name: QUIET AND COMFY 2BD WIFI GRACIA
summary: Chic and charming apartment, located in a ground floor of a quiet and peaceful street of the picturesque Gracia's neighbourhood, only 10 min walk-distance from the famous Sagrada Familia and the avenue Passeig de Gracia, where the Gaudi's monuments are.  HUTB-007442
space: Chic and charming apartment, located in a ground floor of a quiet and peaceful street of the picturesque Gracia's neighbourhood, only 10 min walk-distance from the famous avenue Passeig de Gracia, where the Gaudi's monuments are. And only 3 metro stops from the Plaça Catalunya and the beginning of Las Ramblas. This cosy apartment with high ceilings and the original wooden beams, completely new, has two double bedrooms, one of them with a double bed and the other with two single beds, a pleasant lounge-diner with a comfy double sofa-bed, a fully equipped kitchen and a fully bathroom with shower. This apartment is ideal for groups, families and business travellers. And if you are a big group you can also book 4 more apartments in the same building.

neighborhood_overview: Gracia used to be a separate town on the edge of Barcelona until it was absorbed by its larger neighbour. It is renowned for the fact that it has always managed to maintain an independent character from the rest of the city. The neighbourhood is richly cultural, from the diversity of people walking its streets to street parties, human towers, live music and fireworks, a wide variety of restaurants, and cinemas, theatres and galleries. The unique architecture also adds a charm of its own. The narrow streets, little squares and small buildings are reminiscent of the town it used to be, but the spectrum of restaurants, bars, shops and cinemas betray its status as a part of Barcelona, Catalunya’s capital city. Gracia offers the choice of quiet sleepy side streets alongside the life and bustle of its squares.
notes: Prices are VAT included. Check-in after 8pm: +20€ and after 11pm: +40€ Barcelona City Tax: 2.48 € per person ( >16 years old) per night (for a maximum of 7 nights) NOT INCLUDED in total price (from November 1st 2012). HUTB-007442

host.host_about:
Are you looking for accommodation in Barcelona?
rentBCN offers you a wide range of apartment rentals in Barcelona, all fully-equipped and centrally located at extremely attractive rates. Choose your apartment and book now online.
Through our services, rentBCN opens the doors of Barcelona and wishes you welcome!

reviews.comments: I recommend this  lovely flat very highly. Situated on a quiet street, you only have to walk a few streets away to  find all the hustle and bustle of Gracia. There were three of us staying, but it's extremely spacious and six people could stay there quite easily. And Silvia was an extremely friendly and helpful host!
We had a fine stay in Silvia's apartment in Barcelona (;

The place was in a great position in Gracia, and I felt safe coming back late at night. Air con was great as it is really hot in mid-late July. In general the apartment was good, a kettle and some nice pillows would be good, and would be a bit squeezy for 6, but good for 2 or 3. Silvia and Gianluca both very nice and happy to give good information. The locks on the door were a bit confusing, pay attention when they show you! Thanks Silvia, enjoyed yr hospitality, bronwen, Australia

Die Unterkunft von Silvia, welche wir buchen wollten, war nicht mehr verfügbar. Sie bot uns jedoch eine andere (größere) zum selben Preis an, bei der es sich allerdings nicht um die hier bewertete, sondern um die der Anzeige 'Lovely 2 BD Wifi Gracia' handelte. An unserem Ankunftstag hatte unser Flug zwei Stunden Verspätung, was leider zu einigen Komplikationen bzgl. des Check-In führte und nur durch eine vor Ort wohnende Freundin gelöst werden konnte.

Die o.g. Wohnung selbst befand sich mitten in Gracia, wobei es sich unserer Meinung nach um einen der schönsten und lebendigsten Stadtteile Barcelonas handelt. Es befanden sich diverse kleine Geschäfte und Restaurants in der Nähe und auch zwei Metro-Stationen waren fußläufig in 5-10min zu erreichen.
Leider fühlten wir uns in der Wohnung nicht so wohl, da in den gesamten Räumen ein muffiger Geruch hing. Hinzu kam, dass es im Badezimmer insbesondere morgens und abends erheblich nach Abfluss stank (vermutlich aus dem Abzugsrohr)! Da die Klimaanlage nicht funktionierte und ein Lüften bei unserer Abwesenheit nur auf Kipp möglich war (Erdgeschosswohnung), ließ sich dieser Geruch überhaupt nicht vertreiben. Aber auch bei weit geöffnetem Fenster trat keine Besserung ein. Nach Kontaktaufnahme zu Silvia erschien sie jedoch sofort am nächsten Tag und versuchte, dieses Problem zu lösen, was jedoch während unseres Aufenthalts nicht mehr möglich war. Allerdings brachte sie uns nach unserem Hinweis einen neuen Duschvorhang mit, da der alte gammelig war und wahrscheinlich bereits sehr lange dort hing. Darüber, dass das Wifi nur im Wohnzimmer funktionierte, wusste sie Bescheid (kein Signal in den anderen Räumen aufgrund der dicken Wände). Wir konnten uns gut mit Silvia unterhalten und stellten fest, dass sie eine sehr sympathische Person ist.

Da die Wohnung von Silvia selbst nicht bewohnt wird und mit weiteren des Gebäudes von ihr nur vermietet wird, ist es ihr nachzusehen, dass sie über bestimmte Gegebenheiten nicht Bescheid weiß. Dennoch würden wir als Pärchen die Wohnung nicht wieder buchen, da sie unserer Meinung nach eher für eine Partygruppe geeignet ist.

Appartement idéalement situé dans une petite rue calme entre la Sagrada Familia et le Passeig de Gracia et pas très loin du métro. Quartier sûr pour les retours de soirée. 
Tout le confort dans l'appartement. Rien a redire on recommande!

Logement sympa et plutôt bien placé. Mais j'ai plusieurs critiques à formuler.
Il n'y a pas vraiment d'intimité entre les 2 chambres. Il y a de grandes ouvertures dans les murs fermées par un simple rideau et les chambres communiquent avec le couloir ! La porte de la salle de bain et des toilettes n'est pas une vraie porte mais un système coulissant. Pareil on entend tout. 
Enfin, même si le logement donne sur une petite rue, elle est assez passante donc bruyante. Dommage. 
En conclusion, cher pour ce que c'est. En plus, l'hote n´est pas hyper sympa. elle arrive à 11h pile pour le check out, fait un tour rapide de l'appartement sans un mot et attend que vous sortiez. Sympa :(
Apartamento perfecto para 4 personas. Limpio, nuevo, amplio y espacioso para 4 personas.  Con muy buena ubicación en el barrio de Gracia.
bathroom very small, the apartment was dark because no natural sunlight, damp and very expensive. i would not stay again.
Silvia is very nice. There is no intimacy in this appartment as the bedrooms have big openings in the walls but it's clean and can be great for a family stay.

No hagan caso de las fotos. Nada que ver con la realidad. Muy oscuro y húmedo. El baño con puerta "biombo" , se oye todo. Las habitaciones están abiertas al pasillo por una "ventana" con "cortinilla" Privacidad nula.  Muy ruidoso, se oye perfectamente ruidos de vecinos y calle . NO ES UN PISO ES UN LOCAL mal rehabilitado.  No lo recomiendo en absoluto.
Excelente departamento en la mejor zona de Barcelona, totalmente recomendado.

Greetings to this wonderful Airbnb community! :)

I have been blessed to travel all around the world and experience many cultures! This has allowed me to understand much better travelers and I my passion is to take a good care of your accommodation!

Speak English, French and Spanish! :D
We would be pleased to host you when you come to Montreal for business, relocation or leisure! 

Thank you for checking our apartments and we hope to have you soon!

Alejandro.

reviews.comments: The apartment was wonderful, clean, and had everything we needed. The listing description was completely accurate. The location was excellent. It was less than a 5 minute walk to all of the sites/attractions in Old Montreal and was near great restaurants and bars. The instructions for checking in/getting keys were very clear. We are very happy that we stayed here!
Great place. Exactly as picture is shown. Amazing location!

Unfortunately, this is my first bad experience on airbnb. I would not go through this "host" again as it was not a host who owned the unit but rather a large corporate housing company posing as the owner. They ran multiple units throughout the city it turns out. This is not the welcoming airbnb model and felt as such. When we tried to reach the "host" we had no replies via airbnb or the numbers provided until 24 hours after we tried to make contact. We had a snow storm that delayed our arrival and when we tried to communicate this to the host we never even heard back from her, making for a very stressful experience while on the road. The unit itself was very simple and clean but felt more like a cold abandoned studio apartment than a welcoming and warm stay, especially for the price we expected much more.

Great location!  Enjoyed the ability to get on the subway or grab a BIXI bike right out the front door.  Has a wonderful French bakery around the corner and easy to walk to numerous restaurants.  Wonderful stay and arranging key pickup/drop-off was incredibly simple.

Great location and comfortable bed.  The fireplace does not work so a little disappointed.  For a long stay bring your own washing powder as there is only enough provided for 2 loads unless you call them and pay for more.

location was great, value was great, just wish the check-in was smoother. it's a company that handles multiple airbnb's so your apartment might look a little different than the one in the pictures but same layout. communication was good, there is a phone number you can call and through email we got quick responses. would stay again here again.

space: The living room is full of light, the people living at the other flats are easy going and self dependent people, nobody bothers any other.
description: The flat is at a very central location. Two minutes to Istiklal street, five minutes to any buses, metro, local transportation. Flat has living  room, bedroom, kitchen and bathroom. There is a laundry area outside the flat in the entrance with a washing machine and a drying one. The living room is full of light, the people living at the other flats are easy going and self dependent people, nobody bothers any other. Please don't close the heating while leaving the flat.

host.host_about: I'm a puppet designer, and the founder of the puppet company "Ahsap Cerceve". I travel abroad usually for festivals. As it is not so easy to make your life with puppetry, i built a studio flat to one part of my workshop place, but it became a pretty place to live in.

reviews.comments:
This is an amazing apartment in the happening Taksim-Cihangir neighbourhood. 
What I liked:
Accessability - metro 5 minutes and plenty of buses, taxis
Neighbourhood - great cafes, shops, restaurants, supermarkets
Host - very prompt and helpful
Apartment - has everything for a comfy stay, clean, fresh linen, towels, proper bed, clean bathroom with hot water, heating
Neighbours: very nice and helpful

What I didn’t like so much:
Noise - there’s a school directly behind and you get woken up by the school bell, weekends can get very loud with live music from the cafes - it was so loud on my first night, I complained as I was tired and needed sleep. You can also hear the neighbours snoring. 
All eventually sorted with ear plugs.
El apto de Cagri es tal cual las fotos, muy bien ubicado a pasos de İstiklal, único detalle cuando hace mucho calor se siente la falta de aire o ventilador

The apartment is very central, just a minute from Taksim and İstiklal. I chose the apartment because of the location close to my school.
There were no problems in the apartment: bathroom, heating, refrigerator all worked as they should.
The layout of the apartment is not optimal: the living room seems added to the apartment, and the cold gets in through the windows. Sleeping on the couch in winter is a cold experience - in summer it is no problem.
Also the apartment doesn’t have a table or a desk. This was no problem the first month or two, as I did my writing and reading in cafes, but it would have been nice to have the opportunity to work from the apartment after a couple of months in cafes.

Right next to the apartment is a school and a schoolyard. The windows from the living room face the schoolyard, and the sound from the school is quite loud.

The neighbour upstairs has a cat that gets up early. From the adjacent apartments you  can hear everything from the neighbours, and they from me. The noise didn’t bother me, because I sleep well and am not bothered by noise, but take it into consideration if you are noise sensitive.

The laundry dryer had some problems, so for some weeks I had to find other solutions, but it was solved, and I could wash again.

I didn’t cook at home. Kitchen is small, but clean. There are not many kitchen tools in the kitchen, but as I didn’t cook, this was no problem.

Location is wonderful only 1 min. from Istiklal and 5 min from Taksim square. You can find all utensil and spices for cooking. The apartment is clean and big. There aren't independent entrance. The stairs is very narrow ( the apartment on the 3 floor) it will be uncomfortable if you have a big luggage. For me was a big problem a bad sound insulation. I heard all what happened in the apartment on the up floor. Neighbors from above did not sleep ( it's look like), they constantly walked, talked, laughed and this could go on until the very morning. If poor sound insulation is not a problem for you, then I recommend this apartment.

Close to Carlingford station. Bus to Epping, North Rocks Shopping Centres & Parramatta. Safe parking. A great starting point to explore Sydney. Fast M2 bus connect direct to Sydney CBD City. We are happy active couple who enjoy meeting people from all over the world. We are looking forward to welcoming you.
space: Modern bedroom with views over the valley and gardens. You have your own large bathroom. Comfortable secure lock up room. Friendly hosts. King size single bed. All the features for a comfortable nights sleep and multi day stay.  Great base for Workers moving to Sydney, Travellers and those taking a break to visit and explore Sydney.  Our home is in a terrific location just outside the hustle and bustle of Sydney city life. Own use of large beautiful sandstone full tiled bathroom.  We live in a quiet area of Sydney. Set above Hunts Creek where you can bushwalk or mountain bike all the way to a wild life reserve and Lake Parramatta.  Secure yard, friendly lassie collie dog and awesome rabbit.  It's very green here and out of the hustle, bustle and noise of Sydney. The M2 bus is nearby, 30 minutes to city center. Carlingford Train station is 1.2km a 15 minute walk. neighborhood_overview: Friendly neighbours. This is a very safe, low traffic area. We often have bbq's on the back verandah with neighbours dropping in. There is a new bakery Jenny's and 2 Westfield's shopping centers (North Rocks and Carlingford Court) within 15 minutes walk.  Sydney Olympic Park, Castle Towers and Parramatta Westfields shopping with Eat Street, Theaters and Movies nearby.  UNSW and Macquarie University are both easily accessed within 30 minutes.
notes: We have a house alarm code that we program for you, to allow access. We enjoy people who are themselves, whilst being respectful.
transit: Walk to Train or buses is around 15 minutes. The local M2 bus has you in Sydney CBD Center or The Rocks within 25 minutes. We can lend you a bike if you would like to explore.  If you are really nice and helpful we don't mind giving you a lift. There is safe parking here both on and off the street.  Our home is a brilliant base to use for exploring Sydney and getting out of the City.  Or working locally in Norwest, Parramatta or Pennant Hills.  Also handy for work, as access to many areas is easy on transport routes from here.
access: You are welcome to access - Living and entertainment area, great Kitchen, and Laundry facilities. Large green Back Yard, Bathroom, Front Yard with cafe table setting. As well as large Verandah in rear yard overlooking grassed areas. Its very green. We have a superb range of games. Fun activities and enjoy cooking meals to share if you like sharing and contributing. Or you can be totally independent.
interaction: Happy to interact or provide personal space. We enjoy meeting people from all walks of life. We are an Australian couple, youthful energetic aussies in our 30-40's live here. 1 with European heritage - Swiss, Austrian, German. The other full Australian with Hunter Valley wine country heritage. Loves having a laugh. We are both helpful and organised - mostly!  There are extra rooms, air matresses, sofas and Queen beds can be set up for your partner or friends for an extra charge. Be nice and friendly to us, as we are at home and like to relax too.  Our beautiful Lassie dog is friendly and would love for you to throw his frisbee, rope or join us for a walk.  We are open to playing evening games, Finska, Badmington, dice, 5000 chess...  Having a friendly social drink, sharing stories. Practicing your English or teach us and share what you know.  You are welcome to walk, mountain bike, paddle, exercise, cycle or relax with us.  If you're ever bored we can provide you lots of fun things to
house_rules: We appreciate treating us and our home with with respect and care.  Clean as you go.  Keep safe and Secure the house with Alarm code & key provided.  Communicate arrivals and departures.  Plenty of space in The Fridge and Pantry welcome to facilities for preparing meals, washing and watching TV/DVD's.  Friendly Pets allowed - please check with us 1st. Pets may incur additional daily charge.  Keep yard secure as we have a friendly outside pet collie dog and a lovely rabbit. Non-Smoking.

host.host_about: Settled in Sydney. Bought a large house. Kids have grown up. Have space to spare. Love nature, adventure and activities. Bushwalking, Canyoning, Mountain Biking, Paddling, Exploring, Dancing, Laughing, Sharing, Encouraging, Guiding and Educating. Motto - 'living a full life'.

reviews.comments: My stay with Kondrad and Mish was the best experience I had with airbnb! And I seriously believe that it probably won't get  any better than this! When you are looking for a place to stay this is the one! Not only is their place beautiful but it is the people making it very special. I never ever felt more at home in any other place I stayed at. For a change everything that is shown and described is the real deal- which I experienced not always to be true. Konrad and Mish are very nice and kind and made me feel very welcome. They shared not only their home with me but also their knowledge about their beautiful country and let me be part of their lifes. Thank you for having me stay with you and thank you for taking me with you to the event and on the trip exploring in the Blue Mountains National Park! I also enjoyed the walks with your dog! I had a fantastic time and made new friends ;) I am definitely gonna be back!

My Dad and myself spent two nights at this wonderful house with Konrad and Mish. The description of  what is on offer is spot on.
This is a great house with separate rooms in an decent location adjacent to bushland and not too far from shops and transport. Wonderful hosts who are willing to go the extra distance to help out.  Highly Recommended!

My booking was made at relatively short notice whilst travelling and I was really appreciative that Konrad and Mish were able to accomodate me. The location and accomodation was exactly what I required for my visit to see my mother in Sydney. But Konrad was very organized. Thanks again and if your ever in Canada please don't hesitate to connect with us.  
Kind regards, Tracey and Bob Forster
Konrad was a friendly host.
Lovely, very genuine and welcoming people. Clean room with comfortable bed and very convenient location. I am definitely planning on going back!

I had a great time in the two weeks spent with Konrad and Mish. Felt more like living with housemates than anything else. Konrad took me out on a few mountain bike trails bearing in mind I haven't rode a bike in years but that didn't deter him. Nice location and great company would highly recommend....just don't ask Konrad for his review on your food as you will get the review of an Australia Manu

Great place and Konrad was really flexible and accommodating when I had to check in late. Even fed me dinner upon my late arrival! Really thankful for the room on such short notice. Just what I needed. Would recommend konrads place and would happily stay again!
Was a very enjoyable experience. I felt very at home in the house. Will stay there again.
All very good once again
Once again great to be there.
Was great to enjoy dinner and chat with both Konrad and Mich. Great place to stay.
Once again a very pleasant stay

Mish (Konrad was away during my stay) was a superb host who was friendly and welcoming the whole time. Even breakfast was offered which was lovely! I also borrowed their laundry equipment during my stay.

Communication was clear and details were provided via SMS. 

The room is spacious with good natural sunlight, and was accurate to what the photos showed. Everything was really clean including all shared spaces. 

Thanks for having me and being so friendly!

I had a great stay at Konrad and Mish places. They're lovely and friendly people and gave me plenty of advice on what to see and do in and around Sydney. The place is like advertised, so comfy room , nice bathroom and great kitchen.

I would suggest to have a car , as the transit system in this particular area is not great. Also be aware that the room can be really hot on warm days!

But it's still a great place to stay ;)
All good

Helt kort, 10/10 over hele linjen.
Konrad og Michelle bor i et smukt og roligt villa kvarter i Carlingford, i et dejligt hyggeligt og sikkert hjem, det ligger tæt på både supermarked og togstation. De er utroligt imødekommende og søde værter og står altid klar med en hjælpende hånd hvis det mangler og de er fantastiske til at komme med råd og vejledning om gode steder at besøge, som turist. De er glade for at inkludere dig i både sports aktiviteter, gå-tur med hunden eller brætspil om aftenen.
Det var en fornøjelse at bo hos dem og jeg vender gerne tilbage.

Great people 
Very friendly
Very clean and tidy
Thanks to you both for the opportunity to stay and connect with you two, much appreciated.  My stay was nice and comfortable, I'd stay again. Best wishes :-)

Great hosts. Konrad is a wonderful man and fun talking to. Got to learn a great deal from you for the short time spent. Wish we could chat more but nonetheless hope to keep in touch with you.

Michelle was always busy and working but caring too. You guys makw a great couple

Thanks for hosting me guys 

Regards
Husain
Nice area, nice house and nice hosts. I am glad that I picked up this place.
Energetic and hardworking hosts. Thank you for your education on wines, and for bearing with me for sometimes improper use of kitchen facilities :-)
Thank you for hosting me for yet another week :-)
Stayed here for 3 weeks in total, hesitating to move mainly due to too much luggage plus having many things bought after coming here :-)
Konrad and Mish are very nice. And their friendly dog is so cute. It is a really nice place. I spent a nice week here.

it's been such a wonderful experience staying at Korad and Michelle's. They were very lovely so does their fluffy family member, Morpheus:)) 

It's a very clean and tidy homely place, very peaceful and quiet at night. The best part I loved is the view you have when you look out to the window from the room, it was AMAZING!!! It's the backyard but it's not just a backyard, it's a great piece of beauty whenever you look at it, so peaceful!!
Perfect hosts in every way, thank you for making my first Airbnb experience a great one!

name: North Avalon Beach Apartment
summary: Beachside luxury at its absolute finest! The North Avalon Beach Apartment is the downstairs apartment and takes pride of place in one of North Avalon's most tightly held surf side addresses, less than 400m from the beach, or an easy 10min walk from Avalon.
space: North Avalon Beach Apartment is completely private and self contained on the ground floor of the two storey home - there is a fully inter-grated Vergola roof system giving total privacy between both apartments  The apartment features beautifully rustic exposed sandstone walls and overlooks the outdoor entertaining area and garden. APARTMENT FEATURES: *Master bedroom with queen bed, oversized ensuite and bath. *2nd bedroom with queen bed and large ensuite *All linen and towels provided *Large living area *TV *Foxtel *WIFI *Kitchenette  *Seimens Washer/dryer *Hairdryers *Hair straighteners *Private entertaining BBQ area and garden *Nespresso coffee machine  *Shopping/Airport shuttle service *Backyard
description: Beachside luxury at its absolute finest! The North Avalon Beach Apartment is the downstairs apartment and takes pride of place in one of North Avalon's most tightly held surf side addresses, less than 400m from the beach, or an easy 10min walk from Avalon. North Avalon Beach Apartment is completely private and self contained on the ground floor of the two storey home - there is a fully inter-grated Vergola roof system giving total privacy between both apartments  The apartment features beautifully rustic exposed sandstone walls and overlooks the outdoor entertaining area and garden. APARTMENT FEATURES: *Master bedroom with queen bed, oversized ensuite and bath. *2nd bedroom with queen bed and large ensuite *All linen and towels provided *Large living area *TV *Foxtel *WIFI *Kitchenette  *Seimens Washer/dryer *Hairdryers *Hair straighteners *Private entertaining BBQ area and garden *Nespresso coffee machine  *Shopping/Airport shuttle service *Backyard Guests have their own private entra
neighborhood_overview: We live in a quiet but friendly neighbourhood.  A short walk to the north Avalon shops including: cafe, convenience store, bottle shop and surf shop.  Also within walking distance is Avalon shopping village which has a variety of restaurants/cafes, bank, cinema and grocery shops.
notes: We do have air conditioning and would request all the air conditioners and electricity be turned off when not in residence.  We would also appreciate not leaving doors and windows open when the air conditioners are being used. There is a maximum of 4 persons staying in the apartment at any time. We do not charge for extra beds as we do not allow any more than 4 people.
transit: A short walk to the main bus line to palm beach, nearby towns or to the city.   We also offer an airport pick up or drop off service at a small fee.
access: Guests have their own private entrance and will be provided with keys on arrival.
interaction: Our guests are given complete privacy. Additional services such as airport shuttles or grocery shopping can be arranged.
house_rules: WE HAVE A VERY STRICT NO SMOKING ANYWHERE ON THE PREMISES - BOTH INSIDE AND OUTSIDE INCLUDING THE DRIVEWAY THANK YOU.     We have a strict no party, or events policy.   Quiet time after 10:00pm especially in the outside area. There is a MAXIMUM of 4 adults only at this apartment

host.host_location: Avalon Beach, New South Wales, Australia

reviews.comments: My boyfriend and I were greeted by Angela and Geoff upon arrival and taken to the ground level of their private home  - their place looks just like the pictures!! What a great way to spend a mini weekend getaway. Angela and Geoff are so warm and welcoming and make you feel right at home from the moment we met them. Great place to stay in Palm beach, highly recommend their beautiful home! Couldn't get any better than this

We had such a wonderful stay here in this gorgeous apartment with my husband and his parents. It really does feel like a tropical retreat away from it all! 
Thank you to Angela for making our stay so special. Every little detail had been thought about and Angela went above and beyond to make us feel so comfortable.
It is stunning accommodation like this and wonderful hosts that make a getaway so perfect and memorable.

Thank you! xo
Amazing location, Amazing house and amazing Host! Would definitely stay again. It was a paradise :)
Immaculate home in great location. We had an enjoyable overnight stay.

Angela was very welcoming and hospitability upon arrival.  The apartment was amazing and our only regret was that we did not stay for more days. The beach was extremely close with all amenities within walking distance. Would love to come back and stay for a longer period. 
Thank you  Angela and hope to see you soon.

Wow wee!! What a brilliant time away. Geoff and Angela's place is just 'Brilliant', from the outdoor alfresco living space to the master bedroom suite, these areas are just perfect!
Oops I forgot to mention the beautiful back garden as well!

'We'll be back'

Cheers Damian Tanya and Jude.

We could not have been happier with our stay in Avalon!!!! The house was everything described and more!!! Angela had added so many personal touches such as flowers and fruit, fresh bread and other bits and pieces in the fridge  .... 
The house was immaculate and had everything we could have wanted!!
We cannot recommend Angela and Geoff's house enough and hope to be able to come back again one day ...

Angela and Geoff were fantastic hosts. They were very welcoming, gave us plenty of information and even offered to help us source dinner. The apartment is just stunning. It is beautifully decorated and very comfortable. The beds were really comfortable. The apartment was so well equipped with more than we could possibly need. We really appreciated the fresh bread, fruit and variety of tea available. Angela and Geoff even organised a cot and high chair for my son so I didn't have to bring the portacot or worry about chasing him around to feed him. I wish we needed to stay longer! Highly recommended.

The house is amazing and even better than the photos! We rent a couple of holiday homes ourselves and were blown away with the quality and value of the property. Lovely soft furnishings throughout, plush linen, Bose sound system and large TV, and the added extras such as flowers and soaps make for a truly luxurious stay. Although there is another apartment upstairs, we never felt that this invaded our privacy, since the owners have now installed fully automatic roof system. 

We loved our stay there and wish we could have stayed longer. Could not recommend more...

Absolutely amazing, thanks Angela and Geoff for your hospitality! Wonderful place in a perfect location, we had the best time and enjoyed having our relaxation hen's getaway here. The yard was perfect for afternoon yoga! We'll definitely be back again :)

This North Avalon Beach Apartment was perfect.  Angela was so accommodating, and the pictures don't even do the place justice.  From extremely responsive to our inquiries regarding accessibility issues, to the fruit and bread left for us upon arrival, our trip to Sydney was made by the friendly and comfortable accommodation.  Would recommend to all!

What an incredible sanctuary! We had the best time staying at Angela's beautiful home. Every detail had been thought of to make our stay enjoyable. Angela was a fantastic host and the home was very relaxing in its beautiful surrounds and lovely furnishings.

Angela and Geoff were so welcoming. It was lovely, comfortable, spacious yet cosy and very relaxing. You don't want for anything in this little sanctuary as everything is already thought out for you. Truly feel like you're in a home away from home. Pictures are exactly how you find it. Location is very convennient too. Thank you so much!!!

Felt very welcome in this gorgeous house. Was very comfortable, spacious, clean and peaceful. Loved the proximity to Avalon beach. Had a lovely swim and walk there. 
Looking forward to another stay there one day.

Fantastic, beautifully appointed home in an amazing Northern Beaches location - better than the photos if that's possible!  Angela was the perfect host, made us feel right at home and so many nice touches!  Thanks!

Angela and Geoff have created a stunning, homey getaway spot in North Avalon. So close to local cafes and shops and short walk to the beach. Perfect for a quick weekend away- exactly what we needed. They were very accommodating and have put effort into lovely little touches for their guests which make it that little bit more special. We will be back!!

Angela and Geoff made us feel very welcome.
The apartment was stunning and equipped with all the latest technology. 
Private entry so felt like it was our own place.
Location was fantastic to use as a base to explore Avalon and the Palm beach area. Would highly recommend and would return again.

We loved our stay at North Avalon Beach Apartments. Hosts Angela & Jeff were both very friendly, welcoming & helpful during our stay picking us up from the ferry & offering to drive us anywhere during our stay. Although they are living up stairs the downstairs apartment is extremely private, quiet & separate to up stairs. It feels as if there is no one else around. This neighbour hood is filled with many other beautiful beach houses and feels very safe and welcoming. We will definitely be back to stay at the North Avalon Beach apartments again. Thank you!

What a great place to stay and explore Avalon. The apartment was very welcoming, even better than the photos, with every little consideration covered. 

The outdoor patio was perfect to sit and relax with a cheese plate and wine. 

Angela and Geoff made us feel very at home, and allowed us the privacy to enjoy the weekend away with our kids. Angela also made the extra effort for our kids to enjoy the break - plenty of toys and books and even offered a cot and highchair.

We will be back!

Amazing location and stay. Better than the pictures. Really nice sunny backyard and very private. Inside furnishings and bed were five star and super close to cafe and headland walk. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay and our the owners were lovely. Highly recommended!!!!

We had a lovely time staying at Angela's downstairs apartment. The separate entrance gave us the privacy we were looking for & we were able to enjoy the BBQ and modern appliances. The Foxtel access to movies & such was a nice touch as the living room was absolutely beautiful to relax in. Would recommend up to 4 people staying at this spot if they're looking for an Avalon trip.

Angela and Geoff made us feel so welcome! Their property is stunning and they don't miss a single detail - everything is beautiful, right down to the hand soap and shampoo. I can't recommend this property enough to anyone looking at staying in the northern beaches. Amazing!
Angela's house is really stunning, attention to details, very close to beach. Angela and Geoff are both very nice, helpful and welcoming. Highly recommend!!!

Fantastic apartment and only a 1 minute walk to Avalon beach. The apartment is beautifully furnished having 2 large double bedrooms both with ensuite bathrooms and it has everything you need. The hosts were very thoughtful and left fresh milk, bread and loads of other essentials, even books for our kids. The apartment is very private and looks out on a lush garden, the house is on a quiet street and access to the beach is  at the end of the road. Avalon village is also within walking distance and has lots of cafes, restaurants and cute shops. Absolutely recommend this property!!

Angela and Geoff were very fast to respond to messages and check in was smooth. The space itself is very well appointed and spacious. We stayed here for our wedding accommodation and there were so many small details that made our stay really special. From the delicious bottle of french champagne, farmers market strawberries, bowl of fruit and yogurt, to the beautiful smelling fresh garden roses placed through out the property.
If you like a good bath then you will love this one, the outlook is onto a little tropical garden area and it was raining when I had mine and the sound of the raindrops on the leaves outside the window was so relaxing.
Overall our experience was perfect - this would have to be our favourite airbnb stay to date.
Thanks for making it so special Angela and Geoff!
Highly recommended! Great hosts, wonderful light filled property with every little detail considered. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and look forward to the next visit.

This truly is "Beachside luxury at its absolute finest". A very unique and beautiful apartment,  with high standards of luxury that I have not even experienced in some 5 star hotels.  

Angela and Geoff are absolutely wonderful hosts and really amazing to chat to. They obviously put tremendous work, pride and passion into presenting the apartment to their guests in such an impeccable way. 

Such an incredible base to immerse yourself in the salubrious beauty of Sydney's northern beaches. 

I cannot wait to come back here some time,  a truly spectacular experience.

This place is a GEM and truly perfection! Angela and Geoff were the perfect hosts - great communication and very welcoming on arrival!

We loved/enjoyed every second of our 5 nights stay! Didn't want to leave this paradise. 

The apartment is very well equipped and everything is high standard. The terrace has a BBQ and is great for outdoor dining. The garden is very spacious and with a lot of privacy. We were travelling with a baby and were provided with a portable cot which was very much appreciated!

We were surprised by the complimentary goods in the kitchen and we loved the beautiful flowers in every room. 

The kitchen is very well equipped and has everything you need for cooking. 

The location is great and only a couple of minutes walk to the beach. The area is far away from traffic and ideal for a getaway. 

It was by far the best place we ever stayed at!!

From the warmest of welcomes and first moment you enter Angela & Geoff’s home, you instantly realise that you are about experience a very unique property and enjoy all the creature comforts that make their home feel as if it is yours. 

Each element of how the property caters for you is well thought out beyond your expectations, notwithstanding how serene its surrounds are and proximity it is to town, beach and coastal views. A return visit is already on the cards!

Angela and Geoff are such a wonderful host, the house is so stylish, chic and super nice. I would highly recommend who loves to visit Avalon beach to stay at this lovely house. Thanks Angela and Geoff and hope to see you again!

The place is beautifully decorated and very chic,even better than the photos. I was so impressed by all the decor, art and furniture , it had a "wow" factor. I would definitely recommend staying there!
Angela and Geoff are the perfect hosts.

The entire experience was not only great but amazing and even better than the illustrations in the photographs.  Angela and her other half are excellent hosts and the amenities, etc. were top notch all the way!  I even took a photo of a few products to buy when back at my house.  

I will definitely be staying here again...and again.
Thanks for a great weekend!
Thank You Angela, everything was Brilliant

Loved this apartment in Avalon. Beautifully styled and finished with a cool, sophisticated beachy aesthetic and a lovely outlook into the garden. Angela was a great host, and went over and above to make sure we had everything we needed and more - she even provided fresh, organic fruit and croissants.

Highly recommend this place
We had a great long weekend at this place. Would highly recommended it.

Not only are Angela and Geoff the nicest most easy going people, their place is one of the nicest homes I have ever been in. It was the perfect size and had everything we needed. Angela has decorated the place beautifully, it is clean and warm and homely.
The hospitality and attention to detail is on another level, from fresh fruit and beautiful classical music on arrival, and a beautiful souvenir on checkout we just loved our stay even though it was short. It is in a great location, minutes to Palm Beach on one end and Newport the other, it is also right near the main street at Avalon making it the perfect location.
We absolutely loved our stay in their beautiful home and would love to go back again soon xx
The place was great, spacious and very private. Perfect little getaway. Our hosts were lovely, very welcoming and helpful. Highly recommend.

Angela and her husband Jeff were so great. Such lovely, kind hosts. Their Airbnb is phenomenal, fresh yoghurt and jam in the fridge, fresh fruit and a gorgeous, spotless apartment. My three friends and I had a blast.
Would absolutely stay again. 
Thanks Angela and Jeff!!
A lovely, modern, beautifully decorated apartment within easy walking distance of North Avalon Beach. Very comfortable bed and gorgeous bathroom(s).

Angela and Geoff were amazing hosts. They allowed us to check in early but we came too early, but it was a great opportunity for us to meet them and they're absolutely lovely! The place itself is beautiful, we stayed there to get ready for our wedding and the pictures are perfect. The location is central to all the beautiful beaches and close to the shops. We would definitely recommend staying here, in fact we're looking forward to the next opportunity for us to stay.

We were made to feel very welcome from the moment we arrived.  Leading up to our stay the communication was excellent and Angela our host went above and beyond to accommodate our every wish. The house was beautiful with everything we would wish for and more.  Extremely comfortable, relaxing and a very easy stroll to the beach and town.  Thanks for making our stay so wonderful, we would love to come back sometime and will definitely recommend the Beach Apartment to our friends and family

Angela and Geoff are warm, lovely hosts. We have never had such a well-stocked larder and fridge in any other Airbnb we have stayed at! The flat is beautifully appointed and the quality of amenities is superb. There are all comforts one could possibly wish for and the garden is a delight. You can walk to the beach in less than 5 minutes and to Avalon village in less than 10. We will definitely be back.

Great hosts who go out of their way to make sure you have the best time! The place is lovely, stilish, cozy, spacious and so well located! Wouldn't consider staying anywhere else in Avalon! Thanks Angela and Geoff for sharing your beautiful house with us, we've had special holidays!

This was my 2nd stay at Angela's place.  She and Geoff are excellent hosts who really go out of their way to make sure that you're comfortable and enjoy your stay/holiday! 

They remembered that my son (5) liked a particular type of milk and ensured that this was the brand stocked in the fridge when we arrived.  There were also lots of fresh fruits and delicious fresh bread from a local patisserie.  

We brought pop up soccer goals and a ball for my son to play a bit in the back garden and they didn't mind at all.

There are beach chairs, a beach umbrella and little extras left for you to use during your stay that makes the whole experience special and easy.  They've really tried to think of everything that you might need during your stay.

The house is a 5 minute walk to the beach and a short walk to town.  As I was with a little one I drove more than I walked and Palm and Whale Beach are also a short drive away.

I have recommended many of my friends to stay here and I will certainly be staying here again soon!  Thanks again for making our summer holiday in Avalon the best!

I have stayed in over 30 AirBnB's and can say with certainty that this is one of the very best.

Beautiful apartment, wonderfully furnished and equipped and spotlessly clean.  Angela and Geoff were the perfect hosts in every way.  Very keen to stay again soon - even though I live a very long way away!

We have had the most amazing 5 nights at Angela and Geoffs home. The house is stunning and exactly as described and shown in the pictures. They have thought of absolutely everything you may need while staying away from home, even the beautiful toiletries in the bathrooms and the welcome pack. The location is fabulous - 2 minutes to the beach and a 5 minute walk to the shops/restaurants. We hired a car to explore the area which was beautiful and to experience some of the other restaurants.
We would love to go back and stay again.

What a beautiful home to stay. Attention to details from Angela and Geoff is what made our stay memorable... they have though of everything all you need is your personal belongings! Which makes it easy while traveling with kids! Even after a big storm hit the area the night before we were able to check in early! The area is peaceful, quiet and yet so close to all amenities... we most enjoyed the 5 mns walk to Avalon beach the kids (4/10) loved spending time surfing, making sand castles, relaxing and then going for a bite in Avalon city... one of our best day was walking up the light house and have lunch at the boat house.
If you are looking for the perfect get away to visit the northern beaches don't look any longer you found it!!!

Angela and Geoff were wonderful hosts. From the minute we arrived, they warmly welcomed us into their beautiful home. If you're after a relaxing weekend away, you cannot beat this property and location.
Great break with the parents.

Our stay was perfect. A beautiful apartment with high quality appliances, furniture and a beautifully kept garden. We stayed two nights and were very comfortable... loved the BBQ and outdoor space. Our 3 year old loved the garden. It's only a short drive to the shops and beaches (and a short walk to north Avalon beach). A quiet, peaceful location. We definitely recommend and would stay again.

Our stay at Angela & Geoff's stunning apartment was perfect from start to finish. The apartment itself is decorated to the highest level of quality and feels truly like a home away from home. Angela communicated well ensuring that we had everything we needed both prior to and during our stay. The location is also great, a short walk to Avalon Beach and a short drive from Palm Beach makes it easy to explore both. I would highly recommend staying here, it is great value for money - so great that we didn't want to leave!
Thank you very much Angela and Geoff, we have wonderful stay there! will definitely visit again and recommend to our friends !

We had a fantastic stay and can highly recommend this apartment to anyone! This place is simply stunning, very tastefully decorated and everything is of the highest quality. You can tell Angela and Geoff put lot of effort in decorating this place to the highest standard. The outdoor area was beautiful and our little girl loved the big garden area. The location is perfect, close to Avalon center and a short drive from Whale beach and Clareville, two of our favourite beaches in the area. My husband surfs so he was very happy with the short walk to Avalon beach which is stunning as well. We will def be back!

My partner and I stayed here for our babymoon and it was magnificent. Beautiful space, really friendly hosts and fantastic location. Has everything you need (loved the Foxtel and bath!) and Avalon is such a great location year round with fantastic restaurants and great walks/beach. We had the best time. Highly recommend.

Angela was an outstanding host.. in fact she was the best host I have ever had! Will definitely stay again, the place was very well designed with quality finishes. We loved our holiday. Thank you for making it so lovely.

Angela and Geoff were exceptional hosts in every aspect of our stay. They made us feel really welcome and provided us with more than we expected. We enjoyed complimentatry wine, champagne, bread, milk yougurt and cheese which were just a few of the personal touches we experienced. The home is clean, well presented and neat with a contemporary flair. Located in one of Sydney's best kept secrets, Avalon is a great holiday destination. The superb is quint and quite, with one of the best beaches on your door step. We highly recommend Angela and Geoff's home, best AIRBNB EXPERINCE TO DATE!

Angela and Geoff were amazing hosts. They had gone out of their way to ensure that they had stocked the kitchen with not only all the necessities but many thoughtful touches from local stores etc. The apartment exceeded our expectations. It's a quiet and tranquil location. Angela and Geoff were always available to give advice and directions etc. but went to great lengths to give us privacy and to make us feel that the space was our own. Lovely people and a beautiful property.

Angela and Geoff were wonderful hosts, providing extra touches and attention to our needs. They really went out of their way! The communication was great and everything went smoothly. What a lovely space. The kids loved it. Thank you!

We absolutely loved our stay at Angela and Geoff's place!! They made us feel so welcome, communication was fantastic and there were so many thoughtful little touches and extras that made this stay our best Air BnB experience. The apartment is stunning, the space is spotless with absolutely everything that you might need and the location is perfect. We can't wait to go back!!!
A really lovely place to stay.
Angela is a truly wonderful host. Outstanding communication, gorgeous house with incredible hospitality; we can’t wait to come back!
We had a wonderful weekend at Angela’s place. It was immaculately kept, warm and welcoming as was Angela herself. I couldn’t recommend her place any higher, we felt very relaxed and right at home.
Second time staying here and was once again wonderful.  Clean, comfy, great location, wonderful hosts with great local knowledge and so helpful.  Thanks for a wonderful stay.  We will be back
What an amazing apartment. Everything provided was of the highest quality and Angela and Geoff went out of their way to make us and our children welcome.
We really enjoyed our stay, beautiful place and very relaxing.

We enjoyed our stay at Angela and Geoff's place!! They made us feel very welcome. the communication was great and the apartment was really great with a superb AV installation, this and all other extras made this stay our best Air BnB experience. The apartment is stunning, the space is spotless with absolutely everything that you might need and the location is perfect. if possible we really wou;d like to go back there.

We loved the accommodation, Angela's hospitality and all the added extras (Bread, milk, yogurt and fruit in the fridge, hairdryer and straightener in the bathroom, along with beach towels, sun umbrella and beach chairs to take to the beach). 
Angela is a fabulous host. She greeted us on arrival and provided information on facilities, she was more than happy to assist during our stay and accommodate our requests. A guide was available on local restaurants etc. The apartment is a beautifully decorated, quiet and relaxing home away from home and only minutes from the beach. Top rate accommodation we would not hesitate in recommending. Loved it.

Angela and Geoff were so hospitable and thoughtful. Generosity in every thing they do makes for a wonderful airbnb experience. My Daughter and I visited the Avalon Beach apartments for a week. On Arrival - When we arrived we found to our delight a superb selection of Freshly baked bakery Bread, Premium Fruit (including mango, rock melon, blue berries and raspberries), Yogurt and the milk of our choice. We asked for an early check in which at this time of year (January)they could not do but to compensate there was a bottle of French Champagne in the fridge and a bottle of Aussie Red on the counter. But this was to be the first of many surprises. I then discovered a lovely selection of premium cheeses in the crisper. As well as selection of unopened French jams and spreads just added to the already extensive pantry. The kitchen – every need or requirement had been carefully thought of. Every type of glassware and china in the cupboards was of the highest standards in design and style and again very generously provided. The kitchen appliances, fridge, washer/Dryer, stove was all of the highest specification and all as new. Entertaining was a so easy. The generous designer lounge spilled out onto the terrace. State of the art technology provided many hours immersed in the latest movies. The windows featured an electronic block out blind for privacy and to mange the sun. Internally a thoughtful arrangement of blinds managed the totally privacy of the areas. Again, premium appliance including a Bose sound System and Jet Master Fireplace. Designer furniture, Interiors books and magazines. Picture windows opening on to the stunning tropical garden. As well as delightful collection of original artwork from the region. The Terrace – again every need had been carefully thought of. Centering on a delightful table for 8 the designer flagstone floor flowed seamlessly via concertina doors opening into the lounge. A huge 4 burner BBQ, ceiling mounted outdoor heating. Generous collection of Comfortable premium garden furniture to enjoy the stunning garden. Stylish beach mats provided. In the main bed room good design was again present in everything they had chosen. The premium beds and linen and towels were all immaculate. Stylish bathroom, double sink and huge European bath, heated towel rails, hair straightener and hair dryer, Spare Razors, makeup removal pads, cue tips and designer toiletries. – again, everything carefully provided. Double hanging and 30 black velvet covered hangers – generosity again. A fresh arrangement of orchids on the Dresser. Generous selection of fresh designer Turkish towels and Beach bags. Generous designer bath and beach towels provided. The second bedroom featured a double bed and again generous hanging and storage. It features a generous library of classics and current design and food books that kept me entertained for hours. Another large stylish en-suite bathroom with every need again considered. Again all immaculate. Local area recommendations for everything we could need in restaurants and cafés was provided in Blue Binder...

We had a fantastic time at Angela’s. Travelling with our 22-month old toddler, we appreciated the extra amenities - toys, travel cot, high chair and a stocked pantry. Angela even bought bread, milk and yogurt for us before we arrived. How thoughtful! 

The apartment itself was very clean, tastefully furnished and well cared for. Both the outdoor and indoor space was toddler-friendly. Our son could easily occupy himself minutes on end in the garden! We also enjoyed putting some beautiful, fresh produce on the barbie. Dinner sorted! (The apartment has a small open kitchen. The stove is too small for any serious cooking so bbq is the easier option.)

In terms of location, the house is walking distance from the beach. The road is not flat though and there are a few steps of stairs to access the beach. One can walk to the town centre via the beach but we always drove as we would often come back with shopping.

All in all, we’d highly recommend Angela’s apartment to any couple or small family travelling to Sydney in the summer.

What an amazing place to stay and such wonderful hosts. It’s tempting to want to keep it a secret, but too good not to write a review. We had 4 of us come up from Sydney for a couple of nights for our friends’ wedding and we had such a lovely time staying at North Avalon Apartment. From top to bottom everything was very well thought of, well-equipped, tasteful and clean. I echo all the previous comments about how awesome Angela and Geoff are. Angela even drove the 4 of us to the wedding up at Palm Beach and offered to pick us up afterwards too. Such a champion. Super easy to communicate with, quick to respond and always helpful, not that we needed any help - absolutely everything was done! 
Thanks again.
Immaculate, every detailed considered, beautiful quality furnishings, great hospitality and peaceful environment. Definitely returning!

Had a wonderful stay at Angela’s !
Can’t wait to return 
Beautiful home with lovely relaxing feel 
Future guest will not be disappointed

Probably the best air bnb we’ve ever stayed in. Such care and attention to everything you would ever need. Fresh fruit, dairy products and bread provided and asked what we’d like pre-arrival. In addition to fresh flowers, an amazingly stocked kitchen, and a great place which was so clean - our hosts provided a range of toys (and kitchen utensils) for our toddler which were very well received. She loved playing in the garden and we enjoyed our bbqs while she was asleep in the evening! Thanks for a wonderful weekend

This is a perfect Avalon escape, walking distance to the beach and immaculately presented. Angela has considered every detail, from fresh bread, kids toys because we needed them, and Champagne. There’s a perfect green lawn for kids or sunbathing, and shaded outdoor dining. 
The kitchen is well appointed, the fridge full size, the aircon works well. 
Loved our stay!! We’ll be back!
It was a lovely stay, from how beautiful the place is to how amazing Angela was with making me welcome and comfortable. Everything was worlds above average.

Angela’s place is stunning!! The thoughtful touches everywhere were great and we had a very relaxing and peaceful stay. The outside area is perfect for dinners and with the heater we could stay outside until late. Angela was lovely and got us absolutely everything we needed. Highly recommend and we’ll definitely be back :)

Angela’s place could not have been more perfect for our stay. Private, quiet, clean and beautiful! The amenities are amazing, everything from bathroom products to beach chairs, towels, and beautiful bread, fruit, cheeses and champagne for our arrival. This place is a rare find in Avalon!

This is a wonderful spot - easily walkable to great beaches and all the local amenities in Avalon
Angela is a really wonderful hostess - I cannot recommend it highly enough

What a beautiful place. Such a warm welcome from Angela and Geoff, a beautiful space with 5* finishing touches. A really beautiful, peaceful garden to enjoy a long lunch and so close to Avalon.

We would love to come back again. A wonderful experience throughout. 

Thanks so much Angela and Geoff - outstanding hospitality at its best and a really memorable night away.

Great dinner at Berts restaurant (Merivale) in Newport - an easy Uber ride and lovely meal.

All expectations were met at Angela’s Airbnb. Such a beautiful setting with perfect touches inside and outside of this property. I highly recommend a stay at least once, thank you Angela for your kind hospitality.
Amazing apartment! Cosy and perfect for a getaway from the city. Every little touch was perfect and definitely well worth it.

Angela’s place was absolutely perfect! Even better than I expected it to be from the photos. The apartment has everything you need and is decorated with a lot of attention to detail!  Angela also provided Eggs, Fruit, Milk and Bread for breakfast. The conversation, check-in and out was super easy and quick.
We loved our stay!
Thank you!

What a wonderful weekend. Angela was easy to communicate with right from the beginning. Geoff gave us a warm welcome and tour of the house when we arrived. The kitchen was fully equipped, there were many fine touches throughout and it is clear the space has been designed for comfort. It was clean, luxurious and had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend Angela and Geoff’s apartment!

This is a special unit.  The details of rich, beautiful fabrics, cozy blankets, lovely decor, not cluttered and simply stunning. The outdoor space was a great place to eat even though it rained quite a bit.  The heating element outside kept us warm and there are lots of throws and blankets if you need more.  The fridge had champagne, a gorgeous cheese plate, yogurt, fruit, milk (all our choices), crackers and more. This was in the top 2 airbnb's I've stayed in (and I am a veteran!). The walk into Avalon village was easily done via a pathway, just a few minutes away. The unit is quiet with blackout shades on every window. You will be very pleased with your choice.

Angela's place lives up to all your expectations.  It is beautifully and tastefully furnished and spotlessly clean and all the added extras were absolutely fantastic.  We will most definitely be back.
The best place I have stayed

Beautiful apartment with everything you could wish for with lots of added extras. Breakfast provisions were delicious. Great location, close to Palm Beach, the Boat House and the northern beaches. A truly wonderful stay and lovely host.
A lovely place to stay, great location and a stunning property! We will be going back again no question about it.
Brilliant in all aspects. Will definitely stay here again

Great location and is a short walk to North Avalon Beach. The space itself was exquisite and everything catered for. Angela is an amazing host and very accomodating. We would not hesitate staying again or recommending to our friends

Thank you Angela for amazing accomodation. Beautiful North Avalon Apartment exceeded all expectations. Sparkling clean, very stylish, and comfortable accomodation. Best Airbnb experience. I can't wait to come back to this place for another weekend away. Highly recommended.
Absolutely stunning. The most amazing get away in the most amazing home! Angela is wonderful!
Angela's place will not disappoint. It stays true to its online images and description but its the little touches and Angela's friendliness that made our stay extra special. Thanks Angela!
Our stay was amazing. Everything about Angela's accomodation was exceptional. Beautiful decor, calm and serene.

What a great find! We loved our stay here. Angela's place is exactly as it looks in the photos! Self check-in was a breeze and communication with Angela was excellent. The location was perfect and easy to find. Angela went above and beyond to make sure our stay was comfortable and the information pamphlet she sent was very thorough. The apartment is also close to Avalon beach and the supermarkets/shopping strip which was very convenient. I would recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a beach getaway :)

Incredibly designed apartment. Super stylish with all the amenities and more provided.
Angela was super quick to respond and very nice to deal with. Highly recommend

This was the best Airbnb we’ve experienced. Such a beautiful and stylish  space. My husband and I stayed here with another couple and it was the perfect size for 2 couples. The host went out of her way to ensure an easy stay. We really appreciated the milk, bread, yogurt, Nespresso pods and fruit placed in the kitchen for us. Awesome location with the beach at the bottom of the street and an easy stroll to the local shops and cafes. Hope to return one day soon.
Our stay at Angela’s was amazing. The place is stunning and clean !! Very close to the beach and local shops. We really enjoyed our stay!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Angela’s - a fantastic place to spend a few nights in Sydney’s Northern Beaches, either to explore or just relax. The property is located in a quiet, residential area but in walking distance of Avalon beach, and all local amenities. The space is beautifully decorated and maintained, with lots of space for 4 adults to share and enjoy. Angela was an extremely thoughtful host (extra thanks for the wonderful food and drink supplies that welcomed us on arrival) and easy to contact throughout. Would highly recommend staying here, wish we could have stayed longer!

Angela's place is absolute luxury! We loved the provision of additional fruit and gourmet food! It's a really a nice touch and super handy when in a rush. I booked her place the day before my wedding - and it did not disappoint. Angela herself is very helpful and responsive. I would definitely stay here again for a holiday experience.
Angela’s place is absolutely wonderful - she has thought of absolutely everything. You are guaranteed a perfect time when you stay here!

We enjoyed our stay at this lovely property. Quiet location with a nice private outdoor area adjacent to the garden. Facilities were excellent and the hostess was great to deal with. We would definitely stay here again.

I would highly recommend this apartment- we really couldn't have asked for anything more. The apartment is beautiful and cosy, had everything we needed, and was fresh and spotless . Lots of lovely extra touches- luxury bathroom products, books, essentials for the beach, delicious food in the fridge.  Great location. Communication was  prompt and easy.

Angela & Geoff’s place is beyond exceptional. My husband and I and our 2 young children spent 2 very enjoyable and comfortable nights there. The apartment is private, really quiet and beautifully stylish. The beds are the most comfortable I’ve ever slept in. Angela made sure there were toys and a travel cot for my 2 year old and responded so quickly to any questions I had. Fantastic stay, loved it!!!

10/10
Thank you for your help

An absolute gem, superb location and very luxurious. We loved just strolling to the beach and sitting in the garden. Angela and Geoff were fantastic hosts, very helpful and on hand to assist. We would definetely stay again.

Angela's place was inviting, cosy and contemporary at the same time. my family and I quickly settled in during our stay and felt very comfortable throughout our stay. The size and facilities for our family of 4 was perfect ( the washing machine, dryer and lovely garden was especially handy having two young kids) Our privacy was not at all compromised yet Angela made sure she was available for any questions or help we may have had. The amenities located around the beach house are excellent and all within walking distances. I will say pushing a stroller with a toddler in tow was particularly tiring when returning back from the beach as the beach house was located at top of a relatively steep hill. I would bare this in mind if you plan to not hire or take a car. Other than that, an excellent location, beach house and host!

We had a beautiful time at Angela’s apartment. Everything was exactly as described and Angela went out of her way to provide thoughtful touches including ammenities for the beach and gorgeous fresh fruit, bread and other snacks. The apartment is in a great spot and very easy to get in to Avalon town with many great restaurants and things to do. I would highly recommend this place to anyone!
Great location. Very luxurious .Tranquil garden setting. Great breakfast provisions. Angela was amazing.

Second time we’ve stayed here, we love this place. Has such a warm and cosy feel. It’s so clean, modern and on trend. beautiful thoughtful touches from Angela the host. Such a gorgeous place, highly recommended.
