reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 20 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Superb designer appartment
summary: Located in the heart of the Plateau Mont Royal, steps from the park, close to all amenities and transportation and still very quiet. Equipped with all appliances, Wifi and Netflix included.
description: Located in the heart of the Plateau Mont Royal, steps from the park, close to all amenities and transportation and still very quiet. Equipped with all appliances, Wifi and Netflix included.

name: Luxury Vacation Walk to Beach Ocean Condo Maui HI
summary: Beautifully Remodeled  2 bedroom 2 bathroom Condo, sleeps 6 plus 1 infant. This Condo is perfectly situated in the heart of Kihei, Maui Hawaii. Conveniently located across the street from Beautiful swimming, snorkeling Beach called Kamaole 1 Beach. You can walk to the beach, restaurants, ice cream, grocery and shops! Surfing, kayak rentals, golf, etc. In close proximity. Enjoy all the comforts and amenities of this beautiful condo to make this your ultimate vacation destination.
space: We include with your rental:  - Tommy Bahama Beach chairs & Umbrella's - Crib, Stroller & Highchair - Parking - Wi-Fi - Elevator - Across the street from Beach - Away from Street Noise - Pool & Large Hot tub - BBQ Area - Washer & dryer in condo - 55" Flat screen Smart TV - Cable Tv - Over 100 channels - Netflix ready Smart Tv's in each bedroom - Coolers & ice packs - Queen size bed in each room - Sofa Bed Queen size pull out Sofa bed - Stainless steel appliances - Nintendo Wii U - Fully stocked Kitchen Includes; - Laundry detergent, Dishwasher soap, Toilet Paper, Paper towel, Shampoo, conditioner and body wash, Beach towels, Bath towels and all linens are provided, Hair Dryers. There is a small peek-a-boo Ocean view from the lanai, however depending on the time of year, the landscaping grows and covers the view until the next trimmings, therefore I cannot guarantee the Ocean view. Set far enough back from the road that there is no traffic noise from the street this condo. We love Kihei
description: Beautifully Remodeled  2 bedroom 2 bathroom Condo, sleeps 6 plus 1 infant. This Condo is perfectly situated in the heart of Kihei, Maui Hawaii. Conveniently located across the street from Beautiful swimming, snorkeling Beach called Kamaole 1 Beach. You can walk to the beach, restaurants, ice cream, grocery and shops! Surfing, kayak rentals, golf, etc. In close proximity. Enjoy all the comforts and amenities of this beautiful condo to make this your ultimate vacation destination. We include with your rental:  - Tommy Bahama Beach chairs & Umbrella's - Crib, Stroller & Highchair - Parking - Wi-Fi - Elevator - Across the street from Beach - Away from Street Noise - Pool & Large Hot tub - BBQ Area - Washer & dryer in condo - 55" Flat screen Smart TV - Cable Tv - Over 100 channels - Netflix ready Smart Tv's in each bedroom - Coolers & ice packs - Queen size bed in each room - Sofa Bed Queen size pull out Sofa bed - Stainless steel appliances - Nintendo Wii U - Fully stocked Kitchen Includes
neighborhood_overview: Located right across the street from Kamaole 1 beach. 5 min walk. Beautiful swimming beach for relaxing, snorkeling, boogie boarding and making sand castles. This condo is fantastically convenient for shopping, souvenir hunting, restaurants, ice cream and more!
notes: - 14.25% State of Hawaii Taxes (Transient accommodations tax, combined with general exercise tax) is not included in your quote. It is based on the nightly rate and cleaning fee. This amount is paid separate and is due upon booking Elevators will not be functioning in the A building from approx. Friday, April 26, 2019 to Monday, May 27, 2019
transit: This condo is fantastically convenient for shopping, souvenir hunting, restaurants, ice cream and more! - Car, Walk, Bus, Uber/Taxi and Turtle Tracks! - Many restaurants and shopping nearby. Surfing, kayak rentals, golf, etc. In close proximity. Fun for the whole family!
access: Located on the 3 1/2 half floor. Elevator and some stairs. Must be able to walk up or down some stairs.  For your enjoyment, the Complex has a Hot Tub, Pool & BBQ area.
house_rules: - State of Hawaii Taxes is due upon booking at rate of 14.25%. (Not included in nightly rate) (Tentative dates)  - Friday, April 26, 2019 – Monday, May 27, 2019 “A” Building Elevator Replacement is being replaced. Use of stairs only.

reviews.comments: Thanks for a convenient and comfortable place to stay!
The host canceled this reservation 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
This condo was great! Everything looked great, the upgrades were beautiful. It felt like we were home! Very happy with our stay, highly recommended.

We had a great experience staying at Rebecca's condo. The place was super clean, well managed and very conveniently located. We had all the amenities we could dream of and much more. I highly recommend it!
It was a perfect location, well kept, and clean! Owner was very responsive and easy to work with. The only complaint was there was a few lights out in the main bathroom.
I really enjoyed staying here. Beach across the street and so close to a fun night life. The condo was super nice!! I will be back for sure!

If you are looking for a feeling of luxury hotel, this could be the place for you. The host keeps the unit very clean and is flexible to accommodate early check in. The apartment locates very close to a beach within 3min walk.  We had a little challenge fitting the pack n play into both bedrooms with the spare space the rooms offered. But other than that, it was a good stay.

The space is tastefully decorated and equipped with every amenity a family could possibly hope for (nice washer/dryer, dishwasher, great beach chairs, etc.) It is located within a short walk to the best swimmable beach on the island (Charlie Young). Bring your snorkeling gear - lots of turtles! The neighborhood has many places to eat in every price range. Incredibly convenient! Would not hesitate to stay here again.

This place was wonderful! Rebecca was great at communicating with me when I needed to get a hold of her. Be sure to read through all the instructions once you book it, and things will go smoothly. The apartment was clean and recently remodeled. It had all we needed for beach fun! We would definitely stay here again.
Good value for the price. Typical appatment outside but interior is clean  and renovated.

Great AirBnB conveniently located in South Kihei. Easy to walk to restaurants and some nearby beaches although the best beaches require driving. This place comes with in-unit laundry which made washing our swimming outfits easy. Also, it comes with a bunch of essential beach gear including snorkels, 5x beach chairs, 3x beach umbrellas, and toys for kids to use in the sand. We did not cook much but the kitchen was spectacular. There is only A/C in the living room but the bedrooms stayed cool enough with the ceiling fans. Definitely would stay again.
Looks are deceiving very well set up inside very comfortable with lots of equipment and the best equipped kitchen. Central for some good beaches but transport required for going beyond local area

This place was really nice and clean.  My family all stayed there, 6 adults and a 1 year old.  The pack and play was nice to have for my niece, accommodating to families with children.  Also had a high which we didn't end up use during our trip.  We were really only there to sleep as our trip to Maui was short and we were trying to see the whole island so we didn't get to take advantage of the beach across the street which would have been fun, especially with all the beach gear that is provided.  To sleep 6 people, 2 must sleep on the pull out bed in the living room which was not the most comfortable.  That was a little disappointing, other that that, I would recommend it and come back and stay again.  Next time, I'd save a day to enjoy the beach across the street with it being so easy to come back to the condo by a short walk.

We appreciated it our stay. Condo was in perfect condition, good location, well stocked ! Rebecca are a good host ! 

Nous avons apprécié notre séjour. Le condo est tranquille, bien situé, bien rénové. Rebecca est une excellente hôtesse et nous recommandons l'endroit.

What a great apartment.  Very close to some awesome beaches and great eating places.  We thoroughly loved our stay and would definitely like to stay again.

The apartment is very well equipped with everything we needed.  The USB chargers in all rooms and in the living room were a godsend.  Very comfortable stay.

Thanks Again.

I would definitely recommend this beautiful little condo! The decor is very nice and comfortable. The updated kitchen had absolutely everything we needed! The beds were super comfortable. Our family loved having boogie boards to use and we loved that they provide beach chairs and towels! The beach across the street is literally one of the best beaches! We've been to Maui countless times and finding this beach was such a blessing! Our teenage boys LOVED snorkeling all morning with tons of turtles and boogie boarding all afternoon in perfect little waves. The beach isn't crowded because there aren't any big resorts - it feels very "local". 
Everyone at the condo complex was very friendly. The pool is nice and it was great to have the BBQ area within the pool area so we could grill and relax while our kids swam. 
It's perfectly located just south of one of the main beaches in Kihei where took surf 
lessons. It's also walking distance to the Kihei Caffe... one of our favorite places!
Rebecca was very responsive by text. The check-in was beyond easy.... just a door code to get in!
We were sad to leave but we will for sure be booking this condo in the future! 
Mahalo to Rebecca and Stephan!!!!

The unit was very clean and came stocked with towels, swimming equipment, soaps, kitchenware, cooking supplies and much more. The in unit wash and dryer was a great plus. I would highly recommend this place.
Rebecca was a fantastic host and within reach at anytime.  Location was fantastic and easy access to local beaches.  Everything was a breeze!
Terrific location, walkable to beach, clean, nice, set back in complex so quite. Snorkeling gets, boogie boards, umbrellas, beach towels. Great communication with host.
不錯 兩室兩衛 廚房+客廳

Great condo. Very clean and modern inside.  The outside location initially appears to look a bit unsafe but it's really not. We were able to walk to the ice shaver place at night. The building has half levels that the elevator does not reach.  The half levels were a bit confusing. Overall the condo itself is gorgeous!
Rebecca is super quick in replying my msg. The location is nice close to Wailea and nice restaurants close by.
Rebecca's Airbnb was very nice and close to a number of local shops in Kihei.
Wonderful place to stay while visiting Maui.  We would rent from Rebecca again.  Awesome!!

Great location with lots of great food, golfing, beaches, and shopping within a few miles.  Highly recommend staying at this condo. Very clean and peaceful. We utilized the snorkel gear, beach chairs and umbrellas which came in very useful. A/C works great!

This is our 4th stay with AibBnB and we've been happy with them all, but Rebecca really stands out as a host. She has literally thought of everything. Her place is clean, private, well-appointed, close to shopping and restaurants, and modern. We had the best time and intend to stay here again. This is a 5-Star+++ property!!!
Great place in a nice part of Kihei. Beach nearby is great!

Our stay was amazing and the condo was exactly as described. Everything was perfect and we could not have been more pleased with the accommodations. I highly recommended Rebecca’s condo if you are considering a trip to Maui. The location and the close proximity to the beach is what makes this place a must. We will most definitely book again.
Wonderful place, great location! Would definitely stay again! Our daughter loved it. Close to the beach, close to food and shops!
A luxury home away from home...  The clean, luxurious condo contains everything you and your family needs to explore the island.
Really nice place. We lived staying here
Our stay was very relaxing and great! We loved the proximity to the beach and restaurants. The beach chairs were a huge plus!

This unit is exactly as pictured, lovely updated decor. The kitchen is stocked with fine quality dishes and cutlery, good assortment of glass wear, lots of pots & pans and plastic wear to take down to the pool. The beds are comfortable, nice bedding. The unit was clean. We were 2 couples, the bedrooms are somewhat small, but plenty of room in the kitchen, dining and living room. The balcony is very tight, room for 2 people.  The location is great; beach a short walk across the road, restaurants, shops within easy walking distance. The complex is quiet, BBQ is within the pool area, kept nice and clean. We felt very safe here. We used the window air conditioner at night (in the living room sliding door) along with fans in the bedrooms, we were very comfortable. Rebecca, the host, emailed us after a few days to ask if we needed anything. She is very quick to respond. We would stay here again.
Rebecca 的房子是我第一次的Airbnb 经历 ｡ 一切都很顺利和舒适 ｡ 社区很安静,距离沙滩和餐厅都可以步行｡
It was a nice stay. Easy communication, very clean, close to beach and shopping center in a quiet place.

Rebecca's place is fantastic. I would absolutely recommend it to anyone traveling with a young kid as it has all the amenities you need including a pack n play, high chair, and an umbrella stroller!

Great location with a <5 min walk to the beach, and 5-10 minute walk to amazing casual restaurants and convenience stores.

We would absolutely stay here again when returning to Kihei.

This place was way better than we expected!  Very clean and nice.  The beds are very comfortable. All around great place.  Great location in Kihei!.  Will be going back for sure!
Thank you!
Fully equipped kitchen, washer and dryer plus beach chairs and fins for snorkeling. This place had everything we needed to enjoy our stay in maui. Rebecca was very prompt in responding to msgs.
Great stay. Great location and comfortable.
Our family of 6 loved this condo! It was stylish and well stocked. It’s near a wonderful beach, shops and restaurants. Rebecca was a wonderful host!
The location was great and the place was clean. The bedrooms are very small and the aircondition unit did not work .
Good location, close to beach. Have everything you need in the room. Rebecca replies my questions very quickly.

Rebecca was very responsive to the 2 minor issues we experienced and was very helpful. The location across from a beautiful beach is ideal. The unit is beautifully updated with lots of useful beach things like chairs, boards and umbrellas. Great value!
You can expect a very stylish and clean condo. It offers a variety of amenities that made our stay comfortable and enjoyable.
The location was perfect! Beach is just across the street and we saw turtles!!!!
Great location only 2 minutes from  a beautiful beach

Perfect location! Just returned from a 2 week stay. Close to all amenities. Charley Young & Kamaole beach is across the street. Pictures don’t do this place justice. It was perfect! 
Our home away from home. 
Rebecca responded promptly if we had any questions. 
Fully equipped with beach chairs/towels/surf boards and beach toys!
Would without a doubt recommend this place!

Great location for visiting Maui.  Amenities for enjoying the beach are all provided. Rebecca is easier to interact with.  Condo association is stricter than most in the area so there are many rules to be aware of.  If visiting during the summer, be aware the cooling options are limited.
Great location to beach and local spots. Lots of beach gear available for guest. Rebecca responded to messages quickly throughout our stay.
This place was fine in a pinch but we would not choose this for our full vacation. A bit rough around the edges and very expensive for the quality of the place.

Overall our stay was pretty good. For the size of my family I wouldn’t book this again. We booked last minute because we weren’t able to stay at our other place we had booked on the island due to fires. General location is great however I didn’t enjoy the walk to the car every day with my 3 children and my grandma. It was a task to get all of our luggage and groceries up and down from the unit. I’m a clean freak and have pretty high expectations so I was disappointed with some cleanliness things. The photos of the unit are accurate, however I didn’t find it as nice as what it looks in the photos. On the flip side, tons of beach gear and TONS of snorkel gear which is a huge plus seeing as you spend your day on the beach anyways!
Nice place. Convenient location in Kihei. The AC is only in the living room(but it is a small unit) so cool enough. Host is very easy to get in touch with. Would definitely stay here again
The condo is just a short walk to the beach and to local stores and restaurants. Very comfortable space in a very quiet complex.

We enjoyed a week in Rebecca’s condo and couldn’t have asked for more. The location is perfect, being within walking distance of a beautiful quiet beach that is protected from large waves, with rock pools for our 2 year old son to explore. The condo was tidy and exactly as described/pictured. An abundance of extra things were supplied such as linen, beach towels, beach furniture and children’s furniture (cot & stroller). Overall we had a wonderful stay and would not hesitate to book here again!

(Hidden by Airbnb) map directed wrong block to enter, but Rebecca promptly corrected me to find location.
everything was great there such as beach, location, facility, swimming pool, and accomodation.
Very nice condo. Very close to the beach and shopping.

This was an awesome place for my family and I to stay. Everything that’s in the pictures and listed were on point! The place was super clean! The only thing is the beds needs some getting used to. But overall we would stay here again and again. We’ll also recommend all of our family and friends to stay there while visiting Maui.
Really nice location, central to food and the beach, but not too disturbing from the cars and what not. Beds were nice and comfy. Aircon was perfect!
Fantastic remodeled two bedroom with nice linens, towels, and kitchen supplies. A short walk to one of the best beaches on Maui.  Ideal location between Kihie and Wailea!

Such a great location! Very close walk to the beach across the street, an ABC store, a hotel next door with a great restaurant and pool bar that you can go to! Easy little 15 minute walk to a little village in Kihei with restaurants , bars, and local
Shops. The condo is very clean and full of great amenities! Beach chairs, snorkeling gear, towels, etc. So nice to have! The baby gear was great for us as well! Rebecca is quick to respond and provides you with needed amenities in a timely manner! Would definitely recommend!
We had a great time.  Great location. The beach chairs and umbrellas were greatly appreciated.

Everything at Rebecca's was pretty great. Lovely amenities with very new and updated appliances. Great location which was walking distance to the beach and Kihei market. Our only very minor complaint was the front bedroom gets pretty warm after a shower in the ensuite but once we got the extra fan going, it really wasn't too bad. Definitely the softest beds we've ever slept on!
It’s a great location in walking distance to the beach. Pool area very nice.

Rebecca's place is great on Maui with everything well prepared. It is close to beach, restaurants and stores. It is great for either short vacation or long-term stay. This is the best place during our stay in Hawaii. We are a party of 4 and we are quite satisfied with it. However, I don't suggest those who have a larger group especially with old people stay here as it could be a little bit tight for more people and it is a little bit far from parking position.

This is a great place close to the beach, we walked to almost every beach we went to and were able to watch the sunsets from just a short walk. There are great little restaurants close by as well as very nice and elegant ones! The host was great with everything we needed.

Awesome beach right across the road, but one block across the road, restaurants and shopping 10 to 15 minute walk was really nice. Night life is not so great. Most things close by 9 o’clock, the bars close at 10. But - would definitely go to this place again

Very clean, stylish, and updated. Kitchen was absolutely equipped with all cooking and meal prep utensils. Games and a game system available as well. Pool area was used frequently, with a nice hot tub and great BBQ area. A very quiet building complex but was very close to everything you need to make your stay a great one. I would definitely recommend!

Wonderful location; loved walking across the street to a neighborhood beach. And we took Rebecca’s beach chairs, umbrellas, towels, baby toys!  
Rooms are small but able to fit provided pack n play.  
Beds are soft and I prefer a harder bed.
房屋位置很好找,房屋内部设施齐全,干净整洁｡

It has almost everything we need and is very close to the beach. I personally like Kihei so I chose this condo. It was perfect for 6 of us. The designated parking lot was a good thing, too. I would like to come back.
Great location and great place to stay!

name: Room for two in amazing Surry Hills
summary: Only one block from Central Station and walking distance to all of Surry Hills' great bars and restaurants its hard to find a better location. In a secure building the room has a queen size bed and plenty of wardrobe space.
space: Make my spare bedroom your home away from home when staying in fantastic Sydney.  It's been a few years since I've had airbnb guests but I thought it might be a nice change to have a few more. Availability will be limited so hopefully your trip and my dates match. I'm probably at the bottom of the search results and my photos aren't professional so read the old reviews because you might have found a great place to stay. It's only a short walk to some of Sydney's best restaurants, pubs, bars, cafes, shopping  It's two minutes walk to Central station (really!), there's plenty of taxis nearby and buses to the Eastern suburbs beaches, UNSW and beyond. I also have a hair dryer even though I don't need it myself. One less thing for you to pack.  Getting to my apartment from the airport is super easy and the proximity to the CBD and train station are my apartment's best feature. And it's all on a relatively quite street. My apartment is walking distance to everything in the Sydney CBD, there'
description: Only one block from Central Station and walking distance to all of Surry Hills' great bars and restaurants its hard to find a better location. In a secure building the room has a queen size bed and plenty of wardrobe space. Make my spare bedroom your home away from home when staying in fantastic Sydney.  It's been a few years since I've had airbnb guests but I thought it might be a nice change to have a few more. Availability will be limited so hopefully your trip and my dates match. I'm probably at the bottom of the search results and my photos aren't professional so read the old reviews because you might have found a great place to stay. It's only a short walk to some of Sydney's best restaurants, pubs, bars, cafes, shopping  It's two minutes walk to Central station (really!), there's plenty of taxis nearby and buses to the Eastern suburbs beaches, UNSW and beyond. I also have a hair dryer even though I don't need it myself. One less thing for you to pack.  Getting to my apartment fr
notes: Please check with me about check-in times as I work Monday to Friday which makes check-ins during the day impractical. Either very early in the morning or after 6.00pm is best. If you're arriving on the weekend any time is usually ok.
transit: My place is VERY convenient for public transport and you can walk to the CBD and most parts of the city.
access: Yes you can: Use the kitchen to cook provided you keep it clean Put your food in the fridge or cupboards Use the washing machine
interaction: I'm usually around during guests stays. Happy to have a chat, discuss your travel plans and answer all the little questions that make a trip more enjoyable.  Interaction all depends on each others' needs at the time. Sometimes my guests come and go with not more than a quick hello and goodbye. They're busy, have limited time and lots to do. I'm not offended by this.  Other times I find myself sharing meals with guests, going out for coffee or visiting tourist attractions. There is no rule for how much interaction we have or don't have.
house_rules: No smoking, pets, random guests or drugs you can't take through airports. Keep the kitchen clean and please don't keep food in the bedroom. There is plenty of space in the kitchen to store food. Treat my apartment, the building and my neighbours with the same courtesy you treat your own. I work full-time so check-in is typically after 6:00pm. This is flexible for weekends and public holidays so please discuss it with me prior to booking.

host.host_location: Surry Hills, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about:
Born and raised in the suburbs of southern Sydney I've lived here all my life. I've travelled to countries in South America, Central America, US, and Europe plus one or two other places.  Loved every minute of travel and found I always had a better time when I was staying with locals. So if you're staying with me I'll do my best to make you feel at home, provide you with tips and advice and generally try to help you get the most out of your holiday.

Skills: cooking skills, running skills, language skills (falo algum portugues), tour guiding skills, 'girls only want boyfriends who have great skills' - N Dynamite

Likes: Australian Rules Football (it'll take some explaining, maybe we should go to a game), getting down to the beach, good food with friends, ice-cream and chocolate, red wine over white, 

Sense of humour: Satire and black - Jon Stewart, Stephen Colbert, Ricky Gervais, Doug Stanhope etc

Reading list: Any non-fiction - my favourite author is Michael Lewis, newspapers (but not Murdoch papers!), 

Documentaries: Love 'em.

reviews.comments:
Gavin's place is very clean and well laid out and is ideally located close to Central Station. We stayed for four nights over New Years Eve and enjoyed our time immensely!

What we liked the most was the host! He is a very good person, respectful, cordial and polite at all times. He even made time to show us the tourist attractions as well as some of the local hotspots.

We shared some great evenings with Gavin and enjoyed the conversation on a range of interesting topics. During our stay, I also had the chance to introduce him to my favourite European drink "the Hugo" which went down a treat! ;)

We enjoyed staying in Surry Hills and can happily recommend the place and the host, and if given the chance would gladly stay there again.

Gavin's apartment is located in the heart of the city, not far from the Central station, at the same time the street is very quiet and peaceful.
The apartment is very clean, well-organized and balanced. We had a feeling that we were at our own home (also we cannot forget the incredibly delicious ice cream - Gavin certainly knows the simple pleasures of life and doesn't mind sharing them with the guests).
The guest bedroom is quite spacious and comfortable, with pillows of 2 different heights to choose from (not a frequent option in B&Bs).
Gavin is a nice person, and knows a lot about his country and city. His travel suggestions for our further trip in Australia have helped us a lot.
Very good place, excellent host.

It goes without saying, Gavin was a great host and guide. We stayed with him for two weeks, and couldn't have asked for a better place. His home is lovely, clean and there was always plenty of fresh fruits for breakfast. The bed was really comfortable and the room was quite  convenient. Upon our arrival, after 30+ hours of flights and airport, a great home cooked meal and a bottle of wine was waiting for us. With all his great tips about Sydney and the area (he would sometimes plan a great day trip for us), he really made us feel at home and welcomed! Si vous passez par Sydney, vous devez absolument passez chez Gavin. Son accueil et la connaissance de sa ville native, font de lui un hôte extraordinaire! 
Gavin, best wishes, if your ever pass by Montreal, you are more than welcome to come see us!
Gabriel & Ngoc-An
Es war einfach ein grossartiger Aufenthalt! Super Host, praktische Lage, feines australisches Lamm, gemütliche Stunden. Danke vielmals.

First of all i have to say that Gavin is a great person and excellent host! He was very thoughtful and polite. Apartment was very clean and comfortable, on great location, near by Central Station. I would recomend Gavin"s place to everyone! Tnx Gavin for wonderful tree days in my favorite place on earth!!

Gavin's a very nice host,he'll basically try his best to answer your questions happily and talks with you easily. He allows his guest to fully utilize his accommodation which we appreciate very much. He made an effort to stock up his kitchen with full of foods upon our arrival. 

The location is amazing with free shuttle bus and central station (train) around the corner. His place is clean,tidy and big enough to accommodate quite a number of people in fact. 

The setback is there's no air conditioned which was what he'd mentioned. It gets quiet at night that we felt insecure while on the way back but so far,it's fine for us.

Overall, it's a good stay for us!

Staying at Gavin's place was our first airbnb experience and he made it very easy for us to feel at home... We really enjoyed our stay at his apartment. Gavin was always very helpful, gave us some advice what to see and where to go in Sydney and was always open for a nice chat at home. We even stayed at his place a 2nd time on the way back to Germany and it felt like coming home for us... :) If we should ever come back to Sydney, we would also be checking in for a 3rd time if Gavin is fine with it! :)

We stayed 3 nights at Gavin's flat; it was really convenient because next to the Central station, CBD, Chinatown etc (the place for cheap food).
About the home, the living room and the kitchen form especially a nice and spacious open-space.
We could finally book one more night at the last minute.
Thanks again Gavin for your welcoming and all the lovely "gift" foods, we rediscovered the peanut better thanks to you!

Firstly, Gavin's place has a superb location! Only 3 minutes' walk to Central station thus extremely convenient. From Central station, you are able to take the train or light rail to almost everywhere! Surry Hills is an awesome area and we were spoilt for choice for every meal. It is also within walking distance to Darling Harbour, Chinatown, George St, Darlinghurst etc. and a short bus ride from Bondi beach. Gavin is very approachable and friendly and it was a pity we weren't able to hang out much; we were out exploring most of the time. He gave great advice about travelling to various locations, which bus to take and which way to walk and we really appreciate that! The room was adequate for us with good space for our luggage. The bed was really comfortable with 4 pillows and we slept really well during our 5 nights there. Also, the apartment is very neat and tidy and great to return to after tiring days out. This was our first Airbnb experience and it will definitely not be the last! 

Ying Shing & De Yong

Gavin was an excellent host - friendly, direct, thoughtful and helpful. 
Everything was easy. His place is clean and comfortable and the location is amazing. There are fantastic places to eat nearby and so easy to catch a train anywhere.
We'll be back!
Our stay at Gavin's place was very enjoyable. The apartment was always clean and tidy. Gavin is a good bloke who was very easy to stay with.

Gavin was kind enough to make arrangements for an early check-in when we arrived in the morning, even though he was at work till evening. Instructions were clear and he was always prompt in replying to our queries. The apartment was simply decorated but clean, uncluttered and Gavin had provided us with towels and even kindly helped change our sheets for the comfortable bed during our 10 days stay. The bathroom too was clean and spacious and Gavin picked up after us to make sure it stayed tidy. Breakfast - various kinds of tea, cereal, bread, constant supply of bananas and milk- was great. He even taught me the tip for a good Vegemite toast. All in all, everything we needed was available and easily found. Gavin was very helpful with what we may have needed and basically allowed us make ourselves completely at home. The bonus was a very useful and top notch hair dryer (sorry for the noise).

Wish we weren't always out and got to chat more. See you again hopefully! All the best, Mae.

There isn't much we can add to all the glowing reviews from everyone else except to confirm that it is all true!

Gavin was a very welcoming and accommodating host, and we really enjoyed over evening chats with him over dinner. The flat is extremely well placed and is clean, tidy and has everything you could need. We were a little surprised by how chilly Sydney winters could be in the mornings so bring wooly socks!

Gavin, thanks for making our first visit to Sydney so enjoyable.

Gavin was by far the best host I had in Oz. (the others were good too) He was there when I arrived, nice, a good conversationalist, good tips, and shared with me his honemade cooking.

His place is just a few minutes walking from Central, the main train stationin town. Plus, it was a 3 minute walk to my favorite coffee shop, Di Bella, that he told me about.

We enjoyed a lot our week at Gavin's home. He gave us good advice and thanks to him we learnt a lot of things about Australia. Don't worry if you don't speak very well English, Gavin takes care about speaking slowly and clearly ;) so pleasant! His flat is well located, next to Central Station it was very convenient for us! His flat is also clean, tidy and our room was large enough for us and our luggage. To conclude I think it’s the best place to be in Sydney! :)
Extremely friendly host that made me feel right at home. Lovely place just next to Central station. Very comfortable home. Pleasant stay.
Gavin was a great host, very friendly and reliable. Great location within close proximity to public transport and cafes/restaurants. I would highly recommend staying at Gavin's apartment.

This was our first Air BnB experience and Gavin from the start was prompt and professional. As our flight was early, Gavin kindly made arrangements for my friend & I, to be able to check in early.  

The location of the apartment is amazing. It is literally less than 5mins walk from Central Station. The room is much larger than what we expected from the pictures, it had plenty of  room for our luggage. The apartment was clean, the room and bathroom immaculate, bed and pillows were comfortable and clean. Gavin even has a hair dryer for us ladies or guys with really long hair. 

We spent the day wondering around Surrey Hills and coming from Melbourne I need my coffee in the morning, Sample coffee on Devonshire st  and Le Monde on Foveaux St has amazing coffee and it is just around the corner less than 5mins walk.   
That evening we spent dinner with Gavin and had a enjoyable conversation while watching my AFL team WIN, GO HAWKS! 

Gavin is a great host making us feel welcome and comfortable, making sure we had everything we needed for our stay. Living in the area Gavin knows where everything is, is it spot on with recommending place to eat around Surrey Hills and its all within walking distance( I have said that enough already? lol). 

YOU MUST try the pie's at Bourke St Bakery and Churros from Movida.
As you can see I'm BIG on food. I Loved that we were only 5 mins walk away from china town, there is also a taxi depot in the next street so we had no issues getting a cab. 

If you are down for the weekend over spring head down to The Rocks for the markets and eat macarons at la renaissance café and the food stalls there amazing food!

If your a foodie like me my favourite places to eat was: Din Tai Fung for dumplings, be prepared to wait but they are worth it, Gumshara Ramen for their thick tonkotsu broth and N2  ice cream in Chinatown, Ms g's for a twist on Vietnamese food in Potts point. Around Surrey Hills Morh fish, Bourke st Bakery, Ruben Hills and Chur Burger.

All in all , with our bellies full, our legs and feet exhausted we had a great experience in Sydney and staying with Gavin and would defiantly stay again without hesitation.

Gavin's place was cosy, well-kept and really clean! Conveniently located near Sydney's Central train station, with the CBD just a further 5 mins walk...Gavin was a great host too - recommending food places, places of interest and even taking time at the end of a long day at work to chat with us and share on the history of Sydney :)  Wouldn't have made much sense out of random chalk marks on the pavement otherwise..!

Would definitely recommend Gavin's to anyone, and stay there again on our next visit!

Gavin is a very friendly person, he help you and he cooks very well. The room is big, very comfortable. The house is in a convenient location, very near to the train station and bus stop. I recommend it to all people the house of Gavin if you come to visit Sydney.

It was a great experience staying there! Like what Gavin has said, it was really a few mins walk from central station. If you need to have air con in your room, then this will not be the place for you. And yes, the toilet door has been fixed! Do note that it will be a shared toilet with the host. Satisfied with my stay, if you're looking at a place just to wash up and sleep while on holiday in Sydney, this is the place for you.
We had a nice stay in Sydney. The room was no frills which suited us fine and we had a great chat with Gavin. We recommend staying here if you are looking for a simple room with good company.

This was my first time using AirBnB and it was really easy.  Gavin was a great host - very prompt response to the initial booking, clear and easy instructions to get to the apartment.  He was also friendly and helpful with recommendations for restaurants, activities, and even some interesting books!  The location was great - really handy to the train station for coming in from the airport, and close to the CBD, Paddington and Surry Hills for shopping.  The room was simple but spacious and nice and clean.  Highly recommended.
My partner and I really enjoyed our time at Gavins home. We can highly recommend  to stay with Gavin.

Gavin is definitely a great host, he is so nice and always there when u'be got any questions. His place is amazing, clean, quite, convenient to anywhere u wanna go. I spent 3 days in Sydney and every time went out just rely on walking. Next time when I go back to Sydney, will definitely choose to stay with Gavin again.

We had a great time at Gavin's apartment. Gavin is a super host. He helped us to plan our short stay in Sydney and we saved a lot of time by following is recommendations. The apartment is REALLY well located (a couple of minutes from the Central station) and clean. 
Don't hesitate to book this accommodation to discover beautiful Sydney!
Lovely clean flat in a superb location.  Gavin had lots of recommendations & local knowledge on how to have a great time in Sydney.

Excellent location, nice apartment, great host.  

Highly recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Sydney who wants easy access to Central Station or Surrey Hills.

We had a nice room in the perfect location to explore Sydney and surroundings. We had a good bed and shared the fine shower and kitchen with our host Gavin.
Gavin was very friendly, and let us come and go whenever we wanted. We didn't see him a lot, but when we did he always had time for a chat. There was some confusion about the dishes, unfortunately, but this was our first AirBnB experience and we weren't sure about the house rules.
I would highly recommend a stay at this apartment. Great location - right next to Central Station. Gavin is a fantastic host and really helped me out during my stay.

Gavin was a very good host and helped us planning our stay. The room and all the facilities were clean and the bed was very comfortable. The location is a good starting point for the exploration of the whole of Sydney and with the detailed directions from Gavin, it's also easy to find. All in all we can only recommend the stay!

Galvin was accommodating as I arrived early on a Sunday morning. The location near the central train station was fantastic for me to arrive and depart by the airport and also to go visit friends in Paramatta. The built in bench in the bedroom was very convenient for spreading out my stuff.   I liked having some good places to eat nearby. The Shakespere over on Devonshire had great food at a cheap price. If you want a great location for seeing Sydney and the surrounding neighborhoods this is the place to be.

Very convenient location minutes walk away from Central train station.

Gavin was very hospitable.  He walked me around town and showed me lots of places to see.

We stayed at Gavins Place for some days.. It was very nice, Great Location and Gavin was a Great Host!! We had a wonderful Time.. You can walk everywhere from the Appartement. We had Really good conversations with Gavin and Would Love to go there again :)

We stayed at Gavin's for 2 nights and the experience was awesome!
Location- very near to city/ china town etc all within walking distance
Gavin was very accommodating as we arrived in the morning on a public holiday. He is a very easy going and hospitable host with minimum fuss and everything was well organized when we got there.
Definitely recommend Gavin to those who would like to visit Sydney, we definitely will stay at his place if we visit Sydney again!
Thanks Gavin!!

Gavin's place is extremely convenient & a short walk to some of the greatest meals on earth. I'll definitely be back the next time I'm in Sydney! The best part is that Gavin is always up for a conversation about anything (thanks for the insight into Australian politics!). Anyone who wants to experience the beautiful Surry Hills neighbourhood should stay here. It really is incredible.

Gavin was a great host! He was welcoming, friendly and great to speak with. He knows the area quite well and is always willing to offer advice. Although we didn't see him too much we were lucky enough to have Gavin come along to breakfast with us before we left. He showed us some great places to eat and was very entertaining. The room was exactly as advertised, except the bed was brand new and super comfortable. The bed in the current picture doesn't do it justice. Surry Hills is excellent. It's about a 10 minute walk from some great bars, and cafes and about a 5 minute walk from Central train station. Overall it was a wonderful stay.
Gavin's house is at the best location of Sydney, close to every thing. Gavin is a really nice guy.

Had a brilliant stay at Gavin's place, which is conveniently located a short walk (less than a minute) from Central Station and also a reasonably short walk (15 -20 mins) to Oxford Street. Gavin is a friendly and engaging host and made my brief stay enjoyable.

Gavin was a very nice and friendly host - I enjoyed a lot talking to Gavin about australian society, politics, aussie football and so on.
Gavin's appartment is very well located - just a few step further and you are in Central Station - in a cool and trendy neighbourhood.
About the room - it has been renovated, spacious and the matress is awesome :) 
Thanks Gavin and see you soon in Portugal or France!
Had a great time, very personable and offered great advice on where to go, and what to do. Great location with good access to central station for trains/busses. I would totally stay with Gavin again!

Gavin's place is incredibly convenient, only a couple minutes walk from Central Station. This meant that on the morning we flew into Sydney we could go straight from the airport to Central by train and leave our suitcases there for the day while we did some sightseeing, then we picked up our cases in the evening and walked round the corner to Gavin's. Easy! And the place was so central that we could easily get to all the tourist destinations we wanted to either by foot or by a quick train ride from Central Station.

Another great feature of Gavin's place was the bed - it was soooo comfortable! I actually came down with the flu whole we were there and had to spend a couple of days on bed, and having a cosy bed to sleep in all day really helped.

Gavin was polite and friendly and gave us lots of privacy, which we appreciated. The place was clean and exactly as advertised. It's not a luxury hotel to spend lots of time hanging out in, it's more a convenient base to sleep in for people who want to spend their days out and about seeing Sydney.

The only negative about the place is that we were there during an exceptionally cold and rainy week in Sydney, and the room had no heating so was very cold overnight. But I'm sure during a normal week of Sydney weather the room temperature would be perfect. We were just unlucky with the timing of our visit.

All in all we recommend Gavin's place for anyone wanting a clean, easy, convenient base right in the middle of Sydney. Thanks, Gavin!

Great location! Gavin's place is right around the corner from the busiest public transportation station in Sydney. This made getting around easy and allowed us to take full advantage of the time we had. The room was very spacious and had all the essentials. 

Gavin was a great host! He made us feel at home at all times and even asked us to join him to some local sporting events. He gave us great tips on Sydney, and answered any other questions we had. 

Overall a great place to stay in Sydney!

We enjoyed our stay at Gavin's place! He's a nice host who recommended some nice beaches and helped to plan our days in the lovely city of Sydney. This apartment is super clean and has nicely aired room. Will come back if we get the chance to revisit this wonderful country!

Gavin was a great host. Very friendly,easy to get on with and always welcoming. Always on hand to provide tips on resturants and local attractions.Anything we wanted was there. Bed really comfortable & quiet area,easy to sleep. Very central location, we walked everywhere only used buses for beaches. The stop for these around the corner from apartment. Couldn't have asked for a better stay, thanks Gavin! Alicia & Mark

Our stay for four nights were great! And Gavin was a friendly & helpful host. The location is perfectly convenient as its close to the central station plus there are a lot of nice cafes around the neighborhood.
Gavin is a great host. He gave us great ideas (places to see). We enjoyed our stay very much. The location is great; lots of busses and trains within walking distance.

Great host. My friend and I felt very comfortable during our stay.   Gavin had an answer to all our touristical questions and it was nice to chat about other topics anyways. Loved the central location.

The apartment is ideally located in a cool suburb of the city with plenty of bars and cafes nearby (we recommend the Dove & Olive!) The room was basic but clean, and Gavin kindly provided us with towels. 

Gavin was welcoming and helpful and able to offer local tips and travel information.
Gavin's place is near central. It is a perfect situation. His apartment is huge and we had a good bedroom.

Gavin was really nice , easy to communicate with and flexible.The location of his place is ideal to visit Sydney. The bedroom is big and we could put our clothes away in the cupboard. We could easly cook in the kitchen.

Gavin was very friendly and accommodating and easy to get along with. He made the stay really comfortable.
His place was really tidy, clean, spacious (it's more spacious than the photos) and in a really convenient location (minutes from central station). I would definitely recommend!

Gavin was such a hospitable host.  After I arrived at his place, a short, easy, and safe walk from Central Station, we went to coffee at one of his favorite local spots, which I appreciated and enjoyed.  The room in his apartment where I stayed was newly painted, comfortable, and clean, and the WiFi connection was solid, which enabled me to call home to the U.S. using (Hidden by Airbnb) .  Throughout my stay, I enjoyed my conversation with Gavin about sports, culture, and life, and he catered his assistance to my needs.  If you want a great location (especially if sticking to mass transit, which I recommend) and an even better host, I recommend staying here as Gavin helped to make my first days in  Australia enjoyable ones, and I thank him for it!
Excellent location, very comfy bed and Gavin great host, excellent value for money
Gavin made us feel very welcome.  The room is as described and is in a great location.  We really enjoyed our stay with Gavin in Surry Hills.  Thanks.
The apartment was centrally located and convenient for visiting the city. Gavin was friendly and easy to get on with. We enjoyed our two days in Sydney.
Our stay with Gavin was perfect, his apartment is fantastic and he was an excellent host. I would recommend that anyone coming to Sydney stay here.
Wir kamen sehr spät am Abend an. Wir fuhren mit dem Taxi zur Adresse und haben Ihm geschrieben, dass wir unten stehen. In ca 2 Minuten war er schon unten=)
Friendly host, Lovely apartment, excellent location for surry Hills, City and Central station.

Gavin is a nice guy to make my first Bnb experience fantastic. I appreciate him to host us after his long distance trip with jet lag. We were easy to talk with and get along well with each other. There're all same as describe, even much better than it, special room, comfy bed, clean and well-appointed home, excellent location... My mum and me definitely enjoyed staying at Gavin's place. There's no doubt that I will be there. I highly recommend you to stay at Gavin's place.
A really handy spot to stay - close to everything and Gavin was very helpful and welcoming.
Gavin is a very friendly, welcoming and helpful Host. His appartement is very central and is in the perfect area to explore the city by foot. I would really recommend staying in his appartement.

The room is really tidy and comfortable. The location is perfect, very near to the central station. Gavin is a nice person, very warmhearted and considerate. We will definitely choose there again when next time we come to Sydney!
Gavin is a very helpfull and great host! The location is perfect -> directly near central and Crown street! Thx for everything!!
Gavin is a very nice host.  The bedroom is on the second floor of unit. The air conditioner is excellent. We liked the location of the condo..  It is very convenient  a variety of restaurants.

name: Grand 3 1/2 au cœur de Montreal !
summary: Grand appartement chaleureux et paisible à l'entrée du quartier HoMa. Étendu sur deux étages, le condo comporte un salon cosy, une belle cuisine aménagée ainsi qu'une chambre avec salle de bain.
description: Grand appartement chaleureux et paisible à l'entrée du quartier HoMa. Étendu sur deux étages, le condo comporte un salon cosy, une belle cuisine aménagée ainsi qu'une chambre avec salle de bain. Quartier dynamique à 5 minutes du centre-ville. De nombreux commerces à proximité : bars, restaurants, épiceries, dépanneurs, fruiteries, boulangeries, pharmacies, banques, friperies, piscine gratuite, salle de gym, cinéma. L'appartement est situé tout près de la place Simon-Valois. Stade Olympique, Biodôme, Planétarium, Jardin Botanique, stade Saputo et parc Maisonneuve à proximité !   Lively neighborhood 5 minutes from downtown Montréal. Many shops nearby: bars, restaurants, grocery stores, bakery, coffee shops, drugstore, banks, free public swimming pool, fitness center, theater. The flat is located near Simon-Valois square. Olympic stadium, Biodôme, Planétarium, Botanic garden, Saputo stadium and Maisonneuve park nearby ! A 5min à pied de la station Prefontaine (ligne verte). Lignes de bus
neighborhood_overview: Quartier dynamique à 5 minutes du centre-ville. De nombreux commerces à proximité : bars, restaurants, épiceries, dépanneurs, fruiteries, boulangeries, pharmacies, banques, friperies, piscine gratuite, salle de gym, cinéma. L'appartement est situé tout près de la place Simon-Valois. Stade Olympique, Biodôme, Planétarium, Jardin Botanique, stade Saputo et parc Maisonneuve à proximité !   Lively neighborhood 5 minutes from downtown Montréal. Many shops nearby: bars, restaurants, grocery stores, bakery, coffee shops, drugstore, banks, free public swimming pool, fitness center, theater. The flat is located near Simon-Valois square. Olympic stadium, Biodôme, Planétarium, Botanic garden, Saputo stadium and Maisonneuve park nearby !
transit: A 5min à pied de la station Prefontaine (ligne verte). Lignes de bus 125 (pour se rendre au centre-ville et au terminal de bus pour l'aéroport) et 29 (pour aller sur le plateau) au coin de la rue. 5 minutes walk from Prefontaine station (green line). Bus line 125 (to go downtown and to bus terminal for the airport) and line 29 (which goes directly to the plateau Mont-Royal) just around the corner.
house_rules: Merci de respecter les lieux et de rendre l'appartement propre comme vous l'avez trouvé. Please respect the place and give it back as clean as founded. Thank you.

host.host_about: Je suis une femme milieu trentaine qui voyage seule la plupart du temps. Quand la température refroidie au Québec et que mes contrats de travail(sécurité) se font plus rares j'aime bien aller visiter d'autre pays. J'adore marcher, la musique, les restaurants végétariens etc...

reviews.comments:
Tres bel appartement, les images refletent la réalité. On se croirait dans un appart VIP. 
Annie est un hote super, disponible et sait mettre ses invités dans des conditions de séjour optimales. Ns n'avons manqué de rien. De plus l'appartement est situé en plein coeur d'un endroit animé le soir. Je recommande fortement son appartement. Vs ne serez pas déçu.

Annie has been very responsive and very helpful. Her apartment is very nice and I love the place where it is located. A very creative and changing area, with all what we needed. Organic vegetarian food around the corner, groceries and fresh fruit and vegetable store, few nice cheap restaurant and bars. Early open breakfast dinners. Bookshops and bakery. Bike rental stations very close as well as metro and bus station. Perfect location for us.

Annie was great to us! The place was super clean. She was very accommodating and it had everything we could have needed. Annie was very easy to work with regarding check in and out times. The apartment is very close to good food and the metro station. Thank you for making our time in Montreal that much more enjoyable!

name: Centrally Located Balcony wSea View
summary: It is 100 meters walk to istiklal street  Center for all public transportation Nicely decorated 4 bedroom apartment.  Please ask who you are going to share the flat. No pets live in.
space: -Nice Bosporus view attached to the balcony -100 meters walk to 'istiklal street' that is the most popular pedestrian boulevard. This flat is located on K(H)umbaraci Street which is just behind the Russian Consulate building on istiklal street. Sleeps 1 comfortably in that room. Apartment is located at the third floor. You will be sharing the kitchen, bathroom with other tenants.  You'll be sharing this 4 bedroom apartment with (please ask if you want to hear more)
description: It is 100 meters walk to istiklal street  Center for all public transportation Nicely decorated 4 bedroom apartment.  Please ask who you are going to share the flat. No pets live in. -Nice Bosporus view attached to the balcony -100 meters walk to 'istiklal street' that is the most popular pedestrian boulevard. This flat is located on K(H)umbaraci Street which is just behind the Russian Consulate building on istiklal street. Sleeps 1 comfortably in that room. Apartment is located at the third floor. You will be sharing the kitchen, bathroom with other tenants.  You'll be sharing this 4 bedroom apartment with (please ask if you want to hear more) Comfortable double  bed Bathroom Towel Free wifi Washing Machine Full access of kitchen & fridge Clean, shared bathroom with hot shower 1 set of keys including the room's door  Anything you need please do NOT hesitate to ask and I will do my best to accommodate your request. I can interact with you as little or as much as you would like. That is
neighborhood_overview: This is a great location in a fabulous city, if you want to stay somewhere where you don't feel like one of the zombie horde tour groups in Sultanhamet. The apartment is far enough from the thronging hordes of Istiklal street, but close to transport. Istanbul is a city of vast contrasts and paradoxes, but you’ll never feel unsafe or unwelcome in this neighborhood.  Spend Your Day Wandering the City Spend the Evenings in the Neighborhood - Only Having to Walk Home at the End of the Night. Various dining out and night out alternatives are within a walking distance. You will definitely come back to Istanbul to discover more and wanna stay in the same apartment :) There are 4 nicely decorated bed-rooms.
notes: Tenants are paying for cleaning person to keep the common areas of the place that might be once or twice in a month. Long term stays do not cover the bills.
transit: 10 minutes to the old city (topkapi palace, the Hagia Sophia, Archeology museum) by light rail 10 minutes walk to the Istanbul Modern Art Museum 1 minute walk to Istiklal Street.
access: Comfortable double  bed Bathroom Towel Free wifi Washing Machine Full access of kitchen & fridge Clean, shared bathroom with hot shower 1 set of keys including the room's door  Anything you need please do NOT hesitate to ask and I will do my best to accommodate your request.
interaction: I can interact with you as little or as much as you would like. That is up to you.
house_rules: Please do not leave your personal trash&food after your check out. Trash bins in the bathroom and in the kitchen to be emptied out regularly and left outside the building. We do not have a cleaning person for the apartment and door guy for the building.

host.host_about:
We are native Turkish, but excellent English speakers who are very interested in meeting people from other cultures. As professionals in business lives, we are flexible and happy to assist guests to get to know Istanbul. You can contact us with any questions. We offer you great service and you will feel yourself at home!

Insta istanbulmeeting

reviews.comments: The room immediatly felt like home. It's very spacious and light, and the balcony is amazing. A view on the Bosporus and the busy street life.  The location is perfect: close to the metro, tram and the Istiklal street. The shared spaces are clean and comfortable. If you want to stay in Istanbul and enjoy the buzz of the city, this room is great! Also Fatih is a great host: extremely helpfull and quick communication.
