name: Apartamento Ipanema vista lagoa
summary: Apartamento contemporâneo com moveis de design, composto por 2 suítes, belíssima vista para lagoa no bairro mais charmoso do Rio. Repleto de opções de lazer, restaurantes, bares, casas noturnas, pontos turísticos, farta opção de acessibilidade. Opção de garagem.
description: Apartamento contemporâneo com moveis de design, composto por 2 suítes, belíssima vista para lagoa no bairro mais charmoso do Rio. Repleto de opções de lazer, restaurantes, bares, casas noturnas, pontos turísticos, farta opção de acessibilidade. Opção de garagem.

host.host_location: Niterói, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: el departamento es mas que hermoso, parece sacado de una revista de decoración, la ubicación es divina, se ve el cristo desde el ventanal del living. La zona es de las mas caras en Rio, es preciosa, pero si la idea es estar muy cerca de la playa no esta bueno, al menos si vas varios dias. Renata siempre fue muy atenta hasta que se abono el importe, luego de eso la comunicación fue casi nula a pesar de que yo necesite ayuda. Nunca se me dio la contraseña del wifi, y se corto la luz un par de veces, por ejemplo. Salvo eso, estuvo todo perfecto. Lo recomiendo!

Como falei ele a hospitalidade não foi boa, foi inconveniente uma pessoa ficar mandando mensagem para voce sair do apartamento muito antes do horario, não prestar assistência para os problemas relatados de valvula de descarga quebrada e a não verificação de elétrica doa apartamento ficamos com medo de ter um curto circuito que pode acontecer nesses casos. Como falei o chuveiro eletrico cai a chave toda hora e depois apagou a luz e ficamos sem luz até o dia seguinte e tivemos que tomar banho frio e sem luz. Uma coisa que me incomodou foi que ela enviou a mensagem falando que eu tinha locado o apartamento para duas pessoas sendo que registrei o nome das quatro pessoas que estiverão hosopedads no airbnb, confirmando a minha tese de que ela nem olhou quem iria se hospedar e não proporcionpu o conforto adequado. Mas cobrou pela estadia ndos quatro.

Apartamento muito bom, totalmente reformado, de muito bom gosto e muito pratico. Tem uma vista espetacular!
Encontramos tudo em ordem, limpo, camas excelentes com roupa de cama e banho ok, tudo conforme esperado. 
Se preciso, voltaria a utilizá-lo.

name: 铭城宾馆 (3人房)
summary: 香港铭城宾馆(家庭旅馆)(MAIN SHING HOTEL)位于铜锣湾地铁站附近,与利园一期毗邻,位置优越,交通十分便利｡宾馆周边有多家餐馆､便利店和大型商场｡宾馆拥有各类面积从6至10平方米不等的舒适房间,房间干净,布置温馨,设施齐全,服务热忱,适合商务出差,旅行入住,为您的住宿带来居家的便利体验｡
description: 香港铭城宾馆(家庭旅馆)(MAIN SHING HOTEL)位于铜锣湾地铁站附近,与利园一期毗邻,位置优越,交通十分便利｡宾馆周边有多家餐馆､便利店和大型商场｡宾馆拥有各类面积从6至10平方米不等的舒适房间,房间干净,布置温馨,设施齐全,服务热忱,适合商务出差,旅行入住,为您的住宿带来居家的便利体验｡

host.host_about: (Hidden by Airbnb) : (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 房东很友善,沟通顺利､及时,卫生打扫非常干净,还提供热水壶､晾衣架和电吹风,生活方便,有家的味道｡房东还在阳台种了花花草草,特别温馨｡房子的地段也超好,闹钟取静,是个理想的住宿地｡下次过去香港一定会首先联系房东的,但愿有空房哦!

Your typical "tong fong" in HK. Super small place, but exactly as advertised. Very pricey for a dingy room with a bed. The pluses: your own bathroom and universal power bar. 
The minuses: in a building with per-hour love hotels, bathroom is so small there is no separate shower, but you shower on top of the toilet, cleaning lady leaves surfaces wet (especially the bathroom ledge which is your only surface for placing toiletries).
地點十分好, 很易找到目的地, 房間比想像中好, 在特別日子上價格合理, 但晚上被自稱上一手房客不斷騷擾, 到零晨兩三點才可睡.
大厦在铜锣湾苹果店附近,大厦的电梯只能乘坐7人....淋浴房里的花洒没有固定...只能一只手拿着另一只手洗...而且一会儿就没热水了好冷,感觉非常不好
地理位置很好!虽然没见到房东,但是我们通过手机信息很有效地沟通｡房间很小,但地理位置非常好!价格合理!设施简单实用该有的都有!下次应该还会去｡
刚开始觉得比想象中小了点,不过这个地段这个价格能有这样的房间已经很不错了｡
Nice apartment, located in the center of Causeway bay. Around the apartment have many shopping store and easily to find restaurant. Overall very nice.
녀~~무 좁교 칢구 위섕상타ㅣ가 벼ㄹ 로 엿어용 우ㅣ치는 젹당햇어여
房间太小了,唯一的优势是位置很方便,隔音很差很吵,空调太古老了像吹电风扇一样蹭蹭的响不停,好评的是房东人挺好的,回复很及时｡

地段好的没话说 铜锣湾地铁站附近 中心地带去哪都方便 
对入住环境要求不是特别高的可以参考
环境很整洁,服务很细心
老闆態度很好.位置很好找.樓下的商場都很近
The apartment is very well located and close to the metro station, however it is very small and should not accommodate more than 2 people.
Para los precios de Hong Kong esta bien, ubicación perfecta. Sin sorpresas, tal y como se descdibe, fácil acceso.
位置超级方便,去时代广场只需走5分钟左右,离sogo也就10分钟｡去购物,吃东西,晚上去中环回来,交通都太方便了｡虽然空间比较小,去周末玩就刚好｡房东回复信息很快,沟通也很顺畅｡到7楼后有点难找,建议地址把门号也写上｡=D

It feels like a Korean '고시원(Gosiwon)'. the rooms are independent.
Of course, it does not compare to hotel, but there was no big problem to simply sleep. But there was inconvenience to toilet hinge, but it was not big problem.
If you want to stay at a reasonable price, you can recommend it. But if you want comfort like a hotel, it might not be right.

and for korean.
위에서 설명한 바와 같이 꼬씨원 같은 분위기입니다. 방 안의 씁도가 높은데, 원인을 츄츽해 봊아면, 아마 화쨩씔의 씁기가 뺭 냅우로 들어와서 끄렇게 되는 것 같습니다. 잘때, 뼉에 물끼가 끄뜩할정도로 씁한 편입니다. 꿀애서 홪앙실 안에 있는 몯은 물 밻으들을 쟘국오 쟜읍니다. 걍 문안한 편이긴 한데 쬬오온나 쓰읍하기 땜운에 글언거 실어함연 골여하세요. 
젝아 홍콩 몇번 왑왔는데 역이는 더욱 싀임한 편입니다.
地理位置很好 客服态度也很不错 因为我们到香港之后是先去找亲戚了 所以很晚才过去旅馆  打了电话给房东  房东把钥匙插在门锁上了方便我们拿  洗澡房是真的小…真的只是能转个身的事…其他都ok没什么大问题
在香港房间大小就不说了,挺干净,离时代广场也就几分钟旅程,整体感觉还行

Very good location 
Room is very clean 
Response is very fast 
We had good time
很好
overall worth with the price. Strategic location
价格不高,铜锣湾地铁出来不远就是,有共用阳台可以晾衣透气,卫生热水都很好,楼内融合了香港的楼凤文化,楼下小食店很多,便利店很多,莎莎卓越很多,DFS里面的价格没有优惠,不如去附近的崇光sogo,总体感觉住铜锣湾的话这里最好｡谢谢房东｡
Absolutely fine for a stop-over in HK if you need a cheap small clean  room, shower, toilet and place to sleep.
房东很棒,让我们提前入住,走的那天也让我们留放行李,三人间也很干净,虽然空间小了一些,但是睡觉还是不错的｡就是卫生间的门好像坏了不好拉,希望修一下更好
比预想的要好很多了,性价比很高,地理位置也不错,推荐
不錯
The host was quick to respond,and the location is convenient.

name: Brooklyn Brownstone Private Room A
summary: Come and chill in our cool large private room with walk in closet located on a model block in crown heights Brooklyn .Equipped with a large Queen size bed , dresser and cable TV - comfortable for at least two. Enjoy cooking in our gourmet kitchen and access to bathroom.
description: Come and chill in our cool large private room with walk in closet located on a model block in crown heights Brooklyn .Equipped with a large Queen size bed , dresser and cable TV - comfortable for at least two. Enjoy cooking in our gourmet kitchen and access to bathroom.

reviews.comments: My host kehinde was great and attentive. Room was clean and comfy.

Kehinde is a friendly and helpful guy, he made his kitchen available for anything we wanted and checked in every morning with a text/phone call. The neighbourhood is friendly and welcoming but is rough around the edges. The room is spacious, clean, comfortable and has a television.

Had a great stay at Kehinde's place. It was very private and cozy on a really quite street with lots of space in room. I would recommend staying here for sure. Kehinde was also a great host, he checked in a few times to make sure everything was going okay and was very good about arranging my arrival.

Kehinde and the room were both fantastic!  The apartment is pretty quiet off the main street, but its also really close to the main areas of town and the subway.

The room was great!  Comfortable bed, good size kitchen, and a really nice T.V. for when we needed to relax outside the city.

Kehinde checked in regularly to make sure everything was going well for us, which was very nice of him.  We felt like we had plenty of privacy, but also support from Kehinde if we needed it.  

We would definitely stay there again if I go back to Brooklyn!

Kehinde was a great host. Everything went smoothly with arrival and departure despite us arriving later than expected. The room was clean and the bed was very comfy. Public transport into Manhattan was straight forward. I would recommend Kehinde.

Yes, i felt welcomed and warm in Kehinde place and he sent me a text message everyday to make sure everything is alright. He is good guy. The room is big enough for 2-3 people and you have your own kitchen and washroom. It is about 10 mins walking distance to Subway station and 35-40 mins subway to Time Square.  However, it is a bit noisy in the morning by the neighbourhood.
I had a great stay at R. Kehinde's Brooklyn brownstone! It was warm and comfortable and the kitchen and bath were clean. He checked in periodically and was always available by phone. Thank you!

We had a good time in Brooklyn, the room was quiet and we felt welcomed by Kehinde. Although we met only once, he kept in touch everyday by text message.
The distance to the subway and to Manhattan was correct.

We had a good time at Kehinde´s place. We felt welcome and he sent us a text message everyday to make sure we are fine. The room was okay, not that clean, the neighborhood noisy. Nevertheless, especially the tenant has ensured that we lack nothing (hairdryer, toaster, vacuum cleaner). 

All in all Kehinde is a courteous host.

Kiki was very welcoming. We didn't get to meet him but he checked in with us periodically. The house matched the description and pictures. The room was huge and comfy! Parking wasn't a problem. We were happy with our stay!
The room was big and comfortable. Kehinde was a great host and very responsive.

Kehinde haben wir nicht getroffen. Er hat sich jedoch täglich informiert, ob alles ok ist.
Das Zimmer war groß und nett. Bettwäsche und Handtücher sauber. Leider ist das Badezimmer sehr heruntergekommen und schmutzig. Badezimmer muss man sich mit den anderen Hausbewohnern teilen. Nachbarschaft ist ebenfalls sehr laut. Wenn man einen leichten Schlaf hat, ist diese Unterkunft nicht zu empfehlen.

Cozy accomodation for  a reasonable price! Near the subway station - so you have a good & quite fast connection to NY City. 
We saw Kehinde only once but he's always just a phone call away ... very reliable and helpful! 
Thanks for the great time - wie would come again!!!
Kehinde was very responsive & friendly & made us feel welcome. I'm not sure how the neighborhood is after dark but I had no problem during the day. The room was as described.

Our stay at Kehinde's house was really good, the room and bathroom were clean and the bed was really comfortable. The kitchen was also clean and had everything we needed for cooking. Kehinde is very reliable and contacted us nearly everyday and even came late at night for an emergency.

I had an outstanding stay at Kiki's place. His place was very convenient for me. Everything was as described in the profile. The room is very spacious and cozy. The other room wasnt rented out so I had the place to myself for my entire stay. Even though he didnt stay there he made sure he checked in on me often to make sure everything was ok, which it was. He also allowed me to check in earlier since I arrived a couple of hours earlier than I expected. I will definitely stay here again when I come back to New York. Thanks Kiki

My stay at Kehinde's property was alright. I was the only person there that weekend, so I basically had the whole apartment to myself. I stayed during a very cold weekend, but there was wonderful heat and hot water. The train station is also not far and the B15 to JFK airport is within 2-3 blocks. Kehinde is very responsive and courteous. He checked on me periodically and was always available when needed. If you need to be close to Manhattan and downtown Brooklyn, I'd recommend his place.

Great location near the subway. The room is very cosy and the bed is excellent :)
Rehinde was really nice and present even if we didn't see him during the stay. i really recomend the place ans i will probably book it again when i'll come back to NY.

Desde antes de llegar al departamento Kiki estuvo en permanente contacto con nosotros, y siempre a disposición ante cualquier cosa que necesitáramos, aún sin habernos conocido personalmente. Fue nuestra primera experiencia en Airbnb y realmente muy buena.
La descripción del anuncio fue exactamente lo que encontramos, nos sentimos como en casa, muy cómodos.
El barrio es muy lindo y tranquilo, a unas pocas cuadras de dos lineas de Subte.

I wish I had of looked into the area of this listing more before staying there - not what I was expecting. House looked nice on outside but not as nice on the inside. Staircase railing partially broken, bathroom was dirty/ water pressure was awful, some other visually unappealing features of the house, which is okay if you don't really want to be in the house much. Room was a bit better than the rest of the house although still some issues such as broken blinds, water damage, and window panes were very thin such that you could hear a lot of noises (such as street fights) throughout the night. The walk to the subway station was 10 mins which wasn't too bad and you had to utilize the station as not much to do around the house.

The listing description was accurate. The room was as expected. Watch out, the door closes when slammed shut, we had a bad surprise (that was quickly resolved by our host 'Kiki').
Our host couldn't be present upon our arrival but he arranged that we could access the keys instantly and didn't have to wait.
He was always available by text during our stay and checked with us to see if everything was going all right.
The kitchen, bathroom and room were clean.
The neighbourhood wasn't the fancy hipster Brooklyn you'll maybe want to visit but is was good enough to stay. It was also close to public transportation. 
Thanks Kiki!

The room was as portrayed in the pictures and really comfortable! The bathroom is right beside so that's convenient. We had some problems with the water pressure but Kiki helped us promptly, which we are really thankful for! Highly recommended for people who needs an affordable place to stay and not looking for a luxurious holiday.

The room was exactly what we needed and paid for, close to subway & B15 (bus to/from JFK airport). The room was exactly as showed in the pictures, very tidy, clean and prepared for us. We got given towels, the bathroom was good and the kitchen had cooking facilities and utenciles needed. We did not get a chance to meet Kehinde, however he was extremely helpful with checking in/out, we were greeted by someone and felt very welcome. Kehinde checked up on us and was always just a text/call away. One note would be to research the neighbourhood, I travelled with a friend so it was great, but I would have deffinitely looked into more it if I was travelling alone. Apart from that, the room was great, the host was very helpful and the location is convenient. We enjoyed our stay in Brooklyn!

We had a  very good trip in NYC. Even though we did not meet the host he was very friendly before and during the trip, making sure we had all the information to get to the appartment, to find the keys and do the check out. He was always available by text/phone.
The room is as shown on the pictures, clean, quiet and comfortable. There is AC, fan, towel, soap and maps/travel guides of NYC.  The bathroom is right next to the room, it has hot water. The rest of the house is a bit deteriorated but this place is perfect to sleep and shower to recover from lots of walking in the City. 
The neighborhood is safe but a bit rough, we were a couple so I felt ok walking from and to the metro at night even though I might not have done it as a solo woman traveler. There are two subway stops at less than 10min from the appartment which is very convenient, the ride to Manhattan is about 40min. There are also buses directly to Williamsburg and Prospect Park, it takes about 20min to get there.
We found a delicious bakery (Albany Bakery) close to the subway which became our breakfast spot. In general it is better to buy breakfast, water, fruits in the neighborhood as it is way cheaper than in Manhattan. Overall it was a very pleasant stay!

A notre arrivée, nous avons contacté l'hôte pour récupérer le code du boitier à clés. Il a été joignable très facilement et disponible. La chambre se trouve à l'étage, conforme aux photos et à la description. En revanche, la salle de bain commune aux deux chambres n'était pas nettoyée lors de notre arrivée et ne l'a pas été durant notre séjour.
La rue est plutôt calme mais le quartier n'est pas forcément très rassurant quand vous rentrez de nuit !
Kehinde was very friendly and gave us useful information about the area nearby. The room was very neat and clean and the neighborhood was lovely.

Kehinde jest sumiennym i pomocnym gospodarzem. Mimo, że się nie widzieliśmy, był z nami w ciągłym kontakcie telefonicznym i meilowym. Sam pokój zgodny z opisem, mieści się na drugim piętrze kamienicy, w której na dole mieszka sam gospodarz. Jest przestronny, czysty ma ala garderobę, gdzie można zostawić ubrania, buty i walizki. Łazienka i kuchnia dzielona jest z drugim pokojem. Bardzo dobry stosunek jakości do ceny. Z mieszkania szybko można dostać się na Manhattan linią metra nr 3 (przystanek Kingston Ave). Okolica to typowy Brooklyn, można poczuć super klimat tej dzielny NY.
The host wasn't there but we maintained contact by texting. He was responsive. It's not a big place but there's air conditioning and it's perfect and cheap for two people.

There was two subway stations so we are easily able to go anywhere.
The room was large and clean.
And Kiki was kind and attentive.
Everything was good.

Kehinde, aka 'Kiki' is an excellent host, though we didn't meet him until it was unfortunately time to check out of his wonderful room in Brooklyn. The bed is very comfortable and the in-wall AC unit works really well. There's a great Dominican bodega on the corner with good food and all the snacks you could need to take on the city. Would definitely stay here again!
I had a very good stay at Kehinde's place. The room has its own share of privacy and space and Kehinde was a great host. I would choose this place once again. Thank you Kehinde!
Kehinde has been extremely welcoming and helpful

We didn't meet Kehinde, however his communication was awesome and he ensured that our check in and check out ran smoothly. We loved the room it had amazing air con and was spacious with a mega comfy bed and lots of finishing touches :)

Kehinde was an amazing host. He was very helpful and made sure my wife and I had everything we needed. He made our stay better than we could have imagined. We definitely recommend staying here and will absolutely return!
Kiki was very helpful throughout the stay, and always kept in contact to see if everything was going smoothly

Kiki was a great host, very nice, welcoming and always ready to help. Room was large, clean, nice and cozy, as on the pictures. Neighborhood safe and amazing with beautiful Brooklyn brownstonehouses. Great stay at Kehinde's place!

Kehindé nous a contacté avant notre départ, nous sommes ensuite restés en contact et avons été bien accueillis. Kehinde s'est montré chaleureux et prévenant  Il travaillait mais s'est inquiété de notre bien être. Il a été réactif lorsque nous avons sollicité son aide.
Kehinde is a great host. He's responsive, helpful, & kind. The neighborhood is adorable and the price is just right. The room is spacious, clean, and lovely!!

Great place for the value! You definitely get a good rest after a long day out, the bed is comfortable and the street is quiet. The room was cosy and warm. Kehinde was reachable via phone and check in/out went smooth. We didn´t spend much time in the neighbourhood though, but taking the subway was ok, around 7-10 min walk. Thank you Kehinde for having us!

Kiki is really thoughtful host. He is very kind and well comunicated:)

When we had a problem about bed, he right came to us and fixed it.

Location of the house was not that good(it tooks at least 10-15min to the cloesest station), but i want to stay his house if i have a chance.

And the room was really cozy and warm. Most of all, the mattress is so nice! Friend and i loved it:)

We spent really good time in kiki's!
Thanks

If you are looking to stay in Brooklyn and want a nice and affordable place to call home for the weekend this is the spot for you. Kiki was really attentive to any concerns that I had. I will definitely stay there again.
Отличное соотношение цены и качества. Район так себе, но это на первый взгляд.  До метро минут 10 пешком, рядом есть несколько магазинов и фаст фудов.
The location was great, check-in was easy and Kiki was really flexible with our schedule. Definitely would like to stay here again!
We really appreciate our stay in Kehinde ´s place. Everything was great !! Thanks a lot
The host was kind and everything was good, but access to the subway station was a little disappointing.

Great place, great host in a very convenient location with trains and buses to go wherever. Stores and restaurants within walking distance. Host was very welcoming and the room was perfect. It was clean, spacious, and the bed is ridiculously soft.

Kiki is cool. He'll help with anything and make sure everything's satisfactory. Old place, lots of character. Close walk to the subway station and there's a brand new coffee shop nearby. There's free parking and solid tv and wifi.

R. Kehinde was a great host. This was my first Airbnb experience. He sent me everything that I needed to know about his place and was very responsive whenever I reached out. I would stay at his place again and recommend it to anyone who needs an Airbnb in NYC.
Great location and value, would definitely stay here again!
He was a great host. The room was clean and big. Walking distance to the subway. He was in contact with us the entire trip and was very helpful.
Great location, near to subway station and good communicated with Manhattan. Nice surrounding, lot of shops and "real life". Perfect host and contact with him. Definitely we will come back here!
Very good place! Good experience for me!
The owner was very nice. It was near the public transport.
Great value. All the amenities. Would recommend.

This place is located in a great spot a short trip from the Brooklyn Bridge. The room was quite comfortable with a soft bed and a good street view. There was a heater in the room if needed. TV was a good size and had good channels. 
Only downside was the poor water pressure in the bathroom. All else was good

A nice, charming little house. The host was very helpful at every step. The water pressure in the bathroom wasn't the best but the bedroom was very clean and comfortable. The walk from the subway was a little longer than expected but definitely walkable.
Kehinde is a great host. Place was in a good location close too stores and not too far from the train station. The bed was super soft. Only problem would be the shower due to the water pressure.

Great experience and thoughtful owner. I enjoyed staying here and would come again. If I had to be nitpicky, the bed was too bouncy for my taste and everytime I shifted, the headboard will bang against the wall. I woke up several times throughout the night. A good tip is to pull the bed away from the headboard. The water pressure was also low. If you don't mind these minor details, you will enjoy your stay. I intend to come back.
Close to Subway and in a tranquil neighborhood with lots of cheap places to eat a sandwich or sth like that.

El apartamento de Kehinde es sumamente acogedor al igual que la habitación en la que estuvimos, contaba con calefacción todo el tiempo algo que se agradece después de un largo y frío día en Manhattan, contaba con televisión con cable con muchos canales para elegir, un amplio closet para guardar la ropa y el colchón de la cama es muy suave. El departamento se encuentra ubicado cerca de 2 estaciones del metro (10 minutos caminando) ambas te llevan a las principales atracciones de Manhattan, dependiendo de la atracción, el tiempo de traslado va de 35 a 45 minutos (ya que el metro de NY en ocasiones tarda hasta 17 minutos en llegar). Cerca hay muchas tiendas para comprar comida, en lo personal encontramos un mini súper mercado (Fine fare supermarket, sobre Kinstong av.) en el cual había un gran surtido y buenos precios. También a unas cuantas calles habia una lavandería. El barrio es muy tranquilo y seguro, en ocasiones llegamos después de la 1 am y nos sentíamos muy seguras al regresar al departamento. La cocina contaba con todo lo necesario para cocinar, el baño siempre tenía agua caliente, algo muy necesario en época de invierno. Kehinde siempre estuvo al pendiente de nuestras necesidades, sin duda un excelente alojamiento para visitar New York, recomendado ampliamente.
Nice place. Good location. The bathroom is not working properly. He told us after checkin. But he's a very nice guy and a good host.

name: Nice modern condo, JeanTalon Market
summary: Nice modern condo on quiet residential street within a ten minute walk to Jean Talon Market, and within five minutes of three Metro stations (Jean-Talon, Beaubien & Fabre). Can accommodate 4 persons very comfortably.
space: Nice modern condo, entirely renovated in 2014. The bedroom features a King bed, while the living room has a sofa-bed that can accommodate two persons comfortably. There is a small backyard with patio equipment for your enjoyment.
description: Nice modern condo on quiet residential street within a ten minute walk to Jean Talon Market, and within five minutes of three Metro stations (Jean-Talon, Beaubien & Fabre). Can accommodate 4 persons very comfortably. Nice modern condo, entirely renovated in 2014. The bedroom features a King bed, while the living room has a sofa-bed that can accommodate two persons comfortably. There is a small backyard with patio equipment for your enjoyment. Rosemont used to be working class, but it's really been blooming in the last few years. There are plenty of nice bars to hang out to. Plaza St-Hubert (3 mins walk) is an old shopping district that's been revitalized in the last few years, there are nice bars, concert halls, bookshops, etc. Car2Go is firmly implanted in Montreal and you can park anywhere on our street, as we are part of the active zone. There are several bus lines you can take : Bus 95 on Bélanger, Bus 13 Christophe Colomb, Bus 93 Jean-Talon. We are right in the middle of a three M
neighborhood_overview: Rosemont used to be working class, but it's really been blooming in the last few years. There are plenty of nice bars to hang out to. Plaza St-Hubert (3 mins walk) is an old shopping district that's been revitalized in the last few years, there are nice bars, concert halls, bookshops, etc.
notes: There is no private parking attached to the condo, however there is plenty of parking space available on our street at all time with few restrictions (no parking on monday mornings for the eastern side, no parking on tuesdays for the western side... other than that, you're good). The next parallel street also has a lot of available space. Most inhabitants on our street use public transportation.
transit: Car2Go is firmly implanted in Montreal and you can park anywhere on our street, as we are part of the active zone. There are several bus lines you can take : Bus 95 on Bélanger, Bus 13 Christophe Colomb, Bus 93 Jean-Talon. We are right in the middle of a three Metro station triangle : we're closest to Jean-Talon (about 5 minutes walk), but also pretty close to Fabre (about 6 minutes walk) if you're coming from the east part of town. Station Beaubien is slightly under 10 minutes away.
access: Vous avez accès au logement entier, ce qui vous permet d'être 100% à l'aise. De plus, nous avons une boite à clés extérieur vous permettant d'avoir accès aux clés à votre arrivée.
interaction: Je réponds à toutes les questions des voyageurs lors de leur séjour.
house_rules: Puisque nous prenons soin de notre logement, nous attendons la même chose de nos voyageurs.

host.host_about:
Je suis une productrice, vidéaste et auteure vivant à Montréal. Je voyage beaucoup avec mon copain, je suis donc consciente de l'importance d'un logement agréable où dormir. Cela transforme nos expériences, non?!

I'm a producer, videast and author, I'm living in Montreal and I travel a lot with my boyfriend, so I'm aware of the importance of a comfy place to stay. It's changing our experiences, no?

reviews.comments:
It was a great experience. The access to the apartment was simple and convenient allowing us to be flexible with our time. The place is very nice, functional with all one might need for a comfortable stay. Free parking on the street. There are restaurants, cafes and shops near by as well as Jean Talon market with fresh produce and great selection of cheeses.
The communication with the host was easy, constructive and positive. I already recommended it to a friend and I would definitely stay there again.

L’appartement était propre et bien situé (près du marché Jean Talon), on a trouvé un espace de stationnement sur la rue et on était proche des transports en commun. L’appartement était équipé de tout ce qu’on avait de besoin pour passer un beau séjour. La communication avec Geneviève était bonne et efficace.
Nice, cozy and centrally located condo. Exactly like the picture. Genevieve was responsive and everything went smoothly.

This place is a must stay. Place makes you welcome. Beautiful apartment. Bed was real comfortable. Stay in this place if you're into art. I would stay here again without thinking twice. Unfortunately we didn't get to stay here much because my girlfriend and I were out and about.  Host was on point! Highly recommend

We had a wonderful stay at Geneviève's beautiful condo. The kitchen was fully stocked and the dishwasher was a nice bonus since we cooked a couple meals, and the bathroom was perfect (loved the rainfall shower head!). We hit the snooze button a few times because their bed was super comfortable. And once we woke up we enjoyed an espresso from their machine on the patio deck. One night we connected our computer to their tv via HDMI and enjoyed a movie.  The wifi was also strong allowing us to use it outside on the patio or front porch. We loved the neighbourhood too because it's close to Jean Talon Market and practically every street has a bike path so we biked everywhere (you can rent scooters and ebikes at Dyad to get around faster). There are a bunch of parks nearby, and Little Italy, Rue St. Denis, Mont Royal and Mile X are a short bike ride or walk away. We also found parking on the street right in front of the house without issue. Geneviève was a great host too. She was very responsive. The key exchange was easy since she left the key in a lockbox (much safer than the usual mailbox method). And she wrote down a bunch of amazing restaurant suggestions that we tried... They were amazing! 

Don't hesitate - a fantastic stay awaits you!

Nous avons passés un super moment chez Geneviève! Le logement est bien placé, proche du métro et des échoppes et est également décoré avec goût. Nous avions tout ce qu'il nous fallait à disposition. Nous n'avons pas eu l'occasion de la rencontrer mais les indications laissées étaient claires et nous n'avons eu besoin de rien de plus. Bref, je vous le conseille! :)

name: Private room with your own backyard
summary: Have your own space in this large and sunny 2 bedroom apartment in safe, convenient and charming Carroll Gardens. Huge windows and lots of natural sunlight with a private huge backyard. This is the one while you're staying in NYC, literally right across the street from the F,G train which is 20 mins direct to Manhattan. Your room has a comfy queen-sized bed, superfast wifi & the apt is a few blocks from Whole Foods. We have everything you need to love your stay!
space: The apartment feels more like a HOUSE than an apt so you can feel at home during your stay. The bedrooms are small but the living room is huge. Here you can stretch out, relax, do your laundry, plug in your music and enjoy your stay! This listing is for ONE person only.
description: Have your own space in this large and sunny 2 bedroom apartment in safe, convenient and charming Carroll Gardens. Huge windows and lots of natural sunlight with a private huge backyard. This is the one while you're staying in NYC, literally right across the street from the F,G train which is 20 mins direct to Manhattan. Your room has a comfy queen-sized bed, superfast wifi & the apt is a few blocks from Whole Foods. We have everything you need to love your stay! The apartment feels more like a HOUSE than an apt so you can feel at home during your stay. The bedrooms are small but the living room is huge. Here you can stretch out, relax, do your laundry, plug in your music and enjoy your stay! This listing is for ONE person only. You'll have access to the entire apartment. Even our private basement so you can access washer/dryer. I am a busy New Yorker and are rarely home. But if you need anything - I'm just a phone call or email away. Carroll Gardens is a safe and hip neighborhood where
neighborhood_overview: Carroll Gardens is a safe and hip neighborhood where you'll get that famous Brooklyn appeal that you can't get in Manhattan. An old Italian neighborhood, there are great pasta places and a small park 5 minutes away. Lots of trees and the famous Prospect Park is a 10 minute bike ride.
notes: My apartment is also yoga friendly. You will have space to practice, a meditation chair to use and a calm space to come back to after busy days exploring NYC.
transit: And you'll be directly across the street from the subway (F,G) and you can grab the perfect cup of coffee at Momofuko Milk Bar.
access: You'll have access to the entire apartment. Even our private basement so you can access washer/dryer.
interaction: I am a busy New Yorker and are rarely home. But if you need anything - I'm just a phone call or email away.
house_rules: Just treat my home as your home. You can smoke outside in the backyard, but not indoors.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Graduate student, traveler, Mac user since 1988 and 3rd generation Miamian.

reviews.comments:
Lindsay is an extraordinarily thoughtful host and simply a wonderful and inspiring person to be around. Despite booking late and Lindsay being out of the country for the first two days of my stay, Lindsay went beyond what I would normally expect from airbnb hosts to accommodate me and make sure I had everything I needed. She had great recommendations for local restaurants and classes and was both friendly and welcoming and respectful of space. 

The apartment is light, clean, only steps away from Carroll St station and the room is comfortable, quiet and a great place to return to and rest after a long day of apartment searching. I cannot recommend this apartment enough.

The room was perfect, sunny backyard. The bed was very comfortable
and the neighbourhood is amazing, full of restaurants, groceries and a good coffee at Momofuku Milk Bar. Subway is on the corner.

Such a special apartment. It is quiet, spacious, and quite marvelously set up! So comfortable, the living area is extraordinary, the kitchen so well-organied and equipped! Plus, a great backyard. The bedroom is terrific, the bed so comforable. Hot warm shower.

All this, and quite literally steps away from the subway station. And last but not least, it sits on a fantastic street, great restuarants, a nice sense of community. And, washer and dryer in basement, that was so great!

Lindsay is a fantastic host!! She is so responsive, and makes sure you are well in her space! I highly recommend this apartment, a great get-away and so convenient to so much!

name: Free Spirit
summary: COLORIDO!  HARMONIOSO!  Localizado numa zona tranquila da cidade, Ramalde do Meio. Acesso fácil ao Metro (5min a pé). Autocarros.  Supermercado, mercearia, farmácia, barbearia, lavandaria.  O apartamento tem 2 quartos. 1 com cama de casal e casa de banho privativa com banheira.  2o quarto dispõe de um beliche, ideal para uma criança.  Cozinha equipada. 2 varandas.  Sala ampla.  Dispomos de dois gatos meigos e residentes que te fazem a melhor das companhias.  Garagem.
space: Um apartamento com poucos anos. Inserido numa zona residencial. Boa vizinhança. Dispõe de um quarto de casal com banho privativo. Outro quarto com beliche, ideal para criança.  Sala com área de (Website hidden by Airbnb) varanda ampla.  Duas casas de banho.  Cozinha equipada.  Zona comum infantil.  Possibilidade de garagem.  A área envolvente convida ao descanso, após os intensos passeios à baixa da cidade.  Tranquilidade a 10 minutos do centro da cidade.

neighborhood_overview: A Calmia,  a Paz, e a possibilidade de acesso a tudo indispensável. Lugar com bons acessos, ao metro e transportes.Ainda com características rurais, com algumas casas de lavradores, torna o lugar repleto de tranquilidade.  Zona residencial, com passadiço fantástico para caminhadas ou exercício físico.  Possuímos um jardim ótimo para relaxar, a 2 minutos  a pé, o Jardim da RIBEIRA da GRANJA.  Acesso ao Hospital S.Joao em 10 min.  Tudo apetrechado para teres a melhor estadia na cidade mais bela do mundo!
notes: Nem sempre o centro da cidade é o melhor sítio para pernoitar. Arrisca num lugar tranquilo e de rápidos acessos a tudo.
transit: Existência do Metro de Ramalde a 5 min a pé. Tudo se torna mais fácil, e perto.  Caso o desejes estamos disponíveis para te ajudar a cumprir a melhor estadia de sempre.  Transferes possíveis se o desejares.
access: Os hóspedes terão acesso a toda a casa, excepto aos arrumos. Terão como companhia dois gatos meigos, que habitam permanentemente na casa. Terão ainda toda e qualquer informação acerca da cidade. Possibilidade de organizar passeios fora da cidade.
interaction: Desde o momento da reserva concluída, todo o processo da estadia é feito com o contacto adequado e apoio necessário para ficarem boas recordações. São colocados ao dispor dos hóspedes, se estes o desejarem, ajuda nos transferes( aeroporto, metro, autocarro). Os hóspedes poderão ter ainda várias referências dos pontos vários de interesse, para usufruírem da cidade no seu melhor. Poderão ser agendadas ainda, previamente, viagens para fora do (URL HIDDEN) preciosos locais de natureza, rio e montanha.Preços acessíveis.
house_rules: MI CASA ES SU CASA! Esta é uma CASA DE FAMÍLIA, ao longo dos 365 dias do ano. Como tal, pedimos, que cada hóspede a respeite, tal como a sua própria casa. A casa está num lugar sossegado, onde os vizinhos estão também habituados á tranquilidade.Como tal pedimos consciência, no que respeita ás horas, ruídos, etc. Dada a existência de dois gatos, agradecemos o maior cuidado com a presença deles.Os animais fazem parte da alegria das nossas crianças diariamente. Desejamos que desfrutem desta casa, como um lugar de repouso, após as vossas visitas á Cidade. As gentes do Norte, são por norma acessíveis e bastante acolhedoras a todas as outras gentes que chegam. ASSIM, espero que aproveitem a minha Cidade, usufruindo de cada recanto, História ou Monumento. A VIDA faz-se ao instante. ALEXANDRA

host.host_about:
Enfermeira, Professora de Yoga, mãe e...apaixonada pela VIDA!
GOSTO de quem gosta de (Website hidden by Airbnb) quem respeita e zela pelo próximo.
O meu lema é a de que vivemos todos numa SÓ CASA ❤️
A minha casa é a tua também. Entrego-te a minha cidade. E ajudo, se quiseres, a conhecer melhor um dos lugares mais belos do mundo. 
Acredito que o AMOR é o ingrediente básico para seres FELIZ num TODO!
Acessos fáceis. Um lugar pacífico. Um cantinho de natureza, em plena cidade. 
Supermercados, mercearias,farmácias, barbearias, etc, tudo disponível para ti. 
Caso necessitem disponibilizamos viagens para outros rumos que queiras conhecer. Amantes da Natureza, estamos só teu dispor! 
Bem vindos!!!!

reviews.comments:
A descrição corresponde. O apartamento está bem localizado, com bons acessos e estacionamento gratuito fácil.

Tem boa vista e é sossegado de noite.

A anfitriã foi bastante acessível, simpática e profissional.

Em todo o momento a anfitriã fez-me sentir bem-vindo, nomeadamente, na disponibilidade para me ir buscar e levar à estação de Campanhã, mesmo fora da hora do Check-in e Check-out e ainda na retenção das bagagens. A descrição do anuncio, a meu ver, peca pela má descrição da 2.ª cama. O apartamento fica a cerca de 200m da rede de metro e o bairro é calmo. Recomendo desde que não seja alérgico ao pelo de gato.

Su familia han estado muy atentos a nuestra llegada y durante la estancia. El piso es tal y como se describe en la ficha. La única pega es que está en un barrio algo retirado, pero a la vez existe mucha tranquilidad, lo que te permite descansar.
Departamento en lugar silencioso y tranquilo. Cerca del metro. Anfitriones muy gentiles. Hay dos gatos muy tranquilos y limpios. Muy buena comunicación con los dueños. Recomendado.

Great host ! Nothing to say about the flat. 
Very flexible on times. Note that you'll have a place in the garage! It is not noted on the Airbnb but it is available! Thank you Alexandra
El Apartamenro de Alejandra es adecuado para una familia o grupo de 4 personas, muy tranquilo para descansar y a 15 minutos en auto del centro de la ciudad, nos gustó.

Алексадра одна из самых гостеприимных хозяек, которых мне доводилось встречать и  всегда готова оказать поддержку своим гостям.
Жилье расположено всего в 5-7 минутах ходьбы от станции метро. Все чисто, опрятно и тихо. Квартира просторная, можно смело останавливаться вчетвером  Совсем рядом находится супермаркет, который работает до 21.00.
2 кота, являющихся постоянными жильцами, нисколько не мешают, опрятные и только добавляют уюта этой квартире.
В общем смело останавливайтесь у этой замечательной хозяйки.
Just 15 minutes away by public transport to the city centre, in a quiet neighbourhood, it' a perecte place to stay i visit Porto.

Clean cosy apartment with two bathrooms and a friendly communicative host. The area isnt the best for restaurants/bars etc but not long to get into the city centre. I use a wheelchair and it worked well for me.

Alexandra é o que no Brasil, o carioca principalmente, chama de "sangue-bom"! Solícita, amável, com uma família admirável.  Valeu a pena a viagem pois com certeza, fiz grandes amigos dos quais não vou me esquecer.

Apparemment agréable dans un immeuble très calme. Alexandre est attentionné, elle nous a  fait fair le tour du quartier.  Pour nous monter .( métro super marché etc...) ils y  deux chats adorables. 
Pour les amoureux des chats

name: Rambutan - Only 8min. walking from Paseo de Gracia
summary: Rambutan Apartment - Very central !! Beautiful apartment of 46 m2 perfectly well located, in the heart of Barcelona with capacity to accommodate up to 4 people. Room with double bed and double sofa bed in the living room. TV in more than 15 languages, A / C, Coffee maker, Bedding, Gel and Shampoo. Nice terrace! Ideal location to get to know the city on foot!
space: Modern and bright apartment with everything you need to enjoy your pleasure or business stay in the best location in the city. Fully equipped kitchen. Linen included. Bathroom with free toiletries, towels, gel and shampoo and hair dryer. NO smoking area.

Room with double bed and double sofa bed in the living room. TV in more than 15 languages, A / C, Coffee maker, Bedding, Gel and Shampoo. Nice terrace! Ideal location to get to know the city on foot! The area is characterized by having a wide range of shops,
neighborhood_overview: The area is characterized by having a wide range of shops, fashion shops, restaurants, boutiques, tapas bars. The tourist bus is only 4 minutes walking. (The tourist bus covers all the most important and tourist points of the city of Barcelona) El Corte Inglés, (the most important shopping center in the city) is located right in front of the apartment. Zara and Mango (Spanish fashion stores) are located right next to the apartment. Supermarket 24h just behind the apartment. Parking at € 23,80 / day just behind the apartment Iron and ironing board on request baby Crib on request
notes: Possibility of housing more than 36 people in the same building in different accommodations (apartments and suites) Groups: No parties or excessive noise allowed. Good behavior is required. Parking directly behind the apartment (€ 23,80 / day)
transit: Privileged and central location in one of the most important avenues of the city; Diagonal Avenue Perfectly well connected with metro, bus, railways, bike lanes and taxis. 8 minutes walk from Paseo de Gracia and 7 minutes walk from Rambla Catalunya! The Sagrada Familia is just two metro stops away. The train station of Sants is only 10 minutes by car / taxi. If you love the sea, the beach of Barceloneta / Villa Olímpica is only 15 minutes away by metro.

host.host_about: Ojalá te sientas en mi apartamento/habitación como en tu propia casa! ;-)

reviews.comments: Great location and comfortable rooms!
Lugar muy bien ubicado, el apartamento está estupendo, trató excelente, los anfitriones muy atentos .

It is really a good experience! Thanks for kiwi team, your lovely notes and sweet candies make me feel at home. It’s really an awesome place! Barcelona is an awesome city too. I’ll highly recommend Kiwidestiny to my friends!

name: Oasis in the city centre
summary: My 400 sq feet studio apartment is at the best residential area in Kowloon Tong, with 3 minutes of walk to Kowloon city, 3-5 minutes walk to bus/ minibus stations, and 3/5/15/20 mins of ride to Mong Kok, TST, central, Causeway Bay respectively
space: This is a perfect studio for two people.  a queen-sized bed with comfortable lining  one extra mattress and one airbed for more people if needed good air-conditioning and heating systems 42 inches smart TV  Apple TV  High speed broadband wifi  5.1 hifi system fully equipped kitchen with nespresso machine strong supply of hot and cold water for shower and bath tub You just have to make yourself feel like home.
description: My 400 sq feet studio apartment is at the best residential area in Kowloon Tong, with 3 minutes of walk to Kowloon city, 3-5 minutes walk to bus/ minibus stations, and 3/5/15/20 mins of ride to Mong Kok, TST, central, Causeway Bay respectively This is a perfect studio for two people.  a queen-sized bed with comfortable lining  one extra mattress and one airbed for more people if needed good air-conditioning and heating systems 42 inches smart TV  Apple TV  High speed broadband wifi  5.1 hifi system fully equipped kitchen with nespresso machine strong supply of hot and cold water for shower and bath tub You just have to make yourself feel like home. Free unlimited access to clubhouse downstairs on 2/F Gym  Swimming pool  Kids playgrounds ( indoor and outdoor) Outdoor BBQ pit Reading area  Computer area Safe building with 24 hours security guard and only assessable by digital card or code I will be available anytime to contact via Airbnb message, while I am happily traveling as you are.
neighborhood_overview: This is the best residential area in Kowloon Tong, with easy access by walk to everything 2 mins to Kowloon Tsai Park (running trail, Olympian sized track field, swimming pool, basketball, football and tennis courts) 5 mins to 3 supermarkets  5 mins to local food in Kowloon City (the famous Chinese, Thai restaurants and desert places in Kowloon City, right opposite to the well-known old Kai Tak Airport U can even enjoy a night walk around the area, with luxurious houses and top schools nearby, where the locals enjoy the jog or stroll with their dogs, feeling safe and refreshed after a day of shopping and sightseeing in the hectic HK
transit: Excellent public transport system (you don't need a car in HK!) From airport  30 mins by taxi  45 mins by airport bus  From my apartment  Walking distance  3-5 mins to nearest bus/ minibus stations To hotspots  By MTR 3 mins to Mong Kok (MK) 5 mins to Tsim Sha Tsui (TST) 15 mins to Central 20 mins to Causeway Bay (CWB)
access: Free unlimited access to clubhouse downstairs on 2/F Gym  Swimming pool  Kids playgrounds ( indoor and outdoor) Outdoor BBQ pit Reading area  Computer area Safe building with 24 hours security guard and only assessable by digital card or code
interaction: I will be available anytime to contact via Airbnb message, while I am happily traveling as you are. My family and cousin will be ready to meet you in Hong Kong and for your disposal in case you need anything.
house_rules: Treat yourself like home, like what I do. Please help me to respect my living space and the neighbourhood. No smoking indoor. No shoes indoor. No pets. No loud noise after midnight.

host.host_about: HK Chinese professional speaking English, Mandarin and Cantonese, love to meet people around the world, and try my best to be a good host in return for all the amazing experience I had from AirBnb

reviews.comments:
Our host, Eric, was very attentive and helpful right from the start.  He provided us with lots of detailed information on his apartment and the area.  When we arrived we were greeted by Eric's parents who checked us in and took us for a walk around the neighbourhood, showing us where to find bus stops and supermarkets etc.
The apartment itself is only around 400sq ft so it was a little cramped for myself and my husband, but it had everything we needed - was well equipped and there was room to put clothes away and to relax.  I particularly liked sitting at the desk looking out at the views towards Kowloon.
The Neighbourhood is very local, peaceful and quiet.  It is a little trek to the nearest MTR (Lok Fu) - I would say around 15-20 minutes which isn't so bad but if you want the convenience of having the MTR around the corner this apartment probably isn't for you.  If you want somewhere away from the bustling crowds then this is perfect.  The clubhouse facilities are great, I used the gym many times, always very quiet.  We did not get a chance to use the pool but it did look lovely and would be perfect on a hot sunny day.
I would definitely recommend Eric's apartment, it was very clean, with a comfy bed, well equipped kitchen, spacious bathroom in a welcoming and friendly building.  Lots of great places to eat in Kowloon City and Lok Fu market is up the road which has a great choice of fresh fruit/veg/meat and fish.
Eric was always on hand if we needed to text him and he always provided help straight away - a good host.

name: PISO MODERNO EN EL EIXAMPLE
summary: The design occupies a floor area of 95 m2 plus 3m2 terrace overlooking a courtyard, and a balcony when you access it will have a magnificent view of the great city.
space: It has an elegant receiver opened for both zones of the housing, with a very functional kitchen to be able to have breakfast, with a bath in the corridor , has towels of bath and hands, this way as the whole clothes of bed necessary for an agreeable stay, as well as hairdryer and iron, and a spectacular suite with dressing room, shower with soil of stones of river and French , both rooms with beds of 1.50x2.00mts (the total of persons is always of 4 including children), where the guests will be able to rest silently, and that give to the small terrace. The whole floor has air conditioning and centralized heating. It will be able to enjoy an environment of the exceptional city to three stops of meter of the Paza of Catalonia / ravine and of the Walk of Grace,
description: The design occupies a floor area of 95 m2 plus 3m2 terrace overlooking a courtyard, and a balcony when you access it will have a magnificent view of the great city. It has an elegant receiver opened for both zones of the housing, with a very functional kitchen to be able to have breakfast, with a bath in the corridor , has towels of bath and hands, this way as the whole clothes of bed necessary for an agreeable stay, as well as hairdryer and iron, and a spectacular suite with dressing room, shower with soil of stones of river and French , both rooms with beds of 1.50x2.00mts (the total of persons is always of 4 including children), where the guests will be able to rest silently, and that give to the small terrace. The whole floor has air conditioning and centralized heating. It will be able to enjoy an environment of the exceptional city to three stops of meter of the Paza of Catalonia / ravine and of the Walk of Grace,
neighborhood_overview: Tiene todo tipo de servicios de supermecados como de restaurantes, esta situado en el barrio gay del Eixample de Barcelona. Si vienen en coche tienen un Parking en la calle Rocafort, NN Rocafort que se puede reservar por horas y por días a muy buen precio.
transit: A 15 metros de la puerta del edificio esta el metro 'Rocafort' y el Bus
access: Secador de pelo , plancha, cafetera Nespreso, microondas, horno, caja de seguridad, lavadora y lavavajillas.
interaction: Hay posibilidad de cuna para bebes. Desperfectos en el mobiliario o tapicerias que hayan sido provocados por el mal uso de adultos o niños pequeños serán descontados del deposito.
house_rules: Las normas son las basicas de no hacer ruido y bajar el volumen de television y musica despues de las 22:00 horas, ya que el edificio es residencial.Cualquier alteracion o molestias que pudieran ocasionar puede tener como resultado que la vecindad avise a la guardia urbana. No se puede fumar. Para los bebes hay una cuna extra disponible sin cargo bajo peticion, Los niños cuentan como adultos.

reviews.comments:
Host serio ed affidabile. 
Bellissimo appartamento confortevole e fornitissimo di tutto.
Quartiere tranquillo e ben collegato.

Luis was a great host despite a slight language barrier. We landed late in the evening but Luis was very accommodating and met us at the apartment just before 11pm. 
The apartment was as described and pictured, it was a lovely place to stay and me and my group felt at home here. 
It was a 15 minute walk to la rambla or if you are feeling lazy the metro station is right outside the front door!
The only thing to note with this apartment is that there are many stairs to get to it (86 to be precise!) All female groups with lots of luggage would probably struggle. 
Other than that I would highly recommend this apartment for comfort and location. 

Thanks for a lovely stay Luis!

Luis greeted us the second we arrived! He explained to us where abouts the main places are. The place is SO MUCH Nicer than the pictures shown! Place was equipped with everything - towels, quilts, soap, kitchen accessories. It was really clean. No complaints : ) !! (Sidenote; its on the 3rd floor so be prepared to walk up a few stairs)
Accueil ponctuel et sympathique,appartement super agréable,excellent rapport qualité prix,toutes commodités à proximité
The host canceled this reservation 49 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

A casa é muito boa, muito confortável, fica numa rua central e de fácil acesso a todas as atracções turísticas. Tem logo uma estação de metro perto o que ajuda muito na mobilidade. O Luís é super simpático. Adoramos a estadia :)
Obrigada Luís!

Very nice appartment close to metro station and walk distance great park. Easy to contact Luis. We had some problem with water, but he solved it very quick. House was clean, shower in the master bedroom could be more clean. There was a lot of stairs to climb, but they were busy putting an elevator. So next time, I hope the elevator is ready.
Luis a trés bien organisé mon  arrivée , son appartement est très agréable. Je  recommande la location de cet appartement.

Le logement correspond exactement au descriptif. Très bien situé (transports, quartier), 2 chambres confortables au calme (très bons lits), 2 salles de bain, un salon/salle à manger et une cuisine très bien équipée. Nous nous sommes très rapidement sentis à l'aise dans cet appartement. Nous recommandons ce logement sans problèmes. Merci Luis !
It was a nice and beautiful Apartment. Near metrostation. 20 min by feet to Plaça de catalunya. Luis is really nice and helpfull. :)

Luis was a great host, meeting us outside the apartment when we arrived in Barcelona. 

The flat is in a great location just by Rocafort metro station. The flat itself is beautiful with a lovely terrace to enjoy breakfast in the sun. Everything you could want from a city apartment. Be warned though - lots of stairs! Would highly reccomend this apartment.
Beautiful apartment, great location for metro. Luis was very friendly and everything was very straightforward. Would definitely recommend!

Accoglienza ottima,appartamento moderno ben tenuto, come descritto nelle foto, silenzioso nonostante sia sulla gran via.Unica pecca è al quarto piano senza ascensore,che però stanno mettendo.
Consigliato, posizione ottima intermedia tra due fermate metro.

Luis ja sido muy amable, en todo momento todo . el departamento ubicación excelente, muy lindo , cómodo y con buen gusto en la decoración. Muy cómodo para dos parejas. Sin dudas lo volvería a elegir y lo recomiendo !

Super séjour dans cet appartement. Bien équipé, propre et charmant. Agréable d'avoir deux salles de bains quand on est quatre. Metro juste à côté. Luiz est disponible facilement sur (Hidden by Airbnb) . Je recommande
Amazing apartment in an amazing location. Also although the host didn't speak English he sent his niece who did making our arrival smooth. Would definitely recommend!
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Les photos correspondent exactement ! L'appartement est super bien situé (accès au métro et aux bus dans la rue). Résidence calme (même de nuit). Pas d'ascenseur pour les étages mais au moins ça fait les cuisses ;)

This is a very nice flat on a historic boulevard close to the city centre (some 15 mins walking distance). It is clean, quiet and very confortable. Luis is also vey responsive, so eveything goes very smoothly.
Bellissimo appartamento, centrale e confortevole, da ritornarci, grazie per l'ospitalità:)
Loved it!

Beautiful apartment, in a very central location. Metro stop on the doorstep, and a reasonably short journey to the sights of Barcelona ( Passeig De Gracia, Las Ramblas, Mont Juic etc) Was absolutely perfect for a short stay in Barcelona at a great price. Would definitely stay here again. Just be aware that there's lots of stairs to the apartment, but a lift is in the process of being installed in the building.
Appartement impeccable et idéal pour découvrir Barcelone.
It's a clean and big apartment. We are enjoying our stay in Barcelona. Thinks Luis!
Perfect location with a very good and confortable flat. Luis was nice and flexible

Een te gek apartement op een toplocatie. Contact met Luis verliep ook erg goed. Wel was het jammer dat er tijdens ons verblijf verbouwd werd in de rest van het gebouw en dit was niet naar ons gecommuniceerd.
Very good location. Spacious and comfortable for 4 people.
Luis is a kind host and his apartment is nicely arranged and well situated just next to a metro station. I definitely recommend it !

Great location. The host met us directly at the time we needed and the location was great with a lot of shops and restaurants nearby. There was construction going on in the building when we stayed so it was very dusty but I'm sure it will be very nice once completed.

This is a beautiful flat in a not so touristy part of Barcelona but close enough to walk everywhere! 

There are some fabulous bars and restaurants all around the flat that because aren't in the main drag cost a bit less! If you fancy an amazing hamburger check out the New York cafe!

Be prepared to walk up around 8 flights of stairs to get this flat so maybe not suitable for young children or those that may struggle: there is a lift coming but who knows when! 

Thank you Luis for a wonderful stay!

We loved our stay in Barcelona.  The apartment was in a great location which was walking distance to many of the tourist sites and also close to restaurants and shopping. It was great to be so close to the central city but also very quiet at night for us to sleep.

Good and clean place for two families. Close to Rambla and Plaça Espanol. You can go by walk to the Gaudi's mater pieces. İf your visit 4 or more days appropriate Hola Card advised. İf you will rent a car Sixth office and parking place (€14/ daily) are vey close. 2 metro/bus (30 mins time) you can go Parc Güell or Sagrada.

Double check if any repairs are still ongoing in the building - we had a bad noise surprise (only) the first day (meaning it wan't noisy in general, and might've been a one-off). The lift was not working for our stay. There are decent places to eat about 10 mins away. When in Barcelona, use the public transport, but take the 10 tickets coupon. It halves the price of a ticket, and is allowed to be used by multiple people for the same journey. Aside from what's instantly visible on the map, there is also a rooftop next to Arenas de Barcelona (which is ~10mins walk), in the B Hotel.

Très bon accueil de Luis. L'appartement, tout confort, est idéalement situé (bouche de métro à côté). Malgré sa situation sur un axe central, le calme y règne. Les 2 grandes chambres avec WC et salle de bain privatifs sont un réel point fort. Il faut tenir compte cependant qu'il est situé au 4e étage sans ascenseur (installation en cours). Très bon choix à recommander.

Logement adapté pour 4 personnes.
Emplacement parfait grâce à l'accès aux transports en commun.
Petit commerce de proximité pratique pour les imprévus.
Je recommande.

Excelente. Soy la hija de Eduardo a nombre de quien alquile el piso. Hablo en nombre de él. Destaco el trato y comunicacion con Luis. Ha respondido a todas las preguntas rapidamente, ha estado pendiente en todo momento.
El piso es bellisimo, como en las fotos.. Lo tiene todo para una estancia ideal.
La ubicacion excelente tanto para conocer Barcelona como para ir hasta el aeropuerto en el bus que pasa a 3 calles.
Sin dudas lo recomendare y volvere en cuanto pueda.
Appartement de tres haut standing, idéalement placé, très fonctionnel et spacieux. Tres bon rapport qualité-prix. Hôtes très accueillants et disponibles. Je vous le recommande vivement.

Our stay at Luis's place was great!!
When we arrived to Barcelona Luis was waiting for us in the apartment, although our flight was delayed, and we were late- he was still there.
The apartment is in great location, very close to the Metro station.
We had every thing we needed inside, plus it looks so nice and clean :)
Luis was very thoughtful and helpful.
Thank you Luis !!

This place is just amazing . Nice furniture , comfortable two bedrooms and bathrooms ,kitchen with all equipments .  Its great located right at the metro ! Also walkable to bars ,Restaurants ,  plaza Catalunya , Gracia , Ramblas ... 
We met Luis friend Silvia who was very helpful with explaining and showing us the area  . We had great time !! 
Once again thank you Luis for ur flat and definitely we will stay again on our return to BCN 
Muchas gracias y espero nos vemos pronto 
Ciao Radek :)

Our stay in Barcelona could not have been better. Luis' apartment was the perfect choice. Location wise is great, just outside the door there is a metro station and bus stop that connects to main areas in the city. Although, main sightseeing attractions are within walking distance. The area is safe, calm and very charming. The apartment is fully refurbished and you can see the amount of care Luis put into it. Comfortable beds and nice shower, fully furnished with everything you will need to ensure a pleasant stay. Very smooth check in and check out process. I had to arrive a day earlier and Luis ensured he would get the apartment ready for me to be able to  check me in. He was there waiting and gave all necessary instructions. Overall, great experience. Whenever I go back to Barcelona, I will definitely check if Luis' place is available.

El departamento es super cómodo y limpio. Muy bien decorado. Tiene todo lo que se necesita, utensilios, artículos de limpieza y demas.  No tuvimos que comprar extras. Las habitaciones muy cómodas y ai53 acondicionado central. Es más lindo de lo que se ve en fotos. Super recomendable!
A great apartment that's close to the best parts of Barcelona. - and literally a few meters from the Metro.
Lovely Apartment. Perfect Connection with Public Transport. Super Clean. Nice kitchen. Cool neighborhood. Thx Luis
Sehr schönes, sauberes geräumiges Appartment. Mit 4 Personen gut nutzbar, da 2 Bäder vorhanden sind.

Great location, it's like a minute to the Metro. You can also walk to most attractions. Nice apartment, spacious,  modern and clean. Easy communication, and easy check-in. We enjoyed our stay and would stay here again.
Very nice and friendly ☺
Leuk en goed appartement net buiten het drukke centrum. Lopend goed te doen.

We had an excellent stay in Luis's apartment. It is very well located just next to the Rocafort subway station. There are lots of cafes, bars and restaurants in the blocks around, and it is very easy to get the city centre.
Unsere Sorge war es, ob die Schlafzimmer in ruhiger Lage sind. In unserer Zeit brauchten wir keine Aircondition. Somit war es sehr ruhig und wir konnten gut schlafen.

El piso es grande y muy bonito, excelentemente bien ubicado. La comunicación con Luis fue siempre fluida y rápida. Sin duda lo recomiendo y volvería a hospedarme en este piso en otro viaje a Barcelona!
Wir haben die 4 Tage in Barcelona auch dank der Unterkunft sehr genießen können.
The communication was great between is and Luis and we found the apartment very convenient and also appreciated the location!

alloggio in bella posizione , confortevole e con servizi di primo livello . 
host puntuale e gentilmente diponibile  ,

Appartement grand, fonctionnel, avec deux salles de bain pour deux chambres ce qui est très bien.  Mais la semaine de Noël où nous étions là, l’appartement d’à côté était en chantier et nous n’avons pas été prévenus. Vu qu’en plus des bruits de chantier, on entendait aussi les conversations des ouvriers, l’insonorisation de l’immeuble n’est pas top.

Agradecemos a Luis por todo cuidado. Foi muito atencioso. O apartamento é ótimo muito bonito organizado e (Website hidden by Airbnb) todas as funcionalidades que precisávamos para hospedagem. Foi muito bom estar em Barcelona tão bem hospedado

El apartamento es tal como se ve en las fotos o mejor: precioso, limpio y con una decoración muy cuidada. El emplazamiento es el ideal, con paradas de metro y bus a los pies del edificio. Si os gusta caminar, en a penas 20 min estás en la Rambla o en el Paseo de Gracia. La cocina y los dos baños están perfectamente equipados. En cuanto a Luis, es un anfitrión atento y cuidadoso. En definitva, nos hemos sentido como en casa. El único pero que no depende del anfitrión ni de la casa son las obras del piso de en frente entre semana, pero al estar nosotros principalmente el fin de semana no tuvimos problemas. ¡Sin duda una experiencia a repetir!
The apartment is good located, just next to the Rocafort subway station. Easy, friendly communication with Luis and Silvia, and easy check-in and check-out. We enjoyed our stay very much!

We stayed for 9 days in February 2018, and we really enjoyed the apartment.  The building had beautiful Art Nouveau details, and the apartment was very stylish and clean.  The location along the tree-lined GranVia was very elegant.  The apartment was easy to reach from the airport; the Aerobus stops just two blocks away at Granvia/Urgell.  The L1 metro line also stops very close to the apartment.  Communication and key-exchange with Luis was easy and prompt.  Overall, I highly recommend this apartment!

appartement très agréable, très propre  parfaitement bien placé par rapport à tout ce qui peut être vus à Barcelone Une station de métro se trouve au pied de l'appartement ainsi que l’arrêt de bus De plus dans une rue toute proche nous avons trouvé un parking avec des prix trés attractifs .
Une excellente adresse
100 % recomendable. Un departamento increible en todos los sentidos. Luis un anfitrion inmejorable. Todo perfecto. Supero nuestra ilusion por lejos.

Très bel appartement décoré avec goût. 
Idéal pour 2 couples. 
Très bien situé pour le marathon de Barcelone ou autre visite ( Metro au pied de l’immeuble)
Très bon accueil 
À recommander

Apartamento muito bem localizado com ótima decoração! O metrô (estação Rocafort) está a uns 50 passos da entrada do prédio. O apartamento estava muito limpo e organizado, e Luis foi muito paciente com nossos horários (contando atrasos de voos)
Great place

This was a great apartment. Clean, spacious, stylish and with everything one will need. Big enough for a family of four or for 2 couples. Right next to the metro stop (Rocafort - line 1). The wifi was pretty good. A lot of supermarkets and bakeries in the area.
Overall we had a great stay there and would highly recommend it.
appartement très propre et bien equipée je le recommande a tous

I stayed with my family for 4 days in Luis apartment. It has great location with a metro and supermarket right next to the   building and with several restaurants close by. The apartment is located on the III floor and the building has got a lift. Overall a very pleasant stay and Louis is also a great host. Will highly recommend this apartment.

Perfect apartment in a perfect location, walkable to many major attractions. Super cute neighborhood with lots of cafes around. Quick bus ride from the airport, gets you just a block away. Apartment was very stylish and comfortable. Luis was quick to respond. We loved our stay!
Amazing location and large apartment. Very close to metro station and a bus stop just in front of the main door.

Appartement très bien situé, avec station de métro au pied de l'immeuble et un arrêt Aérobus tout proche. Commerces à proximité.
Bien que situé sur GrandVia, aucune nuisance de circulation (seulement si le double vitrage reste fermé).
Décoration raffinée. Logement spacieux, bien aménagé et bien équipé.  De quoi passer un très bon séjour pour découvrir la ville.

Amazing cute appartement perfect size for our  family of 4, tidy air conditioning was great for those hot Barcelona nights . The elevator was a godsend with all our luggage and worth the amazing view from the terrace. A great space in a great neighbourhood!
Very accommodating host.
Clean, stylish, well-ventilated, very functional kitchen incl dishwasher, and comfy beds.  I'd stay again.

L appartement est bien placé, bien décoré et Luis ou Silvia sont à l écoute et disponibles ! 
Parfait

This apartment is more than great! Super clean , nicely decorated, near a metro, grocery store, bakery and health food store, walkable distance to plaça de Catalunya where you can ride the hop hop off buses . We loved it and would not hesitate to come back!
Luis’ apartment is beautiful and stylish. It is air conditioned and has a balcony on either side. We loved our stay here! I can recommend this apartment highly to anyone visiting Barcelona.

Great apartment & well decorated. A few hundred metres from Aerobus drop-off and pickup. Very convenient for airport transfer. Walking distance to Placa Cataluna of approximately 1.6km along tree lined pedestrian walkway.

Four of us stayed for six nights and it felt like home. Luis and Silvia were very prompt with responses and meeting us. We were arriving very early and Luis arranged for us to checkin straight away which was really appreciated. The location is fabulous and you can walk most places. The metro is just outside if you prefer. The Aerobus from the airport stops about 100m away. Many supermarkets and cafes are close. Apartment is lovely and will definitely recommend to others.  Thanks Luis
Very nice stilish place. Very good location. Welcoming host

L’host è stato molto accogliente poiché ci ha aspettato all’appartamento prima che arrivassimo e ci ha spiegato tutto. L’appartamento è bellissimo,pulito e tutto curato. È stata un’esperienza piacevole
Perfekte Lage, sehr gut ausgestattete Wohnung, sehr sauber, wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Luis hat alles sehr gut organisiert und war bei Fragen immer erreichbar.
muy buen anfitrión y excelente apartamento y muy buena ubicación
Fantastic apartment, very well equipped, great location and value for money with plenty of local amenities and transport links. Would certainly recommend!
Appartement idéal pour un séjour touristique à Barcelone. Tres belle déco et surtout 2 chambres ET 2 salles de bain! Rien à redire donc, à recommander même...

Great location and neighborhood. Exit the charming building's door and the Rocafort Metro station is 20 steps away. Many excellent restaurants, markets, and a variety of shops in the 3-4 block neighborhood. Luis and Sylvia are accommodating and timely when meeting initially. Definitely recommend and would return to this apartment.

Un piso muy chulo, confortable y bien decorado, espacios amplios y bien distribuido. Muy bien ubicado, comunicado y muy cómodo. 
Cerca de Pl. de Cataluña en una zona con buen ambiente.  
Muy recomendable
Très bel appartement confortable et bien équipé, nous avons passé un très agréable séjour.
The location and place is fantastic. The only thing bad was the internet (wifi) connection. Other than that - great place!

This place was great because of the awesome location. It's perfectly situated within walking distance to a lot many touristy places and at the same time is located in a non touristy place which gave us the feeling of being locals. 
The house is very stylishly done and is warm and cozy.
It has all the amenities that you would require with a well stocked kitchen.
We were given local tips on food and places to go too.
There is a supermarket and a Cafe right below the building which took care of our breakfast and daily needs.
This is really the perfect place for all who want to get a taste of Barcelona.
Great apartment in the center of Barcelona, clean and with great amenities. Luis was a great host.

Very friendly and helpful owner,immediate responses!The apartment is very cosy and ideal for two couples!The location is great,next to metro station,pharmacy,mini market!The neighborhood is quiet and safe!I would definitely recommend it!!!
Hope to stay in the apartment again!!Thanks for everything!

Posizione perfetta, alloggio enorme con 2 camere matrimoniali, 2 bagni ( di cui uno dentro ad una camera ).
L’host è stato fantastico e gentilissimo. L’alloggio è completo di tutto ( ascougamani, asciugacapelli, bagnoschiuma, saponi, macchinetta del caffè con capsule, lavastoviglie ). Il quartiere è molto tranquillo è molto ben frequentato. La Metro L1 è a pochi metri dal portone di casa è sempre sotto casa trovate dei mini market h24 e molte farmacie in caso di necessità. Sicuramente tornando a Barcellona la prima scelta sarà sempre questo appartamento. 
Fantastico
Excelente departamento, luminoso, cómodo y muy confortable!!!!!

El piso de Luis es mejor de lo que ves en las fotos. No sólo es un espacio de cuidada decoración, sino que es un lugar agradable para descansar y disfrutar. Las camas son comodisimas y teniendo 2 baños es un valor añadido. La ubicación es inmejorable, a media hora caminando de todas partes de media, en plena Gran Vía. Sin duda es un piso que merece muchisimo la pena reservar. Luis es un host atento y agradable y la comunicacion fue fluida de principio a fin. Un 10 como host y como piso.
Un piso hermoso, cómodo, bien ubicado, con todo lo que uno necesita en vacaciones, volveré seguramente el año próximo, Luis un anfitrión de primera calidad , gracias por tido

A clean, modern and stylish place which is suitable for family travel. Although Lius doesn’t speak English well, he try his very best to communicate with you. With the help of (Hidden by Airbnb) translate, I think it’s not a big problem. Also, Silvia can speak English fluently and she will greet you in the apartment on the day you check in. The check in and check out process is very smooth! Much appreciate! Just a friendly reminder, there is 90 litres hot water for shower only, if you used up the hot water, u need to wait for more than 30 minutes to have the hot water again.
Très joli appartement, bien situé et spacieux. Parfait !
Super Wohnung. Besser als auf den Fotos. Richtig Cool
Many thanks for our stay. Everything was perfect.
Cosy and clean (Email hidden by Airbnb) plimentary minibar and a proper coffee machine were nice. No issues except unreliable Wi-Fi.

name: Cozy ensuite 1 min to MTR #5
summary: This is a double room with private bathroom for 2 people. We are a hostel with 11 rooms Key area: can reach 3 MTR stations in 5 mins: Kowloon, Jordan & Austin
space: This simply decorated studio is well-equipped with all basic living necessity 這間套房簡單清潔,各種基本生活設備都齊全,希望提供一個方便乾淨的住宿環境 The double bed is good for 2 people.  Also has a private bathroom + FREE wireless internet. Convenient and allow you complete privacy 房間有一張雙人床,獨立衛浴設備,以及免費無線上網｡ Location is excellent. Just right next to Austin Exit A. Extremely convenient to travel to Hong Kong spots. Just 5 - 10 mins walk (or take 1 MTR station) to Tsim Sha Tsui for all shopping! 位於柯士甸地鐵站A出口旁邊,5 - 10 分鐘 (或坐一站地鐵) 就可步行至尖沙咀,十分方便｡ From airport you can take A22 Airport Bus directly to the apartment. It takes within 30 mins and the bus stop is right located 5 mins from the apartment 從機場可乘 A22 機場巴士,約30分鐘,巴士站僅距大廈5分鐘 Prime Location: Can reach 3 subway stations within 1 - 8 mins: Kowloon station: directly airport express line to airport & reach Disneyland in 20 mins for only 6 stations  Austin: one station from Tsim Sha Tsui and two stations to Mong Kok Jordan: 3 stations to Central, 4 stations to Causeway Bay 地點優越,

reviews.comments: We stayed here on a layover whilst travelling to Singapore. It was a small room with no window so felt a bit claustrophobic. Directions from Helen were very good and we found the place very easily.
Checking in and out was easy as long as you have a phone. The room was ready and cleaned as promised. It was what we expected.
Normal budget travel experience. What you see is what you get. Convenient location. Near to Airport Express MTR and bus. Near to local convenience stores and restaurants.
찜사추이에서 걸어다닐수있는거리라서 좋았어요~^^  침실도 깨끗하고  좋았어요~  하지만 화장실이 좀 지저분해서... 좀 아쉬웠지만 너무 즐거운 홍콩 여행이였습니다~~^^

We arrived early to Hong Kong International (Website hidden by Airbnb) went straight to Helens (Website hidden by Airbnb) was very easy to find from the explanations from Helen.We were very tired after our long flight from Europe.We hoped to get into the room earlier.But that was not possible.First at 2! ( we were there already at 9.30.We could let our suitcases be in the corridor.And went to the park waiting for the time should be 2 !This is a hostel with many small rooms !No toiletpaper,no towels. The aircondition did nor work,and it was no window there. We could not put a suitcase under the bed because there was a lot of different things from the owner.But closing the suitcases and put it up into the wall,it was okay !
