Helen's place is so convenient coz it's just across Austin MTR. There's a 7-11 store across the building. Checking in was easy! Helen provided us with the building code and all the instructions. When we got there, no one answered the door so we had to call the contact number Helen provided. The building guard was nice enough to let us use their phone so we were able to get the door code quickly. When we got inside, our assigned room was open and was ready. The room as small, but it was okay for the price. There was not enough room to move around but it was perfect for budget travelers like me who just need a place to crash in after a long day of touring around. No towels provided but I already knew that so I brought my own. They had a hair dryer inside, adapter, tissues and shampoo and bodywash inside the bathroom. There's also a Flatscreen TV. Bed was comfortable and I slept like a baby! Our room has no window, so if you're claustrophobic this might not be the room for you. Overall, We had a pleasant stay. Will definitely stay here again. Thanks Helen! :)
很棒的住宿体验,实惠舒适,美中不足就是房间隔音不太好
Small but very clean, nice place
it was a really nice and convenient walk from the MTR. Really nice and cosy room. Great for 2 people! I liked it alot!
唯一不滿是房間沒有對外窗,但價錢反映質素,房間近走道,隔音較差｡
We were welcomed by a man who's English was very good, which was very helpful.

This room in Austin Inn was nice deal. Its location is so convenience, you can find drug store, 711, good restaurants, taxi stand, MTR stations nearby. You should try dimdimsum restaurant, Woosung street hawker bazaar, those two were my favorite restaurants there and their price was reasonable.

The room size was decent and can fit some people just like described on the listing. I booked 3 rooms for 8 people and we stayed for 5 nights in Austin Inn. We didn't spend much time on the room, just for resting at night, and cleaning ourselves so I think it's really a good deal and the price is pretty reasonable.

You can get taxi if you want to get to HKIA fast for around HKD 240-250.

I really enjoyed my stay here. Thank you!

這種價錢不能挑剔什麼 但是值得注意的是
1.隔音很差 淺眠的人需要三思 除了外面的汽車噪音明顯之外 走廊的噪音也很明顯 我幾乎整夜無法入眠
2.當我到賓館門口 敲門都沒人回應 我打了房東提供的每一隻電話給我 都沒有人接 我不得以只好打房東的手機 跟他反應沒人開門以及沒有人聽電話 房東只跟我說那就打到通呀 我覺得房東態度很差以及不負責任 可能這對香港人來說是正常的態度 而且房東的國語很不標準 我不是很清楚他在說什麼 幸虧樓下的警衛幫助我我才能進去 房東你大概會覺得我態度也很差 但是為何我會不高興是因為你說"那就打到通啊" 一間旅館不論規模大小 價錢多少 隨時有人開門是很正常的事 當然我不會再入住了 我願意多花點錢住隔音好的地方
位置挺好的,就是房间有点小,但是很干净
Disappointing
只是短暂的住一晚,虽然小,但是挺干净的,挺好的｡交通很便利,旁边还有几家挺好吃的茶餐厅｡愉快的旅程

I couldn't enter the room for one and half hour, and I waited in the room.
I was very sleepy and I wanted to sleep earlier. But I couldn't sleep a lot because of the host. I sent the host a email, but he thinks I am a bad girl.
I hope he returned the money and I don't recommend the room.

Very affordable for places in HK, especially with it's own private bathroom. Usually for this price you would be forced to share a room. WiFi is fast. Staff are friendly. To access the hotel it requires a swipe card and then you have your own key to the room, I felt like my items were secure. As an added bonus the outlets were universal so I could plug my electronics straight into the wall, no need for a universal converter.

It seems a little disconcerting at first, especially to those not used to HK, as the place is tucked away. That's fairly normal for HK. Follow the directions to get there, as a lot of HK intersections are crossed using tunnels underneath the road, so if you are catching public transport use the directions provided. Really friendly staff. I would stay there again. It's in a nice central spot, close to Temple street for night markets, close to Jordan station which is a lovely central spot.
還是很不錯的,交通方便,來去自由,

Helen is very helpful although we didn't manage to see her in person but she responds very quickly on chats. The room is just nice for  my sis and i. A bathroom and a bed. Didn't intend to coop in the room anyway, just a place to rest. Location is good too, located nearest to Austin, it's quite central! :) Recommended!

The room was clean and size is ok for Hongkong. However, we have to say that we had cheaper rooms for 17$ in Hongkong which were much more modern, in better locations (Tsim Sha Tsui, Mirador Mansion or Chunking Mansion building) and had windows. We stayed for 3 nights and this room has no window so the air is not really fresh inside.

The directions to AUSTIN INN were excellent.
The air con made a little too much noise.
For the price and the easy location to Kowloon Station was great.

Very convenient location. Small room as others have said but clean and affordable so overall a great deal. Many amenities were provided for the guests for communal usage such as umbrellas, which are a must in Hong Kong.
Near mtr austin and it's private room

Ms. Helen is very accommodating despite all the additional requests i made during our stay. The instructions provided is very accurate and the area is very safe even at night. Thank you! I will definitely recommend the place to others.
Fast response to any inquiry.

Strategic location near temple street, public transport, 7-11 and local food. The place is very small but quite clean. Might be quite noisy when other people enters Austin Inn after midnight and exit early in the morning.

You can't beat this location, right in the heart of Kowloon and a 2 minute walk to Austin Station. If you manage your expectations for a Hong Kong sized room you'll be happy with this place. Only wish a towel was provided in the shower but I understand the laundry constraints in Hong Kong. Helen was very good at replying to any messages or questions I had. For a short stay right in the heart of the city, this is a great place!

We were sent directions in advance that led us to a door on the opposite end of the floor. Upon calling to clarify, I ended up being yelled at. When we finally arrived, I was told that we were definitely sent the right directions. The room is comfortable enough and located within walking distance of 3 convenient metro stops, but you can hear everything happening out in the hallway, which repeatedly woke us up during our stay. In particular, there was one morning when the phone rang continuously for several hours, with apparently no one around to pick it up. So, if you want a place to rest during the day or sleep when you want, this is not the place for you.

clean but small bed for two persons.

overall, fair experience. The hot water stops working on first night and called the next morning, waited for almost an hour for someone to take care of this matter. the location is great, near multiple underground stations (Jordan, Kowloon and Austin) and airport express (Kowloon).

Room was quite small but very convenient to MTR or bus. A lot of restaurants and convenience stores in the area.

This place is certified inn and accommodation so have better peace of mind. Building is not dodgy. But must be prepared to have abit of noises as quite some traffic in main corridor.

The place is near some great authentic local Cantonese restaurants and the Main Street of Mong Kok. Self-checkin is easy. The rooms are clean and air conditioned.

Helen's place was nice and cozy and the location was a plus! It's not exactly the cleanest or the best accommodation but if you're simply looking for a place to sleep then it should do. The checkin instructions and directions were clear and easy to follow. It was a bit cramped for my boyfriend and I and two luggages but we managed. There were a lot of restaurants open late near the accommodation and so many other things were within walking distance.

Our stay in the room was very convenient : the location is perfect, near by the metro station, convenience store and restaurant, and the street night market. 
Room is small and don't expect too much confort but still OK for sleeping quietly.
Air conditioning installed in the room helped a lot knowing the high temperatures and humidity outside !
地理位置非常非常便利,房子很好找,离佐敦和柯士甸地铁站都不远,去旺角､庙街都很方便,坐地铁到海洋公园､铜锣湾､中环也很方便很方便｡夜晚噪音有点大了,可能也是我们运气不好赶上不太文明的房客,整体性价比还是很高的｡
Adequate little spot to sleep in Hong Kong
5号房､房间小､无窗很闷､空调噪音大对着床吹､床单看起来干净睡了身上发痒､位置还可以､只是第一次去的话联系不上人比较难找点
Quite difficult to find and there is limited space if you have a lot of baggage might not be appropriate to this place.

The place is near public transportation however a bit difficult to find. The room is too small and full of the smell of anditote which woke me up the other morning. The others are fine. Especially with a nice price.
You always get what you pay for. Just enough for leaving your baggage and sleeping.
Excellent location

Dear readers, the host is very friendly and responsive.

HOWEVER, the directions for the location of the unit is very misleading.
the instructions given after you done the payment did not really tell you where you are staying, which room number or house unit number.

it is just mentioned, stairs on the right, walk up 1 floor up and you can see Austin Inn on your right, and followed by the passwords and so on.

i tried to find out which house number the host is referring to, IN THE END I ONLY KNEW AFTER I FOUND OUT THAT WE ARE STAYING IN "AUSTIN INN" itself. OMG, we feel cheated and disappointed.

I am not a big fan of definition however I believe AirBnb does not offer any staying in an INN. this has clearly violate the purpose of AirBnb.

Note: If i am suppose to stay in AUSTIN INN, please mention that "you are expecting to stay in AUSTIN INN." this can really clear the few minutes of talking on the mobile phone with the rude check-in counter person to clarify which house unit i am staying on the 1st floor, ENDED UP ACTUALLY WE ARE STAYING IN "AUSTIN INN."

I hope this review of mine serve a good purpose to all especially those who are interested to stay here. 

Thanks in advance and have and have a nice day.
Well located in the Kowloon side, good places to eat nearby and also easy access to MRT. Clean and comfortable room with everything that is required.

It was very hard to communicate with the host and the receptionist  for this Inn, we requested early check in as it said on the description we could do. The host said ok but when we arrived the maids and receptionist didn't get any information from the host. So we had to wait another 2 hours. We were unable to stay in the room because of the previous guest smoked in the room. This inn is a Motel as it said in Chinese when you arrive at the main entrance.
除了空间小了点其他都很好
地理位置真的很棒 ,设施都很好,靠近地铁站周围都是餐厅超市非常方便!
De kamer beschikt niet over een raam en het is een erg kleine kamer. De locatie is top maar de prijs kwaliteit verhouding is niet gelijk.

If you are not above 6 feet in height and need a place to sleep and leave light suit cases then I highly recommend this place, very accessible to shopping and transportation areas. We will get the place if we go back to HK!

BOEK DEZE KAMER NIET!    Belangrijkste reden is dat er overal schimmel in de kamer zit! Verhuurder trekt zich er weinig van aan gezien haar reactie dat ze het met chloor hadden aangepakt. Kamer wordt aangeboden als 2 persoonskamer maar dit is miet het geval. Het bed is te klein voor een westers persoon (lees: iemand langer dan 1.70meter en zonder enige spieropbouw). Met mijn vriendin lag 1 van ons er gegarandeerd voor de helft uit. 3e reden dat je deze kamer niet zou moeten boeken is het feit dat de AC kapot is en het daarom erg muf is. In combinatie met de schimmel is dit onbewoonbaar. Ik heb samen met mijn vriendin hierdoor last minute een ander hotel moeten boeken.
房东人很好,住的位子也很好找,很安全方便.
不好,照片骗人的,马桶是堵的｡
很好
很好
一分钱一分享受,还不错,下次过香港应该还会入住

I have no complains about the hosts, Helen was very comprehensive and she made us a reimbursement without even asking, which was a very nice gesture and we kindly appreciate it. She quickly reply to us regarding about our problems and try to fix things for us. However, about the place, we were very disappointed, since we found things to be quite out-dated from the ones shown in the pictures. Our room had some humidity problems on the wall as well as a slight odor inside the room and bathroom. She told us they are going to fix it asap so, I really hope they put things up to date because at this moment, seems like the have forgotten a bit, keeping the rooms in good conditions. We never expect everything to be brand new, neither to find the place exactly as shown in the pictures, but we do expect to find things in the same conditions as the ones shown in the pictures. The building itself, which has nothing to do with the room, it also a bit rusty and dirty in the common areas, which is quite important for us, but we agree it is not important for everyone. At the end we cancelled and went somewhere else. So, no complains at all about the host, but at this moment, won’t recommend the place, even though is well located and at a “cheap” (for HK standards) price.
Very comfortable room for couple. Quick responses from Helen. Near in Austin,Jordan,Kowloon stations. :)
So small
great location and can be the first option to stay in Hong Kong if you want to avoid Chungking Mansion
总的来说还可以

离地铁有些远,还要过隧道,方向感不好的不太好找｡我住的离门口很近,大早上5点左右很吵,空调声音很大,有些破旧

helen和她的房子都很棒,房子在非常便利的地方,去往任何地方都很方便,我并不是来香港购物的,我去的地方很杂,但是从这里出发几乎都很方便,距离两个地铁站和很多公交车站都很近,附近步行可到庙街和百老汇影院以及著名的油麻地警署~整体来说是非常有性价比的住处!窗户靠着马路但我依然睡的很好~导航搜索柯士甸宾馆就可以很方便地找到这里~
The place is very conveniently located and very easy to get to & from the airport and also LKF. The only issue is the size of the room. It’s very small but I guess that’s normal in HongKong.
Helen Place was good. i will stay here again when i come back to HK
穷游住一晚的话性价比在香港算正常的,没什么问题,位置就在庙街旁,地铁也近,周围比较安静没有杂乱的人,还可以｡但建议的话,两天及以上有点久,还是多加两百找个正常点的,房间还是太小太不透气了,住了两三天后潮湿憋闷的味道受不了,心情会很压抑,最后一晚换了一家四百多的,虽然还是没有窗但空间条件都好了不少心情也通透了,可以正常居住了

The room is small... maybe 9X5ft room and bathroom. Just a room and bathroom. Shower is not in a separate section of the bathroom. No windows in room or bathroom. Check in and out was easy. Location great. Expect what the images show and know it’s hard to capture in photo the small size.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Hello, my future guest! Let me first introduce myself, i am Aracele and love welcoming people and exchange with them our cultures, lifestyle etc.. I am organized, friendly and without vices. Regarding my job, i am owner of the tax consulting company (small) and sometimes i need to work in home office. My apartment is locate in a great place: two blocks from the beach and in front of the Station Subway General Osorio. Nearby my apartament there are a lot of restaurants and fun bars where you can have a great times. The guest´s bedroom is cute, cozy, clean and comfortable. Important mention that in my apartament there is one exclusive toilet to the guest and doorman 24 hours. I hope you have amazing times in my home and in my City! Hugs, Cele.

Olá, meu futuro hóspede. Deixe-me primeiro apresentar-me, meu nome é Aracele e adoro receber hóspedes e aproveito esta oportunidade para trocar diversas experiencias, seja a nível cultural e estilos de vida! Sou hospitaleira, organizada, simpática e sem vícios. Sou sócia de uma empresa de consultoria fiscal e, por vezes, trabalho em home office, dessa forma, a interação com o hóspede fica até mais fácil. 
O apartamento fica em uma excelente localização. A duas quadras da praia,  em frente ao metrô da Estação General Osório. Em frente ao prédio estão localizados diversos restaurantes e bares. Você poderá encontrar tudo nas imediações (farmácia etc). O quarto é bem aconchegante. O ambiente é bem cheiroso, limpo e confortável. Importante mencionar que o apartamento dispõe de um toilete exclusivo para os hóspedes e possui porteiro 24 horas.
Seja bem vindo ao meu lar e aproveite ao máximo esta linda cidade! 
Abraços, Cele.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Aracele was a great hostess. She is very sympathetic and although she was only late at night at the apartment she was always reachable by phone and stayed in contact. We were received by her maid, who was also kind and attentive. Aracele was very flexible with our checkin and checkout times. The apartment is very clean and well equipped, right at the heart of Ipanema and just 2 blocks from the beach. We recommend this place to everyone!!

We loved staying at Aracele's!! She is a great host, very friendly and always willing to help! The apartment is very cosy and the location is terrific! Thanks for everything Aracele! I hope you come to visit me to Uruguay! See you soon!

Aracele's place was lovely to stay. It was very clean, the bed was wonderfully comfortable , just what we nedeed after a long day on our feet, it was quiet and the interior was the same from the photos. Aracele was thoughtful and incredibly helpful in giving directions and suggestions during our stay. The neighbourhood was filled with lovely restaurants and some nice shops, and was easily accessible by metro. The apartament was situated very close to the beautiful Ipanema Beach.  Aracele is a very nice person and she become our friend . Thank you Aracele  for welcoming us into your home!

La casa de Aracele es muy linda, cómoda y segura! Su ubicación es espectacular...enfrente del metro y cerca de la playa de Ipanema. Ella siempre estuvo atenta a todo lo que necesitamos y nos ha ayudado mucho! Estuvimos 3 semanas y realmente nos sentimos como en casa!! Sin dudas es una excelente opción para disfrutar de Rio de Janeiro! Gracias por tu hospitalidad Aracele y por habernos abierto la puerta de tu casa! Nos vemos muy pronto!
Foi uma experiência muito boa e me senti como em casa de amigos!
The best host ever I have seen!! She es super kind, happy and charm! The room is great and the location is perfect.

Excelente ubicación. Excelente Anfitriona! El metro está en la esquina de la calle. Enfrente de un parque y a dos cuadras de la playa Ipanema. Yo seguro regreso con Aracele!! Sin duda! Recomendación al 100%!!! En verdad que te sentirás como en casa. Gracias por tu hospitalidad Aracele!!

Aracele is such a great host, she welcomes you in the house and makes you feel you are just at home. She made sure everything is prepared well for an unforgettable stay. the house is perfectly located in Ipanema, a walking distance to the beach, restaurants, supermarket and metro station. 
I recommend the apartment especially for people visiting Rio for the first time, the location is great and Aracele keeps in touch always to make sure everything is ok, she also recommends places to eat at around the area in Ipanema.

Lugar bem localizado perto de lojas, restaurantes, mercado e transporte público. Além de ser perto da praia. Aracele é super simpática e tem um alto astral maravilhoso. Adorei a estadia, a casa é confortável e bem equipada. Recomendo!

Aracele has given us from the beginning the feeling that we are home. We were received for our honeymoon with a small bottle of sparkling wine. Many thanks for the great apartment. I would recommend them to anyone.

Aracele es una gran anfitriona, nos ayudó con información hacía los principales destinos turísticos en Río. El departamento es amplio, limpio y ordenado. La pieza es cómoda y si bien el baño es compartido, nunca tuve algún problema. La ubicación es lo mejor, muy cerca del metro que permite moverte rápidamente en Río, cercano a la playa y a algunas tiendas si deseas hacer shopping. En las noches acostumbro a tomar infusiones y pude usar la cocina sin problemas. Muchos cariños
Ótima localização, o quarto é muito bom!
A localização é maravilhosa, achei o bairro muito seguro e com diversos restaurantes, sem contar que é próximo de tudo! Adorei!

If you want to be close to beach of Ipanema, you have the right place!! It is only 2 blocks away, very secure area, close to Metro, restaurants.  Araceli apt.  Very nice and you have a guard 24 hours.  I travel alone, so I felt very relax in Ipanema.  I was able to eat some meals if I was tired to go out.  Supermarket are all over with 1 block!!
Great bakeries if you like sweets and espresso cafes !!

Aracela, thank you for helping me with taxi and uber requests!!

Rosario
SF

A casa tem uma localização fantástica, o metrô fica na porta, vários restaurantes e bares bem próximo além de um mercado na esquina. A praia fica a menos de 5 minutos caminhando. O apt é bem aconchegante o quarto muito confortável. Adoramos!
Absolutely recommend this spot. Perfect location!

Passei 4 dias com meu namorado no apartamento da Aracele e foi incrível. Uma pessoa boníssima e prestativa. Quanto ao apartamento, o quarto tem um espaço ótimo, banheiro sempre limpo, cozinha sempre organizada e a localizado não poderia ser melhor. No geral foi tudo ótimo e com certeza eu voltaria a me hospedar lá e recomendo a amigos.
great location, great apartment. cele is an awesome host. everything is very clean. well worth the stay.

Apartamento e quarto super confortáveis e limpos. Ótima localização com muitas opções para comer, próximo da praia e do metro. 
Fui super bem recebida e com certeza voltarei.

First big thanks to Aracele for beeing me and my girlfriends host, we had a great time in Rio. 
About the flat: the location was amazing, just five minute walk to the Ipanema beach. Its also located in a save area and a lot of good restaurants and bars are just nearby.
The flat was clean and we did even have our own bathroom!
I am using airbnb a lot and this was one of my best experience I ever had! 
Greetings from Switzerland

Aracele é uma ótima anfitriã, com um apartamento super bem localizado. Me senti em (Website hidden by Airbnb) tudo perto, foi muito fácil curtir a viagem mesmo sozinha com um bebe de um ano. Aconselho para todos ou qualquer um que esteja procurando por conforto, carisma e uma ótima experiência no Rio!
Alojamento tranquilo. Buenos accesos.

Excelente anfitriã e quarto. Tudo funciona perfeitamente, o quarto é bem fresquinho e ótimo para dormir. Aracele permitiu que eu guardasse as malas antes do checkin para minha comodidade e me deixou bem a vontade, me senti em casa, apesar de ter ficado os dias inteiros praticamente na rua. Não tive tanto contato com a anfitriã pois fiquei passeando, mas ela sempre estava disponível a me responder eventuais mensagens, e qualquer dúvida o porteiro do prédio também estava disponível 24h. O local é seguro e próximo a tudo. Tem frigobar no quarto, ótimo para quem precisa resfriar remédios ou ter seus lanchinhos fora de hora. O Wi-Fi pega super bem e o espaço é ótimo. Recomendo muito!!
Excelent location, next to the subway and ipanema beach. Shared bathroom and kitchen
Fui muito bem recebido e me senti a vontade na casa da Aracele. A localização do apartamento é perfeita, tem de tudo por perto. Recomendo!!!
A great stay in a very safe and central location with a very nice and helpful host

This rental is a real gem and I felt right at home. The room is cozy and lovely and you have a fridge and a TV and the bed is super comfortable too! Aracele is an amazing host and you will feel like you're staying with a friend rather than a host. You'll be in the prime location of Ipamena with everything being close by. Can't wait to return one day!

A estadia no apartamento da Aracele foi ótima. Ela nos deixou muito a vontade para fazer nossa programação, independente do horário que saímos ou voltavamos. Tudo muito limpinho e delicado. Super aconchegante. A localização é ideal para qualquer estilo de viagem.

O quarto é ótimo, a localização perfeita, pertinho do metrô e linhas de ônibus, na minha hospedagem faltou atenção com a limpeza do banheiro na minha chegada, que foi resolvido no dia seguinte. A recepção não foi muito boa, não respondeu a mensagem de (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) quando estava chegando ( solicitando ponto de referencia ) e mesmo estando em casa, em nenhum momento se ofereceu para dar dicas ou informações sobre a cidade, como fiquei 6 dias, achei que fosse disponibilizada uma outra toalha. Também, ao chegar encontrei vaso de agua para beber e copos sujos no quarto, que foi resolvido no dia seguinte, pecou nesse sentido na minha hospedagem. Como acredito que foi um deslize, recomendo, pois a localização é excelente.

I spent a total of 2 weeks here and it was great. Aracelle welcomed me into her home with open arms offering me tips and made constant sure that i had everything i needed, she is amazing 

The location is AWESOME. Your right across the street from the metro which gives you acces to almost everything.  There is a grocery store within 2 blocks every direction, and tons of great restaurants and bars  to check out plus your 2 blocks from the beach. 

I would highly recommend this place. (solo male traveler age 26 from Canada)

Location was perfect. So close to the metro (literally steps away) and the beach! I was travelling alone and i totally felt safe in the area even at night. Cele was also very accommodating and made sure i got settled in even if i was arriving at 5am. She also speaks good english so communicating was never an issue. Obrigado again Cele for sharing your home.

Olá!
A minha estadia no apartamento da Aracele foi ótima. Quarto confortável e ficamos muito à vontade. Localização perfeita!
Agradecemos o carinho recebido e a confiança!

A estadia no apartamento foi ótima! Organização e limpeza nas acomodações, mas principalmente a localização do apartamento é o grande diferencial. Recomendo muito. Foi ótimo. E a Aracele é bastante prestativa.
Un lugar espacioso y organizado.  Sólo a una cuadra de la playa y estación de metro. Muy buena experiencia
Location is very good, just a few blocks away from the beach

Airbnb is not just about the home, it's about the experiences and moments u collect on your holiday. 

Let me first start about the home!
The home is situated in the best location in Rio, as an Indian solo traveler my most important demand was security and a clean place. Aracele's home is situated in the best place in Rio, Ipenema. Great security and walking distance to ipenema and copacabana beach! There is a park right opposite the building, this park transforms into something magical everyday! A flea market on a Sunday with amazing stuff to shop, fresh produce fruits;vegetables;Pork;meat and local foods on a Tuesday and on every other day it's a beautiful park to meet amazing Brazilian people and their dogs! 
There are great restaurants around the park and bars u can just have a drink! The central shopping for havainas (a must buy ) and so much more is all just a hop, skip and jump! 
The home is clean, warm and perfect! 

Aracele as a host is the best ive ever been with! There is a reason why she is a super host! I travelled with no plan, no list of places to visit! On my first day she helped me with a list of places to visit and foods to eat. She welcomed me and gave me the confidence to go out there and have the best holiday I could have in a strange but beautiful country where no one speaks English!  

Aracele was not a host for me but became family, it felt like home and this holiday was my best ever and will always be remembered for a lifetime. Its people like Aracele that make this big world  a loving place to live in! 

Watever the price! The experience with this super host is definitely worth it  and u haven't experienced Brazil if u haven't met this beautiful Brazilian host❤️

She is a really nice girl. Smiley, communicative, and helpful. If I had a problem or a question, she knew the answer. The flat is clean, and the occupation is the best (from the airport, with subway, or in the relations of the praias as well). She is great, it was one of my best appartment is Brasil. :)

O lugar é muito bem localizado. Em frente a estação de (Website hidden by Airbnb) bons restaurantes próximo. Fácil acesso a praia. O quarto é pequeno, mas bem arejado. Poucas opções para pendurar roupa ou toalha. Mini bar dentro do quarto o que facilita muito. Converse com a anfitriã previamente como vc vai pegar as chaves e o funcionamento em geral.

The room is fantastic and exactly what's needed for a solo traveler
The place is 2 mts away from the beach - and quite close to most places I'd wanted to visit
Cele was more than accommodating with everything - allowing a super early check in and very late check out - couldn't have asked for a better place for my first time in Rio. 100% will stay here when back in Rio and cannot recommend the place or Cele enough to others

Aracele was a delightful host. She made sure I felt welcome from the minute I arrived. The apartment is located in a great building in the heart of ipanema. Everything you need is within a 2 block radius. Will definitely stay here again on my next visit to Rio.
Very great host. Good advices for anything you need. Super great location of the apartment. Highly recommended!
Apartamento limpo, tranquilo, e bem localizado.
Gréât apartment in a safe  área, close tô The beach, restaurants, shopping. Aracele is an amazing host! I just want to come back!

Aracele's apartment was amazing. Perfect location, friendly doormen, very comfortable, clean, and quiet. I didn't get to spend much time with Aracele, but she was very fast at replying to messages and extremely friendly. It was a wonderful experience and I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a great place to stay in Ipanema.

FIVE STAR LOCATION FOR A VERY REASONABLE PRICE

LOCATION: 
It is situated in the heart of Ipanema. Everything is walking distance from the building such as, subway system, ground transportations, restaurants, groceries, banks, cafes, bars, hair salon, shopping stores, laundry, etc. It is right in front of the famous General Osorio Square, where, the Sunday Hippie Fair takes place. I couldn't ask for anything more.

ROOM:
The room is spacious, clean and comfortable. It has a mini refrigerator and a queen-sized bed. It provides a personal space from Ipanema's beach neighborhood. There's an exclusive toilet for the guest. Shower room is shared with host. Wifi is dependable. In general, it is a beautiful and airy home. You get more than your money's worth. 

HOST:
I did not have much interactions with Cele because she's working everyday. But she was very responsive on my text messages and cheerful when she's at home.

Cele's apartment really does have one of the best locations in Rio! Located right on General Osario Square, the apartment is a minute walk from the metro and a couple of minutes walk from Ipanema beach with lots of shops and restaurants nearby. The apartment was really spacious and the room was also a good size and clean and comfortable. Cele was a great host and we became friends after I stayed there for 1 week. I would highly recommend to anyone travelling to Rio and I know I'll be back soon to stay there again!
Appartement très bien situé, proche de beaucoup de petits commerces de proximité, de la place, et d'un marché pour y trouver des petits souvenirs

1) About the location
You will be living at the best location of Rio, safe and chic area. I have the say because I have stayed in Rio for 3 weeks and was living in another Airbnb house after staying at Cele’s. Cele’s house is the best choice in terms of quality/price, location, convenience ( metro, supermarket, restaurants, cafes and gym, yes Gym, are literally downstairs) and her hospitality. You will be amazed what a good deal you are getting.

2) About the host Cele
Words cannot even describe 1% of who Cele is and how Cele makes me feel and what this experience in Rio with Cele has inspired me. Cele is someone who is special, warm-hearted, super beautiful physically and soulfully. Our connection is so special that I feel like she is my long-lost sister from the other side of the world. ( I was born and raised in China. I could never imagine that there is someone who thinks, fights for life at the other side of the world the same way as I do). Airbnb is so magical that it connects people who seem have nothing in common but eventually turns out to be your best friend who makes you feel so familiar and close! 

I will come back for this beautiful city and more importantly for this beautiful and magical rencontre of Cele. I believe in destiny and destiny directed me to Cele. Now, it is your turn to be led to Cele and start a new magical experience with her in Rio!

Aracele's apartment is in a perfect location! Walking distance to everything including beautiful Ipanema beach. Aracele was very accommodating and let us stay a day earlier when our travel plans changed. Aracele was also very helpful when we needed to print out documents. And although we were all busy out and about being new year, we knew we could reach Aracele at any time. Thanks Aracele for everything!
Didn’t have much contact with Cele, but she seemed easy going and discreet.  Check in was easy and the place is confortable and well located.
Limpo, confortável e excelente localização. Aracele é atenciosa e nos deixa à vontade. Ótimo custo beneficio.

Excellent location. Room size is more suited for Solo travelers as we found it tight for 2 people with luggage (as we had traveled for 3 weeks before landing at Rio). Many restaurants and stores nearby. Beaches are walking distance. Metro Subway and Bus stn at the doorstep.
very sweet girl! clean apartement! Aracele responds very fast when you have questions. Good security with doorman. Nice area close to the beach !

I highly recommend Aracele’s place. The location is perfect. Two blocks from the beach of Ipanema, walking distance from a lot of trendy hip shops, bars, and restaurants. 
The apartment is super stylish, clean, and spacious. Aracele is very friendly easy to talk to. Hopefully someday I’ll go back to Rio and if I do I’d definitely stay at Aracele’s place again! Thanks again for everything Aracele! All the best vibes from NYC....Shirley:)

Amazing hospitality, the location is the best that you never could get in Rio. Cele is a wonderful host, always accessible to talk with you, explain and advice about Rio, she knows the better places to go, prices, food to taste and experiment. The cleaning, space and organization of the apartment is perfect. The experience with Cele as a Host is amazing: 110% guaranteed. After this  opportunity you don´t want to leave Rio. Thank you so muuch Cele!!!!
Excelente localização!!! Voltarei com certeza!
Muy lindo depto tal cual las fotos, muy buena ubicación. De fácil llegada y linda zona.

Araceles apartment is a cute little place very central in the Ipanema quarter, close to he beach, restaurants, shops and bus/metro! I stayed with her for four nights and would definately stay again! The room is airy and clean, very comfy bed!

Aracele is a lovely person to stay with. The location is amazing. Super close to the beach and the metro, nightlife. The room is spacious and comfortable. I would definitely recommend staying with her.

Aracele welcomed me with open arms and heart. I feel like I have been hosted by an old friend, rather then an unknown host. The house is clean, welcoming and perfectly located, in the heart of enchanting Ipanema. I would definitely recommand her home for anyone who wishes to experience the best trip of their live!

Aracele me acolhou com braços e coração abertos. É como se era uma amiga antiga que me receveu, nem uma enfitriã que eu não conhecia. A casa dela é limpa, acolhador e perfeitamente localizada, no centro de Ipanema. Sem o menor dúvida, eu recomando a casa dela para quem deseje fazer a melhor viagem da sua vida!

Lugar perfeito, no coração de um bairro bem movimentado, bom quarto. Meu namorada quebrou o pé durante nossa estância e Aracele foi muito solidaria, passou tempo com ela e até a deixou ficar mais dois dias de graça !

Although we didn't see Cele that much, it was easy to communicate with her online. The location is really great, right next to the subway, many shops and restaurants nearby and just a few minutes to Ipanema beach. The apartment is cosy, bed is comfortable and everything is there what you need. We would definitely come back again.

A Aracele é uma anfitriã simpática, sempre gentil e atenciosa para as necessidades dos hóspedes. 
O espaço que ela  oferece é realmente super bem localizado, muito limpo, simples e confortável. A praia fica há  dois quarteirões e em frente ao apartamento é possível ter acesso a qualquer parte da cidade através de ônibus e/ou metrô. A vizinhança também é cercada de restaurantes, lanchonetes, padaria, farmácia, supermercados, etc... o que facilita  bastante  o dia a dia de quem estiver na área. Sendo assim, o lugar não muito silencioso mas ligando o ar condicionado o problema do som vindo da rua fica resolvido.  O espaço da Aracele tem um bom custo benefício, vale a pena! Com certeza voltarei em outra oportunidade!

The apartment is well-located and the neighborhood is amazing. The room is very good. You have everything that you need.  Aracele was very nice and she was very helpful. She was a woderful host. In Aracele's house I felt like at home. Thank you very much.

The room was clean and comfortable with access to shared spaces in the apartment. Aracele was friendly and kind which made for a great experience. The apartment is very close to the metro, beaches, shopping, and a grocery store. It’s a great spot!

Aracele's place is wonderful. The location is amazing, close to everything you need. I loved that the place has great amenities. I like the fact that there is a blender, toaster, washing machine etc.. it makes the stay as if you are at home and it's really pleasant to cook in the kitchen. That for me was a great plus! Also the room is super comfortable, the bed is comfy, quiet and lovely. I had a great stay. Thank you Aracele!!

L’appartement d’Aracele est idéalement placé. Tout près de la plage et dans une rue commerçante et animé, vous serez au cœur de la ville et avec la possibilité de vous déplacer rapidement (Metro en bas de l’appartement ou Uber). Aracele est une hôte très sympathique et très réactive à vos différents messages. Je recommande cet appartement à la fois pour un premier séjour à Rio et également pour des habitués de la ville qui aime la vie de quartier d’Ipanema.
Vous ne serez pas déçu en logeant chez Aracele qui représente la joie de vivre et l’hospitalité brésilienne

O apartamento é muito bem localizado, bem espaçoso, com uma ótima iluminação. A Aracele deixou tudo preparado para minha estadia, e o apartamento estava muito organizado e limpo. Havia alguns utensílios de cozinha que podiam ser usados. A Aracele responde rápido e é bem atenciosa.

Aracele’s place is perfectly located for a stay in Impanema, Rio de Janeiro. It is close to the beach, supermarkets, public transport and great restaurants. The property has great amenities and it was a home away from home for us. Aracele was quick to communicate, lovely and a very accommodating host. Would happily stay here again.
The location is great close to the beach easy access to places to eat exchange money and stores

This place is in the perfect location- so close to beach, great restaurants, supermarket, and ATM.  The bed was really comfortable. I had everything I could need! Thank you Aracele, I had a wonderful first visit to Rio!
Aracele is a wonderful host. Her apt is cute and cosy , very well located with the metro , local shops and beach nearby. I felt very comfortable at her home and would recommend to anybody

Great host, arrived late but made sure I was welcomed. any problems she answered. clean, quiet, safe and secure. next to many shops, restaurants, few minutes walk to the beach. 1min walk to the metro. 24/7 reception desk. own keys. hot shower. kitchen. only thing is doesn't have a kettle. other than that id give her a 10/10

name: Stunning sunsets at your doorstep
summary: Please read entire listing before proceeding with booking.  Watch the striking Maui sunsets from your private, ocean and garden view lanai (terrace) on the ground floor of this centrally located condo. There is no better place to enjoy your morning coffee, a happy hour cocktail or an evening glass of wine. Come bask in sun, stroll the lush garden areas, and enjoy the resort like amenities and beautiful beach this property has to offer. Paradise is at your doorsteps (literally)!
space: PLEASE NOTE ***   The Kauhale Makai Association is conducting lanai (balcony) repairs and general construction on the complex until Summer of 2019.    The work will be ongoing daily from 8 am to 4 pm, from Monday to Friday, except on the weekends and holidays. Some lanais may be inaccessible due to safety concerns.   Our rates are reflecting a discount compared to the otherwise offered going rates for the duration of the project. During the ongoing work, the parking will be unassigned on property. If you are looking to be out and about to be exploring beautiful Maui, this project will likely not impact your stay. *****OCEAN FRONT PROPERTY *****  This comfortable and airy unit is 648 square feet and comes equipped with a fully stocked kitchen, a master bedroom with a queen bed, a spacious dining/living area, a queen pull out sofa, and a private lanai. Bamboo accents and bold pops of color make this ground floor unit truly unique. Wake up rejuvenated in your quiet bedroom, then step onto

neighborhood_overview: Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. Kauhale Makai's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your finger tips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor - 6 miles - Many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Plantation, and the Whale Sanctuary. The town of Kihei is a quant, laid-back beach town boasting some of Maui’s most pristine stretches of white sand and turquoise waters. South Maui is fun for couples and families
transit: I always recommend renting a car. We have access to better rates with AVIS and BUDGET, please contact me so I can assist you with booking. If renting a car is not an option for you, the Maui Bus actually has a stop right in front of this complex. I would recommend visiting the Maui County website for transit information and bus schedules. Hawaii Tax I.D. #TA-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) #GE-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
access: Located oceanfront in North Kihei, Kauhale Makai (in Hawaiian, “Village by the Sea”) is the ideal location for a family or couples retreat. Two buildings with 168 units stretch towards the ocean on tropical grounds. The complex provides shuffleboard and volleyball courts, a pool, a children’s wading pool, hot tub, a putting green, gas barbecues and even a sauna. Each well-appointed unit includes its very own private lanai (balcony). The complex also has coin-operated laundry facilities on property for your convenience. Kauhale Makai’s location on South Kihei Road makes it the perfect base for exploring this magical island. Just minutes away are some of the world’s most beautiful beaches, superb shopping, renowned restaurants, and world-class golf.
interaction: I am always available to be reached via email or phone. We have a Housekeeper on call; additional cleaning could be arranged at a $50 fee, generally our long stay guests take advantage of this service. Our Maintenance crew is on call and can assist at any time. Check-in and Check-out are very simple. We send you a pre-arrival email that has all necessary information on how to get to the condo, what the electronic door lock code is, pool and laundry access code, etc. We recommend you print the email prior to the trip or saving it on your smart phone to easily access it when you arrive at the complex. A private Concierge is always standing by to help with any activity bookings, island recommendations and restaurant reservations.
house_rules: TERMS AND CONDITIONS   RESPONSIBILITY FOR CHILDREN / MINORS Adults traveling with children and minors are solely responsible for them and their actions. There is no lifeguard on duty at the pool or hot tub. MAXIMUM OCCUPANCY Exceeding the Maximum Occupancy for the condo at any time, with either overnight guests or day guests, is not permitted.   If you exceed the maximum capacity you will be required to find alternate accommodations for the extra guests. CHECK-IN / CHECK-OUT The rental period begins at 3:00 PM on the day of arrival and terminates at 11:00 AM on the day of departure. The property is professionally cleaned and inspected before and after each rental to ensure that all guests have a comfortable stay. Please note that additional expenses may be incurred for failure to follow checkout procedure, or if excessive cleaning is required to return the unit to rent-able condition. Do NOT anticipate an early check-in or late checkout. We will accommodate these requests when possible

host.host_about:
I am hospitality professional, who genuinely cares about creating great vacation experiences for our guests. Prior to assisting with vacation rentals, I worked for high end, well known hotel chains and private hotels for over 17 years. Hospitality is my passion, to ensure that our guests have a great booking and stay experience is always my priority.  
We offer discounted rental car reservations, travel insurance and concierge services to help you make the most of your Maui vacation. Our team of guest experience specialists consists of Paige, Carine, Taylor, Jennifer and Tim, they help me connect, respond and assist our guests 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. I am so proud that we are able to offer warm, friendly, professional and resort quality services in an un-hotel setting for our guests. 
I love to engage in all different forms of art in my spare time, I draw, dance and aspire to play the drums. I love Maui, it would be hard to imagine living at another place, other than paradise.
Mahalo for reading. I hope we get the opportunity to assist you with your next Maui vacation!

reviews.comments: Victoria was great. The unit was excellent and as in the description.

It was a nice location with good amenities. Besides the parking spot nothing was great. The hot tub never worked and the light in the laundry was out. 

It was easy to get in and out of. You can walk to a small private beach which is perfect for watching the sunset. But it's not a good swimming spot.

We had a great time in Kihei! The condo looked just like the photos and was so close to the beach. Viktoria was wonderful, thorough, and accommodating. I loved the personal touches to the house, such a aloe vera gel that was left under the sink...very helpful since I, of course, sunburned my shoulders!

We loved this place.  It's in Kihei, which we found to be a great place to stay during our first trip to Maui.  The room looks just like the pictures.  The location was easy to find, about 25 mins from the airport.  The condo complex has a pool, parking, and a lot of outdoor space for kids to run around on (as well as a beach within 5 walking mins from the room).  The room itself had all the amenities you'd need to feel at home (cooking equipment, towels, beach equipment).

We had no issues with this place and would definitely come back.  Viktoria was very helpful and her company did a great job in providing information on what to do while we were there (as well as a concierge service).  We actually moved units within the same complex during our trip, which Viktoria helped coordinate. 

This room is on the ground floor, which is both good if you want easy access and want to just let your kids go in and out of the patio door.  The view was of the courtyard, so not much to see.  The other unit we stayed at was on the 4th floor which had a partial ocean view, but at the same time, we had to go up and down on the elevator any time we had to leave, so really up to you what you want.

We all loved our time at the condo we selected by Sunny Maui Condos. It was spacious, clean and stocked full of extras to make the trip more enjoyable. The kids loved the boogie boards and snorkels and loved having all the kitchen utensils you could think of not to mention spices. The view was Amazing and the kids favorite meal was BBQ chicken cooked on one of the many grills by the pool. I loved all the emails and tips with things to do on the island. We will for sure  be going back!

The host was very welcoming. She sent us detailed recommendations for activities and restaurants. The condo was clean and quiet. We enjoyed our lanai, shared grill area, and beach access. The beach in front of the condos is a little rocky and narrow. Not the greatest beach for swimming, but it was still nice to have easy access.

We had an incredible time in Maui. Kihei was the perfect centrally located place with the condo being right on the ocean. The condo was clean and had a great reserved parking space for us. The beach towels, chairs, snorkel gear and boogie bar were also great. Also, we used the concierge service almost every day and it was extremely helpful in setting up trips/adventures and asking questions. Viktoria and her staff personally took care of us and I had my best AirBNB experience to date. I would recommend this stay for anyone traveling to Maui.

Our stay in Kihei condo was great!
I would stay there again for sure.
Great location:: much better centrally located on the Island of Maui then Western Maui Locations like Lahaina.
Close to volcano Haleakala which we visited 3 times (one visit was on a bike up to the top which was a great event!
The condo unit is on the first floor garden facing and very short walk to the beach
with Beatiful Sunsets.
The unit was well equipped! All necessities were there!
The beach was perfect too! Great for swimming and walking.
We weather was great too!
We spent 5 days there and were sad to leave!
Highly recommend it!
Matt & Joann
Great location, very convenient to town and not in a crowded location. Unit is very clean. Fully furnished and Wi-Fi works great. Very easy check in. Plenty of cookware, plate ware and glasses.
Had a very nice stay at this condo, would stay again.
The area was exactly what we needed for our stay in Maui. The condo was well kept and clean.

We really enjoyed our stay here! The location was awesome: so close to great places to eat and many amazing beaches! The communal grills were also a plus and we made dinner out by the pool. The pictures are very accurate and the kitchen was well stocked with essentials and dishes. Also, we loved that there were beach chairs and towels provided! The people who checked us in at the front desk were very helpful. Thanks for a wonderful stay!
Great concierge, customer service, location, and updates on local news and activities. I would recommend staying at any of Sunny Maui locations!

We stayed in this apartment for 5 nights and we really had a wonderful time. The location is great, close to the airport, and very convenient if you want to visit the west part of the island, Hana and the south. It's close to everything, and there are bars and caffes in Kihei, very close. 
The apartment was very clean. Exactly as it is shown in the pictures. They provided us with beach towels and beach chairs and umbrella. The apartment has all kitchen utensils. Having the hot tub was a plus! And the sunsets are beautiful from the beach in front of the building. Viktoria was really nice, communication with her was very easy and fast. She even called us to see if we had everything we needed. Thanks Viktoria, we really enjoyed our stay!

Great communication and efficiency. Everything went very smoothly and we were very happy with the accommodations. This is a fine place for 2 people to stay, and I would do so again. The AC kept us cool and there are many places nearby to get what you need.

Great a very nice time. Viktoria and her team clearly know what they are doing and go above and beyond to make sure I was taking care of.  Unit was spotless and there was plenty of information about the unit, the complex and the surrounding areas. I'd highly recommend staying at any of her rentals.
Vous pouvez vous fier sur les photos démontrant le logement.  Le condos est bien situé, soit près de la mer et des commodités.
The listing had accurate information, the welcome book included all the required information. The location was perfect.
The listing was very accurate & I was extremely happy on how fast our host replied back to our messages.

Best location for the price. Nice green open space/lawn to play or set up a picnic to watch sunset.  Right by the water. Condo was on the first floor which was super convenient - our car was parked right around the corner from the condo.  Loved having the small ice chest, beach towels and plastic tupperware to pack snacks and drinks when we went out for long days exploring the island.  Ice maker was a huge plus, along with toaster, coffee maker, and all the cooking utensils.  It was super easy to get around and close enough to Paia, Walea, etc. Having air conditioning was a major plus for having a full night of sleep and rest.  My son slept on the sofa bed and he described it as cozy and comfortable.  Great having a movie night when we were tired from a long day of exploring right in the living room. Viktoria was very helpful in preparing me for our stay and answered all of my questions.  Really enjoyed receiving emails about places to visit and things to do - we got the "local experience" versus the tourist traps.  I hope to come back again to the same spot next year!
Great host and place! Had great time staying here and Defiantly will recommend to friends!

Review for unit #126

Ocean front property but no real view from this ground-floor unit. Lovely pool, hot tub and bbq area. No privacy as it is along the path to the pool. Anyone walking by can see directly into the unit. Unit generously provided beach amenities to borrow such as cooler, beach chairs, umbrella, beach towels, floaties.

Unit was clean and sufficient but is in desperate need of updating. Outdated kitchen and bathroom - furniture well out of style. Badly needed black out curtains as the landscape lights beam into every window. Expect the stereotypical worn-out Hawaiian room/condo. 

The price was right, however, and available when we needed it! Viktoria made our transition from unit to unit very easy.

This particular unit wouldn't be my first choice to stay in again, but the property is fabulous.

My mom and I had a really nice experience staying here. We were right on the ocean and the grounds of the condo were beautiful (amazing sunsets!). The company Viktoria works for was very responsive and helpful and the condo had plenty of the basic amenities (towels, beach towels and chairs, umbrella, etc.). Since we were on the ground floor and right near an entrance, there wasn't as much privacy as we would have liked but that didn't hinder our enjoyment. Really great location on the island, centrally-located for access to everything by car.
Well equipped! Well equipped!! Well equipped!!! That's the best point for this  B&B. With a car, every famous place in MAUI is not far from here, and staff were very kind and helpful. So lovely.
Beautiful location walking distance to beautiful sunsets daily. Viktoria and the rest of the team really made our stay in Maui an enjoyable worry free one. Highly recommend it!

This review is for unit 126. It was nice to have the beach be such a short walk from the unit. Our stay there was quite nice and relaxing.
Aspects of the interior could be updated to be a bit more modern.
Me and my wife had a great time here and everything was beautiful. Viktoria made sure that everytthing is ready for us when we arrive. Would truly come back and stay here again.

The unit was a perfect location. A quick 15-20 min walk from a bunch of food places and groceries. 

5 min walk from the beach and the pool and hot tub was a great bonus. 

A couple staying in Maui would find great value at this location.
The place was great. Good location. Right on the beach. It was really nice to have chairs/towels to use for the beach.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Kihei.  This condo unit was very comfortable and spacious.  Communication with Viktoria was really easy and she was very helpful and accommodating.  I would highly recommend this location.

Even though host was not available in person, felt like someone was there all through the way providing best and on time communication with regards to all the process. Also gave tips and suggestions on places to visit. The Condo was located in the best place and great value for the price, my wife enjoyed it very much. The beach sunset is as described and the place was clean and best parking spot next to condo.  We would love to comeback and stay in the same place next time.

The place is an awesome value. It is located just north of Kihei which is a bustling little community where you can find anything you would like to do in Maui. It is also just far enough north of town to have some quiet at night. Great place
Good value.

Host very welcoming and accommodating of requests but the room is in dire need of cleaning, fixing all sliding doors so they work, fixing the toilet, clean chairs or buy new ones, cleaning of walls & re painting to eliminate odors, replace drapes that smelled awful, consider adding option of blackout drapes for those who prefer to sleep in while on vacation. Appreciated that when the shower didn't drain on our first day there the host brought drano to fix it and replaced our towels that all smelled dirty. Appreciated the nice gift basket! There was no sunset viewable from the actual room also.
Great location and some beautiful sunsets at night! :)
Comfortable,clean, quite condo. Close to everything.

Loved staying at Viktoria's place. It was clean and ready for us when we got there. It's right down the street from a bunch of stores to stock up on groceries and other necessities. Viktoria was very good at communication and contacted us multiple times to keep us in the loop. Also, all the extras (beach towels, toys, cooler, etc) were so helpful to be able to use! Overall an amazing stay and would definitely recommend!

We stayed at Kauhale Makai 126 for a week in February. The condo fit our family of 3 perfectly. It's a ground floor unit near the pool and bbq areas so you do get a little foot traffic passing your lanai, but everyone was very friendly and didn't have any issues with this. Viktoria was very helpful and communicated with us every step of the way. I would not hesitate staying here or using Viktoria  again. 

Mahalo!
Right off Beach and a clean quite setting.  Unit has everything you'll need.
The place was great and Viktoria was wonderful to work with!
Tile floor everywhere.
This is a wonderful and affordable choice for staying in beautiful Kihei. Would highly recommend for families and single people alike.

The condo is in a great location and Kihei is a great place to stay! The complex offered everything you need and the unit was ground floor which was nice if you like quick access to the beach/pool/vehicle!

Great condo with everything you need.  The condo was bigger than I expected and is set in lovely surroundings.  
I enjoyed the nice powerful shower, large kitchen/dining area and the patio to sit out on.  The beach, which was a 2 minute walk from the condo is beautiful and quiet - we were the only ones on it on more than one occasion!  We did share it one day with a few giant turtles which was incredible!
The condo is short drive to supermarkets and a few eating places, we enjoyed Lava Java Coffee Roasters for breakfast and morning coffee which is a 5 min drive away.
Viktoria was a great host and was very quick to reply to any questions I had.  The front desk staff were lovely and helpful also.  I felt taken care of the whole time of my stay and it was nice to know they were only an email/phone call away if I had any problems, which I didn't.
Would love to to return and stay at this wonderful condo on beautiful Maui!
Viktoria was so easy to communicate with, and very friendly and accomodating. Beautiful sunsets right at the doorstep.

They place was simple but beautiful. The pictures are exactly what the condo looks like. Not a far walk to the beach from our doorstep. Live the entire town. I couldn't ask for a better vacation spot. Definitely will rent on our next vacation from Viktoria.
The place was great! Perfect location! The condo had everything we needed to cook and vacation comfortably.
Place was just great, no complaints at all, it was all really nice

We had a great stay at 'Village by the Sea'.  Kihei is a central point for day trips around the island.  It was quite windy while we were there but you don't have to drive far to find a sheltered beach.  We made good use of the beach chairs and took the cooler to watch the sunset one night.  There's plastic containers to pack food etc and cling wrap which is handy.  You cant actually see the sun set from there in June, it goes behind the western part of the island. You might want to take an eye mask if you like to sleep in total darkness because the light is on outside the glass door all night and the curtains are not blockout.  We got a great driving map from the tour desk at reception and the lady there was very helpful.  Being on the ground floor is handy for nicking out to the pool or for a walk and to the car but the balcony isn't that private because people are walking past.  We still ate breakfast out there every morning.  I liked that the unit is cool enough at night not to need the aircon.  The spa at the pool is nice and hot and a good place to meet other travellers at night.
We enjoyed everything about our stay! The pool, the putting green, walks on the beach! The location was perfect!
Super friendly & helpful; Viktoria has a wonderful place on Maui that had everything we needed.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez Victoria. Facilité de communication avec l'hôte et logement correspondant bien à l'annonce.
Merci
Our stay was great at this condo! Viktoria was so fast in returning my messages, and we would love to recommend Viktoria's rentals to our friends. Thanks again!
Great place beautiful area
Viktoria and her staff were all super helpful and very welcoming. The location was convenient to south maui food and beaches and an easy drive to/from all other parts of Maui.
Great host. Would stay again
Wat een fantastisch verblijf. Mooie omgeving. Perfecte condo met alles erop en eraan. Communicatie was top. Iedere keer binnen 10 minuten reactie. Echt een aanrader

The flat was nice, clean, cozy and very practical, it had everything you need, the swimming and jaccuzi that we can access on the property were great,  the view on the sea nearby was awesome... Thanks!
Cool place! Didn't check out the beach much, but lots of good food nearby and good location

We had a great stay at Viktoria's place. The condo was a really good value for the location and type of amenities offered. We used the pool, and parking was easy to come by. Check-in was quick and efficient as well as check-out. The bed inside the bedroom was incredibly comfortable, and the space itself is very quaint and cozy and worked well for our party of 2. Viktoria was always quick to respond to my messages and I appreciate the welcome note and local information she provided.
A very clean condo right by the beach. We really enjoyed the place, especially the sunset (and moonrise!). The beach is right from the condo complex's lawn, making it super convenient.

Viktoria's place was a great experience! The main thing that stood out was working with Viktoria. She is always quick to respond and able to provide great tips and suggestions! The room is as described. Bigger than I was expecting actually. Comfortable bed, fast wifi and at the time of our booking we were able to enjoy the beach chairs, umbrellas and beach towels. There was a cooler and some snorkel gear too. I would recommend staying at Viktoria's place because you know you are going to be taken care of!

This was a great value. The condo was clean and had everything you need for a great stay. The pool area was nice and the sunset from the beach was great.

The umbrella provided was broken and it was replaced almost instantly.

I would highly recommend this condo.

War ein super Aufenthalt. Victoria war super freundlich, hat sich öfters (per Email) erkundigt, ob alles gut ist, ob sie mir helfen kann, hat mir Tips für Lokale, Ausflugsziele.... gegeben.
In der Unterkunft gab es auch eine Schnorchelausrüstung und Kühlbox, Strandsessel,... für den Strand was ich echt klasse fand.
Super Aufenthalt in guter Lage!☺️

Nice, fully equipped condo rental.  On the main floor, but private.  Condo was clean and supplied beach chairs/towel, beach umbrellas and snorkel gear which was a nice bonus!  Communication with the host was wonderful and efficient.

Mysig lägenhet i södra Kihei. Superbra med eget kök med alla titillbehör. Ett tips är att man inprincip måste hyra bil om man åker till Maui för att ta sig runt. Överlag ett bra boende om man gillar att kunna va lite för sig själva

Everything was wonderful. The place was fantastic, the location was perfect for us, the on site amenities were great. Every morning I took the short walk across the well groomed grass and had my coffee on the beach. Amazing. Viktoria and staff were super helpful and gave me a lot of great tips that improved my vacation.  I highly recommend staying here.
Great location and nice pool-area , Victoria answered friendly and prompt all of our questions. We would love to come back!
Viktoria's team does a great job communicating and following up!

We loved this condo! It's spacious and clean, has great amenities like a great pool and hot tub, grills, and even access to a small beach. The front desk is extremely helpful. The laundry was a life saver and very easy to use. Best of all, it's so close to all the shops and restaurants in Kihei, our favorite town in Maui. There was some construction happening but it didn't bother us whatsoever. This is a great spot for a great price.

The area was lovely. The room was clean and the staff were very pleasant and helpful. The room however seemed to have been flooded in the past as water damage was noted to be present in cabinetry. Great space for BBQ, the pool and hot tub were very nice and well maintained. Direct access to the beach was awesome and laundry on site was a bonus.

Sunny Maui Vacations was great for communication and providing awesome trips for things to do and places to see. The team was very quick to response and willing to help. We did not have any issues that we had to contact them for but it was clear that they are genuine and cared about our stay.
The amenities provided in the unit were good with some beach chairs and umbrellas.
The kitchen within the unit and the barbeque area in the complex were very useful.
The unit could use an update as the cabinets and counters are a bit outdated and it was clear that the tub was well used. Shower head was a bit low so some would need to bend down a bit to rinse out their hair.
The beds were not the most comfortable but still able to get a good enough sleep each night.
비교적 추천할만 합니다 위치 좋고 시설도 보통이상 이며 해변도 멋집니다
Excelente lugar y muy tranquilo :) nos encantó, excelente tanto para la familia como para amigos. Muy cómodo y limpio. Me gustó la idea de no usar llaves y solo el código para ingresar

The condo was nice with a good layout, the building is from the 80's, so some fixtures, like tub/cabinets are dated.  Unit 126 was comfortable for family of three with the pullout couch.  It was centrally located on ground floor near entrance walkway, elevators, BBQ and pool.  Good for easy access which my wife wanted, you do loose some privacy on the lanai in exchange for the central location and easy access since the entrance walkway is right there.
Beautiful. Friendly neighbors. Beautiful view. Close to stores and fun things to do.
Great place to enjoy Kihei and it’s relaxing atmosphere.

The location was fantastic - only a short drive from the airport. The apartment was nice although a bit dated, it's close to the pool & BBQ area which was convenient. The bathroom is tiny. The beach in front looked really nice. Kihei is a nice place and restaurants, shops and supermarket were about a 5 minute drive away. Received really clear check-in instructions and some useful local information.
Everything went smooth with our stay. Prior to arrival we got all the information needed and useful advice on Haleakalā. The location is great and kitchen is indeed fully equipped.

The lanai in this particular unit was awesome. I think we had everyone of our meals outside on the lanai. It is a little close to a public entrance but is shielded really well by lovely plants and vegetation. The space itself is a nice open floor plan and was really just amazing!

The amenities at this location are great! We were communicated with on a continuous basis before during and after our trip. We got recommendations for locations to visit, sites to see and local events too. There is a place in the lobby to book activities and the staff is very helpful and inviting. We paid the same amount we would have to stay in a hotel but receive a full kitchen and got to stay right on the beach. The is a local craft market right up the road for any souvenirs and 2 grocery stores with in a mile of the property. I would come back to this exact location again. If it were for sale, I would buy it!
Great spot in a great central location to anywhere on the island. Highly recommend! Communication was fantastic.
Great place. Recommend staying there.

From initially booking through Viktoria till the very end of our stay, everything was made very clear and simple which is exactly what you want on vacation! Communication was wonderful, information about the island was plentiful and very useful, and the room/complex was more than we expected. The neighbourhood was great with easy access to the beach, and many restaurants/bars as well as stores for any other essentials that you need. We had a wonderful stay and it was made easy by Viktoria and her team. Thank you!!

We had a lovely stay here! The location was central and quiet, which is exactly what we were looking for. The condo was clean and had all the amenities we needed for our stay. Viktoria was also really responsive and sent us a lot of local recommendations. I would definitely stay here again.
I recommand it
We stayed few days and we had really time there. The location  is great and Viktoria's tips also.
Viktoria and her team were super responsive and the place was accurately represented. We enjoyed staying there and hope to use her team again the next time were on island.

The location was excellent. We were able to walk across the grassy field everyday to the beach and watch the beautiful Hawaiian sunset. Great pool and spa which we used almost every day. Plenty of towels for the beach and nice to have an esky to bring our cold drinks in

Viktoria was the kindest host, most helpful and quick to respond. The location of the condo was great - in Kihei and right on the beach. The apartment itself was well stocked, so it worked as a long term rental. The only downside was that the bathroom needed an update and the bedroom had a smell (but I have a sensitive nose). There are nice Lānais to sit on too. It is right by the building’s public path, so there isn’t much privacy, but we didn’t mind too much. If you’re looking for an economical stay, this is ideal. Viktoria is a great host, as well.

The property is a little old, but clean, with excellent facilities, and in perfect location... walk through the gardens straight to the beach! Handy swimming pool and hot tub for days when a Hurricane looms!! Viktoria/Samantha were amazing - speedy initial response and fabulous  communication throughout the stay. Great value for a great location.
Best trip ever!  Perfect location, convenient to everything. Beautiful condo and they thought of everything- towels, beach chairs, boogie boards, etc. kitchen had everything we needed too.
The condo was clean, well-appointed, easy to get to, and in a great location. Would definitely rent again next time I am on Maui.
Viktoria and her team provided excellent communication and awesome local recommendations.
Perfect value stay. Good location for going up and down south Maui and explore rest of island. Would stay again.

This is a very nice space. It was clean, and furnished with everything we wanted. The living room, kitchen, and bedroom were all good sizes for the two of us. The outdoor patio is somewhat concealed by bushes, and makes for a nice mealtime location. I sometimes have difficulty keeping sand out of the house at the beach, but the vacuum provided picks it up like a charm. Food trucks and some open-air markets are a couple minutes away
 The beachfront is only a couple hundred feet away, and while that part of the beach is pretty short, it's still great for walking and putting your feet in. This is a good location for other activities, being equidistant from the great southern beaches like Big Beach, and the northern towns and beaches in Lahaina. 

Snorkeling at Molokini Crater, the Royal Lahaina Luau, and the Road to Hana were our favorite activities along with just relaxing at the beach.

This Airbnb was sparkling clean and had all the amenities we could have asked for. The patio in the morning was beautiful and the rooms were cozy without clutter.

All of the little extras really made this place great; the tips and local suggestions were on point, the pool(s!) were gorgeous, there were both beach and bathroom towels available, and it was a short (15m) walk from the nearest shopping plaza. Additionally, this Airbnb was right on the local bus route, making it incredibly accessible.

The only thing to note is that travellers arriving after sundown should really familiarize themselves with the map provided before arrival. The garden paths to the buildings are moderately lit, but all of the numbers for the rooms face the inside of the complex. 

Overall, this was a fantastic experience that I would not hesitate to repeat. :)

While the location is great, be aware that this is an older building.  The room itself smelled very musty and appeared to have mold on the ceiling.  The building itself has seen better days.  That being said, the sunset from this place is AMAZING!

Our stay was delightful. The apartment was comfortable and situated right on the beach where we could roam up and down the roads to all our favorite beaches and restaurants. We especially enjoyed the garden setting with expansive lawns and a perfect barbecue area where we happily cooked our Mahi Mahi in the evening.
Nice place. We really liked Kihea a lot. The condo was nice.  Having the use of the BBQs was really nice. I would stay here again
good location.
The place is awesome!  Very clean and it's convenient as it's close to restaurants, gas stations and grocery stores.  Plenty of parking space.

Nice quiet location. Loved the emails with local tips of restaurants and things to do on the island. Check in was a breeze since it uses a door code so no keys needed. Bathroom was a bit tiny and could use some remodeling. Only issue was that we saw some cockroaches in the unit. They’re mostly concentrated in the kitchen but also saw one in the bedroom. Not sure if it’s due to the weather, the construction that was happening outside the unit, or the the fact that the unit is on the 1st floor, but we were a bit wary of leaving any bags open after seeing them within the first hour after arriving. Double check with Viktoria if roach traps have been placed throughout the unit before arrival. She replies quickly if you have any issues.

There are no sunset views outside your door unless you take a long walk.
Don’t try to get anything done during the day there. The construction noise will rarely allow you to make a phone call.

This place is way over priced for what it is. Can hear everyone walking by the bedroom door, front door, and back door.  Some maintenance guy will wheel around a loud mop bucket at 5am or 6am every morning.  The construction noise was ridiculously loud and right outside the door making it difficult to relax, to walk to the beach, or use the outside grills. There is no beach or water view.
Great spot, just an easy place to call home for a couple of days.

Staying at Viktoria’s place was our very first experience in Airbnb! We love Maui and have visited many times. Viktoria has been very pleasant and timely in communication before, during and after the stay.

Thank you again and look forward to our trip back to Maui!

Mahalo!

name: pid MODERN 1 BED FLAT NEXT OLD TOWN
summary: Completely remodelled and modern "Acomodis" apartment with a nice and big balcony located in Barcelona’s city centre situated in a classic building in the emblematic quarter of L’Eixample. It is ideal for couples and for small groups up to 4. Amazing location.
space: Welcome to Barcelona and to "Acomodis" Apartments! PRICE FROM 81 EUROS - 166 EUROS If you contact us we'll answer you with more information and the total price. The price is set according to the number of people, number of nights and season. One bedroom "Acomodis" apartment ideally located in the 19th century Barcelona area Eixample Esquerra. The flat is on the first floor and is equipped with the most modern furnishings. If you're travelling in a large group it is possible to reserve more than one of these flats and stay together. Kitchen Description: There is a fully equipped kitchen. This has all the implements you may need for a self catering holiday.  Living Room Description: The living/dining room is bright and luminous. There is a comfortable sofa bed for two people also for relaxing after a day of sightseeing.  Bedroom Description: The bedroom has two individual beds (90x200).  Bathroom Description: The bathroom is equipped with shower, wash basin and toilet. It features a desi

One bedroom "Acomodis" apartment ideally located in the 19th century Barcelona area Eixample Esquerra. The flat is on the first floor and is equipped with the most modern furnishings.
