This has all the implements you may need for a self catering holiday.  Living Room Description: The living/dining room is bright and luminous. Th
neighborhood_overview: This unique area is rich in history, architecture, culture, and cuisine. Just a short distance to the trendy Passeig de Gràcia you will find, La Pedrera, Casa Batlló, and Casa Milà along with several upscale shops and restaurants. On summer (July and August) a few meters away there is the "Eixample beach" where relax and refresh yourself.  Also,  within walking distance there is the Arc del Triomf, Parc de la Ciutadella, Plaça Catalunya, Ramblas... Even the beaches are only 15 minutes by metro. The location is truly ideal to enjoy all of the splendors Barcelona offers. Great shopping, excellent galleries and restaurants all around!
notes: As you will be staying in a fully touristic licensed "Acomodis" apartment There is a tourist tax of .75 cent per adult per night, this needs to be paid on check in please. Children under 17's are free.
transit: The public transportation in the area is excellent with numerous bus stops and 2 metro lines. The metro lines nº3 (green) and nº4 (yellow), Stations “Passeig de Gràcia” and “Girona” are only a 2 minutes walk away. This will bring you to Las Ramblas (old town) in just 5 minutes and likewise you can go directly to Plaza Catalunya (main square in Barcelona) and Las Ramblas (main street downtown in the Gothic Quarter) in similar time. The excellent public transportation options are easily accessible from the apartment, allow you to reach the main points of interest of the city of Barcelona in just minutes. Alternatively to reach these destinations you can grab a taxi which will take 5 minutes. The taxis are in multitude here and very reasonable. At the temple of La Sagrada Família and at Plaza Cataluña you will find the sightseeing bus stop, which will take you to see the major tourist attractions of the city. It is a safe and bustling area with restaurants, café terraces and small shops.
access: You'll have full access to the "Acomodis" apartment. It'll be all yours for your stay.
interaction: We'll be on hand to help in any way we can.
house_rules: - No smoking in the apartment please  - The kitchen is of course available for your use, please be safe.  - Reasonable quiet noise levels especially after 21pm. - Respect of the property and neighbours.  - No loud parties. - With the hot weather we would really appreciate if you could clean down kitchen surfaces at least once a day (only if used) and bring out the garbage at least every second day. This is necessary in the hot weather, thank you! The garbage bins are located very close to your apartment - near the main front door. They are the big grey plastic containers - you can't miss them! Cheers!  - Most importantly relax and enjoy your stay! RESPECT FOR NEIGHBOURS. As the apartment is very quiet, for the centre of Barcelona, or any part of Barcelona, for that matter, I ask visitors to be mindful of noise levels.  ON ARRIVAL:  - You will sign a contract.  - There is 150€ security deposit hold with cash on arrival and refunded at the end of your stay. - Late check in (20h to 24h) h

host.host_about:
We are Happy Aurora and Happy Jacob!
We have 3 happy daughters, a happy Beagle and a happy fish!
We offer a wide variety of apartments ideally located in Barcelona. These apartments are perfect for your vacation! Book our apartments and, if you want, enjoy our superb cooking classes followed by a complete Spanish meal. That's a great experience!
We speak English, French, Spanish and Catalan. 
We are happy because we like what we do!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: My husband and I live here and love our apartment, you will find here all you need and we will be happy to provide you with everything that will create your stay perfect!

reviews.comments: I came with my husband to New York and had a great stay at Keren's apartment. The location is perfect, and the building was great and felt safe. She and her husband were very friendly and offered to help us with any questions we had during our stay. No complaints!

We had a great one-month stay at Keren's place in Midtown. It's convenient, clean and well-stocked with the basics. Keren's husband was available to answer all of our questions. We have no complaints. Smooth and friendly experience.
Stayed with my father for 8 days. Great location. I like the apt and the building. The views from the 20th floor balcony in Midtown Manhattan are great. Would stay in the apt again.
Karen and her husband are awesome! Super helpful, apartement is beautiful, feels like home. Will recommend to friends and hopefully come back myself! Thank you

Karen & Ofer were great - easy to contact and very helpful. The apartment is comfortable, clean & has very good closet space if you want to unpack & hang up your stuff. The location -- close to Central Park and the subway at Columbus Circle was perfect for me. I loved staying here!

Ich war für 8 Wochen in dieser tollen Wohnung mitten in Manhatten. Karen und Ofer, waren super nette, jeder Zeit erreichbare Hosts, die immer ein Ohr und gute Tips hatten.
Die Wohnung ist super schön und auf jeden Fall weiter zu empfehlen.
Columbo Circle, der Central Park, Time Square alles um die Ecke.
Ich würde jederzeit wieder diese Wohnung einem Hotel vorziehen.

My husband, I and kids have been stayed at the Karen's apartment for 2 months. This was our first experince of using airbnb and we were lucky to find Karen and Ofer. I want to stress several points. 

First, Karen and Ofer both are great hosts-were extremelly helpful, delicate, kind, professional, easy-to-communicate with, and it was a real pleasure to deal with them. They react fast to discuss and solve any questions. 

Second, I want to underline that we had no issues with anything inside the apartment or building during our stay- everything worked properly.

Third, as a mom of 2 kids (3,5 years and newborn) I found everything extremelly equiped in the apartment- furniture, technics, kitchen (all possible things you might even think about) which made my day-to-day life in the apartment easy and no stressful.

Fourth, location!!! Location is so great that you can't imaging. You are in the center of life, including central park for kids, skate rings, toys shops, theatres, shopping, restaurants and night life. Also have all subway lines available by walking distance which allows to be anywhere within the shortest time.

I know that will remember the time I spent at this apartment with my family with positive only. And of course will stay again with pleasure.

Karen and Ofer were wonderful hosts! They were very helpful and accessible to communicate with. They really made my stay in New York comfortable. I stayed with them for 3 months, and the apartment has everything you need, is right in the middle of everything, and is a block from the Columbus Circle subway station that will take you anywhere in the city. It's the place to stay in Midtown.

Perfect for us. Exactly as advertised. Contemporary decor, 1 BR with 20th floor balcony overlooking midtown and  the Hudson river was a wonderful home  for 30 days. Building was lovely. Doormen and staff made us feel welcome and safe. Easy walk to Central Park and Times Square.  We highly recommend Karen and Ofer as hosts and will check with them again when we come back to the city.
It was a terrific place to spend a month.  The host couldn't have been better.
It it a very great building and the apartment is very applicable for family traveling in new york.

For the whole stay every day of 31 days we lived in the apartment I felt blessed and thanked God for how lucky we were to get that apartment. There is no other place in New York I would love to live more than at Karen's apartment.
great location and great size!

Excelente todo, muy buena ubicación, cerca y accesible para todo (central park, subway, times square). hemos tenido la mejor estadía posible en nyc, karen y offer fueron excelentes anfitriones, muy atentos a todo y muy comunicativos. El apartamento en muy buenas condiciones y muy bien aquipado (nada les faltara). Mega recomendado si quieren pasar una excelente estadia en ny. La vista del balcon es un mega plus, bellisima!

We loved the apartment more then all for its location. Very nice place to stay with dorman 24/7, at The 20 th floor with a wonderfull view on the city.
Well equipped kitchen.
Room for 2 adults.
WC room comfortable.
Loundry room on the floor near the apartment.
Check in and out well organized.
Perfect stay in an amazing location at manhattan, close to everything! All what we needed for a great vacation. Would definitely come back! Thank you soooooo much!!

name: Fantastic apartment in Copacabana
summary: Espaço funcional e moderno , melhor ponto de Copacabana. PREÇOS PARA REVEILLON E CARNAVAL SÃO DIFERENCIADOS, FAVOR LER ABAIXO: PREÇO DE PACOTE REVEILLON: MÍNIMO DE 7 NOITES - R$645,00/noite  PREÇO DE PACOTE CARNAVAL: MÍNIMO DE 7 NOITES - R$645,00/noite
space: Excelent, modern and functional apartment located in the heart of Copacabana, few steps from the beach, bars, restaurants, gyms, shops and near the metro stations. All the installations are brand new and beautifully decorated . This apartment is equipped with: - Hi speed internet - 2 split air conditioning - 2 LED TV´s with HD 40" and 32" - Luxury toilet equipped with Italian Carrara Marble. - Double bed with high end  linens, sheets and blankets. - Ipod Dock BOSE - Microwaves - Fridge - Remote control ceiling fan - Convertible sofa in the living room for an extra guest. - 24 hours doorman. No other city in the world can boast with charm the title of wonderful as Rio de Janeiro. To the vagaries of nature, sea and mountain put side by side in perfect harmony, join the Christ Redeemer, Sugar Loaf, Maracana and lifestyle of partying and stripped Rio. More than a postcard, Rio is a state of mind, always cheerful and high spirits. Who knows never forget!

reviews.comments:
Appartamento ideale per vacanza a rio!!!
Tutto nuovo...pulito...e funzionale!
Vicinissimo alla spiaggia...e a tutti i servizi!!!
Il proprietario affidabile, puntuale e disponibile!!
Consigliatissimo!!!!!

copacabana beach is 2 mins from the appartement
there is bus direct to evrywhere in rio
the appartement is very new and confortable

The flat is so nice! The design, comfort and location! We had more than we expected. And Ricardo is great!!! He helped us with everything- finding good places to eat, to book further flights and with much more. Thank you Rick for all your help and patience :))) btw the 686 place is the best! And meat there was better than in churrascaria)))))
The apartment is everything you see and much more. Location was perfect. Ricardo is very professional.  You couldn't ask for anything better. Thank you Ricardo

The place is all it says in the description.
It is safe, calm, very well located - simply perfect.
Ricardo was a great host, being available always.
I stayed in the place during my business trip for more than one month and would definitely rent it again, cause it made me feel like being at home.

Me and my girlfriend spent a few nights in Ricardos Appartement. It is modern and nice furnished. The location is great if you want to explore all parts of Rio. 
Apart from the appartement Ricardos is a great, very friendly and extraordinary helpful host. Communication was swift and easy. Thank you Ricardo :)

We stayed in this apartment for 4 days in January and we are absolutely glad we did! The location is super central and extremely colse to the beach. The apartment itself is very new, modern and clean. 24 hour concierge. The hosts are friendly, speaking fluent english and ready to help with any kind of advise. Highly reccomended if you plan a to Rio!

Хочу сказать огромное спасибо Ricardo Ponce за предоставленное уютное гнездышко!!! Отличный дизайн, новая мебель, современная техника. Очень удобное расположение и транспортная доступность. Доброжелательный и веселый Ricardo, очень внимательный и пунктуальный!!!!!
Ricardo Ponce ты лучший!!!!! ВСЕМ РЕКОМЕНДУЮ!!!!

Realmente solo tengo para decir GRACIAS, desde el primer momento me sentí  atendido de mil maravillas, Ricardo Fue mas que amable, puntual e inspira confianza desde el  primer momento.-
Estuvo siempre a disposición nuestra, y el departamento que tiene en alquiler es tal cual las fotos publicadas, esta 200 metros de la playa, y a 50 metros de todas las líneas de bus, tanto para irte como para llegar.-
El equipamiento del departamento es perfecto y nuevo, todo funciona, le falta detallar en el anuncio el sistema de luces que tiene que es impresionante, no encontré punto negativo asi que todo es favorable,
Desde la rapidez de la atención hasta el dia que me fui que solo tuve que cerrar la puerta e irme,.-
Asi  que Lo califico con un 10 a Ricardo Ponce y con un 10 mas 1 al departamento.-
De nuevo Gracias Ricardo pasamos unas maravillosas vacaciones, espero volver y a ese mismo lugar.-

We've just got home after a great stay at this lovely clean and modern apartment, with everything we needed including an iron, hair dryer, wifi, iPod dock etc! Excellent location for a range of places to eat and of course, fantastic beaches just down the road. We found Ricardo to be a perfect gentleman, helping us out with everything we needed. Highly recommended!

Bonjour 
Nous avons passé une super semaine a rio chez Ricardo . Il a su nous donner les bonne adresses de resto les choses a voir etc... L appartement est super si ce n est mieux que sur les photos et super bien placé .
Toute était parfait merci Ricardo

Ricardo was an excellent host making it quite easy to get acclimated in Rio. The apartment was quite comfortable for 3 people and had all of the amenities anyone would need: WiFi, cable, 2 televisions, AC, power adapters, etc. All in all we had a great time and would highly recommend Ricardo.

ricardo was one of the best hosts i've ever had. he was courteous, kind and helped with absolutely anything i needed. the apartment is exactly how it looks in the photos. it is contemporary and very comfortable. it's location is perfect, right next to the main street with all the shops and restaurants, near all the public transportation, and also extremely close to the beach. it really made my trip to rio very enjoyable. i would definitely come back and rent this apartment again. i highly recommend this listing to anyone.

So I just stayed in Ricardos beautiful apartment for one month now and I'm really sad my stay is over! 
The apartment is really nice furnished, modern and located in a great neighborhood in Copa very close to the beach! 
Ricardo himself is an awesome host, always there to help which I really appreciated during my stay!
I highly recommend this place and would always stay in this apartment again.
Excelente departamento, muy bien equipado. Limpio, y en muy buena ubicación. El anfitrión, excelente, siempre preocupado por que todo funcionara. 100% recomendable.

We really enjoyed our weeks stay at Ricados (Website hidden by Airbnb) was clean and well maintained. The apartment was very quiet dispute its great central location.Everything was only a few minutes walk...shops,the beach and access to all the bus routes.
We were made to feel welcome by our host and always got a reply to our e- mails within an hour.
A great week!

This was my first time using airbnb and was a bit reluctant given I was traveling to another country but Ricardo answered all my questions prior and had no problem coordinating once I got to Brazil.  The apt is great as everything is new and works as well as internet as my last trip to Rio I stayed in a Hotel and the internet was useless.  Great place great person I will stay here again next time I am back in Rio.  It is also only a few blocks from the beach and many places to eat and such.  Could not ask for a better place.

This was my first time using Airbnb outside of the US.  I had concerns about my phone working and being able to coordinate with the host given flight delays traveling into Rio.  Ricardo set my mind at ease and was willing to adjust his schedule to ours.  He made sure everything worked out great. He was kind, friendly and helpful.

The listing is exactly as described, in a safe building with 24-hr doorman, wifi (internet) works great, and well located just 2 blocks from copa cabana beach, and 3 blocks from the Metro.  We were not disappointed and would stay here again, and definitely recommend this listing and the host to anyone looking for a comfortable stay in copa cabana.
Description of the apartment was perfect. Cozy apartment, everything you need is there. Ricardo is helpful and provides a good place to stay in copacabana.

Great apartment for our 6 day New Year stay. We loved the close proximity to Copacabana Beach and being able to go back and forth with great ease. Wonderful air-conditioning and very comfortable bed. Many thanks Ricardo for being so friendly and suggeeting various things. We loved the bossa nova evening you suggested and appreciated all your handy hints.  A great apartment for 2 people!

Ricardo was amazing and so helpful with everything! The apartment is well equipped and styled, located in the heart of Copacabana wit everything at your doorstep (2 mins walk to the beach!!) Highly recommend!

Muy bueno. El apartamento es tal como lo muestra Ricardo. Está ubicado en pleno Copacabana a menos de dos cuadras del mar. 
Está totalmente equipado con ropa de cama y vajilla.
El apto es pequeño, ideal para dos personas aunque nosotros éramos 3 y estuvimos súper cómodos. El sofá cama es confortable.
Cuenta con dos aires acondicionados que hacen que el calor no se perciba. 
Y lo más importante, siempre contamos con el soporte de Ricardo para resolver las inquietudes que pudieran surgir.
Muy recomendable!

Ricardo's flat was great, a perfect place to stay in Rio. Everything was provided for and Ricardo was always responsive over text if there was anything we found we needed. The flat itself is also great, very clean and modern and in a perfect location for the beach. Staying there made our trip much better than it would have been otherwise!

I must say...Ricardo provided us with an apartment that met EVERY single one of our needs. From the location, to the size, the comfort level, the apartment facilities and the general feel at home factor. The apartment is a 5 minute walk from Copacabana Beach so extremely ideal. The apartment also has 24hr security and all the various guards are very helpful and welcoming. I would STRONGLY advise anybody who would like to stay in Copacabana to consider this apartment. Thank you so much Ricardo!

The BEST!  Great location.  Plenty of room and convenient to everything.  Great value as well!

Could not have asked for better customer service from Ricardo!  Attentive to detail and immediately responsive at all times.  He understands what great customer service is!  Plus, he speaks perfect English!

An overall GREAT experience.  Would not hesitate to reserve this apartment again or work with Ricardo.  THANK YOU!

Ricardo greeted us at the apartment and showed us the amenities, despite our late arrival. The apartment's features were exactly as listed and our stay was hassle free. I would highly recommend this apartment if you are looking for a comfortable and secure stay in Copacabana.

A good location. A friendly, professional service from Ricardo.
The flat had all that you needed - aircon, cooking utensils.
It was very fresh and clean.
Thankyou Ricardo. 

Best wishes,  Andrew
O apartamento é confortável e muito bem localizado. Nas fotos se tem a impressão de que é maior, mas me acomodou bem com minha esposa e filha.

Nice and secure place with friendly doorguard. The host was very welcoming, gave us good tips around town,and is very good in english, something you don't always stumble across in this country. The apartement was as the pictures describes, very good! Lots of nice details! It is also very nicely located on Copacabana. The streets are very touristic and safe. If I'm returning to Rio, this is where I want to stay!

Ricardo was a fantastic host. His place was super clean and exactly like that described in the picture. Anytime I needed to get in touch with him, he was always quick to respond and very professional. I would highly recommend him to future Airbnb members, and I will be sure to come back!

O apartamento do Ricardo é muito bem localizado, próximo a praia e em um ponto de fácil deslocamento com linhas de ônibus, metrô e taxi. O apartamento é pequeno, mas bem estruturado, acomoda muito bem duas pessoas. O Ricardo foi muito atencioso, simpático e pontual. Pretendemos ficar no apartamento numa próxima viagem.
Todo perfecto .. fabio muy cordial y amable .. el departamento tal cual las fotos ... lindo bien ubicado .. todo perfecto muy recomendable. Gracias x todo!
Apartment looks exactly like the pictures, however the apartment is small. Ricardo was a great host and the community was extremely friendly. Check-in and Check-out was fast and easy.

Ricardo is very nice. Show me around the district and very helpful for my short notice booking. The apartment is great as the picture - clean and tidy with everything you need. Great location, just two blocks from the beach and tons of restaurants, supermarkets, atms, etc around. Highly recommend.

This was my second time staying at Ricardo's place and just like the first time the experience was fantastic. Ricardo is very responsive and the location is in close proximity to Copacabana beach. I plan to stay there again on my next trip to Rio.

We stayed here during our honeymoon in Rio.

Host: Ricardo was a warm and welcoming host. He was flexible regarding check in time and took time to explain the apartment, amenities, local restaurants and things to do in Rio. He was also very responsive when we had issues with the hot water in the shower. We have literally no complaints.

The apartment: Clean, good size, safe building, well located, good wifi. Perfect holiday apartment

Overall: we wouldn't hesitate to stay here again (we'll definitely be back in Rio one day!) and we also wouldnt hesitate to recommend to others
We had an amazing time in Rio! Such a beautiful city!! This apartment was a great location and was as pictured. Ricardo was great to work with.

Ricardo was great. He met my group and I at the apartment with the keys and explained everything about the apartment to us. He gave us suggestions on beaches and where to eat. The apartment looked exactly as pictured in the photos. It's small but that wasn't an issue at all being we were just in and out since we were exploring beautiful Rio everyday. The apartment is super modern and very welcoming. I absolutely loved it and my experience in Rio. It's literally two blocks away from the beach and close to everything! We were able to hail cabs without a problem right outside of the building. There's even a doorman so we never felt unsafe coming into the building at night. We had a late flight out and Ricardo let us have a late check out without a problem. Thank you Ricardo! You were great!
Muito bom apartamento, aconchegante e perto de tudo. Recomendo.

Ricardo is an extremely friendly and helpful host. His flat is in a superb location for exploring Rio, two blocks from Copacabana beach and very close to Sugar loaf mountain. The flat is very clean and furnished really nicely. It is small but because there is a lounge it really helps. He was very kind and let us have a late checkout. I would definitely recommend his flat.

Ricardo was extremely helpful and friendly from the very first email which he replied to promptly. Our check in was late at night and Ricardo met us on time and was incredibly pleasant and helpful. The apartment was extremely clean and all the appliances are new and worked perfectly. The apartment is in a great area near lots of shopping, restaurants and 2 blocks from the beach. The doormen were friendly and helpful as well. We always felt safe and my husband and I traveled with our 4 yr old son. We travel to Rio once a year and we would definitely stay at this apartment again. We can't recommend it enough!

The apartment is very nice and in the perfect location in Copacabana just two blocks away from the beach.  Ricardo was very helpful and friendly both before and during our stay. I would definitely recommend this place.
O Ricardo foi extremamente atencioso. Nos aguardou no apartamento pacientemente, mesmo com o atraso do voo. Explicou tudo o que precisávamos saber sobre o prédio e as redondezas.

Não tenho do que reclamar, o apartamento era exatamente como o anunciado, completo, todo reformado, com móveis novos e ótima localização, apenas a 3 quadras da praia de copacabana.
O Ricardo foi um bom anfitrião, nos explicou como tudo funcionava no primeiro dia e respondeu com prontidão a todas as dúvidas.
Recomendaria para meus amigos.
Everything was perfect! Ricardo is a great host and will help you anyway he can! Apartment was spotless! Thanks Ricardo!!
El departamento es muy lindo y comodo, esta en muy buenas condiciones. Ricardo cumplio con todo lo que nos prometio. Muy conforme

O Ricardo é um excelente anfitrião, super prestativo. 
Seu apartamento é muito confortável e exatamente como mostrado nas fotos. 
Nossa estadia, sem dúvida foi melhor que imaginávamos. E o Carnaval no Rio foi ainda melhor.
El departamento es hermoso! Tiene todo y la ubicación es excelente. Ricardo fue muy amable con nuestras consultas. Si vuelvo a Río, lo volvería a elegir!

We were guests in Ricardo's apartment for 7 nights and we were really happy with our choice. Ricardo was always available by email before our arrival and on the checkin day he welcomed us at the apartment which is even better than how it looks in the pictures. It is modern and functional, fully equipped and very comfortable for two people. Location is perfect, 5 minutes walking from Copacabana beach and 7 minutes from the subway. We didn't use the kitchen since we prefered to enjoy the exquisite restaurants that the city offers instead of cooking at home.
We also would like to thank the gentlemen available 24/7 at the building entrance who were always very kind and attentive.
Ricardo did his best to give us a perfect experience in copacabana. The appartment is very nice (allthough it seems a little bit bigger on the pictures) and well equipped.

Ricardo was very accommodating because I had an early morning flight.  He met me at the building and walked me through everything I would need to know about the apartment.  It is a nice sized apartment for a couple or a person traveling alone.  It is literally two blocks away from the beach and is surrounded by juice bars, coffee shops, restaurants and transit.  The apartment was clean and modern and was the perfect fit for me.  I had an amazing time in Brazil and I will book with Ricardo again!
With Ricardo you always get quality and great service. He is very professional and easy to communicate with.
Very nice and accomdating host. Beautiful place!

A estadia foi ótima, apartamento bem localizado e com estrutura adequada para acomodar três pessoas. Não tenho reclamações a fazer, tudo ocorreu como o esperado, assim como na primeira vez em que aluguei outro apartamento pelo Airbnb com o Ricardo. Recomendo!!
Gostei muito do espaço, pequeno e agradável, perto de tudo!

La ubicación es muy buena. Ricardo fue súper servicial, hasta nos permitió un check out más tarde sin cargo adicional para que podamos aprovechar al máximo nuestro último día en Río. El departamento es muy lindo, bastante más chico de lo que parece en las fotos. Todo está muy bien puesto y no tuvimos ningún problema. Gracias!
Place was clean tidy. Small but had everything needed. Enjoyed the stay there

Ricardo es muy buena persona . Me brindó algunas indicaciones para mí permanencia en Rio. En su apartamento se quedaron unos documentos muy importantes para mí y me está colaborando para tenerlos de regreso en Colombia
Ótimo anfitriao... muito atencioso e receptivo. O espaço é muito bom... pequeno mas muito bonito e funcional.  É muito limpo, completo e organizado. Por espaços como esse que o airbnb da certo.
Très bien situé, proche de la plage Copacabana et tous plein de restos au proche. Belle expérience merci!

Não existem palavras para descrever a simpatia do anfitrião Ricardo. Tudo que foi anunciado, foi cumprido. 
O apartamento é EXCELENTE. 
Nota 10!

Foi uma ótima estadia e o apartamento é exatamente como anunciado, perfeito para três pessoas. Ficamos em quatro e ainda assim foi confortável, apesar de não muito grande! Bem decorado, bem equipado e a localização é ótima.
Gracias por todo Ricardo!! Muy buena atención. Slds.

Excelente ubicación en copacabana, próximo a agencias de turismo, servicios y supermercados. Es un departamento muy acogedor y moderno. Ricardo tiene muy buena disposición para ayudar en lo qué se necesite.

Disfrutamos mucho nuestra estadía en Rio. Ricardo es un excelente anfitrión, siempre atento y el apartamento cumplió con todo lo que estábamos buscando! muy buena ubicación y se ve exactamente como lo publicado en las fotos. Gracias por todo!
Ricardo was great to deal with. We went at 11.30pm. He was very welcoming. Apartment us  less than 5min walk to the Copacabana beach. Also walking distance to Ipanema beach. Nice apartment.
Ricardo was incredible responsive regarding our check-in and the apartment was exactly as advertised: modern, efficient, attractive, clean and well-situated.  Highly recommend -- a great value!

Excelente, aconchegante e confortável, parece ser menor do que nas fotos, mas nada que interfira.
O Ricardo é mega atencioso
Excelente apartamento, aconchegante, bem organizado. E a localização é ótima.

Ricardo é um excelente anfitrião e muito prestativo. O local é exatamente como nas fotos e a localização é excelente! O preço é bem justo para o que oferece. Sem dúvida ficaria novamente nesse apartamento em uma próxima ida ao Rio.

Apartamento novo, bem equipado, limpo, aconchegante e com total segurança. Vizinhança tranquila, o bairro dispensa comentários. O Ricardo se mostrou super atencioso fazendo contato um dia antes de nossa chegada ao Rio e nos recepcionando no momento do checkin.
Um espaço maravilhoso com um preço justo.
Ricardo is a amazing person,The apartment is very beautiful, (Website hidden by Airbnb) Ricardo!!!!!

Excelente estadía pasamos en el departamento. Ricardo es muy buen anfitrión, muy atento a los detalles.
El departamento es tal cual a las fotos y esta cerca de todo, playa, lugares de comidas, lineas de colectivos y metro; Esta muy bien equipado y con todos los servicios. El edificio dispone de portero los cuales fueron muy cordiales y considerados siempre, dado que nos resultaba difícil el idioma. Fue nuestra primera experiencia, por lo cual teníamos ciertos miedos y la verdad que el departamento y Ricardo nos ayudaron para recorrer Rio de la manera que queríamos. 100% recomendable!!!

Sou carioca e estou morando em Porto Alegre, já morei em Copacabana e o apto é mto bem localizado, próximo da praia e de td o comércio do bairro.
Em relação ao apto, é pequeno mas super funcional, limpo, organizado e rico em detalhes!
Ricardo se mostrou solicito e à disposição, voltaremos com certeza!
Ricardo’s place was excellent! Clean, very convenient location, amazing bed, and modern per description. Great value and Ricardo is a great host and very responsive.
place was in a great location and the host had it down to a science.  everything was as advertized and the cleaming lady was great.
The apartment was beautiful, perfect for 3 people, and Ricardo was available to help with any issues and give suggestions. I'd stay here again on another trip to Rio :)
Excelente acomodação e presteza do Ricardo.
Excelente departamento, muy bien ubicado. Ricardo ha sido muy atento y respondio nuestros consultas al instante. Altamente recomendable.

O apartamento de Ricardo e bem localizado a dois blocos da praia de Copacabana.  Perto do apartamento tem padaria, supermercado, farmácias etc.As fotos correspondem ao apartamento . A vizinhança e segura. Ricardo e um host super atentivo nos tivemos um problema com o ar condicionado e ele prontamente se mostrou apto para resolver.

Ricardo’s place is an excellent choice for a good, central stay in Copacabana. Best cost/benefit ratio I had found in this area! A great variety of restaurants, bars, shops and public transportation nearby, not to mention the beach!Ricardo was an excellent host, very attentive and quick to reply, polite and friendly.

The apartment is very comfortable, clean and in a very good location for the beach and the rest of Copacabana and Rio. Good amenities in the apartment itself, the bed is probably the most comfortable we have ever experienced, and in line with one you would have in a 5-star hotel. Good communication during our stay and with check in/check out. Highly recommended!
De 10
El departamento  es muy lindo y cómodo (igual o más lindo que en las  fotos). Se nos cumplió con todo lo acordado y más, muy atento y  bien predispuesto. ¡Muy recomendado!
O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos. Ótima localização, perto da praia, mercados, restaurantes, farmácias. E o Ricardo um querido, sempre disponível para tirar nossas dúvidas.
Ricardo muy atento, el departamento tiene una ubicación bien céntrica y cómoda... muy satisfecho!

Apartamento excelente, exatamente conforme mostram as fotos. Ótima localização, limpo, moderno e com diversas comodidades. O anfitrião é extremamente atencioso e solícito para auxiliar qualquer necessidade que venha a surgir durante a estadia.

Nos encantó el departamento. Super limpio, lindo, una ubicacion genial cerca de todo, en especial del subte que en el mismo podes llegar a muchisimo lugares. Superó mis expectativas, tuve unas vacaciones hermosas me llevo un hermoso recuerdo del departamento! Y Ricardo super atento, nos quito todas las dudas, contestaba los mails enseguida, un genio!

Muy bien todo, ubicación excelente había de todo cerca, limpieza excelente, era un apartamento en una torre lo cual había seguridad y entrada y salida del edificio las 24 horas.
servicios de la casa excelente, quizás algunos canales del tv no servían pero no es de gran importancia.

La excelente ubicación resalta sobre otros departamentos, lo tranquilo del sector y lo gentil y amables de los conserjes te hace sentir como en casa.
Un gran lugar
otimo apartamento, e boa localização
Muy lindo apartamento, cerca de las playas de Río. Excelente estadia
Logement très bien situé, à 3/4min a pied de Copa Cabana dans un condominio sécurisé. Déco sympa et propreté impeccable. Très bon sejour dans l'appartement. : )

Staying at Ricardo's was great.  We were there for a long weekend and it suited us well.  Close to the beach and lots of options for restaurants, shops etc.  Ricardo was very swift and prompt with communications and the place is just like the photos.

Stay was amazing. I never got to meet Ricardo but everything was ready and keys were at my disposal as I arrived. There were some very small issues (toilet seat should be changed, shower doesnt have power due to small hose being disconnected all the time and sink in the bathroom had a very small leak), but it did not bother our stay and I am sure Ricardo will fix these issues for the next guests. Thank you for the stay in amazing and central copacabana!
Conforme a a description. Propre lumineux et bien équipé. Je reviendrais avec plaisir

The apartment is great for two people. Surrounding areas is very safe and literally 2mins walk away from the beach. Ricardo is a excellent host and always willing to help and recommend local destination. I would highly recommend this apartment! Cute and clean

parfaitement situé, a 5minutes du metro de la plage et de bar de copacabana les supermarché sont juste en bas franchement rien a dire l'appartement est tres propre et le lit tres confortable! ricardo s'est montré tres reactif pour des questions.
Nice apartment in Copacabana. Near to the beach, shops, restaurants and metrostation. Ricardo responded very quick and it was possible to check out later because of a late flight.

El departamento es tal cual las fotos nos sentimos a gusto y se encuentra a dos cuadras de la playa. No tuvimos el gusto de conocer a Ricardo personalmente ya que se encontraba de viaje pero si mantuvimos contacto telefónico con el y siempre se mostró muy amable y respondió al momento.
Ricardo was accommodating and check in was super easy.
excelente!!!!
gratidão pela estadia, foram bons dias, apto com excelente localização e bastante opções de restaurantes nos arredores.
Good communication with Ricardo and the appartment is very well located near Copacabana beach
We had a great time! The apartment is in a perfect spot with restaurants, supermarkets and the beach very close by!

La ubicación es genial cerca de una estación del metro, área completa con centros comerciales, restaurantes, panadería, de todo para comprar y a 5 minutos caminando llegas a la playa.. recomiendo abiertamente este departamento y buena comunicación con Ricardo.
muy buen anfitrión. el apartamento en un sitio céntrico, seguro
just fantastic!!!

This lovely apartment is located a few blocks away from the beach and in a really nice, bustling area. It was easy for me to get around and the area felt safe. The apartment building is safe and relatively quiet. I wasn’t woken up by loud sounds at any point in my stay. There’s also a doorman, which is a plus. The apartment itself is very modern, clean, well-stocked with kitchen products and is just a cozy place to stay. 

Ricardo is a great host! I had a small issue with the doorman due to miscommunication and Ricardo handled it immediately, making the rest of my stay very pleasant. He was very responsive to all of my questions and concerns and he checked in to see if I was enjoying my stay, which I felt was kind and hospitable. 

Overall, I highly recommend this place!

Pasamos una excelente estadia, el departamento es cómodo, limpio y práctico para hacer turismo.
El anfitrión Ricardo fue cordial y atento en todo momento.

Nossa estadia no apartamento de Ricardo foi fantástica. O apartamento é muito completo, o mais completo em que já fiquei, e está localizado em uma área perfeita. Além disso, Ricardo é um excelente anfitrião, ele facilitou tudo. Super recomendado! muito obrigado!

Déçu par un appartement qui a l'air pratique mais pleins de défauts : eau chaude seulement dans la douche, manque de vaisselle, un seul bol, pas d'économe, comptoir pour manger pas pratique du tout, pas de table basse, placards trop haut et sans poignées.
Excelente administrador do apartamento   .boa acomodação e localização limpeza excelente
Apto ótimo, exatamente como as fotos! Ambiente aconchegante e acolhedor! Silencioso para dormir! Ricardo super atencioso e gentil. Excelente localização, tudo que é necessário por perto. Recomendo!!

name: Villas Of Kamalii 20: Near Shops, Restaurants, And Beaches
summary: Beautiful two-story townhouse with a stunning interior, two master bedrooms, A/C in gated community. Pool, hot tub, bbq. Free midsize rental car.
space: *Free mid-size car while cars are available. Not valid with any other special offers. Car can be upgraded for minimal fee, unlimited mileage and taxes included, and is picked-up and dropped-off at the airport. Cars are on a 24 hour basis so if flight arrival and departure times exceed the number of days reserved, there will be an additional charge. At the Villas of Kamali’i 20 you get it all – convenient split-level floor plan, gorgeous finishes and incredible mountain views. All this and you’re tucked away in an exclusive gated community. With over 1,800 square feet of space and two master suites, the condo is ideal for two families or two couples traveling together. The main-floor den has a queen sofa sleeper for even more sleeping space. Open and airy with vaulted ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows, the living room offers a comfy couch, plush armchair and large flat-screen TV. Behind it, gather for meals around the dining table for six. Head out to the lanai off the living room f

neighborhood_overview: Villas of Kamalii, an exclusive gated community, adjacent to the prestigious Princeville Golf Courses on Kauai`s North Shore. These beautiful vacation rentals have high vaulted ceilings, an open floor plan, two master suites and a den. There are large windows to view unparalleled scenes of the golf course, mountains, and waterfalls framing the extraordinary beauty that the Island of Kauai has to offer. Villas of Kamalii is close to private tennis courts for the non - golfers. It`s just a 5 minute walk from the Makai clubhouse that serves three 9-hole courses for the avid golfer, and is next door to the Prince Golf Course designed by Robert Trent Jones Jr., named the number 1 course in the State of Hawaii by Golf Digest.  These vacation townhouses are in close proximity to Kauai`s most gorgeous beaches and possess all the needed amenities for a wonderful, relaxing vacation including a heated swimming pool, Jacuzzi and professional BBQ grill.
notes: Get your shopping on at the Princeville shopping center, just 5 minutes down the road. Golfers in your group will love the Makai Golf Course, just a 3-minute walk from the condo. Even if you don’t golf, stop into the clubhouse for a casual breakfast or lunch. For an extra challenge, the Prince Golf Course, designed by Robert Trent Jr. and named the best in the state, is also next door. When you’re ready for sand and sun, head to the world-famous Hanalei Bay beach, just a 15-minute drive away. If you’re looking for an adrenaline high, Anini Beach is also 15 minutes away and well-known for its snorkeling and wind surfing.
transit: 1. Two Master Suites: Whether it’s two families or two couples traveling together, the condo’s flexible floor plan suits different groups. The two master suites offer privacy and space with king beds and en-suite baths. Extra guests? The den has additional sleeping space on a queen sleeper sofa. 2. Gorgeous Lanai: Start and end your day on the pretty lanai off the living room, sipping on coffee in the morning and a glass of wine in the evening. Enjoy mountain views all around and when it rains, you can see waterfalls in the distance. 3. On-Site Amenities: Along with being gated, the exclusive condo community has a heated pool, hot tub and BBQ area to hang out with your fellow guests. We recommend renting a car for your stay, however, Kauai does have public transportation.
access: FREE WIFI FREE PARKING/ONE GARAGE SPACE AND ONE OUTSIDE SPACE POOL/HOT TUB/BBQ AREA
interaction: You will receive check in directions after final payment is made. The property has a lockbox and you will be able to go directly to the property to check in after 3p.m. on your check in date.
house_rules: 1. Please contact Great Vacation Retreats directly with any questions, maintenance issues or concierge requests. 2. Hawaii has a new smoking law which allows smoking only in designated areas outside of any building, 20 feet away from doors. Our condos and lanais are all non-smoking. Please use the designated areas if you wish to smoke. They are usually located in the parking lot of the building. There is a $300 fine for smoking in our properties and the State of Hawaii may also impose a fine for not smoking in the designated areas. 3. Please wash off all sand from beach gear and your body before re-entering the units. Outside showers are available at most beaches and outside of most properties. Please do not hang beach towels, swimsuits, etc. from lanai chairs / bbqs. 4. Because we are in a tropical environment, there are insects. Please keep all food covered and stored properly. This will help to discourage roaches, ants, geckos and spiders from having a party.  5. Overstocking refrig

host.host_about: We are a boutique property management company on the islands of Kauai and the Big Island. We are here to help you plan your Hawaiian Experience. All of our properties include free WiFi, free parking, fully equipped kitchens and more great amenities. Our team checks our account very frequently to make sure all of your questions are answered as soon as possible. Once on island we are available to help you 24 hours/day. Need a rental car? Where is the best place for a sunset dinner? Where do the locals go? Let us know how we can help you experience the vacation of your dreams!

reviews.comments: This was a perfect place for us to stay!  We are 2 friends who felt like going on a vacation but didn't want the typical resort experience.  This condo was a perfect alternative.  Plus, it gave us the ability to have our own master bedrooms and bathrooms without having to share - which added both comfort and luxury that was appreciated.  Very clean!  A short run to the beach in Princeville or a short drive to Hanalei Bay.  Lots of windows, which I LOVE and the views are quite lovely!

Fantastic property, excellent furnishings and quality appliances, I think we counted 4 juicers in the cupboard. Close to Princeville and some of the best snorkelling on the island, we were up early most mornings snorkelling with turtles at Tunnels and Hideaway Beaches. Good communication leading up to the stay, and the hire car included was great. Pool is shared with the other condos however was never busy. Would recommend this to groups travelling to Hawaii who would like a relaxing luxury trip, and would come back to stay if we have the opportunity.

Amy was really responsive and helpful making it easy to make up my mind and the reservation. Check in and check out were seamless with a code to access keys. The villa, a vacation rental, is really nice, spacious, has amazing views (you can even see a waterfall from the distance),  and everything is clean and good quality (just like int he pictures or even better). The vila is part of a quiet gated community of about 30 vilas. Has 2 bedrooms, 3 balconies, washer and drier, AC and a very nice kitchen. They also have beach chairs, a cooler and  buggy boards which came in handy.  Great for relaxing, cooking at come, enjoying the balcony, and having a very comfortable and homey stay.

This is a beautiful place. It was clean,  and spacious, with all the essentials to make our stay a great vacation. The included rental car with our 7 night stay was fantastic! I highly recommend this place and would stay there again next time I am in Kauai. Thank you Amy!
Beautiful house!

The house was beautiful and spotless. We absolutely loved it. Amy was also super helpful throughout the booking and during our stay - provided lots of info. 

Love it!
Fantastic experience - the photos don't do the place justice.  Very comfortable and homely feel.  We didn't want to leave.

Amy was a fantastic host. She is very prompt at answering emails, and is very helpful with planning activities while in Princeville and on the island. The location of the condo is very private and quaint in a luxurious area. The best par about it was how clean the entire place was. It made the stay very comforting and relaxing. The condo is very close to Hanalei Bay and the gorgeous Napali coast which we loved much more than the south shore. The description of the condo was very accurate to our experience although we were a group of 6 adults and the 3rd bedroom is a closed off office with a pullout couc (which we knew).  However, our only complaint was that this room is not sufficient for two adults. The pullout couch is full of springs, and when it is pulled out, there is barely any room to walk around, open the entry door or the armoire to access clothes. Also, it does not have A/C, and even with the oscillating fan it is still extremely hot and uncomfortable. It is better suited for children or kept as an office only. We didn't spend much time in the condo as we were eager to get out and explore the beautiful area. Otherwise, the condo was spectacular

Während unseres Aufenthaltes hat einfach alles gestimmt! Die Villa ist sehr geräumig, sauber und gemütlich und die Aussicht ist toll. Im Vergleich zu den teuren Resorts in nächster Umgebung ist auch der Preis angemessen. Wir haben dort alles vorgefunden, was man im Alltag benötigt: Waschmaschine und Trockner inklusive Waschmittel, reichlich Geschirr, Badetücher usw.
Wir haben zu viert dort übernachtet und hatten reichlich Platz, da zu den beiden Schlafzimmern je ein großes Badezimmer mit WC und ein begehbarer Kleiderschrank gehört. Es wäre durchaus auch denkbar zu sechs Personen dort zu wohnen, da es ein weiteres Zimmer mit einem ausklappbaren Sofa gibt. Wir hatten einen sehr angenehmen Aufenthalt und würden die Villa jederzeit wieder buchen!

This was an amazing rental. The views of the waterfalls were incredible. We could see 7 going at one time!
Thanks again Amy!!! You always come through!

This is the best Airbnb experience I have had! The property was awesome; I feel the actual house / townhouse is a lot bigger and newer than what's in the photos. The rooms are huge. And it was very clean, in a very nice and quite neighborhood. It's also at a very convenient location; easy access to stores, beaches, and my fav hotel for breakfast!! 

Amy is super nice and easy to work with. We had a last minute change for our rental car and she was very quick to respond. 

I def recommend it to everyone who is looking for a nice and relaxing vacation.

My wife and I had a marvelous time staying at this condo for a week long vacation in Kauai. It is hard to believe, but the condo actually looked even BETTER in person than it did in photos.

It was also chock full of considerate amenities like snorkel gear, boogie boards, coolers, puzzles, board games, and more. It was also stocked with all necessary supplies for living, such as dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, soap, toilet paper, paper towels, tons of kitchen appliances, etc. It was nice being able to cook, clean, and do laundry in this luxury condo.

This condo is air conditioned, which was a must have even when we visited in the later months (Oct/Nov).

The condo came with a car rental included, which was very useful and hassle free.

For those of you who want a personal connection with your airbnb host, you should know that this place is rented out by a company called Great Vacation Rentals rather than a specific individual/couple. I didn't have any issues with Great Vacation Rentals (they left us mostly alone), but it might be a different feel than what you hoped for.

Excelente estadía.  Muy cómodo el departamento.  Amplio, limpio, bien equipado y confortable.  Clara y fácil la información para llegar.  Un buen lugar para descansar. excelente atención de great vacations.

This was our first experience with Airbnb and I have to say it exceeded our expectations. We loved this Villa, it made us feel like we were home and welcome. The house was far better then the photos it was clean and had everything we needed including a lovely welcoming cooler. The views from this location were breath taking we loved waking up every morning to a view of the mountains and amazing rainbows. If you are planning a visit to Kauai, which I highly recommend, there is truly no better place to stay. Near grocery store and short drive to town. We did not want to leave and will never stay in a hotel again! Thank you for making our trip perfect!

Even better in person!!  Amazing amount of space with a fully stocked kitchen.  Wonderful complex with easy access to everything.  Great Vacation was wonderful with communication and rental car.  Highly recommend!!!
The puctures don't do the unit justice, it is stunning! perfectly located to beaches, restaurants and local grocery store and shops.

We had such a great time. The condo is gorgeous and so clean.  We comfortably had five people stay.  Two master suites so nobody is left unsatisfied in their accommodations.  

They had a bunch of stuff for us to use at the (Website hidden by Airbnb) rentals needed!!  These guys were fast when I needed a last minute car rental change.  

When we come back to Kauai we will be staying here again!!

This was a well appointed townhouse. Washer/dryer, well equipped, air conditioner, and the location was perfect to get to activities, restaurants anything we wanted to do was close by. Good value for the cost! We definitely will be back. Actually, we didn't want to leave.
Terrific condo. It was clean lovely and so spacious. Pictures do not do it justice. Location is great and the management and communication was super helpful and made for a smooth booking

This location could not have been more perfect! 30mins to the Na Pali coast, 10min walk to Queens Bath and Hideaway Beach and so close to food shops. The area is so well kept and beautiful, waking up every morning to the mountain view was a dream. The house was so big, clean and had all the essentials for cooking and beach gear. Could not recommend this place enough - it was spot on!

This was awesome!!! I didn't want to leave to come home because it was so comfortable. When I return to Princeville, I will stay here again. No parking problems like other places and the area was quiet and relaxing. Maholo!
I had a wonderful time. The listing is very updated with a nice view of the mountains. I loved the proximity to so many Princeville activities including tennis and golf! I'd definitely go again.

This was a huge beautiful, beautiful condo! Definitely a " Wow" factor when you walk in.  The view of the mountains  were spectacular. The grounds were very pretty and well maintained.  The bathrooms were luxurious (loved the soaps and shampoos). Terrific location, quick drive to Hanalei Bay.  The garage was very small, a tight fit for most cars.  Overall a lovely place.

Gorgeous and quiet, this lovely AIR CONDITIONED townhome was the perfect spot for our business/holiday stay.

Luxurious beds, plenty of linens, fans to silence the chickens (!!) and friendly, welcoming neighbors.

Kitchen has all you need and buffet full of board games and puzzles was a nice respite on a rainy afternoon. Garage has miscellaneous beach gear and parking access was easy.

Walk the nearby trails and even to Queens Bath. Less than a mile from the St. Regis, if applicable.

Hanalei restaurants are 10 min away. We loved the Kalypso and the Bread Co.

Anini Beach is short drive (ideal for kids) and Napoli coast is stunning hike and beaches in the opposite direction.

We will definitely book again.

This condo is amazing! It is sparkling clean and has a ton of room! If you are looking for a getaway with your family, this is a great place! 

With that being said, there isn’t much to do in the Princeville area. My husband and I found ourselves driving to the west or south part of the island everyday which was approximately an hour drive. However, a rental car was provided which made everything convenient. 

Be aware of a few things, 1) this group prefers to communicate via e-mail, not the AirBNB chat. 2) they give you a car with the company Alamo. I couldn’t figure out why everyone was running me over at the airport to get to the car rental area. I later found out it is because cars are “first come, first serve”. So if you want a nicer vehicle, you MUST get there early. 

All in all, awesome place to stay, just not a lot to do in the area.

This place was amazing! We had such a great time on Kauai and this beautiful townhome is the perfect place to stay. It’s a short drive to many restaurants and beaches and driving over to the south side of the island to have some adventures is so easy. I highly recommend this place and Kauai!

Sparkling clean, special comforts, and perfect for families or singles.

This is our second stay and we love this home. Our kids have plenty of room to spread out, beds are super comfy, and the kitchen is loaded for easy cooking if desired.

The home is sparkling clean and we never feel like we are living in someone else’s place. 

Plenty of board games for those evening at home and plenty of beach toys and equipment do you don’t have to provide your own.

Location ideal for easy access to shopping, yummy eats, drinks, massage, coffee. Trails to run on and super clean pool.
Just a few minutes from Honalei and right near Princeville- great Mountain Views from the patio. Easy check in and out- great place for families complete with games in the cupboard.

This home is clean, clean, clean and comfortably accommodated my family of five. It had everything we needed to feel right at home. I would highly recommend staying here if you want a quiet stay while still being very close to a bunch of amazing North Shore attractions. Eg: Hanalei Bay was a 5 min drive and Queen's Bath was only a 3 min drive. There was also a grocery store, Foodland, that we stopped at countless times to either pick up a quick breakfast before an early hike or ingredients to take back to cook dinner. All in all, this was the perfect stay for my parents' retirement trip.

Pros: The interior of Great Vacations Retreats' condo was much more lavish and beautiful than we expected. The inside is quite accommodating, with a pleasing, spacious layout and comfortable beds. The hot tub was relaxing and quiet.  We could hear the sound of the ocean at night. It was pleasant to watch the birds on the rooftops from the outside upper balcony. Washer and dryer were large and functioned well. Laundry detergent was in the cupboard. The car rental was easy. We had no issues picking up or returning the car.  Everything we needed for the beach was provided: snorkel equipment, beach towels, surf board, cooler . . .Cons: The pool could have been warmer. The gated community had a lot of neighbors and light on every door that made it hard to see the stars at night though we eventually discovered we could walk up the road to the golf course and walk that path at night, which was nice. The biggest concern was the location, which required significant driving every day to get to the things we wanted to do such as hike at Waimea Canyon, take a boat tour of the Na' Pali Coast, and visit Poipu Beach. We drove a lot because of where we stayed. 
This is a beautiful place to bring the family if you want to do activities near Princeville.

This place was truly amazing and definitely met our expectations. The townhouse was large with master suites on each level. The interior was beautifully decorated and the beds, couch and chairs we comfy. The complex itself was quiet, offered beautiful views of the mountains and was less than 5 minutes from the Princeville shopping center. The only downside was the internet was spotty at times. Overall though, it was a fantastic stay and we’d absolutely visit again.

No parties Absolutely no smoking even on terrace whole building is smoke free and neighbours will police this Water feature cacti plants & climbable balcony wall make my home unsuitable for young kids Security building & alarm Gas main BBQ

host.host_about: efficient , friendly, easy going,

reviews.comments: Brendas place is absolutely wonderful. It's got a huge terrace with lots of space to hang out and relax. The apartment itself is wonderfully decorated and very cosy. The loacation is also brilliant - just a small stroll down to the beach and an easy bud travel to the city centre. We stayed here in just over a month with our to kids and loved it!

My parents stayed in this apartment and here is what they had to say: "Our stay in Brendas apartment was terrific! Brenda herself greeted us and gave us helpful hints and a tour of her stylish home. We were impressed by the lovely white towels,  lovely bedlinen and even beachtowels for us to use, very thoughtful as we came all the way from Sweden! We loved the very nice and spacious home, which we quickly felt was cozy and easy to relax in. The apartment is tastefully furnished and decorated with Art Deco from the smallest items, furniture and lamps as well as interesting art. We had breakfast, lunch and dinners on the fantastic green and shaded terrace where we even could catch a glimps of Coogee Beach!
 
Our stay in Sydney after Christmas was terrific, including precious family time with our two sons and their partners, as well as friends who also could stay in the extra bedroom. New Years Eve was celebrated on the terrace where we had a great view of the fireworks in Coogee. We could easily find the shops closeby and nice walks in the surroundings. Buses and subway took us around in Sydney in no time!
 
We are happy to recommend Brenda as a friendly and trusting host and who knows, we might be back again soon!?"

Could not recommend this place more! My daughter and I stayed for 2 weeks in Brenda's place. Fantastic location, everything supplied that you would need. Beautiful apartment  & furnishings, comfortable beds and an outdoor balcony that you will not believe until you see! Easy walk to restaurants/pubs in Randwick and Coogee and to the beach. Thanks Brenda!

Breandas  House was great, amazing artwork, clean and with everything you could ever need. We truly enjoyed that amazing Terrace and view.I would recommend Brenda's place for anyone  visiting  Coogee beach.

Fantastic stay. Brenda's flat is cosy and perfectly equiped for a several nights stay. Brenda is a very kind host and Coogee is a convenient location to explore SYdney without the hustle and bustle of the city. The beach is 7mn down the road and we enjoyed combining visits in Sydney and relaxing on the beach and in cafes in Coogee. There's a bit of traffic on the street so if you shouldn't be too fussy about noise. But for urban dwellers like us that was nothing compared to the quality of the stay. Thanks!
Brenda's place is well worth a stay. It is quirky and the art alone fascinating.We would recommend the accommodation without hesitation.

Brenda's place is full of art and sculptures. We also loved the spacious verandah. Quite close to cafes, groceries etc. We all loved our stay at Brenda's and would recommend it if you wanted to stay in Coogee. Thanks Brenda!

Brenda's place is wonderfully furnished and gives off a very homely vibe. The beds were comfortable and all the amenities were working well. The place is located in a nice suburb very near to coogee beach. Supermarkets, convenience stores and eating places were also within walking distance.

It's also a convenient location to stay in as many buses around the area bring you to the city center and other explore-worthy suburbs such as Surry Hills.

Brenda was very communicative since the time booking was made till we checked in and the days we were there. She is a very hospitable host and me and my group of friends really enjoyed staying there.

Would not hesitate to recommend!

Brenda has a beautiful home. It is a perfect place for a quiet, relaxing stay close to all the Too spots in the area. We were visiting our Mum in hospital and we couldn't have found a better place. Brenda is a wonderful and welcoming host and I highly recommend her place to anyone. 
Regards, Mary
Beautiful old apartment with good sized rooms and lots of sunlight, huge terrace which would be perfect for a sunny afternoon. Brenda is a great host and was very easy to deal with, highly recommend
A beautiful apartment! Brenda was very accommodating with our arrival and departure times. This is a great spot for easy bus routes in to Sydney and a 15 min walk to Coogee Beach and Randwick.

A really lovely space with some very interesting decor which makes it more interesting than your average accommodation. Brenda is a lovely host and is quick to respond. The location is great with bus stops only a few minutes walk, so you can easily get into the city and around Sydney. The terrace is glorious so you are able to soak up the summer sun and eat outside. 
Many thanks 
Isobel

host.host_about: You can contact me if you think about this. Eight of my Zero friends Eight to much.Eight hundred and Fifty Four people came to visit me. My mum is Sixty Seven and I am Fourty Nine.

space: You will have access to the whole studio which includes a bathroom and kitchen. There will be shampoo, body wash, toilet paper, and towels provided. You are more than welcome to use the pots, plates, glasses, and utensils in the cupboard.

It is close to all major subway lines - BDFM, NQR, 123, and 7 train. Also the building has an amazing 360 roof deck access!
