When checking out, please be sure to empty all trash and take out the recycling. This is my home and I stay where whenever I am not renting it out on Air Bnb so please treat this place as you would with your own home.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We stayed here one month. Elaine was accommodating and easy to communicate with. The apartment is pretty large for being a studio and everything is in very good shape and the apartment was clean. Very good location, close to Bryant Park and to the subway.
The only minus is that the apartment is pretty loud from the street. Even though it is on the 15th floor you hear cars, honking, fire trucks etc.
The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Perfect Potts Point Pied-à-terre
summary: Gorgeous studio apartment recently renovated to the highest standard. In a classic Art Deco building in the heart of Potts Point on Macleay Street opposite the famous El Alamein Fountain. It's like a fabulous hotel suite with everything you may need.
space: Pied-à-terre: dictionary meaning - Small city residence away from home... This studio apartment is perfect for your short stay in Sydney - even though it's right on Macleay Street it's in the middle of the building so there's no traffic or street noise, and is completely private from the windows. With wi-fi, Netflix and fetchtv which gives you 17 cable stations including BBC World, CNN, France 24, MTV etc etc!
description: Gorgeous studio apartment recently renovated to the highest standard. In a classic Art Deco building in the heart of Potts Point on Macleay Street opposite the famous El Alamein Fountain. It's like a fabulous hotel suite with everything you may need. Pied-à-terre: dictionary meaning - Small city residence away from home... This studio apartment is perfect for your short stay in Sydney - even though it's right on Macleay Street it's in the middle of the building so there's no traffic or street noise, and is completely private from the windows. With wi-fi, Netflix and fetchtv which gives you 17 cable stations including BBC World, CNN, France 24, MTV etc etc! This beautifully appointed studio  apartment has recently been completely gutted, so it's a brand new shell inside the old Deco building - everything has been done to the highest standard and quality. It's been carefully designed down to the last detail, caesar bench tops in the kitchen, heated towel rail in the bathroom, power socke
neighborhood_overview: Restaurants within a few minutes walk (or less!) include The Roosevelt, The Apollo, Billy Kwong’s, The Butler, Miss G’s, Cho Cho San, Fei Jei, Fratelli Fresh, Fratelli Paradiso, Crane Bar and more.  Llankelly Place is right behind our building and is full of fabulous cafes and Harris Farm Market.
notes: For longer term guests we offer a cleaning service weekly or fortnightly at a cost of $100 - bed linen changed  - fresh towels - full cleaning of apartment Please advise if you'd like this service arranged for you
transit: Kings Cross Train Station is a two minute walk away for easy access to the city (one stop) although it's very pleasant to walk to the city centre, takes around 10 minutes. Walk down to Wooloomoolloo Wharf and the Art Gallery of NSW via the steps on Victoria Street.
access: This beautifully appointed studio  apartment has recently been completely gutted, so it's a brand new shell inside the old Deco building - everything has been done to the highest standard and quality. It's been carefully designed down to the last detail, caesar bench tops in the kitchen, heated towel rail in the bathroom, power sockets everywhere to power your devices - and even a perfect view of the TV from the bed! It's fully equipped with everything you may need. Everything is new!
interaction: I'll be happy to greet you whenever you arrive, and if I'm away there'll be someone to assist with welcoming you to your home away from home...
house_rules: No Smoking

host.host_about: I'm passionate about interiors and love all aspects of design. Originally from London, I love Sydney, especially this fabulous area and have been living here for many years. I work in the fashion industry...

reviews.comments: I stayed at Jenny's apartment in Potts Point for over a month and it was a perfect home away from home.  Jenny was an impeccable host.  So welcoming and accomodating - even when I locked myself out of the house she was around in five minutes to save me!  I loved every minute of my stay at the apartment.  Jenny's beautifully decked out apartment is a newly renovated studio, so compact but with everything you need - including a great kitchen and bathroom.   The location couldn't be better as you are in the heart of Potts Point, which is my favourite Sydney suburb.  My only wish is that I could have stayed longer!
The apartment is very  pretty and is very properly placed. Thank you a lot. I advise this apartment for holydays in Sydney.

Great place to stay, the apartment has everything you could ask for. 

Jenny is very accommodating.

It was just like staying in a hotel. 

I'd recommend staying if you are after an alternative to a hotel suite. 

I would stay again.

Jenny's apartment is as described and is located in the middle of a wonderfully eclectic neighborhood. 
the location is within a half hour of circular quay and the Opera House and the is a train station within a couple of minutes... easy access to most great spots in and around Sydney.
Jenny was very accommodating on my arrival and departure, over an above what any hotel would do...

Jenny could not have been more accommodating or helpful.  The apartment was even nicer than the photos suggest.  Everything has been finished to a very high standard.  The area is vibrant and convenient.

My stay at Jenny's place was fantastic. The apartment is thoughtfully and thoroughly appointed, and the location is unbeatable. Jenny is a gracious host, who is extremely responsive and kind. I highly recommend this apartment.

Jenny was so nice with great advise.
The place is great I recommend it.
a
Lovely clean and central flat. Jenny was very helpful and overall stay was pleasant. Would definitely return.
Jenny was extremely hospitable, the location is extremely convenient and the listing was accurate.

I've spent one week at Jenny's Studio. Location is good, Just few mins walk from Kings cross Tube station, There're lots of Bars, restaurants , Supermarkets , gyms and etc. Everything in a walking distance.
She was so sweet and nice to me, good communication and friendly.
Studio is like same size as hotel room but has kitchen too.
I liked this place and I will return .
Thanks Jenny.

I booked Jenny's place for my parents as they were visiting from overseas. Jenny is a great host and really responsive to any messages/questions/issues. The place was clean, well-equipped and central. Great location which makes it easy to visit around. The building is not recent but the apartment is  well renovated with all modern amenities such as washing machine, dryer, air conditioning (definitely a plus in summer). It doesn't have a view but it didn't bother my parents as they were just there at night.

Jenny's apartment is the perfect place to have everything you need while getting to know Sydney. It is close to public transport which makes everything easier, but it is also close to the city so if your in the mood to walk it would be perfect! Communication was great and Jenny is a very nice host! Made my stay really good.

The place is very well equipped with everything that we needed during our 4 weeks stay. The location is excellent! Close to public transport, Sydney most beautiful parks, etc. Jenny is a very nice host who gave us a warm check in. We were happy to stay at the apartment and would certainly come back.

Jenny is the most ideal host and that's  because she's just a lovely human being. Everything was most ideal. Being completely new to Airbnb myself I felt safe and comfortable. Is there anything more you'd want?

Me and my wife have spent a very nice week at Jenny's apartment. Studio was clean, well-equipped with everything that we needed. Location is very good, close to the public transport, just a few minutes walk to the Kings Cross station. There are lots of bars, restaurants, supermarket in the neighborhood.
Jenny and Simon are a very nice and helpful. Check in was quick and nice, despite it was a late evening. Summarizing - everything was perfect. We hope to be back to Sydney and this lovely place.

Location was good, 2 minutes walk to the train station, 2 supermarkets which were each 5 minutes away. The weekend market was so interesting and the food sold was great. The studio was well-equipped and saw to all our needs. There were many eateries around, a police station nearby. It's safe, well furnished. It's a 10-15 min ride to the city which makes it very convenient. Jenny, our host, was prompt in her responses and made sure we were comfortable throughout.

Jenny was great! She was very accommodating with our early morning flight and check in. The apartment is cute and cozy and in a perfect location. The train is a short walk away and the bus stop is right outside the building. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed for the week!

I really loved staying in Jenny's meticulously designed and brilliantly anticipated apartment in Pott's Point (King's Cross). I've stayed in a lot of places all over the world in the last few years, so I've become more and more aware of well-planned and practical design. This place was one of the best designed I've ever been in. I stayed for 2 weeks and was perfectly comfortable using it as a home base the entire time. It's not big at all though, but the layout flows so nicely you shouldn't mind. I think it's great for a single traveler or maybe a vey cosy couple, but I wouldn't recommend it for more (though Jenny also does the same). The building is centrally located and the halls are a bit dingy, but they open up to a really fun and bright apartment, like a nice secret surprise. I highly recommend it!

Jenny is a great host: super kind, quick replies and so easy do get along with - thanks for that!
The apartment look like on the fotos. It is pretty small but clean and cute, with everything you may need.
The only negative thing was the house itself, which looks old and a bit dirty. But I’ll be clear here: this is nothing what Jenny could change.
So, thanks a lot for your help and your recommendations! I really enjoyed Sydney and especially staying in your beautiful little studio apartment.

Fantastic little appartment in a great location, about 30 mins walk from sydney opera house or if you prefer about 5 mind walk to kings cross station from where you can go anywhere, a very well appointed place and spotlessly clean
Had a great stay at Jenny's place. The apartment is in a very convenient location, close to shops and the train station. The apartment had everything we needed and was super clean. Highly recommend.

My partner and I had a fantastic stay in Jenny's apartment. It’s the perfect base for exploring Sydney. Awesome neighborhood with lots of character. Make sure to check out the weekend markets across the road. While the building is a little rustic, the apartment has been renovated extremely well. Modern, clean, every amenity you’d need. As the description states - it’s a pied-à-terre. But we found it a-ok for a couple. Also communication was fantastic. Would definitely stay there again.
Wonderfully modular pied-à-terre that truly felt like home for my 2 months there. Recommend!

Jenny was very nice and sweet, we felt welcomed once we arrived. When me and my boyfriend lost our wallets at Bondi Beach, we were offered to help with money and were also allowed to rearrange with the check out time. The apartment is perfect for couple, compact but has everything you need and is well decorated. Lots of good cafes around the area, Kings Cross station is only 5 mins away. Good experience :)

Just stayed there for 3 months! Had a really great time, the apartment has everything you need Jenny and Simon are just great! They helped me on everything I needed! This is the place to go, for sure!
I cannot recommend Jenny's place highly enough - lots of lovely little touches to make it feel like home, super communicative and helpful hosts, and a wonderful easy location!

Was a great location on edge of CBD  heaps of great restaurants and cafes around, easy walk to Kings cross station, a nice market across the road on the weekend in front of the police station and fountain area, house inside was cosy but too small

I stayed Jenny’s place for about a month and I had been happy to stay there. Jenny’s place was amazingly clean and had everything I needed. Easy check-in/out. Location was convenient, easy access to public transport, only 5 mins walk to Kings Cross Station and less than 5 mins walk to grocery, chemist and post office. Jenny and Simon were friendly, super kind, excellent communication, quick response and helpful all the time! I would absolutely recommend Jenny’s place. Thank you Jenny and Simon for being the best host!!

We stayed 7 nights at Jenny's apartment and loved everything about it! Communication with Jenny was easy and she was flexible and let us keep our suitcases in the apartment after we checked out. Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Sydney!

name: spacious 2 bedder with great views
summary: Spacious two bedroom apartment with great city skyline and black wattle bay water views. Close to CBD buses and light rail. Loads of great cafés, glebe markets and foreshore walks. Family friendly, huge sunny private balcony, outdoor pool, visitor parking.
space: This two bedroom apartment is north east facing with loads of natural light and amazing morning sunshine- so lovely and sunny on cold winter mornings!  The large sunny balcony features an l-shaped outdoor lounge and a vintage outdoor setting which is perfect for a morning coffee or an evening wine whilst soaking in the views.  I have a five year old daughter so there are also plenty of toys and books. There is also a portacot available for smaller children.  *please note there are only two beds (one queen and one single), so the fourth person would need to sleep on the lounge (which very long and comfortable).
description: Spacious two bedroom apartment with great city skyline and black wattle bay water views. Close to CBD buses and light rail. Loads of great cafés, glebe markets and foreshore walks. Family friendly, huge sunny private balcony, outdoor pool, visitor parking. This two bedroom apartment is north east facing with loads of natural light and amazing morning sunshine- so lovely and sunny on cold winter mornings!  The large sunny balcony features an l-shaped outdoor lounge and a vintage outdoor setting which is perfect for a morning coffee or an evening wine whilst soaking in the views.  I have a five year old daughter so there are also plenty of toys and books. There is also a portacot available for smaller children.  *please note there are only two beds (one queen and one single), so the fourth person would need to sleep on the lounge (which very long and comfortable). There is an outdoor swimming pool within the complex and newly landscaped grounds. The place is all yours to enjoy. Glebe is
neighborhood_overview: Glebe is a quirky village with loads of great food, markets, bookshops and parks.  The newly opened Tramsheds have fantastic restaurants and a supermarket! It's very close to the city so a great base for exploring Sydney.
transit: A few minutes walk up the road are buses into the city, balmain and coogee.  There are also trams that go to central via star city casino and darling harbour. If your catching an uber it is only approx $12 to get into town or Surry hills.
access: There is an outdoor swimming pool within the complex and newly landscaped grounds.
interaction: The place is all yours to enjoy.
house_rules: This apartment is located in a quiet building with quite a few families and elderly residents.....Please keep noise to a minimum.... especially when out on the balcony as the sound travels.  No smoking. No parties.

host.host_location: Forest Lodge, New South Wales, Australia

reviews.comments: This was a great place to stay. Heaps of room for an inner city apartment in a leafy area. Great views from the deck. Sara met us in the carpark and showed us to the apartment and was friendly and informative about access to shops, transport and to the city. The kitchen had everything we needed to cook a meal and the shops and fish market are really close to source ingredients. We'd definitely stay here again. Very clean and homely.

Sara was a fantastic host.  Prior to our stay she was easy to communicate with, responded quickly and with no fuss.  Sara met us on the grounds of her apartment and showed us around on arrival.  The apartment was clean and tidy and in a great location.  We enjoyed our stay.

Sara was a lovely host, she had great communication and was extremely helpful. Her apartment is located in a prime area of Glebe; directly adjacent to the main street, which has many cafes and restaurants. The place is very tidy and cosy with a stunning balcony view.

This was my firs time booking via Airbnb, and thoroughly enjoyed my stay.

The place was clean, roomy, ideally situated, and with a fantastic view of the Sydney CBD and the harbour itself.

This was our first time booking via airbnb, and the process was pretty straight forward. Sara was very nice, helpful and easy to get in touch with.Her apartment is nice and tidy and has amazing views.Plenty of shops/cafes in walking distance.Overall a really impressive stay, would recommend her apartment to anyone heading to sydney.
Great spot, amazing  view

Sara's apartment is in a great location to plenty of convenience stores, cafes, takeaways and a bottle store. Handy to the buses and light rail system, but there is a bit of a uphill hike if you get off at the Glebe Station - it's a much easier walk if you get off at Jubliee Park Station.
She was very easy to deal with and flexible with the time to meet us and responded to messages promptly during our stay. Was a great space with all the amenities that you need, plus more - our wee girl loved all the toys and books (Thanks for having these available).

The views were  amazing , most of the time spent in the apartment were out on the balcony taking in the scenery . We felt like we were in a home from home the apartment was lovely and clean and the area was nice and quiet but just a few mins drive from the city centre . It had everything we needed and Sara responded immediately with any queries we had. It was a lovely place to stay and if I ever return to Sydney will be looking to book with Sara again
The host is easy to communicate with, and give a help efficiently.
Excellent city views can be enjoyed form a delightful balcony - excellent pool as well.
Really good place, quiet quartier and amazing  views. It is possible to go on foot to the main places of the city. Comunnication was perfect with Sara.
Great location!! Short walk to Glebe shops, bus and restaurant. Second bedroom is for a child, not suitable for an adult.
Sara was welcoming and the flat was tidy and ready for our stay

Fantastic family apartment! It is great to have a break away and be able to have a separate room from the kids. 
Sara went above and beyond providing a high chair, port a cot and sharing her daughters toys; our boys loved it.
The view and location was amazing, the apartment clean and stylish. 

We would really like to stay again next time we are in Sydney.
Sara was an excellent host, very responsive to questions and made check in easy. Place was clean, comfortable, as described with beautiful view and a great location. Would happily book again.
The host canceled this reservation 33 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We loved staying at Sara's. The place easily big enough for 4 adults and really close to both the CBD and surrounding Sydney. She welcomed us and made as sure we had everything we needed , and even let us stay late on Sunday. Definitely would stay again if back in Sydney!

Sarah property was everything we were looking for, clean, spacious, comfortable and located on a very good location. Definitely recommend anyone to stay there. Very suitable for couples and small families. The host was also very friendly.
Sara was a great host and has a great place to stay. Great view of the city.

Sara was just lovely. She was very quick and accurate in her communication and the apartment is just perfect. You fee that the people living there really love living there, as we did. The view is to die for. Our kids loved all the toys they could play with.

Thanks for letting us stay at your place.  The visitor parking was full everyday we stayed.  So was a bit concerning during the 2 hour limit times during the week.  The light in your daughters room being out was disappointing and the lamp bulb blew on our last night.  Otherwise we had a great time and loved staying.  Close to tram and local shops.  Would definitely recommend and stay again.
Excellent communication service and provided a lovely accomodation. Would recommend.
Sara's place has an incredible set-up, view, and more importantly, a kind and wonderful host!

Sara's home was just perfect for us. Large 2 bedroom, in a great location with views of the city. It was clean and comfortable with little touches like Netflix and Wifi. Sara's was a great communicator.. thanks so much 5 out of 5! Will def stay again next time in Sydney.

host.host_about: 保留香港本地特色,本土文化,是現時好多香港人要做的｡我想現在的年輕人感受一下以前的唐樓/板間房的感覺,同一屋簷下,互助互勉,這個是我的理念,感謝支持~Reserved Local specialties, local culture, is now a lot of Hong Kong people do. I think today's young people feel between former tenement buildings / board room feel, under the same roof, and help one another, this is my idea, thanks to the support ~

reviews.comments: I stayed for 4 nights, the first day I got a map and a quick explanation of the city and the neighborhood, so I was quickly in my way to see the city. The neighborhood were safe in day and night, and very well located, one block to metro station, two blocks from Nathan Rd and shopping right in the doorstep of the building. The place is very clean and well equipped with air condition and hot water. The rules are very clear and simple to follow. I loved my stay.

Very nice hosts. Nice location in the middle of all "hustle & bustle" of Hong Kong. Clean and neat room, bathrooms and common areas. Not so much privacy in the bedroom, as the walls don't go all the way to the ceiling and a bit noisy from the street. But all in all great value for money and a great place to meet new friends. Highly recomended if you are the social type.

This was my first Air BNB experience so I didn't really know what to expect. With that being said, I was very impressed with Carmen and Charlie as they were both extremely accommodating and friendly.

To begin, my flight was actually pushed back and so instead of arriving around 7pm, my friend and I ended up arriving 2 hours later (9pm). We mentioned this to Carmen & Charlie immediately and both were very understanding and even picked us up at the bus station because they were worried that we were going to get lost :) #YAY. In addition, both hosts were very helpful and gave us a map/directions so that we could get around HK. They gave us honest feedback on what places to go to when one travels to HK and gave recommendations on places to eat and shop.

In terms of location, we stayed in Mongkok and the apartment was actually right in the middle of ladies market, which were both convenient and lively. The apartment was clean and rules of the home were reiterated upon arrival, which served as a good reminder. 

The room itself was definitely large enough for 2 people to live in, but I may be biased because my friend and I are both rather small and we enjoy the simplicity of a smaller room. If you're a larger person, you might enjoy a bigger room but I don't think large rooms are very common in HK to begin with. By the way, there is no elevator to get to the 4th floor (where you will be staying) so I hope you packed light and is ready for a short workout everyday!

The description that Carmen and Charlie provided on their profile was definitely accurate but I think additional information might be helpful such as the number of showers (they had 2!), number of actual rooms they had, as well as the high potential of living with other fellow Air BNB'ers (as this might be a turn off for some people who are looking into this space).

Other than that, I loved living in this space and I would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to live in a traditional yet cute little home while staying in HK. Both Carmen and Charlie are super sweet and both tried their very best to make sure we enjoyed our stay. I plan on staying in touch with the both of them :)

The host is nice but we had issues with our agreement and she tried to over charge us which lead us to several awkward moments and unpleasant moments during out trip. We had to get Airbnb involved in the end to resolve the solution to our satisfactory. 

The location is in the ladies market which is very lively and close to the MTR station. The place has a nice clean shower. The rooms have zero privacy.

Her assistant Charlie is really friendly and helpful. He is usually at the hostel and is easy to contact when there are any concerns.

Carmen is a very nice host, though we were coming late due to the delayed flight, she was still there and waiting for us.

As for the room, it's really a unique experience; very old fashion, which is just like traditional HongKong style--- you can hear others' voice, you can even talk to them from your room! You can also make friends easily and share each other's experience, travel information...etc.

With brand new decoration, we feel the whole place is clean and tidy. Downstairs environment is convenient for everything, especially no need to walk too long for food hunting.

Very good for backpackers, but with heavy luggage, then it's a good opportunity to train muscles. 4F/5F will make people breathless. Therefore, try to be light if want to stay there!

謝謝Carmen這一次的接待

作為一位背包客,乾淨､舒適､簡單Carmen都細心的照顧到了
很高興第一次使用Airbnb就有很好的體驗,下次來香港會優先考慮!

新年快樂,希望這一年我們都有很好的開始 ^ ^"
位于旺角波鞋街,晚上依然很热闹,不会担心回得玩了就会街上没人的问题｡楼下饮食摊位､超市､万宁等商店一应俱全,附近还有书店､电子产品店等,非常方便｡Carmen人很好,非常有礼貌,交谈很愉快,希望再有机会去香港入住她家｡
很不错的房子,很有香港的风味,一切的设备都很齐全｡而且能认识到不同地区的朋友,是很好的经历,希望下次还能来住｡房东Carmen人很好,有问必答,可以向她多多咨询
房东非常热情平易近人~屋子离地铁站也十分近~就在通蔡街附近~第一次去找不到~房东还亲自来接我,真是太感动了
Thank you Carmen,I have a nice memory of hk because of you

very near to the subway station, right at the heart of mongkok busy street.  totally recommend this place to stay for those who like sneakers; it's just 2 blocks away from the sneakers street. you will never get hungry here - plenty of restaurants and stalls around the neighborhood. carmen is a very nice host! this place is clean and i especially like the bathroom, haha! those who like vintage building would love this place. the only one down side is that it is at the 4th floor with no elevator so it would be better to pack light. :)
房东的图片感觉很温馨,象家一样｡
位置很好!但是房间是两个人一起的,房间和房间之间没有完全隔开,晚上回去晚了会不好意思开灯,就只能摸黑了｡但是只是睡一觉不影响啦!总体还是不错的~
Carmen很耐心,人也好｡房子位置很棒,是自己隔成的三个小隔间,干净､整洁｡缺点就是门不能反锁,女生会觉得有点害怕;淋浴花洒是坏的,会掉下来｡
下次有机会去香港还会继续入住这里的 房东太好啦
很棒很貼心
有史以来最糟糕的一次民宿,没有之一屁大的地方,三个房间,木式推门,晚上想上个厕所都要很小心的拉门,不然会发出很大的噪声!隔音也没有的!房间脏乱不堪,床还没有看守所的大,跟住在火柴盒里一样,腿都伸不直.!男房东态度恶劣,凶神恶煞一样的!隔壁一个黑人整晚不睡觉,坐在客厅,开着灯,上面都透光的,关键是狐臭很严重!!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
非常干净!很喜欢!!下次还会来!
在这里认识了很多不同国家的朋友大家一起出去玩~厕所超干净,如果房间与房间之间顶上不是镂空的会给人感觉更安全的

neighborhood_overview: With plenty of shops, cafés and pubs, Downtown means having access to a diverse range of restaurants, exclusive boutiques and plenty of entertainment to suit everyone’s needs. Serviced by the Guy-Concordia metro station, this area is host to a plethora of tasty restaurants like Kazu, free-trade coffee shops such as Café Myriade and plenty of bars like the Sir Winston Churchill and Hurley’s Irish pub. Up the street, the Forum Entertainment Complex offers movies, arcades and bowling lanes as well as the Alexis Nihon shopping mall. Don’t miss the Montreal Museum of Fine Arts, the lively Crescent Street or the Jardin de Sculpture for a cool look at the city. Montreal has never looked so good!
transit: Metro Station : Guy-Concordia or Lucien L'Allier
access: Vous avez accès au logement complet.
interaction: Informations Séjour 1) Heure d’arrivée  Veuillez prendre note que les heures d’arrivés se déroulent à partir de 15h jusqu’à 21h maximum. Aucune exception ne sera tolérée à moins d’une autorisation contraire. Votre heure d’arrivée par défaut est 15h.  Un agent vous accueillera à l’unité afin de vous remettre les clés et effectuer un état des lieux. Afin de pouvoir vous accueillir dans les meilleures conditions, il est essentiel de convenir d’une heure d’arrivée approximative avec votre représentant.  Dans le cas où votre heure d’arrivée dépasse 21h, veuillez vous adresser à votre représentant afin de voir si des exceptions peuvent s’appliquer. ------ 2) À votre arrivée    Afin d’éviter toute attente inutile, nous vous demandons d’appeler l’un de nos représentant 45 minutes avant votre arrivée à l’unité (lors de votre arrivée à l’aéroport de Montréal, ou une fois que vous aurez passé les douanes canadiennes). Veuillez prendre note qu’une flexibilité de 30 minutes supplémentaires à l’heur

Looking for a perfect stay with a host that understands your needs? 

Welcome to Loftel and Simplissimmo, Montreal based companies established over 10 years ago, that are operated by young and motivated team with a strong and valuable hospitality experience. 

We manage more than 200 properties and are fully dedicated to make every client’s stay unique and memorable. We’re always there to help, answer questions and provide the best services. So don’t hesitate and go ahead, and challenge us :)

reviews.comments:
This appartement was really nice and huge, and Simplissimo was great. 
Everything was ready when I arrived. No hassle everything was easy. Also the air-conditioning was turned on, the internet speed was fast everything needed was there. Great location close to St Catherines with all the shops. I would really recommend this place and Simplissimo too.

Cheers

Simplissimmo was helpful and accommodating throughout my stay, and the apartment was excellent. The space was clean, comfortable, and in a great location. The closest metro stop was only a short walk away, so it was easy to make use of Montreal's wonderful public transit system. Simplissimmo made my stay in Montreal simple, comfortable, and relaxing. I can't recommend this apartment enough.

neighborhood_overview: When you are relaxing at Poipu Shores in a beautiful oceanfront vacation rental, it will become immediately obvious why this is one of the most sought-after locations on Kauai. This beautiful oceanfront retreat has breathtaking views where you can watch the turtles swim below daily. Located on Kauai`s beautiful South Shore, Poipu Shores has one of the best views on the Island of Kauai.  Transient accommodations tax id number: w (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
notes: Grab the towels, umbrellas and beach chairs and take a short 5-minute walk to Brennecke Beach, a hot spot for turtle watching and bodyboarding. A large grassy area with picnic tables and covered pavilions connects Brennecke to popular Poipu Beach. Along with snorkeling, swimming and surfing, Poipu Beach also has a small baby beach protected from the waves that`s perfect for kids. If you’re looking for a resort-style stay, we have you covered. For an additional fee you’ll have uninhibited access to the Poipu Beach Athletic Club, home to a fitness center, hot tub and sparkling pool with a waterslide and sand-bottomed kiddie section – everything you need to work out, cool off or wind down. For more information on the Poipu Beach Athletic Club: (Website hidden by Airbnb) MEMBERSHIPS ARE LIMITED, PLEASE LET US KNOW  IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO SECURE A MEMBERSHIP PRIOR TO YOUR ARRIVAL.
transit: We recommend renting a car for your stay, however, Kauai does have public transportation.
access: FREE PARKING FREE WIFI POOL
interaction: 1. Pacific Ocean Front and Center: You can’t get more oceanfront than this! The condo sits right on the shore, with a roomy lanai that actually stretches over the water. Shared with the condo next door, the 500 square foot lanai has plenty of seating for watching the sea turtles play below. During the winter months, you`ll also get to watch the humpback whale migration. 2. Air-Conditioning: Both the living room and bedroom have air-conditioning for those extra steamy Hawaiian days when the ocean breezes can`t cool you down. 3. Gorgeous Pool: When you need a break from the sand and the salt, head to the pretty heated pool sat right over the water. In the evenings, gather with your fellow guests in the grassy area next to the pool to watch the spectacular sunsets. You will receive check in directions after final payment is made. The property has a lockbox and you will be able to go directly to the property to check in after 3p.m. on your check in date.
house_rules: 1. Great Vacation Retreats is not affiliated with the onsite management. Please contact us directly with any questions, maintenance issues or concierge requests. 2. Hawaii has a new smoking law which allows smoking only in designated areas outside of any building, 20 feet away from doors. Our units and lanais are all non-smoking. Please use the designated areas if you wish to smoke. They are usually located in the parking lot of the building. There is a $300 fine for smoking in our properties and the State of Hawaii may also impose a fine for not smoking in the designated areas. 3. Please wash off all sand from beach gear and your body before re-entering the units. Outside showers are available at most beaches and outside of most properties. Please do not hang beach towels, swimsuits, etc. from lanai railings.  4. Because we are in a tropical environment, there are insects. Please keep all food covered and stored properly. This will help to discourage roaches, ants, geckos and spiders

host.host_about: We are a boutique property management company on the islands of Kauai and the Big Island. We are here to help you plan your Hawaiian Experience. All of our properties include free WiFi, free parking, fully equipped kitchens and more great amenities. Our team checks our account very frequently to make sure all of your questions are answered as soon as possible. Once on island we are available to help you 24 hours/day. Need a rental car? Where is the best place for a sunset dinner? Where do the locals go? Let us know how we can help you experience the vacation of your dreams!

reviews.comments: The location was extraordinary, with the deck cantilevered over the ocean, we were able to watch turtles feeding throughout the day.  The crashing of the waves were the best part of this location, as it lulled us to sleep each night.  Other guests were respectful and quiet during suggested quiet hours.  Challenging to find at first (in the dark), but once we got the hang of the route, a great location to serve as 'base camp'.  The amenities of the condo were adequate (plenty of bath shampoo/body wash/conditioner, toilet paper/paper towels, etc.)  Laundry supplies were provided to wash two loads, so we had to buy more (especially after hiking the north shore one muddy day).  The common area pool was wonderful and a great place to hang out and watch for whales.  The management was friendly and helpful.  We would definitely return here on another trip to Kauai.

Amy, as usual comes through with an awesome one! 
This is an amazing place to stay.  Whales passing by every day...
Turtles swimming under our private deck that sits over the ocean, literally. One of the best places I have stayed!!

Our stay was unfortunately disappointing. The place lived up to our expectations as far as view and location, but unfortunately fell short when it came to cleanliness. 

We ended up staying two out of the nine nights we had reserved. Fortunately we were able to find a clean and lovely place to stay the remainder of our holiday. The transition was stressful and we were charged the cleaning fee despite the fact that was our major issue. They rental agency offered to send people to re clean while we were there but unfortunately issues like black mold in the tub cannot easily be cleaned. 

Wish I could have given a better review but this was our experience. Working with Amy's team prior to our trip was easy. They responded quickly to my e mails and I appreciated that.

Good instructions were given and the unit was easy to access.  
Right on the Poipu shore.

Everything was really wonderful. Lots of information in advance of my trip and as my arrival got closer. The setup with the management firm meant that the apartment was available even when I arrived a few hours early. 
The apartment itself was really great, it's hard to say that it had a good view as it was located right in the middle of the view. Wonderful to be so close to the ocean. 
I really couldn't have found a better location for a much needed getaway.

Hi Amy, What a wonderful way to spend time on the Island! We have traveled for many years to Hawaii and we stay in Resorts. This was our first experience with condominium living. We loved it. Coming home everyday to a place that was ours, quiet , private and a meal prepared by us. The ceramic tile flooring felt wonderful on our feet and the furnishing felt very comfortable. 
Entertaining here in the evening was easy and fun with the convenient BBQ area nearby. 
We loved falling asleep to the crashing waves. 
Mahalo for our first Airbnb stay. We are convinced this is the only way to stay Hawaii now ;-) !

Our stay in Koloa could not have been better.  The condo was perfectly situated and stocked with everything we needed.  The lanai was a huge bonus and we spent many hours enjoying the views of sea turtles below, whales in the distance, and even a few spinner dolphins - not to mention the stunning sunsets.  We enjoyed many activities, but still had such a relaxing time.  Thanks for the nice bottle of wine for celebrating our anniversary.  We certainly hope to come back and stay here again.
Awesome vacation rental!

Gorgeous views and amazingly close to the ocean. Location is perfect - right down the street from a few restaurants and shopping centers. 

Pool is fantastic! Nice and warm.

Perfect size for a couple.

Well stocked kitchen.

Washer dryer was a HUGE life saver.

Rental office staff very friendly.

Constructive feedback:
The door handle needs to be replaced. Worn and difficult to use. 

One window didn't shut.

Was about a 4/5 for cleanliness. Some tables weren't too clean and we found a dead bug under the counter.
The best place to go on a honeymoon!

The condo was clean and the kitchen was well-equipped.  The lanai right next to the ocean was perfect for sunrise and sunset watching.  The hosts were very friendly and responsive.  

It was great to come home to a quiet spot on your private lanai to relax and enjoy the ocean views.  A world of difference compared to staying at a large resort regardless of the hotel's star rating.
Very good!

We LOVED our stay in Poipu Shores. The views from the balcony were amazing. I loved watching the turtles. This location is great for exploring the canyons, south shore beaches and you're convenient to Lihue!

Poipu Shores 101 B truly is the most beautiful place I have ever seen. The views from the condo and private Lanai are absolutely breathtaking. You don't just have an ocean view, you are ON TOP of the ocean. Everything about this place is magical and I will definitely be staying there again.

We loved staying at 101B through Great Vacation Retreats! It was a perfect place for our Honeymoon. It had the perfect amount of space, and was very clean and comfortable. The private deck (shared by the room next door) was such a treat. We saw turtles below the deck everyday and even caught a glimpse of reef fish. We would definitely book through them again on our next trip to Kauai!

This is a great place and we loved our stay! It's less than a 10 minute walk down to Poipu Beach and you can't beat the views! We enjoyed many breakfasts, dinners, cocktails and morning coffees out on the deck. The deck is shared with only one other unit so it's super private and exclusive. It was the envy of other guests at the complex! The pool is also right above the sea cliffs which is cool on its own but is also very well maintained and great for afternoon dips while listening to the sound of waves!

My boyfriend and I had a wonderful time at GVR's Poipu Shores 101B! The best aspect, of course, is the oceanfront lanai. We spent most of our time out there watching sea turtles swimming nearby or enjoying a glass of wine at sunset. Overall, the unit is exactly as pictured. The folks at GVR are also very responsive which we appreciated. A few items worth noting - the space wasn't as clean as I'd expect (floor of the bath tub is stained from so much use and front door handle needs replacing, there were also stains on the pillow cases of the bedding). There is also no cell service in the unit. This was difficult for us initially as there was a storm during our first day/night which disconnected the wifi from 3pm until about 10am the next morning (a fairly long time after the rain had stopped). We got our iPad and my boyfriend's cellphone to connect to the wifi afterwards, but my cellphone was never able to connect. A bit inconvenient for me, but since we had the iPad it wasn't detrimental to our trip. Nonetheless, we enjoyed our stay very much and would recommend to anyone. The lanai can't be beat!

The location is wonderful. The large sea turtles and big waves crash below the deck.  It is a few blocks from poipu beach.  There are many restaurants a short drive away.  This is about 25 minutes from the airport.  The condo itself is cute, efficient, and peaceful.

We didn't book Poipu Shores 101B originally.  We booked a different condo managed by GVR, but as soon as we landed in Kauai, we got a call stating that the condo was no longer available.  Poipu Shores 101B was offered as an alternative.  Poipu Shores had lots of issues for us, especially since we were traveling with a toddler.  We ended up leaving after one night and found a better place down the road for the rest of our vacation.  

Poipu Shores 101B is probably ok if you're just looking for a comfortable bed, not traveling with a child, and can put up with a fairly run down condo with no cell service.  The pool was very dirty also.

Our main issue with GVR is that they listed (and confirmed) a unit that wasn't even available to rent.  That was very frustrating to deal with during our vacation, especially since we were traveling with a toddler.

Great location by the sea. Turtles, whales and close to Poipu beach. The only negative is the sound of the waves hitting the rocks outside the windows made getting to sleep a challenge and early rise when the sun came up due to the bamboo blinds.

Location is beautiful but the condo was not clean and was full of thousands and thousands of dead bugs.   We had to scramble last minute to find new accommodates cause it was too disgusting to stay there.

The view is spectacular. We loved sitting out on the lanai.  We saw about 5 turtles, stings and dolphins from the lanai. 

You are walking distance to the beach  which was nice. 

The ac was broken when we arrived but the hosts were on top of it and had it fixed in no time.

You must stay at 101B Condo - this place was truly amazing. It was very clean, GREAT location to nearby beaches, snorkeling, food, and local attractions and we had all the amenities we needed. We woke up every morning, ate breakfast on the private deck/balcony and watched the sea turtles right outside the door to the condo - pure happiness and awe inspiring!  The hospitality was warm and inviting and Great Vacation Retreats's were so responsive with communication.

Guests agree to take good care of the p

host.host_about:
Welcome to your one stop for holiday accommodation in & around Bondi Beach. 
We offer a selection of beautifully furnished holiday homes with modern comforts & spacious living areas. All homes are immaculately kept & located in prime locations near the city & beach with public transportation nearby.

Our holiday rentals include complimentary Wi-Fi, luxury bedding and much more.

Perfect for guests looking for a beautiful home away from home. We invite you to enjoy Sydney in one of ours.

See you at the beach!
Gina & the team

Bondi Beach Holiday Homes

name: VB204-Spacious Upgraded Condo w/Partial Ocean View
summary: Vista Waikoloa B204 - This nicely furnished and recently upgraded two bedroom, two and a half bathroom unit is located on the second floor and it can accommodate up to four people comfortably.  The master bedroom has a king bed and the second bedroom has two twin beds.   Amenities include central air conditioning, ceiling fans for natural ventilation, spacious covered lanai, fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, washer and dryer with detergent provided, complimentary WIFI access, iron and ironing board and hair dryer. The Vista Waikoloa complex is centrally located within the Waikoloa Beach Resort & is within walking distance to shops, restaurants & Anaeho'omalu Bay (known as A-Bay).  Built in 1991, these condos are spacious & larger than most properties.  All guests who stay at the Vista Waikoloa will have access to use the communal lap pool (heated), two hot tubs, large covered pavilion with gas BBQ's (first come, first serve basis), fitness room and business center with access to

notes: The State of Hawaii requires that we collect 14.69% tax on the rent (which is INCLUDED in the price).
house_rules: South Kohala Management (SKM) manages residential vacation rental properties that are privately owned by individuals. By reserving a property you are entering into a rental contract with SKM that is governed by the laws of the state of Hawaii and the Hawaii Landlord Tenant Code (HRS 467).  STAY RULES -Registration: Guests are required to register at our designated Resort Check-in Office, open daily from 9:00am – 5:00pm. You will be asked to present your drivers license or other form of ID. A photocopy will be taken at registration.  -Maximum Occupants: Each of our properties has a strict maximum sleeps capacity. Guests are required to provide the accurate number of people who will be staying in the unit at the time of booking. If the occupants exceeds the limit, you may be required to rent an additional unit or to pay a per person daily surcharge. In some cases you may not be allowed to stay in the unit if the maximum capacity is exceeded. Violation of this policy may also result in th

host.host_about: South Kohala Management is a full service property management company founded on the Big Island over 35 years ago. We are a family-run company and we strive to provide our guests with the most desirable vacation properties, personal service and top-notch housekeeping. We provide on-site resort offices and a professional linen service for a hotel-quality experience in a privately owned vacation property. Don't leave your Big Island vacation to chance and book with us, the local experts!

name: Old Montreal Elegant 1BR, Business & Leisure
summary: World-class pied-à-terre suites featuring the ultimate in luxury, security and great value. Sitting on the sofa or in your favorite chair next to the electric fireplace, you can catch up on international business news or work on your laptop.
description: World-class pied-à-terre suites featuring the ultimate in luxury, security and great value. Sitting on the sofa or in your favorite chair next to the electric fireplace, you can catch up on international business news or work on your laptop.

host.host_about:
Greetings to this wonderful Airbnb community! :)

I have been blessed to travel all around the world and experience many cultures! This has allowed me to understand much better travelers and I my passion is to take a good care of your accommodation!

Speak English, French and Spanish! :D
We would be pleased to host you when you come to Montreal for business, relocation or leisure! 

Thank you for checking our apartments and we hope to have you soon!

Alejandro.

reviews.comments: Localização excelente. Ao lado da Notre Dame e da Montreal antiga. Em frente ao Palais de congress. Para dias frios existe acesso rápido para o RESO que leva até o centro Desjardins onde há um mercado. Fomos em um casal com um bebê. Apartamento super equipado. Sentimos falta apenas de um sofá para o fim do dia.

Uncomplicated way to get the keys at the welcome desk near the Appartement. Alejandro was fast in responding if we had questions. Parking possible in-house for a reasonable price. The Appartement was really clean and bright and had everything from pans to chopping board ... The location is perfect for visiting old Montréal.
Unfortunately the bed was a bit hard and shaky, if someone turns around and you could hear the fridge and air condition during nighttime.
Despite these two things, we really enjoyed our stay in Montréal.
Loved the place and it's location. Very close to everything.

This place made our stay in Montreal beyond perfect. What a perfect location and such a great experience. 
Highly recommend!

Great apartment/suite in a perfect location on the edge of Old Montreal, walking distance to both downtown, Notre Dame, and all other sights in Old Montreal. There was a Metro stop literally 2-3 minutes away, which was convenient for getting nearly anywhere else in the city. 

The apartment itself was clean, spacious, and comfortable. It looked and felt like a hotel suite (was even in the Embassy Suites building, I believe). 18th floor with a nice view of Mont Royal (could see the cross out of our window). Gym on site and onsite underground parking available (though at an additional charge of $30/day). Laundry in the apartment was an added benefit. 

Alejandro was responsive leading up to the trip and very friendly. It was a bit harder to reach him during our stay, but he works with a company (Corporate Stays) that was reachable during their business hours, and Corporate Stays was able to assist with any of our questions/concerns.

Though the apartment is a bit pricey, I thought the location was excellent and the space was comfortable. Thanks Alejandro and Corporate Stays!

Stayed there for a month, perfect location in Old Montreal, close to everything you need especially the metro station. The place had an hotel feel to it and view was great (I was on the 20th floor). I had some issues with the WiFi but they give you a number to call for customers service and issue was quickly fixed.

Managed by a corporate rental company. Key pick up is at another location 7 min walk away. They request photo ID for keys. Building is primarily short term rentals. 2 minute walk to Notre Dame, Metro. Great location.  Unit was clean. Front door was off its hinges so hard to open close. Kitchen Cabinet hinges also broken. Bathtub turns into a swimming pool after 2 min. No microwave. Wifi didn't work. Layout is like a 600sq/ft condo. Great space. Clean appliances, Good cable package. King sized bed. Lots of pillows, very quiet at night. Location, Location, Location! Would go back and hope the bathtub was unclogged. :)

name: Oh-So-Close to Waikiki Beach Condo
summary: Proudly featured in Hawaii Home + Remodeling magazine. Stay barely two minutes walk from Waikiki Beach! Our stylish two bedroom condo is on the 2nd floor of a secure building with everything that Waikiki has to offer on your doorstep, starting with an ABC store downstairs. Lap up the luxuries of a reserved parking space, two bathrooms, split-system A/C in the living room, an internal washing machine and steam dryer and a beautiful shaded balcony to relax on.
space: Guests describe our condo as beautifully appointed, spacious and clean. The space was completely re-designed and renovated in September 2015 and has a casual-chic modern feel. While the building is located within Waikiki’s resort zone, it’s predominantly residential giving guests the opportunity to “feel like a local”.  We’ve filled the apartment with all the essentials for a stress-free and memorable vacation. Highlights include a large split-system air conditioner, fast Wi-Fi, Smart TVs with cable and a Graco Pack 'n Play Playard (travel cot).  Save money by preparing meals in the fully-equipped kitchen with premium appliances including a Whirlpool fridge-freezer, Samsung glass-top electric oven and a Bosch dishwasher. The usual suspects are found in the cupboards including rice cooker, toaster, kettle and coffee maker. We haven't forgotten the necessities either; salt and pepper, olive oil, tea, sugar and coffee.  Retire into cosy bedrooms with high calibre beds (one King Bed and on
description: Proudly featured in Hawaii Home + Remodeling magazine. Stay barely two minutes walk from Waikiki Beach! Our stylish two bedroom condo is on the 2nd floor of a secure building with everything that Waikiki has to offer on your doorstep, starting with an ABC store downstairs. Lap up the luxuries of a reserved parking space, two bathrooms, split-system A/C in the living room, an internal washing machine and steam dryer and a beautiful shaded balcony to relax on. Guests describe our condo as beautifully appointed, spacious and clean. The space was completely re-designed and renovated in September 2015 and has a casual-chic modern feel. While the building is located within Waikiki’s resort zone, it’s predominantly residential giving guests the opportunity to “feel like a local”.  We’ve filled the apartment with all the essentials for a stress-free and memorable vacation. Highlights include a large split-system air conditioner, fast Wi-Fi, Smart TVs with cable and a Graco Pack 'n Play Playard
neighborhood_overview: The condo is located on Paoakalani Avenue in the heart of Waikiki. It’s half a block from the best end of Waikiki Beach, right by the calm waters of the break wall. Duke’s Statue, considered central Waikiki, is a 7-minute stroll away. Kaimana, Queens and Diamond Head beaches are less touristy and within easy reach of the condo. Waikiki’s buzz of activity begins on the doorstep, the building is blessed to have an ABC store, cafes, coffee shops including a Starbucks, food trucks, restaurants, bars and retail shopping with seconds. Guests are well positioned to visit Honolulu Zoo, Waikiki Aquarium, Kapiolani Park, Diamond Head Crater and KCC Farmers Markets (Saturday 7:00-11:00am). Diamond Head Road and Monsarrat Avenue are streets within walking distance that offer spectacular ocean lookouts and local neighborhood shops.  Mopeds, scoot coupes (two person mopeds), scooters and bicycles can be hired from the condo’s side street at Hawaiian Style Rentals. Enjoy tropical cocktails and local
notes: This condo is in the heart of buzzing Waikiki and does receive traffic noise. We provide earplugs to assist, but would not recommend staying if you are a light sleeper. Room rates are inclusive of the Hawaii general excise tax (4.5% on Oahu) and transient accommodations tax (10.25% statewide).
transit: The seaside city of Waikiki is accessible on foot, and the key areas of attraction are within a comfortable walking distance from the condo. Waikiki Beach is less than 2-minutes easy walk.  Hiring a vehicle is a fantastic way to explore the rest of the island, as long as you are comfortable driving on the right side of the road. Rental cars can be picked up at Daniel K. Inouye International Airport (formerly Honolulu International Airport) or in Waikiki. There is a Hertz Car Rental depot at Hyatt Regency Waikiki Beach Resort at 2424 Kalakaua Avenue, 7-minutes walk from the apartment.  Our stay includes free undercover parking, which is a huge bonus because parking in Waikiki is expensive. Hotels and parking stations will charge between USD20.00-USD40.00 per night.  Shared or private shuttles can be pre-booked to take you from the Airport to Waikiki hotels. The closest hotel to our condo is next door at “Hyatt Place Waikiki”. Taxis are available on arrival at the Airport and are flagged
access: Stay includes one undercover car space. There is fob-key entry to the building and 2nd floor where guests have access to the entire two bedroom apartment. We provide two sets of fob-keys for our guests convenience.
interaction: Ashlee and Keli'i are remote Superhosts available 24-7 via the Airbnb app, text message or direct phone call. Should a problem arise during your stay they are eager to solve it as quickly as possible.
house_rules: Quiet time after 10:00pm.

host.host_about: I'm Ash, a Hawaii-loving Aussie living on Oahu. I work in the tourism industry, enjoy being an Airbnb Superhost of three apartments in Waikiki and also run a Hawaii travel site called "The Hawaii Admirer" @hawaiiadmirer. Keli'i is a local Hawaiian girl who helps co-hosts the properties. We will always ensure our guests are comfortable and are having the best stay and experience possible!

reviews.comments:
We really enjoyed our stay in this Waikiki unit! Ashlee provided great instructions on how to get there and a detailed home manual outlining everything we needed to know.

The unit was immaculate with modern décor, we especially liked the kitchen with dishwasher, washer/dryer, huge fridge and great stove. Both bathrooms were nice and had good water pressure.

We loved coming home after a day out, it was like returning to our own little oasis (awesome air-conditioning!). The balcony is large, perfect for relaxing outside enjoying a few bevies. There is a lovely "sky view" and shades if you want privacy.

The BEST part was the location, it is literally a ½ block to the beach – so close! It was also really convenient having an ABC Store next door, we had easy access to food, drinks, ice, necessities and items like snorkelling gear. We found a great spot around the corner that rents mopeds and bicycles. We’d also recommend the Tiki Bar at the end of the street for great Hawaiian entertainment in the evenings.

All in all we were super happy with this choice and we hope to return again one day.

My family and I loved this place for our 5 day stay in November.  The instructions (which we were sent before-hand) were spot-on and we were able to easily find the place, get the key, and get into our room.  The place itself was modern and clean.  The amenities were all modern and everything that we needed was available in the place (from dishes, to cleaning products, to cookware).

I'll admit that the place was a bit loud at night but that was due to the fact that it's right in the middle of the action and we didn't mind.  We'd definitely stay here again.

This accommodation was great. Ashlee is a good host, made booking and check -in very easy. In a really good and convenient location right by the beach and strip. And comes with a parking spot which was fantastic. Condo newly renovated, has all the necessities needed. Very modern and comfy. Very clean. Great home away from

Great House! Cosy, modern, clean and two bathroom, extremely convenient beds (I really loved), large TV, nice washing machine...
everything is perfect!!

We really enjoyed staying at this large and cozy condo. Fully equipped kitchen and laundry are very comfortable for us. 

Ashlee is so kind to react our request very quickly and sincerely.

I was staying here with my baby, so the noise from outside was a little bit loud, but after 11:00PM it's quiet to sleep well.

I will definitely return to this condo next year!! Thank you!!!

AMAZING- this is how I would describe our stay of 4 adults (my husband and I plus 2 college aged daughters) at Ash' place. The condo is very well set up in regards to all what one need, and brand-new renovated. The kitchen has all that a chef needs to whip up a meal, and a big plus of this unit are the washer and dryer right in the unit. Did I also mention that you are a 1 minute walk away from the beach? And that  there is free parking and WiFi included? There is really nothing I can say bad about this place, previous reviewers mentioned that it was a bit loud, but we felt that this is the "supersmall price" that you pay to be right in the middle of the action.

Now finally let me spend a few sentences on Ashlee. She was amazing from the get-go. I had not done AirBnB before this stay, and she could have not made this experience any more amazing, smooth and fun. Took all the anxiety and worry out of it. We received a very detailed pre-arrival booklet letting us know exactly how to get into the condo etc. I had a few logistical questions during our stay and Ashlee stayed on close contact the whole time. I really could have not asked for a better host.

I am looking forward to maybe coming back one day, and will end with a big Thank you- Bella

The apartments was really good, everything is exactly like at the photos. Also a very good location. Ashlee was great, we checked in easily, and she helped us with everything we needed. We are coming back for sure

We had a lovely stay in Ashlee's home in Waikiki. It was truly a great time. The home was newly renovated and very clean.  Exactly like the photos. We intend to stay with Ashlee every time we are in Waikiki. Home away from home

Ashlee was an amazing, responsive, and accommodating host! She was always quick to respond to any questions I had. Her condo was newly renovated with a modern feel and most importantly, very clean. The location was super convenient for us since we were spending most of our time outside of Waikiki. It afforded quick access to H1 via Kapahulu Ave. The free parking, wifi, and washer/dryer were great perks since most hotels in Waikiki charge extra for those. One warning: due to the location, the unit is not exactly quiet. In the morning, even with the windows closed, we heard tour buses and garbage trucks. It's a minor complaint in an otherwise wonderful experience. I will definitely keep this property in mind for my next trip to Oahu!
Ash was a great host, she was very quick to respond when questions were asked. The condo was clean and in a great location. Walking distance to the main strip. I highly recommend this place.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Wonderful place exactly as described, right by the Waikiki strip near everything you would need and want.  We spent a week here with my family for a wedding.  It was easy to get to from the airport, and an easy place to drive to anywhere you wanted on the island.  

Just as described it does get busy and noisy at night and morning, so if you are a light sleeper, would recommed ear plugs. Which we did. Worked like a charm. 

Ashlee is great with communication. Was very responsive if you needed anything or something was wrong. 

Overall, would highly recommend this place.

This was a wonderful place to stay! A group of 5 adults stayed in this condo, and we had plenty of space. The bedrooms were both beautiful, the beds were comfortable, the apartment was clean and intuitively organized. Having a washer/dryer in the unit was so useful. The welcome guide gave us plenty of ideas on where to eat and go around the area. Ashlee was super communicative, constantly making sure we were settled and happy. This apartment was a stone's throw from the beach, and from awesome restaurants. The ONLY thing (and I want to stress, this is not a negative! More something to be aware of) is the noise level outside the apartment at all times of day. There were constant tour buses and trucks loading and unloading at the neighboring hotels. It did wake us up quite early in the morning, but hey, then we got to get an early start to our day! My suggestion is if you're sensitive to noise when you sleep, bring ear plugs. I'm sure this problem isn't unique to this unit, it's a city so something to be expected. It didn't detract from the wonderful time we had in this beautiful unit. Thank you so much, Ashlee! We will be back!

Our family of 5 (me, my husband, elderly but spry parents in their 60's, and our 2 yr old) stayed in Ashlee's condo and we had a wonderful time. Ashlee is such a responsive and helpful host that she made this Airbnb booking a breeze. As previous reviewers have mentioned, you will hear noise but please keep in mind that you are in Waikiki and there is noise everywhere. Ear plugs were conveniently provided which my husband used and I just played some background sleep music which solved our problem since we are very light sleepers anyway. There was a small issue upon check-in with the air-conditioner condenser tube dripping water off the outdoor lanai (which didn't affect us directly), but Ashlee took care of it immediately while we were having fun at the beach and when we came back we were pleasantly  greeted with fresh pastries from a local bakery that Ashlee had left for us! Awesome right? 
    The condo was as pictured, very clean (I didn't have the instant urge to sanitize and wipe everything down when I walked in), and had a well designed use of space. We didn't feel cramped at all and loved having the new washer & dryer to use so that we didn't have to lug tons of dirty laundry back home. 
    The condo is conveniently located near everything and we had a blast walking a few minutes to "The Pool" which is a barricaded area of beach that is very safe for little babies/toddlers/ and anyone who doesn't prefer to swim in the open ocean with waves. 
  Another thing to note was that the condo was well stocked with many of the necessities and this may seem trivial, but nice toilet paper, soft bath towels, & Tide detergent were provided! With hotels cutting back we've stayed at 4 & 5 star resorts recently where they provide what seems like sand paper for bathroom tissue and off-brand detergent that doesn't clean very well. Obviously we usually and can easily buy these things ourselves, but small details such as these is what makes a stay distinguishable.  
   Overall, we would definitely recommend this condo due to the location, value, and Ashlee being such a warm, attentive, & great host. We look forward to coming back the next time we visit Waikiki. Thanks Ashlee for opening up your home to us and making our stay such a wonderful one!

Ashlee was extremely responsive and proactive to ensure our stay was  comfortable. The condo was perfect for what we were looking for, which was two couples who wanted walking access to Waikiki and close to the beach. They also offer a parking spot which is extremely helpful as we rented a car to take day trips to the other beaches.  There are two bedrooms, one of the beds is a Murphy bed. They also have two pullout beds located in the living room couch and ottoman. Both bathrooms are located in the bedrooms. Something to consider if you have people staying that aren't sleeping in the bedrooms. They will have to walk through a bedroom to use the restroom. I would also note that this condo is located in a very lively area. So it can be noisy on the streets. Ashlee does provide earplugs. Also there are no shades on the windows, so it is very open to natural light. Again, not an issue for our group as the sun does not rise in the areas the windows are, but if you are light sensitive sleeper, you may want to bring an eye mask. Overall the condo is really nice and modern. The appliances are all very new and all the furniture is comfortable and clean. They have AC and also a washer/dryer. You can tell Ashlee definitely pays attention to the property and cares about her guests.The location, quality, parking and space are extremely hard to find so close to Waikiki. I'd highly recommend staying here, and am planning on returning for my next trip.

This was our very first experience with AirBnB, and I must say Ashlee has converted us!   Communication leading up to our stay was quick, detailed & thorough.  The location of the unit is fantastic and so close to the beach, Starbucks, restaurants & nightlife.  We rented a car and having covered parking was also a huge benefit.  

The units decor was also extremely well done, the bed was super comfortable, there were tons of towels, free wifi etc.  Can't say enough how much we enjoyed our stay.  

The only small complaint was that you could hear street noise in the unit, but everything quieted down at night and neither of us had any trouble sleeping.  

Overall A!
A great host wit a great place
Ashlee was very responsive.  Her apartment is just as pictured in the photos - clean and includes everything you need for a wonderful stay.

Ashlee was a fabulous host, from the moment our booking was accepted to the day we left. Her communication was always quick and detailed. The apartment was fantastic, the location was amazing and everything we could have needed was provided. We were a family of five adults and made use of all the beds including both fold outs which turned out to be quite comfortable. The whole experience of staying in Honolulu was awesome, a massive thank you to Ashlee for the great place to stay!
Great vacation with a nice home from Ashlee,thanks a lot!

5 of us (3 adults and 2 children) stayed in Ashlee's apartment and we had a fantastic time! The place is modern with everything you need for a short stay, walking distance to the beach, includes a at park (which is a commodity in Waikiki!) and felt like home. Ashlee has thought of everything and was a pleasure to deal with. The apartment is prone to noise but is so close to the action and can easily be fixed by the ear buds provided. We didn't want to leave!

A nice newly renovated apartment. Excellent location that is convenient and quiet. Neighbours in the apartment are nice and almost non-existence. Finally, the place is clean and an excellent size for a family of 4, which makes it comfortable!

Ashlee was an outstanding host.  She followed up to make sure we arrived safely and got into the condo with ease.  Her condo was definitely as she described.  Excellent location, only a block away from the beach!  We had 6 people in our party including our 1 year old daughter and everyone fit comfortably.  She even provided a pack and play which made traveling with our baby so much easier.  We will definitely be back!  Thank you again Ashlee!

ashlee waa extremely helpful as well as responsive to all my questions before and during my stay. her condo is lovely and was nice to come home to after a long day at the beach. it did get noisy and my mom was complaining but she refused to use the earplugs provided so as far as i'm concerned her complaints don't count (; i used the plugs and slept right through all of it. also the location is amazing. i loved being so close to the beach and everything is in walking distance.

Ashlee was a wonderful host. She was communicative at every step of the process. Her home is beautifully appointed with lovely furniture, a very very comfortable couch, with brand new appliances and every little thing you might need or want (tide pods for the laundry, a good hair dryer, shampoo AND conditioner - even a bit of welcome chocolate!) The apartment is a great location for the beach, it is literally four minutes away...I would stay here again in a heart beat!

Ashlee was an outstanding host, all up to checking out. Very descriptive and smooth check-in. The house is as wonderful as shown/described in description, everything was fully equipped along with beach towels and toy bucket as well as a portacot if you're travelling with a child. Close to everything and easy to get around. Very minor thing to point out is the surrounding noise but why would waste your day sleeping in when you can get up early and explore. Like diamond head which is literally next to it, Manoa falls which is close by as well as the zoo. Best place to end our little family holiday in the states, will definitely come back and stay at Ashlee's.
Ashlee was an awsome host. The apartment was exactly as it is in the pictures, very new and clean. Location was great, about 5mins walk to the beach and shops. Would come back again!
Ashlee was eager and helpful with any questions we had.

체크인은 미리 보내준 메일 내용을 보고 쉽게 할수 있었구요 
위치는 와이키키에서 아주 가까웠어요. 아파트도 깨끗했고 주변 치안이 좋은편이고 주차시설과 세탁기 건조기가 있는점이 가장 맘에 들었어요
