The place was great especially the location. Also the designated parking was convenient. Washer/dryer was very useful after swimming. Thanks!!

Our last 3 nights in Hawaii were spent at Ashlee's place in Hononlulu.  The apartment is  set in the best location just a block from the beach.  We had a hire car so it was great to have the access of a parking bay.  It was a great size for 4 people and has everything you you could think of or need and was super clean.  Ashlee left very precise instructions on how to get into the apartment and how everything works so there was no need to contact her for anything.  The only downside was the noise but nothing you wouldn't expect staying in the heart of a bussling city.  I would definitely recommend staying  here and would love to stay here again when i come back to Honolulu next year.

Ashlee was an amazing host, communicating with us and making sure we had everything needed for a great holiday. Thanks Ashlee. 
Mahalo

The condo was lovely - I was surprised to see that the condo looked exactly like the photos! I visited the place with my parents and my brother, and everybody beamed at how fantastic the condo was.

Host: Ashlee was very communicative, answered our questions pretty much immediately with detailed responses. She managed to do this while being low-key and honoring our privacy; hence a big thumbs up and many thanks to Ashlee!

Amenities: There is not a thing that is missing here. Silverware, extra towels, extra blankets, snorkels, board games - you name it; it's there. As others mentioned, the washer/dryer set and the private parking lot space came in super handy and were a huge plus that cannot be enjoyed in regular hotels.

Location: A two-minute walk to Waikiki - what more can you say. There are lots of restaurants and a Starbucks within a couple of blocks. We've definitely enjoyed having meals with an unhindered view of the ocean.

Sound: Sound level could be an issue (the apartment is on a lower level of a twelve-story building), but earplugs provided by Ashlee solved the problem for us. However, I think future customers should be aware of this problem.

All in all, fantastic host, fantastic location, and fantastic condo. Our family had a wonderful time here, and will definitely return if we have the chance. Thank you Ashlee for providing us such a nice condo!

Ashlee is a wonderful host! Although we didn't get to meet her in person, she was easy to get in contact with and made us feel very welcomed (before, during, and after). Her place is exactly as described and housed our family of 6 comfortably. The location couldn't be better, and being 2 blocks away from Waikiki Beach was a dream. In addition, there were small touches that really showed how Ashlee cares that her guests are well-prepared and happy. The instructions to find the apartment, parking, access were clearly laid out with accompanying pictures. And upon arrival, there was a hand-written card welcoming us along with a couple local snacks. Her home is fully stocked with useful amenities--shampoo, conditioner, body wash, towels, and the washer and dryer came into good use. It was absolutely spotless clean! Access to parking was great, and we didn't much noise concerns. I've stayed at over 50+ Airbnb homes around the world, and Ashlee's place is one of my favorites. I recommend her place to anyone who wants to visit Hawaii and stay in the Waikiki area! Thanks again Ashlee!

Ashlee actively communicated with me to make sure our arrival was seamless and easy. The accommodations and location were exactly as described, and made for an extremely convenient place to be to experience Waikiki. The property provided plenty of room for six, and amenities to please the most critical of children. We enjoyed our time there immensely, and would recommend a stay here to anyone! Thank you, Ashlee.

My family of four stayed in Ashlee's place and absolutely loved it! The condo is beautiful and exactly as pictured. The accessibility to Waikiki beach, shopping and everything else is unreal. With that comes a lively neighborhood- was a bit noisy, but nothing too outrageous. Ashlee has thought of everything you could possibly need, and we were more than comfortable there. Thanks Ashlee! We loved it!
The location was fantastic, so close to the beach and restaurants/bars.  The area is rather noisy at night, however, Ashlee provides ear plugs which was very much appreciated.

Great stay at Ashlee's! All beds are comfortable and we fit five adults into this condo! We had a blast. SO close to the beach and awesome that it comes with a parking spot (good luck finding parking if she didn't provide that spot!) A/C works GREAT!!

Ashley was a great host who could be easily contacted. She sent detailed information a few days before check in. The house was great, it was clean & tidy & well stocked. The location is amazing! So close to Waikiki Beach. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
The property was as listed, and handy too the beach. Nice too have 2 bathrooms with good water pressure, and a full kitchen, and W/M Drier.

First of all, the location of this place is superb, about a block from the main strip, and the beach.  There is an ABC store practically on the bottom floor and FREE parking, which alone can run you $30-$50 a night.  

Host Ash is very communicative and responsive.  So no worries if you run into a bit of a hiccup here and there (like too busy to read the check in/check out guide).  

The apartment itself is very nicely furnished, we had 6 adults and 2 children and slept comfortably.  2 bathrooms were great, not to mention the full kitchen and washer/dryer. 

The only thing is that there is central AC located only in the LR and the 2 bedrooms have windows that aren't sealed from the hot air outside.  So if you close the doors, the two BRs will run very hot.  Leave the doors open unless privacy outweighs temp comfort.  

There are also things for the beach, such as floating beds, towels, mats, and even a football.  The balcony is a great place to dry your snorkel gear. 

It was our first Airbnb experience and it left me wondering why I will ever go back to using hotels.  Especially for families, a place like this is so much better.  

Can't wait to go back!  Mahalo.
Great location, lovely homey feel to place with good amenities and Ashlee was very welcoming with great communication!
Ashlee's apartment is in a fantastic location, walkable to the beach and restaurants/bars/shopping.  We'll definitely be back!

Ash was extremely professional and thorough in all our dealings . Her instructions where easy to follow and enabled us to arrive and move into our accomodation after a long flight smoothly and with a minimum of fuss.
You cannot ask for a better location for the price asked.
The apartment was as advertised and even though there were 5 of us we did not feel on top of one another. 
Fantastic stay and would use again.
Ash was a fantastic host and a truly caring person.
Great and clean place to stay. Just few mins walking distance to stores and beach. Definitely will come back again. Super like!
excelente todo! Ashlee impecable!

Agree with all the other commenters. Added likes: We loved that there were TWO sets of keys so that we could do separate things; some beach/sand play toys/mats available; games for kids; interesting books to peruse; basic pantry staples to get us going for cooking and coffee service.  Thank you Ashlee!
Great location and space!  It's close to everything and the beach!  The owner was very responsive in getting back to me and easy to communicate.  Overall I highly recommend!

she was the best host in whole my air bnb experience! 
have check up my schedule consistently and alarm us for the check in/out
and not only for the very prompt response, but also shared her status in case of emergency. feeling like taking care by good friend. no doubt of her house, very fancy/cozy/perfect location and high technique facility. would like to recommend to my friends and also want to visit again ! if you are looking for the house more than one bedroom and restrooms, can't be better than this place.

Loved out stay here. Felt like a local. Very clean and spacious. As it notes you can hear a lot of outside noise. I didn't mind cause I sleep with a white noise machine so it can led out a lot of noise. Loved being able to get groceries n make breakfast n lunch most days in a really cute updated kitchen. Even baked cookies one night

This condo was amazing, every detail was thought of including earplugs and beach gear! Also the convenience of being just a walk to the centre of town made it an ideal location!

We would also like to mention how accommodating you guys were with our luggage and arriving earlier and allowing us to leave our bags while the condo was being cleaned prior to our check in! This was a huge relief! 

Thank you again!

Ashlee is amazing.. we have had a wonderful stay .. thank u so much for making our holiday unforgettable.. I will recomand this apt for people that want to run Honolulu marathon is just 400mt from the finish line!!!
I will say just perfect!!! Mahalo

Ash was extremely responsive before check-in, during our stay and at check-out. Truly a host that cares about your experience. We had some issues with a fan, cable and internet that were quickly addressed. Convenient location and spacious condo, with great added amenities like a pack and play for our infant and a beach umbrella and mats. The only thing I would note is that there is only one AC unit in the living room, so the master bedroom can get stuffy if the fan isn't left running. Also the noise, which Ash does note in the listing, can be quite significant even with ear plugs that she thoughtfully provides. I did end up having to book a separate hotel room for my mother after the first night due to the noise, but my husband, infant and I did fine with a white noise machine that we brought.

Ashlee was amazing about communication and flexibility on check in/check out. Really a sweet heart.

The place is beautifully renovated with well stocked kitchen but it's literally steps from Waikiki beach, restaurants and shops so going out it super easy.

This was my mother/father-in-laws first time in Hawaii AND AirBnB and they loved the place, especially sitting out on the lanai, and walking out to the beach.

Would definitely stay here again!
위치가 아주 좋습니다. 와이키키해변에서 걸어서 1~2분이면 됩니다. 거리로는 한 100미터 정도? 도 안될 수도 있겠네요. ABC STORE도 바로 붙어 있어서 편했습니다. 처음에 세면대에 물이 잘 안빠졌는데 금방 수리해줬습니다. 새로 인테리어한지 얼마 안되서 그런지 매우 깔끔했습니다. 다음에도 기회가 되면 다시가고 싶네요.

Fabulous!
The place looks exactly like the photos. It's spacious, nicely decorated and in a great location. Check in/out was super easy. Ashlee was always available to answer any questions and was super helpful -even with trying to find a great sunset spot. I didn't have issues with noise in the front bedroom- mostly city noises.. if you are an urban dweller, you wouldn't notice anything. The "master" seemed more quiet perhaps. Everything was beautiful and clean. There were plenty of beach towels and mats, as well as kids beach toys if needed. There were also spare sheets and pillow for couch guests if needed. We used the laundry many times and enjoyed some evening drinks on the lanai. Apparently this part of Waikiki is very expensive so, the price of the airbnb is definitely more than fair for the quality and condition of this place. According to a local living in the area, this is definitely a beautiful place which could garner some very high rent as a residence. Parking onsite was terrific and made it easy to have a rental car.  Overall we were very impressed and would suggest this to anyone! We were single girls traveling in a group and we loved it!  As a bonus the ABC- store is right next door- so anything you might need is a block away.  Definitely worth the money, Waikiki is a pricy area and you get what you pay for. Loved it!!!!

위치가 매우 좋습니다. ABC 마트가 바로 옆 건물이고, 와이키키 비치도 걸어서 3~5분이면 갑니다. 이름 좀 들어본 웬만한 식당들도 모두 걸어갈 수 있는 거리에 있습니다. 주변에 호텔들이 많아서 투어 픽업도 바로 옆 호텔에서 받을 수 있었습니다. 저희는 사용하지 않았지만 트롤리 정류장도 근처에 있어서 이용하기 편해 보였어요. 렌트를 하셨다면 지하 주차장에 전용 주차 공간이 있어서 주차비용이나 공간 걱정 없이 사용하실 수 있습니다.  
침실 2개에 침실마다 욕실이 딸려 있고, 거실에는 큰 소파가 있어서 성인 가족 5명(부모님, 여동생, 우리 부부)이 사용하기에 부족함 없이 좋았습니다. 이 경우 한 명은 거실 소파에서 자야해서 덩치 큰 남자분은 불편하실 수도 있어요. 
내부는 사진과 동일하고 안락한 느낌입니다. 들어가자 마자 좋은 냄새 (섬유유연제 냄새 같은)가 나고 매우 청결하게 관리되는 것 같았습니다.
세탁기와 건조기가 있고 세제도 모두 준비되어 있어서 유용하게 사용했습니다. 엄마가 특히 좋아하셨어요. 
마지막으로 Ashlee가 출발전날부터 마지막날까지 꾸준히 연락해주면서 불편한 점을 체크해주고, 여행이나 식당 관련 질문에 빠르게 답변해 줘서 매우 든든했습니다. 
가족단위로 오신다면 호텔보다 훨씬 편하게 지내실 수 있습니다. 강추합니다!

Ashlee was super friendly and welcoming!

Amazing place, good location, tips and tricks were very handy once we arrived.
Great location in a lively area walking distance to shops and night life! Ashlee is an amazing host!

This is such a cute apartment, so well-furnished, clean, and very nicely updated, with plenty of amenities including an abundant supply of beach towels!
The location is fantastic!  "Oh-so-close" to Waikiki is more than accurate, with barely 1.5 short blocks to the beach and all of the actions. And last but not least, Ashlee is super-responsive and helpful. Self check-in and check-out were very easy and simple.
Thank you, Ashlee, for such a great stay!

This apartment is great value for the location!

The building is older, and mostly occupied by permanent residents.  The apartment is fully renovated, but the pictures do make it look a little higher end than it actually is.  We have pretty discerning taste, I'm sure it would suit the needs of most travellers very well.

The parking spot is very convenient, as it is a very busy part of town.

The beach across the main road, just a few minutes walk is very beautiful and great for little kids.  The walk to Waikiki shops and restaurants is only 5-10 mins.

We had a few hiccups during our stay, but the host was very accommodating.  We would recommend this place to those who are very laid back and spend most of their time outside.  We love the outdoors, but have realized that we prefer the creature comforts of a hotel, room service and not making our beds on vacation.

Ashlee was a super friendly host who gave us great instructions and advice for our stay. She has an awesome Hawaii travel blog and printable maps we found very useful. I was extremely happy with the apartment, it's beautifully renovated and had everything we needed in our home-away-from-home. It's in a popular area of Waikiki, just a few minutes stroll to the beach, park, shops, bars and restaurants. I really felt as though I was "living the dream" in Waikiki here. I'll be back soon!

What a great place to set up camp for a trip to Waikiki..

Really nice
Absolutely enjoyed staying here. Soooo close to the beach. Next door to an ABC store. Communication with host was amazing. Nothing negative to say here. Would definitely recommend.
일단 위치가 너무 좋습니다. 주차도 편리하고 주변에 마트가 있어서 좋습니다. 집안에 세탁기와 건조기가 있어 물놀이를 하고 난 후 편리했습니다. 호스트도 연락에 응답이 잘 해주셔서 잘 놀다 갔습니다.

The apartment is in a great location with access to the beach, dining, nightlife, etc. The apartment felt like home for my wife and I, my wife's parents, and my wife and my toddler. Having easy parking, check in/out, a kitchen to cook, beach toys, and comfortable beds made this a great trip for us.

Loved Ashlee's place. The decor is great, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms what else could you need! Oh and the kitchen is super handy especially if you are traveling as a family. The highlight for us was the location, in my opinion its the best part of Waikiki beach (near the break-wall) Also its a perfect street to catch public or tourist buses from. Finally, having an ABC store literally downstairs is so handy. We loved this place and would recommend it to anyone who is looking to stay in the area.
Pretty easy review , this place is what many have stated prior. AWESOME!

Very clean, easy to get every where, great little touches, suitable for a couple or family. We stayed 11 nights with 6 people and never "got in each others way". 
Better than a hotel.

Charming apartment just one block from Waikiki beach.  Photos and property description were accurate and the check-in process was very easy thanks to very detailed instructions (pictures included).  The unit has been nicely upgraded and was a great space for four guests.  You can't beat the location of this (Website hidden by Airbnb) is close to everything on Waikiki.  The underground parking space is a very nice amenity.    As others have posted in their reviews, the small air conditioner was not adequate to cool the bedrooms.  The master bedroom was particularly warm, but a fan helped move the air.   A second fan would be a good addition for the other bedroom.    Ashlee was a great host and was very responsive...she checked in with me a couple times during the stay.

We had a great time staying at Ashlee's condo. Because of the great location, only 2mins walk from Waikiki beach, it can get a bit noisy in the evening. But Ashlee has prepared a can filled with earplugs ;) so we had no problem falling asleep at night. 
The apartment is in great condition, we didn't get to use the kitchen much but it's fully equipped with everything you will need. 
Ashlee is very responsive and always there for us. She was also kind enough to offer early checkin since we had an early flight. 
Thank you, Ashlee for hosting us. We will definitely come back to stay next time we visit Honolulu.
Great location! The accommodations were exactly like the posting. Had a great time at  Oh-So-Close! Would definitely come back!

This apartment is perfect if you want to get out an explore Waikiki beach. It's an easy walk to all the major hotels and restaurants - including Moana, Outrigger, Marriott, Dukes and more. Ashlee is a great host who was always reachable and more than happy to help us with whatever we might need. The apartment was very nice, though it was warm in the evenings due to the lack of a/c in the bedrooms.

great stay here with the family and boyfriend! I love that beach towels were provided for us and board games. Lovely little apartment and a great location for the beach and for major restaurants. No complaints from me!
This place is a perfect location for easy and quick access to all the Waikiki beach activities.  My family and I had a great time here.  I wish we could have stayed longer than two days for sure.
The apartment was great!
Ashlee is truly a great host....the accommodation was amazing....she answered all my questions and helped us along the way during our trip.....big tick from me and my family.....thank you again
와이키키와 매우 가까운 위치와 주차 가능한 점, 그리고 넉넉한 방크기 등이 매우 좋았습니더

I had stayed for 7 nights, everything was very comfortable. Location was also perfect. Only takes 5mins to get to the waikiki beach. We could comunicate with Ashlee very easily even though she lives in another place. And I had a problem with the washing machine, but we could solve this problem very quickly. She explain the reason of the problem carefully so I was able to solve it. When I asked some questions to Ashlee, she replied in 5mins! It's awsome!! This place is probably the best airbnb in Honolulu.

The listing was just as advertised, quaint, beautiful, but a bit noisy. Don't get me wrong, you get used to it, but if you're a light sleeper, the included Ear Plugs will help a tad. We did have a little trouble in our stay there though. The seals of the toilet wore off causing a leak and emitting the smell of urine. There was a gap in the shower between the shower floor and the door resulting in water leaking all the way into the adjoining room. A couple slips later, we had to let Ashlee know... SHE HANDLED IT AWESOME! Besides the working around the plumber and the cleaner, the toilet was fixed and the smell was gone! They even brought us Malasadas! Besides the one day of weirdness, all else went to plan. You will enjoy this gem, just pack some earphones to drown out the early morning deliveries to the ABC Store below.

Amazing apartment. The location is great. Walking distance from the beach, stores, and restaurants. We were traveling with an infant, so it totally helped that the unit came with a pack-n-play and a baby bath tub. There were plenty of extra bath towels and beach towels for us to use. Just to note: some of the reviewers mentions that the master bedroom can get warm; but there is now a portable AC in that room.  Yes, you can hear the sounds from the street but we were not bothered by them. There are earplugs for those who are light sleepers. The pull out beds in the living room are good quality.  We had few minor questions and concerns during our stay but Ashlee responded within minutes and addressed them wonderfully. She is a lovely host. I have no complaints at all!
Ashlee的公寓就在威基基海滩旁,走路只要5分钟过条马路就到海边了,出行非常方便,房间和图片一样干净整洁,房东人很 nice,给我们提早入住和延迟退房,厨房里厨具､调味料,咖啡机､烤面包机､电饭煲一应俱全,很适合一家老小入住,可以自己烧,还有游泳器材免费使用,只要按照房东提示,入住和停车都很方便｡退房时与房东约定的时间晚了一会儿,房东也很理解｡让我们度过了一个愉快的假期｡
Great location Good Facility. We stayed this accomodation with good memory. I recommend to stay here for your vacation.

부모님와 세식구 총 다섯명이 지내기에 아주 훌륭했습니다. 
걸어서 와이키키 해변이 5분도 안걸렸고 ABC 마트도 바로 집앞에 있었습니다. 
숙소 깨끗하고 세탁기 건조기까지 다 있어서 물놀이가 더 수월했어요. 
저흰 사용하지 않았지만 물놀이 용품이나 돗자리 아이스박스도 구비되어 있습니다. 

다시 온다면 모든일정 여기서 보내고 싶고 다른숙소로 이동이 아쉬울만큼 만족스러웠습니다.
와이키키 해변에서 가까워 비치로 바로 걸어갈 수 있는 것은 매우 큰 장점입니다. 다만 밤 시간에 거리소음이 들리는 것이 단점일 수 있겠습니다. Ashlee의 응대는 매우 신속하고 배려 깊었습니다. 거실에 있는 쇼파베드는 숙면을 취하기엔 부족함이 있습니다.

Perfect Waikiki apartment!  We had a wonderful stay here with our family of five.

Ash is a fabulous host with great communication & instructions.
The only slight downside was the noise from the street however Ash very thoughtfully left earplugs that worked a treat.  Otherwise magnificent, everything worked, thoughtful supplies & wonderful stay!

정말 좋았어요. 와이키키 바닷가와 가까워서 서핑을 즐기고 옷을 갈아입지 않고 숙소까지 걸어갈 수 있습니다. 또한 음식도 마음껏 해 먹을 수 있어서 더욱 편리하고 좋았습니다.
청소 상태도 굉장히 깨끗했고, 침구류의 상태도 깨끗했습니다.
숙소 주인과의 대화도 원활해서 굉장히 좋았습니다.
그리고 단독 주차장이 있어서 주차 걱정을 하지 않았어도 되고 안전합니다.
집이 전체적으로 배수가 잘 안되는것 빼고는 굉장히 좋았습니다.!!
The location was awesome and it was super clean!
The condo is located perfect in Waikiki. It was very clean and well equipped. We really enjoyed our stay.
Excellent location!  Beautiful place to stay.  Would highly recommend if you are looking for Waikiki vacation spot.

Ashlee’s condominium is so close to the Waikiki beach! That is enough reason to choice her room. Not only that, it was very convenient because ABC store is located near the room. In addition, she is very kind and gave helpful information to us. So I believe that will choose her room again if I visit Honolulu.

This place is so handy to everything we wanted or needed in Waikiki. An easy stroll to the beach and just a little further on are all the shops and restaurants.
The place itself is very stylish and comfortable inside. We were expecting some noise at night but it wasn’t too bad, slept very well.
Ash was great with a few minor hiccups and sorted them out straight away. I’d love to stay here again and recommend it highly.

Condo is located at a great location and had all the amenities we needed to enjoy our time!! The kids had so much fun with the water tubes and beach toys at the condo. The playpen and high chair made our stay so much easier with our 8 month old. Great condo for a family or a couple to enjoy their Vacay!!!
단체 여행으로 와이키키 해변에서 시간을 보내기에 좋은 위치이며, 주변에 맛있는 식당과 마트가 있어 생활 하기 좋습니다. 집의 청결 상태도 좋고 집주인의 즉각적인 대응과 배려도 만족스럽습니다. 호텔보다는 소음이 많다는 점은 감안해야 하겠습니다.
Wonderful and comfortable,  the five of us never felt like we were on top of each other. It was noisy some times, however we were always so tired we slept great! Stay here you won't regret it!
Ashlee is very helpful and the apartment is cozy and convenient. Room is clean and new. We had fun there.

This is a great place to stay in Waikiki. There was plenty of space for two kids and four adults.   It really is right next to the beach, specifically the protected beach which is great for families.   The place was well appointed and comfortable.  The noise was an issue at night for those who weren't comfortable wearing earplugs, and the earplugs didn't completely drown out the noise.
Nice apartment.  Suggested a few minor things to host.  Great location to beach and shops etc.  If you used to peace and quiet at home.  Be warned.  It's noisy starting at 5 am

What an amazing experience!   The home was beautiful and very modern.   We really appreciated the large washer/ dryer set up to do towels, bathing suits, etc.    The home was tastefully decorated, clean, and welcoming!  The location was so perfectly close to downtown and all the local restaurants/ shops.   Ashlee was lightening quick in responses and was very helpful in keeping us up to date when the elevator in the building was inoperable.      Our teenage son LOVED having his own bed and bathroom.   Ashlee also provided a wealth of local knowledge and helpful tips and recommendations as well. 

My only comment would be similar to those listed previously.   This location is very loud with city noise.  There are 2 loading docks for hotels immediately outside the window.   With earplugs (graciously provided by the owner) and the AC floor unit running in the bedroom, we were able to sleep most of the night.   However, it can get very noisy with horns, sirens, etc.   Like you would expect any living to be at 2 stories above a busy city block.  Again, NO FAULT of the owner at all  Ashlee was a tremendous host who shared excelled local tips which made our visit wonderful.  This was a great experience.  Thank you for opening your home to us.

My extended family of 6 had a great time at Ashlee's place.  I had two kids (5 and 11) and two grandparents.  The location of this place was perfect for everyone. It was a short walk to the beach and a short walk to activities around Waikiki.  Ashlee was great at giving us tips on where to go and what to do.  She's very responsive.

The pictures are accurate and the street noise I found as acceptable. It didn't bother anyone in my group, probably because everyone was so exhausted from the beach so they slept like rocks.

Parking was easy and great to have. You are a short drive to all the great beaches on the windward side.

Bathrooms and kitchen were clean. No issues with the washer and dryer.  

This place is in a great location. For our group, it was better than staying at a hotel.

the location is nice!!
very close to wikiki as it is named!!

Ótimo apartamento para quem necessita de 2 suites, ele possuí todas as amenidades necessárias, cozinha super equipada e máquina de lavar e secar dentro do proprio apartamento. A localização é em uma das pontas de Waikiki, ao lado do Marriott Waikiki, perto da praia e de diversos restaurantes e lojas. Waikiki é muito cara  então ter uma cozinha pra fazer algumas refeições simples é muito bom. Tem um supermercado bem próximo. Recomendo também não comprar tours antecipadamente, comprando em Waikiki e pagando em dinheiro você consegue bons descontos. Por estar em Waikiki o local é muito barulhento, mas os tampões de ouvido que tem no apartamento, ao dormir ajudam enormemente, não deixe de usar.
Ótimo apartamento e localização, fica atrás do Marriott Waikiki. A cozinha é completa e a máquina de lavar e secar no apartamento é muito útil. O contato com a anfitriã é rápido e simples.

Ashlee's place is super close to the beach and shopping and it's a fantastic apartment layout with all the mod cons. We did have a  issue during our stay with house caused by remodeling apartments upstairs and building maintenance however in these sorts of situations it's how the host handles it that makes all the difference. We were moved by our hosts to very comfortable accommodation and everything was taken care of. This didn't detract from our enjoyment of beautiful Waikiki.
Thanks Ashlee and Kelii for a great stay

Ashlee's place was awesome. It's near the downtown area and close to the beach (2 minute walk). She has a binder that is full of resources & suggestions for stuff to do around the Island. The condo was not lacking in amenities, we had everything we needed during our stay. Ashlee was attentive to our needs and always available via messaging. Don't miss out.

It’s a great place to stay.
1. 2 minutes walking to Waikiki beach.
2. ABC store is just downstairs.
3. Well equipped kitchens.
4. Washing machine and dry machine
5. Beach toys, body board, snorkeling equipments, a dolly helping you get all the tools to the beach and ice bucket.
6. Free parking space.

Loved our stay here! The location is perfect. The apartment itself was really nice. There’s not really a view from the balcony but the beach is literally a 2 minute walk away. The apartment had everything you could need. Thoroughly enjoyed our time here.
Great location, Good amenities!

Ashlee's place was perfect for our family of four.  Her place was clean, modern, spacious, and perfectly located within Waikiki.  Everything was well thought out:
Amenities - I cannot think of anything that was missing (she had: coffee machine, blender, utensils, cookware, and etc)
Comfort - The place was spacious for the four of us.  My boys had their own space / room which gave us some quiet time after a full day of exploring the island.
Location - The location was perfect.  Close enough to all the main attractions (beach, shopping, restaurants, and etc) but far out enough to avoid the crowd.  One or two streets down, it gets really busy...
Host - Ashlee is by far the best host I've experienced via Airbnb.  Her recommendations, accommodations, and prompt responses made our trip more enjoyable.

Overall, we will definitely stay here the next time in Honolulu and had already recommended to several friends/family about Ashlee's place.

Very nice clean condo unit 1 block from beach. Washer, Dryer, beach towels, even a boggy board were provided. Great stay for six of us for four days. Ashlee was very responsive to any needs that we had. Would definitely stay there again.

Was expecting the place to be really noisy especially because it was written in the description but was presently surprised. both kids didnt even notice the noise. the place is impeccable. beautifully decorated. really easy location to most places. Ashley really thought about everything. boards for the beach, sand castle set, snorkles gear even a small little wagon to pull it all out with. highly recommend. she was very prompt with replies and also very accommodating with late check out (I.e luggage storage which not many air bnb have provided for us in the past) mahalo ! hope to visit someday again.

This place is in a fantastic location!  Less than 5 min. walk to the heart of Waikiki!  Even though there are earplugs in the place because of possible outside noise at night, you don't really need them because the fan of the AC blocks it out...very soothing to sleep with it on.   Also loved having a few beach toys on the lanai!  Thanks Ashlee.

Place was absolutely amazing and Gorgeous. There were were additional touches in every department. Place spotless, all kinds of beach gear, towels galore, tv's in All rooms, liquid soap/shampoo/conditioner, hard soap. a few items in fridge, spices in cupboard, every needed utensil. all kinds of sun screens/Blocks and lotions and dressings. Ashlee was SUPER sweet and helpful giving tips on everything. very close walking distance to the action beach and clubs.

My 1 non-positive comment (and only because i am literally searching for one) is that the shower door is a little too short, but then again i am six foot six. (and it's just the door itself, the actually shower head and shower space is fine)

Loved staying in Ashlee's apartment! Great location with an ABC shop below and fast easy walk to the beach and main street of shops and restaurants. Loved having Starbucks around the corner for my morning soy cappuccino! The apartment is beautifully furnished, modern design and well equipped to make your stay comfortable and relaxed. Ashlee is so helpful and great at communicating. Thanks Ashlee! You thought of everything!

Ashlee’s place was a great place to stay. We really appreciated having a baby tub and high chair available for our use. There were many extra towels and blankets. Ashlee was a great host and made sure that we had everything we needed and that everything went smoothly. We would definitely stay again.

It' clean and comfortable place.
I strongly recommend this place for family trip.
The apartment is modern and very clean. The rooms are a bit smaller than we expected and it’s a bit noisy at night. But the location is great and very convenient.

So glad we decided to book Ashlee’s place to stay before we went home. It was so nice to have such a big space after checking out of a standard size room of nearby hotel. 
The unit is clean and looks exactly like it does in the pictures. My family loved being able to unwind and play board games  or watch Netflix after a long day exploring or chilling on the beach. Location is perfect and yes oh so close to everything! We were picked up on the same street for most the tours we booked. 
The unit is fully equipped and there was a lot more provided than expected for example Aloe Vera gel in the fridge and laundry detergent. Also, it was so convenient to have access to a large washing machine and dryer. It meant we didn’t need to pack as many clothes or come home with suitcases full of dirty clothes. Having the kitchen and large fridge meant we could buy groceries and eat some meals in. Eating out and feeding a family of 5 can get really pricey in Waikiki. 
Ashlee’s place is fantastic for families and next time we will skip staying in a 5 star hotel and come straight here!

The location of the apartment is absolutely fantastic and having all the beach toys supplied was a great perk. You can’t get a better host than Ashlee - her local tips, quick responses and love for Hawaii are unparalleled. The kitchen, washer dryer set up and car park was A+. We were prepared for the street noise as mentioned so that didn’t really bother us - our only real issue was for those of us staying on the sofa bed in the living room - we weren’t prepared for the brightness of all the lights from surrounding buildings at night. If we were travelling in a smaller group and got to stay in one of the bedrooms instead of the lounge I’d definitely stay again.

Ashlee was an amazing host.  The property is literally right next to the beach and about as easy access as possible to all the festivities on Waikiki.  The unit is very clean and newly remodeled with nice touches.  Would totally come back and stay here again!

We enjoyed our stay at Waikiki! The location is perfect, so close to the beach, right next to a grocery store for basic needs, clean and has everything you would need for a beach vacation home. It is literally 2 mins walk to Waikiki beach! So this apartment has a lot going for it! 

However the sleeping arrangements are not uniform. 
The master bedroom has an AC and a superb king bed
The second bedroom has a murphy bed thats not bad, and the room has a standing fan only, no AC
The living room has AC but the bed is a sofa bed, a regular one, not one of those surprisingly comfortable sofa beds

It will feel like first class, premium economy and economy rooms :)

Great location! Easy walk to the beach and to the main strip! Very comfortable and felt like home. The parking and washer/dryer are a plus to our stay! Ashlee was so accommodating. Everything was clean and the amenities within the Airbnb was great! We would stay here again!

메리어트 호텔, 하이야트 플레이스 인근 숙소, 인근에 동물원 있음
바닷가까지 걸어서 5분
숙소에 주차공간 및  바로 옆에 ABC마트(편의점)이 있어 간단한 식음료 구매 가능
부모님과 아이들과 같이 숙박을 했는데 유모차 및 기타 편의 시설이 잘 구비 되어 있습니다. 
다만, 해변가 근처라서 저녁에 발생하는 소음으로 인하여 잠자기 힘들 수 도 있습니다. 민감한 사람을 위해 집에 귀마개 준비되어 있음. 
소음을 제외하고는 편의시설, 위치, 청결도 및 호스트응대는 우수함.

Thank you Ashlee! We had a wonderful stay in your place with our 2 kids. Great location for close access to the beach, amazing sunsets & thoughtful of you to provide beach towels, cart with snorkels, goggles, beach toys etc.

Your apartment was ideal for our family with plenty of space (especially having the use of the kitchen & laundry as one of our children has food allergies). Lovely decor and so much better than a hotel room! 

Ideal location to get to anywhere & within close proximity to buses & trolley stop right on the street.  Pick up & drop off from our tours from just outside your place was also great. 

Thank you again & we will be back!

This home and Ashlee are fabulous. She was so responsive to my questions, even later in the evening. A delight to deal with. 

The unit is incredible. We stay at the resort across the street from it every year, but decided to try a home this year, and won’t be going back to the hotel. The location is ideal, the unit is very clean, checkin/out is easy as can be. 

The comments on noise were my only concern, as I’m a light sleeper, but I stayed in the room that is supposedly the loudest, and with the earplugs Ashlee so helpfully provided, wasn’t woken up once. 

This home was loved by everyone from my grandmother to myself, and we will absolutely be staying in the future.

Great apartment in the middle of Waikiki with great hosts. 

Pros:
- Good location. It is about a 15-20 minute walk to the most popular attractions/restaurants/shops on Waikiki. You might be closer if you stayed at one of the top hotels, but I think this is appropriate for an AirBnB location. 18 minute drive Honolulu airport. 
- Cleanliness. The apartment was very clean, and I felt very comfortable in it. Bathrooms were very clean, kitchen was spotless. There were some minor issues (see below for Cons)
- The host (Ashlee) had exceptional communication. She replied within hours of my messages to her, answering all my questions. This made me feel very connected, safe and secure with where I was staying
- Hosts thought of everything to make the trip successful and pleasant. There were beach towels, a vacuum machine for miscellaneous sand you might have brought in. Soaps, laundry detergent, shampoo/conditioner/lotion. 
- Very kid friendly apartment. There were beach toys for kids, a wagon if you needed it, high chairs, strollers, a pack and play, a newborn basinet. 
- Check in was VERY smooth. Great directions sent out by Ashlee

Cons:
- We had issues with some broken windows upon arrival. When we landed in Hawaii after 11 hours of travel, all we wanted was to get into a cool apartment, relax and head to bed. However, our plans changed when we got to the apartment and realized that some of the windows were broken, allowing all of the air from the AC to get out, and it was hard to keep cool air in. My husband had to move some furniture as well as put up towels on the broken windows to keep the cool air in. 
- We also had issues with a bad smell in the master bedroom, I had to wash some sheets as well as move an air freshener into the room to make the smell go away. 
- Ashlee communicated GREAT with me about these 2 issues. She came to the apartment ASAP and fixed what she could.  Sounds like it was issues with previous guests in the apartment, not necessarily the apartment itself. She also refunded me a small portion of the cost to accommodate for these issues. 

Overall, I highly recommend this apartment for anyone traveling to Hawaii. We had a great time, all because Ashlee is an amazing host. THANK YOU for making this a memorable trip for our small family.

Wow! That's all I can honestly say. Place had everything you needed + more. I had a family of 5 + 2 kids & we fit comfortably. The way they remodeled & laid all the furniture out made if feel even bigger. SUPER CLEAN!! Place even had a washer & dryer like cmon! Also had beach stuff like an umbrella, mats, body boards, life vests, sand castle toys & a wagon to put everything + the kids in. If that's not enough for you, it also comes with 2 AC units to keep the place cool, cable AND a parking space! Location was great being literally 1 block from the beach & an ABC store right next door. This was the best Airbnb I've stayed at hands down. You get what you pay for so I recommend booking before it's too late

Ashlee's condo is clean, modern and well-equipped and is in a superb location, right off the main street in Waikiki and just steps away from the beach! Ashlee was responsive and thoughtfully provided advice, tips, and all of the amenities you would need for a great holiday. Would recommend Ashlee's place for 2-4 people, it was a little cramped for 6 adults but is manageable if you're not fussy! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay, Ashlee is a great communicator and host.

Location is good and the place is overall clean. However, it’s ONLY suited for young people who party all night or very heavy sleepers. The bedroom and other windows are so weird they can’t be closed tightly therefore you would be like sleeping on the street.... also missing mesh in some windows means anything, from bug to rat, can come inside straight.... and there was no mention of all these in property description.
The place looks just as nice as the pictures and has incredible amenities! Would definitely stay again if I visited Honalulu

가족들과 함께하시는 분들이시라면 정말 추천 합니다!!! 완벽한 숙소입니다 위치는 두말할것 없이 좋고 숙소내에 구비시설과 청결도 등등 칭찬하고 싶은 점이 너무 많아서 한번에 말하기가 어려울 정도 입니다 다만 도로와 가까워서 어느정도의 소음은 가만 하셔야 겠습니다 그치만 와이키키 어딜 가든 이정도의 소음은 있습니다 마지막으로 하와이 숙소를 찾고 계시는 분들 지금 당장 여기로 예약 하세요 강추합니다:)

This airbnb was great! My family and I stayed here and we really had no complaints. The airbnb most importantly was clean and is in a great location right off the main strip of shopping and restaurants in Waikiki. The beach is also steps away from the airbnb. We stayed here with a baby so having laundry, a stocked kitchen, high chair, pack n play, plenty of linen, blankets, pillows, towels was so great. There is a parking spot included which is so convenient in Waikiki. There is also an ABC store right downstairs. The only thing we did not expect was that the master bedroom bathroom did not have a door. Overall, I would recommend this place if you are a family looking for the conveniences of home away from home. Check in and check out was super easy and the host was very responsive to any questions we had. Overall we had a wonderful stay here.

Ashlee & Keli'i have provided a perfect clean place for a family of up to 6 to stay while on Oahu.  The ability to make your own meals, wash and dry laundry in the condo and  to have a parking spot at the condo building  for a rental car was a rare find.  Many other amenities like laundry detergent, dishwasher detergent, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, regular linens and beach towels, etc. are provided.  There's boogie boards, and other beach toys you can haul to the beach in a very handy wagon that's provided.  Don't bring tolitries as there's ABC stores in every block that  provides the right tanning lotion (to protect the coral reefs) and almost anything else you need or want.  Save your receipts and take them in to the ABC store at the end of your trip for nice free gifts.   ABC stores sell snorkels and fins; snorkeling tours provide them - so don't bother packing them.   Waikiki beach was literally  a two minute walk from this condo so besides swimming and sunbathing,  it was fun to watch the sunset and Friday night fireworks from that stretch of beach.  We also walked to many of the nearby attractions, shops and restaurants.  We were able to travel all over the island in our rental car but go early in the morning as parking space is an issue later in the day.  Many tours will pick you up right across the street from this condo.  Ubers are also quite prompt - mostly within 2-5 minutes.  Ashlee provides a lot of written information about things to do, but one should plan ahead of time (before your trip) for any special adventures you don't want to miss like zip lining on the north shore or snorkeling off the Oahu coastline  or taking a sunset sail off of Waikiki as they fill up fast.   While the bus is a cheap way to take a group to the north shore of the island, if you use the bus for that be sure to use the express routes that only run a couple times/day.  Otherwise the bus running the regular route will  be stopping at every stop - and it will take hours. Bus is often not on time.    The food trucks at the North Shore are fabulous.  Leonard's Bakery with Portuguese donuts are to die for.  Ashlee's availability when we wanted to contact her was great - even when she had to be out of the country!  Oahu is a great island for multi-gen family experiences.  This condo is ideal.

What a great stay and Ashlee is a superb communicator. Sure it was noisy but after the first night with ear plugs on, you simply get used to the buzz of what Waikiki is all about. So handy to shops, restaurants and beaches. With major hotels nearby, It’s super easy to catch buses and organise tour pickups. Ubers are easy to grab as well with average wait time around 3 mins! The apartment block is very security focused as well. And that beach buggy and pram came in very handy. Love, love, love!

This place is located very close to Waikiki beach and the beach walk. Everything was very satisfying except the condition of the mattress in the second bedroom. And the vacuum wasn’t properly working. Besides this, all was the best!

Great location - cant fault!
alot of road noise - but your in the middle of Waikiki....
great services and fast responses from host :)

The location is great. 1 minute walk to the beach. Right next to the ABC mart. Very close to circle bus stop goes to Alamoana...etc.. The rooms are spacious and clean. I recommend Ashlee’s apartment to anyone who is looking for 2 bed room, 2 bath room in this area.

name: ON HIGHLINE! Private room & bath
summary: Enjoy the privacy of your own bedroom and bathroom in our sun-drenched 125 year old townhouse, located directly on the beautiful High Line in Chelsea. Our home is optimally situated for exploring Manhattan. Guest quarters comfortably accommodate two.
space: Upon arriving in our home, you will settle into the privacy and comfort of your own bedroom and your own private bathroom. Our home, a 125 year old townhouse located in the heart of Chelsea, consists of 2,500 sq feet (232 sq meters) of soaring atrium ceilings, tons of natural light, and spacious comfort. We live directly on the High Line among Chelsea's many art galleries, bookstores, and quiet green spaces. We're just one block east of the Hudson River, where extensive biking and jogging trails, a world class sports center, and rolling lawns of open park space are at your fingertips. Within walking distance are numerous restaurants, grocery stores, shops, post offices, banks, bicycle rental agencies, 24-hour pharmacies, etc.  Public transportation is excellent in the neighborhood: the M11 bus to the Upper West Side stops in front of our building (with service to Midtown, the Museum of Natural History, Central Park, Columbia University, Harlem, etc.), and the E and C subway lines are j
description: Enjoy the privacy of your own bedroom and bathroom in our sun-drenched 125 year old townhouse, located directly on the beautiful High Line in Chelsea. Our home is optimally situated for exploring Manhattan. Guest quarters comfortably accommodate two. Upon arriving in our home, you will settle into the privacy and comfort of your own bedroom and your own private bathroom. Our home, a 125 year old townhouse located in the heart of Chelsea, consists of 2,500 sq feet (232 sq meters) of soaring atrium ceilings, tons of natural light, and spacious comfort. We live directly on the High Line among Chelsea's many art galleries, bookstores, and quiet green spaces. We're just one block east of the Hudson River, where extensive biking and jogging trails, a world class sports center, and rolling lawns of open park space are at your fingertips. Within walking distance are numerous restaurants, grocery stores, shops, post offices, banks, bicycle rental agencies, 24-hour pharmacies, etc.  Public trans
neighborhood_overview: Chelsea is a truly special neighborhood in Manhattan because of its art galleries, the High Line, the restaurants, the convenient public transportation, the beauty of the Hudson River, the gorgeous architecture, and the sense of community shared by the residents.
notes: Due to complications with receiving packages, we cannot receive deliveries for Airbnb guests. Please do not ask to have packages delivered before or during a reservation. Thank you:)
transit: Public transportation is among the best in our immediate neighborhood. Also, getting to/from the three airports is very easy. From LGA, take the Q70 LTD bus (i.e., the express bus to Roosevelt St). At Roosevelt, transfer to the E subway toward Manhattan (total cost $2.50). From JFK, take the AirTrain to Jamaica Station. Transfer to the E subway toward Manhattan (total cost $7.50). From EWR, take the AirTrain to the airport train depot. Transfer to the NJ Rail to Manhattan's Penn Station (total cost app. $13.00 per person). Then, take the E subway downtown one stop, or take a taxi to our home. You can also walk from Penn Station if the weather is nice. From the E subway train, exit at 23 Street station in Manhattan. Walk two blocks to Tenth Ave. We live near the northwest corner of Tenth Ave and 23 St.
access: Guests enjoy access to a private bedroom, private bathroom, the shared kitchen, and shared living room.
interaction: As much or as little as our guests like. We will cross paths occasionally in the kitchen, however :)
house_rules: Please treat our home as you would have others treat your own. You are welcome to come and go as you please (i.e., no curfews). The kitchen and living room are at your disposal. No entertaining outside guests, smoking, or playing loud music. The use of illicit drugs is strictly forbidden. Use of the clothes washer is available with our supervision and at a cost of $7 per load (regretfully, we found this measure necessary after our machine was accidentally broken by a guest). Our building has stairs and is therefore not suitable for small children.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Along with Ed (my better half, pictured on the right), I strive to build a growing base of happy and loyal AirBnB clients. We're both fairly quiet guys: I have a doctoral degree and enjoy researching/writing, and Ed is a retired dentist now working in Manhattan real estate. We're very tidy, laid back, and respectful of guests' desire for the same. We're also very proud of New York City and are always happy to share our knowledge of the city's history and offerings. Traveling to world capitals and exotic places is our passion: I speak French and Portuguese fluently, and Ed speaks Spanish. We absolutely love hosting guests from all over the world, and we're always happy to interact with guests as much or as little as they like, so conversation over a bottle of wine is always welcome!

reviews.comments: Wow, what a great location and wonderful, upscale condo in Chelsea, right next to the new Highline elevated park.  Arthur is a remarkable Man, knowledgeable, friendly, warm-hearted and makes you feel at-home.  You can use the living room, kitchen, etc., while viewing the high-line out the rear windows.  The location is great for transportation access around the City by subway, bus or cab.  Chelsea has become a hotbed of art, outdoor activities and of course you have the wonderful Joyce Theater nearby.   The Red Cat is a great place to eat and have a drink, it's located downstairs.   I will certainly visit Art's wonderful condo again and highly recommend it to others.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the HighLine B & B and our host Arthur. If we had to live in NYC this is would be the place, it is centrally located, close for walks along the Hudson River and minutes to the subway and Chelsea. Our walk along the Highline (even in Winter) was breathtaking. Our Host was extremely helpful in navigating our way through the city, providing maps and great instructions. The accommodations were very comfortable and we felt welcomed and at home. A light breakfast with coffee and orange juice was available. We used the living room with the fireplace at night to unwind from the day. We would highly recommend a stay here and look forward to coming back in the future.

Arthur & Ed are the consummate hosts. Their Chelsea space is beyond lovely: immaculately clean, stylish, centrally located and cozy. We felt at home from the moment we arrived and they were quick to lend us a hand at every turn, from restaurant recos to subway directions to colorful local history. Also, the mini flat screen in the bedroom was a great added touch. 

Can't recommend more - thanks again to our amazing hosts & new friends!

This is the best apartment I've ever found on Airbnb and the host Arthur was wonderful! The room was very clean. The living room was very cozy and the entire apartment was very artistic. Arthur was very nice in offering help in every single way and even provided coffee and breakfast for us. The location is super because it's only 2 blocks away from subway and it's not noisy at all even though it's situated on the second floor in a commercial district. There are bars and restaurants just around the corner so eating out at late night is not a problem at all. I will definitely recommend this apartment to everyone!

Nous avons passé une excellente semaine chez  Ed et Arthur qui sont des hôtes accueillants, chaleureux et très intéressants, tout en restant très discrets. 
Leur appartement est vraiment confortable et nous nous y sommes sentis comme "chez nous". Il est bien situé dans un quartier intéressant et proche des transports. Nous recommandons cette adresse et nous y reviendrons sûrement ! 

--
We had great time in Art & Ed's apartment. They are lovely people, warming (we shared at least 2 time a glass of wine, had great discussions  and they provided some good tips to visit the quarter), very interesting, but also very discrete. 
Their apartment is comfortable and we were there like at home. It's a very well situated (only 2 blocks away from the subway line A,C,E, 23rd street) and convenient apartment. 
This part of the city (Chealsy) is a newly renovated quarter full of art gallery and news spots very interesting like the High-line.

We will definitely warmly recommend this apartment and will probably come back soon.

Having never used airbnb before we were slightly nervous but Arthur soon put paid to that.  He was a brilliant communicator from the start and continued to be until our departure.  His level of service was impeccable from the perfect directions to reach his place, to carrying our huge suitcases up the stairs, to the breakfast provided and the cheese and wine in the evenings over interesting conversation.  The apartment is stunning.  We had free reign over the living room, kitchen and bathroom and our room was adequate with 2 single beds.  Arthur is in the process of renovating the apartment too with new carpets etc. so it will be even better on our return and a 5* establishment. We highly recommend a visit.

I honestly could not have asked for a better host for my first trip to NYC! Arthur (and Ed) are gifted hosts, and made my father and I as comfortable as could be. The space was immaculately clean, and they even took it upon themselves to change our sheets and waste baskets halfway through our stay. There was always coffee in the morning and a few breakfast items so you could quickly run out the door and see the city. Ed even picked up some soy milk for me, which was above and beyond the call of duty! 

They are highly perceptive, and I have no doubt that they effortlessly adapt to each new guest and his or her unique needs. When I arrived, Arthur took me on a tour of Chelsea and gave me some pointers on how best to get around the city, as well as a few maps and restaurant/landmark recommendations. Arthur truly will be involved as much (or as little) as you'd like him to be, and he and Ed were an absolute joy to be around--great attitudes, highly knowledgeable, infinitely helpful. The apartment was in a great location, near subway and bus lines, and surprisingly peaceful. When I told Arthur that my father snored, he quickly pointed out that there were ear plugs and a sound machine in the room to help me out. Literally a life saver. Overall, I can't say enough wonderful things.

An oasis in the middle of Chelsea! The apartment is just as expected; spacious, cozy, very relaxing and private and location just can't be beaten. With a full view of the high line! We were greeted upon arrival with a cheeseboard, wine and a blazing fire. 
Ed and Arthur proved to be excellent hosts and helped us in any way they could to navigate our way around. It made our stay in New York all the more relaxing and fun. We were sad to leave! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay with them and will return.

Arthur saved my trip and I won't stay anywhere else next time I'm in NY. He went out his ways to help out my problem with Airbnb (despite which I still need to thank Airbnb for meeting them) and made my stay in NY a perfect ending for this trip. Their panhouse apartment is awesomely located.  you can see the high line park from the window, and bus stop right across the street, subway station 2 blocks away.  They have 2 very proud cats, who don't bother anyone. 
The bathroom is separate and super clean. The bedroom is really cosy with 2 beds, perfect for a couple. I love the big kitchen, where I had the most interesting conversations. Mostly l listened because they tell great stories. 
I highly recommend Arthur's place as your NY stop for knowing both the people and the city there.

Sublime is the word to describe Arthur's apartment! I spent four nights there with my brother and I wouldn't go anywhere else for a future trip in New York. I never thought I could find such a large, quiet and beautiful place to stay in New York. Arthur is an amazing guest! He welcomed us with beer and wine, provided more than everything we needed for our stay, and offered us a lot of really good recommendations and interesting stories. We had a terrific time!

Our trip to NYC was amazing, thanks to the wonderful stay at Arthur (and Eds) appartement! It was very clean, quit and the location is perfect (next to the wonderful High line, near to bus&metro and a lot of nice restaurants at walking distance.)
I think there are no better hosters than Arthur and Ed! So friendly, shared everything with use, made great reservations for bars and restaurants and really opend there home for us.
If you want an unforgatteble trip to NYC than you must stay here, I can recommend it to everybody!!!

We (my 14 year old son and I) received 5-star service while staying at Arthur & Ed's place on 10th Avenue. It is a wonderful location, the apartment is super-clean and Arthur & Ed did everything possible to make our stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. They are a generous couple.  The room was cosy, we had our own bathroom - and we also practically had the kitchen and lounge to ourself too!   Despite Arthur & Ed's giving us the utmost privacy, we became friends and hope to see them again another time.  What more can you say than that?

For a first stay in NYC, that was a great one! It'll be difficult to find more awesome guests than Arthur & Ed. They set the bar very high.
First, the location: Chelsea district ideally located for all south Manhattan points of interest (from Freedom Tower to Central Park).
The flat itself is really great: private room and bathroom with a nice view on the Highline. The other rooms are nice too ... and the rooftop! Not an high one like on other buildings but still nice to enjoy.
Concerning Arthur and Ed, they gave us so many addresses where to enjoy the city as New Yorkers. We had the opportunity to enjoy some dinners with them and their friends, yet another way to enjoy good time with locals. They were very keen to answer to any of our questions, discuss about the city, ...
To sum up, the next trip to NYC should lead to Arthur & Ed's once more!

My stay at Arthur and Ed's beautiful home was the best I've ever had on Airbnb! The apartment itself is incredble, and located in one of the most scenic areas of New York. Arthur and Ed made the trip, though! They were the two most accommodating and kind hosts I've ever had, and went out of their way to not only make sure I felt comfortable but to give me incredible tips and tricks as to how best to settle into New York. Ed even made me a list of apartments for me to look at for when I move there. Now that I've been to Arthur and Ed's, I wouldn't want to stay anywhere else!

Encore un grand MERCI à Arthur, Ed, Pollux & Castor pour cet agréable séjour ! Merci pour cet accueil si chaleureux et votre gentillesse. Si nous revenons un jour sur New York, il est certain que nous reviendrons aussi chez vous !!! On s'y sent vraiment comme à " la maison ". De plus, le quartier de Chelsea est très sympathique et il y a beaucoup de vie. 
Merci pour tout et bonne continuation.
A très bientôt.
Corinne, Nathalie et Lauriane.

Art & Ed's penthouse is amazing. We couldn't ask for a better place to start our holiday in New York City. Their apartment is just next to the famous Highline and within the vicinity of the historical part of Chelsea. Art & Ed have beautifully styled the interior and filled their home with so much character.

Art & Ed are really pleasant and accommodating that we felt so much at home as guest. We are so thankful to have known them and to have the privilege to share a place in their home. 
Thanks guys!

What a fabulous find!  We recently moved from the City & were looking for a place to stay that would feel more like "home" again.  Well, we found it!  We need return to Manhattan often for medical appointments, theater, opera, meeting with friends, etc.  This is the perfect solution.  Arthur and Ed are the most welcoming of hosts.  Our room was comfortable and quiet.  They even obtained reservations for us at a popular restaurant!  An assortment of breakfast foods was available to us.  We give On Highline our highest recommendation!  Thank you Arthur and Ed.

Although my stay with Arthur and Ed was extremely short I appreciate their flexibility with my time of arrival. Upon arrival I was taken on a tour of their beautiful house. The room that I stayed in was immaculate as was the bathroom. I am so grateful for the hospitality and conversation. Would definitely recommend!
Arthur Tang couldn't be a more delightful and accommodating host. Their home is gorgeous and comfortable and in the perfect location.

Arthur and Ed were wonderful hosts. They went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable and oriented in the city. They also gave us some great tips about good local places to eat and visit. Our room had 2 very comfortable single beds. Each against a tall window overlooking the High Line! We stayed two nights, took in the city, walked a ton, ate and had drinks at some of Art and Ed's recommended spots. We loved our trip!

Art and Ed are exceptional hosts and sharing with them for my first trip to New York City has made my experience truly amazing! (this was also my first AirBnB experience!)
Their flat is really well located with regards to public transport. It is very nicely thought out architecturally and arranged. The beds are very comfortable and everything has to be positive in all honesty!
The area is rather quiet and very arty-like with galleries and slightly avant-garde buildings. Art and Ed were happy to guide me through parts of the city, help me plan my days etc. They are very kind and considerate, we had lots of interesting chats at breakfast and other times when going out together.
I would not even think of any other accommodation when I return to NYC! I met Art and Ed as strangers and we left as friends!

Arthur was a very accommodating host. He's so well-versed on NYC, especially the Westside, that it's like having a free tour guide with your room. For couples to note, the room is two separate single beds.

The apartment was exactly as described online - the room was great for our week long stay, our private bathroom was beautiful and spotlessly clean, the kitchen contained everything one could wish for, and breakfast was super (in particular the coffee ;-)). The location of the apartment in Chelsea, right next to the High Line, is absolutely perfect to explore Manhattan and the rest of NYC. If you plan to extend your trip, the Megabus station with many destinations in the North-East (we traveled to Philadelphia for $7!) is only a 10 minute-walk away. But all these comments on the room would not suffice to guide any future guests with respect to their decision for this place. Maybe more important are Art and Ed who were so much more than AirBnB hosts. They welcomed us like family/friends and were more than happy to share their experiences and recommendations for restaurants, bars, museums and all the little special things that you will never find in any travel guide. Thus, they helped us immeasurably to get the most from our lovely week in New York - thanks again for this!  We had the impression that we arrived as guests and left as friends, a truly wonderful experience.
Angela & Chris

I just cannot say enough good things about my stay at Ed and Arthur's place! They are both very caring and super friendly. Arthur teaches at the University I graduated from! so great! They both kept in touch as I was working my way to New York and gave me detail information on how to take transport.  Ed, the bakeries you recommended were amazing! I look forward to my next visit to New York and a stay at Highline.

What can we say? Our new friends Art and Ed created a soothing and tranquil atmosphere right amidst the throb of an exciting urban surround.

'Art' and 'Ed' are apt names for these gracious hosts - they possess true art for hospitality and are an educative source for the history and personality of NYC.

Our stay was met with thoughtful anticipation of all our needs - no matter how trivial - and a smiling enthusiasm for exceeding them. We had complete privacy when we desired and thrilling humorous contact when we wanted. We could not have enjoyed such ease, comfort, privacy, good cheer and insight in this city staying anywhere else.

Our stay at ON HIGHLINE exceeded all expectations.   The layout of Arthur Tang's house lends itself well for the privacy of the guest quarters but still offering full access to his beautifully furnished large living room and kitchen.   The sleeping area is completely quiet and it looks out onto the Highline Park, an amazing civic accomplishment, where I ran every other day.  Our five stars apply not only to the location and the amenities of the place, but also, and especially, to our host himself.   Arthur is an interesting and multi-faceted man.  He's very knowledgeable about the area and conscientious about his guests' comforts.    This was our first time to use AirBnB, and we could not have been happier.   We look forward to repeating this experience.    David and Jim

I realise I need to post this review in two parts - the apartment and the host
The apartment is stylish, elegant and there is plenty of room to relax in the kitchen and the lounge room, the bedroom is spacious and the beds are really comfortable. The location is drop-dead fabulous!! Close to the subway and cross town bus and in the heart of lovely Chelsea. We were there in summer and arriving home (yes it felt like home) each afternoon was like walking into a cool inviting haven.
The hosts - how can you review people that are now your friends? Ed and Art are generous hosts and lovely men. They are intelligent, funny and insightful and over a glass of wine we shared many fascinating stories and a lot of laughs. They know the city inside out and provided lots of local knowledge. With Ed and Art you will never feel like like a number (or a $$) you will feel like part of the family. We already miss them.
If you want an authentic and memorable New York experience start by booking your accommodation here!!

Staying at Arthur and Ed's house was an unforgettable experience. It was not just a rent a roon at airbnb. It was much more than that: socializing with loving people, polite, fun, caring and know how to care very well.  They provided me with tips in town that I would never find out without their help. Left wonderful friends in New York and for sure I will be with them again. Guys, you are great!

Arthur and edward were extremely nice to us. Much more than we expected. They helped us a lot on this, out first visit to NYC.they know a lot of history and all their advices about restaurants and places to visit were wonderful.
The appartment is incredible, the room, the bathroom and kitchen are beautiful.
We surely recomend anyone to go there!

I had a GREAT time staying with Arthur and Ed in their lovely Highline Home, which was all they said it would be and more.  They could not have been more hospitable.  Five of five stars for them, their home, and the popular and artistic Chelsea district.  One of the best features of my stay there was the ease with which I could access the Highline at any time up to 11 PM.  Try this special urban walk on a warm evening with a bright moon and you will be hooked!

Lee

This is a great space. The whole apartment is lovely and very conveniently located.  It was nice being right by the Highline. There's plenty to do nearby and  it  is easy to get  east west and  north south  from this location.  

Arthur was  away during my stay, but he is an immediate email responder and made everything  easy in terms of  travel planning.   Ed and Lea  were most accommodating.  As others have mentioned, Ed has a profound love of NYC and a delightful story teller.  

The only thing I would mention as a potential drawback   is that they do have two cats who are  lovely, Castor and Pollox,   but people with cat allergies should be  aware of  that.   My own allergies are minor, but was still affected.

It was our first time in NY and we are so lucky and happy that we had a chance to meet Arthur and Ed and stay at their fabulous pent-house! Their place is really nice and clean. Best location in NY, close to everything! And at the same time it is also in a quite spot, where you can enjoy a deep sleep, which is kind of rare in NY. 
Art and Ed are very kind and will do their best to make your stay in NY perfect. They helped us with the surroundings and gave wonderful tips how to experience the local lifestyle in NY. They also helped us with our next trips to other parts in the US, very helpful tips! 
Thanks to Art and Ed, our first impression of NY is fantastic!

We had an absolute wonderful time staying at Arthur and Ed's place. Ed was such a welcoming host, making us feel at home straight away. Also very accomodating about dropping off our luggage early which made it easy for us. 
The room was lovely, super soft sheets with lots of thoughtful little touches like a personalised map of the city, a DVD set on the history of New York and even a white noise machine.
Beats staying at a hotel any day!

Lukas and me enjoyed our stay absolutely! Everything was fantastic organized and everyone was really helpful and welcoming to us. The appartement and our room were great. We can recommend this Airbnb absolutely!

Art and Ed are very congenial, hospitable and go out of their way to assist.
The location is very convenient and the environment appealing.
The room, while not large is pleasant and clean, so is the bathroom.
The room is in fact situated inside Art and Eds's apartment, with other participants. While this did not disturb us, this fact is not clear from the advance description on your site.

Arthur and Ed are great hosts. They are very friendly and very pleasant to talk to. They have given me great advices about what is to do around. The room is very comfy, the bathroom is great. All is very clean. I slept very well in the bed. The window to the room is looking to the highline. It is not only green and pleasant to look at, it also means that, for New York, it is not too loud at night. To sum it up, I really felt like home and I hope the room will be free when I come back next time!
Oh yes, and Arthur speaks perfect French which was really helpful as I was too tired to speak English when I arrived... :)

Where do we begin!!!! The place is even better in person, very very clean, and very spacious! We had a very comfy stay in a great location! Ed was a great host! Giving us a tour of the home and showing us where we should eat and what we should see. The home is lovely! You won't regret it one bit! I HIGHLY recommend anyone to stay here! We will definetly be returning here for our yearly NY trip!

I can only say that the hosts are the best! I do feel that is at home! "Your house is my house" he he Thanks ED! The house is beautiful, full of art and literature in each corner, a unique location, the room is beautiful in every detail, certainly is a place where you feel good! Strongly recommended!

This was my daughter and my first trip to New York.  We LOVED the location!!!  Away from the commotion of Times Square and close enough to the subway for our daily trips around New York.  The apartment was clean and Ed and Art were the perfect hosts.  They made suggestions of sites we might want to visit, and restaurants to go to.  Thanks again to both of them for making us feel so comfortable in their home :)

Location.  Location.  Location.  About as good as it gets in Chelsea.  Literally next to the High Line, a couple of blocks to the subway, a great restaurant (Red Cat) downstairs, a friendly wine bar (Drunken Horse) next door, a cool art gallery two doors down, walking distance to everywhere I wanted to go, etc., etc.   The house, room and bath were all immaculately clean and stylishly decorated.  Plus Art and Ed were fantastic hosts -- about the most down to earth Manhattanites I've ever met.  Overall, a great stay!

Our experience at Eds and Arts place was great! We stayed almost a week at their place. From the beginning, we were welcomed and we felt ''at home''. Both hosts are very helpful to show their city and tell about their experiences. At the mornings, we got the real American breakfast, made by them selves and that was lovely. The location could not be better. 5 to 10 minutes walk to blue and red lines and 15 minutes walk to the Chelsea market! We definitely recommend staying with these friendly people! When we were back home we missed them even a little.

Our stay with Arthur and Ed was in a word: perfect.
They are gracious hosts and great people.  We enjoyed everything about our stay and it could not have worked out better.  Thank you Art and Ed-- we will definitely be keeping in touch and will see you guys again! Have the warmest holidays, and much happiness in the new year.

Katy and Jerry

Arthur and Edouard are great hosts! Very friendly and welcoming, they like talking about their city and have lots of nice places to recommend. The apartment is wonderful, super clean and very well decorated (with a huge christmas tree in december!). Especially, this is the perfect location to visit all places. I fully recommend these hosts and flat for a trip to NYC.

Art and Ed's home is beautiful and welcoming. We had a short time to actually spend getting to know our host and it was time well spent. I felt right at home from the beginning. I would highly recommend staying here.

The week we spent in the Ed and Arthur’s house gave us great pleasure. The room is very cozy. The location is great, it is very close to Manhattan's tourist attractions and close to buses and the subway. Ed and Arthur gave us valuable advice and told us a lot about Manhattan's history, which we really appreciated. We highly recommend Ed and Arthur’s house for all who would like to spend time in Manhattan!

My sister & I spent two nights with Art & Ed, and wished we could've stayed longer.  Their place was everything we expected it to be and more. Their home was clean and beautifully appointed; the bedroom was comfortable, quiet, and we both slept well. But, it was the "lagniappe" (that something extra) that made our visit there so special: Art & Ed were very attentive, warm, and generous with their time and space. They made our stay in Chelsea one we will always remember. Thank you both very much!! We look forward to seeing you again sometime.

We arrived to a crackling fire, a beautifully decorated tree, and candle light throughout the spacious and elegant living room.  This is a really gorgeous home, in a great location, which would cost a fortune in it's entirety but is available for the price of a modest bedroom.  

Ed and Art could not have made us feel more welcome.  They are the consummate New York hosts full of knowledge and suggestions and were so generous with their time and hospitality.

We had more than everything we could possibly need or want in our brief stay and feel we left with two new NY friends.

Art and Ed's home is a  beautiful, classic NYC brownstone with high ceilings, tall windows, fireplace, and large kitchen. It is centered in the heart of Chelsea, in the heart of the art gallery district. And the new darling of NYC, the High Line, struts across the back windows of this home. You are surrounded in beauty and right in the midst of Chelsea.
Art and Ed are gracious people. Throughout our stay, they gave us a mixture of privacy and entertainment. They are storytellers and art collectors. In front of their fireplace, I learned from their stories and from their art books the history of many successful artists. This was a perfect segue from these stories and out to the galleries right around the corner.
Art and Ed are kind as well. My husband came down with a sinus cold while staying with them. Ed made his famous chicken soup - twice - for my husband.
Art and Ed are lovely people and this is a lovely place to stay.

Great location with direct acces to High Line, nice neighbourhood, very nice hosts that can speak French :-) and give great tips, the house is very cute and well maintained, high quality bed. All you need for a perfect stay in magic New York city. I was there 3 nights with my friend and two on my own.

A match made in heaven. Art & Ed go out of their way to make you welcome and comfortable.  As an older couple, we liked the separate twin beds which were very comfortable though the room is small. The private bath was clean and stocked with quality products. Lots of variety in breakfast products, and free run of the well equipped kitchen. We spent evenings enjoying a fire in the living room and talking to our hosts. Chelsea is a vibrant neighborhood, close to public transportation and many restaurants. Our bedroom overlooked the Highline, the old elevated railway which has been converted to a lovely walkway. Our hosts were generous, thoughtful and very helpful suggesting places to go and things to do.  This was truly a 5 star experience.

Cet appartement est parfait! En plein coeur d'un Chelsea anime, au bord de la High Line, et entoure de restaurants de qualite, d'une boulangerie (Sullivan) a tomber par terre, et le tout manhattan a portee de main...
La decoration est superbe, on sent des hommes de gout derriere le choix des livres et des oeuvres d'art contemporaines. La chambre est parfaite et sa salle de bains attenante privee respecte notre intimite.
