Ed and Art really take trouble to make their guests feel welcome and are extremely helpful and knowledgeable about the local area and New York more generally. The appartment is lovely and the location is great - we went all over New York from here really easily. I would absolutely recommend staying here.

Whatever we say would not even begin to describe the amazing experience that we had at Art and Ed's place in the heart of Manhatten. The apartment is beautiful and to us it felt like home. But that is just the bonus. Meeting Art and Ed was what actually made our stay truly special. Dear future guests, you are in for a treat. You will meet two of the moat intelligent, kind, friendly and detail-oriented people, who would go the extra mile to make your stay in New York one to remember. History, cultural heritage,art, food, you name it... You will be treated to a comprehensive guide and isights that you can only get from real people and New Yorkers. Could not imagine a better location (view of ESB) through your living room window and the High Line 5, yes 5 meters away) and we can't wait to be back!!

What a wonderful experience for a first AirBnB experience!  We picked Arthur and Ed's place for the location and all the positive reviews and were not disappointed.  Chelsea market, Greenwich village, Flatiron district can all be reached by foot or a short bus/subway ride away.  Since several subway lines have stations on 23rd St., it is easy to access all parts of NYC without the fear of getting lost.  We also felt very safe walking 'home' late at night.  Arthur met us when we arrived and provided a great deal of useful information for us and answered a number of questions we had.  We told him the sites we were visiting and he provided suggestions to restaurants that one would not typically find on tourist sites.  BTW, we texted Arthur for the name of a restaurant he told us about previously when we were in the Financial district and he immediately responded with the info!  He also recommended dinner at the Red Cat restaurant just below the townhouse since we were arriving in the evening and did not want to venture too far for a good meal.  The Red Cat was wonderful and we would definitely eat there again.  We can only second all the reviews about the wonderful accommodations, cleanliness, and  continental breakfast provided.  I especially enjoyed sharing a glass of wine and conversation with Arthur and Ed when we returned early one night.  As mentioned in other reviews, they will provide as much privacy or conversation as their guest desired.  Will not have to spend time looking for accommodations for our next visit to NYC, it will be at Arthur and Ed's.
Nice host and location, definitely will visit again when back to NYC

Whatever you're planning to do in NYC won't be nearly as good as staying in with Art and Ed over dinner and refreshments. Our only regret is that we didn't stay in every evening with them! They're amazingly generous, incredibly accommodating, and hilariously entertaining. We'll never, and I truly mean NEVER, stay anywhere else when passing through NYC again. You won't regret any of it!!

My fiance and I are the easy-going type from Ontario, Canada. We have family/friends in Toronto and all over GTA but we even try to avoid that bc of the crowds. So we weren't really looking forward to NYC, even though friends, family, and co-workers obviously gave rave reviews and plenty of suggestions on things to do. We were happy to find this gorgeous penthouse in Chelsea based on their 5 star reviews. Their hospitality is truly above 5.

Art is prompt at getting to know you and eager to offer a true New Yorker experience. We were texting details about ourselves and our ideal NYC experience weeks/days before our arrival. We arrived several hours before check-in and Art nearly demanded we drop our things off and freshen up in their spare bathroom, even if we couldn't access our room yet. We felt so welcomed and ended up staying a couple hours that morning to "catch up". Our stay was almost 3 days and left feeling so satisfied with fitting several suggestions that suited us into our visit - nearly all of which were suggestions of Art and Ed's. 

They have wild schedules but never failed to be amazing hosts when we saw each other, like we'd known them for years. And like their site says, they always left coffee and breakfast options available in the mornings, clean accommodations and fresh towels. The rest of their place is spotless and beautifully decorated with all kinds of art and photographs. Art and Ed do well in keeping out of your hair while there, which my fiance and I usually prefer, but we just couldn't get enough of our conversations with them! 

My fiance proposed to be the day after we left Art and Ed's for our cruise and we both actually wished they had been there too to celebrate with us haha. They are, at the very least, the cherry on top of your NYC experience. But they were definitely our highlight!

A fantastic place to say, both Art & Ed make you feel right at home. Their support throughout our stay was far better than you could get at a hotel. Their beautiful home is so well placed, only a few steps to get on to the very popular Highline, 2 blocks from the subway and bus stops outside. Plenty of eating  places nearby, with great recommendations from the guys. Short walk to the Whitney art gallery and really interesting Chelsea Market, but only 2 stops,  on the subway then a couple of blocks walk from Times square or 5 minutes to the World Trade Centre stop and access to downtown. Breakfast being supplied was a lovely touch, plus use of a small fridge makes life easy.  We would highly recommend a stay here and really hope that we are able to get back to New York and a stay here again as soon as we can. Thank you.

We were absolutely thrilled with Arthur's apartment, which is very well located. The apartment is nicely quiet, very clean and well furnished. You have a view of the HighLine which is right behind the house. We liked it very much, to walk on the HighLine. Nature in New York City.
The area feels safe and there are lots of restaurants outside the door.
Arthur was absolutely delightful with us, very obliging, always available and quick to answer our questions. We will recommend this host and lovely place.

Arthur is amazing. He is so kind and hospitable and his place is 12 on 10. There are no downsides and you will rarely ever find even a family member as hospitable and kind as Arthur. He was so sweet and even gave me a piece of luggage when I had some luggage issues. He truly is a gem as is his place. Staying at his place is a once in a time experience, so do it without any doubt.
A great location, not only for the Highline but also buses & subway. Plenty of space to feel at home. We loved it.

Arthur and Ed have the gift of hospitality, of immediately making strangers feel at home.  Can’t say enough good things about the accommodations, the assistance from our hosts, and the ambiance.  Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Everything was great- what a perfect location. Thanks for the thoughtful and detailed info about the area. I highly recommend Arthur’s space and will see if it works next time we are back in the area!

Our second stay with Art and Ed exceeded expectations. Who else would call us when we were enroute to the subway to let us know that our train wasn’t running and suggest an alternative?  We love the homey atmosphere and are already looking forward to seeing Art, Ed and the kitties again next year.

Je vous recommande à 200% de faire un séjour dans ce merveilleux logement . Arthur et Ed sont formidables. Un séjour à la hauteur de nos attentes. La literie parfaite. Le cadre aussi. On reviendra.. ❤️
Location, amenities, cleanliness, kindness... everything is amazing.

I cannot recommend Arthur and Ed's home, hospitality and company enough. We were in New York for 4 days of theatre, art and sightseeing and this was the perfect place to stay, well located, comfortable, friendly. Arthur and Ed were full of tips and help and are a pleasure to stay with. I hope to stay again and will be recommending them to all of my friends!

Everything about Art and Ed's place was fantastic. The pictures speak for themselves and the place was extremely cozy/homely. Not to mention they had the most beautiful Christmas tree we've ever seen. It was so much fun sitting by the fire at night - it even snowed twice while we were there.  Coming from Australia we've never experienced a "White Christmas" but we can tick that off our bucket list now. 

The location was amazing, however we thought the highlight of our stay was getting to know Art & Ed/Caster & Pollux (their adorable kitties). They put so much time and effort into giving us tips and suggestions for things to do / places to eat / ways to get around. They went above and beyond! We loved spending time with them too having lots of chats about everything and anything. We learnt so much about Chelsea's History/ NYC's History etc. 

It was sad to leave, but hopefully we'll return to NYC one day soon! 

Art and Ed - We'll miss you guys and of course Pollux and Caster. Stay in touch :)
Lovely hosts, lovely apartment would recommend without hesitation
Another wonderful stay with Ed and Arthur. They are the most hospitable hosts and the apartment is fantastic. Comfortable and in a great location. We will be coming back.
It was great to have access to kitchen, coffee, clean bathroom, and great company during our time in New York.  We hope to come back soon.

This was my first time using Airbnb and I could not have been more pleased with the service I received. 

I will likely stay here each time I come back to NYC.

Arthur is the most gracious and considerate host.  His communication is timely and thoughtful of our needs.  Unfortunately Mother Nature threw a huge storm at the east coast and our flights were cancelled and we did not end up making it to the city.   Arthur was quick to respond and very understanding.
Fantastic location. Charming. Gracious host. Will definitely return again.

It is worth a trip to NYC JUST to stay in Ed's warm, comfortable and gorgeous home.  We felt welcome and spoiled from the moment of our arrival.  In Chelsea, within steps of the high line, this home occupies the 3rd and 4th story (penthouse) of a charming 4 story building. Our bedroom, looking out on the high line, was on the same floor as the kitchen and art filled dining and living rooms.  Ed and Art gave us great advice on where to go and what to see.  We had dinner at The Red Cat on the first floor of the building; it was the best meal we had!  If you want to treat yourself to a pampered visit, stay here.  Its proximity to the high line, subways and buses make it a convenient location no matter what you want to do.  Oh, I almost forgot to mention the excellent continental breakfasts and the availability of our very own mini-fridge.

Arthur and Ed are amazing hosts and their place is immaculate, cool, comfortable and perfectly located to explore Manhattan. The room is very nice, with a view of the High Line. The beds and linen are top quality - just what you need after a full-on day (or days) of walking and exploring the city. Arthur and Ed are incredibly thoughtful, providing breakfast, toiletries, local tips and good humour. 
Our days were packed so we had very little time to chat to them but when we did they were great company. Honestly, I can’t think about anything negative about our stay. Exemplary!
I don’t think you could do better than Arthur’s place.  Great location. Great accommodation.  And best of all, great hosts.

Staying at Arthur and Ed's was all that I expected and more. The location was excellent - really right next to the Highline with lots of restaurants, cafes, diners etc nearby. Check-in and communication was super easy and painless. The bedroom and bath are as shown and very nicely appointed with lots of extra amenities like spare toothbrushes, soap & shampoo for guests. The rest of the penthouse apartment is also beautifully done up and is a place of light and space. Both Arthur and Ed provided lots of tips for local eateries, transport, things to do etc. Thoughtful touches included provisions for breakfast, a little fridge for my use, bottomless coffee. Their two cats showed up occasionally but in general were too shy to stay in the kitchen and guest areas. Above and beyond all this, Arthur and Ed are very warm and welcoming hosts, and we ended up hanging out in the kitchen having great fun discussing the "interesting times" that the USA finds itself in under its 45th President over some food and wine. For me, this interaction was the real plus point of my stay - it’s something that I look/hope for when I'm travelling solo and staying at Airbnb rooms, but which doesn’t always happen. Another plus point was the anti-Trump art in the windows which is a mini-tourist attraction on the Highline - LOL!  Even though they were away for part of my stay, I felt completely secure and at ease in the apartment and with their house sitter. Arthur was always available if I needed to check anything and he also checked in regularly to see that I was ok. My brother and sis-in-law had travelled to NYC as well and there were no issues with them coming to the apartment to hang out before checking in to their hotel etc. In conclusion, I can’t recommend Arthur and Ed highly enough.

Ce que l'on peut trouver de mieux sur Airbnb à tous points de vue : 

Appartement fidèle à la description (calme / confort/ esthétique) 

Localisation optimale en terme d'accès à pied ou en transports en commun à tous les quartiers de NY 

Nos hôtes :  inégalables ! 
Arthur et Ed nous ont accueillis de manière très amicale. A l'écoute de nos moindres besoins et disponibles pour nous enrichir de leur grande culture et nous faire profiter de toutes les richesses de la ville.

Art and Ed excel as hosts. They go the extra mile to make their guests feel welcome. It was delightful to come back the apartment after a busy day sightseeing. They were happy to help us find our way around and offered excellent suggestions for places to eat or visit. The location is central, very close to transportation and is a pleasant area to walk in. The apartment is spacious and light filled, overlooking the Highline. We were able to cook in the kitchen. Our hosts provided makings for breakfast and treats which were much appreciated. Wish we could have stayed longer! Hope to return soon!

This a First Rate accommodation. Beautiful bedroom with two twin beds and your own private bathroom, stocked. You also have access to your own refrigerator in a fully equipped Kitchen. Also with a Beautiful Dining area and a Absolutely stunning Living room + plus two cats. Lol We rate this Air-B&B 5 stars +++++

Why stay at the Plaza when you can stay here and get 5 star treatment for a pittance. 
Your room will have a view of the High Line. Your accommodations will be immaculate and welcoming. 
The location is perfect-walk the High Line to Chelsea Market, two subways stops within a couple of blocks, great restaurants close by - within walking distance of buses and Penn Station.
Your hosts will provide breakfast and absolute privacy if that is your desire. 
We have stayed here twice and plan to return again and again for our biannual New York visits.
These two are now dear friends.
We wouldn’t THINK of stay elsewhere.
This is home.

Art and Ed's place was wonderful to stay in! They're not kidding when they say they're right on the High Line! The location is wonderful, the bedroom is quiet and the house is incredibly clean. Art is very responsive to any and all questions, and he gave us many great tips for our stay in the city. I would definitely stay here again!

Staying here is like being in a New York dream. Arthur is a wonderful host – informative and friendly. The apartment was bright, quiet, clean, and stylish – the perfect tranquil spot to unwind. The location is fantastic. I used the High Line to commute to my work meetings.
Excellent location, stylish apartment, and warm and kind hosts who made our New York experience full of wonderful memories.

Einfach traumhaft... und nicht zu toppen! Superhost in jeder Hinsicht - vielen Dank für alles! Wir würden jederzeit wiederkommen und können es jedem nur ans Herz legen,  bei den beiden zu wohnen.... tolle Tipps, leckeres Frühstück und vieles vieles mehr inklusive.  Liebsten Dank für alles!!!!
I loved staying here! Great location and comfortable space. Art and Ed were friendly and helpful hosts and I would love to stay again next time I’m in NY!

Art and Ed were the most welcoming hosts ever. Due to flight delays, I wasn't able to check in until it was super late. In the back of my head, I was nervous since I was going to disrupt their sleep with all of the flight updates, but they were completely understanding the entire time and made me feel right at home from the start. The location was fantastic since it's right next to the High Line and close to the E train which made it super convenient to go to HK and Tribeca. Bedroom, bathroom, and kitchen amenities was top notch.

Arthur’s place is right at Highline. We had no trouble getting to places, buses and subways, all nearby. Arthur and Ed are extremely considerate and thoughtful. Their home is lovely and clean. They had quite a setting for their guests, the morning coffee, breakfast and so on. I and my husband didn’t get much chance to talk to them but the short period we talked, you just know they’re nice and wonderful people. We had a great time staying at their home. We went to some places Arthur recommended. It was amazing. I highly recommend their home to anyone who wants to go to New York and enjoy.

This is the real deal!  I will definitely be staying here when I visit New York again.  Arthur and Ed are fantastic hosts. They are courteous, generous, friendly, and extremely knowledgeable about NYC.  You can learn lots of interesting facts about the history of Manhattan and Chelsea from them, as well as recommendations for food and activities.  Their home is gorgeous and was much nicer to stay at than a hotel. One of the best Airbnb experiences I’ve had.
Great hosts, fantastic location and really comfy beds with fabulous linen.

This was everything you can expect from an AirBnB rental. The location, the space, the amenities, all top notch. And the hosts! Art and Ed couldn’t have been more hospitable; great communication, and their wealth of knowledge and recommendations for both the neighborhood and NYC in general were invaluable. There were many thoughtful touches - our own refrigerator stocked with breakfast items, freshly brewed coffee every morning, toiletries and bathrobes - that all added to make this a great stay.
We really enjoyed staying with Art and Ed. They were both very helpful. Their home is gorgeous and we appreciated their chats, the use of their kitchen and the great location.
Ed & Arthur are great host. Their place is wonderful and their hospitality is amazing. I highly recommend them!!

I said in my previous comment that I couldn't imagine staying in another place whenever I went to New York again, so when we decided to return to New York, we naturally stayed with them again, and it was just as lovely as the last time. They also made some improvements around the house (like a fridge just for guests and better wifi), and they even had new recommendations of places for us to visit, so we had a great time again.

I don’t think any review can really do this place justice. Arthur and Ed are welcoming and wonderful hosts, and their 2 cats are similarly charming. The apartment is beautiful, everything is immaculate and you are surrounded by more excellent restaurants than you can count. The highline is a literal stone’s throw away and Arthur and Ed are full of tips and suggestions in the unlikely event you find yourself short of things to do. This is Airbnb at its very best and our trip was immeasurably enhanced by staying here.

This is an absolute gem in the heart of the Chelsea district in Manhattan. Everything was top notch and Arthur and Ed are experienced and gracious hosts. If you're looking for a great location, a beautiful and comfortable homebase and two wonderful humans as hosts, then you've found your place.
Oh my.  Favorite Airbnb ever.  Gorgeous space, over the top hospitality, perfect location , affordable and generous and fascinating hosts.  We made new friends!  5 stars is not enough.
Staying with Art and Ed has become an integral part of our annual NY adventure. They are excellent hosts and provide a welcoming spot from which to explore NY. Highly recommended

We had a great time at Ed & Art's place. They are wonderful people, we had so much fun together and learned a lot about New York City. The house is very nice, sparkling clean and in a prime location. And the cats are really cute and friendly. Highly recommend. :)
We had a fantastic stay at Arthur’s place. We have stayed in lots for Airbnb’s this one was one of our favourites. We 100% recommended staying here.
Terrific place and gracious hosts. My second time there.

This space is exactly as you see in the pictures - beautiful, clean, comfortable, convenient & affordable!   Art & Ed were excellent and knowledgeable hosts who gave us privacy but also shared amazing history of NYC when we had the opportunity to chat with them.  They provided every amenity you could possibly need and even bought some gluten-free products for my husband!   Communication was easy, they provided an entire binder on NYC sites and restaurants, the beds were comfy and the overall space was clean & comfortable!  We would definitely visit Art & Ed again!
The absolute best!

Arthur and Ed are very nice host and they gave a lot of information which are very helpful for us whom come New York for the first time. They also prepared coffee/bread/juice/fruits with other food for breakfast. The room is super clean and the location is very convenient to everywhere. Subway station is just few steps away. The bus stop is downstairs. We went to / Whitney Museum of American Art— Andy warhol exhibition now / Nature history Museum / Wall street & Ellis island for Liberty Status / Lincoln Centre for concert/The Metropolitan Museum of Art.  All places easy to go . There are many restaurants around the blocks, Some are 24 hours open.Supermarket is very nearby just cross the street.  The apartment is located in the middle of highland park with nice view outside the window.  For the persons who come New York the first time, it is a very good choice to stay at and highly recommended. By the way, Castor and pullox are lovely and friendly cats.

We stayed at Art and Ed's place during a week long business trip.  There home is beautiful and it is in the perfect location.  Their hospitality was exceptional and we so appreciated their tips for the city.  There are so many wonderful restaurants in the surrounding area and it is literally right on the High Line.  We would highly recommend!

name: Art Studio - Heart of Plateau
summary: Spacious art studio situated in the center of the urban action of the Plateau steps away from the Mont-Royal metro. Living space is a contemporary environment combining design and original character.
space: Welcome to a unique artistic living space! The studio is situated on the 1st floor of a century old building, one block from metro Mont-Royal and in the center of the urban action of the Plateau next to trendy boutiques and restaurants of St-Denis, Rachel and Duluth streets.  This is an open concept apartment designed as contemporary environment combining design and original character. Hall with closet, kitchen with center island, massive wood work surfaces and lunch counter, living room, dining room and bed room as an open concept, bathroom with shower. Also features original woodwork, large windows and moldings and a private entrance.
description: Spacious art studio situated in the center of the urban action of the Plateau steps away from the Mont-Royal metro. Living space is a contemporary environment combining design and original character. Welcome to a unique artistic living space! The studio is situated on the 1st floor of a century old building, one block from metro Mont-Royal and in the center of the urban action of the Plateau next to trendy boutiques and restaurants of St-Denis, Rachel and Duluth streets.  This is an open concept apartment designed as contemporary environment combining design and original character. Hall with closet, kitchen with center island, massive wood work surfaces and lunch counter, living room, dining room and bed room as an open concept, bathroom with shower. Also features original woodwork, large windows and moldings and a private entrance. Wi-Fi. Free parking in front of the entrance during weekends and from 4 pm. Weekdays- there are free parking on the neighboring streets. It will be a pleas
transit: One block away from the nearest metro station on the orange line (most central), walking distance from numerous restaurants, bars, cafés, boutiques, markets and parks (Lafontaine, Jeanne-Mance, Laurier) and ten (10) minutes walk from the Mont Royal Park. Easy access to Old Montreal, downtown, museums, place des festivals, and Notre-Dame island by metro in less than 20 minutes, Bixi.
access: Wi-Fi. Free parking in front of the entrance during weekends and from 4 pm. Weekdays- there are free parking on the neighboring streets.
interaction: It will be a pleasure for us to share with you good addresses, to advise you on interesting things to do in Montreal. I am usually easy to reach by email or telephone.
house_rules: No parties. No smoking inside please. You can enjoy smoking at the doorstep, glancing at people passing by:)  Also, please respect the space and keep it clean.

host.host_about: My name is Ana- I am an artist living in Montreal :)

reviews.comments:
The hosts are awesome and have a great place for couples or 2 ppl. It is a nice art studio, simple and it is near everything. We didn't have to take a cab or uber anywhere. We walked through "The Village"  which is where this is located and we had tons of cafes, bars, restaurants and shopping options. It is close to everything that a 20min walk would take you to down town Montreal and the old port as well. 

This was a great place to stay at. We kept our car parked in front of it for 3 days and no one complained. I would stay there again for sure.

Anastasia was a great host, really easy to talk to when arranging the reservation and flexible to meet up with us on our own schedule. The listing was exactly as described, and we love the neighborhood (Plateau). The bed is a futon which I didn't notice originally, but it was comfortable either way. We would definitely like to stay here again. Merci beaucoup!

The studio is on a quiet street in a lively neighbourhood, great cafes and restaurants nearby. Anastasia's brother let us in. Everything was as described. Really lovely, cozy place, sparkling clean and spacious. Would definitely stay again!

We had a very nice experience here and would return. Valentin was warm and welcoming. The place was very clean and well decorated. The neighbourhood is very close to a lot of spots in Montreal! Overall, we're very happy with our stay! Thank you :)
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is a bright, beautiful studio space, in a great location. Close to restaurants, shops, cafes, and the mountain. Well stocked kitchen if you are eating in. Clean and artistically decorated. The host was welcoming and flexible with a rival and departure. I love this apartment and would stay there again.

Anastasia a été très gentille et très accueillante. Son studio est bien décoré et tel que sur les photos. Un excellent pied à terre pour un couple qui souhaite découvrir Montreal. Tout prêt du métro, vous pouvez découvrir les restaurants des alentours ou faire quelques stations pour visiter le reste de la ville. Je vous le recommande.

The studio is located in a great location, quiet neighborhood. Short walk to the metro station, shops, and restaurants. Everything was as described. The hosts were warm and welcoming. I would definitely stay here again!
Anna is a Great host. The property is fully Equipped and is in A great location.   Just that we felt a bit uncomfortable at night  on the sofa bed.

Ana was a good host. The apartment is clean.
Bed is too small but there is an air mattress alternative. 
It would be nice if there was some curtains to make the place darker at night.
This was a beautiful, bright space in a great location!

Anastasia was accommodating when it came to our arrival -- we were later than expected, and had experienced cellphone issues when entering Canada, and she was willing to delay her plans for the evening until we arrived soundly. The place was minimal in the best of ways: clean, bright, well-equipped (except for not featuring an actual bed with mattress-- although that should come as no surprise, assuming you actually *read* the listing details), and we found the shower to be more than satisfactory.
Ana was a wonderful host! Everything was as shown in the pictures/description. The apartment is perfectly located, and allowed us to walk around the city without worrying about travel!

Parfait petit pied à terre très, très bien situé en plein cœur de Montréal. 

Le studio est spacieux, lumineux et aménagé avec grand goût et le futon équipé en lit très confortable pour une personne, probablement un peu étroit pour un couple par contre. 

L'endroit fut idéal pour un weekend de rencontres et de projets créatifs à avancer... le genre de très chouette endroit où je me verrais très bien habiter plein temps. Points bonis pour l'excellent album de Led Zeppelin sur la bibliothèque :)

Bien que très vivant, le quartier est étonnamment tranquille considérant sa disposition très centrale (à deux pas du coin Mont-Royal/St-Denis). L'endroit est suffisamment insonorisé pour passer une nuit confortable, les grandes vitrines avant auront cependant  tôt fait de servir de réveil-matin une fois le soleil levé. 

Ana est une hôte tout à fait charmante, accueillante et facile à rejoindre et propose un endroit que où je n'hésiterai pas à revenir lors de mes prochains séjours à Montréal!

I'm glad I stayed at this apartment during my vacation in Montreal. Anastasia was a very gracious host. She gave me plenty of tips about where to go and what to do and she was very good about responding to my questions. The neighborhood is a very unique one- close to bars and restaurants and full of life. Anastasia was also very accommodating with my rather early check-out time.
Everything was very pleasant, Great Communication and nice appartment in the middle of the plateau. Bed a bit small but place very nice and clean. Would come back again !

Great great location. apartment is really nice and clean.
5' walk from all services, metro and 10' from the Parc du Mont Royal.
Anastasia was really helpfull and available though a late arrival on friday night.
highly recommend this place !!

 (Website hidden by Airbnb)

Ana's space was great! A perfect location and size. It can be a little noisy at times as it's on street level and the bed is a futon, so it's good if you're planning on spending most of your time exploring.
Anastasia and Nikolai were very communicative, generous, and welcoming hosts. The studio is clean and modern, cozy yet spacious.

Ana and Nicolai were so easy to communicate with!  It was a pleasure to stay with them.  Love the layout, and it's in a prime location.  Would definitely stay with them again.  Note: the bed is a futon.  Enjoy!
Warm and welcoming. Loved the place

Le studio est comme indiqué clair, lumineux et spacieux. La rue calme et le métro à proximité en font un lieu parfait pour visiter Montréal. Les resto nombreux ainsi que les commerces facilitent votre intégration rapide.  Ana s'est montrée disponible et accommodante notamment avec des horaires d'avion internationaux parfois imprévisibles...Excellente place a tous les points de vue.
Great place, central, and Anastasia is super accommodating.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great location is awesome and bagels at bagel etc which is nearby are phenomenal
Great place but bed was a bit un comfy

My second time at Anastasia's location, and what a nice stay it was, again! 

Ana is a very nice and accommodating host and a very sweet person.

The studio is very well located, clean, charming and, if you don't mind sleeping on a futon (I don't, it's actually comfortable enough), it is a very nice place to stay if you want to spend time in Montreal.
The studio is great! It was super clean for our stay, had everything we needed and was in a great location. Only a stone's throw away from Rue Saint-Denis and cool coffee shops, bars and restaurants.

I really like the place, the location and interior was absolutely perfect, the host was also incredibly nice. I would really recommend the place, definitely worth it, and I would definitely like to go back!
very nice location and you are able to walk everwhere by foot!

A very cute apartment located on street level in the heart of the Plateau Mont Royal. The place was very clean and is a nice place to stay during a quick trip. The bathroom is great and everything is very close. 

Note that the bed is a futon, so it's better for one person than two! Also the kitchen is not equipped with items for cooking, so it's better if you are planning on eating out (which you should in Montreal).
Drop dead gorgeous space! Very restful as well as inspiring!  I feel so fortunate to have spent a wonderful long weekend in the Art Studio! Would highly recommend and would LOVE to visit again!
Pas vraiment un logement pour voyage d'affaire surtout avec le décalage horaire

Great spot, right in the heart of the Plateau, a charming neighborhood that feels like Paris. Plus, you're only a block away from the Metro stop, with easy access to all of Montreal's major attractions.

Ana's place was clean, central, and nicely furnished.

Le logement est parfait pour un séjour découverte de Montréal. J'y étais en voyages d'affaires, la proximité des transport en commun et des restaurants c'était bien, par contre, il fait clair (même la nuit) et comme c'est tout près de la rue c'était un petit peu bruyant.  Ce n'était pas insupportable, mais si vous avez le sommeil léger, c'est mieux d'amener un masque de nuit et des bouchons pour les oreilles. 

Anastasia a été très disponible et flexible, et répondait rapidement à mes questions par textos. Une hôte idéale! C'est un logement très moderne et j'ai beaucoup apprécié mon séjour.

Anastasia's place was absolutely perfect for our trip to Montreal.  The location in the Plateau could not have been better--just a block and half from St. Denis and a short walk from Av. Mount-Royal.  The studio is so thoughtfully set up and designed, and Ana's style is super fun and inspiring.  The futon bed was perfectly comfortable.  And on a warm night the breeze from the window above the bed was great.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat!
A+ Location. Would definitely stay here in the future

We loved Anastasia's stylish apartment in the gorgeous Plateau area and would have happily stayed there forever. Anastasia was extremely accommodating and very helpful throughout out stay. Merci beaucoup!

The apartment was beautiful, and in a great location! Anastasia was very friendly and answered all of my questions promptly. I really enjoyed my stay.

Just a heads up that as other reviewers mentioned, the bed/futon is quite hard, although Anastasia has put a mattress pad down. It's fine for a short stay but you may want to consider bringing memory foam if you're staying longer.

Studio parfaitement situé, au calme: au cœur du Plateau Mont-Royal, que nous avons adoré et à deux minutes du métro qui amène au Vieux Port.
Le studio est confortable, seul petit bémol: l'absence totale de stores devant les grandes baies vitrées très lumineuses... sympa la journée mais réveil aux aurores garanti!

Anastasia's place is in a superb location that is close to the Metro as well as plenty of restaurants and cafes. 
She is very responsive and accommodating as a host

Really cool little studio apartment in a fantastic location for accessing the Plateau and Mile End. Only a block away from the Metro. We found the futon to be very comfortable, but travellers looking for a proper bed might not. Would definitely stay here again.

This place was cute and is definitely an art studio. It is in a great part of the city! Anastasia said it might get a little loud at night due to the location but we had no problems. Anastasia was very thorough with checkout procedures and helpful with any questions we had about the area. We thought the bed was very comfortable and had everything we needed. There is a nice radio that we used every day and kitchen items for cooking. Would recommend!
Anastasia's studio was bright and cosy. It is in an awesome location and close to lots of great bars and restaurants. I would stay here again next time I'm in Montreal. Thank you! :)
It s basically ok.
Full of character and centrally located; Ana was extremely responsive, which was particularly important as my flight was delayed. Thank you!

Appartamento delizioso! La zona in cui è ubicato affaccia proprio sul Plateau e, volendo, si può sempre restare in zona a mangiare o bere qualcosa. La referente Anastasia è stata precisissima e disponibilissima. Se hai un auto sei praticamente a 10 minuti da ovunque indicato in una guida Lonely Planet di Montréal. Lo consiglio vivamente a tutti.
Great stay! The way it is decorated and the level of cleanliness makes it feel like a boutique hotel. It was very easy to communicate and coordinate with her. Will stay again :)
Great place! Loved it! Will stay again!

Wonderful little studio in a very convenient area - super close to the metro and lots of stores and restaurants nearby. The cleanliness, natural light, and decor make for a relaxing and inspiring atmosphere. It's street level so you often hear people or cars coming by, and there's light from the street lamps at night, but none of that stopped me from having the best sleep I've had in ages (that bed is really comfy!). Anastasia is a great host - very friendly and communicative, and I'd love to stay here again!
Very cool open plan apartment in a hip area, comfortable bed and walking distance to restaurants and bars. The subway is a couple of blocks away. Check in was effortless, I would stay here again.
Awesome apartment at a great location. The apartment is just as you see in the pictures. We felt straight at home! Wish we could have stayed longer.

I really enjoyed my stay. The loft is beautiful and in a great area. Anastasia was a great host and was very communicative and understanding when I was having issues with my phone. I would definitely stay here again.
Amazing place to stay in. Extremely clean and the neighbourhood is really metro, can't have picked a better place to stay

Anastasia's place was stylish and in the perfect neighbourhood for exploring Montreal. We were able to walk everywhere on foot and there were Metro stations right nearby as well. We would definitely recommend this place for any travellers looking to discover the city while living in an authentic local neighbourhood! Thanks again!
Great place in a great location.
Great Place to stay in Montreal.
Beau Logement bien situé, près de tout, bien décoré et lumineux. Stationnement plus ou moins évident. Cuisine équipé de base. Sommes tout ce fut bien parfait pour notre court séjour à Montréal!

Fantastic location in the heart of le plateau. A clean, bright and comfortable studio with futon bed. Easy access and great communications from a charming host. Slightly noisy evening traffic on Friday and Saturday due to the great location.
Magnifique petit appartement, bien équipé et très propre. Vraiment bien situé. Communications très faciles avec Anastasia. J’y retournerai sans hésitation!

The location is great...the apartment is comfortable and clean...I would definitely recommend staying here and would definitely stay here again! Anastasia is a wonderful host and was very quick to respond to messages.

My stay at Anastasia's place was absolutely wonderful. I enjoyed the spacious studio which is very centrally located - a short walk to mont royal and a block from the very frequent Montreal subway. Anastasia was very responsive and helpful throughout and I'ld definitely recommend friends to stay at her place as well.

I had a lovely time at Anastasia's ultra-hip, yet comfortable apartment in the Plateau, one of Montreal's best neighbourhoods. The space is beautiful with lots of natural light and is very spacious. So close to the Metro (3-minute walk) it was perfect for my short stay. Big beautiful windows let in lots of light, so do bring a sleep mask if you're used to sleeping in total darkness. One of the best designed places I've stayed thus far - a pleasure to spend time in. Anastasia was very responsive and easily reachable. Want to feel like a real Montrealer? Stay at Anastasia's!
Anastasia’s place was very fun and hip! It’s in a great location and you can walk to almost anything. My friend and I had a great weekend stay.

I had a great stay at Anastasia's lovely, bright and open apartment. It's new, uber-clean and tastefully decorated. The front windows are all opaque so may not be the best place for anyone who needs to sleep with blackout blinds (I personally really liked the the light :) ). Would definitely recommend.
The studio was clean and in a great location for exploring the restaurants and shops in the plateau. We had a great stay. Would definitely stay here again.

Anastasia’s apartment is not only clean and comfortable, it’s also close to many great shops and restaurants. It’s only a short walk to the metro, too. Anastasia was easily reachable through text and quick to respond. Loved staying here.

The flat is very tastefully decorated, and is in an excellent location. Anastasia is flexible and communicates very, very clearly, promptly and fully. This made getting in and out very stress free. Thank you and I would highly recommend your place in the future.

This studio was exactly what I needed for a long weekend in Montreal. The space is clean and stylish while still being warm and hospitable. The large frosted street level windows were lovely light and definitely added a cool factor.  I can see how large street level windows might not be for everyone - but I really liked them. The proximity to the metro was very convenient but not always necessary as there is so much to see and do within close walking distance of the apartment. 

Anastasia was very responsive and a great host.

Emplacement super pour accéder rapidement au métro et profiter de la vie culturelle du Plateau. J'ai été étonné par l'agencement spacieux et design de cet intérieur coquet. Parfait pour un couple ou un voyageur seul qui aurait besoin d'un pied à terre. Seul bémol, les grandes baies vitrées qui laissent passer la lumière des éclairages de nuit et la lumière du jour. Dans mon cas ça n'a posé aucun problème mais je sais que de nombreux voyageurs auraient eu leur nuit écourtée par ce détail.
Super appartement situé au coeur d'un quartier vivant. L'accueil et la communication avec Anastasia ont été parfait. Très bon choix !
Anatasia was fantastic and quick to respond to any questions I had!

Loved staying in Anastasia’s studio! It was super cozy and perfect for a solo traveler like me. There was a small convenience store right at the corner and tons of shops and restaurants that are a short walking distance away. Communication was easy and i didn’t have any issues with parking on the street for the two days i was there! Would def recommend!

Anastasia's place looked like the photos: clean, stylish, and homely. It's located right in the middle of one of Montreal's best neighborhoods. Anastasia was very quick to respond to any questions and was extremely helpful. I would definitely book her place again!
Cool place! Stylish art studio, good size for 1-2 people. Host very easy to reach and accomodating, would stay again!

Anastasia's place is an incredibly stylish and unique get away located within walking distance of a number of great bars, restaurants, cafes, and stores. The space is open and welcoming with large opaque windows and plenty of natural light. Anastasia is easy to reach and responds in a very timely manner if you have any questions or need recommendations. While freezing in the outside, the place stays nice and warm throughout each room which was a big plus for us, non-Montreal-natives. There are plenty of kitchen supplies and utensils, but they can be hard to find as the home has a very 'lived-in' feel and layout. Also, there is no TV, which wasn't an issue, but thought it should be mentioned (luckily there was a speaker with an aux to play some music). The shower can be a little tricky to get the right temperature and the shower door doesn't close fully (wasn't kidding when I said the space is 'open'). But, all of these minor details aside, this space is unlike any other airbnb or hotel you could find and it is absolutely worth staying in.
Cute, quiet space close to amenities and the metro.
Anastasia was very sweet and kind! Her place was very clean and it was at a very convenient location!
Great location, close to a lot of amenities and very clean! Was a great place to stay for the weekend.

Le studio d'Anastasia est idéalement situé sur le plateau, à 3 mn à pied de la station de métro Mont-Royal et de tous les commerces. La déco est design et très sympa. Il est très propre, bien équipé, très lumineux (ne pas oublier le masque pour dormir car il n'y a pas de rideaux ni de volets), très agréable, idéal pour 1 ou 2 personnes. Anastasia est une hôte très agréable, très réactive et très arrangeante. Elle trouve toujours une solution. Je ne manquerai pas d'y retourner lors de mon prochain séjour à Montréal et je le recommande vivement.
Very cute place to stay in Montreal

Anastasia's studio was an absolute pleasure to stay in. The neighborhood was an excellent central location in Le Plateau, with tons of retail shops, cafes, bars and restaurants to explore. The apartment was immaculate, and the bed much more comfortable than expected!

Anastasia was extremely communicative, providing quick and clearclear instructions for entry and check-out. I will be sure to see if this studio is available if I ever find myself back in Montreal!

Anastasia's studio was perfect for our stay in Montreal. Only a short walk from the Mont-Royal subway stop, which takes you right downtown, the studio is conveniently located in the Plateau, with short walks to some of the cities best neighbourhoods and streets, like Mile End, Laurier-Est and Boul St Laurent. Anastasia was quick to communicate with us, and we appreciated her flexible check-out times which worked so well with our flights. Just a note to future guests that the bed is a futon with a mattress pad, which we weren't expecting. It was a little small for my boyfriend and I and one side had a bit of a bump where the futon folded down which wasn't particularly comfortable to sleep on. That, and the fact that there were no coverings on the large windows (as indicated in the photos) would make it a little difficult for a sensitive sleeper, so I would recommend bringing a sleeping mask if the light at night bothers you as this is an open concept space and everything (aside from the washroom, which was great) is in one space. That was the one thing that was a little misleading about the studio, but otherwise, it was a great space to chill out in after adventuring around the city all day. Thanks for having us Anastasia!
great location - easy check-in and out - communication was good.
Fantastic place in a great location! Easy access to metro and just about everything else in Montreal.
Beautiful little space - charming decor and really clean. Everything was on your doorstep. It also felt very safe, but for lighter sleepers it might be advisable to bring earplugs and a dark mask.

Anastasia's place was the most perfect getaway for a quick trip to Montreal. It shines with warmth and intimate details that really make the place feel like yours. She was an extremely communicative host, checkin and checkout were seamless.

Thank you, Anastasia.

A fantastic little studio in a very convenient location. A lovely relaxing space to chill and work. 
Light sleepers will benefit from ear plugs and a eye mask.

Le studio d'Anastasia est vraiment très beau et bien situé sur le Plateau, proche de toutes les commodités. Il était vraiment très facile de communiquer avec Anastasia, elle était toujours présente en cas de besoin. Je recommande vraiment cet appartement!
Everything was perfect! Loved the space.

Anastasia’s apartment is lovely! It’s very stylish and in an ideal location- close to many restaurants and cafes. The only complaint we had was the bed- the bed is a futon and not a mattress so it was not very comfortable to sleep on.

The apartment was really stylish, incredibly convenient, and in a really fun area. It would be a great place to stay for one or two people max. I had a wonderful time there and definitely recommend it!

Anastasia's place was exactly as pictured! I really enjoyed the openess of it, and it's very convenient location. She was a super great host, incredibly easy check in and would definitely want to stay again.

The apartment is great and in an amazing location. The only "problem" was that the bed is a futon so it wasn't as comfortable. However, if you like to sleep in very dark rooms, this might not be the place for as it does not have curtains. That didn't bother me at all. Anastasia was very nice, accommodating, and responsive. I would definitely stay there again.
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

A nice, street-level studio apartment that is well-maintained and in a great location to walk to St. Denis, parks, and more! Nice, double-lock entryway right on the street. 

Note: This home is *genuine* Airbnb! Some Airbnb properties are permanent investments--the owner rents their property full time. This is not the case here-- Anastasia's home is clearly a part-time art studio and home, which makes it personal. The home is astonishingly clean and well maintained! But tourists who expect a sterile, empty hotel-room experience should look elsewhere. Also note that window treatments do not allow you to "black-out" the space, so if you need total dark to sleep you should look elsewhere. 

Otherwise, come and enjoy a classy, stylish little home! Great, instant communication from the host. Wonderful Indian restaurant and playground one block south. Easy walk to Chocolates de Chloe, Fruiterie  Plateau, Mamie Clafoutis, Park La Fontaine, and other Montreal favorites. Go get hibiscus ice cream at Cremerie Meu Meu! Very close to Mont-Royal metro stop for a quick ride to Old Port, Museums, etc.
Easy communication with Anastasia to get into the apartment, and the neighborhood is nice.
Appartement très fonctionnel et surtout tres bien placé dans un super quartier. Ideal pour découvrir la ville
Nice, simple and clean place, with a great location and access to local sights and public transit.

I stayed at Anastasia’s lovely art studio for two nights while visiting friends. The location is BRILLIANT: so close to the metro, and so many great places to eat and drink. The apartment, as expected, is a studio space on the ground floor with frosted glass rather than curtains. Everything is beautifully done but, as other reviewers suggest, an eye mask is definitely recommended!
Unique studio in the heart of a cool neighborhood.  Anastasia was a great communicator/host and I truly enjoyed my stay.  Would book again.

Anastasia’s place was the absolute best choice we could have made for a place to stay in Montreal! It was spotless, decorated beautifully, and had everything we needed and more! The neighborhood was walkable, and close to transit. Check in and out was so easy and Anastasia was great with communication! We truly enjoyed our stay and would definitely choose to stay here next time!
Anastasia is a very good host. Communication was easy.

Super endroit, au milieu d'un des plus beaux quartiers de Montréal. Loft équipé de base, mais très beau. Le lit-futon est préférable pour une personne. J'y retournerais si j'étais en vacances, mais pas pour un voyage d'affaires. La rue est à l'occasion assez bruyante avec les touristes qui circulent dans la rue.

Great flat in a great location (very close to Subway station Mont Royal). Anastasia was nice, precise and very helpful. The only (very small) negative point was that there are no curtains on the big windows, so bring your sleeping mask. Other than that, perfect! Would recommend 100% to anyone visiting Montreal.

This is a very “hip” studio in a very trendy part of town. It is spacious and very clean. Like other reviewers, the street noise (voices, cars, late night revellers) are very loud, so it might not be the place for you if you aren’t a sound sleeper.  The big windows also lets in lots of light, so a sleep mask or an early start might be necessary. We also had a difficult time finding parking (came in on a Friday). The street signs were confusing (en francais), but once we found one it was free and good for the whole weekend!!  It’s a very lovely spot, but depending on your needs and lifestyle (eg. you’re an old insomniac like me), it might not be a great fit.
Nous recommandons ce studio pour son emplacement, et son état neuf. Anastasia est vraiment très disponible et réactive.  Nous avons passé un super séjour dans ce studio.

Anastasia has a beautiful apartment! Very confortable, clean and perfectly located. Besides, she was very attentive and replied quickly to my questions and requests. I recommend this apartment without any doubt!

Very stylish place located in a great neighborhood with great restaurants and shops, all within walking distance from Mont Royal, the old centre and Mile End, another lively neighborhood. Anastasia was very responsive and helpful. If one thing I would say the bed isn't the most comfortable bed I slept on. Other than that, it was a great place to stay for a long week-end in Montreal.

I really enjoyed to stay at Anastasia's place. The place is same as pictures and location is also great to commute. The place was perfect for me while I can take a rest and enjoyed the city of Montreal. The place would not be an ideal place, if you are a light sleeper.
周边有些吵闹,不利于休息｡
Great location in Montreal, very intimate but central to the surrounding neighborhoods full of life. Also very stylish interior decor. It will make you relaxed to be in.

Anastasia's place could not be in a more perfect location- only about 2 blocks to the metro, in the heart of the plateau's best restaurants. Parking in the area is really tough (outside of Sat & Sun where there is limited street parking in front of the apartment). Apartment was clean and bright and spacious for a studio. Thanks for the great stay! Would stay again next time we're in town!
Anastasia was very gracious in letting me arrive early. I really love this neighborhood and this studio is a great base to explore from.

This was a great place to stay in Montreal, and loved the location as it was easily accessible to the Metro (which takes you to the airport and downtown), close walking distance to St. Denis/awesome coffee shops and shopping, and a very sweet place. Looks exactly as listed in the pictures. I am a light sleeper, but in general had no issues with sleeping as some previous reviews have suggested (there is a fan to help with background noise). Would definitely recommend!
Terrific location and a really nice space. Easy check-in/out so you can focus on enjoying Montreal!
Great apartment, great location, very clean. Easy to find and good value, would recommend
This is my second time at Anastasia's place and it was exactly as I remembered it! Highly recommended to anyone who is looking for a comfortable place to stay near Mont-Royal
Absolutely perfect location!

Clean, modern work studio in a great location. Bed is also a folding sofa, but fine. Not really any places to lounge other than on the bed, but space itself is quite comfortable. As others have mentioned, space can’t be made totally dark, but we didn’t find that an issue. Very convenient location, near Metro.
Staying at Anastasia's place makes it different. Great host and great location, 100% recommended to every person visiting Montreal!

Anastasia's space worked out very well for my two night stay. The location is central and interior artfully done. I'd definitely stay again. She let me keep my bags at the space after check out which really helped! Definitely recommend.
Super séjour dans ce très joli appartement du plateau mont-royal. Je recommande.

This space was very clean and in a good part of the city. There were very minimal amenities - no tea, coffee, dishes in any of the cupboards (all were left in the dishwasher). We also found it got quite cold and the heating takes a while to kick in. The space is beautiful, check in easy, and Anastasia was a good communicator. This place really is a studio and not really designed well to accommodate sleepers. The bed is a somewhat comfortable futon and there is a tonne of light at night through the wall of windows facing a semi-busy street. If the futon was a more comfortable pull out couch and there were curtains over the windows, this would be a great Airbnb. It suited me fine for 2 nights but I was happy to return to a real bed!

This location is absolutely wonderful! It is next to a number of boutique shops and the food around there is great. Getting around town is very easy because the location is a 3 minute walk from the metro. Anastasia's place is extraordinarily clean and the studio is decorated very well. Super great value!

Anastasia’s place is very nice and centrally located. A couple of details could be improved, though: we found the bed to be a little too small for two, and not extremely comfortable. Also the heating made a noise that was distracting, especially at night when trying to sleep. Perhaps add some blinds to make it darker for sleeping too? Other than that, great place!
This is a very cool space in a nice area that’s fun to walk around in and close enough to other interesting parts of Montreal.
Great place to stay in the Plateau-Mont-Royal! Very clean and stylish!
The location is perfect. Close to tons of nice restaurants and subway. Easy to go all places. And the space is quite unique. Really like the plants
Beautiful place and Anastasia really took great care of me.
Excellente réactivité et disponibilité d'Anastasia. Tout était parfait.
Great location and clean and stylish space.

Great communication, beautiful, inspired space with everything you need in downtown Montreal. Close to restaurants and public transit. Can't wait to stay again in the near future and visit Au Pied du Cochon. (If you haven't been there.... go there)

I had a wonderful stay at Anastasia's stylish little (Website hidden by Airbnb) has endearing personal touches and happy plants! The location is amazing...right near great restaurants and shopping...
Anastasia was always easy to reach, generous and helpful. A true treasure for the price.
Perfect location, cozy artistic spot. Very clean, cant wait to stay here again!

name: Modern Balmoral Beach Apartment
summary: Sunny modern apartment only five minutes walk to stunning Balmoral Beach and super close to the city. White with beautiful wooden floorboards, the apartment has a sunny balcony, serene leafy views, a dishwasher, large sun-lit bedroom, a large bathroom with bath/shower and wi-fi.
space: The apartment is perfect for a couple or a single person. It's situated on the third floor of a small block of apartments in a very quiet street. It has lovely wooden floorboards and large windows which look out to a peaceful, leafy setting.  The kitchen is well-equipped with a coffee machine, an electric stove-top, modern oven, fridge, heaps of cooking and baking utensils, wine glasses, martini glasses etc, a smoothie-maker and microwave. There is a large dining room table and a comfy lounge which is very sunny. It features a very large plasma TV, DVD player, iPhone stereo player and wi-fi.    The bedroom is large and has a queen-sized bed, a little desk and access to a stand-up fan and heater (feel free to read any of my books:)  The bathroom is beautifully finished and features a combination bath/shower and use of shampoo/shower gel and fresh towels.
description: Sunny modern apartment only five minutes walk to stunning Balmoral Beach and super close to the city. White with beautiful wooden floorboards, the apartment has a sunny balcony, serene leafy views, a dishwasher, large sun-lit bedroom, a large bathroom with bath/shower and wi-fi. The apartment is perfect for a couple or a single person. It's situated on the third floor of a small block of apartments in a very quiet street. It has lovely wooden floorboards and large windows which look out to a peaceful, leafy setting.  The kitchen is well-equipped with a coffee machine, an electric stove-top, modern oven, fridge, heaps of cooking and baking utensils, wine glasses, martini glasses etc, a smoothie-maker and microwave. There is a large dining room table and a comfy lounge which is very sunny. It features a very large plasma TV, DVD player, iPhone stereo player and wi-fi.    The bedroom is large and has a queen-sized bed, a little desk and access to a stand-up fan and heater (feel free to re
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is literally a five-minute walk down to Balmoral Beach, which is consistently named the most beautiful beach in Sydney. There are a number of cafes and restaurants at Balmoral and it really is idyllic, whether you go for a stroll along the foreshore or take a dip in the ocean.  It's also an eight-minute walk to the heart of Mosman which is known for its boutique shops, wine bars, cafes and eateries. There is also an IGA supermarket and Franklins which are very close.  The apartment is 12 minutes by bus to the heart of the city. I get the bus every day to go to work and it's very easy and close.
notes: I grew up in Sydney and I'm very social, so I'd be very happy to send you an email highlighting the best coffee shops, restaurants and bars in Balmoral, Mosman and across Sydney, and anything else you would like to know about Sydney before you arrive. I know all the secret spots:)
transit: The apartment is very convenient to public transport and it's an eight-minute walk to Spit Junction which is the main transport hub for Mosman. You can catch a bus (they literally come all the time) from Spit Junction to the heart of the city to Wynard, Town Hall or Circular Quay (12 minutes) or an array of places like Neutral Bay, North Sydney New Town (M30), Manly or Chatswood.    There is also street parking and access to taxi services like Uber, but I honestly use public transport all the time.
access: You will have access to the entire apartment, any essentials that you need like coffee, tea and sugar etc and access to the washing machine and dryer (on the same floor). There is also a small clothes line that can be automated on the balcony.
interaction: I  will meet you to give you the key and I will be in Mosman. I'll be contactable via phone and text if you have any questions or need any help. More than happy to help you plan your holiday in Sydney and make suggestions!
house_rules: No children please. A couple or a single person only. When you leave I expect the apartment to be as clean as when you found it.

host.host_about:
Nice to meet you. I'm a creative professional living in Sydney. I'm pretty chilled and I love films, words, espresso martinis and Bill Murray. 

I was born in Sydney and know the city very well. I look forward to hosting you and sharing Sydney's secret spots, cafes, bars, restaurants, beaches and sights with you.

reviews.comments:
Kirrilly was very welcoming from the moment I booked the stay. She made it super easy to pick up the keys and find the flat and then she left us tea, coffee, chocolate and milk and bread plus extras in the fridge. The apartment was compact but cute - a good size for a couple to stay and we were completely at home and relaxed there. It's clean and bright with all mod cons and very reasonably priced for the fabulous location.
Mosman is a bit of a hidden gem of Sydney - one of the most beautiful and fancy spots yet so convenient and with not to much tourist traffic. The flat is right near Mosman shops and there are buses straight into town or down to Manly.
Best of all you can walk down the hill and find yourself at gorgeous Balmoral beach. We had hot chips down there every other day and strolled around, even going for a few early summer swims. Glorious!
Do yourself a favour and stay at Kirrilly's.
The host canceled this reservation 125 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The place was exactly what we were after. The location was excellent and Kirrilly was great to deal with.

I stayed at Kirrilly's beautiful & well-equipped apartment with a friend who was visiting from interstate.  We both loved it here! The apartment is in a security block in a quiet street, located near to a bus stop, where you can catches buses to & from the city & Chatswood from very early in the morning till very late at night. The apartment is only a 5-10 min walk to Balmoral Beach & a 15-20 min walk to the start of The Spit To Manly coastal walk. The bed & sofa are both very comfortable & the apartment is very nicely decorated & spacious, with good heating.  Kirrilly was a friendly & very helpful host & absolutely wonderful to deal with! I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a good place to stay in Sydney. Thanks to Kirrilly & AirBnB for such a great holiday rental experience!  :-)

name: Cozy Flat very close to Taksim
summary: Hello, This flat has everything you could need for your stay. Metro Stations away and 5 minutes walk home. On the street there is bus station and the bus can take you directly to the old city where you can visit Hagia Sophia etc.
space: 10 minutes walking you can reach Nisantasi where all luxury boutiques, restaurants and cafes are situated. If you want to go to the nearest seaside, take a cab and pay 3.- USD. Have fresh fish at the  lunch, walk around the fish market and have a “Chay” by looking amazing view of the Bosphorus. There are plenty of supermarkets around, where you can buy anything you like for your breakfast. Welcome home =)
description: Hello, This flat has everything you could need for your stay. Metro Stations away and 5 minutes walk home. On the street there is bus station and the bus can take you directly to the old city where you can visit Hagia Sophia etc. 10 minutes walking you can reach Nisantasi where all luxury boutiques, restaurants and cafes are situated. If you want to go to the nearest seaside, take a cab and pay 3.- USD. Have fresh fish at the  lunch, walk around the fish market and have a “Chay” by looking amazing view of the Bosphorus. There are plenty of supermarkets around, where you can buy anything you like for your breakfast. Welcome home =)

host.host_about:
I was born and raised in Istanbul.
Working on Marketing Agency

Reggae Fan!

reviews.comments:
Can Emre Felah was a very nice and welcoming host! And the apartment was super nice, cozy, clean, light and sunny!! Shopping centers and metro station was just few minutes walk. Neighbours were very quite. 
We will be back to Istanbul middle of november, and will stay in this apartment again for sure! Also will recommend to our friends!

Nous avons été très gentiment accueillis par Cam.  Son appartement est en tous points conforme à la description. L'appartement est lumineux, confortable et bien décoré. Il est situé dans une rue calme et résidentielle à 10 minutes à pied du métro et à quelques minutes de différents commerces et restaurants. Il est est aussi très bien placé par rapport aux différents points d'intérêt touristiques.  Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Istanbul ville animée et pleine de contrastes, nous espérons y revenir le plus vite possible et ce sera avec plaisir dans l'appartement de Cam que nous remercions encore pour son accueil.

Appartement bien situé à  proximité du centre commercial de Cevahir et du métro qui permet d'accéder rapidement aux autres quartiers d'Istanbul. Avec une poussette, j'avais peur des pentes de Sisli, mais ça allait.
L'appartement était plus grand que sur les photos et très propre. Le salon était effectivement bien cosy pour se détendre après les longues marches dans la ville et le quartier était calme le soir. La chambre donne sur un espace vert coté cour avec un balcon. Le grand dressing a même permis de servir de chambre pour mon bébé.
Emre a été un hôte très accueillant et disponible mais pas intrusif.

Emre was a great host who gave many knowledgeable advice on new year's eve. The appartement is bigger than it looks in the pictures, very comfortable and located in a calm area of the city center, 10 min away from Taksim. I definitely recommend it and will come back on my next stay in Istanbul.
Can's place was very spacious and comfortable. Close to shops and a lively part of Istanbul. Everything I needed was present in the flat.
excellent séjour chez Can Emre ;tout était super parfait ;l’appartement était très confortable ; et agréable ; j'ai trop aimé , j y retournerai je n'irai nul part ailleurs

Emre’s place is a very nice spacious apartment which contains all the necessary appliances. The living room is very cozy and gives the comfort of a home. It is nicely located in a quite neighborhood, which makes you feel safe, and  provides easy access to metro, taxi or busses.

I have spent 6 lovely days with my family in Emre's flat. We felt like home in his warm and nicely decorated place. It's even more spacious than we thought and was equipped with everything we could need. The location is perfect, less than 10 minutes away from both the metro and bus station and within walking distance to the lively Osmanbey and Nisantasi. The street is nevertheless quiet and safe. 
Emre is a great, thoughtful host. We had to cancel our intial plan and could only communicate our new dates at the very last minute but he was understanding and helpful. 
I highly recommend this flat to anyone visiting Istanbul.
Many thanks to Can Emre, kind and helpful. I liked his apartment, especially a large living room and a large bed. He has a lot of things in the kitchen. I wish many guests in your house.

Can Emre was so helpful. He was also flexible for the check-in and check-out times, we really appreciated it. Easy to reach the city center via metro and taxi. Thank you for the welcoming and the accuracy of the location.
This is a very comfortable home. I stayed 6 days and was very satisfied. This house also has a central location.

A really nice, cosy and spacious apartment, perfect for couples. The place was clean and the host is really pleasant, responsive and cooperative. The location of the place is good, not far away from public transport and in a quiet neighbourhood. I would definitely recommend this place.
Super appartement spacieux,  decoration original, le tout bien située dans le centre et a proximité des transports en commun. Très bon rapport qualité prix.

Emre is very nice and kind person. He will help you when ever you want. 
Flat is really big and comfortable for living. Everything is near, metro station, bus station, lot of shops with fish and vegetables. 
We like it very much:)
As usual great place

The apartment was simply great 
We had everything we needed, everything was clean. 
The apartment is modern and in a very quiet neighborhood.

A few minutes walk to the metro and to Cavahir Mall 

Well recommended.

Emre’s Apartment is amazing as usual
it’s my second time there  and gonna book it again next month

Emre's house is one of the best house i've ever lived in Istanbul. There's everything for having rest its very clean and comfortable. Home's location is good too cus everything is near. Emre is very good person he is always ready to help you. I would like to have rest in his house for each time i go there

Квартира большая. Чисто и уютно. Оборудована всем необходимым для проживания. Удобный матрас. Спальня окнами в тихий двор. Спать удобно и комфортно. Квартира расположена в 5-7 минут пешком от метро Шишли. Тихий жилой район. Несколько продуктовых и овощных магазинов рядом. Замечательный внимательный хозяин. Очень рекомендую для проживания. 5 из 5.

i was in Emre's house second time and i will go again if the house will be free because Emre's house is comfortable, clean, location is great. you can use any kind of transport which will help you to travel to Asia or Europe side. Emre is really good person and he will always help you. i would definitely recommended his house
Emre's flat is a lovely clean and very comfortable... i stayed heare   4th time and I will be back :)
I liked  an apartment Can Emre so much that leved there second time. Everything is good for that money in Istanbul. He always help what i need.
Great place in the quiet area in Şişli, about 20 minutes ride to Taksim.

Прекрасная квартира, с креативным дизайном  .  Дом очень чистый,а также  большой,   .  Улица очень спокойная, культурный район   .   Вблизи есть большой супермаркет, есть разные магазины  .  Рядом также есть большой торговый центр “Cevahir” самое то для шопинга .  Emre очень дружелюбный  и отзывчивый  .   Он всегда готов помочь   .

The host is very friendly and helpful. The apartment is located in Şişli and I could get to know a bit the daily Turkish life style and cuisine in the local restaurant. The apartment is quite silent and that bed room has no noisy whatsoever.

I have stayed in the flat for 8 nights, it`s a great place to explore Istanbul, easy access to public transport, Cevahir shopping mall is 10 minutes walk, same as loads of shops, restaurants etc. Flat is spacious, bright, you can feel at home there. Quiet and safe neighborhood. There is all necessary things in the kitchen and in the bathroom. Wifi works fine in all flat. There is small balcony where you can enjoy some sun in the afternoon if not going out.  Emre was helpful, friendly host. Highly recommend the flat. the only thing to consider if important for someone - flat is on the third floor so if any health issues, that can not climb.
A great flat with everything you could need and in a really good location.

Great location to explore by foot in a  neighborhood. Easy access from the  metro plus a 15-20 minute walk to   Metrobus. The flat is fine in terms of comfort and cleanliness.  Overall good experience because of the location of the apartment. everything is clean, towels, bed... lovely balcony, Emre is very helpful and good person  I would stay with him if I go to Istanbul again.  I highly recommend staying here. :)

Квартира Эмре чистая, очень теплая, есть все необходимые принадлежности для душа. Эмре бей всегда готов помочь подсказать где, что и как куда добраться, доброжелательный . расположена не далеко от станции Метро Шишли. Минут 10-15 до трц Джевахир, рядом Мечеть. Жаль, что не нет лифта  ибо чемоданы тяжеловато поднимать, как и во многих стамбульских домах, у них крутые лестницы.

name: Kona Coast 1 bed on ocean 4.5 star
summary: Kona Coast Resort. Sitting on the ocean and surrounded by a golf with a large blowhole. Resort is meticulously maintained. Large condo units. Minimum stay 1 week. This is a 4.5 star resort. Very quiet. Checkin Thursday to Sunday only
space: Surrounded by a golf course with the ocean a short walk to see the sunset and the blowhole. Very quiet and clean. The actual unit may vary but the furnishings are the same layout  and standard.
description: Kona Coast Resort. Sitting on the ocean and surrounded by a golf with a large blowhole. Resort is meticulously maintained. Large condo units. Minimum stay 1 week. This is a 4.5 star resort. Very quiet. Checkin Thursday to Sunday only Surrounded by a golf course with the ocean a short walk to see the sunset and the blowhole. Very quiet and clean. The actual unit may vary but the furnishings are the same layout  and standard. Access to pool, restaurant, bar, work out room Air conditioning available but extra. Hawaii  taxes of roughly $ 10 day payable on departure.
notes: Air conditioning available but extra. Hawaii  taxes of roughly $ 10 day payable on departure.
access: Access to pool, restaurant, bar, work out room

name: Waikiki Condo with Free Parking
summary: Enjoy the beauty of Hawaii while living right in the heart of Waikiki.  Large, spacious one bedroom condo with a full kitchen.    Great location in Waikiki with easy access to everything!  Waikiki Beach is only five minutes away walking.
space: Address is 424 Walina Street, Honolulu HI 96815
description: Enjoy the beauty of Hawaii while living right in the heart of Waikiki.  Large, spacious one bedroom condo with a full kitchen.    Great location in Waikiki with easy access to everything!  Waikiki Beach is only five minutes away walking. Address is 424 Walina Street, Honolulu HI 96815 The condo comes with one free covered parking spot. Yes, we are neighbors in the same building....always available. Location is just fantastic living right in the heart of Waikiki!  Close to everything! The unit comes with one free large parking stall, and it is also right on the main Waikiki bus line.....
neighborhood_overview: Location is just fantastic living right in the heart of Waikiki!  Close to everything!
transit: The unit comes with one free large parking stall, and it is also right on the main Waikiki bus line.....
access: The condo comes with one free covered parking spot.
interaction: Yes, we are neighbors in the same building....always available.
house_rules: Respect our property, no noise after 9pm and have a wonderful time in Hawaii!

host.host_about:
We have lived in Waikiki over 13 years now and we love it.  An opportunity came along so we picked up a second unit in this prime location. 

We love living in Waikiki for the ocean, beach and beautiful parks.   And in the evening it is just lovely to stroll around and get some easy eats locally. 

Located only five minutes form the surf, we enjoy the outdoor life Hawaii has to offer.  As well, we are very lucky in that there is always a place to go to in Waikiki whether itis casual food or fancy dining, and no shortage of nightlife.

reviews.comments: Our host was very welcoming and accomodating. Owen was very friendly and easy to get in contact with when necessary. Our space was clean and very comfortable.  The location is in the heart if waikiki so very close to everything bus stops, restaurants, shops, and most Importantly THE beach!! What I also loved about this is is that they offer free parking! This saved us a ton of money. There is also a grocery store right across the street. Loved this place and would definitely stay here again.

Jan and Owen were great. They made us feel at home, were always available and gave us a few tips on what to do around Waikiki.
