The apartment is pretty good and the location is amazing. Not to mention the parking spot, since parking can be quite expensive in Waikiki. Definitely recommended.

Owen was a great host and willing to accommodate our schedule even though we checked in rather late! One thing that rather caught us off guard was the bare bones accommodations. It's still a great value, but as one of the most inexpensive places to stay on Waikiki you do get what you pay for. (Keep in mind that the free parking is worth easily $20/day.) While it has a kitchen, there is no microwave and no utensils, dishes, or pots and pans. We got some aluminum pans to do some cooking in. Also, the toilet looks like it was designed for a child. And while it's not on the list of amenities, lack of WiFi is unusual. Also, there was construction on the buildings next door and the equipment rolled by right outside our front door, making it impossible to sleep in on a weekday in October 2015. In hindsight it may not have been the best place for us because we didn't spend a lot of time in Waikiki. But if you want to walk to the beach or shopping, this is an excellent location!

The location of the condo is perfect for an afternoon beach-side walk or shopping. It is right by the Wakiki and a grocery store is located just opposite to the street. Ross is about 5-minute walk away; so it the Apple store. The condo has the right size with the right equipment and the actuality is the same as the listed descriptions.

Owen & Jan were awesome and the place was perfect, it was super clean and looked exactly like what the photos show.. The location is unreal, two blocks "3 minute" walk to the beach and the parking spot was awesome as parking a rental car in Waikiki can be very expensive in its self..

Owen was helpful and accomondating for check in. The apartment and parking was perfect for our needs. Nice size grocery across the street was super handy. Easy walk to beach, restaurants, shopping. Great location to enjoy Waikiki & parking perfect to take off and discover the rest of the island. Suprised to see the cute pool & bbq area.

I used to live in Honolulu and this was a perfect location for my family to come by and pick us up. It was close to the beach and close to the food pantry (a little grocery store) walking distance to a lot of things, city bus stop not far. 

The condo was warm and cozy, and it was perfect! Owen and Jan are very nice people and easy to talk to. If you have questions or need anything they response right away. 

My mom and I enjoyed our stay there! Thank you for making it an awesome vacation!

We loved this place and highly recommend it. It's comfortable and in a great location and close to everything you'll ever need. Owen was more than welcoming and full of great local knowledge. He's prompt to get back to you if you have any queries and regularly checks in to see how you're going. There is now wifi available which is always handy when you're travelling.

The apartment was exactly what I needed. A good sized studio in a small block in a great location. The studio was clean and the air conditioning worked well. There was even a pool and laundry room. It was a perfect trip, except for the weather :)

Staying in Owen and Jan's condo was fantastic. The check-in and check-out were easy, and communication with them was great. The condo was exactly as listed - comfortable, clean, and in a great location. And the free parking is a such a bonus. I highly recommend this condo to anyone looking for a place to stay in Waikiki!

From the moment Owen clicked in to welcome me to his and Jan condo all was good! Great place just 3 blocks from Waikiki! Great location if you want to surf everyday and the Food Pantry is less than 150 feet away! If you rent a car, the parking here is unreal, it's right under your room, no need to wander in circles looking for a place in Waikiki!
The surprising thing is that it's quiet, no noisy residences just typical early morning dumpsters cleaning up and some construction, but hey you don't come to Hawaii to miss the mornings or sunsets. 
Clean condo, could use a microwave but I eat local so if you need one, eat local! Nice little pool, no kids..yes! Out going mail box for postcards and a great A/C if your not use to Tradewinds sleeping.
Come visit Owen and Jan and enjoy a great landing pad right in the middle of Waikiki with Happiness!

I stayed at Owen and Jan's place for a week in December 2015. The place was as described, very comfortable and well located. I only met Owen. He was very helpful and welcoming, gave me lots of useful information and even provided some detergent and water bottles. He was also very respectful of my privacy. I would recommend this place to anyone visiting Waikiki beach, whether for work or vacation.

I have to echo the other positive reviews thus far and add that the parking spot, kitchenette and location are really incredibly invaluable. We were also treated with exceptional warmth before arrival and in person.

Their place was really good! Had an amazing  experience staying on Oahu, and happy that I stayed at this place. Its was very important for me to have a kitchen and stove, so I made sure that they have all the utensils and pots too. They had everything I needed, and were willing to help me if i needed something else! I arrived earlier so they let me check in earlier too, which was a big plus. There is a construction going on during the week days, which didn't bother me much, since I was leaving apartment early in the morning and coming back to the place after they were done, but I would consider that if you are planning taking a nap during the day time. However, I want to say Thank you to Owen and Jan for helping me to get one of the best experiences in my life!

Owen and Jan are wonderful hosts from the point you arrive. They live in the building, and thus are quite responsive if you need/want anything (i.e., extra cooking equipment). They also are happy to offer sightseeing tips, and Owen even told me about some great spots to surf! The property description and photos are spot on. The space is very clean, and I felt very safe (especially as a girl traveling solo). Location is excellent- minutes to the beach, and there is a Food Pantry (grocery store) and coffee shop literally across the street. Can't beat the included parking spot and pool on site. Bed is super comfortable. Tradewinds from open lanai and front door keep the space cool and fresh- I did not even need the a/c though it works as noise cancellation at night if needed. Definitely recommend this property, and I would stay here again. Owen & Jan, mahalo nui loa!!

英語を心配していたのですが､ｵｰｴﾝさんは少し日本語もお話しできたので､大丈夫でした｡
ｾｷｭﾘﾃｨｰもちゃんとしてました｡
お部屋はとても清潔で広く､使いやすかったです｡
ﾜｲｷｷのど真ん中なので､ﾋﾞｰﾁもﾊﾞｽ停もすぐで､どこに行くにもかなり便利でした｡
すぐ向かいにﾌｰﾄﾞﾊﾟﾝﾄﾘｰがあるのもよかったです｡ｷｯﾁﾝが付いてるので自炊もできました｡
駐車場付きなので､ﾚﾝﾀｶｰも置けます!

次回もぜひここに泊まりたいと思います｡
ｵｰｴﾝさんご夫婦にも親切にしていただき､ありがとうございました(*^^*)

Owen was a fantastic host and made us feel very welcome from the day we arrived. He ensured we always had what we needed and was very friendly not to mention quite knowledgable about the area. We loved the condo and thoroughly enjoyed our time there. It was very clean and spacious and had a lovely little balcony. The condo was fully equipped with a kitchen and there was also laundry facilities on the premises which was very handy. The accomodation is perfectly located close to all that Waikiki has to offer. Only a couple of blocks walk to the beach, restaurants and shopping. If you have a car the use of the undercover parking spot was extremely convinient. We would definitely stay here again and cannot speak more highly of Owen as a host. We highly recommend this accomodation. Thanks again Owen for a fantastic stay. Cheers.
Owen was so kind! The department is ok. Very very clean, there aren't many utensils in the kitchen. But is not also a big deal! We had a wonderful holidays!!

The Condo was exactly as pictured and in a great location, Waikiki is so walkable it would be hard to say any location isn't prime. We only met Owen and he was very accommodating and quick to reply from the moment we booked. The apartment has everything you need, and if we felt we needed anything Owen was totally approachable and would have helped. The wifi worked well for us (better near the balcony that other places). Awesome to have a fridge and stove and we used them since the grocery store is across the street. The construction across from the building was loud in the mornings but if you turn the AC on then it muffles it out, and the construction looks to be wrapping up soon anyways. There is no view from the Condo, but the beach and the mountains/canal are so close. The parking was a big plus, we recommend using it and seeing a bit of the island! 
The building, like much of Waikiki does show its age a bit, but that is to be expected. there was lots of storage, and the apartment had a number of basic things for guests to use.  The unit had a nice couch and TV to relax and unwind with after a busy day of Island exploring. Totally recommend this place and would happily stay here again.
The apartment is exactly like it is described. The host was friendly and welcomed us in a nice way. We had a great time in Waikiki.
thaks!

We stayed in Owen & Jan for six days. Owen & Jan were awesome, and so was their place.

We came late on March 24th, and Owen welcomed us with a short introduce to his unit and BEERS!!!!!!!! After a long flight, it was much better than what we could expect. He gave us a lot of advices, where to go, what to eat, etc. in Honolulu. 

When we entered the unit, we were surprised once again, because it looked exactly like in the pictures, but somehow better, larger, and more comfortable. It has almost everything you need in honolulu: beside cooking stuffs, showers,... it also has a small surfing board, snorkeling tools for two people. One of another plus is the parking lot and the location, grocery stores, beaches, coffees, restaurants, are extremely close and in walk distances.

During our stay, Owen was always responsive, when we needed anything. Actually, we were a little bit careless, so we bothered him a lot, but he was always friendly and extremely helpful. If you have a chance you should also visit Owen in the farmers market. His cake was awesome!

All in all, if you are looking for a place, in the heart of Waikiki, with extremely friendly host, a free parking lot and everything ready for your adventure, this is the place you will choose.

Would absolutely recommend staying here! Great location right in the heart of the Waikiki area, plenty of great restaurants, shops, and the beach all within very short walking distance. Also having your own parking stall right downstairs was very convenient. Owen and Jan were outstanding hosts - extremely nice and personable, and always available and willing to help out with anything in the apartment or offer good recommendations for any food/shopping/activities in the area. Would definitely stay here again!

Owen made me feel right at home! He even went out of his way to pick me up from the airport because I had a been travelling all day and arrived late. This was so thoughtful and appreciated!
Owen and Jan's place is perfect because its close to everything! I would definitely come back!

Owen & Jan were wonderful and very accommodating! The unit itself is a little out of date but it was clean and had everything that I could have possibly needed while there. The location is great and located in the heart of Waikiki and a few blocks from the beach. I would highly recommend staying here!
Great place. Close to everything and the hosts were great. This is such a great deal. Can't wait to stay here again.

2回目の滞在です!

今回もとてもきれいにお掃除されていて､広々使えました｡

ｽｰﾊﾟｰのﾌｰﾄﾞﾊﾟﾝﾄﾘｰも10m程の距離にあるのでとても便利で､ｷｯﾁﾝも使いやすかったです｡

ﾜｲｷｷのちょうど真ん中にあるのでどこに行くにも便利で､ﾋﾞｰﾁにも歩いて5分程で行けるので､ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝがかなりお気に入りです｡

駐車場もついて､このﾛｹｰｼｮﾝでこのお値段はかなりいいと思います｡
また次ﾊﾜｲに来る時はおじゃましたいと思います!

ありがとうございました｡

Owen and Jan were very welcoming and helpful. Very convenient as they are located in the same building! 
The Condos location was superb, right in the heart of Waikiki,
A free parking spot was also super convenient.
5박의 기간동안 매우 편안하게 지내다가 돌아왔습니다. 와이키키 중심에 위치해서 위치도 훌륭하고 집에 필요한 것들은 다 갖춰져 있었으며, 호스트 Owen은 매우 친절했고 필요할때 바로 연락되었습니다. 하와이를 재방문 한다면 다시 이용할 의사 100%입니다!

It was so fantastic staying in Owen's house!
It seems like that i'm at home everyday.
The locate is the heart of Waikiki.
It takes 5 min. on foot.
There are everything for living so i didn't need anything to buy!
The best thing is the own parking lot #8.
It is only for you! 
I firmly believe that i'm gonna stay his house next time again.

——————————————————
여기서 6박을 했는데 마치 집에 있는것처럼 편안했구요
집주인이 엄청 친절합니다.
위치는 와이키키비치랑 걸어서 5분정도 이구요 충분히 걸어다닐만 해요~!
집바로앞에 홈플러스 익스프레스정도 되는 마트가있어 맥주와 간식거리를 사기에 좋았고 주변에 맛집들이 있어 밥먹기에 좋았습니다!
집이 깨끗하고 생필품들이 이미 구비되있어 살게 없습니다!
개인 주차장이 따로있어 주차에대한 스트레스를 받지 않을수 있었구요 호텔에서 주차비를 30불정도 받고 세금도 따로 받는다고 생각하면 이방은 엄청 싸다고 볼수 있습니다.
주차장은 정말 저말도 아무도 주차를 못해서 진짜 편했습니다.
어제 한국 도착했는데 또가고 싶네요ㅠ
하와이 너무 좋습니다!
다음에 또가면 오웬집에서 또 묵을거에요~!
편안한 여행되세오~!
정말 여기 강추합니다!

We had a great time staying at Owen's,  the apartment has everything we needed, very clean, as it appeared on air BnB. Very close to buses, supermarket across the road and easy walking distance to the beach, shops etc. make it a value for money place to stay. Your own car park and a pool are a bonus as well! 
Thanks Owen and Jan.

We stayed at Owen's and Jan's and had an excellent experience!

Jan met us as soon as we arrived and gave us a tour of the apartment. She can't be any friendlier! Jan also shared with us a lot of tips as where to go and what to do, this helped us first timers to get to know Oahu better. 

The condo is just as pictured. We found it cozy, super clean, and it's in a really handy location as described in the listing! We were also happy to find things that were not in the listing, such as a microwave and a kettle, sure did help us to fix a quick breakfast everyday during our stay. When in doubt ask Jan, chances are she would have the things you need in the condo!

Parking is just downstairs (covered). Laundry facility is also downstairs in the building. Groceries is just right across the street. Waikiki beach and plenty of restaurants are only minutes walk away. Marukame is like 5 minutes walk away, and we went there twice during our stay! Ala Moana shopping center is about 10 mins easy drive away.

Bottom line is ... we were extremely happy with Jan and Owen and their place, and will not hesitate to recommend or to go stay there again in the future!

Owen's wife, Jan came to greet us on our arrival. She gave us a mini tour and even told us about places to go in Honolulu. The no shoes policy kept the place clean and it was nice for 2 people. They also have some snorkeling gear and beach boards to use for the kids.

Location, location, Fantastic, plus the ability to park your vehicle, only blocks from the beach, this is a gem if you want to be in the Heart of the Action with a down home feel! Also felt very secure. There are laundry facilities downstairs, which is always a benefit. Super nice hosts. I would stay here again!

Owen was a great host.  He communicated well. The location is great as well and the free parking spot is clutch if you are renting a car.  I recommend this spot.  Lots of good eats close by as well and across the st from a grocery store too.

Great stay at Owen's place. He went out of his way to accommodate early check-in, the place is neat, convenient, well kept and equipped with a few handy extras for work and leisure travel (beach towels, iron and board, laundry detergent). Really liked staying there - Owen was very helpful, respectful and responsive.

Although we were not able to meet Owen and Jan in person, they were very helpful and welcoming in their emails to us. The condo was safe and in a terrific location within close walking distance to numerous shops and restaurants in the heart of downtown Waikiki.
5박동안 편안하게 잘 묵었습니다. 호스트는 매우 친절하고 숙소는 안전하며 위치가 정말 좋아요! 바로 앞에 새로생긴 쇼핑센터, 상점, 커피숍뿐만 아니라 트롤리와 버스정류장이 모두 근처에 있어서 편리했습니다.

It was a pleasure to stay at Owens!  He was great with communication and ran home from work to let me in early.  The location - right across the street from the only Supermarket in Waikiki; two blocks to the ocean and the bus stop a half block away.  The unit was great, clean and really functional!  It had everything that the description said it did along with a lanai.  There is a nice swimming pool and accessible, affordable laundry area.  Would definately recommend Owen's to my friends.

This was my girlfriend's and my first stay at an AirBnB and it set the bar extremely high. Owen's condo was wonderful and the location was perfect. It had everything we could ask for and more and far exceeded our expectations. If I ever return to Oahu, I'll definitely be checking to see if this listing is open - I just don't imagine I could find a better place at such a reasonable price!
Owen's place was great especially because of the prime location in Waikiki. The grocery store across the street was also very clutch.
감사합니다. 많이 신경써주신 덕분에 즐겁게 여행했습니다

This is the best place we have stayed in our Hawaii trip! We love everything about this studio, the location, the kitchen, the bed, and Owen is definitely the best host ever! We felt really sad the last day when we had to leave. Will come back again!
Owen was awesome!   Really went the extra mile!   Would stay there again

Owen was a great host! He was great with communication and had a nice little Hawaiian cake for us as a treat when we arrived, very thoughtful. The location is very convenient to the main tourist part of town and beaches.

Owen is the nicest person! We had great communication, he was very flexible with our check in and check out and we got a chance to talk, he is awesome! The check in instructions were very easy and after getting there at 1am that's all we wanted. 
The apartment is neat, everything clean and tidy with everything we needed. There's a supermarket right across the street that was still opened when we got there, so that was a huge plus. It's also a walking distance to everything in Waikiki, the beach, bars and restaurants and the famous stores. Parking is hard in that area, so you'll be happy to have a garage there! We couldn't be happier with the place and we're definitely reaching out to Owen next time we're in town!

ｵｰｳｪﾝさんはとても素敵なﾎｽﾄでした♪
事前のやりとりはとても丁寧で､ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝ･ﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄもこちらの都合を聞いて可能な限り応えてくださいます^ ^気遣いがとても素敵でした｡部屋も写真の通りで､収納ｽﾍﾟｰｽも豊富で有り難かったです♪ﾊﾞｽﾀｵﾙやﾋﾞｰﾁﾀｵﾙも常備されており自由に使えました☆履物は入り口ﾏｯﾄで脱ぐので足元も快適に過ごせます｡目の前にはﾊﾟﾝﾄﾘｰがあり､ﾋﾞｰﾁまでもすぐ近く便利な立地です｡
またぜひ利用してみたいと思います
Great spot very Central and convenient.

This was my second stay at Owen & Jan's place. Owen & Jan are friendly, communicative and helpful- wonderful hosts that are easy to access. The space is quite comfortable, and front door and lanai allow for tradewinds to come through, thus, little need for a/c. The included on-site parking spot is a great and rare find. The space is a very short walk to the beach and ala wai canal. A grocery store is literally across the street. Overall, I had a great stay and felt very safe in this space. Mahalo nui loa and a hui hou, Owen & Jan!

Great host and excellent apartment! The location couldn't have been better. Walking distance to the beach and a grocery store literally steps away. It was very convenient having a kitchen to be able to cook as well. Communication with Owen was fast and effortless. He is very accommodating. The apartment was clean and spacious. We would definitely book with Owen again!!

Everything was great at Owen's place - the photos accurately represent the property, the location is convenient to the beach, shops, and various restaurants, and everything was comfortable.

Owen was super communicative, very helpful in letting me check in early, and generally very pleasant to deal with.
The location is great. The host Owen is very helpful and nice. We encountered a big storm while at Waikiki, Owen even brought an umbrella over for us.

Great value and location.  We were in town for a combined business and vacation trip.  The central location is great.  It was very nice to have a place to park and walk to everything.  As we found, both driving and parking in Waikiki can be a challenge.  
Owen was very friendly and helpful.
Great location! Minutes from Waikiki Beach, shopping, restaurants, public transportation and free parking was invaluable!

Owen was not in Hawaii while I was there but Jan helped us to check in. She was very nice and friendly! The location is wonderful. The room was cozy. I felt that the water pressure of the shower was kind of weak but everything was great! I'd like to stay at Owen's place again:)
Owen and Jan's place was perfect for us.  The location is great and very secure.  It had everything we needed and more.  Definitely recommend them and their place for comfort and value.

하와이는 초행길이 아니어서, 숙소가격도 비싸고 주차도 대부분 무료가 아닌걸 알고있었기에, 과연 이집이 머무를만한 곳인가에 대해 고민을 많이 했었어요.
결론부터 말하자면 대만족이구요 제가느낀 장점은 아래와 같아요

1. 숙소 위치
엄청좋아요. 저녁마다 와이키키, 로얄하와이안센터 쪽으로 걸어서 산책을 갔었어요. 
2. 무료전용주차칸
여행내내 렌트를 했었는데 숙소에 무료 전용주차칸이 있어서 늦게와도 주차걱정은 전혀없었구요.
3. 세탁관련
건물1층에 세탁기, 건조기(각 1달러, 75센트)가 비치되어있어서 세탁하는데도 불편함이 없었어요. 숙소에 세제도 있어서 별도로 세제 구매는 하지않았어요

그 외에도 간단한 양념류, 물놀이용품(부기보드, 스노클장비)도 다 구비되어 있어서 매우 편하게 지내다 왔구요, 
다음에 하와이가면 또 머무르고싶네요~!!
Pretty convenient place close to Waikiki

Location is AWESOME + With a Free parking place! The grocery store is right cross the street. Besides, it only takes couple minutes to walk to the plaza, shopping centers and all kinds of restaurant!!! Highly recommend Marukame Udon which is only 5 mins walking distance!   Owen and Jan are very nice too! The condo is clean and cozy with a full kitchen and balcony!
ﾜｲｷｷﾋﾞｰﾁも近く､これぞﾊﾜｲと言えるすごく便利な立地です｡しかし本当のﾊﾜｲを楽しみたいならﾚﾝﾀｶｰをお勧めします｡自分都合でいろいろな所に行けますから･･･｡そうなるとこの立地で駐車場完備のOwenさんの物件は最高!Owenさんもﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰで笑顔の素敵な方でした｡
Absolutely will stay at Owens again! Great location, easy check in close to everything you need. Great space for a short or long stay

와이키키 해변에서 도보로 5분거리에 있으며 바로 옆에 대형 식료품마트, 전용주차장까지 모든 접근성에서 아주 편리했습니다.
주인 Owen씨도 정말 친절했어요!
굉장히 추천합니다!

We had a good stay in Oahu at Owen's. The parking was really convenient and we appreciated that. The location of the apartment was very convenient as well - close to the beach, lots of shops and food. It was a good mix of very walkable and, because of the parking spot, it was still very easy to drive where we needed to go on Oahu. The apartment is big enough for 2 people, and had the basics that we needed, but the view isn't great and the ambiance isn't anything special. That being said, Owen's place definitely served its purpose and we had reasonably priced, clean place to stay in a great location.

Owen and Jan were so helpful, organized and welcoming. You can't get a better place than this in the center of Waikiki! The highlights- location- within 5 minutes walk to all the action- beach, restaurants, nightlife, activities! Parking space was essential! Home- clean with everything you need! Great for a long or short stay! I hope to be back again to Oahu and hope to stay at their place again! Highly recommended!

You cannot go wrong with Owen's place!  It was very clean and is located right in the middle of everything you're looking to do in Waikiki. i.e. Restaurants, shopping and the beach. He was very informative and communicated each and every detail about accessing his place and things to do in the area.  Looking forward to staying there again!  Great People!!

Great place to be! This place is nothing crazy but very cozy and feels like home. Free parking is a plus here but it's best to park in backwards. Just a block from there is a shopping mall. In the evening, the area is very lively but when your in the apartment it's pretty quite. Love that there is a grocery store across the street and beach is walking distance. So many things to do around there! Just not enough time!!! Next time we go back to Waikiki we definitely would book here again. Thanks Owen for being a great host!
와이키키와 정말 가깝고 모든곳이랑 가깝습니다. 바로 앞에 마트와 버스정류장도 있고 생활용품이랑 부기보드도 있어서 정말 편리해요. 그리고 전용주차장까지 하와이 여행의 모든것이 다 갖춰졌습니다. 오웬은 정말 친절하고 저희 편의를 많이 봐줬어요 ㅎㅎ

Petit appartement au milieu de Waikiki avec toutes les commodités à proximité et un emplacement de parking très appréciable dans cette grande ville. Merci à Owen pour sa prévenance et son accommodation aux situations.
Owen's place was exactly as advertised, comfortable, and had all the basics.
Great place to stay in Waikiki. Location cannot be beat. There is a pool here, and it's on a quiet side street

It was our first Airbnb stay but was great. We are glad it was Owen's. He is very nice- so helpful! The room was very comfy, all equipped including snorkels and stuff. The location is good as well - you can walk to the Waikiki beach and the big grocery store is just in front! 

初めてのｴｱﾋﾞｰ体験でやや不安でしたが､ﾎｽﾄのｵｰｳｪﾝさんのお陰で､とても良かったです! とても親切で､困ったことは何もありませんでした｡
部屋も快適です｡洗剤や石鹸､お皿､ﾋﾞｰﾁで遊ぶための道具まで置いてあります｡
立地もよく､ﾜｲｷｷﾋﾞｰﾁまでは歩いて5分くらいです｡目の前に大きなｽｰﾊﾟｰもあるので便利です｡

The room was the best I had ever stayed before.  First, the location is really perfect!  It's close to Waikiki beach and main shopping road. 
There is a free parking so if stay with car, everyone can go somewhere. To diamond head it's take 10 mins and 5 mins walk to Waikiki beach.  

And Mr. Owen is so wonderful host. He always help us and make our honeymoon perfect. 

I'll come back to this room again!

Thank you for everything. It was so comfortable!  I love it :P
prefecr like it

Owen is a fantastic host with a lovely condo. He messaged me every few days to see if anything was needed from him or for the unit. The supermarket across the street is a huge plus if you plan on doing your own cooking. If you plan on renting a car during your visit, the included parking spot will significantly save you money that would have been spent on hotel valets. Take that saved money and splurge it on a nice dinner in nearby Waikiki. 

Overall. Great value. Great host. Great location.

Owen's place is outstanding for several reasons. It includes parking, the location directly across from the International Marketplace makes it easy access to all of Waikiki and the hospitality Owen extended.  The initial instructions for the check-in process was spot on and easy to understand.  Once into my stay Owen for very hospitable and timely with changing linens and providing me with anything I needed. A warm Aloha to Owen!!

We loved our stay at Owen's place! Check-in process was quick and easy to understand. We met Jan on our way up, and she gave us a very warm welcome. The location was great! Food Pantry right across the street was so convenient to pick up groceries, and Marukame Udon is right next door. We rented a car so having a designated, free, covered parking space was a huge plus! It was so easy to communicate with Owen. He made sure we had everything we needed for our stay. Whenever we are staying in the Waikiki area again, we will be looking up Owen's place!

owen의 숙소는 와이키키 중심가에있는 힐튼 가든 호텔뒤에 있는 작은 콘도형아파트입니다. 쇼핑하기에 가깝고 천천히 걸어서 7분정도면 해변에 갈수있고. 3분거리에 트롤리타는 버스정거장이잇어서편리한데다.숙소는 사진그대로이고 깨끗하며 와이키키중심가인데도 시끄럽지않으며. 1층에 세탁기와 건조기 1달러에 이용가능하고   no resort fee 와 free parking 까지 있어서 최고입니다!  둘이서 지내기에 딱 좋았고. 호스트가 최고로 친절한데다 한국에도 많이 와본 베태랑입니다

We loved this unit!!! There wasn't anything we didn't like or found "wrong". The location is right in the heart of Waikiki and excellent to walk all over. If you want a day at the beach, its a short walk directly through the International Marketplace and then across the street. We'll definitely be booking this place again...and again!

Owen is the best host on the island!! The unit was perfect, clean , well placed (just 5 min walk to the beach) and the prking place was just great! He helped us everytime we needed him and was very kind and friendly with us! Thanks again for everything Owen, we will definately go back to his unit sometime! I highly recommend you to stay here!!!
An awesome place in a great location - everything you need is close by. Owen's also a fantastic host and made the trip so much better. Would stay here again!

The place is exactly as described! It’s literally less than a block away from the main Waikiki Beach area! The grocery shop is just across the street!  Owen had been a super host.  He greeted us with pineapple cake and gave us tips of exploring Waikiki.  He was also very accommodating.  Our flight was at midnight and Owen let us have a late check out and continued to use the parking stall for the day.  We highly recommend his place!

ﾜｲｷｷの中心のとても便利なﾛｹｰｼｮﾝで快適でした!
ﾎｽﾄOWENさんが､本当に親切に気遣いしてくれて安心して過ごせました｡
ﾊﾟｰｷﾝｸﾞやｷｯﾁﾝがついてｴｺﾉﾐｰｸﾗｽのﾎﾃﾙ並みの金額はすばらしいです｡
ﾌﾟｰﾙにはBBQｸﾞﾘﾙがあり自由に使えます｡
また利用したいです｡

I don't have the words to express what incredible hosts Owen and Jan are. They were flexible and accommodating way above and beyond what's required or expected. I was on Oahu unexpectedly because my boyfriend was  med-evac'ed to a hospital here. I knew no one, had nothing with me, and was thoroughly exhausted on every level. Their generosity and thoughtfulness made being in this terrible situation much more bearable. They even made my Christmas feel Merry.  I highly recommend this great location, super-clean unit, and especially it's fantastic hosts.  Mahalo nui loa, Owen and Jan!!

Very very nice place and more affordable compared to the hotels. The location is perfect. It's 2-minute walk to the grocery store. 5-minute walk to the mall and it's also pretty close to the beach. The condo is really comfy and well organized. Basically has everything I need. There is even a swimming pool. Owen and Jan are also really nice people. I feel so lucky to meet them and stay at their place for a week. Definitely will come back to their place next time!

Gostamos muito do apartamento do Owen e da Jan! Eles são ótimos anfitriões! O lugar é simples mas o apartamento é muito aconchegante. Alguns detalhes foram cuidadosamente preparados para nos sentir em casa. 
Conseguimos usar bem a cozinha que estava equipada com muitos utensílios e até com alguns temperos!
Tinham vários armários onde pudemos guardar os nossos itens pessoais. Alguns acessórios de praia também estavam disponíveis! 
A internet tinha bom sinal! Poucos canais na TV mas com tanta coisa para fazer na cidade que nem sentimos falta!
Não utilizamos o ar condicionado pois não estava tão quente assim. Também não utilizamos a piscina.
O estacionamento (valor já incluso na diária) é muito bom! Estávamos com uma van e foi super tranquilo de estacionar. 
A localização é sensacional! Perto do mercado (food pantry fica do outro lado da rua), do shopping (Internacional Market), do ponto de ônibus, dos restaurantes e das ruas principais de Waikiki. A vizinhança é bem tranquila! 
Tivemos uma intercorrência com a banheira mas foi prontamente resolvida. 
A comunicação com o Owen foi super fácil! Fomos com uma bebê de 1 ano e 3 meses e foi super tranquilo. Apesar de não ter berço disponível, conseguimos improvisar uma cama para ela e deu super certo. Utilizamos alguns produtos de lavanderia que estavam no apartamento. A lavadora e secadora também eram boas. O nosso voo chegou bem tarde mas não tivemos problemas para entrar no apartamento pela primeira vez pois foi bem explicado em como fazer.
Owen and Jan are nice hosts - helpful but not hovering.  Good Waikiki location, on a quieter street.  The unit is as described.

Once you choose this accommodation, it is no exaggeration to say that you will have friends in Hawaii. Host Owen and Jan are so kind and friendly people. When you feel uncomfortable, you can be easily contacted and they try to solve the problem immediately. 
And they provide all the convenience that their guests can get comfortable with. 
1. Location : Waikiki Beach is so accessible, it's only a five-minute walk. Since Waikiki doesn't have a large supermarket, the grocery store right in front of it is very useful. 
2. Facilities : All cooking facilities are available. It's a studio, but it's convenient to have separate bedrooms and living room. 
In conclusion, if I go back to Hawaii, I'd like to stay at Owen's house. I would like to say thank you once again.

Owen and Jan have a fantastic condo perfect for couples or solo travellers! We had everything we needed at our finger tips from groceries, buses, restaurants and a short walk to the beach! The bed was more comfy than our one back home- luxury to fall into after a long day sight seeing around Waikiki! Dont hesitate to book this one as you will be well looked after, our hosts were extremely helpful and responsive and are never far away if you need any help! Thanks again for having us!
Place is great! Great location and great hosts!

Owen Jen, were very nice, friendly, gave us excellent suggestions on where to go and how to get there. The place was very clean, comfortable. Couldn't have asked for anything else. Close to beach, stores,restaurants. Very convenient. Much nicer than staying at any hotel, resort. Felt like we were ohana.
Ora had a very comfortable stay at Owen's place. Would highly recommend!

Owen is a wonderful and friendly host.
Everything is ready at home.
Beach towel, water play equipment, kitchen supplies Free parking!
The communication with the host is fast and it cares more carefully to see if there is anything more necessary.
The location is only a 7 minute walk to Waikiki Beach, and there is a grocery store right in front of the house. I would like to stay again if I come to Hawaii ♡

We love Owen's condo very much. The location is perfect that very close to Waikiki beach- about 5 to 10 mins walk. There's a supermarket right cross the street that we can get anything we needed. There are tons of restaurants around too that we don't have to worry too much about foods. The best part of the condo is the parking lot! Which saved us a lot of money and super convenient for us. We highly recommend to stay at Owen's condo if you will rent a car. We definitely will choose to stay here again if we ever come back to Hawaii :)

I rented Owen's place for 1 week for my bf's sembreak/birthday celebration last April 2018

Right from the start, Owen has been an outstanding host. After I confirmed my reservation, he sent me a message about how to make my stay in Waikiki much more comfortable. 

Location - The location can NOT be beat for the price! His place is literally a block away from International Market Place and a couple of blocks away from Waikiki beach. There is a grocery across from the condo too. All the amenities you need is close to his place. We were there for the WAIKIKI Spam jam festival which closed KALAKUA avenue for this annual celebration. THOUSANDS of people packed the street and  although it was fun, there was a lot of noise coming from the free concerts/entertainment. The celebration was a block away but we did not hear any noise. His location provided a lot of guilt free happy hour bar hopping. :-) Lots of good restaurants within walking distance. 

Garage - Covered parking and included with the fee. No extra/hidden fees. This is such a rarity in this area. The cheapest I had found when I was doing my research was $20-25 per day. Most places will do valet. His is FREE!!

Apartment - extremely clean. We were pleasantly surprised. The condominium is not one of the high rise ones and his unit is on the second floor but nevertheless, there is an elevator. Basic amenities are provided. He even let us borrow his snorkeling equipment. 

The best thing about the apartment is not the place BUT the host. He has been so accommodating of me and my bf. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. He would email me every couple of days to check if we need anything and I also had his mobile number, just in case. I think we were lucky to book his place because most of the time he is always booked so if you have an opportunity to rent out his condominium, GO FOR IT. You will not regret it!

Location! Location! Location! From the reviews we expected a clean and cozy condo (which we got) but we could not have ever imagined a place so perfectly situated. It is right across the street from the International Marketplace which is where all the high-end shops and restaurants are located. It is also close to the beach (about a 10 minute stroll). Owen was the perfect host. He was not going to be around at our check-in so he not only sent detailed directions but also included photos of doors, locks, and keys. Parking can be difficult in Honolulu so having a free parking space was a definite plus. It should be noted that the spot, like most spots on the island, are rather small so you may need a few swings to get in correctly (and do not rent an over-sized car!). We would recommend Owen's place without any hesitation.

ﾎｽﾄのｵｰｳｪﾝは予約時からとても親切に対応してくれて､返信も早かったです｡立地はﾜｲｷｷに5分程で行けて､目の前に大きなｽｰﾊﾟｰと､その隣の公園でとても美味しいﾌｰﾄﾞﾄﾗｯｸが出ているのでとても快適に過ごせました｡とても静かなお部屋で､wifiの環境も整っています｡ﾄﾗﾌﾞﾙにも迅速に対応してくれて､いつも気にかけてくれてとても親切でした｡無料で駐車場が付いているので､私達はﾚﾝﾀｶｰを利用していたのでとても助かりました｡ﾜｲｷｷへｻｰﾌｨﾝに行くのもとても近くて便利です!!日本語も少し話してくれます｡英語が苦手な私にもわかりやすいように話してくれてとても優しくて安心できました｡
I highly recommend a stay at Owen's condo. I can't think of any negatives about the stay. I had a wonderful time.

This place was awesome! Having a parking spot was great because we rented a jeep. It's an easy walk go Waikiki beach and has a grocery store right across the street. Owen was great and was there for any questions, and he was accommodating to us because we had a late flight! Super nice. Loved it!
Excellent value for the price and the location is .  Very clean and SAFE!

駐車場つき(ｱﾊﾟｰﾄの下)でｺｽﾄﾊﾟﾌｫｰﾏﾝｽ高い｡
目の前にｽｰﾊﾟｰもあるのでちょっとした買い物も便利｡
Owenは
迅速な対応でﾁｪｯｸｲﾝも楽々｡
日本語が少し話せます｡
滞在中快適に過ごせました｡
また､利用しようと思いました｡
mahalo!!

this second time to stay here.   Mr. Owen helps me soon and gave me advises and we could stay stay comfortably.  
The location is close to Wikiki beach and royal Hawaian center, and main shopping center.
It takes about 5 mins.

The room was so beautiful and cute.  We could enjoy our stay and if we have a one more time to visit Hawaii We'll come back again. ;)

Thank you for all your help and kindness.
Absolutely loved my stay at this condo and can not thank Owen enough for his service. Would highly recommend staying here and will come back again.

ﾊﾜｲは毎年行くのですがｴｱﾋﾞｰは初めてでした｡ｵｰｴﾝさんのｺﾝﾄﾞは思っていた以上に本当に便利な場所でした｡滞在中は､ほとんど車行動でしたが今までとは違うﾊﾜｲを楽しめました｡
是非ｵｰｴﾝさんのｺﾝﾄﾞに行くときは空港から車を借りる事をお勧めします｡
また､是非泊まりたいです!
Good location, clean, helpful host, and parking included. All that you can ask for from a place in Waikiki.

ｵｰｳｪﾝさんはとてもいい人でした!

また､家のﾛｹｰｼｮﾝも素晴らしく､目の前にはｽｰﾊﾟｰがあり､ﾜｲｷｷﾋﾞｰﾁまで徒歩7分ほどで行ける良い場所です｡

ﾚﾝﾀｶｰを借りた私たちにとってこの立地で無料駐車場は大変重宝しました｡
また､なにか困ったことがあれば連絡くださいなど､きめ細かいﾌｫﾛｰもしてくださって､快適にﾜｲｷｷを楽しむ事ができました｡
また機会があれば是非､利用したいです!

We had such great vacation staying here! Owen was an excellent, gracious host. The place was clean, comfortable and the location can't be beat. Right in the middles of Waikiki and steps from the beach. Using this as a home base with a parking space was perfect. I highly recommend this place and we hope to stay here next time we are in Oahu.

部屋がすごく綺麗で広くて最高でした!ｸｰﾗｰもききますし､冷蔵庫の中にはﾐﾈﾗﾙｳｫｰﾀｰも入っていて､ﾚﾝｼﾞも問題なく使えました!ﾊﾝｶﾞｰもたくさんありますし､洗濯機も1階にあります｡1ついうなら､鍵が古いのか､開けるｺﾂを掴むまで､大変でした｡立地もよくて､なにより駐車場があったのが助かりました!
Than you so much Owen!!!!!
location, location, location. this is right in the middle of Waikiki, right across the street from the International Market Place, plus parking is included (huge plus).

We loved our stay at Owen and Jan's place.  We would definitely stay there again.
Pros: location, free parking, use of snorkeling equipment, and nice clean empty pool at complex with a huge grill.
Cons: Needed to purchase coffee for place, the room could get a little warm in summer, would have loved to have a floor fan.

에어비앤비 처음이었는데,
매우 만족합니다.^^

Owen’s place made our stay in Oahu awesome! The location is close to many delicious eateries/ shopping and a quick 5 minute walk to Waikiki Beach! Parking in this part of Oahu can be crazy so the parking amenity was a life saver and the actual condo was cute and spacious for two! Owen is quick to respond and was very helpful in giving us tips about the island and he and his wife were so friendly and sweet when we met them during our stay! Would definitely stay at his place again!

We spent a great time in Owen's place.
The location is absolutely perfect!! You are in a quiet area but just a few minutes by walking from the beach, restaurant, shops etc. The apartment is clean, with all you need to spend your vacation. The parking is so convenient when you rent a car like us (there is a swimming pool and a laundry place in the building too)
Owen was always available and helpful for us. Thank you again for your kindness!

Owens place was great. Clean, minutes from the beach (literally a 3-5 minute walk. Less then a mile). Perfect location and the place itself was well stocked, clean, and Owen was a polite and attentive host.
Very good location. Perfect place to be.  Every day we had a private pool.  Supermarket close by.  Owen was a good host. He brought us beer. Next time, we will stay here again!. Thanks Owen.

Owen's place was great. Exactly what I expected based on the description and pictures, really close to the beach and not too far to go to get to the highways if you're heading to the other shores. There is a microwave also in the room that I didn't see listed/in the pictures. Communication with Owen was easy and he was always quick to respond. Even checked in to make sure we were enjoying our time and to see if we needed anything. Also had really good tips for some affordable bars and activities around waikiki if you plan on staying in the area. Would definitely recommend staying here and would stay here again if I'm staying in Waikik!

This is a perfect location in walking distance to the beach and restaurants. There is an air conditioner unit but if you open up the doors and turn the fan on low the place stays cool without it. It is clean and I greatly appreciated the beach towels and mat that were made available to us. Owen gives wonderful suggestions of things to do and is helpful with any questions you might have about the area.

I’ve traveled to Hawaii many times & I can say that this is one of the best places I’ve stayed. Location was PERFECT. It was exactly in the middle of everything! 2 block walk to the beach, 15-20 min drive to Hanauma Bay, 2-3 min walk to the International Market, & walking distance to many places to eat & shop. The place comes with everything you’ll need for your stay. The free parking was an absolute bonus! If you know Waikiki, you know how ridiculously hard it is to find parking & rates are expensive. The hosts were kind enough to reach out to us to ensure we had everything we needed and to see how our trip was. I can guarantee I’ll be coming back here the next time I’m in town. (Hope its not booked!) Mahalo!

The place is very close to everything. Even if you are not renting a car it wouldn’t be a problem because bus stops are very close by, and a grocery store is just across the street.
There isn’t a Waikiki view from the windows but everything is just as it looks in the picture. The location was great and host Owen was very friendly.
Highly recommend.

Nearly best possible location in Waikiki: quiet and still minutes away from beach, large hotels etc. Extremely valuable for those who rent a car for touring the island: the studio comes with private parking! (very rare in Waikiki). Owen is easliy reachable and available to give you all good advices for your visit.

I am SO glad we stayed here vs a hotel. Seriously every day My boyfriend and I were saying “we are so glad we went with this place”. Between the saving on parking and resort fees we easily saved $80 a day. And this place is GREAT: super clean, amazing location (5 min away from Ala Moana), grocery store across the street, laundry, a small pool, free parking, small patio, full kitchen, and Owen is a wonderful host. I think he texted me back within 1 minute each time I reached out! 
And staying at an Airbnb really changed my trip. I wasn’t so chained to a hotel. Since our car was so easy to access, we were more out and about this time.
When I go back to O’ahu I am definitely going to make sure this apt is available for my trip!

The condo is located close to the everything such as restaurants department stores cafes and the Waikiki beach(one block away) We had wonderful time here. It was also clean and quiet. The host, Owen, was kind and provided us everything what we needed!! Thanks Owen

日本からの便でﾎﾉﾙﾙ朝着だったが､午前10時半頃に快くｱｰﾘｰﾁｪｯｸｲﾝさせて頂いた!
本当に気さくで優しいｵｰﾅｰさんでした｡
お部屋の建物の上層階にｵｰﾅｰさんが住んでいるので､何かあっても直ぐに対応してもらえる｡
駐車場がちょっと狭くて入れづらいが､駐車料金込みですし建物はｴﾚﾍﾞｰﾀｰもあり荷物の出し入れはしやすかったです｡
窓からの眺望は無いと言うか､むしろ悪いですが､ｽｰﾊﾟｰの目の前なので場所はとっても便利だと思います｡
Owen потрясающий хозяин, вежливый, общительный. В наш приезд пригласил нас на рождественскую вечеринку соседей дома, это был очень интересно и вкусно. Дом просторный и комфортный. Всем рекомендую:)
The condo is exactly as advertised location could not have been better close to shopping, restaurants and the beach. The parking was perfect. All in all could not of had a better place

Owen is a great host. He's such a nice guy and went out on a limb to help us. My wife and I were very impressed by how considerate he was and comfortable his house was. And the location! The house was practically 2 blocks away from the beach and near to everything we wanted(we picked up our rental car one block away from the house). 
It was our first air b&b experience and we couldn't have asked more! We will definitely come back to Hawaii again and stay at his house. Highly recommended!!

Owen-san is a great host.
It was my first time staying in condo. I am not good at English, but he was kind to me like that. He gave a detailed explanation, such as preparations of traveling, check-in, check-out, and it was very helpful.
The location of the condo is very wonderful, there is a parking lot and the FoodPantry is also in front of me so all the experience was convenient.
The most wonderful experience is meeting Owen-san. I definitely would like to return to this condo.
HappyCakes made by Owen-san is very delicious so I recommend it!

I appreciate Owen-san very much.

ﾜｲｷｷの真ん中､ｽｰﾊﾟｰも目の前にあり､とても便利な立地です｡
ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝの段取りもﾎｽﾄのOwenさんがとても分かりやすく画像付きで教えてくださりました｡お部屋も､ﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰﾙｰﾑもとても清潔で､女性1人でも安心して滞在できました｡ｾﾙﾌﾁｪｯｸｲﾝできるので､Owenさんにお会いすることはないのかと思いましたが､ﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄ時にはわざわざ出てきて見送ってくださいました｡とても温かな優しいﾎｽﾄですので､とてもｵｽｽﾒです｡
ありがとうございました!

Owen is a super nice host who always responded super quickly and helped us with everything we asked for. 
The condo is nice in clean, in a safe neighborhood and Owen prepared more than you would expect from an AirBnB like bottled water, and products like sun screen and Aloe Vera.

I would definitely recommend to stay at this condo!
Owen was very responsive and helpful. He went out of his way to make sure we enjoyed our visit.

숙소 매우 만족스러워요. 오웬의 집에는 없는게 없을 정도로 모든 것이 다 갖추어져 있는 완벽한 숙소입니다~~ 
특히 무료 주차장이 있어서 매우 좋았어요. 위치도 최고로 좋아요. 바로 앞에 마트와 주위에 맛집, 까페 모두 다 있습니다. 덕분에 휴가를 즐겁게 잘 보내다 왔네요. 특히 호스트가 매우 친절해요~~
무엇보다도 위치가 너무 좋아요. 와이키키 중심에 있으면서도 약간 골목쪽이라 밤에는 조용했고 집 바로 앞에 푸드 팬트리 라는 마트고 있어서 자주 이용했습니다. Owen은 세심하고 친절한 호스트였어요. 체크아웃 하는 날 저희 배웅까지 해주었어요 :) 두사람이 묶는다면 정말 부족함없는 숙소입니다.
location is wonderful. Owen is very friendly host.
The apartment is really nice and clean, with a heavenly comfortable bed. It is nicely located in the center of Waikiki.

This was the perfect accompdation in Hawaii. It was much more spacious than i expected and clean. Owen provided all items that you need to stay. It was easy to communicate via phone call, text messages, and airbnb app. He was a warm-hearted person. If i go to Hawaii someday, i will stay Owen’s home again.
This place is good location. If you don’t book a hotel which is in front of seaside, you should use this place. It was very convenient .
Great location, awesome host, easy check in, clean and organized. Nothing more you can ask for. Highly recommend!

name: D3 - Centro Ciudad / Pº de Gracia
summary: Está situado en el centro de Barcelona a 50 metros de la famosa Avenida de Passeig de Gràcia. Incluye TV, DVD, salón con sofá cama, así como conexión WI-FI gratuita, aire acondicionado y calefacción. El metro mas cercano es DIAGONAL (L3 y L5) HUTB-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
space: Un espacioso salon con dos sofás, uno de ellos convertible en cama de matrimonio. Una mesa con capacidad para 10 personas. Amplia cocina totalment equipada, 2 habitaciones dobles, una triple y una individual.
description: Está situado en el centro de Barcelona a 50 metros de la famosa Avenida de Passeig de Gràcia. Incluye TV, DVD, salón con sofá cama, así como conexión WI-FI gratuita, aire acondicionado y calefacción. El metro mas cercano es DIAGONAL (L3 y L5) HUTB-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Un espacioso salon con dos sofás, uno de ellos convertible en cama de matrimonio. Una mesa con capacidad para 10 personas. Amplia cocina totalment equipada, 2 habitaciones dobles, una triple y una individual. Wifi in all the rooms of the apartment, equipped kitchen and international TV. We are reachable on the following numb(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) in case there is anything the guest could need. When doing check in we will also give information of emergency number out of office hours. The email is also valid anytime. La zona es inmejorable, a 15 minutos andando de las Ramblas y solo 2 min del Paseo de Gracia, donde empieza el Shopping line de Barcelona.  Ademas el barrio de Gracia esta solo a 3 minutos andando, y es un barr
neighborhood_overview: La zona es inmejorable, a 15 minutos andando de las Ramblas y solo 2 min del Paseo de Gracia, donde empieza el Shopping line de Barcelona.  Ademas el barrio de Gracia esta solo a 3 minutos andando, y es un barrio muy animado e interesante, ademas de muy tranquilo de dia.
notes: There is an extra charge for a late check in: 25e.- from 9.30pm 50e.- from 11.30pm   Baby cot available under request for 15€
transit: El Metro DIAGONAL (L3) esta a 50 metros del apartamento. Ademas desde Pl Catalunya suben 5 autobuses hasta 50m del apartamento Tambien hay varios parkings a proximidad.
access: Wifi in all the rooms of the apartment, equipped kitchen and international TV.
interaction: We are reachable on the following numb(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) in case there is anything the guest could need. When doing check in we will also give information of emergency number out of office hours. The email is also valid anytime.
house_rules: It is essential to facilitate the arrival information to Barcelona (flight details, train schedule) The apartment is equipped with wifi whose information is in the house rules inside the apartment. Cleaning costs include a set of towels and bed linen per person as well as final cleaning. If you want some extra set must apply to us and this service has a cost of 40 €. Apart from the contract with airbnb, the guest should also sign a contract accepting our house and behaviour rules.  Monthly rental do not include utilities that would depend on each guest use. Meters will be read upon arrival and also at departure. A monthly prepayment for utilities can be asked in stays longer than 2 months.

host.host_about:
Hola! Somos Weflating Apartments un equipo de gente joven con más de 10 años de experiencia en el sector, enamorados de nuestra ciudad. Nos dedicamos a la gestión de apartamentos turísticos ofreciendo un trato próximo y desenfadado pero a la vez profesional, con atención las 24h del día, un equipo internacional ( hablamos italiano, inglés, francés, alemán y español nativos) y muchas ganas de hacerte sentir como en casa. 
No dudes en contactarnos si tienes algún tipo de duda acerca de la ciudad o cualquiera de las propiedades que ofertamos, estamos aquí para ayudarte. 

Un saludo! 
Weflating Team

name: saikung village house
summary: We have a beautiful room for rent in Saikung - just 30 mins bus and/or train to HK island, 20 mins bus to Mongkok and TST, 5 mins bus to HKUST and 10 mins bus to Saikung trail walk. Nearby you can easily find restaurants, a 7-11 and supermarket.
space: We are in a quiet part of Hong Kong with hiking trails and the sea nearby. Part of a duplex with roof, the room is bright and airy with air-con.  You also have your own private bathroom with toilet and shower (not en suite) and access to a washing machine, kitchen, lounge and cable-TV. On the roof is a nice sitting indoor and outdoor area.  Living in the same house are two dogs (Max Mae) and two cats (Smudge and Munchkin).  The main town of Saikung is 15 minutes by bus and is packed with seafood / other restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and much more. There are also ferries to islands and beaches to explore.
description: We have a beautiful room for rent in Saikung - just 30 mins bus and/or train to HK island, 20 mins bus to Mongkok and TST, 5 mins bus to HKUST and 10 mins bus to Saikung trail walk. Nearby you can easily find restaurants, a 7-11 and supermarket. We are in a quiet part of Hong Kong with hiking trails and the sea nearby. Part of a duplex with roof, the room is bright and airy with air-con.  You also have your own private bathroom with toilet and shower (not en suite) and access to a washing machine, kitchen, lounge and cable-TV. On the roof is a nice sitting indoor and outdoor area.  Living in the same house are two dogs (Max Mae) and two cats (Smudge and Munchkin).  The main town of Saikung is 15 minutes by bus and is packed with seafood / other restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and much more. There are also ferries to islands and beaches to explore. Kitchen with kettle, toaster and microwave, fridge, TV with cable, WiFi and plates & cutlery. If you want to cook in Kitchen, please ask be
neighborhood_overview: It's quiet, peaceful and with plenty of lush greenery. Lots of hiking trails and very convenient for public transport.  This is ideal for people looking to experience another side of Hong Kong away from the hustle and bustle of the city yet still close enough to visit the island and shopping areas.
notes: Monthly rent is $8600, for one person only. Please respect the privacy of other rooms and people on the premises.  The cats and dogs are friendly but can sometimes be shy. We look forward to welcoming guests from the Airbnb world!
transit: There are plenty of buses nearby and the nearest MTR station to us is at Hang Hau that provides access to all of Hong Kong.  Easy to get taxis (green for countryside, red for everywhere).  Airport to Central by train takes 25 minutes. Central MTR to North Point MTR takes 15 minutes. North Point to Hang Hau takes 15 minutes.
access: Kitchen with kettle, toaster and microwave, fridge, TV with cable, WiFi and plates & cutlery. If you want to cook in Kitchen, please ask before you book.
interaction: We are always happy to help, answer questions and give recommendations.
house_rules: Please keep the room clean and tidy, if the room is too messy, the additional cleaning fee will be charged. The other bedrooms, bathrooms, living room and study areas are private. The cats and dogs are fed at certain times with their own special food. Please do not feed them snacks, treats or food or give them any drinks. We do not allow guests to bring and eat anywhere inside the house (including the roof) durian, seafood, salty fish, curry or any foods / drinks that have obnoxious smells.

address.street: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: As a first time user of AirBnB I must say it was a pleasant experience. The place was very nice and the bed was quite comfortable. Very ideal location if you wish to set off and do some hiking.  The hosts were fantastic; super friendly and very accommodating. Highly recommend! Only downside is the place is a bit tucked away from the main road and a bit hard to find on your own. However the hosts were more than willing to meet and guide you back.

累了一天终于到了香港,房东姐姐出来接待我们很温暖!房子特别温馨,还有可爱的宠物｡我们的房间在二楼很温馨,感觉一进到里面跟到家一样~~早晨也很意外的有阿姨给我们做早点,一切都很美好!
房子所处的区域也很漂亮,空气很清新,周围有很多很酷的地方!超市很多进口零食,走之前买了一大堆哈哈哈!
希望以后还能去看房东姐姐,也欢迎房东姐姐跟男友一起来北京玩!
房东专门开车来路口接很贴心,房间干净整洁,早餐很好吃｡离西贡5分钟车程｡周围环境清幽,淳朴｡
nice place, soft, clean, gentle
很熱情的房東夫婦,每天還幫我們準備早餐!好像住在朋友家一樣⋯
房东非常NICE!还帮忙准备早餐｡房子非常Sweet!天台客厅花园能够看到山,同行的小伙伴都说简直就是Dream house~
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
很不错及不一样的香港生活体验,房子是一个独栋的house,看得出来主人很热爱生活,有可爱的猫猫和狗狗,有很能干的工人打扫和做早餐,类似酒店的服务了｡西贡有香港后花园之称,和繁忙拥挤的都市街头不同,这里有山,有水,有清新的空气,适合不是以购物血拼为主要目的的旅行者

Really good! Beautiful and quite place, Jiawen is a very lovely lady and so helpful!!!

Definitely going back.

Location is ok if you are going to the bay, it takes 10 minutes by taxi to Sai Kung Pier to take the boat.

很好高兴可以做客家文家,这是一次很完美的住宿体验! 首先从西贡中心打的士大概15分钟就可以到濠涌小巴站,再走1分钟就可以到了,很容易找而且交通便利!关于住宿环境方面,这是个很温馨很整洁很精致的家!大家可以看看主人发的图片就知道了!最对真实!另外他们家还有四个很重要的成员,两只狗和两只猫,它们四个可是有很多粉丝的,包括我!还有早晨主人给我们准备的早餐,杠杠滴!谢谢主人的热情招待,我和我的伙伴还会再拜访你的!
房子就在山脚下,很安静｡Jiawen很nice,到村口接我们并给我们做了早餐,还告知我们去市区的小巴线路｡不过因为在山下,所以有蚊子,最好关窗开冷气睡,而且Jiawen很贴心地在房间放有电蚊拍｡

Jiawen and her husband are really helpful ,nice owner . I decided that I'll stay their house again when I visit HK for hiking next time even every time . And I'm missing the two lovely baby cat Smudge and Munchkin .Hope see all your family soon ! Happy everyday ⁽⁽ૢ(⁎❝ົཽω❝ົཽ⁎)✧

Jiawen and Ivan were the most fantastic hosts. We were provided with a fantastic private bedroom and bathroom and even got to hang out with their beautiful cats and dogs. Will definitely return as we quickly found out Sai Kung has an abundance of activities, far too many to do on just one weekend. Recommended!
房子在西贡,山水都让人非常舒畅｡早晨出门看见清澈见底的小河里游动的各种生物心情大好~我们是平安夜和圣诞节晚上住在这个温暖干净的家｡房东姐姐为我们耐心建议出行交通路线,在平安夜晚上邀请我们吃火鸡,喝酒｡还有她幽默的丈夫和儿子Ken,弟弟努力用不是很好的普通话跟我们交待事情的样子真的非常可爱｡总而言之是非常好的入住体验~
房子的环境不错,很清靜,交通也很方便,出去市區也就40分鐘就到了,房東也很熱情招待我們｡而且房東家裡有2只可愛的小貓和2只狗,那2只貓真的很可愛｡下次再去香港玩,一定会再入住的｡｡
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
非常热情的家文姐❤️ 房子特别可爱､宠物们也好萌｡西贡虽然距离市区会远一点点,可是感受到了完全不一样的香港｡有时候还会为我们准备早餐､真的好赞!

It's a house by a small river near Sai Kung. It's easy to find following the hostess' instruction. We are more than happy to find the house is very tidy. The hostess Jiawen is a charming lady. Although she has her own job, she'd like to talk with us. 
In this house, we can get hot water and breakfast. Everything is easy just like another our home. 
Unfortunately we encountered the coldest weather in HK in a year. Jiawen especially bought us a new heater to keep our room cosy. 
They have two dogs and two cats. They are all cute, shy and a little curious. Anyway they are quite friendly. The dogs never bark that the whole house is always quiet.
Just like the description the hostess give, this house is in a good place to live for a while and it is easy to reach Sai Kung nearby, or other sites in HK and the New Territory, by mini bus and /or subway.
Walking distance from marina cove. Nice and helpful family.
家里很温馨,印象最深刻是主人家的宠物猫猫,孩子很喜欢,因为逗它,被小猫抓破手了｡有点遗憾是主人没有提供早餐,蚊子有点多了｡
非常好的住家,很亲切和并且帮了很大的忙

房东不会和客人分享大门的钥匙,建议把这点写在房间的介绍上,这样客人选择的时候会便于判断,灵活掌握进出的时间｡

其他房子都很干净,整洁,安静,和描述的一样｡宠物虽然多,都是都很友善｡

We enjoyed talking with Jiawen & Ivan,the hospitable couple. Thank you so much for your reception. We also enjoyed playing with the dogs & cats. They are very lovely guys, especially Smudge. Jiawen introduced Kiu Tsui Island to us. It's a beautiful place for hiking. We had a nice trip there for several hours.

Jiawen's place is just wonderful!! We really enjoyed talking to her, playing with her pets, and it is super convenient with public transportation. Such a shame we didn't stay in Sai Kung longer. Definately recommend her place to everyone.
家文姐的家非常干净整洁,而且布置的温馨舒适,她人也超级好,非常热情,家里的狗狗有点害羞,肥嘟嘟的猫咪很可爱,走路10分钟就有超市和便利店,到西贡也就10几分钟,非常方便,下次还会再来｡

The house is really nice and beautiful and the location was super convenient and was perfect for us to access everywhere we wanted to go. The nearest bus stop for going to downtown of SaiKung is just few minutes away and there're plenty buses available for accessing the center of HK by just few more minutes walk from the house. 

We enjoyed very much all the members of the  houses, Jiwen, Ivan , their boy Ben and the lovely cats and dogs. The experience was just like we're staying with friends  pleasant and comfortable. 

Thank them so much to be so warm and helpful. Would love to return here again if there's opportunity visiting HK.
定的时候没看清楚,离西贡有一定距离｡房东家的猫狗很可爱,但是房东没有给钥匙,家里有菲佣可以开门,但是相对来说没那么方便
因为早到而没有提前说,家文还是很耐心和热情帮忙解决,很是感谢!房间很干净,挺舒服方便的｡如果喜欢动物的就不要错过了,她家养了好多狗狗和猫猫!
Jiawen' s house is very close to HKUST and Saikung.  I took minibus to HKUST conveniently and ran to Saikung during my short trip. It's a nice place.

We had a wonderful time staying with Jiawen. She was great at communicating with us and met us at the bus stop. Their house was lovely, and they gave us wonderful advice on where to go and how to get there!

Jiawen responded almost immediately. We were grateful to book on the same day and check in at night.  Clean home, comfortable room, cute pets, lovely indoor/outdoor terrace (shown in photos).  Communication via (Hidden by Airbnb) was very convenient. She provided her address in Chinese, but the taxi driver dropped us off somewhere else. Jiawen's husband met us at a nearby bus stop. It was great to have a clean shower after a long day, wake up in a safe place, and catch a taxi ten minutes away from Sai Kung pier.
The host canceled this reservation 58 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

感谢家文提供了很好住房｡预定之后家文的反馈十分迅速,也很贴心地提供了到达住宿低地的路线给我们｡房子相对远离西贡市区,但是因为有直达的专线小巴,因此非常方便｡周边的环境也很安静,有干净的河涌,感觉好像到了日本的小区一样｡房间很干净,很满意｡但是要注意的是当时我入住房间的隔壁的洗手间是有出租给另一个房客的的,所以最好使用前跟家文确认好哪一个洗手间是可用的｡另外室内会有一点的隔音问题,但到不影响整体的使用感受｡家文为我们的麦理浩经徒步之行提供了很贴心的建议,实在非常感谢｡如还有机会我还会继续入住的^^
房东亲切热情,房间干净整洁,家里还有很多小动物｡
对于这次的旅程感到非常满意,其中住宿的体验也为整个旅程增分不少,虽然在订房的过程中一波N折,但是Jiawen都有积极和我们沟通,帮助我们解决订房问题,在整个入住过程中也感到非常的干净和舒适,Jiawen和她老公非常热情与好客,给予我们很多的帮助,包括在我们后面的旅程中也给了我们很多很好的建议｡非常推荐大家去体验｡
Jiawen好nice,Leah也是不錯｡最重要有我喜歡的貓貓狗狗,雖然短短地住了一晚,但是都開始掛住傲嬌的Smudge啦,嘿嘿~下次再嚟Saikung還是會選擇Jiawen個度O(∩_∩)O
家文姐个人非常之咁好,到咗香港受到好多佢帮助｡家文姐屋企养咗好多猫猫狗狗,但系训练好好,连我呢种惊小动物嘅人都有得好好相与,而且佢哋都好得意,如果系钟意猫猫狗狗嘅人最啱嚟呢度住｡间房都好大间,而且好干净整洁,通风都好好,唔会有霉味｡家文姐仲煮咗三文治俾我食,手势好地好｡喺家文姐屋住,真系好似返自己屋企一样｡唯美中不足嘅系,隔篱屋企嘅狗狗有啲嘈,晚黑唔得好好休息｡
超捧地理的位置,很喜欢村口那条纯自然生态的河流,还有家里可爱的猫猫狗狗,房东一家都很亲切,下次去西贡还会住｡

嘉文姐是个很好很温柔的房东,她给的一些线路建议也很好,很实用｡第一次到港真的是没有太完美的计划,因为不知道实地的交通是否方便｡住的地方很好找,来之前,嘉文姐已经把详细的路线说明发给我,有两种可做参考｡即使找不到,工人Leah也会出去接你的｡虽然距离市中心不是太近,但是香港的交通很方便,小巴大巴地铁很方便很方便,想到市中心完全不用担心会堵车!空气特别好,潮潮的,整天都不用涂面霜,住在这里真的非常棒!房间在二楼,不大但是很干净,有熏香的原因,整个房间都是香香的｡感觉嘉文姐很喜欢动物,两只狗两只猫,都很可爱｡如果有机会可以再去香港,首选住在嘉文姐这边!
Jiawen is quite nice and gave us a lot of suggestions. My 5 year old son and I had good experience here! Recommend
Jiawen is a really nice & helpful host!
超级可爱的猫猫狗狗,jiawen姐姐的先生人也很nice｡在细雨中等我们｡楼下客厅好美,红色的墙面 红色的中式家具｡唯一麻烦的是专用洗手间在一楼 住房在二楼｡半夜如果想去洗手间会有些许不变｡村里的小河有仙鹤和鱼｡太棒啦!

Jiawen provided clear information for us. It's a really warn house and very beautiful. Jiawen and her husband are very nice. They prepared a bday cake for me after knowing my . They also chat with us and share their experience.  We enjoy this trip a lot
来西贡体验慢生活,Jiawen 家在豪涌村,巴士直达村口,从西贡市中心约20分钟｡小桥流水人家,背靠大山,晚上很安静｡去的时候jiawen 不在家,用蹩脚的英文和Leah交流,也挺顺畅｡一早三楼阳光房撒满阳光,很舒服,Leah 准备简易早餐,很棒,吃完开启麦理浩徒步｡
一进门就知道家主很会生活,每一格楼梯都有一盆小盆栽Jiawen人敲Nice,提前都会把交通天气告知我｡家里还有俩俩,爱猫猫狗狗的人有福了!第二天我们去麦理浩徒步,出门两步路就有小巴站可以到西贡换公交,总之挺方便哒｡
Ensure you have private bathroom, key to your room, close your room door behind you, so the cat would not go into your room. We were told the cat likes to pee in suitcase.
A comfy bedroom suitable for two or single traveller. The lodgement is a bit remote but perfect beside mountains and water. Recommend!
家文係一個超級好房東 一段旅遊識多一個朋友 屋企d貓咪狗仔實在可愛到暈⋯下次去西貢玩必須去探你地一家人
家里有两只可爱的猫猫和两只可爱的狗狗 适合喜欢小动物的客人 在西贡郊区环境很好 !一次很棒的体验,房东女主人家文很热心 去机场也很便利不会不方便,!
第一次住民宿就遇到这么棒的家文姐实在太棒了!!房间整洁舒适,离西贡码头也很近,住在这里很享受呀｡这是一次很棒的体验呢!还要真的多谢家文!!
Jiawen was helpful and we enjoyed her hospitality. Probably the best place to stay near Sai Kung
很友好的房东,屋子很干净,主人为我们准备2天的早餐,非常好吃｡
有猫,有狗,有河,有鱼,有山,有海,很是喜欢
房东很nice,菲佣很友好,小猫小狗很可爱,下次去西贡,必须是第一选择!
主人家好熱情,好客!家裡貓貓和狗狗超級可愛
台风来袭,我哋第二天嘅西贡之旅要取消,下次會再嚟香港后花园--西贡,但值得一提嘅喺Jiawen嘅house好漂亮…好温馨,两只狗狗Max同Mae,两只猫猫Smudge和Munchkin好乖,好听话,好可爱…都唔明点解ally咁怕狗,最重要jiawen人好nice,佢整嘅toast好好次
在香港第一次住民宿就可以住到家文的家,真是幸运!很nice的房东,很舒适的房间,下次还要再来｡

Jiawen is very nice and welcoming, and the apartment is very clean.

Sad though that dogs can prove threatening whenever you go down. Also, be reminded that checkout is at 10AM.
谢谢热心周到的房主家文的招呼,及时提供了不少需要的交通和游玩的信息给我们,这次玩的很开心｡房间卫生干净,两只酷猫很可爱,住的很舒服｡

Fantastic place in a beautiful location.  Lovely hosts with friendly pets (which were the highlight of my daughters stay amongst plenty of other treats!)  

If you want to dip into the hustle and bustle of HK and then go enjoy the breathtaking beaches and hills - this place is perfectly situated as both are only about 20-30 min away.
Well, Everything it was a WOW experience, Friendly family , very pure HongKong Village style, quiet and clean, It's very easy go to Sai Kung.

My husband and I stayed here for four nights while visiting our son at HKUST. Jiawen and Ivan were friendly hosts, with great travel tips and stories to share. Their live-in helper made us breakfast each day, which we enjoyed on the lovely rooftop terrace. 

Their home was clean and comfortable and our bedroom was quiet and had everything we needed. We didn’t have a problem sharing a bathroom with the student who rented another bedroom. 

We are dog owners who enjoy animals, but the two large dogs Max and Mae were unpredictable. Sometimes we were their friends, and sometimes they barked and growled at us. 

The surrounding area was beautiful, with green mountains and a little river that runs through the village. Marina Cove was a 10 minute walk, and it had a grocery store, a 7-11 and a coffee shop. From there, a 10 minute bus ride got us to Sai Kung, which has a large variety of restaurants. 

This is a great place to stay if you want to explore the Sai Kung peninsula. We took a cab to Sai Kung pavilion, up in the mountains, and we went on an amazing 10k hike to beaches and a river with a swimming hole. It is also perfect for people visiting HKUST, which is easily accessible by minibus. 

We recommend Jiawen and Ivan’s place, especially if you are willing to adapt to dogs and want an escape from the hustle and bustle of the big city.
好喜欢家文家里的超胖猫咪Smudge｡交通也便利｡家里很安静､舒适｡超清洁｡
房东家文热情好客,给人很舒服的感觉｡
一个很温馨的住处,晚上在天台上赏月是件很享受的事｡
房东很好沟通,耐心解答和帮助房客所需……
很多巴士去西贡码头｡我们住一晚去麦里浩径,正常是没有早餐,但是家文很贴心的给准备了早餐,给装了一瓶水｡房子干净,安静｡
特别棒的入住体验,好可爱的猫咪,去西贡码头吃了特别好吃的海鲜,下次还来｡
房东非常nice,房间很整洁,装修很温馨
在那里,相机镜头里看到的是别样风景:青山､菜园､小径､溪流､遛狗､游鱼､飞蝶……让人怀疑:这是香港吗?女主人周到的服务还是挺暖心的｡他们家的狗狗不是什么名种,在别人家是弃物,而在他们家成了宠物｡能把动物视为宝的人,肯定也能把你视为宝!
Recommended place to stay! Very responsive communication, nice hospitality in a spacious, clean house in a quiet setting. Ten minutes to Sai Kung town by minibus/bus/taxi, very easy to catch.
房东人很nice,很贴心地额外提供了丰富的早餐,房子很漂亮,楼顶天台很舒服,不过用来出租的房间,床不是特别稳固,之前说的那张小床,到了之后才知道是折叠床,也没有主动另外提供床品｡
闲适的度假,有家的味道｡
民宿非常干净,房屋的布置风格很有家的味道,热情细心的房东不但向我们详细介绍徒步的事项,还叫菲佣一早做好早餐,为我们徒步准备三文治､萍果､水, 再三叮嘱天气太热,带多些水,考虑我们回来太热,提前把房间的空调弄好,很有家的感觉,下次还会再来｡
入住體驗很好,房東很nice,有機會下次還會再來
Jiawen 房东很nice,很温柔体贴,住了2晚,最后一天的早餐是jiawen自己下厨,朋友对其真的是赞不绝口,最最最深刻的是屋里的小动物,真的是超级可爱的,也很乖｡地点不难找,居住的环境挺适合度假的,但是我们是以徒步为主的,都是早出晚归｡

We had a most pleasant stay in Sai Kung. We were hosted by Jiawen's husband Ivan, and he was very welcoming, attentive, understanding and down-to-earth. We enjoyed all the interesting conversations in the living room, and had such a great time with the cute family dogs and cats! 

The house was beautiful, very conveniently located by bus stops and had mountain views, which is a lovely sight on the rooftop, especially in the mornings!  Would highly recommend, and hoping to visit again some time!
房東夫婦一定是很會生活的人呢!房子非常時尚而且整潔,有兩隻貓,兩隻狗,都非常可愛!住這裡真的很幽靜,非常適合度假,放鬆身心｡雖然有些偏,但交通還算便利的!房東太太沒在家,房東先生是個外國人,工人Evelyn接待了我們,還給我們準備了早餐~唯一的不方便就是洗手間在一樓

从维多利亚 到房子位置大概一小时车程 感觉有一点点远 但是 看到房子以后开心多了 遗憾这次没有见到房东姐姐 女佣很细心 但是不会中文 看来我又得再努力一点学习我的口语啦 做的早餐很好吃 狗狗和猫咪很可爱   一次难忘的经历 期待下次见面啦  
对了 房子特别棒~性价比挺高的~
一个非常温暖的家,一群可爱的小伙伴,我们住了两天Jiawen姐为我们提供了早餐,是我本人向往的小宅,超级喜欢阳光房和天台｡出行的话,Jiawen姐给你做好的建议,方便的小巴是不二的选择｡PS:小伙伴超级温顺可爱,实名羡慕

We stayed at Ivan and Jiewen accommodation while we were visiting Sai Kung. The village is nicely hidden from the main road, surrounded by hills and river. You need to get the bus or taxi there from the MTR Hang Hau station. The rooms we had were compact and we suggest you travel light. They have two dogs that were very nice, quiet and friendly. The cats were also there and do roam around, a bit shy but lovely just the same. We found Ivan very very helpful and knowledgable. Jiewen is also a understading helpful person and was able to go beyond to make sure we were comfortable. We had the assistance from the house helper Evelyn who was always there to help with breakfast and questions if any. We enjoyed the location and the hospitality.

房东非常贴心,说不尽的好｡
1､指路明确,有照片+文字说明,还有联络人电话和照片
2､房间装修超级有格调,楼顶有个小花园,如果晴天去晒晒太阳就很棒
3､房东是很有爱心的,收养了2只猫咪和两条狗,宠物都很可爱｡
4､居然还有爱心早餐,简单的三明治+茶+水果,但是能量满满
5､很安静的地方,十分适合去西贡徒步的人住,交通也挺方便的

Very welcoming and attentive hosts. I had a great short stay but it was much more enjoyable than I was expecting, for an overnight stay. Great people, great house, great service and excellent value for money.
Jiawen的人很好,家里的菲律宾小姐姐也很热情｡看了很多房源,她们家性价比最高｡特别是有早餐特别方便,菲律宾小姐姐做的,也很好吃噢!去西贡看山看海,能不奔波真好｡家里卫生很干净,猫猫狗狗也很乖,其中有只肥猫超可爱!!!
选择2晚住家文的家,体验很好!来之前,家文用图文很详细的告知了交通,菲佣姐姐来村口接我们｡家里布置得很温馨,三楼的天台上适合看星星月亮｡最让我感动的是,家文赶早亲自做了香喷喷的早饭给我们,非常感谢!
好
入住后发现房东的态度超级差,菲佣态度也很差｡
房东热情好客,还会为我们准备早餐｡家里有四只可爱的小动物｡

Staying with Jiawen was really a great experience. She is helpful and offered useful information to us for traveling and shopping in hk. The place is clean and cozy. The cats and dogs are so cute and you can play with them^^. I love the delicious breakfast prepared by Jianwen.

在此住了好几天,认为在香港还算性价比不错的民宿,如果对猫狗不介意的话｡尤其是房东和佣人都非常热情,乐于助人,有问必答｡家文也非常健谈,我们有过一次愉快的交流｡早餐丰盛,并且每天变着花样｡这里周边非常安静,环境整洁｡虽然位置稍偏,可是乘交通车外出很方便,离车站不仅近,车次还频繁,能去的方向也多｡我们是第一次到西贡住,主要是徒步和了解一下西贡的人文,包括吃海鲜,结果令人满意｡只是Wi-Fi在二楼卧房不够稳定,但在客厅一点没有问题｡是一次愉快的入住体验,非常感谢Jiawen 和 Lyn｡

name: Estudio / Terraza P4 (S. Família) mínimo 32 NOCHES
space: Es un espacio amplio,  luminoso y cómodo (no uso turístico). Separado en 3 elegantes espacios que comprenden una zona de oficina/estar/comedor con cobertura WIFI (de fibra óptica) con lo que podrá conectarse a internet con toda comodidad para sus presentaciones o videoconferencias gracias a la pantalla de TV de 42 pulgadas y que asimismo con la señal via satélite podrá también estar al día de las noticias internacionales sentado comodamente en el sofá convertible destinado a tal finalidad.  Finalmente tiene una zona de cocina/catering totalmente equipada, lo que le permite la posibilidad de preparar comida/refrigerio  con sus propios horarios. Posee una zona  de baño independiente con todo lo necesario. Todos estos espacios están fantásticamente complementados con su propia terraza privada donde hacer un paréntesis en su trabajo, para relajarse o entretenerse mientras disfruta con el impresionante telón de fondo de la Sagrada Familia y una panorámica de la ciudad de Barcelona. - SERVIC
description: Es un espacio amplio,  luminoso y cómodo (no uso turístico). Separado en 3 elegantes espacios que comprenden una zona de oficina/estar/comedor con cobertura WIFI (de fibra óptica) con lo que podrá conectarse a internet con toda comodidad para sus presentaciones o videoconferencias gracias a la pantalla de TV de 42 pulgadas y que asimismo con la señal via satélite podrá también estar al día de las noticias internacionales sentado comodamente en el sofá convertible destinado a tal finalidad.  Finalmente tiene una zona de cocina/catering totalmente equipada, lo que le permite la posibilidad de preparar comida/refrigerio  con sus propios horarios. Posee una zona  de baño independiente con todo lo necesario. Todos estos espacios están fantásticamente complementados con su propia terraza privada donde hacer un paréntesis en su trabajo, para relajarse o entretenerse mientras disfruta con el impresionante telón de fondo de la Sagrada Familia y una panorámica de la ciudad de Barcelona. - SERVIC
neighborhood_overview: La Sagrada Família es uno de los seis barrios que integran el Distrito del Ensanche de Barcelona y muy cerca del Hospital de Sant Pablo. La Sagrada Familia es la obra maestra del arquitecto Antoni Gaudí,  Iniciada en 1882, todavía está en construcción y está considerado el máximo exponente de la arquitectura modernista catalana, siendo el monumento más visitado de España. Es un barrio muy bien comunicado (metro, autobús, bus turístic, taxi), de locales de ocio y de restaurantes. La avenida Gaudí (zona peatonal) con mucho encanto y a solo dos paradas de la zona centro de la ciudad, (Paseo de Gracia, Pza. Catalunya, Ramblas), el principal centro comercial de Barcelona, con su impresionante variedad de boutiques de diseñadores como Gucci, Yves Sant Laurent y Hugo Boss, donde también podrá encontrar dos de los más exquisitos edificios de Gaudí, “La Pedrera” y la casa Batlló;  A cinco paradas de bus con dirección a las playas de la Villa Olímpica y Nova Icária; y/o centros de negocios (como
notes: La terraza le proporciona un atractivo muy especial ya que su ubicación (planta 8ª) dispone de unas vistas diurnas y nocturnas espectaculares de la ciudad de Barcelona, así como una gran intimidad para relajarse después de un largo día de trabajo.
transit: Puedes llegar fácilmente a la Sagrada Familia utilizando el transporte público, ya que está situada en uno de los barrios más céntricos y bien comunicados de la ciudad: L'Eixample. A continuación te detallamos los medios de transporte que te acercan a este barrio.  Transporte público:  Metro: L2 y L5, parada Sagrada Familia.   L3, parada Verdaguer.  Autobuses: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) El huésped también puede disponer de plaza de parking para su vehículo (precio adicional). Locales cercanos de alquiler de motocicletas, bicicletas y vehículos urbanos.
access: El alojamiento está ubicado en la planta 8ª de un edificio con ascensor, montacargas y conserjería. Se ofrece plaza de aparcamiento (pago adicional), según períodos. Mantenimiento/limpieza obligatoria (semanal)
interaction: Serán atendidos personalmente por el anfitrión que intentará resolver cualquier necesidad.
house_rules: Responsabilidad, seriedad y buen comportamiento cívico. El espacio se entrega en óptimas condiciones de limpieza y equipamiento. Dispone de todos los utensilios de cocina, toallas y  ropa de cama. Se ofrece limpieza (semanal) obligatoria para estancias largas. Check- in: 14:30 Check-out: 10,30  Los precios incluyen: Estancia + Impuestos (IVA). Cambio de ropa de cama/baño y limpieza semanal (con carácter Obligatorio) y coste adicional de 30€ por cada intervención  No incluyen: Plaza de parking.

host.host_about:
Me gusta la naturaleza, me encanta el montañismo. Soy una persona a la que le preocupa muchísimo la actual pérdida de valores humanos por parte de la sociedad en la que vivimos, y procuro hacer todo lo que está en mi mano para cambiar a un mundo mejor. Me gusta la comida mediterránea, la música clásica, jazz, contemporánea. Soy persona sencilla no necesito grandes cosas pero si aprecio la sensibilidad humana. El estilo de hospedaje que me gusta de airbnb, lo sabré cuando lo conozca mas.
"No hagas a los demás lo que no te guste para ti mismo"

reviews.comments: We had a great stay here. The apartment was super clean a spacious with a great balcony overlooking the famous Sangrada Familia. Subway stops are all near by, so its very easy to get around Barcelona. Xavier was a great host, would highly recommend this apartment.

It was our first trip to Spain. Xavier is an excellent host.There wasn't problems with flat or him.He helped all that he could, even with the smallest problems that we had. The apartment is located very well. All amenities are very close. There wasn't any disadvantages with our road to the sea, because there is bus stop near the house. Also, i want to say about the view from the balcony, this is realy great! 

I want to rate our trip for 10 stars, but there is only 5)

Thank you, Xavier!)

We really enjoyed to stay in this beautiful flat, very well located in Barcelona near the Sagrada Familia.
The appartment is exactly like the pictures on the site, even better.
It was very clean, really comfortable, and all the equipment we needed were here.
The terrace is so beautiful and sunny.
Our hotes were very helpful, nice and had all the answers for the informations that we needed.
We recommend this location if you're looking for a pleasant stay in Barcelona.
Muchas Gracias !

Grace à la gentillesse de Xavier et de sa femme et aussi le charme du loft,  nous avons passé un très agréable séjour à Barcelone. 
Le logement est vraiment bien situé. Le quartier est très sympathique. Le métro est très proche ce qui permet de se déplacer très rapidement dans la ville. La vue sur la Sagrada Familia depuis la terrasse et à travers les fenêtre est vraiment intéressante.
Cette présence au quotidien est un vrai plaisir. De plus la nuit, la Torre Agbar changeant de couleur est aussi très agréable à regarder.
L'appartement, décoré avec goût, est très fonctionnel, très bien équipé et propre. Ma femme, nos deux enfants en bas âge et moi s'y somment vraiment beaucoup plu.  La connection wifi est très stable et plutôt rapide.

I stayed a month at Xavier's loft, and it was truly a wonderful experience. The loft is modern, tastefully designed, has everything you need, immaculate, all of it opening up onto a huge terrace right across from Sagrada Familia.  In addition to Sagrada, you also have a panoramic view of the sea, city, and surrounding hills.
The loft is really exceptional and Xavier is an exceptional host. Communication was always fast and easy. If you have the chance to rent his loft, you will certainly not regret it!  Thank you again Xavier for providing this wonderful place for my stay in Barcelona. Un abrazo y hasta pronto!

Fantastic apartment with an amazing view on the Sagrada Familia. Very nice host and great location.
I definitely recommend this place!

Accueil très sympathique de Xavier et son fils. Appartement très bien équipé, agréable, fonctionnel, bien situé, quartier agréable, et en prime vue imprenable sur la Sagrada Familia et Barcelone ! Et petit plus : le concierge que l'on croisait régulièrement, très accueillant. Une adresse que nous retenons et recommandons vivement à tous ceux qui souhaitent séjourner à Barcelone.

El mejor!  La vista es increible!  No queriamos irse.  El espacio es 2 cuadras al metro, 2 cuadras a la Sagrda Familia, pero no es muy ruidoso.  Y es solo algunas cuadras al barrio Gracia.  Dentro del espacio es muy comodo y podiamos conicar, trabajar y relejar en casa.  La terraza era nuestro esepacio favorito para leer y ver la iglesia.  El espacio es perfecto para 1 o 2 personas, pero mis padres se quedaron por 5 cinco dias y todavia funciona bien.  Hay mercados y restaurantes muy cerca.  Hay un portero durante la semana y 2 puertas para seguridad.  Xavier era un buen anfitrion y nos ayudo con cualquier cosa necesitamos.  El mejor!!!!!

The best!  The view is incredible!  We didn't want to leave.  The space is 2 blocks from the metro, 2 blocks from the Sagrada Familia, but it was not too loud still.  You are only a few blocks from the Gracia neighborhood.  The space was very comfortable and we were able to cook, work and relax.  The terrace was our favorite place to read and look at the church.  The place is perfect for 1 or 2 people but my parents stayed for 5 days and it was still fine.  There are lots of restaurants and markets nearby.  There is a doorman at the building during the week and 2 doors for security so the place was safe.  Xavier was a fantastic host and helped with anything we needed.
