Accueil parfait, on a l'impression que ce sont des amis qui nous ont préparés l'appartement. Lieu de séjour que je recommande vivement, au cœur de la ville et un havre de paix, ce n'est pas si courant. Le logement est très agréable et sa terrasse offre de magnifiques vues. 100% satisfaits

Amazing apartment!!! Me and friend of mine spent one month in the apartment and we were extremly pleased. The apartment has everything you need (even more) for normal life. Everything you see in description of the apartment is right there (no hidden stuff or problems). The view from the terrace is breathtaking, magnificient, incredible... Metro station is 150m away which is perfect for connect to the other parts of Barcelona. The communication with mr Xavier was fast and without any problems, he was available all the time. 100% recommended!

Xavier's place is incredible. The pictures, in my opinion, completely undersell how nice of an apartment this is. The view is spectacular, and the neighborhood is *just* far away from the tourism of the Sagrada Familia that it's nice and quiet. Further, you're close enough that you can look out the window at the incredible structure each morning. The apartment itself is well equipped, and having a washer and a dryer is fantastic. Xavier made me feel very welcomed, and worked with me on my check out time, which was very early in the morning. I only hope that I'm able to stay at this apartment again, and experience Barcelona a second time.

Studio très agréable avec vue magnifique et terrasse sur la Sagrada. Très lumineux, correspondant parfaitement à la description sur le site. Etat de propreté parfait. Quartier calme et très agréable avec toutes commodités et bus, métro. Bon accueil de Xavier. Merci , Xavier de nous avoir rendu service, pour stocker nos bagages, le jour du départ.

Nuestra estadia en barcelona ha sido muy buena, la comunicacion con el anfitrion ha sido fluida y rapida y el estudio dispone de todo lo indispensable para estadias largas, recomendado y muy calido, la vista en el balcon es inigyalable , muy buena hubicacion, lo tendre en cuenta para mi proxima estadia!

I had a wonderful month in Barcelona at Xaviers place. I found everything as described here. The view is marvelous.
The place is highly recommended.
Xavier is a warm, friendly and welcoming host.

Die Unterkunft nahe der Sagrada Familia war wirklich wunderbar!
Das geräumige 1-Zimmer Appartement im 10. Stock ist modern und mit allem Nötigen eingerichtet. Der atemberaubende Ausblick von der großen Dachterrasse spricht genauso wie Barcelona für sich selbst.
Xavier war als Gastgeber stets ansprechbar und sehr hilfsbereit. 

Dementsprechend kommen wir gerne wieder und können nur unsere besten Empfehlungen aussprechen.
Great apartment with a great view! No problems to report.

Le loft est exactement ce à quoi je m'attendais après avoir lu la description. En plus, il est parfaitement situé dans la ville. Il est à trente minutes à pied ou 20 minutes en transport collectif (bus ou métro) de tous les endroits intéressants de Barcelone que ce soit la plage, un musée ou le centre touristique. Et tous les services sont disponibles dans le quadrilatère. 

Quoiqu'il que ce soit très spécial que d'avoir la Sagrada Familia "dans sa cour", le quartier demeure un quartier résidentiel où on se sent tout à fait en sécurité. 

Et Xavier est un hôte qui sait être accueillant tout en demeurant discret. 

Si vous avez la chance d'être à Barcelone quand le loft est disponible, n'hésitez pas à réserver avec Xavier.

Our one month in Barcelona was amazing in this apartment! Xavier is amazing host! Very polite, respond very quickly on every our question. The apartment is not big, but very cosy and clean,  same as at the photos. But the view is definitely more magnificent! Subway ( Metro) station is very near from the apartment, but we usually preferred a short (25/30 minutes) walk to the city center. Supermarket is also very close (2 minutes from the house). Everything was just perfect! Would definitely reccomend!

El apartamento era todo lo que buscábamos y sobre todo fiel a las fotos y la descripción. El trato directo con el dueño fue muy agradable y amigable. En resumen quedamos encantados con el trato del dueño y la calidad del apartamento. 100% recomendable.

Xavier ist ein sehr guter Gastgeber. Er war stets ansprechbar und sehr nett. Die Wohnung liegt zentral in der Nähe der Sagrada Familia in einer wunderbaren Umgebung. 3 min Fußweg zur U Bahnstation, 3 min zu Supermärkten und anderen netten Restaurants und Lokalen.

Très agréable séjour à Barcelona, pendant un mois (mai 2016).
Vue fantastique sur la Sagrada Familia.
Loft confortable.
Xavier (le propriétaire) est très présent et très réactif.
A recommander vivement.

Xavier has a first class world destination AirBnB. The Sagrada Familia is ever present; I spent plenty of time sitting on the villa watching construction slowly progress on the almost supernatural structure. The loft itself is very comfortable. Xavier is a fantastic host and keeps the place impeccably clean. The neighboring area takes in a lot of tourists, but that's not an issue. There are plenty of fantastic local places all around. I highly recommend this stay! Thanks Xavier.
Amazing place! The view is seriously breathtaking and the flat was always so clean! Great location too, would recommend to anyone staying in barcelona. Hope to stay there again!!
Excelente ubicación, vista inmejorable, muy limpio. El anfitrión excelente.Muy buena comunicación. Lo recomiendo 100%.

The host is very friendly and helpful. However, he came to the appartment unannounced which we did not always appreciate.
The apartment is in a top location and has everything that one can wish for.

Logement totalement en accord avec la description. Le studio est très bien équipé et fonctionnel. Sa terrasse et sa superbe vue sur la Sagrada Familia est vraiment l'atout de ce logement. De plus, il est tout près du métro. Je recommande vivement cette adresse!

La estancia en el estudio de Xavier ha sido inmejorable, Xavier es un excelente anfitrión, la comunicación ha sido excelente, siempre atento a todo lo que pudieramos necesitar y el trato muy agradable. El estudio es muy acogedor, limpio y  bien equipado, da gusto estar alli. Las vistas del estudio son increibles!!!. Se tiene una vista panorámica de mas de 180º de la ciudad. Y la ubicación genial! Muchas gracias por tus atenciones!!! El estudio es altamente recomendable!

I had a magical 4 month stay at Xavier’s. The place is perfectly located, close to all the things but very quiet and residencial. The studio has everything you need, even the tumble dryer! It was always kept clean, he was very attentive and any issue was quickly resolved. 
Being able to watch sunset over the Sagrada Familia everyday was such a delightful experience. From the terrace, you can see the panoramic view of the whole Barcelona. I never got bored of it. Can’t recommend enough this place. Thank you, Xavier!!

La ubicacion del apartamento es perfecta ! y no se puede pensar en una atencion mejor que la recibida por Xavier. Todo, pero todo, merece 10 puntos. Nosotros viajamos mucho  y esta fue la mejor experiencia de cordialidad y trato personal que hemos recibido. Recomendamos con todo corazon.
Excelente lugar ! <3 100% recomendable

Mr first visit to Xavier loft attic was for two months. My latest visit was for five weeks. The view is stunning. The apartment stylish, functional. Every thing works perfectly. Air conditioning, washing machine for clothes and dryer. WIFI. It is a family neighborhood except for the block around Sagrada Familia. Supermarkets and store just down the block. This is my favorite part of BCN. Hope to get back again.

name: Wonderfull and historic Glebe.
summary: Lovely room in the heart of historic Glebe in a modern two bedroom apartment with a king size bed and your own separate  bathroom. We are in a terrific location with cafes and restaurants on our door step. Good transport links to the city, Balmain, Newtown, Annandale, Leichhardt and Chinatown.
space: The space is a good size space.  The bed is a comfortable king size bed. You have your own bathroom during your stay. The room accommodates two people. Please note that parking is paid metered parking. Parking is free between 10pm and 8am. We don’t allow use of the kitchen as there are many restaurants  and cafes in the area to experience.
description: Lovely room in the heart of historic Glebe in a modern two bedroom apartment with a king size bed and your own separate  bathroom. We are in a terrific location with cafes and restaurants on our door step. Good transport links to the city, Balmain, Newtown, Annandale, Leichhardt and Chinatown. The space is a good size space.  The bed is a comfortable king size bed. You have your own bathroom during your stay. The room accommodates two people. Please note that parking is paid metered parking. Parking is free between 10pm and 8am. We don’t allow use of the kitchen as there are many restaurants  and cafes in the area to experience. Guest have access to the living areas but not the kitchen other than to make coffee or tea. One of us is available most of them time. I have lived in Glebe for thirty years and I love the village atmosphere. There are lots of restaurants, cafes and bars. We are close to the city, china town, Newtown, Balmain and Leichhardt. All very good areas for restaurants.
neighborhood_overview: I have lived in Glebe for thirty years and I love the village atmosphere. There are lots of restaurants, cafes and bars. We are close to the city, china town, Newtown, Balmain and Leichhardt. All very good areas for restaurants. We love having visitors and we welcome everyone.
notes: Guests are welcome to use the living areas but not the kitchen other than to make a cup of tea or coffee.  We supply breakfast when we are able. Some mornings we have early starts but it’s not normally a problem. There are many wonderful cafes in Glebe supplying breakfast. Please ensure you leave the apartment quietly as well as the house for the comfort of all. No banging doors please.
transit: There are very good transport links including the light rail system. The busses run every ten minutes into the city.. Please note that parking is metered parking and only free between 10pm till 8am.
access: Guest have access to the living areas but not the kitchen other than to make coffee or tea.
interaction: One of us is available most of them time.
house_rules: Be Respectful and quiet if entering the property late in the evening.

host.host_about: I am sixty three years of age and my husband is the Same age..We love to travel, go to the  beach and to eat out in restaurants. We are both retired but volunteer in the community.

reviews.comments: The hosts Elizabeth and Simon are extremely welcoming hosts with lots of helpful tips to get around Sydney. The room was well appointed, very clean and comfortable with a gorgeous private marble bathroom located nearby. There are a few stairs but easily manageable with luggage. Elizabeth provided a concise list of all information making access to the Internet and building really easy. Would highly recommend this location for an awesome holiday experience. The hosts have gone above and beyond to make my holiday wonderful and I thank them again for it.

This was a wonderful experience. The picture doesn't do justice. It's in a very modern apartment in a historical building, the room is quiet, private, simply and elegantly furnished, with a dreamily comfortable bed.   Glebe Point Road is close by, and so it is very convenient for shops, buses etc, but there is little noise.   Elizabeth and Simon were kind, thoughtful and welcoming.  I recommend this without reservation, except for people who need to have the bathroom on the same level as the bedroom.
Great host! Made us feel very welcome. Would be happy to stay there again when in Sydney

My poor vocabulary cannot describe how my wife and I love this family and how wonderful this experience is. Just see some details.
*Day 1, when I saw Elizabeth standing at front door, waiting for us arriving, I have already felt moved.
*One of my suitcases, with most of our clothes in it, got lost when I landed. Elizabeth offered her daughter's dresses to my wife just in case she has nothing to change. How thoughtful!
*She collected some useful travel tips and printed on a piece of A4 paper so we can save a lot of time searching all these info.
*We cooked and had dinner together just like a family, and also shared an old movie in the night before we leave. 
Elizabeth and Simon have travelled a lot of places all around the world. If you are also a fan of tour-all the world, they are the best people to talk with. And you will learn a lot.

Elizabeth is a delightful host, she and her husband Simon made us feel most welcome in their lovely and tranquil home. The bedroom was bright, airy and peaceful. The bed  was very comfortable and the bathroom private, spacious and spotlessly clean. 
Our visit was brief but Elizabeth and Simon were "easy-going" and very friendly, they made us feel at home and we would happily stay with them again. 
Thank you both.

I stayed with Elizabeth and Simon for around 2 weeks and it was like being at home. They are really nice people and treated me like a family. 

Elizabeth went out of her way to accommodate me and i still miss Simons cooking and spending time with me. 

I could not speak any more highly of them that i do and would definitely live with them if ever needed.  They are like family.

Elizabeth and Simon are wonderful friendly hosts.
I have never stayed in foreigner house.
So when i arrived in front of Elizabeth house, I was a little bit scared.
But she welcomed us glad. So we were happy and relief.
Although I can not speak English well she tried to listen to me.
And when I could not understand her say, she was carefully explained again.
And i'm not going to forget dinner that they prepared for us. Simon is good chef. :)  
Thank you for your kindness.
Glebe is so peaceful.
And house has comfortable bed, nice interior and very clean bathroom.I will miss them and lovely cat Lady. I wanna meet again.
Thank you for everything!

I had a wonderful stay in Glebe with wonderful friendly hosts, a lovely room, comfortable bed, clean bathroom and peaceful location.  Thank you to you both for sharing your home with me, it was lovely to meet you and I will hope to stay with you again in the future when I'm back in Sydney.

Both Eliz and Simon were so kind. It was the best airbnb stay for us to date. The room was very cozy and private, just the way we like it. Feels like home, Simon cooked for us dinner and it was fantastic. The location is not too far from the city. Definitely a recommended stay.

Elisabeth and Simon were fantastic host. They made us feel immediately like home.
The room is very cosy, clean and 
quiete and with your own tv and reading sofa.
The bed was very confortable ( better than my own!)
They assisted us with every single request we had, always with a smile.
They even cooked dinner for us and it was really delicious.
Very convinient location ( the bus stop is just around the corner with different bus taking you to the city centre(10 minutes) or to the beach(30 minutes).
Simon and Elisabeth have a great sense of hospitality and they are really nice person to chat with.
Located in a very quiete and tranquil area. I would definitely go back, as it was like being home away from home.

Many good things can be said about the room and atmosphere Elizabeth and Simon provide. They are down to earth people and gladly help you in anyway they can. Everything was clean and the bed was comfy. The location is great for sightseeing with light rail and buses close by.

Elizabeth and Simon were just terrific and greeted us at their beautiful appartment. They were always available if we had any questions during our stay. They cooked a delicious breakfast for us and during our stay they offer us a glass a champagne. The appartment was everything advertised and it was even better than we expected. The room was clean and very confortable with all amenities that you could need. Its easy to travel all around the city and the area is one of the best area in Sydney. Elizabeth and Simon we really enjoyed your kind hospitality.

I spent a wonderful week at this great apartment in Glebe in the heart of Sydney.  The apartment is very clean and tidy, very spacious and the host's niece made me very welcome. My large room had an extremely comfortable double bed and I slept soundly every night. There was plenty of storage and wardrobe space to hang my clothes. I had my own bathroom with a walk in shower that was amazingly hot and powerful.  There is WiFi throughout, a kitchen for cooking meals and a lovely lounge area to relax in and watch TV. The apartment itself is situated just off Glebe Point Road with at least 3 buses running directly to the city centre and beaches. Get an Opal card and use the buses which stop at the end of the road. The apartment was really quiet with no outside noise. The hosts were in contact throughout if I needed help or advice and provided travel books and handy tourist information that I used to get about. I loved the location best of all and would recommend walking three blocks down to the waters edge where there is a beautiful park  that is a hidden gem.

This safe and beautiful tree-lined suburb, with easy access by foot or very regular public transport to the Airport, Sydney city and surrounds, made a stay in Glebe perfect.  Every type of restaurant, cafe, store etc are just around the corner. The room and spacious bathroom were immaculately clean, and our hosts Elizabeth and Simon made us feel incredibly welcome - almost part of the family.  We look forward to returning again, and recommend Elizabeth and Simon's beautiful home to anyone looking for a relaxing stay in Sydney, with the chance to meet two fantastic new friends.

I couldn't rate this place highly enough. Elizabeth and Simon were wonderful hosts, there were extremely accommodating, making me feel very much at home. The house is lovely, it's a comfortable bed and the room is accompanied by an amazing shower. I'd definitely stay here again. Best airbnb stay I've had to date.

wonderful and welcoming hosts, beautiful room in a lovely neighbourhood with many little cafes and restaurants, about 30 mins walking to Darling Harbour and about an hour to the Opera House, definitely recommended

I had an amazing time at Elizabeth and Simons home in Sydney. They're so lovely! Couldn't have asked for a better place to stay. They cooked me breakfast, dinner and every night we had a glas of wine together. I will definitely come back and stay with these incredible people again.

We had a wonderful stay at Elizabeth and Simon's home. Our hosts were most welcoming and helpful.  Their home is modern, stylish and beautifully looked after. Glebe itself is a vibrant place within easy access of the city centre. It has a village feel, with plenty of restaurants and bars (we ate there every night).  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Elizabeth's place and would definitely put it top on our places to stay when in Sydney.

Elizabeth's hospitality blew me away.  The room and our own bathroom were immaculate and we had everything we needed for our stay.  Elizabeth was a warm and friendly host and also provided us with a lovely warm breakfast as part of the stay.
Glebe is an amazing area and Elizabeth's home is well located close to the shops, the light rail and Darling Harbour all being in walking distance.  
I'm so glad I got to stay in such a lovely home.  Thank you!

Well, this was by far the best Accommodation experience I have ever had, after travelling 5 months around the world, that's a big call. It was really easy to get from the Airport and back and forth to the ICC at Darling Harbour. They were the most hospitable hosts you could wish to have, your own bathroom and comfy bed with plenty of room to move. So many restaurants to choose from and a huge Shopping Centre just up the road. I almost cried when I had to leave. Thank you sooo much.

Awesome location with hosts who offer excellent hospitality. They are generous with their efforts in comfort and companionship if you want it, and they have excellent knowledge on Sydney plus locations around the world. A top little find!

Charming obliging and gracious hosts, generous and accommodating. The room is pleasant and well-furnished, with a large comfortable bed. Small thing missing, I'd have liked a bedside table. Bathroom perfect. Would certainly recommend to anyone, and I'll check if the room is available next time I'm in that part of the world.

It's my first time to use this service in Sydney, I was a little nervous, not very sure what kind of place I would dwell in, not sure who I am going to deal with,to be honest. I was totally relaxed after the initial communication with her, she is very kind and warm, she kept on informing me what necessary matters, even including parking. 

When I arrived in front of her house, which is right behind the historical Valhalla cinema at Glebe, my eyes wildly opened, her place is sitting in an old-style building with a beautiful garden, a nice bobbling fountain. 

She met me and lead to my place, when I stepped in the room, my jaws fell on the ground and it took me a few minutes to pick them up and closed. In a big room, sits a nice iron-framed bed, the bedding looks like an oil painting, very artistic. The space is much more bigger than I would expect. The owner hearted prepare fruits, snacks and even bottled water, that is so touched, everyone who lives in Sydney would know drinking water is not an issue at all, however she prepares the bottled water, when she realized that I drink more water, she prepared jags of them, you know what, she even used the food wrapper to cover it. 

The independent bathroom is also big, she would clean it up everyday, when you step in it, it looks like it isn't being used at all, there is no a drop of water on the glass door, mirror, or wherever you would think it would be.

Both her husband and herself are super nice to the guest, even though I am a horrible one, hardly communicate with them, except basic greetings. How terrible I am. The night before I go back to China, both of them prepared a farewell dinner for me, but I bailed, you can see how a terrible guest I am. 

Her location is wonderful, next to Glebe point road, It's easy to walk around the neighbourhood, beautiful cafes, restaurants, stores and bus stops are within two minutes walking distance. 

Her place is so beautiful, I would wake up in the birds' singing every morning, sometimes, her cute house cat would come and greet you.

Stay at her place is a wonderful experience, like staying at home…this would carve in my brain for a long long time.

Great location, very comfortable accommodation, own bathroom! But best of all, outstanding hospitality & kindness. Elizabeth & Simon were so welcoming, & Elizabeth was extremely helpful by communicating frequently before we arrived. Highly recommended!
Elizabeth y Simon son grandes anfitriones, con una casa muy bonita y confortable para alojarse, su hospitalidad y el lugar son recomendados.

Very hospitable and quick responses to requests.
Great location, close to public transport (bus & light rail).
Great location. Great room to stay. Friendly hosts.
Excellent host and a great location, highly recommend.

summary: Centrally located in Taksim, Red Apple Apartment is 10 minutes' walk from Taksim Metro Station and Taksim Square. It offers self-catering accommodation featuring free WiFi and equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a seating area with flat-screen

name: Quiet Montreal Apartment
summary: Small apartment located in between Mile End, Little Italy and Parc Ex districts. One full bedroom, one living room with sofa bed, full kitchen and restroom. Includes: washer and dryer, wifi, plasma TV, PS3, turntable & records.  Grocery & subway station (Parc) are 5 min away from the apartment. 15 min walk from Little Italy / Jean Talon Market 15 min bus ride (line 80) from downtown Montreal
space: Very quiet apartment well located in Mile Ex district. Close to Jean Talon market, Lille Italy, Mile End and minutes away by bus or subway to Downtown Montreal and Old Port. There is one private bedroom with a double bed, one living room with reclining sofa, one fully equipped kitchen and a restroom with shower, washer and dryer. It includes all the necessary linen, towel and cooking equipment needed.
description: Small apartment located in between Mile End, Little Italy and Parc Ex districts. One full bedroom, one living room with sofa bed, full kitchen and restroom. Includes: washer and dryer, wifi, plasma TV, PS3, turntable & records.  Grocery & subway station (Parc) are 5 min away from the apartment. 15 min walk from Little Italy / Jean Talon Market 15 min bus ride (line 80) from downtown Montreal Very quiet apartment well located in Mile Ex district. Close to Jean Talon market, Lille Italy, Mile End and minutes away by bus or subway to Downtown Montreal and Old Port. There is one private bedroom with a double bed, one living room with reclining sofa, one fully equipped kitchen and a restroom with shower, washer and dryer. It includes all the necessary linen, towel and cooking equipment needed. It’s just a stone’s throw from the vibrant, colorful Jean-Talon Market, in Montreal’s Little Italy, and an equally short hop from the boho-verging-on-bourgeois Mile End neighborhood, but Montreal’s Mi
neighborhood_overview: It’s just a stone’s throw from the vibrant, colorful Jean-Talon Market, in Montreal’s Little Italy, and an equally short hop from the boho-verging-on-bourgeois Mile End neighborhood, but Montreal’s Mile-Ex feels like a lost enclave, a bubble unto itself. When the creatives started getting priced out of Mile End, it became time to look for newer pastures, but there seemed to be a psychological barrier to moving west. Today, the Mile-Ex is now the most interesting area in town, with cafés, restaurants, art-filled factories, and all the things that nurture and cultivate a creative crowd.
transit: Parc subway station 5 min walk away. Bus line 80 and 365 a block away (route to downtown, old port, chinatown)

host.host_about:
Hi,
I'm a music professionnal working in Montreal, Quebec. I have the chance to travel a lot for my work. I love Air Bnb for it's ease of use.

reviews.comments: William à été très disponible, même s'il n'a pas pu être présent le jour de notre arrivée il nous a laissé tout ce sont nous avions besoin. L'appartement est très fonctionnel et très sympa. Il est très bien situé, à quelques minutes du métro et des commerces. Idéal pour un sejour à Montréal! Merci pour tout William !

William was a great host throughout the entire experience. He was there to greet us upon arrival and was easy to contact during our stay. He provided us with some info on the public transit, a list of his favorite spots, and some great music too! The apartment is simple, neat, and clean with plenty of amenities. It is located in a quintessential Montreal Neighborhood with manageable parking around the corner. Be sure not to park right in front (Hutchinson), it is resident only and we got a parking ticket within 20 minutes because it's parking-by-permit only. Around the corner there is pay by space parking and some other free spots. We used Uber and our car to get around but the metro is close and seems very manageable. William is great resource for anything you may need to know about the area.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

L'appartement était très bien, équiper de tout ce qu'il faut, au moindre problème je pouvais contacter William.

Très heureux d'y avoir été

For short or long stays, I highly recommend this apartment. You feel as though you live like the locals, and it has everything you would need. The bed is comfortable and there's plenty of space for lounging. 

It's a short walk to the metro, and easy to car share to. Good option.

We had a great experience at William's place.  His apartment is steps from a centrally located subway stop (and grocery store - bonus!), yet very quiet and safe.  I am a light sleeper and was surprised at how quiet it (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was great from the moment I tried to book.  There was a glitch on Airbnb's side and William worked with them to correct the problem within a few hours.  I never had to wait long for a response to any of my questions.  I even had a few over the holidays while he was traveling, and he replied quickly!  If you're looking for a well-located, tidy, cozy apartment with a comfy bed, stocked kitchen and plenty of room for two, this is your place.  I plan to visit Montreal again soon (I hope!) and I would not seek a different spot to stay unless I had to!
Very clean and quiet place near the downtown area. Fantastic for 1-2 people looking to explore Montreal!
William is a great host and his home was perfect for our stay. I would recommend staying here!

summary: Apartamento 1 dormitorio con cama doble en el dormitorio y sofá cama doble en el salón. Perfecto para 4 huéspedes.El salón con cocina americana y salida al balcón, tiene TV de pantalla plana, sofá cama doble y mesa comedor para 4 huéspedes. WIFI gr HUTB 010402
space: Apartamento de 1 dormitorio con cama doble en el dormitorio y sofá cama doble en el salón. Perfecto para 4 huéspedes.  El salón con cocina americana y salida al balcón, tiene TV de pantalla plana, sofá cama doble y mesa comedor para 4 huéspedes.  El baño tiene ducha y la zona del aseo está separada de la de la ducha, para máximo confort y privacidad de los huéspedes.  El dormitorio con una amplia cama matrimonial tiene su propia TV.  La cocina esta totalmente equipada.  Los suelos son de madera, muy modernos.  Hay WIFI, aire acondicionado y calefacción. HUTB 010402

neighborhood_overview: La zona es muy tranquila y silenciosa, la calle del apartamento es peatonal y hay varias paradas de metro y de buses que comunican el apartamento con Plaza Catalunya y Las Rambals en menos de 10 minutos. Hay varios supermercados a menos de 100 metros del apartamento asi como restaurantes, terrazas, bancos y comercios.  La basílica de la Sagrada Familia es el punto de referencia para orientarse y esta a pocos minutos a pie del apartamento.
notes: La tasa turística (obligatoria) se ha de pagar a la llegada al apartamento. La tasa es de 2.52 euros por adulto (más de 16 años) por noche. Solo se ha de abonar para los primeros 7 días de la estancia. MUY IMPORTANTE: El sofá cama no cierra. Los huéspedes lo pueden utilizar solo abierto como cama doble.
transit: Gracias a su céntrica ubicación, es posible ir andando a todos los lugares de interés turísticos, sin necesidad de utilizar el transporte público durante su estancia.  El apartamento está situado a 500 metros de la parada de metro de Sagrada Familia ( líneas violeta L2 y azul L5). La estación de tren de Paseo de Gracia ( RENFE Cercania ) se encuentra a 20 minutos a pie del apartamento. El tren tarda desde el Aeropuerto de Barcelona - El Prat alrededor de 25 minutos y tiene salidas cada 30 minutos desde las 6 am hasta las 11:30 pm. La mejor tarjeta para el tren el la T 10 (costa aproximadamente 10 euros y tiene 10 viajes . No es unipersonal y sirve para todo tipo de transporte publico, incluido el tren que conecta la ciudad con el aeropuerto ) El viaje en taxi desde el aeropuerto cuesta aproximadamente 30- 40 euros y dura 30 minutos.
access: Los huéspedes tienen acceso exclusivo a toda la vivienda.
interaction: Estamos disponible para ayudarles en caso de que lo necesiten durante su estancia, 24 horas al día a través de 3 números de teléfono con (Hidden by Airbnb) .
house_rules: Están totalmente prohibidas las fiestas. No se aceptan mascotas. Se puede fumar solo en la terraza o en el balcón, en caso de que el apartamento disponga de ello.

host.host_about:
We are owners of several apartments Tendency Group located in the city center of Barcelona and are proud of offering our guests a personalised service together with high quality apartments. 
We are travelers like you and understand and try to meet and exceed your expectations.

reviews.comments: Loved the apartment.
Ottimo tutto dall'accoglienza al soggiorno. Tutto perfetto come descritto. Abbiamo trascorso dei giorni fantastici.
El departamento muy agradable, ordenado y limpio, un poco "inpersonal", pero correcto. Muy buena ubicación, cerca de todo y lejos del caos turístico.
Apartment was just as it was described. It is in an excellent location very close to La Sagrada Familia and to a metro that connects you to everything! We really enjoyed our stay.

Agréable séjour, très bel appartement comme décrit sur le site, bien situé dans une rue calme à 2 mn de la Sagrada, nous avons eu l'appartement à l'heure demandé. Accueil sympathique et agréable. Nous recommandons ce logement pour découvrir ou redécouvrir  Barcelone.
Cute little renovated apartment, 5 minutes walk from the sangrada familia. Loved it!

This apartment is really and I enjoyed the stay pretty much! The interior and the location are great! You have many opportunities to buy some food around the corner and it is just a 7min walk from the Sagrada Familia. The metro station is also close by. 
I slept well on the sofa and the bed was comfortable too. It is maybe a little bit loud on the sofa, as people coming and going and it everything is re-echoing in the corridor. 
The apartment was very clean, the kitchen is fully equipped and apart of towels and there was a hairdryer. The toilette and the shower are separated. The shower is available from the sleeping room and the toilette is not so indiscreet, which some people might bother. It has a glass door that let the other people see your shape and you can hear most of the sounds as there are slots between door and wall. 
All in all it is a very great apartment/location and I will rent it definitely again, when I fly over another time to Barcelona. Thank you!

L accueil était moyen trop impersonnel, la fenêtre ferme très mal au salon et les photos donnent l impression d'un grand espace alors que c est assez petit surtout quand on ouvre le canapé. La Nespresso mais sans capsule vraiment dommage quand on est de passage c est un minimum comme dans les autres locations.
My mother and I enjoyed our stay in Barcelona and the apartment was lovely and in a great spot near the Sagrada Familia! Easy to get into the main part of town and Gothic quarter. Would stay again!

The apartment was perfect for our stay in Barcelona!
The television was big, kitchen fully equiped, with microwave, oven, toaster, fridge, espresso (sadly no cups)! 
Bathroom was small, but enough for the two of us. 
The Wifi was really fast, we had no troubles at all! The extra television in the bedroom is a nice extra! 
There are 3 supermarkets nearby (Supermercado, Lidl, ...) and the metro is also around the corner! 

We would definitely recommend this apartment!
ottima esperienza tutto come veniva descritto nel sito, ambiente pulito, tranquillo,  tutto a portata di mano metro, bus, ristoranti

Experiencia horrible. Tuvimos que dormir los 4 en el salón debido a que no se podía estar en el dormitorio por olores fecales. 

Horrible experience. We had to sleep all 4 in the living room because we could not be in the bedroom by fecal odors.

Contraté el apartamento 2.2 y me entregó el 2.1, argumentando que eran iguales. A pesar de que reclamé el apartamento que contraté me dijo que no era posible debido a que ya estaba ocupado. Al entrar en el apartamento 2.1 notamos un terrible olor, debido a que la pared del dormitorio tenía una rotura de la bajante de aguas fecales del piso de arriba. Solicité un cambio de apartamento al propietario y me dijo que no tenía ninguno disponible. Intenté ponerme en contacto con Airbnb pero no fue posible debido a que todos los agentes estaban ocupados. No me quedó más remedio que quedarme en el apartamento. Tuvimos que cerrar la puerta de la habitación para que no saliera el olor y dormir los 4 en el salón.

I hired apartment 2.2 and gave me the apartment 2.1, arguing that they were the same. Even though I claimed the apartment I hired he told me it was not possible because it was already occupied. By entering apartment 2.1 we noticed a terrible smell, because the bedroom wall had a break in the downstairs fecal drain. I requested a change of apartment to the owner and he told me that he had none available. I tried to get in touch with Airbnb but it was not possible because all the agents were busy. I had no choice but to stay in the apartment. We had to close the door to the room to avoid smelling, and sleep the 4 in the living room.

We've been there for 4 days. The apartment is very nice and cosy. It is close to the most of the touristic destination with lots of nice restaurants around. We really enjoyed there and definitely will be back soon.

Très bon accueil à notre arrivée, nous avons même eu le logement un peu plus tôt que prévu.
L'appartement est très bien situé et proche de toutes les commodités.
Logement parfaitement propre et correspondant exactement aux photos.
Nous le recommandons vivement pour un séjour à Barcelone

a 5 mn de la Sagrada familia 
Apto turístico tipo apart hotel
Muy limpio y bien decorado terraza agradable . Ideal para 2 o 3 personas .
Everything was great,location is perfect.Appartment was clean, cozy, feel great, all recommedation
The place was absolutely beautiful and The company that rented the places had great communications
Vicinissima alla stazione della metro ed a due passi dalla Sagrada Familia e dal supermercato. La casa è dotata di tutto il necessario

We were a family of 4 including teenage children and loved the location of the apartment and it was very clean. The negatives for us were the size. Maybe our fault but from the photos it looked quite spacious. Would recommend for a couple who wanted to be close to Sagrada Familiar rather than for a family as the sofa bed pretty much took up the whole lounge room, the shower was in the main bedroom and tiny with no door (could shut the actual bedroom door but this meant anyone in the bedroom having to vacate for privacy) and the toilet was again small with a glass frosted door so again more suited to a couple. Some Airbnb's feel like the host has gone to trouble to make you feel welcome with some homely touches this was very functional and run as a business. Was excited about the stay but it just didn't meet expectations in some areas
Clean, comfortable, and well-located apartment. Exactly as pictured--everything is quite new and thoughtfully planned. Easy communication. Highly recommended.

The apartment was absolutely lovely and fully equipped! It was perfect and specious enough for us (we were three people) and in my opinion it can visit up to 4 people without serious space problems.

The neighbourhood is lovely and quite. There are two metro stations (Sagrada Familia, Encants) which are about 5 min. (walking distance) far away from the apartment. There are also supermarkets, bakeries and some restaurants/cafes near. Although it's a bit far away from the city centre (app. 30 min. walking), the route is wonderful and not strenuous at all.

Mariela (the girl who welcomed us in town and managed our booking all along) was very kind and helpful. She was very helpful before our arrival and when we asked her for "local information" she recommended us some restaurants and bars.

We had a great time in there and we'd love to visit the apartment during our next trip to Barcelona!

Modern lägenhet belägen på en tyst tvärgata med alla bekvämligheter man kan behöva. Bättre Wifi än vi har hemma. Tunnelbana och bussar runt hörnet. Närmsta mataffären i samma byggnad. Sagrada familia några kvarter bort. 

Han som mötte oss med nycklarna var jättetrevlig och kom med många bra tips. Enkelt att checka ut, bara att lämna nycklarna på bordet och dra igen dörren. 

Det var inte så varmt när vi var där så jag vet inte hur bra AC:n fungerar. Köket var litet men funkade utmärkt för lättare matlagning. Vi fick inte riktigt plats alla 4 runt bordet så barnen fick sitta i soffan bredvid men det var inget problem för oss. 

Då toadörren är i frostat glas och duschrummet saknar dörr helt bör man inte vara helt oblyga inför varandra. (Ska man duscha kan  man stänga sovrumsdörren). 

Sammantaget blev vi väldigt nöjda med boendet.

Buena experiencia! Fue exactamente lo que esperábamos. Todo muy limpio y bien preparado. El departamento también está en una buena ubicación. Es perfecto para parejas, pero también para una familia de tres personas, ya que el sofácama es muy amplio.
Good location and a nice room, nothing to complain about.
The bed is so comfy! Loved the clean white linens and the apartment has so much character! Be sure and walk about the neighborhood, it’s lovely and full of delicious food!

Très bon accueil, appartement conforme au descriptif, propre. 
Nous avons été accueilli par Paul qui nous a donné des bons conseils de visite.
Nice and cosy apartment located in a quiet neighborhood close to the Sagrada Familia.

The apartment is really nice, clean and located in a nice area. 7 minute walking distance to the nearest metro station. It is spacious and comfortable enough for 4 people. 
It was so awesome to be that close to the Sagrada Familia Church. We would recommend it without any doubt.
Charming apartment very close to Sagrada Familia with all the amenities you could need for your stay including a very well equipped kitchen. Light and airy we loved our stay here.

The communication and hospitality was second to none. After a long day of delays and a very late landing the hosts were incredibly accomadating and made check in easy. The apartment itself was everything we needed in a good location. Would highly redommend staying here!

The space was really great! A little small from what the pictures show, but it was manageable for our family of 4. The location is wonderful - literally blocks away from Sagrada Familia and the closest metro. There were a couple of residents below us that were definitely partying in the very late hours a few nights during our stay, which woke all of us up. Not sure if that's one of Tendency's residents or another airbnb, but that wasn't the most pleasant experience. The building also has an elevator, which was super handy for our many luggage!! Overall, we had a great time in Barcelona and we were very happy with the airbnb!

Es un apartamento moderno y reformado aunque muy muy pequeño, el baño no es apto para personas un poco grandes. En realidad aunque se alquila para 4 personas, no debería alquilarse para más de 2 y un bebé como máximo, el sofá cama no es nada cómodo y hace muchísimo ruido.
La comunicación con la empresa (porque es una empresa) era algo difícil porque varios de los chicos que trabajan allí no hablan español así que terminábamos hablando inglés, para mí no fue un problema pero es algo que se tiene saber porque si no lo hablas, la comunicación puede ser complicada.
La ubicación si está bien, cerca del metro y la sagrada familia, en una calle bonita y tranquila.

Nous avons aimé notre séjour à Barcelone, l'appartement est bien situé, dans un environnement calme et près des attraits touristiques et du métro. Le logement est propre et bien équipé.  Nos hôtes ont toujours été disponibles et joignables au besoin. Nous voulons remercié Arezia pour son accueil  et aussi Adina pour son écoute et sa grande disponibilité.
Nice place. Close to the Sagrada Familia. Slightly small for 3 people and a baby, small staircase and lift (for the stroller). Really nice welcome. Good and clean accomodation.

Don’t think twice, the apartment is so cozy and perfect for a couple of two. The location is amazing and so convenient to any site..
Words can’t describe how much me and my partner enjoyed the stay!
Thank you All for your service and lovely welcoming!
Hope to come again in the near future!
Cheers
Lovely apartment in a great location! Very suitable for a couple, we really enjoyed our stay in this bright and clean apartment. Would recommend it without a doubt!

Location is great, and room is exactly what I expected except for almost-impossible-to-open door. I tried to communicate with the host who answered promptly, but I did not receive any follow up. Hope they fix it for future guest.  other than that, everything else was great.

Thank you for your hospitality, let me make a good impression in Barcelona. The door is a bit difficult to open, but there are very comfortable beds and hot water to make the journey more comfortable.

Nous avons passé une semaine à Barcelone. Appartement très bien situé, à 5 minutes de métro de la Sagrada Familia, à deux pas de Lidl et d'autres magasins alimentation, juste en face un Restaurant-bar Chut où nous avons très bien mangé pour que dalle. Appartement bien propre. Nous n'avons rien à repprocher à part le manque d'un peu d'épices, de sucre, de sel, de café.... Communication en plusieurs langues. Nous y retournerions sans problème.

Nice stay! Nice flat! Had an issue with with sticky door but was  quickly fixed by host next day. Bit outside old quarter but close to metro stops and Sagrada Familia, shops and cafes. Would stay again.

Auf Grund eine SEHR kurzfristigen Strornierung durch einen anderen Gastgeber mußten wir zwei Stunden vor unserer Ankunft (spät Abends) in Barcelona eine neue Unterkunft finden. Tendency hat uns das Apartment schnell und unkompliziert zur Verfügung gestellt, wofür wir sehr dankbar sind. Das Apartment ist wie beschrieben, sehr sauber und zentral gelegen. Läden, U-Bahn und Restaurants sind alle zu Fuss zu erreichen.

Had a nice and comfortable stay in this appartment. Nice bed and shower. Could hear upstairs neighbours talking and walking but they were quiet after 23.00 so that was not a big problem. Would not reccomend to stay here with more than 2 people unless you know each other very well ;) since shower is somewhat IN the bedroom with no door ;) check in went very smooth with someone waiting for me in front of appartment to let me in.

It was amazing experience! I have been in Barcelona 6 times and this apartment was much better then other! Lots of sightseeing, shops, Bakerys and so on) apartment a little bit smaller than we expected, but it was perfect for four people! Thank you so much! It was excellent! 10 of 10 for all)

Nice apartment in good location but problems whilst staying with cooker, microwave, drainage and sofa bed but host did not respond first day.  Tried second day via Air B and B which host replied to, stating would get someone out the following day.  Nobody came the following day and host advised problem would be resolved after we vacated.  Very poor communication and no assistance offered during stay
Accueil bien, très propre. Appartement un peu bruyant avec les voisins

name: #2 SUNNY DOUBLE BATHROOM 5 PAX FLAT
summary: 60 sqm. apartment with two bedrooms for 5 pax stay. Each room has it's own bathroom with shower. Location is within 10 minutes walk to main historical attractions and sultanahmet center. SULTANAHMET, CEMBERLITAS TRAM STATIONS and CATLADIKAPI BUS STOP is 10 minutes walk. Apartment is in a quite and safe neighborhood. Private parking lot with extra charge is at sight. Wednesday's farmers' market takes place within only 5 minutes walk. 2 parks with playgrounds for children is 5 minutes away.
space: This is a 60 sqm. apartment with two bedrooms ideal for 5 person stay.  First room has 1 double and 1 single bed and the second room has 1 double bed. Each room has it's own bathroom with shower. The unbeatable location of this apartment will allow our guests to reach all of the old town's major historical highlights and as well as traditional shopping centers such as grand bazaar, spice market, and the famous wednesday farmer's market for fresh veggies and fruits.  A short taxi ride or public transport can bring you to Taksim Square (Beyoglu), a bustling area full of great shopping, nightlife and both traditional and international kitchen restaurants.For those who love to run, sea side path and the GULHANE PARK is just 15 minutes walk away.
description: 60 sqm. apartment with two bedrooms for 5 pax stay. Each room has it's own bathroom with shower. Location is within 10 minutes walk to main historical attractions and sultanahmet center. SULTANAHMET, CEMBERLITAS TRAM STATIONS and CATLADIKAPI BUS STOP is 10 minutes walk. Apartment is in a quite and safe neighborhood. Private parking lot with extra charge is at sight. Wednesday's farmers' market takes place within only 5 minutes walk. 2 parks with playgrounds for children is 5 minutes away. This is a 60 sqm. apartment with two bedrooms ideal for 5 person stay.  First room has 1 double and 1 single bed and the second room has 1 double bed. Each room has it's own bathroom with shower. The unbeatable location of this apartment will allow our guests to reach all of the old town's major historical highlights and as well as traditional shopping centers such as grand bazaar, spice market, and the famous wednesday farmer's market for fresh veggies and fruits.  A short taxi ride or public transpo
neighborhood_overview: Being in the heart of the old town SULTANAHMET is a true privelage. Our guests will feel the historic atmosphere at every corner.  safety, silence, proximity to historical downton, and sea side will provide you the perfect path for a walk or jogging.
transit: SULTANAHMET, CEMBERLITAS TRAM STATIONS and CATLADIKAPI BUS STOP is about 10 minutes walk distance, within 20 mnts walk you can reach to EMINONU PIER to take ferry for bosphorus tour or to across to asan side of istanbul.
access: Unlimited free wifi & Sat. T.V. is available in all of Sufi's Suites. Guests can do  online check in and print necessary papers at reception office. Sufi team will also be more then happy to assist you with unique tips to make your stay most memorable.
interaction: Reception service is available from 9 am till 7 pm everyday. Upon your arrival Sufi's team will be waiting for you to help with your needs.
house_rules: Our's is a nonesmoking property. We expect our guests to respect this rule. Thank You.

host.host_about:
Hi There, My name is Omar  Farouq Tekin and I'm the owner of SUFI APART SUITES. I was born and raised till university in central Turkish town of URGUP which widely known as CAPPADOCIA. Being from this spectacular land of nature and history and as a member of a family which now for three generations dealing in art works and antiquties has helped me to built an esthetic understanding for interior decoration, thanks to this I was able to give unique touches  to my apartments in order to cheer up my guests' not only accomodation comfort but visual taste as well.
As a husband, a Father and a constant traveller, I have the ability of foreseeing A travellers' concerns. Therefor I always take necessary  measures in order to provide utmost safety and comfort. 
My main field of interests are philosophy, history, nature, art and the anthropology. I consider myself as a very lucky person since  I've been  living and  working in places which helped  to enjoy and develop my fieslds of interest on daily basis. Oh and yes definately Culinary as well :-))) I LOOOVE to cook and am a sea food expert as well, so if you care about fine local food too then you are in the right place my friend. Just ask me  or even better, Join me! :-)
I am hoping to see you all in my place to exchange cultural knowledge and have woderful friendships with sweet memories.
WITH ALL MY BEST WISHES TO YOU
OMAR FAROUQ TEKIN.

reviews.comments:
It was a beautiful experience in Istanbul that I won't forget!!!
The apartment was with 2 rooms and 2 bathrooms, small but with everything needed for 2 couples and a child as we. Farouq was very correct with us, waiting till late with a check in at 11 p.m.  He explained everything what we ask him, and gave us good directions. He was very friendly and funny...

We couldn't have picked a better place to stay on our first visit to Istanbul.  Farouq's apartment is located within walking distance to so many wonderful sights and restaurants.  The apartment was great - very clean and comfortable - and Farouq helped us coordinate transport to/from the airport which was also very useful.  We loved Istanbul and found Farouq's apartment to be a great home away from home.
The place is very close to the main attractions of Istanbul. It is small but it's enough for a good stay.

Farouq is the best host i have encountered so far. Messages were replied really quick although he wasnt in istanbul to meet me, he made sure his colleague was ready to receive me when I reached his apartment. The apartment is great with rooms with individual attached bathrooms. Space was fantastic as well. Location is nearby to places like the blue mosque, grand bazaar, spice market etc. Travelling to IST airport took only about 15 to 20mins. Kudos to Farouq for his excellent apartment and service!
Farouq is very hospitable. He always answers very fast and and he gave us the ride from and to the airport. We were pretty happy for this price. Thank you

Farouq has a lovely place, which is located in the heeart of Istanbul's tourist area, with all of the city's sites to see conveniently located within a few minutes' walk.
The place is clean with modern bathrooms and other amneties.
Our host remained in touch from the time of booking to check out and even beyond. He arranged transport from and to the airport as well as accommodating our odd check-in and check-out timings.
This was my first trip to Istanbul as well as first Airbnb experience. Both went better than expected. I dare say I feel I have found a new friend!

Приезжали в Стамбул и останавливались у Farouq на 8 ночей. Нас было 5 человек. Снимали 2-х комнатные аппартаменты на 3 этаже. Квартира очень чистая, приятно находится. В каждой комнате отдельный санузел. Единственное, что нам не хватило- это маленького стола, за которым можно выпить чая. Мини кухня содержит все самое необходимое. От остановки трамвая идти 10 минут, до Голубой мечети тоже 10 минут. Очень спокойный район. Рядом есть продуктовый магазин с хорошим выбором продуктов. Рядом набережная Мраморного моря. Отличная квартира. Когда приедем ещё раз в Стамбул, то обязательно остановимся здесь.

About Farouq ....we could not meet but he took all the efforts to make our stay comfortable  through Murat who personally got my heavy bags throgh those rather acutely narrow staircases !!....and his very helpful  travel guide friend Fehmi who was  outstanding. I appreciate all that. Sufi place is small but  central ; convenient and adequate with good kitchen facilities. Hot water was always there... clean towels bedspreads too. Food and mosque closeby made my life easy...and yes UBER could come to pick up most of the time!!  Only issue is climbing up two stairs after big Kebap meals .. .. carrying suitcases needs planning...but we knew it.

Очень удобное месторасположение, недалеко от исторического центра(5-7минут ходьбы)и общественного транспорта. Рядом много ресторанчиков и достаточно магазинчиков, но в тоже время не так много народу ходит по улице. Близко до набережной с прекрасной прогулочной дорожкой. Сложно найти за эти деньги лучше.
Отличная квартира. Все ОК. Только надо что-то делать с wi-fi. Вообще не ловит.

Farouk’s place is nice❤️ Away from the hustle, but close enough to quaint refreshment bars, small stores selling ceramics and silver jewelry. Theres a travel agency a street and a half away, where you can get your trip organized, in case you just came to Athens on a limb and unprepared. The streets are small, lovely, and safe. Its a 15 minute walk to Sultanahmet area which hosts Hahia Sofia, Top Kapi Palace and the Blue Mosque❤️

Farouq was the perfect host.  He set up transportation for us to and from the airport.  Our arrival was very late but he still had someone onsite to greet us and check us in.  The same was true for our departure.  The residence is about a 15-25 minute walk to the Bazar or River so very accessible to all sites in Istanbul.  The residence is perfect for a family of 5.  Beds were great, residence was very clean, and plenty of hot water.  We had a very enjoyable stay.
a good place to stay in Istanbul, very good location. rooms have appropriate amenities. very good for a group of 4-5 persons.

Very very helpful host. Since the start of the booking until the end he was always there to help and advise. Place is very clean and quiet, away from traffic and under a minute from restaurants and shops. Some restaurants were we even open until one bit the morning. With good internet connection this was perfect for me and my family as we wanted to have a nice and relaxing stay and at the same time close to transportation so we can do sightseeing. We will stay here again.

Farouq’s place was very clean and in a convenient location to all of the major tourist attractions. He was a welcoming host, who even stayed behind late to let us check in after our flight was diverted. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

Farouq's place is central to the Sultanahmet area and close by some fantastic restaurants and parks. The place was well furnished and very very clean, and had two bathrooms which was a plus for us. Definitely consider booking this place for a nice, cheap stay in Istanbul!
Yurt dışından misafirlerimi yönlendirmiştim. Çok yardımcı oldular. Teşekkürler.

Farouq was great at organising transportation for us at great prices. He had an emergency maintenance issue which meant having to come to the place late one evening, but to apologise for the inconvenience, he gave the girls a gift which was lovely touch. Great communication and helpful tips about Istanbul.
Super séjour de 4 jours dans un hôtel très calme, mais proche de tous lieux historiques d'Istanbul. A côté de la place sultanameth, 500m. Farouq au petit soin...

Its a clean flat with comfy beds and small kitchenette (ok for making tea/coffee but not really for meal cooking). Check-in was smooth with someone waiting for us at the door to welcome. 10min walk to Sultanahmet!
Good location walking distance to prime attractions, lots of eating options around, had a pleasant stay.

Communication with Farouq was easy and he always replies and help.
The apartment is a walking distance from touristic places..blue mosque..hagia sophia
Farouq was very cooperative and allowed us to have a late checkout.
Recommended!!!

Great place to stay in Istanbul! Perfectly located to get to the Grand Bazaar and the Blue Mosque/ Eye of Sofia - all of which are less than 10 minutes away.

Both bedrooms are great sizes, and the bathrooms were good also. Thanks for a great stay!

This was our first time in Istambul, and location was of paramount importance. We were lucky to stay at Farouq’s apartment, because it’s perfectly located in a quiet street in the old city. All the major attractions were just 5-10 minutes walk. The apartment itself was very nice, clean, and comfortable. We had a late flight back. Farouq proposed to leave our belongings at his office (which is in the same building). So we could enjoy our last day in Istambul without carrying bags.

Clean and comfortable accommodation with everything you need in a base to explore and enjoy Istanbul sights and cuisine.  In a great location in Sultanahmet with many of the famous places of interest, such as the Topcapi Palace, the Blue Mosque, Haghia Sophia and the Grand Bazaar all within easy walking distance, and a bit further afield, across the Galata Bridge, Taksim Square and the Galata Tower are also walkable if you're feeling energetic.  After a day out, it was nice to think that we would return to the apartment and be able to relax.

This apartment is very well located ten minutes walking to the most important places such as Blue Mosk, Santa Sophia, Topkapi Palace. Also near to Ataturk Airport.
There are a lot of supermarkets and restaurants around the corner that are open until very late.
I really recomend this place if you don't want to spend time going to the most important tourist places.

Farouq est très gentil et très disponible! Il nous a facilité notre séjour en nous aidant pour plusieurs services. C’est la deuxième fois qu’on s’héberge dans son appartement la literie est très confortable ! Juste un petit coup de propreté et de renouvellement et ça sera super!!
The room is clean and tidy. The room is very close to the scenic spot. The landlord is very enthusiastic and recommends living in this house.
Farouq siempre disponible y la casa justo lo que esperábamos y muy bien localizada

Merci Farouk 
On était content de notre séjour
Super nice and cozy appartment! My family and i found everything we needed and were super comfortable. Everything was sparkling clean and the location is the best.

El lugar es muy limpio, pero hay que tener en cuenta que qurda en un 3er piso sin ascensor, con escaleras angostas por lo que cuesta subir las maletas. La publicación es cercana a los principales lugares de interés, sin embargo, se requiere desplazarse por calles con pendientes fuertes para llegar a la estación más cercana.
Nice apartment, very close to the main points in old Istanbul. Very good experience.

Thanks for the hospitality!  
Clean, beautiful interior, good locatione!
We really liked everything ❤️

name: Aruna Hotel - Triple Room
summary: We have 2 very large triple rooms with one double bed and one big sofa which can be used also for a big double bed. The size of the room is 30 m2.
description: We have 2 very large triple rooms with one double bed and one big sofa which can be used also for a big double bed. The size of the room is 30 m2.

name: Luxury apartment
summary: As good as staying at a 5-star hotel, less the services.
description: As good as staying at a 5-star hotel, less the services.

host.host_about: Toolmaker

reviews.comments:
I'm Shin Young Kwon's Son.
She was a bit hard to communicate, and it was quite scary to follow the guy who she sent to us.
And room was really cold. Chill came from window, so we had to sleep against the window. Which means we had to put our foot that side.
Also elevator up to room was really old. It doens't feell that safe.
At last, when we arrived, the room wasn't cleaned up! So we had to wait about 20 to 25 minutes until janitor finished cleaning.(We checked in at about 14:30, It's 30 minutes later than time this homepage said)
But all above was fault of this house, Location was great(Not THAT far from MTR Ya Ma Tei station, near Yoshinoya and McDonald's, fast wifi, and trusty card type lock.
So, If you're looking for really good location but you don't have lot of money, or you just want to sleep in your room, you need to be in this house.

We were able to check in early which was very good, the only problem we had was we had to wait outside the room for almost an hour before May came to open the door because we didn't have an internet connection to let her know that we were already there.  The room was clean, the aircon was functioning very well and so with the TV and there was hot water 24 hours. The place was very secured; there were 2 locks before we could go into the room plus there was always a guard at the building lobby.  All in all we enjoyed our stay at May's place. Thank you May. We will surely refer your place to friends.

出了油麻地地铁站走错方向了,最后导航再找到的,大楼的颜色很显眼,但是电梯太破旧,出了点故障,吓到了,may没有出现过,找到的是另外负责接待的,因为之前有沟通确认一定要两张床,这个是三人房两张床,引路的阿姨见我们只有两个人,非要拆掉一张单铺位,我们没同意就说我们素质很差,不明白为什么我订的这个价位是整个房间的价位,她非说是按人头收费的,态度很不好,最后就走了还一直讲我们,房间除了不通风其他跟图片一致,挺干净,要自带牙刷
干净､整洁,洗澡水很好｡出入极方便｡搭乘去机场的大巴线离此很近｡
The place is what the description says, but it's a little bit difficult to get there
Easy Accses, towel, electric kettle, wifi, clean room, near temple market and tradisional market.

The building was quite old and the facilities didn't look that safe especially the elevator. The room however, looked exactly like the photos but it was too small to fit 3 persons. Overall, the room was good, it was basic. The biggest challenge we had was with communicating to the staff, as they were having difficulty understanding English. We had a few problems in our arrangements. I wish she could train at least one english speaking staff to make things easier for travelers.

May is a wonderful host! :) She replies fast and very accurate with directions. Her place is exactly what you see in the pictures. Clean and neat. Complete amenities just like in the hotels. Its very near the bus stop and mtr. The temple street is just behind the building too. Wifi connection is so fast. And since we're leaving late at night, May let us leave are things for safe keeping while we explore hong kong a little more. We really had a great time! Thank you again May! :*
交通方便,近廟街夜市,安全門鎖
麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,在香港住这样的地方已经是超高性价比了,房东一家人很热情,再来还会选择住这里
Great budget place. Near to everything. Highly recomendable.

The room is clean and the location is really startegist! There's a speedy connection wifi inside the room so it's also a plus. May also lives in a same building so it's really easy if we need something. She's also fast respond. Eventhough theres 2 old elevators and kinda scary, but we can always use the other one. Overall, we love staying here!
房间跟我们上网订的不一样,我们订的房间是有外景的,屋主没有给我很好的解释,房间偶尔有油烟味道,大致上地点不错,房间都很舒服,说到清洁,清洁费用我们有付钱,我们入住5天都没有人来room service cleaning !联络了东主也是没有给任何的反应
Exactly as the picture! Its clean and comfortable to sleep. Only thing creepy is the elevator but all else are really ok.
是一个方便又便宜很安全的居住环境｡我下次还会来
地段繁华的住所不要要求太高,对比附近的酒店就知道了,主家还帮我们换了大间,我朋友不舒服,大部分时间都晕睡过去了,这个地方很近星光大道,走过去都可以,可惜那天部分景点维修,谢谢主家了

good location
good price
CLEAN
basic, small but comfy and central.

The location is very accessible.   I've stayed in other Inn's in Hong Kong and this is the cleanest and most conveniently located one so far.  It's a great value for money accommodation.  Guests should manage their expectations though since Hong Kong is one of the world’s least affordable urban center to buy a home in.  Don't let the old building fool you though, once you are able to get past the old building facade and escalator - the actual room is the same as what you see in Airbnb - which is quite nice by Hong Kong Inn standards.
This place is awesome. It's a bit of a walk from the nearest MTR station but there is a bus stop conveniently located outside of the building. Exceeded my expectations!
Overall good
靠近佐敦地铁站 交通便利 下楼右拐就是庙街 非常近 唯一不太满意的就是床单不太干净 打扫的阿姨也就是清理垃圾 床单被单都没有更换
Enjoyed really friendly check-in and clean room.
It's not far from the subway station, which is very convenient!

房间和预想中的差不多,香港大部分房间都是小小的,但里面设施比较完善,该有的都有,但需要'自己准备毛巾和牙刷,公寓附近也比较安全,大厦里都是一些香港居民住和一丢丢其他国家的人,电梯现在已经很安全,原本别人评价说比较恐怖的电梯已经关了,如果找不到可以直接导航到九龙邮政局再往前走一两分钟就到了,但是如果你是一个懒癌你可以选择离地铁更近的宾馆,因为每次油麻地站下来总是要走几分钟,对于几乎每天都要暴走的人,晚上还要花几分钟走回宾馆很累!如果有洁癖的人可以自己带一个小床单,因为住了几天感觉晚上睡觉总是不舒服,房东还是很热情!总体来说还是值得
Great location
Great location and easy to reach MRT

The place is very much accessible to MTR.
Traveling with a toddler is not easy, however May made it a lot easier by providing every information she could share.
She's always ready to assist.
Her unit is quite, clean, and a great value for money.
Will definitely stay to her place again whenever we travel to HK.

Great location; next to temple street, lots of places to eat and very easy access to all parts of Hong Kong as its close to MTR. Clean and comfortable room.

I love May’s place. It can just fit up to 3 pax because the room is quite small. Just enough for us to stay for 3 days. Wifi is fast, the room is cold, and the place is quiet. I would love to book this again if ever I get back in HK. Overall, I had a great stay. Thanks, May!
The host was very nice and the place clean and confertable. It was close to temple street market and ladies market..
Basic room in good location.

the room was very good although its small. its clean and the location is accessible to all and easy to find for newcomers. only that the male attendant is not accommodating and open  to the queries of the lodgers/residents. how i wish this lady named May was the one around always instead because she could communicate a bit clearer

The place is the same as shown in the pictures. Clean place and the receptionist is accommodating to the guests. Water heater, hair blower and towels are already provided. 
May is also quick to respond to all of our queries during our stay.
Good location, near mrt, restaurants and shopping places. Very clean and secured room.
The room and bathroom are small no have a map on the room,no service adapter charge mobile,but very near jordan station and shopping’s central.
Small room but enough for what we needed, very good location, walkable distance everywhere. Very clean and nice :)

Комната находится на оживленной улице, рядом с метро и парком Коулун. Жилье крошечное, но в Гонконге так везде, это норма. Расположение отличное, есть чайник, посуда, фен, шампунь, окно, отличный интернет. Когда мы замёрзли, нам очень любезно принесли обогреватель :) Из минусов - заселили позже, чем в 14:00, отправили погулять на часик, отсутствие кухни, грибок в ванной комнате, разбитое окно в комнате. Но, несмотря на это, я рекомендую. Цена/качество полностью соответствуют. Таких цен на жилье в Гонконге найти невозможно... А если и возможно, то отвратительное. Здесь хотя бы жить можно, чисто и безопасно :)
Nice Stay. What you see in picture,thats it!
性价比高,主要是在市区去哪都方便
房间干净整洁,地理位置便利,房东热情周到,提供直饮水系统和微波炉｡吃饭购物都挺方便,唯一有点小遗憾是室外噪音有点大,总体来说性价比很不错

not intended for family use. with 2 luggage, and 1 stroller. the size of the room is not conducive for resting. the neighborhood building is also not of good environment. elevator is a bit cramped, broken floor tiles, clothes hanging in the corridors. for backpackers, this would be acceptable i guess.

Incredible location, very easy to find. Good instructions - look for Alhambra building! Right next to Bonjour. Small but great room it had everything we wanted. The photos displayed were incorrect but we enjoyed our stay nonetheless.
因为玩的有点疯  到晚上很晚的时候才到达的宾馆  那里的小哥还担心的说了几句  人也是很好了哈哈哈  房间不大但是该有的都有  床很舒服  离地铁站真的很近 也没找多久就找到了  真的很满意了能在香港住到这样的地方

Decent size and clean room, ideal for 1 or 2 persons. Location is midway between Yau Ma Tei and Jordan station, you need to walk around 3-5 minutes to the station, but overall the place is accessible. Good value for money.
结合简介里的大楼图片和订房后发来的文字描述,位置还是挺好找的｡不过就是大楼环境让人感觉很混杂,不太舒服｡上了楼进了房间其实还好,晚上噪音也没什么｡不过这价格也不能挑剔什么了,综合来说还可以吧｡
房间位置很好,公交很便利,房间很干净,房东人很好,电梯搭乘5号电梯会更方便哦!
房间和预想中的一样,很小,两个人住会有点挤,只能打开一个大箱子和一个小箱子｡厕所第一天去很臭,洗完澡稍微好一点儿了｡第一天晚上回去很晚,一点多了,房卡又出了一点儿小问题,打不开门,还好留有紧急联系电话,房东很耐心地解决了｡总的来说还算不错｡
Same as the picture
房东还是可以的,但是订的房间被别人住了,然后另外给的房间和原先订的图片差距太大
比较了很多名宿,最后选择了May的｡交通很便利,大楼外有很多公交站,离地铁口也只需要五分钟,推荐大家使用公交车可选择的车次多且人少,而且免去了拉大件行李上下地铁入口的麻烦｡房间相对比内地的酒店会觉得房间会觉得小,但是毕竟香港寸金寸土,总体来说已经很不错了｡但是从第一天下午开始直达酒店楼层的电梯坏了,所以走的时候提着行李下了一层楼去乘别的电梯,还是蛮痛苦的｡May回复消息很快,是一次不错的体验｡

Room was smaller than expected, but can’t expect with the price paid. Window in the room had a cracked and wasn’t safe to open the window to let fresh air come in. The Airbnb was also located at a very old building and the lift was shaking at every stop. Wasn’t the safest place to stay too in my opinion and had to check out after the first day of my stay and  move to a new hotel.
La chambre est propre, mais le bâtiment tire de la gueule. C'est situé dans un immeuble sale et vieux. Par contre, c'est vraiment près de tout et c'est facile de se déplacer.
A good place to live and not expensive when considering the purchasing power of hk people,easy to the metro and convenient
房间地理位置非常好,出了油麻地地铁站很快就可以找到｡房间很干净,虽然整栋楼从外面看比较破旧,但是房间装修还是比较新的｡比较不开心的是房东没有提供一次性牙刷牙膏给我们｡
还可以,睡一宿还不行,位置也挺方便

Not recommended. Bad host did not reply on my message. Hard communication between the host and the caretaker.  The caretaker did not know that the room has a reservation on that day. we arrive late at the location about 3:30pm check in time is 2pm the room is not yet cleaned and its dirty so the caretaker ask us to comeback after 2hrs when we came back the  room is slightly clean maybe because of the rush job cleaning because we are not expected. So we ended up in a dirty room, bathroom, dirty hallway with a dirty mop, cleaning materials and dirty bucket of water always infront of our door for 3 nights the caretaker did not remove our trash for 3 nights. Not recommended room and host. But location is recommended.

thanks!

neighborhood_overview: Fall asleep with the sound of the ocean and wake up to birds' singing as the gorgeous sunrise ascends above your windows. The bedrooms have brand new mattresses and fresh linens. The bathrooms are immaculate and well organized with fresh towels and amenities. There are several activities in close proximity including Sea Life Park (where you can swim with the dolphins, Or you can hike an easy trail up to the Makapu'u Lighthouse where you can whale watch in the winter months. Along a 10-minute breathtaking coastal drive you' can stop at Makapu'u and Sandy Beaches (watch or go boogy boarding), Blowhole, Hanauma Bay (Snorkeling) and arrive in Hawaii Kai with great restaurants, shopping and all sorts of activities from boating, jet-skiing, para-sailing, golf, etc.. A 30-40 minute drive will take you to Pearl Harbor, Downtown, Waikiki and Ala Moana Shopping Center. A 45 minute drive will take you to the North Shore and Haleiwa. The countryside of Waimanalo is slow moving and filled with Aloh

host.host_about: Please don't pay attention to the three host cancellations, they were actually cancelled on our end by guest request, but we didn't realize we we would be penalized if we submitted the cancellation from our end for them.

reviews.comments: Everything about this experience was positive. Gilles met us when we arrived and was very responsive if I ask about anything. The house is even better than the pictures. It's well equipped with everything you need. The neighborhood is quiet and the people friendly. The walk to the beach was less than a minute. Since there aren't any resorts on this side of the island, it was like we had the beach to ourselves. If you want to get anywhere on the island, it was an easy drive from this location. Overall an excellent experience for me and my family. Thanks Gilles!
The house  and property was beautiful beyond all expectations. Gillis was available and accommodating throughout the stay in in quaint Waimanalo. Our overall experience was a 10 plus

Our stay in Waimanalo was incredible, due in large part to our amazing accommodations.

The home was even more beautiful in person. From the upper deck, you have an incredible view of the mountains and the ocean. Not only was the home stunning - it was provided with snorkeling gear, bodyboards, and beach chairs. We made good use of the gear at the beach (just a few minutes walk from the house). 

Thank you Gilles for your hospitality!

We arrived very late to night, so had agreed to meet Gilles the next day, but the whole house was lit up for our arrival.  It was idyllic; tastefully decorated and comfortably furnished and with a lovely pool and outside lounging area which is totally private thanks to the landscaping of the garden.  There is also an upstairs sunbathing and eating deck where we had dinner under the stars a number of times.  A lot of thought has gone into equipping the place; there are beach towels, deck chairs and body boards to take along to the beautiful Waimanalo beach which is literally a 100 yards walk away.  There is a huge washing machine and dryer which we made use of throughout our stay.  The kitchen was extremely well equipped; being English we wanted to make tea and the only thing we couldn't find was a kettle.  We mentioned this to Gilles and a couple of hours later he arrived with one for us.  We absolutely loved our stay there and will miss the peace and the sound of the waterfall in the pool.  We'll also miss the lovely birds that came into the garden, including some small chickens! The Waimanalo area is not well served by restaurants (unless you like burger chains), so we rarely ate out, but there is a  small local supermarket two miles up the road and a larger Safeway store a couple of miles further on.  Gilles made it clear that we only had to phone him if we needed anything, but at the same time he was completely unobtrusive as a host and we thought that was a really good balance.  We did contact him a couple of times for advice about things like taxis, and he always responded quickly.  All in all a great stay in a lovely home that we would recommend to anyone.  Thanks Gilles!

The location is perfect! This was our fourth visit to Hawaii, and the best experience we have ever had. The house is located in an authentic, residential neighborhood, close to many shopping options. Not only is it walking distance to one of the best beaches in the world, it is a barefoot one minute stroll. The beach itself is clean, quiet, and safe with beautiful views. 
The house is extremely well equipped. Bathrooms are stocked with essentials, the kitchen is fully appointed. Our favorite features were the pool, lanai area, air conditionning and proximity to the beach. 
Gilles was there to greet us when we arrived, and available whenever we had any questions during our stay. He was warm, friendly, and helpful. 
We adored time there and look forward to returning!

This place was amazing! The photos were spot on and the location was great! The home was fully stocked with anything you could want in a vacation home. The pool was fantastic, our own private oasis and the beach was literally a 1 minute walk. I can't wait to come back with my family!
The host canceled this reservation 137 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This place was amazing! A minute walk to the beach. Fully loaded with everything you could think of: washer, dryer, detergent, dryer sheets, beach toys, beach chairs, swim floaties for kids, tupperware so you could eat on the beach, ziploc bags, foil, everything! The place was clean and spacious - we had more than enough space to fit our group. We loved having dinner in the kitchen area then having dessert and a swim over in the lanai. The morning views - AMAZING. You step outside and there is a breathtaking view of the mountain side. There are little lizards and one got into the house - but no big deal, it is Hawaii after all. This place is a little bit of a drive to a big city, but it was totally fine being away from that scene.But if you did want to drive, the drive was filled with beautiful scenery.  There is a cottage in front of this main house, but you wouldn't know it - the owners / hosts did a great job of separating the 2 houses and maintaining the privacy for each. I would definitely stay here again!

We had the most amazing visit to your home.  Thank you Jessi for being such a gracious host.  The home couldn't be more perfect.  The location is about 75 yards to Waimanalo Beach, how can you beat that?  The homeowners thought of everything!  They have boogie boards, snorkling equipment, beach chairs, beach towels, and the ladies made me mention- even makeup remover!  You can't even get that in a fancy hotel.  We so enjoyed "living" in Hawaii for the week.  Because with this home you felt your time was spent relaxing and living- not just visiting.
