My sons really loved the pool and they swam in it every morning and evening.  The outdoor lanai is a great place to sit and socialize or just hang out.  There are Sonos speakers outside and inside to play your music.  The propane grill came in handy a few nights which I loved!  Every room was decorated so nicely as well-It felt like we were the very first people to ever stay in the home.  We really enjoyed every part of our visit and hope to return someday soon.  Thanks for the most amazing vacation!

The Clement Family

We just wanted to say how much our family from both Australia and the US enjoyed our stay at this lovely home. It was above all of our expectations. 
The location was extraordinary with postcard views in a very quiet neighbourhood. 
The home was well equipped with toiletries, towels including beach towels, beach chairs, snorkelling gear, body boards. The kitchen was well appointed, bedrooms were very comfortable, the pool area was amazing. 

It is great for an extended family get together or a friend's getaway.  

I would recommend that unless you intend to park yourselves at the home, a rental car is highly recommended for getting around.
Thank you for a wonderful stay
Beautiful house, great location, 4 of us were working and the wireless was perfect. Also good ATT connection down on the beach in case you need to make a conference call.  We can't wait to come back!

Everything about our stay was absolutely perfect.  This was our first AirBnb experience and it definitely exceeded our expectations.  The house perfectly accommodated our family of 7.  The house was fully equipped, clean and absolutely beautiful.  The pool is AMAZING!!!!  Just a quick 1 minute walk to the beach was so easy for my mother who now uses a cane.  We drive around the island and I must say, the beach where the house is located is by far the best (secluded and beautiful).  We really couldn't be happier with our stay, the communication with Sherry was so easy and she was always quick to respond.  I highly recommend booking this house as we personally will be doing so every future trip to Oahu.  Thanks David, Sherry and Rudi!  Best family trip ever.

Fantastic home for a family vacation. The layout is ideal and everything is clean and updated. I was surprised by how close it was to the beach access.  The pool is small but it didn't matter to our children. There really wasn't one thing wrong with this property. We truly enjoyed our stay. If Waimanalo is your desired location you can't do better.

Great, well appointed house within a minutes walk to a gorgeous beach. The owners provide lots of beach accessories, including chairs, snorkels, boogie boards and an abundance of towels.  The kitchen had everything we needed to make our meals.  The street is quiet and friendly.  Great communication regarding check in/check out along with great suggestions for area activities.  We had a wonderful stay!
What's not to love about this beautiful home?!! We absolutely loved our stay here! Amazing pool, great space inside, and an incredibly gorgeous beach. Stay here!

This is a great property located a minute away from the best beach on the island.  The house is great and met all of our needs.  My elderly parents, my sister, and my family of four stayed at this house for 8 days and never felt cramped. 

The pool is amazing, especially if you have kids, and Waimanalo is a great location to stay at. Kailua is 15 minutes drive away and offers a ton of great restaurant and shopping options. 

There's really so much great things that can be said for this property and management team it's hard to capture it all. 

The only negative we have to share is concerning the bed frame in the master bedroom. Within minutes of arriving my 70 year old father tripped and fell onto the tile floor after hitting his shin on the corner of the frame when he was walking in from the master bathroom.  Luckily he was not seriously hurt. Three other people hit their shins on the very same corner of the bedframe and have bruises to show for it.  
Anyway, this did not detract from our overall experience at all but just wanted future vacationers to have a courtesy heads up.  We all agree this property and manager deserve a 5 star rating and we definitely would stay here again on our next vacation to Oahu.

The beach house was amazing. Beautiful, close to the wonderful beach, well organized. The labels in the light switches are so useful. 
The safety features for our toddlers put our mind at rest and we enjoyed the lovely pool, all our pictures came out gorgeous. 
We watch the sun rise everyday on the roof. 
For our family with little kids it was perfectly located, fully stocked with everything we might need (stroller, highchair, safety gate, floaters for the pool) and close to everything. 
Communication was a breeze!
Lovely home. Great location. Wonderful beach. David worked hard to accommodate us.
The house was amazing ! Our family of 6 really enjoyed the house, had everything needed for home away from home.  Beach is stunning and pool was used non-stop... loved it and will be back.

Wonderful house for a group of people.  We ended up spending more time around the pool than expected.  The House is laid out wonderfully and actually lives bigger than it is.  We ended up with 6 people instead of 8, but would have had no issue with 8.  It is turnkey and ready for your stay, and you’re a 2 minute walk from the beach and is far more secluded and relaxing than being on Waikiki beach.   Highly recommend.

Our stay was amazing and David was very responsive to any question or issue we brought to his attention. He went out of his way to make sure every request was accommodated which made our stay perfect. The house and location are awesome in every way. It was our second family vacation at this property and we would 100% do a third in the future.

Not far from the beach, this beach house was fully stocked and very comfortable for the nine adults in our party.  When not at the beach with provided beach accessories, we were lounging around the pool, dining on the lanai or playing dominoes on the deck. This beach house is so pleasant that you will not want to leave!
David’s place far exceeded our expectations. Just what we needed as a base for a quiet retreat away. The pictures do not do it justice. Spacious, clean and very well equipped. Highly recommended.
It was everything as advertised, no complaints at all. Awesome place!
Great location amazing for our entire family!
Place was amazing

The HOUSE IS PERFECT.  Clean and comfortable, you will fill just like home. Property manager Gilles was really helpful and will make sure you get all the info about the place.
Best perks? THE BEACH IS 2 MIN WALK AWAY. Views are extraordinary. My wife and I recommend this place for everyone!
Amazing space in a quite part of the island. Great for families.

name: Gorgeous Brooklyn Brownstone Flat, Great Location!
summary: Come and stay in this regal and beautiful, comfortable private flat in the historic Stuyvesant Heights district of Bedford Stuyvesant Brooklyn. Just steps from the Utica Avenue subway station on the A and C subway lines, with both northern and southern sun exposure, original 19th century stained glass windows and full sofabed in the livingroom. The modern kitchen is fully equipped, adjoining the intimate dining area. Flat includes free Wi-Fi, A/C, & cable TV.
space: This bright yet relaxing flat is on the first floor of a renovated two story brownstone townhouse. Enter on the parlor level and your door to the flat is steps away. Easily sleeps 4, with a queen bed in the peaceful large bedroom at the rear and a large sofa-bed in the livingroom at the front of the flat. Air mattress accommodations can be made for additional guests if necessary. Full bathroom, lots of closet space, modern kitchen with toaster and coffeemaker and a dining area for meals.
description: Come and stay in this regal and beautiful, comfortable private flat in the historic Stuyvesant Heights district of Bedford Stuyvesant Brooklyn. Just steps from the Utica Avenue subway station on the A and C subway lines, with both northern and southern sun exposure, original 19th century stained glass windows and full sofabed in the livingroom. The modern kitchen is fully equipped, adjoining the intimate dining area. Flat includes free Wi-Fi, A/C, & cable TV. This bright yet relaxing flat is on the first floor of a renovated two story brownstone townhouse. Enter on the parlor level and your door to the flat is steps away. Easily sleeps 4, with a queen bed in the peaceful large bedroom at the rear and a large sofa-bed in the livingroom at the front of the flat. Air mattress accommodations can be made for additional guests if necessary. Full bathroom, lots of closet space, modern kitchen with toaster and coffeemaker and a dining area for meals. Keys to enter the main entrance to the hous
neighborhood_overview: Historic residential neighborhood, with amenities all in walking distance, markets, laundromat, post office, 24/7 pharmacy. Public parks, shops and restaurants ranging from Southern comfort, Italian, Indian, to BBQ, and Mexican. Laid back lounges and bars provide a relaxing atmosphere after an exciting day.
transit: Very close to public transportation. Only a 2 minute walk away from the A (express) / C (local) subway lines and several metro buses (B15, B25, B46) stop within one block of the residence. Street parking is also available.
access: Keys to enter the main entrance to the house, and to your flat, are provided for the duration of your stay. The flat spans the full parlor level so no other guests stay on this floor of the house. Any questions feel free to ask!
interaction: I'm available as much or as little as you like! I live on the garden level of the house so I'm usually around to provide directions, recommendations and any assistance you may need.
house_rules: No smoking.  No pets or young children, ages 8 and up preferred.  No overnight guests.  Please limit noise/loud music during late nights, after 11 p.m.  Please be respectful of common areas (hallway, stairs.)  Shut off the A/C and turn off lights when you're out of the apartment.  Common sense rules apply - when exiting the apartment, lock doors, unplug clothes iron, out any burning candles, etc.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Brooklyn, NY native and frequent traveler. A natural problem solver, clean, organized, but not overbearing. I'm a people person, but just as comfortable traveling independently and hosting "hands-off."  I love to dance, enjoy a good drink and I love to learn from others.  I have a big personality but I'm also very easygoing so don't hesitate to drop me a line!

reviews.comments:
It was our first B&B experience. And it was a real luck to start it with Jason! 
The house: situated in very clean and quite historic area of Brooklyn, very attractive, built 189..., nice area, quite close to underground subway station but far enough to hear no noice.
The appartment: not too big, with a real touch of charm and what was really important for me very very clean! For our couple looked very romantic! I think a best value for its money! Strongly advise to everyone.
The owner: And of course the great impression of appartment double stronger makes its owner Jason.... Jason and his mother Mrs Doreen not only great hosts, but also very good people! 
They took a great care of us! Jason always was on touch and ready to help. But his attention was so poulite and delicate that our privacy never was disturbed. We felt really nice at his place. When my girlfriend got ill Jason's mother Mrs Doreen came to the place and drove us to the hospital.... What a nice woman she is! Was a real pleasure to meet her! Unfourtunatelly under unpleasant circumstances...
Humanity, hospitality and respect! In this words I would describe

Jason and his mom were great host. This is my first time using Airbnb and it will certainly not be the last. My boyfriend and I rented the property for our anniversary vacation and it was the perfect place. We call it our new home away from home. They were flexible with our check-in and check-out time. It looked just like pictures, but to actually be inside the property was breathtaking. The area is very similar to our home town so we were very comfortable. They gave us everything we would have in a hotel room such as towels, wash cloths, clean bedding, iron and ironing board. They even have kitchen essentials you may need to cook a wonderful meal. We almost didn't even leave to view the city.
Great place and a great host.  Everything was clean and comfortable.  The space is very close to public transit options, which was infinitely helpful for getting around NYC.  Would definitely return.

Jason, and his brownstone, were fantastic!  From being super close to the subway 'A' line to him having clean linens and bath towels available, cabinets stocked with tea for the morning and water in the fridge, the whole experience was great.   He also met me there to give me the keys and a personal tour of the space which I really appreciated.   Btw, the space was incredibly clean and looked just like the pictures.  Next time I need to be in NYC I'll be sure to book here again.    Thanks, Jason!!!

We stayed 3 nights at Jason's house.
It's a very confortable house in Brooklyn with everything we needed (fresh water bottles, towels, candys).
Close to the subway station.
Perfect for us!

We absolutely loved staying here! Jason was incredibly nice + accommodating to any requests we had. The place itself is super clean, well furnished, and overall nice to look at. High ceilings, bowl style sink, a nice shower, and a comfy bed. I personally slept on the fold out bed, and I slept like a baby all 5 nights we stayed. One of the best parts about this place is how close it is to the subway; you can easily get into most parts of Manhattan within 30 minutes. The neighborhood itself is safe, quiet, and has a bunch of hip dining and convenience stores. Simply put, I high recommend this place, and I'd 100% stay again.

Very nice apartment! Clean, roomy and comfortable! Great location to A train, so quick ride into Manhattan. Jason extra attentive to make our stay comfortable. His mother especially nice and had the apt. clean, smelling great upon our arrival.Neighborhood store just couple of blocks on Stuyvesant was convenient with friendly staff.

My experience with Jason was great.  He responded quickly to my messages and met me outside the house for check-in.  He took his time to go over a map if the neighborhood and gave me suggestions for restaurants. Jason took his time to check on me the second day of my trip to make sure I was doing well.  

As described, the house is extremely close to a subway station (walk to the corner and cross over to the park) which made traveling into Manhattan very easy.  The house seems to be recently updated with some very nice touches.

The negatives of my trip...none!  
I would definitely consider staying again.
This is a beautiful and we'll maintained apartment. Jason is a gracious host and from the moment you book to the moment you leave, nothing is to much trouble.

We had a great time in New York. We were very well received by Jason. 
The apartment is really great for 4 people. Spacious, fully equipped kitchen. 
The highlight: the subway is just steps from the apartment. (It takes only 30 minutes to reach Manathan).
The area is quiet, close to markets, bars, restaurants ...
Jason thank you again for your welcome and your sympathy.
Ronan, Fred, Claude Guillaume

Jason was a great host! My sister and I stayed at Jason's for about 8 days and we have no complaints! He was very friendly and walked us through his place. His place looks exactly as the pictures. Very homey and clean. He was so helpful as he showed us the subway map and was ready with everything we could possibly need, Wi-Fi Password, maps, Recommendations on places to eat! He was great! He checked in and let us do our own thing and provided snacks and water, which was much appreciated. He was available when we needed things like towels and sheets, and responded quickly. We enjoyed our stay with Jason and would definitely stay there again. It is very close to the subway and very safe place, we had no issues. Overall great experience and Jason was an awesome host!
Great space in great area..handy for transport shops etc. Jason very welcoming and sorted out another night for us which was much appreciated

What a fabulous experience for our first Time Airbnb. Miss Doreen (Jason's mother) greeted us upon arrival and took care of all our questions and made us feel at home. The apartment was lovely and exactly as described. It's one block from the A subway express train and 25 minutes to Manhattan. 
It was great to heat out of the huddle n bussle of the City after seeing all the sites.
Would have no hesitation in recommending Hason's lively home to anyone who is visiting NYC
Thank you Jason and Miss Doreen

We had a perfect and very pleasant stay at Jason's place. Everything is as described and seen in the pictures - clean and tidy! On our arrival Jason offered us water, apples and chips in the kitchen, which was very welcoming! We liked the apartment and the neighborhood a lot!
-----
Jason hat uns schon vor der Ankunft mit hilfreichen Informationen zur Anreise versorgt und uns dann herzlich vor Ort begrüßt. Die Wohnung entsprach haargenau den Fotos auf seiner Webseite, es war alles sauber und aufgeräumt. In der Küche standen Obst, Chips und Wasser zur Begrüßung bereit, wodurch wir am Abend unserer Ankunft nicht nochmal in den nächstgelegenen Supermarkt mussten. Ebenso gab er uns Tipps für die ersten Tage unserer Sightseeing-Tours - insgesamt haben wir uns in seinem Appartment sehr wohl gefühlt.

Lovely place! Jason was not home during our stay but his mom (Ms. Doreen) came over to welcome us and show us around. The entrance was very warm and welcoming. Inside was clean and the fridge was stocked with water which was much appreciated! A subway map was also provided which was great for us as novice city travelers and we loved the convenience of the subway station being located so near the house. Ms. Doreen recommended Peaches as a good place to find supper on the night we arrived... Loved it! Also enjoyed a fabulous breakfast at Brunswick Cafe. Overall nice area, wonderful house, and we would stay here again!

Jason apartment is amazing! Comfortable, clean and big for 4 people. Jason is an excellent host! He always answered our questions and be nice with us! Great experience 100% recommend! New York is beautiful and the apartment is so convenient because is 2 blocks away from the metro station!

Jason and Ms. Doreen were incredibly great hosts! 

They were helpful, welcoming and friendly. The home was also exactly as described! Jason was easy to reach and remained communicative throughout our whole stay! We stayed for two weeks! When I first arrived to check in, Jason greeted me with a big smile! He showed me around the house and provided us with menus, maps, guides, two sets of keys and the wifi information.

We were provided with fresh and clean sets of towels. Ms. Doreen dropped by the second week to provide us with a fresh set of sheets/bedding and rolls of toilet paper (which was much appreciated)! She's an absolute sweetheart! There was one day where she was around and heard my friend coughing from the outside and she came back later in the day to bring him cough syrup and cough drops! 

The apartment felt like home as it included everything that you'd possibly need to survive in a typical home (ex: knives, forks, spoons, cutting boards, pots, pans, plates, cups, bowls, etc) and it made cooking easy! Under the kitchen sink, there were tons of cleaning supplies, trash bags and whatever else you may possibly need! It definitely is a testament to how clean the home is! Though this might seem minuscule, there was a separation of trash bags for recycled items and actual trash which I thought was great! Jason also provided us with snacks and a clean fridge full of bottled water!

Although we did not use the closet, there was a ton of closet space with hangers! We used the drawers instead and even that itself was enough for all of our clothing! The bathroom was clean, there was a hair dryer, pack of toilet paper and air freshener! Though there is only one restroom, it was super convenient to have two doors, one from the bedroom and one from the kitchen/common area, to access the same bathroom which could be both locked from the inside.

The location makes grocery shopping, traveling and eating very convenient as it is surrounded by several restaurants, grocery markets/delis and is less than a 2-3 minute walk from the nearest subway station. 

I would recommend this listing 100% and this was my first airbnb experience! We are glad we chose this home for our visit! Jason made everything easy and there was no trouble at all!

Thank you so much again, Jason and Ms. Doreen!

Jason's home was just like the pictures and he was so pleasant, friendly, and hospitable.   The location was very convenient, not far from the subway and very close to a few cool restaurants.  If I come back to NYC I'm definitely staying here again.  

The bed was very comfortable and I loved the decor in the house.  I slept so well.
Couldn't be more pleased with how great Jason was throughout my stay
Wow! Excellent place and very clean. The location is perfect and close to public transportation. Jason is perfect  very helpful and inviting . I

All of Jason's reviews prior to this one are very accurate. He has a beautiful home and makes it comfortable for his guests, definitely better than booking a hotel. 

He was also really helpful and a great resource for recommendations and directions! He saved my friends and I from taking the wrong transit and provided us with other suggestions for what we should do with our short time in the area. He also remained really flexible when it came to check-in/check-out times.

I can see why Jason is a superhost! He and his mother were very welcoming, and the apartment is perfect--spacious, comfortable, and clean. The location is great--a 5 minute walk from the A and C trains. Thank you Jason and Doreen for a wonderful stay!

Jason's apartment was awesome and we felt like home.
Jason and Ms. Doreen gave und a very warm welcome and were great hosts. Everything was clean and we really enjoyed our stay! It was almost perfekt.

Jasons lejlighed er super lækkert, der er alt hvad man skal bruge, super køkken, godt til at lave mad selv hvis man ikke vil spise ude hele tiden der er intet gade støj da lejligheden lille på en lille gade,  han var ikke selv hjemme da vi ankom så hans mor tog i mod os, virkelig sød ældre dame, havde sørget der der var koldt vand i køleskabet og snaks på bordet til os, 
lækkert var det også at metroen lå 500m væk så det tog ikke meget mere en 30 min til Manhatten, helt sikkert et sted jeg ville bo igen næste gang jeg skal til NYC

Jason is a very friendly and inviting host. The place was spacious, clean and very close to the subway. In the area are some very nice restaurants and bars. If you don't mind commuting, it is a great place to stay.

Nous sommes restés 11 jours à New YORK. L'accueil était très chaleureux, Jason a pris le temps de nous expliquer comment fonctionnent les transports (nous a donné une carte du métro), nous a présenté le quartier.
Nous avons fait le tour de l'appartement qui était spacieux, très propre et très bien équipé. Il y a de grands placards.
Il est très proche du métro.
Jason avait prévu pour notre accueil des snacks à grignoter et des bouteilles d'eau au frais.

En résumé nous avons passé un excellent séjour. Nous recommandons Jason.

I can honestly say that this was the best Airbnb I have stayed in. Not only a great location but wonderful accommodation. Jason had clearly given immense thought to all the little details that go into making a pleasant and rewarding stay. He is a charming and intelligent host who was both very welcoming and very ready with helpful suggestions.

Most definitely a place to which to return.

Excellent apartment. Perfect location for taking the A train into Manhattan and exploring Brooklyn. Apartment is spacious and has everything you could ever need. Highly recommend Jason and The Brownstone.
The place is great and the host (Jason) is even better. Everything was as expected and more.  100% recommended.  Definetively will be back.

Jason's apartment was great. Just as described and he was extremely easy to deal with. Very quick in his replies and very helpful always. The location is great and very easy to get around New York from. Would definitely use again and highly recommend.

Jason and his mom made us feel so very welcome. The fridge had water and there were snacks at the table. The apartment is very roomy for New York. I have paid more for just a room in New York and I got a whole apartment. The apartment couldn't be closer to the subway stop without being on top of it. The neighborhood is classic brownstone with lots of unique businesses. This apartment is very convenient to stay at when arriving from JFK. Just one train from Howard Beach.

First, I want to say that Jason was an excellent host! He was very helpful and flexible with the check in/out times. The apartment looked exactly as described, clean and spacious. The location is perfect and close to the A & C trains. This was my first time using AirBNB and Jason made it a weekend to remember! I highly recommend Jason's apartment!
We had a very good stay at Jasons place. The appartment is great with  lots of room and very near to the subway. We liked the neighbourhood as well. Thanks Jason!

뉴욕을 여행하기에 완벽한 숙소! metro A 와 C가 다녀서 맨하탄 접근하기에 매우 좋아요. 역도 숙소에서 한 블럭 떨어져있어서 5분도 안걸려요. 근처에 펍도 있고 마트도 있어서 간단한 스낵 구입하기도 좋았어요. 관광지가 아닌 주택가라 밤에 매우 조용해서 숙면했어요. Jason은 check in-out 할 때만 만났어요. 매우 친절했어요. 말이 빨라 다 알아 듣지는 못 했지만, 좋은 말이었을거에요.ㅋㅋ 쇼파침대도 있고 주방거실도 넓직해서 넷이서 지내기도 충분할 것 같아요. 화장실도 넓고 깨끗해서 매우 좋았어요. 추천!추천!!^^

Jason's place is amazing. The place is really calm, spacious and really close to the subway.
We enjoyed our trip there.

Our stay was awesome. Jason provided everything we needed and he was flexible with our check in time considering our flight was delayed by 2 hours. The space was well kept and welcoming, it felt like home. We had one issue with the cable and internet but Jason  was responsive and fixed the problem promptly. When we visit New  York again this will be our first choice for lodging.

What a great experience for my first time using Airbnb! The apartment was great and just as described. Jason was a great host who was willing to be flexible with our check-in time, and was readily available if we needed him for any reason. The apartment was close to the subway, and the commute into Manhattan isn't long at all. I'll definitely look into staying here again when I need to!

Jason was very warm, friendly and helpful. Very informative about the City. The Brownstone looks exactly like the photos and at such a reasonable rate! Great neighborhood  and super friendly people. A movie was being filmed nearby, too!
It's an amazing space--the pictures don't do it justice. Super clean and cared for, and Jason is a delightful host.

Nous avons été très bien accueilli par Jason. L'appartement est très confortable et fidèle à la description. Jason met à disposition les produits de première nécessité. Quartier très arboré et calme. Tout proche d'une station de métro, et notamment de la ligne A qui  va de l'aéroport JFK à Manhattan, donc très pratique quand on atterrit à JFK avec de grosses valises. Supérette et divers commerces tout proches. Jason fournit plusieurs trousseaux de clefs et aussi un code qui permet d'ouvrir les portes avec son smartphone, cela permet à tout le monde d'être indépendant. Le logement est entièrement climatisé, ce qui est indispensable à New York. Niveau propreté, le logement est impeccable. Jason est disponible si besoin (Portable, SMS, mail) et sait s'effacer aussi en fonction de nos attentes. Possibilité de laisser les bagages jusqu'au soir le dernier jour pour profiter tranquillement de la dernière journée. Nous conseillons vivement cette location.

Don't hesitate to book Jason's house. When arrive in his house and meet him, you will know why he gets five stars on Airb&b. Jason described everything in the house in details, and provide everything you need during vacation. Clean towels, shampoo, bath lotion, bottles of water, etc. The house is really convenient to use and stay. It made us felt like stayed at home. We stayed 3 nights there, on second day Jason also contacted me and asked if there is anything we needed that he could provide. It is so sweet! Only thing I want to complain is that the second bed is a sofa bed, and not very comfortable when you sleep in it. Overall, everything is great during our start in Jason's house. Highly recommend!

Jason was  a fantastic host. Although we did not had a chance to meet in person, he was very responsive via text messages and made sure that we all our questions were addressed promptly. The apartment fit the description and served us, a family of four, just right for three days of sightseeing in NYC.

Everything just as described - a perfect place if you want to stay in NYC. We stayed with two teenagers and had a blast in the city knowing that coming back to Jason's house would be relaxing and great. Clean, sufficient space, comfortable, and somehow truly Brooklyn. We would come back. Communication with Jason worked really well.

We had a wonderful stay in Jason's apartment. It is even nicer in person than in the pictures. The subway stop is really convenient and makes the whole city easily accessible. We had an issue with arrival, but other than that had a great experience and I would recommend this apartment to friends looking for an affordable and comfortable place to stay on Brooklyn.
Subway is very close, Manhatten is really half an hour away by subway. JFK is on the same line too. Apartment is great with everything you need in it. All good and Jason is excellent host.

Jason's apartment was "as advertised" with beautiful wood floors, high ceilings, updated kitchen and bathroom oasis with a water jet tub (although I didn't use it); the place was meticulously clean and even had a few snacks for us when we arrived. Jason was friendly and helpful; not to mention super patient when we got caught in a rain storm and then NYC traffic on our way down, which put use 2 hours behind our arrival. I would highly recommend Jason's apartment, and look forward to staying there again in the future!

We enjoyed pretty much our stay. The apartment exceeded our expectation by far. It was clean, spacious and stylish furnished. It was just perfect and gorgeous. The neighborhood was safe and the close subway station (5 min. walk) worked out perfectly for our manhattan trips. Jason was a very kind and helpful host even when our checkin took place fsr after midnight due to flight delays. So we can highly recommend this apartment and we will book it again for our next trip to NYC.

My daughter and I stayed at Jason's apartment from 4th - 9th August 2016. The whole experience was a pleasure, from the moment we got there to the time we left. It was easy to gain entry and also we were able to leave our suitcases there until it was time for us to leave. The apartment was clean and well furnished. The sofa bed was already made up when we arrived. Clean towels were available along with a few provisions to see us though.  I particularly like the fact it has a fully equipped kitchen which is something other self catering apartments do not have. It was also close to a subway and easy to get into New York City without changing trains. We had a great time!

Jason war ein sehr freundlicher und hilfsbereiter Gastgeber. Die Wohnungsübergabe verlief sehr unkompliziert. Die Koffer konnten wir bereits vor dem Eincheck-Termin in der Wohnung unterstellen. Die Wohnung war gemütlich und sauber, die Küche gut ausgestattet. Nur wenige Minuten entfernt befand sich die Metro-Station mit guter Anbindung in das Zentrum und ein Supermarkt. Wir fühlten uns in der Umgebung sicher.

Jason welcomed us as we were walking up to the apartment.  He was very gracious and friendly.  He answered all of our questions, and made sure that we had everything we needed and more.  The entire place was very, very clean!  We absolutely loved it.  It is steps away from the subway stop and has great places to eat nearby.  We will definitely recommend Jason's place to family and friends and will stay here the next time we're in New York City!
Everything was exactly as described, will recommend!
Чистая, очень уютная квартира, оборудованная всем необходимым. Jason оказался гостеприимным внимательным хозяином с хорошим чувством юмора. Нам было очень комфортно.

Le logement est tres bien situe, a 3 mn du metro en 30 minutes vous êtes à Manathan, l'appartement est très propre, et calme ainssi que le quartier on était 3 amies on rentrais très tard le soir sans crainte, la cuisine est très bien équipée. Jason est très gentil, j'y retournai volontier. Super, merci Jason
Excellent place. Totally worth it, at a very convenient location. Will definitely stay here the next time.

We were very happy with Jason's apartment which is well located, just one minute from the metro station. Very nice, spacious and clean apartment. Jason has always given quickly all informations we needed. We have also appreciated his messages after the problems in NYC.
Thank you so much Jason, we would like to get back as soon as possible!
Thi

I traveled with my mother on this trip. Overall, our experience with Jason was very positive. Aside from he maintaining a clean property,  it was the little things that enhanced our stay (i.e. bottled water, a few snacks, where to eat in the neighborhood). We had plenty of room in the apartment for 2 of us. Lastly, he was consistent with communication before, during, and after our trip. Jason made you feel right at home!

May I add that this property is convenient to the subway (~ 5 min walk to ) Utica Station. The home is exactly as it appears in the online photos.

Все понравилось.
Отличная просторная квартира, полностью соответствует описанию.
Современная мебель и кухня.
Не ожидал - ванна с джакузи!
Jason - приветливый общительный хозяин.
Рекомендую.

Jason was an excellent host. Our flight was delayed and he made every accommodation to make the experience as hassle-free as possible for us.
The Brownstone is amazing, the pictures don't do it justice. The entire place was very clean and Jason provides necessary amenities like shampoo/condition/soap and towels (which I had forgot to bring!).

The subway is a 1.5 block walk away and getting around is very easy and affordable since everything is pretty close to the Brownstone.

I can't really say enough positive things about my experience here, it was great and if you're reading this and hesitant about booking, don't be! You'll have an excellent time here

Thanks again Jason
Jason's space is beautiful and well thought out, and he's a responsive, helpful host.

Jason is absolutely wonderful. My wife and I had visited NYC for a short two day trip and loved our time at Jason's brownstone. He was extremely accommodating to us arriving a little early, and made himself available to let us in, show us around, and answer any questions. Everything was as pictured and described. The location to the subway was excellent, and about a 25-45 minute ride into the city, pending where you were going. We would definitely stay there again!
El apartamento está decorado con mucho gusto, cerca del metro y comercio a proximidad.  Cocina bien equipada.  Pasamos unos dias muy agradables en NY.
Super logement et emplacement Jason est disponible et très sympa juste penser au bouchon d'oreille le logement n'est pas équipé de double vitrage.

Jason's apartment was as described. Close to the subway ("blue line gets you everywhere you want to go"). The place was very clean, and the neighborhood safe. Communication with Jason was easy, as he is a helpful and friendly guy. Overall a great experience. Thanks Jason!
Jason was wonderful! He went above and beyond to answer questions, offer suggestions and make us feel welcome. He took our first time NYC experience to the next level!

Jason is an amazing host! He gave us the privacy and freedom of the space, but was always available when we needed. The space is much more beautiful and comfortable than the pictures show. The street is quiet and the subway station is a few meters from the house, beside a beautiful park. I do recommend Jason's space! It was an excellent experience!

Jason é um anfitrião espetacular! Ele nos deu total privacidade e liberdade, mas estava sempre disponível quando precisamos. O espaço é muito mais bonito e confortável do que as fotos mostram. A rua é quieta e a estação de metrô é pertinho da casa, do lado de um lindo parque. Eu recomendo o espaço do Jason! Foi uma excelente experiência!
The place is immaculate, very comfortable, and a short walk to the A train!
Jason's place is beautiful, clean, quiet and so close to the A train-- would definitely recommend staying here!
Jason is a perfect host. He is very helpful. All the things we need are in the appartment. Thanks for your warming welcome. Our stay was very nice :)

Nuestra estadia en la casa de Jason fue una parte fundamental de nuestro increible viaje. Fuimos mi madre y mi hermano a pasar año nuevo alli. Desde un primer momento Jason nos recibio muy bien, siendo muy accesible con los horarios de entrada. Encontramos la casa en muy buenas condiciones, limpia y hasta nos dejo unos snaks para disfrutar la primer noche. La casa tiene una ubicacion muy buena, gran barrio y a media calle del subte (hay que destacar que pasa una linea express, estan en el centro de  manhatan en 25 min como maximo). Es una casa muy confortable, comoda y equipada con todas las comodidades y detalles necesarios. Ademas es un lugar calentito para poder descansar luego de los frios dias de NYC. El es una persona muy cordial, siempre atento a nuestras necesidades ayudandonos con lo que necesitemos. Te agradecemos tu atencion, sin dudas volveriamos a elegir tu casa.
La estancia fue buena la atención del casero también, cerca de transporte público y una zona muy tranquila
Jason was great!

Jason's place is great. Close walk to the A/C subway and very comfortable home. Jason was extremely communicative and and extremely considerate. He even went out of his way to drop off a lantern along with with water and snacks in anticipation of a blizzard. Highly recommend book with Jason.
Jason was super friendly and the place was almost better than described. Furnishing and detailing in the apartment is lovely and we had a great time. Would derfinitely stay again!

Our stay at Jason's place was incredible, to say the least. Jason is a fantastic host; he kept in constant communication with us and is very attentive and friendly. There are multiple menus in the apartment to choose from, and Jason also recommended some great places to eat. The apartment is beautiful, well kept and in a great location, with easy access to public transportation.

 Would definitely recommend!

Thanks Jason!

Nous sommes resté 11 nuits chez Jason (2 adultes et 2 enfants). Il nous a très bien reçu et présenté l'appartement, ou nous nous sommes vite senti comme chez nous. L'appartement est propre et très bien équiper pour cuisiner. Gros avantage il est très  proche du métro A (express pour Manhattan). Le quartier est très sûr de jour comme de nuit. Je recommande fortement cet appartement !

Super logement, identique à la description, situé à 30mns de manhattan et 45mns de time square, quartier tranquille, le métro est à moins de 5mns à pieds, Jason est sympathique, très accueillant, et de bons conseils. J'y retournerai sans problème....
Jason is a great host, my stay was great as well I have no complaints anyone who books Jason's place will be more than satisfied.

Appartement parfait pour 4 adultes, à 2min à pied de la Station Utica (station express), faut compter 30 bonnes minutes pour arriver au centre de Manhattan.
Jason est très gentil, très réactif et donne pleins de conseils et d'infos à l'arrivée pour profiter un maximum de NY !
Je recommande !

We stayed for 6 nights, and Jason's apartment was a great place. He is really worried to have things clean and functioning, was very attentive to our needs and have us a lot of useful information. Only a short walk from the metro station in a quiet neighborhood. I would gladly stay there again.

Jason was the best host, it's like he was born to be an AirBNB host. We had a wonderful time, we got to do everything we planned on. Jason was always reliable and available to give recommendations at a moments notice. We will never stay in a hotel again. We hope to come visit New York again sometime. The neighborhood was very historic and easy to navigate, even for a couple of girls from the suburbs. Thanks again Jason you made our stay better than we could've imagined!

This was an awesome & affordable option for us. We came in for work for a few nights but our stay was cut short & Jason checked us out at 2am, cause he's just that accommodating! He gave us suggestions, offered his parking spot if we couldn't find one, explained where to find the subway, and checked in with us during our time there. What more could you ask for? And of course, the apartment is adorable & even had some snacks waiting for us after a crazy night out! Loved it!

Jason was a great host and very friendly. The apartment was clean and comfortable, and we were impressed with how well furnished it was. A minor issue we had was noise from neighbors and construction, but this was less of a problem in the part of the apartment where the bedroom is located, as it does not face the street. Overall we had a pleasant stay.

Wir waren als dreiköpfige Familie 12 Tage bei Jason und fanden es sehr sehr gut. Die Lage ist unschlagbar günstig, nur 1 min bis zur Express-Subwaystation (In 15 min ist man in Manhattan). Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind um die Ecke. Der Stadtteil selbst macht einen sicheren Eindruck. Viele schöne alte Brownstone-Häuser. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön und absolut ausreichend für uns gewesen. Das Schlafzimmer liegt nach hinten raus und ist sehr ruhig. 
Jason war ein absolut hilfsbereiter und zuverlässiger Gastgeber, der bei Anfragen sofort geantwortet hat und die meiste Zeit auch vor Ort zur Verfügung stand.
Jason is a marvelous host: timely, communicative, and helpful. His property is in a great spot, right next to a part and subway access. Great place!

Super convenient location close to metro line A/C with direct access to Manhattan. Jason is a wonderful host and his apartment is very cozy equipped with everything you need during your holiday. Definitely I choose it once again during next trip to NYC.

Jason's apartment is conveniently located near the train station and along a beautiful brownstone-lined street. It is very clean, spacious and homely. Jason is a wonderful and polite host! Paying attention to detail, he avails little items that any guest would need. He was completely flexible and easy to work with. He went the extra mile to help us with our bags and directions around the place. I would recommend his house to persons looking for a place to stay while in Brooklyn.
Nice flat, authentic neighbourhood and metro is really close. But a general cleanup is due and a couple of things would need the handyman's attention.

Jason, place was spotlessly clean. It is nicely set up. It was a good value for us. Wr gave lower rating for check in because we had a problem with the check-in but Jason explained that he was feeling sick the night we checked in so he missed our call when we were trying to get in. He refunded the night so that worked out.

It has been a great experience for us to stay in Jason's house. It is close to A/C line, very convenient to go to downtown. It was neat and cozy and Jason had considered eveything for us. We also got great help from him on helping us to receive books mailed from Amazon. Definitely will rcommend it to other customers.

After using another website to book, what we thought was Prospect Heights, ending up being in Brownsville. Nothing that we were shown or told was even close to being the truth. That first and only night in that scary place, I stayed up to 130am looking for something last min in Brooklyn. After what seemed like forever I found this lovely place. JASON saved our family vacation!!! With his opening and accepting our booking so late in advance (less than 24 hours) we were able to spend the rest of our trip feeling safe. The place was wonderful, open and clean. We appreciated the full kitchen and was able to cook dinner for our family each night. Jason is a great host and I would recommend him to family and friends if they are ever in the area.
A nice place for a group of four.  The subway was close by and plenty of grocery stores in the area.

Highly recommend if you want a great place in a great location to get anywhere. Jason was extremely great to deal with even thou he was traveling aswell. Unfortunately we were pretty busy the whole time and  Didnt get to meet Jason till we left but he was always checking in with us to make sure we had everything we needed. Communication was amazimg:)  I was traveling with my 3 daughters aged 9-16 and I can say I would def book with Jason again. Great place to stay  for a family trip. Thanks again Jason. Cheers

The place was as advertised--clean, well-furnished and close to mass transit. I know the area well and was very comfortable moving around.  Jason was polite and accommodating.  He responded to all my requests promptly.  I would highly recommend his place.

Jason's place was amazing, and Jason's hospitality topped everything off. Jason was accommodating to my late check in, and promptly responded whenever I had questions. The bnb was adorable and clean. We ubered around quite a bit, but the location is great for walking as well. Jason recommended a park near by with the best views of the city, and Jason recommended many great restaurants. The bnb is well worth the price, and I highly recommend it!
Jason's place is great, and very close to the Utica train stop.  He was a great host and we really enjoyed our stay there in Brooklyn!

Jason was a great host! He was very clear and efficient in all his instructions. Very helpful when we needed help with the subway-- he even left us 3 metro cards with some cash on it! Jason responds quickly to any questions you may have and even took initiative to check on us to see how our stay was going. New York is such a social place and its so much to do. Jason place is a great place to visit because its in the heart of historic Brooklyn. We did the typical tourist stuff hip hop murals, famous streets Do The Right Thing Way, Junior's (btw the French toast is amazing), The Sweet Chick, a Brooklyn block party, Hudson Terrace, Manhattan, Joe's Pizza, etc. now next time we visit we can get more in tune with the locals lol. This brownstone was very clean and tidy, nicely decorated, Wifi, cable, one comfortable bed and a pull out sofa in the front room. Self check in and check out was a breeze! Thanks Jason for extending your wonderful home to us.

Well I don't know how to start this man is such an amazing person thoughtful attentive and on point I cannot ask for a better experience and his home clean very clean and organized not cluttered such a good host not just to me but to my husband and friends very welcoming any time that I go to New York this will be my place to stay I love his home I will recommend him to my family and friends in a heartbeat

Jason's place was amazing! From one super host to another...He IS the super host of super hosts!! His place was immaculate and you can tell that he pays close attention to detail when ensuring guests comfort. Check in and out was a breeze the lock on the door is just fancy.. the place was cool, spacious, and in great location to the markets, places to eat, gourmet coffee, and even a nail shop for my wife who all of a sudden needed a mani pedi!! He was available to answer any questions and recommend places to go and things to do. All in all we would definitely stay again!!
Jason is a very good host. He was largely available for us and the apartment was just so great. Well located and very clean. We recommend a lot. CU next time Jason.

Appartement au top proche du métro (3 mins à pieds) ligne direct Manhattan en 20 minutes 
Quartier très sympas supérette à 2 pas.
Jason est un hôte remarquable ayant une disponibilité exemplaire.
Une très agréable surprise pour cette première à New York et sûrement pas la dernière chez Jason .
Jason's apartment is the perfect spot for a weekend in Brooklyn. Quieter neighborhood with simple access to subway. Great restaurants all around. The apartment was clean, safe and charming!

The appartment was very clean and we had a great time staying there. The place was very close to the metro so we could reach Manhattan within 15-20 minutes. Jason was always available and a great host. Thank you again for giving us some advice for our stay in NYC!

Jason's home is as beautiful in person as it is in the photos. He was so accommodating and made me feel truly welcome. He gave me a rundown of local restaurants and the ins and outs of the boroughs and subway system. I hadn't been to New York since I was a child, so this was super helpful. I highly recommend this spot for anyone visiting New York.
Lovely brownstone, phenomenal host.. we will revisit....

Highly recommend Jason's place.  The apartment is quiet, well equiped, and close to the A express train which gets you into the city in 15 minutes (or less) and is frequent. Have stayed in Manhattan for all previous visits and preferred our stay in Brooklyn this time.
We had a great stay at Jason’s apartment, he was easy to communicate with and the place was exactly as described. Recommend!

We absolutely loved our stay at Jason's home! I traveled with my mom, my sister and best friend and there was plenty of space for the four of us. The subway was conveniently located a short walk away to help us get to and from Manhattan. The home was also located next to amazing eateries/bars - some of our favorites included Roberta's, Hotel Delmano, and Dunwell Doughnuts :) 

The home itself was very cute and comfortable. It was also by far the cleanest AirBnB rental I have stayed in. Jason does a great job cleaning the place between guests and also provides snacks and water! He was very responsive, kind and accommodating. We look forward to staying with Jason again in the future!
Jason is super reliable, and everything was perfect. The room is awesome, and the neighborhood has some of the best pizza. Would not hesitate to book again.
Good neighborhood. Close to trains. And the snacks are an awesome touch.

Jason's home was very good in terms of our expectations. Very close to A and C line metro station. It takes about 30 minutes to go to a metro station near Times Square. Location is very secure,we didn't observe any crime related activity. The only problem we had was the insulation of some of the windows. Jason attached airconditioning mashines' pipes through the windows and that leaves some holes which disturbs the insulation of the house. Although it is not a big factor for people staying in summer or warmer months,it could be a problem during winter. I can say that the heaters are working quite good,but the windows may be checked for better insulation.

Jason is a great host. He is a very welcoming man. We didn't have a major problem,but if we did,he would have paid attention to it. Overall,we recommend his house to everybody who are visiting New York and like to stay out all the chaos of Manhattan.

My siblings and I needed a place that could fit 4 people for a Thanksgiving reunion. We fit into Jason's place with absolutely no problem. We also had everything we needed in the kitchen to perfectly execute our homecooked thanksgiving meal. 

The Airbnb was everything that it promised and more. Jason certainly is a superhost!
Lovely apartment
Thank you for an excellent stay! Clean, spacious, and perfect for our needs.
Very nice and well equipped appartment, good location with many restaurants nearby and good connection to Manhattan. We enjoyed our stay.
Just has been the best host so far, and my family loved his place. We will be definitely be back.

Parfait pour visiter New York, à 2 min du métro (ligne A-C station utica, en 20 min pour rejoindre Manhattan) dans un quartier calme et typique de Brooklyn. Facile à rejoindre depuis JFK (40min par le métro). Commerces également à proximité. 
Très bien équipé, nous avons passé 2 semaines sans manquer de rien. Joliment décoré, fidèle aux photos. 
Jason est un hôte charmant, qui sait être discret quand il le faut et se rendre disponible si nécessaire.
Nous recommandons et ne manquerons pas de revenir si l'occasion se présente. Merci à notre hôte
Perfect to visit New York, 2 minutes from the Metro (line A-C station Utica, in 20 minutes to reach Manhattan) in a quiet and typical area of Brooklyn. Easy to reach from JFK (40min by Metro). Shops also nearby. 
Very well equipped, we spent two weeks without missing anything. Beautifully decorated, true to the photos. 
Jason is a charming host, who knows how to be discreet when needed and to make himself available if necessary.
We recommend and will not fail to return if the opportunity arises. Thanks to our host
Great stay

Jason is one of the best hosts I’ve came across. The apartment was super clean. He was very nice, super prompt with responses, and the apartment was very neat and clean. We got in late and he accommodated us by still being able to let us in so late. A friend drove us to the apartment and Jason thought she was going to be a guest as well (she wasn’t) and immediately offered extra toiletries for her. I will definitely be staying again

Jason's place was fantastic - it had everything we needed for our two day long stay for my wife and I and are foster child. Having an entire apartment with a stocked kitchen, cable TV, and more was an incredible value. The location couldn't have been any better - a beautiful neighborhood with accessible street parking, plenty of places to eat nearby, and a hop, skip, and a jump away from subway station.

Jason was a very attentive and responsive host - giving us good insight into the street sweeping being postponed allowing us to park overnight, cheerfully checking us in and helping us navigate the area.

We'd highly recommend and hope to stay again in the future.

If you are looking for a great place to stay in Brooklyn then look no further!  Jason's Place is on target!  It is close to everything!  You can walk to most local restaurants or stores. Our place was clean, warm and very cozy. We had all the utensils and dishes we needed for cooking.  Every room was meticulously decorated and enjoyed by us.  We even enjoyed the local Italian restaurant that was suggested. Words cannot express how we felt very much at home even though we were miles away.  He spoiled us and set the bar VERY HIGH for Airbnb!  We will definitely be back!  Cheers to you Jason-keep up the great work!!!
The place is super cute and so close to the metro! Jason was a great host and went out of his way to make sure our stay was as stress-free as possible.
One word i’d have to say is “Perfect”. Jason was an amazing host, very communicable from start to finish. The whole apartment was beautiful and spacious. Definitely a home away from home <3

I visited Jason's place with my 16- and 18-year-old daughters. The apartment is in an excellent condition, spacious, and a 3-minutes walk from the A and C trains. Great neighborhood. On-street parking is free. Jason is an excellent host, communication was easy, good WiFi, and the apartment has lots of information on NYC, local restaurants, etc. Strongly recommended!
Handy Brooklyn location,  right near subway on A line.  Jason was a great host. I would stay here again
Todo fue excelente. El departamento es muy cálido y se está a solo una cuadra del metro. Lo recomiendo!!
Jason was an awesome host! The place was clean and really nice! We loved staying here!
Jason was a wonderful host. Very friendly and accommodating, even with my late check in. His place is great - everything was clean and smelled nice:) Had a lovely stay!
Jason is an incredibly polite and communicative host with a stylish yet uncluttered apartment that was perfect for our needs. Would definitely recommend to anyone!

We are 3 adults who lived in Jason's apartment for 10 days. It is perfectly well located in Brooklyn, 2 minutes walk from the nearest subway station UTICA which goes straight to Manhattan in less than 30 minutes. 
The flat is roomy and pleasant. There are 2 minimarkets nearby which is very convenient when you come back late in the evening.
Jason is very friendly and responsive when you need something or ask for help. We highly recommend this apartment to everyone who would like to discover New-York in the best circumstances.
Appartement identique à l annonce, Jason est un hôte au top, description super et mètro très proche, donc super après une longue journée à visiter
Loved the brownstone apartment and location. This was my first time using Air B&B and after this experience I will use it much more. Jason was helpful and friendly

Jason was amazing and was always available for questions or suggestions throughout our stay.  He left some snacks for us when we arrived and provided water when we ran out on our last day.

His place is located very close to the Utica subway, so travel via subway to any of the boroughs was made easy.  There were a few restaurants located in the area, but I wouldn't recommend wandering around too late at night alone without a companion.

I would definitely look Jason's place up again on my next trip to NY.

Jason is a terrific host, living right at the apartment, providing in-person check-in, and local tips. The unit is literally next to the subway, which makes the trip to places super easy. So I recommend this to everybody who doesn't want to bother driving in and out of Manhattan.
Jason's airbnb was awesome! He had a very clean apartment with a fully stocked kitchen and was extremely responsive in his communications. Would definitely stay here again!
An amazing place, would stay here again!
Logement agréable spacieux pour nous 3 proche d un métro et pas loin d un commerce 10 min à pied. L hôte est très réactif sur les messages. Vraiment géniale.
Jason made sure everything was ready when we arrived. it was clean, quiet, and cozy. he answered texts promptly and gave us tips for the city. We felt very safe and appreciated.

We had a wonderful time in Jason's beautiful and very well equipped brownstone apartment. The communication with him was quick and kind and we knew he was around to help if we had needed anything. The neighborhood was amazing and we enjoyed having coffee on the stoops in the morning or pizza in the evening. Very recommended! And queer friendly!

Jason was great very! He is very helpful and communicative. Luckily he had some snacks available which after alot of travelling was very helpful as well. A jacket was left and he mailed it out no problem. Great host!

Vi hade en mycket bra vistelse hos Jason som verkligen var en fantastisk värd. Väldigt snabba svar om vi hade frågor och lägenheten har allt man behöver och mer därtill. Området i Brooklyn är relativt lugnt med vänliga grannar och fina gamla brownstone-hus. Lägenheten ligger nära tunnelbana och buss och man tar sig lätt till övriga delar av New York. Vi hittade många trevliga ställen lokalt också. På kvällen kan vi dock rekommendera att man åker taxi eller alltid är i sällskap när man tar sig hemåt. Vi kan definitivt rekommendera Jasons ställe till de som vill uppleva det Brooklyn som lokala befolkningen lever i. Jasons lägenhet är fantastiskt fin och mysig också!
Jason was a great host. Excellent communication and great local tips. Apartment was immaculate and well stocked.

Jason’s place is just as described, very stylish and comfortable. Jason is a great host. He made sure we had everything we needed, suggested restaurants and events in the area, showed us how to use the subway as it was our first time in New York, and always responded to questions right away. I would definitely stay here again!
메트로 역이 가깝고 호스트가 매우 친절하고 요청사항에 대해 매우 신속하여 지내기에는 불편사항이 없습니다. 단 3명이상이 자기에는 다소 불편하고 거실쪽은 저녁에 조금 시끄럽습니다. 그리고 맨하탄과 거리가 좀 되어서 저녁 귀가가 불편할 수 있습니다

Me and my friends stayed for 3 nights in New York and in Jason’s appartement, we had a very great time ! 
The appartement is very close to the subway station (less than 5 minutes), the neighborhood is safe and quiet, the appartement is clean and the amenities are good and useful ! 
Manhattan is 30 min far away from the appartement by the subway ! 
Jason is very available and welcoming :) 
I recommend it ! :D
Great flat large enough to be comfortable with 4 persons. Great location in the heart of Brooklyn very close to the subway (direct line to Manhattan). Very flexible host, much appreciated!

Die Unterkunft ist genauso wie beschrieben und wie sie auf den Fotos aussieht. Wichtig war für uns , dass es dort ruhig ist, um gut schlafen zu können. Die nächste Subway-Station erreicht man in drei Minuten und mit dem A-Train ist man dann in etwa 15 Minuten im Financial District. Jason war immer super erreichbar und hat sehr schnell geantwortet. Ein toller Host, der uns auch gute Tipps gegeben hat. Jederzeit wieder hier!

Family of three stayed at the Jason's Gorgeous apartment. The apartment was spacious and colorful exactly as in photos provided. Subway Utica station was literally a minute form the apartment which is the  most appreciated after a whole day of walking through NYC :) The apartment is fully equipped and the atmosphere in it is great. Check in and check out were so easy and Jason was very responsive to all questions we had.
Очень близко станция метро удобно и быстро добираться в центр

We had a week at Jason’s apartment which was fantastically clean, well equipped & very comfortable. Jason was a really good host by being available but never being intrusive. The apartment is very close to Utica subway station which makes getting into Manhattans tourist attractions very easy. Would I stay here again? YES WITHOUT HESITATION!
This accommodation deserves a Five Star rating. Everything was super and we thoroughly enjoyed our brief stay. Will most certainly use again if we return to Brooklyn.

Our stay at Jason's place was really great! The apartment looks absolutely gorgeous and you feel like home there from the very first moment. There's more than enough space to get your stuff organized and there's absolutely nothing missing you could possibly need. And on top of that, the style is really cool! The location couldn't be better – direct and fast connection to JFK and to Manhattan and yet a quiet neighborhood to live in (with a lot of good food all around the place!) Jason himself is the perfect host. He answers really fast to all the messages and he even came to fix something for us almost in the middle of the night. There's no information you couldn't get from him and you definitely should listen to his restaurant recommendations! Terrific! I can absolutely recommend Jason's place and for our next trip to NYC, we'll definitely be back there as well! :)
Very nice and tidy.

Jason was the nicest and most responsive host I've ever experienced in my travels. He sent us a map of detailed places to visit, eat at and sight seeing. Access to Sub-Way train is just few blocks away, hence transportation was ease. The location couldn't be more central whilst very quiet. The house had an old touch & was cozy but had all amenities required.  

I would definitely recommend this place to everyone and hope to come back in the future.
Jason’s place is cozy, clean and conveniently located to public transportation.  He responded quickly when I had questions and concerns.  I would highly suggest his place for a stay in Brooklyn, NY.
We reserved Jason’s place for my mom and it was just perfect. Clean, lovely, and comfy. And Jason is always quick to respond and very helpful. She’ll be coming back I’m sure!

Jason is a great host. He managed  our baggage before the check in , the  house was clean, he answered all messages very fast. The apartment is near to subway express line (saving  time to Manhattan), the neighborhood is safe. We endorse Jason.

We enjoyed our stay at Jason's apartment. It was clean and welcoming and Jason was friendly and helpful in advising us about local amenities. The Subway into Manhattan is just a short walk away, approx 30 minutes to midtown Manhattan, 50 minutes to JFK and there is a local food store where you can buy the basics. We stayed at the end of October and it was just beginning to get cold, the central heating was not operating whilst we were there as I think Jason was having the boiler serviced, there were  some radiant heaters available which we didn't use but if you're planning a visit in winter then I would check with Jason in advance that the central heating is now working.

Jason has been a perfect host. His house is clean and well shaped. It's 2min walking from an EXPRESS Metro to go and return to Manhattan in few minutes. Our trip has been fantastic thx to Jason.

I suggest to evreyone this place. Love it!

See you soon!
Excellent stay. Great price. Steps away from a subway.

Jason's place is at a perfect location for travelers interested in exploring downtown Brooklyn and Manhattan, without having to deal with the hassles and prices of each of those places. Jason was also a gracious host, and very responsive when needed. We will certainly be staying again in the future!
We’ve been glad to stay in this apartment. It’s spacious, comfortable, everything was clean and it’s close from subway station. Perfect !
Jason is a fantastic host that strives to make your stay as uncomplicated as possible. We enjoyed our stay and were very pleased with the accommodations.
Spacious accommodations near to subway.
Good location. Right next to Metro. Few snacks came in handy. He left some info about the city, which can be useful. Jason is kind and friendly. No complaints.

Beautiful section of Brooklyn, near subway for easy commute to nycity, gracious available host, wonderful apartment so comfortable, Jason provided everything one would need, I can’t praise him enough!

Jason’s place is a fantastic home base for a trip to NYC. It is within walking distance of the subway that takes you into Manhattan. Jason was very hospitable and took the time to talk us through how the subways system works, how to get to sights and attractions and local places to eat. He checked in with us throughout the trip and was always helpful and friendly. 
The apartment was clean and tidy and has absolutely everything thing that you need. I have no hesitation recommending to other guests.
Amazing host!
Jason was such a great host. My flight landed earlier than check in and he let me check in as soon as i got there. He informed me on places near by and his home was great. Highly recommended.
Fantastic Airbnb experience.

Jason kept his vibrant and colorful apartment clean and well decorated. He was always fast to respond to any questions I had throughout my stay and the overall experience exceeded my expectations. Would highly recommend to anyone.

name: Gorgeous Hawaiiana Home near beach
summary: By the day, gorgeous, sweeping views of the Honolulu skyline and beyond. By the night, it becomes a panoramic vista of the sparkling city lights. This is a beautiful, spacious and uniquely situated home, 5 minutes from Waikiki beach with easy access to shopping and all the convenience while vacationing. It is idyllic setting with tropical gardens, privacy, quiet and very welcoming. The tropical tranquility allows you to relax, enjoy a glass of champagne on the lanai and indulge stillness.
space: This is conveniently located property with 4 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, sleeps 8 comfortably with 30,000 sq ft of land with lush gardens, bbq area, gorgeous ocean, city and mountain views, private gym, pool table and only 1.5 miles away from the beach with easy freeway access, supermarkets and restaurants only half a mile away.
description: By the day, gorgeous, sweeping views of the Honolulu skyline and beyond. By the night, it becomes a panoramic vista of the sparkling city lights. This is a beautiful, spacious and uniquely situated home, 5 minutes from Waikiki beach with easy access to shopping and all the convenience while vacationing. It is idyllic setting with tropical gardens, privacy, quiet and very welcoming. The tropical tranquility allows you to relax, enjoy a glass of champagne on the lanai and indulge stillness. This is conveniently located property with 4 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, sleeps 8 comfortably with 30,000 sq ft of land with lush gardens, bbq area, gorgeous ocean, city and mountain views, private gym, pool table and only 1.5 miles away from the beach with easy freeway access, supermarkets and restaurants only half a mile away. Our guests will have access to the entire property and enjoy the beautiful evenings overlooking the city lights and the ocean in a quiet and tranquil environment. You can catch the
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood (Makiki Heights) is the most conveniente in the Island of Oahu, near everything and yet with plenty of privacy, quietness and tranquility so our guests can enjoy what Oahu has to offer and yet come home to a quiet and comfortable home.
notes: This property is located near beautiful hikes and it is available for larger events such as weeding, anniversaries, and large family gatherings.
transit: Freeway access is only 0.3 miles away and there are buses down the street which can be used to go anywhere in the Islands.
access: Our guests will have access to the entire property and enjoy the beautiful evenings overlooking the city lights and the ocean in a quiet and tranquil environment. You can catch the infamous Honolulu Fireworks every Friday night if you are staying over the weekend.
interaction: Owners live next door and are easy to reach in case of any assistance needed.
house_rules: Just enjoy the house and leave your shoes outside. No loud parties, please.  There is a Hawaii Transient Accommodation and Excise tax of 14 % and this will be collected at check-in since Airbnb doesn't collect these taxes for us.

host.host_about: Aloha, I am a father of 3, divorced, property owner in Honolulu, HI (Oahu) and I enjoy sharing my house with interesting and curious people. My background is in finances and in building businesses.  I love motorcycling, running, yoga, meditating, the beautiful Hawaiian beaches, the great hikes around my house and the outdoors life in general. I enjoy sharing the best hidden spots in Oahu with my guests and it has been a terrific experience to be part of the Airbnb family.

reviews.comments: Amazing house with a very Zen feeling and a beautiful view! Jose was a great host and made sure we felt right at home. Very close to the city and plenty of things to do. The house has plenty of room and is even more amazing in person.

The house is more beautiful in person. You can't beat the view! There's plenty of space for my big group of 12. There are some drain and hot water issues during our stay, but Jose is very responsive and fixed them quickly.  We had a wonderful time in Oahu using Jose's place as home base. Thank you for sharing your home.

We had a GREAT time... Very centrally located -- and we know Oahu really well.  This was one of those Airbnb sites where it was actually BETTER than the photos suggested.  This is a find for everyone.  Definitely worth the little bit extra.  Perfect for a family of 5 to 7.  And you can't beat the views!  Thank you Jose...
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 62 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Comfortable in Jose's home. Spacious living room, kitchen utensils, comfortable soft bed. My family loves it here.
Especially in front of the restaurant can push and pull the glass door, so that we can enjoy the beautiful scenery in the evening and night at night, at the time of tea or dinner. It feels great!
Jose is a good homeowner. Very considerate, thoughtful service! Thank you so much for bringing us such a wonderful experience!
Lovely home located within the hills, fully furnished and equiped. Perfect relaxed holiday location!

Jose's place far exceeded our already high expectations. Jose was extremely hospitable and communicative thro Ghost or stay and especially upon check in. 

The pictures do not even do this place justice. I absolutely recommend Jose and his home for anyone looking to experience a high class but homely getaway, and hope to be back again!
Great location! Great view! Great house! Almost everything is perfect!
Beautiful house with gorgeous views of the Honolulu skyline. We had a nice stay at Jose’s place.

Jose has the most beautiful house we have ever seen as an AirBnB. The photos on the website don’t do it justice - the actual house is mind-blowing! The view from his house is incredible, his treehouse is phenomenal, he has a fully equipped gym, a keyboard & drumset - just everything about his house is perfect. Sitting outside with a couple of beers and looking over into Honolulu/Waikiki during the sunset was a breathtaking experience - something that no hotel can provide. Jose and his family (and his cute little dog) are very respectful, and provided us with everything that we needed. The location is great (10 minute car ride to Waikiki), and the neighborhood is beautiful. It was almost a shame that we had so many things planned outside of the home, and we wished we could’ve stayed longer. It was an honor to be able to stay at his home even just for a few days - not many times in your life would someone be willing to share their beautiful home with strangers and be so accommodating. For anyone coming to Oahu, I highly recommend staying at this property; it will most definitely enhance your experience. Thank you Jose for being such a great host - I hope our paths cross again in the future!

Beautiful location with great views over Honolulu. Great house with lots of amenities and stylish decor.
Helpful host who was also occupying a separate part of the premises for some of our stay.

Lovely home with everything you need for a great vacation: convenient location, beautiful view, clean and great design. Jose was easy to reach to answer questions or respond to concerns. You can't do better than to rent here. Mahalo, Jose!

The place is clean and the view is amazing . This house is located near city, so it is pretty convenience ! The host is really nice people and he helped us when we have question in Honolulu ! You will not disappoint when you go here !

Jose's place is amazing - a beautiful home with spectacular views! It was very comfortable for our group of seven adults and the home had ample amenities. Jose was kind to meet and greet us upon check-in, which our group appreciated. He provided us with some awesome local tips. The location of the property is great and I would highly recommend staying at Jose's place.
当我们晚上10:30抵达檀香山时接到了管家的短信,她等着在房间迎接我们,周到的介绍了房间里的所有设施和需要我们了解的一切｡客厅和主卧的无敌景观让我们每天不舍得走出去,两个宝贝每天吃过早饭都会在花园里玩耍,很庆幸选择了Jose 的家度过我们在檀香山的6天.

This is an excellent house, enough room for a large group. Very stylish and cool decoration. Jose is very responsive and keen to be as helpful as possible. Location is very convenient though it would be best to get a car. All in all, a good and enjoyable experience.

The house is very spacious, well appointed, clean and comfortable.  Pictures do not do this property justice.  It is so much more beautiful in person!!!  The view is breathtaking especially at night.   Being centrally located in Honolulu, you are never more than a few miles from where the action is.  That said, the property is tucked just high enough up on a residential hilltop to ensure your relaxing privacy.  

Jose welcomed up into his home and made us feel like family.  We can’t wait to return.  If you are planning a trip to Oahu, you MUST stay here!!! I promise you will not be disappointed.  

Thanks Jose for helping make our trip to Oahu one that we will never forget.

Jose’s place is breathtaking.  The perfect blend of convenience with centralized Honolulu location and the tranquility of a tropical retreat overlooking diamond head, the city, and the ocean.  I wish had more time allotted to just kick up my feet and relax!  Thanks Jose!  We will be back!
José is a very attentive host. His house is wonderfull, the view is amazing. We have spent an excellent stay. A great experience in Honolulu.
Its really a fantastic experience staying in Jose's gorgeous house.We had a great family vacation there!!!

Beautiful secluded views of the city, yet easy and quick to get right into the nightlife and action. Amazing view of the fireworks! Modern amenities and touches. The younger ones (18-25) loved the full gym with weights, treadmill and bike. And a treehouse!

Jose的房子完全超越了我们的期望!空间开阔､设施完备､无敌景观｡坐在客厅和餐厅,可以俯瞰整座城市｡我们三个有孩子的家庭住在这里,依然还是觉得很宽敞｡孩子们可以在漂亮的花园里玩,还有一个在建的树屋,供孩子们爬树玩耍｡从房子开车去Waikiki海滩或各类商场,都很快捷方便｡Jose是一个出色的主人,为我们耐心仔细地介绍房子,推荐出游地点｡Jose的女儿也是一个很好的小主人,教会孩子们如何爬树屋,孩子们很兴奋!这是一次非常独特的旅行体验,非常适合大家庭聚会!

Gorgeous house located in a quiet neighborhood only 10 - 15 mins from Waikiki and the airport. Jose is a great host and the views are absolutely gorgeous. You can see Diamond Head from the backyard and the Waikiki skyline. Bedrooms and amenities are perfect for a larger group.

Great place and great host. Wonderful location with amazing views of the city.  If anyone is planning s family vacation in and around Honolulu this is a very comfortable place to stay and the host is super helpful.

Fantastic house. Great for large families or groups. 
Clean and tidy.
Loads of fun was had in the entertaining zones of the house.
The views were incredible!
Good location, Only a short $12 Uber ride to Waikiki.
Be mindful of other accommodation at same location, including owner.
They all were so great !! My family and I was so satisfied to stay.  I will recommend this to you ! If you are interested in staying here please not to hesitate!!

Jose's home is wonderful. This is one of those rare times when the home is more beautiful than the pictures. The views are outstanding and the home takes full advantage with great indoor/outdoor spaces. This is a great home for larger groups, with plenty of bedrooms and bathrooms, and parking for two cars. Jose provided lots of thoughtful amenities, including a well appointed kitchen, beach towels, and a boogie board for our son to use. He clearly cares deeply for his home, and was a very welcoming and involved host, responding promptly to messages and checking in with us regularly. We wouldn't hesitate to stay here again!
Wonderful!
The view is outstanding, with very clean and comfortable home. the host was very helpful with tips on  places to go to and things to see

Words cannot describe how amazing this house is.
