       The view was absolutely stunning. It was so nice to wake up every morning to the sunrise as well as seeing the city light up at night. The living area and kitchen were both very clean and had all the necessities in them. Each bedroom and its respective bathrooms were also very clean which made the stay much more comfortable. All in all, the house was very spacious and pleasant to stay in (Website hidden by Airbnb) The house is also located in the city of Honolulu, but it is far enough that there is not much city noise. The location was very convenient for us as we were able to go into the city fairly easily as well as travel to other parts of the island with ease (Website hidden by Airbnb) My family and I enjoyed the stay here, and Jose was an excellent host. Jose not only cares about his house, but he also cares about his guests. He provided us beach towels and boards for when we went to the beach, and he also respected our privacy. I would recommend to book this place as soon as possible because we booked it last minute but got lucky that no one took our dates yet.

Our family loved Jose’s place and are so grateful he is such an outstanding Airbnb host. He was welcoming and gave us stellar local recommendations that even took into account our three year old. Absolutely recommend and would come back again.
Great experience at Jose's place. Amazing view with wakiki hotels. love to stay again.

The views of Waikiki and Diamond Head were breathtaking and the house was exactly as described. Derek was our host as Jose was traveling and he was a wonderful person to meet and told us a little history about the place and local tips. Overall we had an excellent stay! Thanks again!!
very clean house.very beautiful view and very beautiful  yard.

Great location, smooth check in & excellent communication. Loved the Xmas tree :) Thank you Sandra for having us at your place.
Amazing location close to the beach and restaurants at Bondi. Apartment is cosy and comfortable.

Sandra's apartment was very clean, comfortable bed, when you opened the windows a great breeze came through, for it was very hot in Sydney while we were there for the weekend. Very close to everything, beach down one street.
Near the famous Icebergs club which is a must when you visit Sydney.  Would recommend for long or short stays thankyou to Sandra for having my husband & myself.

Great location, close to the beaches and all amenities. Cozy and beautiful one bedroom apartment for great value. My dad felt like at home and Sandra's hospitality and communication is top notch. There is not be a better place to stay for my family! Thank you Sandra!

The apartment is located 5mins walking from the Bondi beach in a quiet residential area. Sandra was very nice and responsive. The check in and check out went very smoothly. We had few issues with the apartment's cleanliness but nevertheless we have enjoyed the stay :)
Great place to stay. Would stay again
Lovely place 5mins walk from beach..lots of shops + bars closeby.buses to city within 5mins walk.really comfy cosy apartment.

Hello, this is Güner, welcome to our Family-run business, BERRY LIFE APARTS & ISTANBERRY :)

We are owner of this whole property and also managing here with our family members. We are also working in the two offices left and right side of the apart building entrance door.

Our sensitivities:
1) Cleaning (The most important one. Confirmed with our awards and reviews)
2) Security (Secure with easy-remote alarm system)
3) Working Discipline (No overbooking. And the apartments will be ready in the check-in hour for sure)
4) Solving the Problems (We instantly take an action about your problems during your stay)
5) Enjoying our Work (You will see our energy and positive approach when you arrive)

Let me introduce ourselves :)

*** GÜNER (Me) ***

I was born in Istanbul and I lived in this beautiful city during my whole life. I am a totally local Istanbul citizen, so I hope I can answer all your questions about Istanbul easily :)

I graduated from Marmara University in 2005 and worked for Finansbank Project Finance Department more than 7 years. And then I started working in our own business and quit from bank.

I will be always replying your messages and emails instantly (If I am not sleeping). And also if you need anything or want to ask something or have any problem (Before & during & after your stay) you can contact me, I will be happy to help :)

My office is in the right side of Berry Life Aparts entrance door. You can see me here whenever you want (The blue door).

*** BERİVAN (My Wife) ***

She was born in Düsseldorf and come to Istanbul while she was a baby.

She graduated from Istanbul University in 2005 and she was working in Citibank Credits Department with her 8 years’ experience. And then she started working in our own business and quit from bank.

She is designer of our concepts. We won creativity award in 2012 thanks to her :) She chooses all the furniture and fixture, pictures on the wall, colors of the wall, carpets, curtains etc. If you have any suggestions about the visual issues, she will consider every single one :)

She is also managing real estate office with expertise on furnished rentals. If you are moving to Istanbul and will need long term rentals, she is the correct person to ask :)

Her office (Which is also our reception office) is in the left side of Berry Life Aparts entrance door and open 24 hours.



*** ERDAL (My Mother-In-Law) ***
Honorary Chief & Cleaning Inspector 

She was born in Kastamonu City, and lived there for many years. Then she came to Istanbul.

She was a carpet designer, but when she gave birth to her daughter (My wife), she quit, and only take care of her :) And now, with her great experience, she is taking care of everything and helping us running here :) She is inspector of the cleaning services and we thank her for our famous & awarded cleaning quality. But she can’t speak English very well.

She is also in our reception office during day.

We all will be glad to welcome you :)
Güner & Berivan & Erdal

reviews.comments:
We enjoyed out stay in Erdal's Studio. It looks exactly like the photos, clean and cozy, but on the small side. Erdal and her niece were very helpful and always very quick at responding to any questions we had. 
The location is good, it does involve a fair amount of waking to reach most destinations, approx 10-15minute walk to nearest tram. However Istiklal Ave is very close and convenient to get to locations if you enjoy walking around. The area is very safe and lively although the roads and sidewalks can be quite uneven. 
Overall we would suggest staying with Erdal and feel as though this is a good place for young travelers to explore the less touristy side of Istanbul.

The flat was clean and comfortable-- just as it is shown in the photos.  Erdal was very quick to respond to all my inquiries, which was much appreciated and very reassuring.  The heating in the flat and all the appliances worked perfectly.  The only thing to be aware of is that (as per the picture) there is not a separate shower, just the shower head over the toilet.  Otherwise, a very happy stay!  The flat location is positioned ideally for nights out and it is feasible to walk to all the major tourist spots without wearing yourself out, which was a great bonus for us!

Staying in Erdal's studio was a good experience! Good price for value, the property and the location of the studio, near to Istiklal Caddesi were appreciable for us. Erdal's nephew, spoke perfectly english so she will be able to respond to any demand.

We really enjoyed staying at the Cute Studio Concept during our stay in Istanbul. Erdal and her family are very attentive and easy to communicate with. The flat is a great bargain and a nice option for a stay in Istanbul especially for a young couple or a couple of friends. I definitely recommend it!

The only comment is that the shower is a bit of an adventure because it's not partitioned. You basically shower in the middle of the bathroom floor in front of the toilet, but that's all part of the fun!

Erdal and his niece were helpful and kind. Their responses to our emails have always been timely, and they met our every request. The position is strategic to reach anywhere in the city. I advice Erdal if someone will visit Istanbul.

Erdal and her family were great.  They ran the bed and breakfast, and allowed us to check-in early since our flight came in very early in the morning.  For you, that would depend on if there were people in your room the night before.  The room was small, but was as advertised.   Room had clean sheets and towels.  Comfortable beds.  Shower was strange for american standards, but it was a good stay!  Would recommend if you're on a budget

A clean, convenient and safe place, wıth everything you need. Although İ didn't have a chance to meet Erdal, her niece Seyma was extremely helpful and patient when İ had problems with my bank at home - thanks *so* much for all your assistance!!!

We spent a week in Istanbul and during our stay we lived in this apart. We came there with our daughter (she’s 2y.o) and it was really helpful that Eldar gave us baby bath and stroller. The apart itself is tiny but there is everything you need during your vacation. In real life the apart is just the same as you can see on the pictures. It’s a perfect place to stay if you are going to see Istanbul. The only thing that I would recommend is to print presentation (especially map)in color and to use jalousie in the evening. Many thanks to Seima for her help)))))

Owner: Very nice & helpful. Questions were lways fast responded.
Room: Small but clean

We had a layover in Istanbul and unfortunately were very disappointed with our stay here in Istanbul.  Our apartment door was in an alley filled with trash and upon entering the apartment all you could smell was mold/mildew. I thought maybe I was overreacting, however, as the night went on I developed allergy symptoms and woke up with a headache and completely congested. We opened a window and turned on the de-humidifier that was in the room, but it did little to get rid of the smell. The shower is only a showerhead over the toilet, however, it provided plenty of hot water. We used Airbnb for our entire two week vaction and this was the only one we had a bad experience at. We left early the next morning and did not get a chance to explore the neighborhood, however, we can’t recommend this room to future renters. Erdal did keep in touch with us and responded quickly regarding our concerns about the protests in Taksim square, however, she will use your e-mail for communication and we were receiving multiple e-mails a day from her and that became somewhat overwhelming as well.

The hosts are great with providing info before and during the stay.  :) The room itself (Cute Studio Concept) is clean but musty.  If mold/mildew bothers you, you probably don't want to stay here.  It probably has to do with the fact that the drain in the bathroom is not at the low point of the floor.  There's a squeegee type thing in the bathroom which would make it easy to push the water in the drain, except that there's a bumpy sticky mat right in the middle of the floor that holds all the water and makes it impossible to move water to the drain.  You can tell this bothered me a little bit.  But!  Aside from musty smell and permanently wet bathroom floor, the place was clean and the price was fairly good.  If those two downsides don't bother you, then it definitely could be worthwhile.  Although there's only one burner, the kitchen is wonderfully well stocked.

During our 3 week tour of Eastern Europe using Airbnb for housing, my girlfriend and I were least impressed with our stay here. To be fair, the place did look as it did in the photos and the communication and check in were second to none in professionalism. The reasons we were left unimpressed was because of the alleyway where trash was scattered around, the musty interior, and the shower and squeegee situation other reviewers have described. In addition, my girlfriend and I kept waking up in the morning with insect bites and found a roach in the sheets. We spent three nights here and never quite felt comfortable. As I said before, there were definitely positives such as the communication and very detailed information and tips the host gave us before the trip. However, even with the budget price, I would have paid a bit more for a more comfortable place to stay.

This cute little studio apartment is exactly that, cute and little. It appears exactly as it does in the photos and is really all that I needed when staying in Istanbul for 2 nights. There is a funny mildew-y smell, but it really isn't that bad - particularly when you're out all day exploring the huge city. 
I really really appreciated Erdal's emails prior to my arrival, particularly due to the protests in Gezi Park. I was never really that worried, but if I was, Erdal's emails would have easily lessened any worries I may have had.
Erdal's niece was lovely, very friendly and spoke excellent english, Erdal's spoken English isn't as good however she was very friendly and welcoming on my first day. Kindness is a universal language and it was shown on this stay.
Thank you so much.
Todo estuvo perfecto en el apartamento de Erdal. Gran seguridad y privacidad. Cerca de todo. Muy bueno.

We stayed in the appartment in early July. The studio was well located and Erdal was really helpful, providing all the info we needed before our arrival. However, the smell was hard to bear (musty), and the door of the bathroom did not lock. It was ok for one night and adapted to our small budget but I would not recommend it for a long stay.

The studio is in fact a room with a kitchen corner and a shower/toilet. There is indeed a smell of mold because it's rather damp (there's a dehumidifier in the room). If you don't mind this, then it's very good value for money, and the staff is friendly as well.

Excellent location and value!! Erdal and her staff were fantastic and the place was awesome!!! I wish we had more time to spend in that 2bd rm studio but it was just a quick one night stay. Thanks Erdal!!!

The pictures are all real, however, one thing that does not appear on them is the high humidity and the noise from the street. The studio feels more like a tiny underground cave due to high humidity. The noise coming from the cars and people in the streets make it difficult to sleep. I spent 2 nights there after a last minute reservation, and I would not have been able to stay more. Istanbul is an expensive city, but this place is to expensive for the standard.

Very small studio, no big window to open, bed cracking, very stinky (most probably because of rotten wood or something like that), shower is above the toilet!
So very bad experience, it is easy to find much better at a reasonable price.

I would recommend to stay in this apartment if you are traveling on a budget :)
The apartment was clean, in a good location and Erdal and her work partners were very friendly and helpful :)
There was even some food and drinks left for us, which was very handy on our first night as we were very tired/hungry and didn't want to leave the apartment !
The apartment is fairly small but all you need for a short stay.

Great place if you have a low budget! In Fact tha apartament is a room with a Kitchen corner, e and toilet with a shower on it! But it's clean end the staff is friendly!! Was perfect for me and my friend!! 

It's highly recommended!

My experience at "The Cute Studio" was great! It wasn't luxury, but for the price, the location, and the good service of Güner and Nazim it's perfect.
As I mentioned, Güner and Nazim were really helpful and responsive to our requests. They gave us tips to tour the city, helped us to communicate with cab drivers, and fixed the shower that I unintentionally broke.
Overall, I am happy with this experience. If I had to go back to Istanbul, I'd stay there again.

Квартира расположена в районе Таксим. Это центр развлекательной жизни в Стамбуле. В этой небольшой квартире есть всё что нужно для комфортной жизни: кондиционер, микроволновая печь, холодильник, душ. Фотографии и описание полностью соответствуют действительности, но возможно не будут соответствовать вашим ожиданиям. Не плохая цена для квартиры в центре. . Были с другом  в Стамбуле два раза. Хотели и во второй раз снять квартиру, но к сожалению было занято. Рекомендую эту квартиру для непритязательных путешественников.

Приятный персонал. 
Чистое помещение.
Недалеко от Таксима.

Приемлемая цена, но того не стоит.

Неподходящий район для одиноких путешествующих девушек.
Очень тесное помещение для троих.
Ужасно сыро.
Обратите внимание на душ на фотографиях.

The owners were very kind and the apartment was central. For staying some days in Istanbul and you´re on budget it is a great oportunity but for staying longer -for me personally- it would be too small (as you can see in the description). 
Moreover the apartment gets a little smelly because there are no windows ;)

i was in the flat for 6 nights.location of the flat is perfect! main street is just 3 min walking. place was really clean and you have everything you need. just one small problem was the bathroom. while taking a shower whater is not going out, so you cant sense the humidity for hours after. but all in all for that price you could not expect more!

Guner was a fantastic host. Himself and the staff were very helpful with everything  I needed and offered me detailed info about Istanbul and its charms.
The room presented itself exactly in the same way it was illustrated in the photographs, and most importantly - it was very clean and tidy. 
If I were to visit Istanbul ever again, I would most certainly book one of Guner's rooms once more.
The area is not too shabby either. Very close to Taksim Square which is a bubbly area with a spectacular nightlife. Walking distance to Galata Tower.

We have been hosted in a different apartment by Guner and his family before. When this was not available I message the host's who kindly recommended this new apartment. This was an absolute treat and a steal for my colleague to stay in. Small but clean, tidy and very central. 
Such a welcome. Thank you
Güner was the perfect host and we enjoyed our stay. The apartment was in a great location and although a little small for longer stays, it was a charming place. We would stay there again.

The correspondence with the hosts was quickly, helpful and nice. They are really professional hosts. They sent me a lot of useful information about Istanbul, it was really a great present, thank you! The apartment was incredible tiny, it's in fact a room with a kitchenette and a bathroom. It was a surprise but it wasn't a problem because we had everything we needed, the apartment was fully equipped. The bathroom is very new and nice. The bed is comfortable and we had an inusefully long blanket that was very comfortable. The house is in a good place but you need to walk a lot (it wasn't a problem for us) because the public transport is far and for the centre is better walking. There was good central heating in the flat. The apartment is clean and by night we could sleep well, there wasn't any loud noise in the neighbourhood. I recommend the flat only for sleeping but you will go to Istanbul to pass the hole day in the streets :). The description of how to reach the house and the map is a little bit misleading, it is better control the route for the house meticulously before starting off because there is another Burger King earlier in Istiklal street and we were confused. On Sundays there is a fantastic vegetable and cheese market in the next streets we found it by chance and it was really a plus.

Aucun problème avec ce studio. Il est bien situé et il y a tout le nécessaire si on cherche un endroit où dormir à Istanbul. L'hôte est très sympa et parle bien anglais, il est toujours prêt a aider si on cherche des conseils.

Host was great.  Easy to communicate with and readily available.  Street where the apartment was being worked on by construction and it was a little too dusty. Overall, good experience for a first timer on airbnb.

Guner and Berry are so welcoming and helpful. They tried all their best to give all info I needed during my stay. 
The accommodation is so clean and has basic requirements. It is located in a residential area, surrounded by some small local shops, cafes, and etc. a few mins walk to Istiklal. 
I should also mention that the flat a tiny studio but good for the price being.
Advice, be aware of taxis in Taksim. Ask for the British embassy and you can walk from there to the flat about 5 min.
Bottom line, I would recommend the host first and then the place.
Guner was great host, always here to help. Flat have everything you need. Street is little dusty and not clean,but overall is good.

We had a nice stay at the hotel-apartment type place. Guner was very nice to us. He tried to help us a lot, especially when we couldn't find the address :))) The room was not the big one, but very nice and clean, with a wonderful terrace on the roof. Also i liked the location. It is located near British Counsulate, very nice street with a lot of bars/restaurants, but still it was not so noisy and annoying. I can tell that the price really corresponds the quality. And if you could book this place you would be very lucky. Thank you Guner. Next time i will book your place in Istanbul for sure.

Bon service et logement tel que décrit. Très propre. Eau chaude, chauffage, climatisation, TV satellite et système d'alarme. Seul bémol qu'on ne voit pas sur les photos est le minuscule lavabo de la salle de bain qui n'est pas très pratique.
Mon conseil: prenez un studio aux étages supérieurs, le voisinage est bruyant. Pour une nuit ou deux c'est très bien. Pour plus de deux nuits je vous recommande plutôt d'aller dans le coin de Sisli, deux stations de métro plus au nord.
Absolutly nice small Apartment. Very clean and there Is everything you need. Good located. Only the bed is horrible!
Our guest wanted to book us with credit card, but she doesnt have airbnb account. So we used our second account for the reservation.

this was my first time at Berry Life Aparts and i totally loved it ,everything was clean and tidy and everyone in the office was nice they directed me to some really nice places and where always ready to help and the manager himself was only a phone call away to organize everything he even send me bell-boy for free in order to help my family to carry their luggage and to guide them to the flat ,the room contained everything that you might need for your stay , i missed my flight at the end of the trip but luckily i was able to extend one more night in the same room and Mr Guner was able to help me to arrange a car to get me to the airport at the mid of the night , highly recommended place to stay.

i extended  my reservation here and still my opinion  is the same it was really great place to stay , thank you Guner for all the things that you helped me with , if i ever come back to İstanbul i will stay here again for sure .
We liked this flat very much. Erdal was very friendly and he took a good care of us :) The location is very cool. We had a lot of fun in the time of our stay
Good value

The accomondation has everything which you need to have a good stay. The Staff is really helpful ( special thanls goes to Ali). The communicatin with Güner and his crew was smooth and easy. The Area is fine but do not suggest something super luxury or whatever but if you need just a stay and no 5* Luxury Accomondation this one will be fine.
Taksim is about 10-15 minutes walk or two stops by bus.
Istiklal is reachable in 5-7 minutes by walk. Try Dürümzade the food is good and cheap and it is just two streets away. 
Anyway i would recommend this appartment.

Nice place and quiet. 
I recommend it

A nice location for a good price. In a few minutes walk you are already in Taksim. Near busstops and metro. A good place to stay if you want to discover the city and only use it for sleeping. 
The only thing is to watch out for is the low entrance door of the studio.
Küçük,tatlı ve ihtiyacınızın olabileceği her şeye sahip studio daire. İstiklal caddesine ve ulaşım araçlarına yakın. Ayrıca oldukça temizdi :)

Great little apt,it has everything u need.Nice comfortable bed,we used kitchen and it was good,bathroom was clean .Location is easy to find,close to istiklal street,taksim square and public transport.Friendly staff,they r ready to help u for anything u need,good price.I would like to stay there again :)
Her konuda yeterli ve güzel bir stüdyo,içinde ihtiyacınız olabilecek her şey mevcut konumu süper çalışanları çok ilgili ve her konuda yardımcı olmaya hazırlar.Çok memnun kaldık yine kalmak isteriz :)
Çok temiz ve düzgün bir daire.

Thank you so much for making our stay comfortable! We had a good time and a great experience. The location was really great, near the small and misterious streets in Taxim! We had a little problem with the Wi-Fi connection, but all in all we enjoyed our stay!

Nice place! Great hospitality from the owners.
The room is kind of small, but that wasn't a problem for us!
Recommend it!
The apartment is good! 15 min. walking to Taksim Square & 3 min. walking to Omer Hayyam Bus Stop. Thank you very much Guner, Enes, Obada & Team! I had a great time staying at your apartment. :)
Personale molto gentile, e comunicativo, Apartamento molto en irdene e pulito, piccolo però ha tutto il necessario per stare benissimo. Ottimo
Good place to stay.Public transport and many restaurants are next to the place."They provide what they say".
房间离独立大街不远,步行大概需要十分钟｡房主很热情,谢谢招待
An amazing place

Como siempre, la experiencia en el apartamento de Güner ha sido fantástica. Tanto la acogida como el servicio del personal fueron de primera, y el apartamento es moderno, cómodo, práctico y tiene todo lo necesario para una breve estancia. La ubicación también es excelente, fácil de encontrar (junto a una de las avenidas principales del centro de Estambul), y a tan solo unos minutos a pie de Taksim, Istiklal y la zona de bares. Sin duda, una excelente relación calidad-precio.
İyi lokasyon, iki kişi için biraz küçük ama tek kişi için ideal.
Herşey ilanda belirtildiği gibiydi.  İstiklal caddesine 5 dakikada çıkabiliyorsunuz. Güner bey ve çalışma arkadaşları bizimle yakından ilgilendiler. Tekrar görüşmek üzere.
Perfect place to stay, highly recommended
Wszystko tak jak na zdjęciach, gospodarz bardzo pomocny. Apartament  był czysty i schludny. Nic dodać, nic ująć ☺️
friendly staff, clean place and good location. good value for the money.

Perfect place for a short stay in Istanbul. The apartment is small, but it's more than enough for 2 people to have a rest and shower (you don't travel to stay in the room, right?). Good value for the price.
Great location, close to tourist attractions, public transport stations, restaurants and bars. Had no problem finding our way around.
It's very handy that reception works 24 hours, so you always have someone to ask for advice and solve any of your problems.
Highly recommended
Konumu biraz sıkıntılı olsa da fiyat-kalite oranı gayet güzel

Very good experience en general. The apartment its really little but has everything you need. It is really clean too, great service from the 24 hours reception. The only bad thing it's that can be a little noisy at night. But overall a very good experience, I think next time I will stay in other of their apartments that are not in the last floor. Everything in general was really good and I loved their security system, so you can have all your belongs in your rooms without worrying about anything.
Все было супер! Хозяева очень гостеприимные, всегда готовы прийти к тебе на помощь. Комната очень скромная, но главное , что чистая. Удобное расположение, есть где побродить. В общем рекомендую.

Квартира отлично расположена, рядом улица Истикляль, огромное количество уютных кафе, есть 2 супермаркета рядом, мелкие магазины, небольшой овощной рынок. 15 минут ходьбы до станции метро и 3 минуты до автобусной остановки. 
Квартира расположена на цокольном этаже, очень маленькая и скромная, подойдет для одного человека или максимум двоих. Горячая вода идет хорошо, туалет, душ - все работает. Был предоставлен полный набор посуды, еда на первый день проживания. Быстрый WiFi без перебоев, работает телевизор с местными каналами. Бесплатная стирка вещей в прачечной. 
Очень отзывчивый и приветливый персонал.
В общем, все очень хорошо, и нам понравилось, единственный минус - в квартире была повышенная влажность, и никакие проветривания помещения не спасали, особенно, после пользования ванной комнатой двумя людьми)
This place was great for my first time visiting Istanbul.
Building was in a great location and it was easy to get around the city. Apartment was comfortable and very clean.

Great spot that was close to some really nice places to visit on foot. Cozy little space for two that made us feel right at home. Not the biggest room but with a well equipped kitchen and gorgeous bathroom, we couldn’t ask for more. Cheers!

We had a great stay in Istanbul! We extrnded our atay at Berrys, because we really felt like home and everything was perfect!
The appartment is well-located, very central. The owner is helpful, answers quickly and gives good tipps!
So overall: if we come back to Istanbul we will stay at Guners‘ place again for sure :)!
Good enough but expensive without reason..
Excellent customer service and value for money!

Квартира идеально подойдет для одного- двух человек, небольшая но очень уютная и чистая! При заезде нас ждала питьевая вода, растворимый кофе,  кексики! В квартире есть все необходимое: постельное белье, полотенца, тапочки, фен ,кондиционер , набор посуды и даже сендвичница!) В квартире нет стиральной машины, но хозяин уточнил, что если возникнет необходимость , то загляните в офис( который находится буквально за углом в двух шагах) и они отнесут вещи в прачечную, бесплатно. Душ, туалет- все работает отлично, перебоев с водой не было. Квартира находится на цокольном этаже(может быть немного влажно, когда мы приезжали на улице было холодно и дождливо),  вход изолированный- за калиткой, как на фото.Хорошо работает WiFi. Квартира находится в 5ти минутах ходьбы от пешеходной улицы Истикляль и в 15ти от станции метро.  Приветливый и отзывчивый персонал! Мы остались всем довольны))
It is a very cosy and clean place, I would definitely recommend it to any solo traveller or a couple!

name: City center private room till 23/9
summary: Only rent till 23/9, our house is located in Hung Hom "food street". The private room has a single bed with a small TV (wardrobe is full..). You can enjoy the living area, kitchen and bathroom. Free wifi. Speaks great Eng, Mandarin & Caontonese.
space: Located right above what local called "the food street" in the city centre, you will never have to worry about getting great meals! The building has 24-hours security guard, with lift. The house is on 13/F, with windows opened you don't even need air-con (of course we have)! You can also have your own (quiet) private room with free wifi and your own TV, a good place to both rest and understand more about Hong Kong culture. If you like to cook, we have a small kitchen which you feel free to use. You can also experience a typical Hong Kong apartment - small but comfy. Oh, and great sunlight, too!
description: Only rent till 23/9, our house is located in Hung Hom "food street". The private room has a single bed with a small TV (wardrobe is full..). You can enjoy the living area, kitchen and bathroom. Free wifi. Speaks great Eng, Mandarin & Caontonese. Located right above what local called "the food street" in the city centre, you will never have to worry about getting great meals! The building has 24-hours security guard, with lift. The house is on 13/F, with windows opened you don't even need air-con (of course we have)! You can also have your own (quiet) private room with free wifi and your own TV, a good place to both rest and understand more about Hong Kong culture. If you like to cook, we have a small kitchen which you feel free to use. You can also experience a typical Hong Kong apartment - small but comfy. Oh, and great sunlight, too! I am renting out one of the two rooms, which belongs to my mother but she's now away to the States till 24 Sept. (so the space is available till 23 Sep)
neighborhood_overview: What Hong Kong people called "the food street", people often come here all the way just to try out many of these famous restaurants - a lot of korean and japanese food opened by Koreans and Japanese themselves, also hotdog, burger, Chinese "yum cha" restaurant, Chinese dim sum, Chinese hotpot, Hong Kong local fast food, 24-hours opened noodle shop... anything you want! A market nearby if you wish to buy ingredients and cook yourself as well. This is a neighborhood where you can find old and new blend in very well with each other - where you can find really cheap food, at the same time expensive or newly opened fusion restaurants. Of course, not only food, there are 3 supermarkets nearby, a famous Guanyin temple (good for career blessing), 10 mins walk to the habor (where people exercises in that area too)... basically it is a super convenient neighborhood in Hong Kong (not to mention how it is located in the centre of Hong Kong, just one station next to Tsim Sha Tsui, or Mongkok.
notes: The room will only be available till 23 Sep, before my mum comes back from the States. And all the wardrobe are full, but if you need, you can always put your luggage in the living area, if you don't want to put them in your room. Female preferred. And the room can only accommodate 1  person max.
transit: Apart from Mongkok, I would say it's probably one of the most convenient areas in Hong Kong to travel to anywhere you want to. There is a bus travelling directing from the airport to the building, a taxi station in another direction, 3 mins walk from the building, a mini-bus right at the entrance of the building, which will take you to the metro and Tsim Sha Tsui or Kowloon Tong.  Hung Hom, where the building is located, is also the area where all bus between Hong Kong Island and Kowloon side will pass by - so it is usually a 30 mins bus ride (max) from here to places like Causeway Bay and Central. Oh, and you can also travel to Hong Kong Island by ferry! If you are trying to visit the New Territories like Tuen Mun or Yuen Long for some great hike or organic farm day trip, you can take West Rail for less than an hour and you will be at your destination.  Travelling to China? The train to Shenzhen or Guangzhou starts also here at Hung Hom metro station.  And Uber has a lot of cars aroun
access: I am renting out one of the two rooms, which belongs to my mother but she's now away to the States till 24 Sept. (so the space is available till 23 Sep). Other than that, you can use the bathroom, kitchen and living area as you wish. I will also be staying in the flat so we will be sharing the apartment during your stay. But usually I wake up and leave work from 9am and back at earliest 730 or 8pm, so it's basically your space during working hours. :) Sometimes, I may cook light dinners and if you wish to join, feel free! (not excellent cooking though...)
interaction: I am a marketing personnel but somehow involved quite a lot in tourism (Hong Kong and China). So yes if you need any help, just let me know! I may not have time to show you around but can introduce you to some great shops, events and restaurant to visit. I speak fluent English, Mandarin and native Cantonese, and just started learning French. Self-learned Japanese just for fun... :) Backpacker, occasionally meditate, and will eventually move from the PR field to self exploration and reconstruction + life reconstruction (to find out who you are, what do you want in life, etc.) If you also want to know more about social enterprise in Hong Kong, I may be able to share a bit. Also, as someone who has lived in Beijing for 2 years, and a very frequent traveler to Taiwan, if you need any travel advice for China and Taiwan, I can support you a lot in that too! 我曾經在北京生活兩年,去過台灣超過30次,非常歡迎兩地的朋友來住喔｡:)
house_rules: As it's my mum's room, so please make sure you keep it clean and tidy, and don't touch any of her stuff (or else she will probably get mad). NO SMOKING IS ALLOWED. If you have a pet, please make sure it will not mess things up (like make them dirty, destroyed, or leave any marks). Please clean things up immediately for your pet(s)! I don't mind you bringing pets but please make sure I can return a clean and same room to my mum (lol).

host.host_about:
Backpacker, and now trying to devote my time and energy for helping people discovering who they are and what they truly want in life - still trying to figure out how to do that, but I can share with you how I found mine. :) Some other keywords: meditation, spiritual development, travel writer, marketing and PR, NGOs, dance - modern/contemp/ballet. Interested in meeting new people from around the world! Speaks fluent English, Mandarin and native Cantonese, just started learning French, speaks very very very little Japanese. Lived in Beijing for 2 years, and a super frequent traveler to Taiwan - know these two places just like my 2nd home(s)!

Oh and life is wonderful, isn't it? :) Can't help but see beauty in everything, including dark moments in life.

reviews.comments:
The location is quite close to bus stop and I could easily move to anywhere in Kowloon Area and Hong Kong Island(of course, another Hong Kong area too).

The host "Lee Megan" is very kind to me and she prepared detail memo how to visit Macau from Kowloon Area.

I think Lee Megan is reliable and secure.

name: BEST Location in Heart of Astoria!!
summary: Come stay at my beautiful place in Astoria (on 1st floor ). It's right by the trains 20 min to  Manhattan, 15 to LaGuardia airport. Close to some of the most popping bars and venues in the area, and near several grocery stores, cafés, and restaurants. Not long term stays.
space: Astoria is one of the safest neighborhood is all of the NYC boroughs. It is safe to walk around at any time, day or night. Astoria has the best bars and restaurants and a beautiful park. Not long term stays

Close to some of the most popping bars and venues in the area, and near several grocery stores, cafés, and restaurants. Not long term stays. Astoria is one of the safest neighborhood is all of the NYC boroughs. It is safe to walk around at any time, day or night. Astoria has the best bars and restaurants and a beautiful park. Not long term stays The bedrooms are on opposite ends of the house. You will have lots of privacy. I will be around to answer all your questions and to help you with anything you need. Not long term stays Astoria is one of the safest neighborhood is all of the NYC boroughs. It is safe to walk around at any time, day or night. Astoria has the best bars and restaurants and a beautiful park. You are only a 3 minute walk to the N/Q train. Super convenient to Manhattan. About a 15 minute total trip time from the apartment to Midtown.
