house_rules: Be honest and respectful and clean up after yourself. If you use the kitchen return it to the clean and orderly way that you found it. Please DO NOT bring home "friends" that you meet in the city. Smoke outside. Also, I am unable to bring in your pets. Keep it quiet at night. No parties. Not long terms stays.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Room was fine, not far from manhattan, but quite a long trip to the airport. We enjoyed our stay. Christian is friendly guy, who is trying to do his best for people who are staying in his apartment. thank you for letting us stay for a day :)
Cristiano was very accomodating and everything was fine.

Astoria is a secure place as indicated and it is a pleasure to be hosted Christiano. He is a very kindly home and thanks to him I was filling home.

I sincerely recommend him to others
The host was very responsive to texts, and exhibited great communication. With my phone out of batteries for most of my time in NYC, the host was quite patient.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Christiano is a very warm and welcoming host. He is a relaxed guy with no hassles. Always responded promptly to my messages. The room is clean, with linen and towels, in a great safe neighborhood right next to restaurants and cafes. Also really close to the subway station with a direct connection into town. 
He was there personally to receive us, which I appreciated, and we had good conversations. I will definitely stay there again.

The room was just as in the pictures and the host has put in efforts to do up the house. The kitchen is sufficient for cooking meals equipped with all basic utensils. The room has a closet, and side-tables to keep your belongings.
The host was very welcoming, talkative and enthusiastic to share knowledge about local trends.He was kind enough to enumerate restaurants of my choice of food.
Overall it was a decent budget stay.

My days in Cristiano's place were simply perfect. The place was impeccable and the room was big. I had my privacy, but he was also very fun to talk to. He stayed in touch through and always made himself available when I needed to ask him anything. Will definitely come back and I highly recommend to anyone!

Cristiano was a really good host. He was available for any help whenever I need it, but I still had a lot of privacy. The room and the flat look exactly as it is shown at the pictures. Everything was clean. The good thing was that I could use everything in the kitchen and the bathroom. Location is also very good, just five minutes walk to the nearest subway and it takes 15 minutes to midtown. It was just a little bit noisy because of airplanes, so bring earplugs if you want to sleep well. It was my first airbnb expirience and thanks to Cristiano I am sure I will do it again.

Cristiano's apartment was beautiful and he was gracious throughout the booking process and our stay. I was only around for 1 night but will think of his room for friends and family that come to visit!

The apartment is comfortable, spacious enough for 3 people, no complaints. We didn't use the kitchen, but it was large enough to be able to cook in if needed. The location is great. Short walk to many great restaurants, bars, and attractions. Great value.

Alojamiento perfecto para visitar NYC. Está cerca de la parada del tren que te lleva dierecto al centro. El barrio es bonito y con muchos comercios y restaurantes, muy agradable. Cristiano nos ha tratado super bien, con mucho cariño y respeto, siempre atento a nuestras necesidades, pero dejándonos el espacio suficiente para nuestra comodidad. Estamos muy agradecidos por su hospitalidad y volveríamos a repetir.
Cristiano communicated cordially and punctually. He was flexible about our arrival time, and made sure to have someone meet us when we arrived.  His place was immaculate and comfortable.
Cristiano was an amazing host! The room was clean and he was extremely friendly, even making some solid recommendations about where to go in the city! Highly recommend!
Great host! Would deff stay there again!
Cristiano was great and very welcoming!  Room was clean and as expected.

It was a great living space the room was exactly how it was described in the pictures I even extended my stay, the subway was only a few streets away and also there's so much choice of food. At night it's so quiet that you have the best sleep ever. I would recommend staying here if you're ever in Astoria and also one of the best hosts ever.
Extend my stay great place

I enjoyed my stay at Cristiano's.  The apartment was clean and spacious.  The location was very convenient with many restaurants nearby.  It was only 30 minutes by subway to midtown Manhattan.  Also, there was on-street parking available.  Excellent value!

Great space in a great location! Totally convenient to Astoria nightlife but you can't hear the city from the room. Accommodations are just as pictured. Spotlessly clean. Finding on-street parking was easy. Cristiano is excellent with communication and dealt graciously with my scheduling needs. I would happily stay here again.

The room and apartment were clean and tidy (as pictured). The apartment is located in a quiet street in a  neighbourhood with lots of restaurants (many of them Greek), cafes, and small businesses.

There's a subway station (Astoria-Ditmars Boulevard) a 5 minute walk from Cristiano's place. From there the N and Q trains bring you to Manhattan in some 25 minutes.

Cristiano was a friendly, helpful host. In particular, he was very quick to respond to all my messages before arrival. He was also flexible about check-in and check-out hours (which was great!).

Would recommend!
Cristiano was a great host! I was able to book this the day of. He was so accommodating. His apartment is located in a great neighborhood and close to great restaurants. Would highly recommend!
Cristiano was really helpful and readily available whenever I needed to contact him! His place was a great and in a really good location for the subway into Manhattan.

Chritiano was very hospitable and more than willing to give advice on what to do and where to go in the Big Apple. He was responsive, organized, and neat, which made my first visit to NYC very enjoyable. His accommodation was a warm welcome despite the near-freezing temperatures outside during my visit.

Christiano is a great host! He was very flexible with check in and check out times, and kept checking in with me via text to make sure we were on the same page. Overall a very accommodating person and understands what it means to be a good host.

His place is clean, the room is clean, and I would recommend his place for a quick stay in the city!

Cristiano was very welcoming. Amazingly upbeat and great guy. He made me feel at home and was quick to respond to any inquiries I had. I highly recommend it to anyone to stay with him. The area is great, quiet, relaxing, and there's a lot to do. It really is a short ride to midtown (20 minutes). Only the upmost praise for the room and Cristiano.

Cristiano was a nice host. The room was clean and the location is nice as it the subway station, restaurants and Astoria park are at a walking distance. Cristiano was helpful whenever I asked him to help, otherwise he let me be by myself.

All I was looking for was a warm bed to sleep on, and this place is exactly that. I showed up about an hour later than we had originally agreed, and it wasn't a problem at all. The host was gracious and accommodating, and otherwise left me alone.

Awesome stay!  The place was as advertised and very clean and neat.  The neighborhood was nice as well and didn't feel unsafe coming home late at night.  Good location close to the metro and plenty of restaurants and bars nearby.  Cristiano was very welcoming and friendly as was his Cousin Mario.  The bed was super comfy and perfect for what I needed.  My only complaint was that I didn't stay longer!  Would definitely recommend and definitely come back again.  Thanks Cristiano!

Cristiano was incredibly welcoming, greeting me warmly, showing me around, and explaining how everything worked. Our timing didn't quite sync up, and he came back just to meet me, and made sure that I was all set and had all my questions answered before he left. The room is very comfortable and quiet. I highly recommend the host and the room!

Nuestra experiencia en el apartamento de Cristiano fue muy gratificante, es muy aseado, la cama es cómoda y exactamente igual a como se ve en las fotos. La ubicación es excelente. Adicionalmente, Cristiano es muy amable. 100% recomendado.

Christiano was warm and friendly. He let us cook in his apartment.  His place is a five minute walk from the subway.  He let us know that his apartment is a five floor walk-up ahead of time, but it was quite a bit of walking after walking all day.  I think that it would be a good place for a single young person to stay at. I didn't like the neighborhood as much as I thought I would. There was graffiti on some of the walls in the neighborhood.

I came in to the city feeling a little down, but when I ventured into Astoria to stay at Cristiano's apartment, I met a smiling, warm and amazing human being who was an exceedingly gracious, accommodating, and kind host. He helped jump start my stay in the city to one that became a hugely immemorable and timeless few nights, and that is largely due to the welcoming and peaceful environment in which I stayed. There can be possibly no other, more apt way to describe an experience as saying, "It was a gift for me to be staying here. It was a blessing."
Cristiano is a fantastic host!
Great stay
Cristiano was great! Friendly and easygoing, and his place was a great value in a nice neighborhood.

Nice place. Big comfortable bed.  Good A/C. Welcoming host. Definitely a recommend. Only downsides are that it's on the 5th floor and the bathroom, although clean and perfectly functional, is on the small side .. but neither of these was an issue for me.

Cristiano was a great host! He was friendly and helpful, and keeps a clean home. He was there to welcome us and was quick to respond via text with any information. The neighborhood was safe and easy to park in. There were lots of restaurants in walking distance and close to public transportation.

I can only recomnend christianos place! I had a really nice stay at his apartment. The room has a perfect size with a big bed. Aircondition works nice and Christiano is a really friendly and cool guy!!! The neighborhood is safe with good restaurants and a 30 minute ride with the subway downtown.
Totally awesome. Gracious, great communication, cozy spot. My first AirBnB and very pleased! fyi the place is 5 floors up!

Christiano is very funny, openminded, friendly and just a great guy!!! He left us alone most of the time, and as we were in need of some advice, he was willing to help us!!! Great guy, nice accomodation!!!!

Nos quedamos una noche. Tenía todo lo que dice el anuncio y a pesar de no haber conocido a Cristiano, él siempre fue muy amable. En el departamento estaba su primo que fue muy considerado con nosotros. El único problema es que hay que subir cinco pisos en escalera para llegar.
I had a very pleasant stay at Cristiano's place. Clean apartment, fantastic neighborhood, fast commute to Manhattan.

My stay with Cristiano was exactly as described and pictured. Cristiano was very welcoming and knowledgeable about the area. He even provided many things to me in his own apartment that are above and beyond what he had to do as a host. With work I wasn't able to talk with him as much as I'd have liked to but I hope to keep in touch and actually move to the area in the near future!

Cristiano was a gracious host, and his apartment was just as shown in the photos (it was actually a bit cleaner in real life). Everything needed was provided. The location felt incredibly safe, and very convenient, as it was a short and easy subway ride to Manhattan. Overall, it was a very pleasant stay, and I would recommend Cristiano's listing to anyone!
Cristiano is a great host. His place is clean and neat. The apartment is close to public transport and I would recommend it.

The room is conveniently located just a few short blocks away from all the bars and restaurants on Ditmars, as well as the N/Q train to take you in to the city. Cristiano was super accommodating and the room was very clean. We would have no problem staying here again if/when we come back to the city.
Great!

A great, clean place to stay in a great neighborhood.  Cristiano is a wonderful host, the neighborhood is an easy subway to Manhattan, and the food in the neighborhood is fantastic.  Definitely recommend.

Cristiano was a great host. We had nice conversations and he was ready to go the extra mile to make it easier for me to access the place and be comfortable. I had a great experience and would recommend this place to everybody.

Cristiano is a very nice host! He was very welcoming and helpful. The apartment was clean, in a quiet safe location, close to the subway station.
I would definitely stay there again. Thank you, Cristiano!

Cristiano is an exemplary host, friendly and helpful always available and around if you need him. I had a great time in his home which is in a quiet location. Shops and restaurants make Cristiano's place ideal for a room rental. Subway is just a couple of minutes away and leads straight to Manhattan in 15'.
I'd definitely book again when in NYC in the future.

Cristiano was a great host. Very personable and genuinely likes to meet people. His apartment was cozy and is a good value because of the location, which is close to a lot of nice restaurant and bars in Astoria. I will definitely use him again in the future

The place is exactly the same as on photos. Cristiano is a busy man, so I haven't seen him too much, however you can always contact him via mobile and he is very helpful. He's also very communicative - you can expect simple messages as 'how are you, everything's ok?', what is very kind.

The location is perfect; simple transport to Manhattan (1 train ride, 8 stops to 5th Ave), quiet neighbourhood, a lot of small shops, restaurant and pubs - everything I need.

If I visit New York next time, I definitely choose this host and place.
Cristiano was very friendly and accommodating. I couldn't have asked for a better host.

Cristiano is really friendly and helpful.
The area is great. I recommand !
Cristiano is a great host, he is polite and open. He is superkind and helpful. We enjoy very much his place and we recommend his place and him as a host!

Cristiano was readily available to answer any questions prior to my arrival. He responded almost immediately. Check in was easy and Cristiano was flexible as I arrived a little earlier than I was suppose to. The listing is just as advertised. I felt very safe in the area and there are plenty of restaurants and other shops within walking distance.
Great stay. Very good host and a nice location in Queen's.
I often use  Abnb so I can say that Cristiano is the best host I had! Amazing experiance and I hope I will see him again!

The place, the area, and the building were lovely,  peaceful, quiet and comfortable. There was a soothing, relaxing energy to the place. Spectacular Manhattan Skyline views from the rooftop. Cristiano was very nice, respectful, easy to talk to, we talked quite a bit,  it felt as if we had known each other before. A gentleman. I felt at home
Cristiano is a very friendly and helpful host.
Cristiano is a great host! His room he offers is very comfortable, cozy and the bathroom is clean. This is a great place to lay your head to rest after a long day of exploring the city.

The room was very dirty and filthy. Dirty linen, towels, ceiling fan was full of accumulated soot.  The shower was completely filled with mold and fungus. The linen and pillows smelled. The bed spread had "stains" and "hair".  Disgusting, just gross! This was my first time using Airbnb and all the reviews I read on hosts room seemed very positive. So I decided to get it.  I blame myself.... the old saying "get what you pay for" .  The host seemed nice enough BUT, my fiance' and I could not stay there and basically had to get a another hotel in Astoria (at an Additional cost of $800 on top of the host's of $300 + for 3 nights).  The host's room priced at $80 was not even worth $10 IMO. In New York completely "stranded" and looking for another Hotel... freezing cold, carrying luggage on a Friday night  while taking a 7 am flight to arrive for family and business trip.  Airbnb site is IMO not customer friendly about requesting a refund. I could not find a phone # on entire site for this kind of situation to get my refund or request some kind of resolution. I had to lookup up (Hidden by Airbnb) how to even request a refund. Basically my experience after my trip is that Airbnb expects you the renter to resolve your grievance with the host. Basically tell the host your're not happy or comfortable of the conditions of their home or room and resolve it yourselves if you can navigate around their completely complicated website when it comes to issues like mine. Basically tell hosts yourself that their house is in my case completely unacceptable  and disgusting and hopefully get a refund days later at the hosts discretion.  After messaging host which again I say seemed nice enough I got only $131 back at his discretion of fairness. I don't recommend the hosts room for anything more than last option resort rather sleeping on the street. A better option and cheaper option is renting a car and sleeping in that car if you don't get a parking ticket whilst parked overnight. If the hosts room, bed and shower are completely disgusting and can't be used than it's the same as a rented car without a shower. Everything always seems like a good idea till something goes wrong like this....then try looking on this site to find a phone # to get some kind of resolution or refund or compromise is like a puzzle within an enigma inside of a maze. Even now trying to upload pictures I took of hosts house to show other guests contemplating using host's room of actual bed sheets, bed, shower, bathroom seem impossible. Also, having to write "required" 500 essay or review about my experience seems like a way not wanting a guest like me to write a bad review... a way of having me shut up and take my $$$ loss without any say so and go away thanks
Probably one of the safest neighborhood in the city.Lots of Greek restaurants 3 min to N W trains.Chris is a really cool guy he works alot. you wont see him during day
Great host, great place, great location. Cristiano was really nice and flexible, easily reached and helped me with any problems i had. No complaints and would definitely recommend!

Had a great stay at Cristiano's place. It's cozy, comfortable, and convenient. Cristiano is a great guy and awesome host - really nice, accommodating, and cool to talk to. Everything went smoothly. The neighborhood is safe and convenient with plenty of restaurants and shops. A few blocks to the train and it's a quick ride into Manhattan. I'd definitely recommend staying with Cristiano!
Our stay with Cristiano was wonderful! He was very friendly and helpful, which allowed us to really enjoy the city. He is a great guy and it was a lovely first airbnb stay.

Cristiano was a great host. He communicated well before my arrival, and was flexible and didn't complain about my arrival at the middle of the night. The room and bathroom were acceptable. However, the location was great. There are a lot of restaurants, cafés, and bars in 5 minutes walking distance. Moreover, the metro station is approximately 6-7 minutes walking from the apartment.

I would definitely suggest this room for other travelers.

Una experiencia realmente genial!! Nuestro primer airbnb ha sido extremadamente satisfactorio. Alojamiento muy limpio, temperatura ideal, cama muy comoda y todo acompañado con un barrio muy seguro y agradable! 20 minutos del centro en metro! Cristiano nos ha sido de gran ayuda siempre atento con nosotros, muy cordial y ameno en todo momento!! Recomendamos sin duda este apartamento para disfrutar NY en pareja!! Gracias Cristiano :)
Great place if you just want to stay in for a flight the next day.
Very kind host and great apartment!
Great host! Great communication,  clean apartment, all went well. I would definitely recommend staying here if in the New York area. Close to train and walking distance to restaurants.
Great Host, Great location.

My wife and me had a greate experience here. Cristiano is a great host! He is really nice, friendly and helpful. The room is clean and cozy. The place is safe and convenient. I will definitely choose here again in future!

Cristiano is the warmest host ,i am so appreciated to live his house ,he is so patient and sweet (handsome also Y(^_^)Y),alway care about my feeling let me be comfortable and convenient. his house is clean and easy to go subway,if i stay new york again, there is no other choice except his place .thank you Cristiano, you let new york warm in winter.

Cristiano is a super welcoming and nice host. I also had some nice chats with him! The place was not big but it had everything you need and it is super close to subway. The neighborhood is safe and lively with shops and restaurants in a walkable distance. I would not hesitate to stay in Cristiano's place again if I am to go to New York again!

It was a pleasure staying at Cristiano's place in Astoria, Queens, NY! He provided detailed check-in instructions upon arrival, and he was so friendly and accommodating. His place is a short walk from the Astoria-Ditmars subway station, which made it very easy to go to Manhattan and other parts of NYC. The bed is comfy, and his place is well kept and clean. I highly recommend Cristiano as a host for your stay in NYC!

Me encanta el lugar donde est'a, buen sitio para llegar a todos lados. Buen lugar para echar unas vacaciones en NY. Buen trato recibido, como un hotel o mejor, limpieza y seguridad. Cristiano e es muy cercano y agradable .Genial estancia!!

The room was very clean and comfortable. Cristiano was helpful and made sure we had everything we needed. The neighborhood was charming, with lots of restaurants and a subway stop within easy walking distance. Overall a great experience!

The perfect location near all the restaurants, grocery store, and the train station. The room was very clean and comfortable. Cristiano met me at door and he was very kind. I appreciate how safe I felt and this was my first time using airbnb. I will def come back again!

Cristiano is a great host! He is very friendly, welcoming, and accommodating. His place is clean and the location is awesome. It's close to public transit and there are also a lot of good bars and restaurants within walking distance. This was my first Airbnb experience and I'm happy to say that it was a good one. I would definitely stay in Cristiano's place again!

Cristina is a fantastic host. He makes his incredible place your place. The location and amenities are awesome. He is a warm and wonderful person. I now consider him a friend. And the deal can't be beat. I highly recommend you Air B And B with him.
Cristiano's place is one block off of Ditmars - tons of restaurants and bars. It's very close to the Ditmars-Astoria train which is one train ride to Manhattan.
Cristiano is very welcoming, helpful. I enjoyed my stay in his super cute apartment

I loved the location because it is conveniently placed near the subway and the local shops . I loved the fact that I was almost always alone in the place. Cristiano is very friendly and ready to help, if needed. The apartment was very clean and had 2 nice tv sets. The only suggestion I have is that the bathroom, which was very clean, could do with some freshening up.
Great stay. Will stay again when I'm in town!

The location was good since the train station was within a walking distance. I did not expect it to be on the 5th floor. The bed was comfortable and Cristiano gave us access to many things in the kitchen.
Very Calm and Clean Place.
This place was amazing, in a very great part of Astoria and the host, Cristiano is very welcoming and helpful.
This is an awesome place in the heart of NYC. Peaceful, calm, and secure.
Cristiano was a great host. If I needed anything, he would always respond quickly. Thanks for letting me stay at your place. It was a great experience!
Nice place and friendly host.  Recommended.
Cristiano is a great host..and he made sure i felt like being home..

Cristiano was very accommodating and incredibly helpful in getting me settled into the city.  His place is a close walk to everything that I wanted to see in Astoria and convenient to the subway when I wanted to go further afield.  Altogether, he offered a terrific experience.  I'm grateful I had a chance to stay at his place.  My only regret is that I didn't schedule to stay any longer.
Nice, Clean, and Quiet Place near Astoria Subway Metro Station.
Christiano and his cousin were very flexible with our check-in that was much later than expected. Room was just what we needed
Cristiano was great host, very friendly. Everything was exactly like in the ad.

Cristiano's place was great and in a great neighborhood in Queens.  Not far from Laguardia Airport.  He was a great host!  Was nervous about booking somewhere i've never been before but the neighborhood wasn't bad even coming home late at night.  Would definitely stay there again.

We had an absolutely wonderful stay at Cristiano's! He was easy to get in touch with and very accommodating with our stay. He checked in with us in the morning to make sure everything was okay and if we needed anything. He was very flexible with checking in and checking out. The apartment was clean. The room was a good size and he had put up an AC for the warmer weather. The neighborhood was safe and quiet. There were plenty of restaurants and bars nearby that are open very late or 24/7. Easy walk to the bus or train.  Street parking is limited but we were able to park a couple of blocks down. Overall it was great and we would definitely recommend!

La mejor opción que puedan escoger para visitar NYC, la zona es excelente que incluso pueden encontrar diversión a unas cuadras, la zona es segura. Y lo mejor el servicio, la atención y en general el departamento de lo mejor.
Cristiano was great.  Very helpful, and Kind, thoughtful.  Had my privacy and felt like apt was my own.  Would stay or recommend anytime.  Awesome neighborhood.

Apartment was very clean. The host was flexible and friendly. Its on the 5th floor and had to drag bags up the narrow stairway. While clean, the apartment is very old and spartan. The TV in the room was apparently out of service. It was fine for the night.

Great location - super close to the main street of Ditmares. We walked for hours around Astoria & it was beautiful. Astoria Park is within walking distance & offers a nice green setting in amongst the city's concrete. Loved the feel of so many different cultures melting together in a few short city blocks. We had Greek food at the 26th Ave Tavern, & ramen & Japanese bar food at a place right around the corner from the apartment. Delicious! We also walked down to a beer garden a few blocks away. 

Cristaino's apartment is perfectly quaint & secure for 2 people. Exactly what we needed for a day to explore the area. He took us up to the roof after dark as well and had an awesome view of the cityscape! 

We would definitely recommend!
El lugar es perfecto para ir de vacaciones o de negocios,  mi anfitrión se porto muy bien, y me hizo sentir que estaba en casa, 100% recomendable el lugar, ideal para ir solo o con tu pareja
I only stayed for one night, but the stay was great and the place was clean and comfortable.  The host was also very welcoming. I would definitely stay here again!

Christiano' s place was clean and comfortable. It's close to the train and restaurants in a lively Greek neighborhood. The neighborhood is safe and fun while the bedroom faces in on the courtyard so it is nice and quiet. I never met Christiano, but his cousin checked me in and took care of anything I might need. The A/C is adequate and the bedroom door locks. I would stay there again.

Cristiano's apartment was perfect. Right near the train and everything you could possibly need. I never actually met Cristiano but his cousin Oscar was there. Super super friendly and always offered to help us out if we needed anything!

Great location in a quiet area but very close to the bussel. The train is maybe a 6 min walk and you pass anything you may want to eat or buy on the way there. If you want to be just outside the city with easy access. This is the place.
Great area, host works hard to make sure you enjoy your stay. Would stay again

Cristiano was an excellent host.  He clearly communicated instructions for arrival.  He was extremely understanding when I had a change in plans for my travel.  I look forward to using his home on my next trip!
Great location, spacious room; very friendly, caring, attentive host. Thank you very much Cristiano!
Great experience, great location. Will definitely stay at Cristiano's place again.
It was perfect!
Good place

Exactly as advertised other than the hospitality far exceeding expectations. Location is legit perfect, neighborhood is quiet but has plenty of nightlife/things to do less than a block away. Perfect spot for what I was in town for. Highly recommend staying here and will definitely be back myself.

Chambre conforme aux photos.
Nous avons croisé plusieurs fois Cristiano, très sympathique.
Pendant notre séjour, ses neveux occupaient la chambre derriere la cloison paravent. Nous rentrions tard, et nous les avons peu croisés, ils restaient dans leur chambre en restant discret.
Quartier tranquille.

Just great! Unfortunately, I haven't met Cristiano in person, but his cousin helped me with everything and waited till I arrived (it was late check in at 11pm) and I will definitely recommend this place, it's really nice room with big bed, TV and closet! Value for money. Thank you for my great experience in NYC!
Excellent, calm, and very clean place.
Cristiano was very communicative and nice, and the location was excellent--very walkable with easy access to public transit (and LGA).
Simple place that gets the job done! Cristiano was super friendly and responsive.

Good experience! Great location. It's close to markets, bars and restaurants.

Didn't get a chance to see Christiano in person, but he is as nice when texting and he really helped me out when I got problems with my schedule. His cousin Oscar was there hosting me. Oscar is super super nice. They are trying to help. Will go back if I get a chance.

Good value for a great location and private bedroom.  It is a real private room with a door, bed, desk, and air conditioning, and the bathroom is shared and small but functional.  Cristiano is extremely responsive and friendly, making it a convenient and welcoming place to stay.

Great stay! Super Quiet, comfortable bed, the host left the summer A/C unit in the window for me so I could sleep in cool air. Slept like a baby! Cristiano was easy to deal with, he was totally upfront about everything, answered all my questions, and was responsive. The only 2 concerns was that the apartment was on the 5th floor, and no elevator, only stairs, and the tile in the bathroom was a little dirty and old. Hard to clean. Both are issues with the building not something the host can control. Everything the host could provide was 100% as advertised and the place was comfortable. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
Staying at Cristiano's place was my first airbnb experience and I would definitely recommend his place to anybody looking for a clean and cozy place to stay in NY with a great friendly host
Good experience overall!
Very good

Cristianos place was very cozy and bedroom large with ple.ty of space. The building  property is very well kept and historical. The apartment very clean and tidy as well as quiet. It's near main strip where you can get good food. I drove so dis not mind fact it was not close to subway.

Great if you want to drive to NYC and leave your car without having to worry about parking. Easy walk to the Subway. You share a small apartment with your host who is super friendly! The room and bathroom are small and basic but perfectly clean and comfortable. I'd happily stay again.
Nice place very well connected to Manhattan through Metro. Nice and safe neighborhood.

The parking was just on the street and was a little difficult for us to find a spot. The host was phenomenal, was very good and gave us an early check in. Also when leaving we had heavy suitcases as we came internationally and they helped us take our bags down, would definitely stay again. Place was clean and close to metro station.
Da Cristiano è come sentirsi a casa
Cristiano was very nice and helpful. His place is just blocks from the subway so it's very convenient.

Thanks so much, Cristiano! My stay was perfect. Oscar was an extremely graceful host as well, making me coffee and telling me all about where I should go when I visit Ecuador. I really enjoyed talking with him.

The bedroom and kitchen were very spacious and clean. And, the location is great! I really enjoyed the rooftop view, as well! I'll definitely recommend your place to friends traveling to New York in the future.

My wife and I needed a place to crash beteeen flights out of LGA, and we’re extremely pleased with Christiano’s place! There is a busy street nearby with plenty of bars/restaurants to enjoy, we felt safe, the room was clean, and Christians was super nice! We’d be happy to stay again.

Cristiano was very welcoming and accommodating. His place was very minimalist but comfortable. It was very clean and what was expected. Very convenient location to different local restaurants and overall a good experience.   I recommend staying in Cristiano's place.

Cristiano was an amazing host! He's place is comfortable, clean and quiet. Location is great with he subway a short walk away. He was very chill and just easy to get along with. Great Value for price!
Great experience

Cristiano's place was very close to the subway which I took to Manhattan (NW line) and close to lots of coffee shops, bakeries, and a CVS drugstore which was very convenient. I am a young woman travelling alone and felt comfortable at his place as well as in the neighborhood. He was very friendly to me and I had a nice, quiet, relaxing stay.
Christiano’s is a nice small place in a charming part of town.
Cristiano's place was okay to stay for 2 nights. The TV and netflix was perfect. Most of the time I was on my own. Cristiano is welcoming and a good host!
Cristiano was very nice and accommodating. His place was simple and perfect for my needs - which was just some place to crash at night since I was in the city all day.

Cristiano’s place was perfect in every regard. It was super close to the airport and the subway, a clean space to relax, and a comfortable bed. I will try to stay with him every time I come into New York!
Great place and awesome host. I’m really happy that I stayed with Cristiano. Many bars and restaurants in the neighborhood. I can highly recommend it!
Cristiano was a great host!!

Cristiano's place was exactly what I needed after a 10 hour flight into the city. He had an emergency and could not be there during my stay, but he made sure to leave very detailed instructions and was available via text to answer questions. I really appreciated him not cancelling, despite his emergency, because I was so tired and sleep deprived when I arrived in NYC that I probably would have cried if he had, lol. Thank you, Cristiano!

Nice apartment in Astoria, <5min from the subway station Ditmar's Blvd, 20min from Downtown Manhattan. Cristiano was sociable and very nice, super flexible in regards to check-in and an overall great host. Also had great tips for surrounding restaurants and breakfast spots (all within <5min walking distance). Totally recommend!
A

Cristiano made this a very easy experience.  I had a last minute trip, and he was very accommodating to my schedule.  The room was very clean and quite, and extremely easy access to LGA airport and quick ride into NYC.
The location is convenient to the restaurants, grocery shoppings and the airport. Within 15 minutes subway ride, you are in Mid-town Manhattan. The host is kind, courteous and communicates very well.
Είναι σε καλή τοποθεσία κοντά στο μετρό και σε πολύ ασφαλή περιοχή....

Cristiano is a wonderful host!! Very friendly, and helpful. It was my very first visit to NYC (also very first Air BnB!) but I had no problem in the city with his useful informations about transportations, and about local places. 
The place is only a few mins walk from subway station which goes to central manhattan very quickly. I definitely recommend you this place!!
Christiano is a lovely host, his home and the room are very simple, but comfortable and clean. It is a good value for the price. I plan to return.

Cristiano's place was amazing. Central to everything with a quick train ride to downtown Manhattan  and  amazing restaurants  close by. Overall a wonderful host who gave great suggestions. The apartment was cozy and very clean with options of nice flat screen TV to watch Netflix. Definitely recommend.

This was a last minute reservation and Cristiano was nice enough to accommodate me. He is the friendliest host, he instantly gave me the feeling I was welcome at his place. The apartment, in Queens, isn’t big, but hey, it’s New York. Since it’s an older building, there were some noises during the night. I could check out late, which came in very handy. For a short trip to NYC, I would recommend.

Es un pequeño departamento en el corazón de Asturias. Cumple con los requisitos básicos, cama cómoda y  baño. Durante nuestra estancia Cristiano no estuvo presente pero nos dejo instrucciones claras y precisas para poder ingresar al apartamento. Para una noche estuvo bien. 

 Llegar a Manhattan en transporte público toma al rededor de una hora. Uber cobra casi 40 dls.
This place is great, would definitely come back and stay with Cristiano! The place is clean and he is a great host!
Cris place was great!! Perfect location! I’ll deff be staying again!

Worst airbnb i've ever stayed in. The beds were dusty, the shower was super dirty. I have pictures. The place was very small. No privacy because they were no curtains on certain windows. The bathroom didn't close. Honestly it was disgusting do not recommend it.
Cristiano is a super host! He provided us with everything we needed before our flight the next day & let us check in a bit early since our flight landed early.
Cristiano is a great host! He is responsive and the apartment is nice and tidy. The location is amazing and we would definately stay there again!
It is able to hold 5 persons
Simple space in a great neighborhood.  Cristiano is very accommodating and quick to respond.
The apartment is very close to the restaurants, shops and services. Access to the Train is excellent and safe.
Great place. Great hosts

This loft style apartment was wonderful and was everything we expected it to be. Cristiano made check in effortless and easy which was much appreciated after being tired from traveling. He provides a bunch of towels, shampoo, conditioner, coffee and other amenities we were not expecting. Awesome location and price, we would most definitely stay here again for a night on the town!
Great host!  Cristiano responded to questions in a timely manner. Check in was straightforward and the location was great with various bars and restaurants at a walking distance.

The location was absolutely great.   Train station was less than 10 min walk, and there are a lot of restaurants and coffee shops in between.  It takes about 20+min to get to Times Square, very easy access to Manhattan.

Host was very kind and helpful, very quick to respond to the messages.

I enjoyed staying here.

The pictures are accurate.  However, there were just things in the space that were just off.  The door to the small bedroom was off the hinges and inoperable.  There was one hand towel in the bathroom and none in the kitchen (although Cristiano told us how to find more when we asked).  There as a half-eaten carton of ice cream in the freezer without a lid with a plastic spoon in it.  The towel rack in the bathroom had fallen off the wall so there wasn't a good place to hang towels.  The sheets in the larger bedroom had small rips in them.  

One big positive:  We took a red-eye to NYC and Cristiano met us early in the morning to let us into the apartment so we could store our stuff and take a quick nap.  That was huge for us.

On the whole, the apartment was kind of okay but could have been really good with just a little more attention to detail.

Ny group and I were very excited for our stay to your place. Especially seeing that you’re a super host. However, we were very disappointed with our one night stay at Cristiano’s place. Not only was Cristiano unresponsive on the Airbnb app, but also on his person phone where I had to dig through Airbnb to find and call him. Furthermore, the condition of the place was a lot worse than we expected. Upon arrival, one of his neighbors came to us telling us someone broke into their place and flipped all their furnitures over. We felt unsafe literally the second we arrived to the place. What made it worst was when we found that the windows couldn’t even lock at Cristiano’s apartment. We ended up leaving our valuables in the car. In addition, there was left over food in the fridge, the door was broken in one the bedrooms, and the floor was extremely dirty. We could feel a thick layer of dust on the floor if we took off our shoes. The bed sheets also felt uncleaned and itchy to sleep on.  Overall it was a very  disappointing experience and I would not recommend anyone to stay there. I don’t usually like to leave made reviews but I do not want anyone to make the same mistake as us , thinking ‘Superhost’ would make a person/place more trustworthy.

I would most definitely recommend this home. This is one of the top homes that I have been too. The house is well maintanced and together. The area is amazing walk to the block and everything you need is in amount to walking distant you will truly be amazed just as I were.
Best location and services

위치는 나쁘지 않습니다. 주변에 편의점, 음식점도 있고 교통도 편리한 편입니다.
체크인할때 굉장히 힘들었습니다. 밤 12시쯤 숙소에 도착한다고 미리 연락을 했으나 막상 도착했을때 호스트와 연락이 되지 않았습니다(문자, 전화 X).
체크인 방법도 사전에 안내받지 못해 문 앞에서 연락을 시도하면서 20여분을 기다렸으나 결국은 안내받지 못하고 혹시나 하는 심정에 문 손잡이를 돌리니 문이 열렸습니다. 우여곡절끝에 집에 들어갔으나...우리를 기다리고 있던건 몇마리의 바퀴벌레였습니다.
뉴욕이니 어느정도는 예상은 했습니다만, 냉장고 안은 제대로 청소되어 있지 않았고 부엌 찬장에는 이전 투숙객들이 먹다 남기고간 과자 봉지 들이 널부러져 있었습니다.
방 2개 짜리였는데 작은방은 굉장히 작고 아무것도 없어 옷을 걸어놓거나 짐을 보관하기 불가능합니다. 
출입구옆 옷장에는 청소도구가 아무렇게나 넣어져 있었기 때문에 옷을 걸어놓기가 꺼려질 정도였습니다.
화장실도 깨끗하지 않았고 수건걸이는 망가져 있고 옷을 걸데도 없었습니다.
호스트는 친절한 편이긴 합니다만 가끔 연락이 잘 안됩니다.
뉴욕에서 그 동네 물가를 생각하면 많이 비싼 편은 아니지만 차라리 돈을 좀 더 주고 제대로 된 숙소에서 몸과 마음이 편하게 머무시는 숙소를 찾으시는 것을 권장해드립니다.
great guy great host very accommodating went out of his way to help us out

Die Wohnung ist groß und super gelegen. Man läuft nur wenige Minuten zur Ubahn. Supermärkte, Restaurants und andere Läden sind direkt um die Ecke.
Trotzdem ist es sehr ruhig (abgesehen von den Nachbarn darüber :D ). Obwohl die Wohnung im Erdgeschoss ist, haben wir uns immer sicher gefühlt.
Die Wohnung hat die Ausstattung, die man braucht. Falls noch etwas fehlt, kann man Cristiano bescheid sagen. Er antwortet immer sehr schnell und ist sehr hilfsbereit. 
Nach Manhattan kommt man mit der Bahn in ca 20min, also sehr schnell. Da es eine Endstation ist, steht auch immer schon eine Bahn zum Reinsetzen bereit. Wir konnten zu jeder Uhrzeit fahren, sehr praktisch.
Wir können diese Wohnung auf jeden Fall empfehlen. Man muss natürlich die New Yorker Standards bedenken (sehr dünnes ToilPapier, Gasherd, sehr dünne Wände...)
excellent host and place, for sure next time i stay again

Cristiano was a great host. I’m new to Airbnb and he explained everything I asked about. I had read one bad review that made me nervous but he assured me everything would be to my standard. The place was cleaned, you could smell it was done. I wouldn’t consider the second bedroom to really be for a guestplus their belongings. We were going to possibly have a friend come with us for our trip and she ended up not being able to. I know that room would have been way too small for her. The area on the other hand was perfect! Tons of bars and restaurants to choose from! The subway was a quick 8 minute walk. Cristiano checked in with us the second day to make sure everything was good as well. I liked that he provided plastic bowls and silverware. I would recommend bringing a blanket because there was no extra blankets available. I recommend staying here!
Great place!
The place was nice & clean, but second room was very small and disappointing.

Cristiano was responsive and attentive. He checked in with me after the first night to make sure I had everything I needed. It's a good place to lay your head with access to bars and restaurants and a short train ride into the city. Would stay here again next time I visit Astoria.

Cristiano es muy amable y hospitalario, siempre estuvo atento a nuestra llegada y que todo estuviera en orden. El apartamento es igual al de las fotos, su ubicación es muy buena si quieres conocer NYC. 100% recomendado
This place is amazing and Cristiano is an awesome host. I recommend everyone this place.

name: Ocean & Beach View Condo WBR H204
summary: Ocean View Waipouli Beach Resort & Spa H204 is a 2 bedroom, 3 bathroom located in coveted Oceanfront H building, the closest building to the ocean. This Exquisite Luxury Condo offers stunning views from every room! Accommodates 6 guests comfortably! This condo has a fully equipped gouret kitchen, central AC and a washer/dryer inside for you! The price includes HI tax (14.42%), out clean and resort fees!
space: Ocean & Beach View Waipouli Beach Resort & Spa H204 is a 2 bedroom, 3 bathroom located in coveted Oceanfront H building, the closest building to the ocean.  This Exquisite Luxury Ocean & Beach View Condo offers stunning watercolor sunrises, whale watching and romantic dinners on the lanai with a panoramic view of the 2 acre lazy river, a fresh water pool complete with water slides, waterfalls, 3 sandy bottom hot tubs, a sandy bottom children's pool, with a beautiful tropical landscape all lit up at night with tiki torches!     Enjoy a special vacation surrounded by the finest designer furnishings, a king bed in the master bedroom suite, a queen bed (Simmons Brand) in the 2nd master suite, a new queen size sofa sleeper in the living room, elegant bedding, linens and toweling, a fully equipped, ultimate gourmet kitchen with state of the art equipment:  Sub-Zero refrigerator for perfection in freshness and wine temperature, a Wolf appliances designed by chef's with a passion, cabinets mad

neighborhood_overview: This condo is located at the Waipouli Beach Resort & Spa! This condo is privately owned and managed by Kauai Calls!
notes: Guests say the bike path along the coast of Kapaa is an incredible experience: beautiful, easy access and leads to access to the most beautiful beaches and views one might not see by car alone.  There are several bike rental shops in Kapaa. Hawaii Tax ID: TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  Note: we get you started with basic supplies, like a few rolls of toilet paper, shampoos, paper towels, dish soap, etc. if you need any other supplies while you are on island you purchase from there! Mahalo!
transit: There is public transportation on the island, but we recommend renting a car  as it's the easiest way to get around on the island.
access: The entire condo, pool, fitness center, beach access, we provide beach chairs and boogie boards in the condo for you to use! You have access to all the amenities at this resort, concierge, restaurant, and spa! Note: we get you started with basic supplies, like a few rolls of toilet paper, shampoos, paper towels, dish soap, etc. if you need any other supplies while you are on island you purchase from there! Mahalo!
interaction: We message you your door codes in advance and provide all information ahead of time. We do not meet you at the condo to show you around. This condo is located at the Waipouli Beach Resort, which is less than a mile from our office. We will be working away when you are on island. :) We will message you the door codes ahead of time that you'll need for entry. If you have any questions or problems you contact us directly, we give you Candace's cell number as she is the on island contact for you. She's very responsive.
house_rules: Please take some time to review these Waipouli Beach Association House Rules that have been designed to ensure safety, comfort and enjoyment for all owners and guests of Waipouli Beach Resort. Absolutely no smoking in the condo or on the lanais or anywhere on the property. Our resort is a SMOKE FREE PROPERTY. All condos are designated non-smoking units. There are designated smoking areas located along the parameter of the property. Our resort facilities may be used only by owners and guests occupying a unit. Privileges may be extended to family and friends visiting our resort only when the owner or the registered guest is present and each guest must be registered at the front desk. Each unit is allowed a total of 6 guests at any given time. Quiet hours are from 10:00 p.m. to 8:00 a.m. but excessive noise should be avoided at all times. Owners and Registered Guests are responsible for everyone in their party ensuring that their behavior is not offensive to other occupants or damaging to

host.host_about:
I have always known I would have a home on beautiful Kauai and dreamed of hosting guests who come to Kauai to fulfill their own life's dream. My favorite TV show when growing up was 'Fantasy Island' and here I am. Over the past 13 years I have come to realize that all that guests who have stayed at Wailua Riverside Hideaway become ohana the moment they arrive. It is you the guests who are the true stars in this Fantasy Island called Kauai! 

I now run a vacation rental business here on the island: Kauai Calls! managing over 40 properties with co-hosting help from Cathy and Michelle, my ohana! 

I look forward to greeting/meeting you here at the Wailua Riverside Hideaway! We have self-check-in set up for all other properties on the island!  

Mahalo nui loa! 
Candace, 
Owner P RB
Kauai Calls!

reviews.comments: Beautiful view! The unit is spacious and in a great location (central, supermarket near by). Very family friendly and yet has high quality amenities. Would easily recommend to any family.
Clean, beautiful place. As advertised. I will look forward to going back.

name: Quiet Tropical Beachside Haven
summary: Our home has a light & airy feel mixed with homely decor & charm; positioned in a quiet, leafy neighbourhood. Walking distance to Manly, Queenscliff and Fairlight beach. A tropical beachside haven, with a sunny garden - what more could you want?
space: A real 'home from home', in a quiet leafy suburb. Our house is split level, with the front entrance being at the top of the house. All bedrooms and main bathroom are situated upstairs; the main bedroom has a queen bed, ensuite and a private balcony, and the front bedroom has a queen bed (nor the sofa bed that's shown in the picture). There is a 3rd bedroom is set up for a baby - this is only accessible for guests that require a cot, please add this to your booking request if it is needed. The dining area is on a separate level to the living room and kitchen, along with a small study area and laundry, which has a washer, dryer and separate toilet. The tropical garden and undercover eating area is accessible from the lounge and kitchen area, with a area set up for the hammock!
description: Our home has a light & airy feel mixed with homely decor & charm; positioned in a quiet, leafy neighbourhood. Walking distance to Manly, Queenscliff and Fairlight beach. A tropical beachside haven, with a sunny garden - what more could you want? A real 'home from home', in a quiet leafy suburb. Our house is split level, with the front entrance being at the top of the house. All bedrooms and main bathroom are situated upstairs; the main bedroom has a queen bed, ensuite and a private balcony, and the front bedroom has a queen bed (nor the sofa bed that's shown in the picture). There is a 3rd bedroom is set up for a baby - this is only accessible for guests that require a cot, please add this to your booking request if it is needed. The dining area is on a separate level to the living room and kitchen, along with a small study area and laundry, which has a washer, dryer and separate toilet. The tropical garden and undercover eating area is accessible from the lounge and kitchen area, with
neighborhood_overview: The house is positioned in a quiet street in Fairlight but is within walking distance to Manly, which has a wonderful beach, a multitude of bars and restaurants and good shopping. Also within waking distance is Fairlight beach, which is harbour side, linking up to part of the Spit to Manly walk. A multitude of outdoor activities awaits you: amazing coastal and bush walks, kayaking, diving, beachvolleyball, cycling and of course surfing! Manly Swimming pool is within 5/10 minutes walking distance, as are sea pools at Manly, Queenscliff and Fairlight Beach. There are also 3 golf courses nearby. For your daily supplies, you're also a 5 min walking distance from the new shopping complex Stockland Mall.
transit: We're a 5 min walk to the City buses, 1 min walk to the free community shuttle that will take you to the heart of Manly or if you prefer you can easily walk into Manly within 15/20 minutes. From Manly Wharf you can access ferries into the CBD or across to Watsons Bay, to Taronga Zoo and to Darling Harbour. Buses from the area also service all of the northern beaches, all the way up to Palm Beach. There is plenty of council run car parks in Manly, most of which have the first 2 hours free.
access: Guests will be able to access all rooms of the house, expect for the third bedroom which is set up for a baby. This room will only be accessible to those guests that request access.
interaction: We will be available to help you during your stay and our parents will also be available in the event that we are not.
house_rules: We respect our neighbours, so no loud parties here please! We also expect all guests to treat our home with the upmost respect, as if it was their own, and to maintain a clean and tidy environment. You are not permitted to smoke in our home and we do not allow guests to bring pets.

host.host_about:
I’m Helen, myself & my husband love exploring & visiting new places! We have a little girl who is currently (2018) 3.5yrs old - such a character! 
We live in Sydney, close to the beach - in our home which is our little tropical oasis - we adore being by the beach and are always out and about. 
We’re very considerate & caring humans and would treat anyone’s else’s home as if it were our own.

reviews.comments: The house is really wonderful. We were warmly welcomed and got a delicious apple strudel - a great start after arriving on a long flight from Europe. The garden is a small green paradise. Walk into Manly is roughly 20 min. We highly appreciated our stay and would love to come back.

Absolutely wonderful stay at a beautiful home! Thank you so much Helen, you were helpful and went above and beyond during the whole booking process. Place was spotless when we arrived and beautifully decorated. Would 100% recommend and come back. Thank you

Thank you Helen! We had a lovely time over new year at your gorgeous place. The house was so homey which was much needed for us during or travels. The place was spotless for our arrival and Helen kindly left us a welcome gift and also allowed us to help ourselves to things from the fridge and pantry. She was very easy to contact and get hold of both prior to and during our stay. Thank you so much! Happy New Year :)

The house was amazing, even better than the photos make it look. In particular the backyard was very nice and private. The location was also great -  within walking distance of Manly beach and the wharf, making it easy to get into the city via the ferry. The three bathrooms was good to have. It should be noted that as the house has four levels there are quite a few stairs. Helen was very friendly and responsive.

name: Repos & Manna Downtown Montreal,  Rm #1, sleeps 3
summary: SPECIAL: 20% "Off-season" (October to April)...SUPER FAST WI-FI. IMPORTANT: No breakfast during off-season (October to April), DOWNTOWN LOCATION, NEAR METRO.  Private Executive Room #1, sleeps 3 comfortably with 3 beds (2 double, 1 bunk single), starting at $157 CDN plus applicable taxes (triple occupancy, one to 3 guests) per room. MINIMUM TWO (2) NIGHTS. Great for convention goers and short Montreal visits. Entrance to front door requires access code available only on day of arrival.
space: Available to guests during your stay:  1. FREE Hi-speed WI-FI internet 2. CABLE TV in Private room 3. FREE starter tea and coffee provided for each guest  4. Small fridge available in common area outside room  5. Towels, soap and shampoo (available in bath and shower) NOT available to guests during your stay:  1.  STRICTLY No kitchen access at all times 2. No Dinning room  access at all times 3. No eating and loitering in Living room area 4. STRICTLY No smoking at all times on our premises including patio and balcony 5. No parking at property driveway 6. No loitering in front of our establishment FEATURING: 1) Full-Service breakfast served seasonally from May to October with minimum stay of two (2) nights prepared by Chef Tony and his staff.   2) No-Breakfast Reduced-Service with 20% Discounted rates from October to April with a minimum stay of three (3) nights. EXECUTIVES, VACATIONERS, CONVENTIONEERS!,  Ideal stay for practical minded travellers, clean, comfortable, relaxing, & great

Private Executive Room #1, sleeps 3 comfortably with 3 beds (2 double, 1 bunk single), starting at $157 CDN plus applicable taxes (triple occupancy, one to 3 guests) per room. MINIMUM TWO (2) NIGHTS. Great for convention goers and short Montreal visits. Entrance to front door requires access code available only on day of arrival. Available to guests during your stay:  1.
