reviews.comments: This is a mini hotel that I found is common in Hong Kong. Room is the size of a mini van. The plumbing is poor and there's a strong scent of moisture in the air. The sheets were worn and not apparently clean although I saw now clear evidence of them having been used. I wouldn't stay here again.

地理位置是无可厚非,就在著名的重庆大厦旁边｡我是晚上快12点到的,出地铁站,遇到好多印度人,有点儿吓人的,因为他们就那样三三两两的站在街上,总之我是硬着头皮拖着箱子走的｡大厦的门口不是很好找,其实,我建议房东应该描述的更仔细一些:出来地铁D,就会看到7-11,然后,面向7-11右拐,大约10米左右是大厦的一个门,不过,这个门晚上关的挺早的,所以,晚上到的话,就得着另一个门也是正门,这个正门离刚才说的门有大约2-3分钟的路程,就是沿着大厦走,就可以找到｡大厦的安全性还是可以的,门口都有保安,晚上会有登记政策方可入内｡第一晚去的时候,由于酒店里没有写WiFi和密码,所以,第一晚就过着没有WiFi的日子｡所以,建议房东,还是讲WiFi写在大家都能看到的地方,这样比较方便｡这个价格我是满意的,毕竟地理位置这么优越的地方｡
Clean and safe. Very convenience

Room is as described, very small with seated toilet and shower and new aircon and fast wifi.  Adequate for solo traveller who is budget conscious.  TST is great location to stay in and Metro entrance is just downstairs, many bus stops near by and ferry terminal within 10 mins walking distance.  Recommend future visitors to go across the road and check out the lovely Kowloon park.  It has swimming pool, bird aviary and MacDonald offering nice coffee and breakfast.  Great place for breakfast and a relief from the pace and crowd of TST.  All in all, this accommodation is good value for the budget traveller.

房東人很親切, 房間有點小, 但設備還ok, 算符合性價比
地理位置很棒, 在尖沙嘴站一出來就是了, 樓下有小熊餅乾, 對要買的人來說很方便.
房間很小 沒有窗戶 有點霉味 但還算乾淨 地點很好 就在尖沙嘴地鐵旁的美麗都大廈 自治checkin 很方便
房間太小
交通便利｡就是第一天晚上到 大厦门前很多印度人有些怕 !但屋子是安全的｡

숙소때문에 힘든 여행이었습니다. 제가 예약한 1인실은 곰팡이냄새가 너무 심했고 이불은 축축하고 깨끗하지 못했습니다. 5일을 예약했는데 도저히 참을수가 없어 방을 바꿔달라해서 하루 맞은편에 위치한 방으로 바꿨는데 그 방은 그나마 환기도 되고 괜찮았습니다. 호스트 샘은 친절했지만 숙소때문에 최악의 여행이 되었네요.. 위치는 좋지만 여자혼자묵기에는 너무 무서웠던 건물이었네요.

房子位置超级好,楼下就是珍妮饼干,对面就是翠花餐厅｡只是美丽都大厦有些旧,住的人五花八门,但个人觉得安全什么的也没那么不好｡
房东很贴心,房间专门放置了转换插头,可以不用自己带｡房间是真心小,那也是没办法的,胜在干净整洁,赞一个
下次过去准备带宝宝一起,还住sam家

This is the second time I've stayed at one of Sam's places. The experience is fantastic with his super efficient system. Rock up at the door, follow the instructions, call his number, get the door code, go in, and you'll find a small but very clean and modern room with a heart warming theme and ensuite, hot water, great wifi, everything you need (just remember to bring a towel!). Will be back again and again!
everything was fine, but there was no towel and bathroom is extremely tiny
不錯,地點很方便
房子很不错,位置很好,购物方便
Clean and convenient. Quick response.

The place is very conveniently located but it's a bit dangerous late at night as the whole building has a lot of guest inns etc,overall the room is really small but still functional and clean for a reasonable price :D
地段好  价格便宜
还不错｡虽然地方有点小,但是算是很不错的订房体验｡交通非常便利,附近很多餐馆和商场｡
房間小了點!沒有鏡子不太方便!地點非常不錯!
很棒~还会再来!
Sam的小屋是个很方便的地方,下了飞机,机场大巴N21可以直达,N21是24小时所以早上早起赶飞机也很方便,住的地方就在地铁站口,轻松玩转油尖旺｡好多地方步行过去也用了多久｡真的是个很好的住宿地点｡
很容易找,房东和阿姨的态度都非常好,价格合理,非常适合暂住一两天且要求不太高的朋友,也很整洁｡WiFi超快,下次应该还会选择这里｡

在香港这样的地方,有个住的地方就行,挺好的!
PS:
1.这里需要自己带毛巾和除了沐浴露之外的所有洗漱用品｡
2.地铁出口没有大楼入口的,其它3面都有,叫美丽都大厦,门口很小,可以节约出尽量多的商铺,可以理解,就是太难找了!
3.一定要开个香港日套餐,要打电话给房东确认你的楼层和门牌号码,到了门口就可以用门框上的电话联系他要密码开门,自助入住,临时离开时一定要带房卡,用来开大门口的密码锁的｡
4.亮点就是周围真的很方便,走路到维多利亚港都只需要10分钟,周围的商场和餐厅也是各种丰富｡
5.总体来说不好不坏,考虑到在香港,性价比还不错的｡
房间离地铁很近,周围有很多景点可以逛,超级方便
房间很精致,很干净交通也很方便唯一不足就是热水器不热和没有镜子很不方便
環境很好很舒適 房東很熱情 一次很好的寄宿體驗 留下了美好的回憶~
房東會回訊息,但有時候比較慢,像是我第一天找不到樓層及號碼,傳了 (Hidden by Airbnb) ,等了很久才有人回,不過還是有得到答案｡房間內沒有鏡子很可惜,不然我就給滿分了｡
房间地理位置没得说｡下楼就是尖沙嘴最繁华的地方,楼下就是珍妮曲奇,地铁站,步行到维港只要10分钟｡周围购物食物应有尽有｡房间虽然很小,但是布置得很用心｡最关键的是很卫生｡床单被罩都很整洁｡卫生间也很干净｡总之住得很舒服,很便利｡很满意!谢谢房东!
the room is small, the blanket and sheet was wet.  so so for the value
地理位置很好,购物什么的也是很方便的!

位置很方便,房間小而溫馨｡
房間位置靠門,隔音普通,早上會聽到外面打掃的聲音｡
房間偶較潮濕,靠近門的地板會有小水灘｡
整體算是經濟實惠,下次來還會考慮住這!!!

Room was very cute ! But kinda small , don't bring over a too big luggage cause you wont have enough space to move around , but its hongkong so yea... Location is superb and overall everything is pretty good and nice !
房間位置很好找,只是可能等阿姨安排住房要等久一點｡而且我房間廁所的水龍頭還是壞的,只能用花灑不太方便｡附近交通很便利,去The one,海港城等大商場都很方便,走路即可到達｡晚上走路去吃個一蘭拉麵也沒有問題,附近有很多可逛的地方還有美食,去之前可以做好攻略｡
虽然很小,但是都很方便,不错的地方,第二次入住了,非常方便,性价比高
Nice area, perfect for traveling alone
ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝが電話越しで分かりづらいです｡部屋は写真の通りですがｺﾞｷﾌﾞﾘが何匹かいました｡ｼｰﾂの交換や清掃がないので清潔さを求める方にはｵｽｽﾒできません｡Wi-Fiはそこそこ快適に利用できました｡

Location quite good and convenient,nearby mrt,ferry pier and bus station to/from airport. Room cum with private bathroom without window, ventilation not so good and smelly. Sam quite nice,contactable and very helpful when I not able to find the exact location.
房间细但比较整洁,适合临时住宿｡
great!
Location was good! But would suggest having bathroom mats because the small area outside the bathroom which is the only area of the room is always wet after a shower. Overall was okay.

Felt cheated since not informed of electric outage, place is dirty, shower scalded me a few times, got bitten by bugs. MTR is very near but u got to climb 2 stories up which may not be ideal if u traveling with luggage.
If you like your Airbnb location to be right in the middle of the city so you can be out and about, this is the perfect place for uou. It's practical, cozy and clean.
便宜､該有的都有
第二次入住了!很好的位置,房间小了一些,但是一个人住足够啦^_^
房间是真的小,来之前都想象不到;但是真的五脏俱全,住起来还挺方便,在此之前都不知道原来一个人生活只需要这么小的地方就够了｡位置也是绝佳很方便,感觉比重庆大厦好点,毕竟楼下没那么多群聚的老外｡总的来说挺好的
位置很方便  出了地铁就可以找到   对面就是商场   (Hidden by Airbnb) 都方便   房东人也很好
The location is good. Dont forget to bring your own shampoo, shower cream and towel. The host never reply my msg and I dont know why.
位置很好,下楼就是尖沙咀地铁口｡就是比较小,没有窗,想想在香港应该正常吧｡
非常方便尖沙咀D出口出来就是大厦入口,适合临时居住
位置好找,附近地理位置便民,房东友好讲解详细,房间小,床被没那么舒适赶紧,不通风,有异味
位置好,去哪都方便
The room is really small,but everything you want they'll offer,and the room smell bad.but the landlord is very kind and nice…
Great cheap place to stay, small and cozy with your own bathroom and fast wifi. The best location in Hong Kong. I didnt have any problems checking in or out. Bring your own towel and enjoy the city!

还是不错的
比较干净
这个价格的话 很合算了
在市中心  就是隔音效果不是很好
对于独身的过客来说还不错,旅游住的话实在有点小
麻雀虽小五脏俱全,地理位置好
房间没有窗,但是住过这么多间店都最起码有排气扇,这间没有,进去很大的味道｡最不能忍是床单没有换过,同样价位可以住得更舒服其实,我觉得房间大小不是问题,卫生问题最不能接受,一整晚基本没睡好
没有窗户,空气有点浑浊,热水器有时候忽冷忽热,与其他住客隔音效果不好｡但一个人住一晚上还是可以接受的｡

我预定了23号到26号的房,全额付款｡可23号香港台风波及了深圳广州,从广州到深圳的所有路线都没办法出行｡我联系房东,退房,少收些房租或者变更到后面几天,可是房东二话不说,理由坚定,不退不改,不退一分钱｡
这样做生意的,真是让人郁闷…………天灾人祸,也低档不住房东的赚钱之心……｡以后大家定房,要注意了…………………………｡
离重庆大

有點潮濕,但整體還不錯
交通非常方便,之後還會想再住
小了一點!但是很適合一個人小小休息的地方!因為沒有窗戶所以有點不太通風!但整體還可以!熱水器也很快就有熱水了!

it's so small and no one will assist you upon check in. this place has a makeship reception, yet it's closed and no one seems to be available to estimate the guests. to no avail of Sam or her staff when I arrived late at night, though she's informed about that, i ended up occupying a two-bed cramped room because it was the only room that's open when i checked in. so i supposed, this was my reserved room. to my chagrin when I checked out, she's freaking mad as if it's indeed my fault that I stayed in a room not meant for me. what's very disapponting was she charged me HK$200. this place and the owner were terrible.
照片拍摄和实际不符,房间只能放下一张床,通风不好,床上用品都是湿润的!
Not good for old peoples
Good value for the money. Room is small with no window, smell a little bit due to the moisture. But all is expected and the location and the price is very attractive so I am satisfied with the room.
Small but really central. Quiet in the night. Good value for money.

地點真的很棒 一出去就是地鐵站
但因爲是尖沙咀熱鬧的地方
所以附近的環境會比較複雜
沒有附吹風機 女生可能要自己帶
Good price, Good location
地點很好,就在地鉄旁,Sam也很好人,一有問題,馬上回覆

Sam's place is perfect for your economical stay in Hongkong.
Great location and great value for your money.
就 被子感觉不是很舒适 霉味重 差点睡不着  拖鞋也很旧不敢穿  就放得下一张床的空间 空调声音蛮大的 花洒卡位是坏的 洗头会不方便  下次还是住贵点的吧

The place is quite small. The wall has a little bit of dirt on it and some the paint is peeling off. It smells a little old but the place in general is clean enough to live. The host doesn't really respond to text so just call him instead. It's also in a great location, in the middle of everything but it is quite pricey for how small the place is.

Pick this place for the location! It is extremely close to the MTR and the harbour, there are nice restaurants and cafes in the area, and the building feels relatively safe with night guards and such. It is really good value compared to other places that are located that centrally in HK. Also, my tiny room had its own tiny toilet and shower. 
However, if you’re planning to stay for a bit longer than a night or two, you might want to pay a little more and stay somewhere nicer, as there was  no window and it felt slightly claustrophobic at times. Also, the room I stayed in had moldy walls, which concerned me as I was staying for several nights (but otherwise clean!).

name: Kailua Kona Village Breeze Condo
summary: Come and enjoy the view of Kailua Kona Sunrise over Hualalai Mt or relax on our Lanai (porch) enjoying the cool breeze and sunsets over Kailua Kona Bay. Our 1/1 has a shower with tub, full kitchen, living area and A/C. Parking is also included.
description: Come and enjoy the view of Kailua Kona Sunrise over Hualalai Mt or relax on our Lanai (porch) enjoying the cool breeze and sunsets over Kailua Kona Bay. Our 1/1 has a shower with tub, full kitchen, living area and A/C. Parking is also included. We strive to make your stay in our home casual and comfortable. If there is something you need, please give us a call. We are only a few minutes away and will do our best to remedy or help you find what you are looking for. There are many exciting things to do for those interested in water activities such as scuba diving, night snorkeling with Manta Rays, parasailing, Fishing, swimming with the dolphins or just relaxing on the beach. If you want to experience the true beauty of Hawaii try out one of the many tours available. There is Lava watching, horseback riding, Big Island ATV tours, zip lining through the forest or hiking up to the waterfalls. And don’t forget the experience of a lifetime watching the sunset and stargazing from the summit o
neighborhood_overview: There are many exciting things to do for those interested in water activities such as scuba diving, night snorkeling with Manta Rays, parasailing, Fishing, swimming with the dolphins or just relaxing on the beach. If you want to experience the true beauty of Hawaii try out one of the many tours available. There is Lava watching, horseback riding, Big Island ATV tours, zip lining through the forest or hiking up to the waterfalls. And don’t forget the experience of a lifetime watching the sunset and stargazing from the summit of Mauna Kea. There are many restaurants within walking distance from the condo. Try out the seafood at Bubba Gump’s across the street, Splashers grill, Umekes for fresh ‘Poke bowls”, Huggos On the Rocks for local favorite foods, drinks, live music and a seaside sunset. Looking to eat in? The KTA supermarket has many local goods and produce. There is also a Wal-Mart not far from here as well as a Longs Drug store. Don’t forget the farmers market for locally grown ve
transit: Hele-On is the primary provider of mass transportation in Hawaii County, Hawaii. Bus fare is $2.00 per ride, $15 for 10 rides, and $60 for 1 month of unlimited rides. Students, seniors and disabled persons can ride for $1.00.  All buses are accessible to seniors and persons with disabilities and those with mobility devices.  you can find the maps and schedules at: (URL HIDDEN)
interaction: We strive to make your stay in our home casual and comfortable. If there is something you need, please give us a call. We are only a few minutes away and will do our best to remedy or help you find what you are looking for.
house_rules: 1. Please do not run the air conditioner with the doors and windows open. Close doors, and windows for the unit to operate efficiently. 2. The coin operated washers and dryers are on the ground floor to the left as you exit the elevators. Please be sure to empty the lint traps on the dryers after each use. 3. Feel free to use any laundry and cleaning products, cooking and food products that are in the condo. 4. No Parties 5. Please do not smoke in our home. Smoking is only permitted on the lawn downstairs in the smoking area to the left of the building. 6. Please follow Hawaii custom and do not wear shoes inside. 7. There is free Wifi for your use 8. There is no BBQ allowed on the lanais. There is a BBQ area for your use located in the pool area at the side of the building. 9. Be sure to lock up the unit before you leave for the day. Be careful with the sliding door lock; make sure the locking lever is in the up position (unlocked) when on the lanai and in the down position (locked) wh

host.host_about:
Aloha!
My name is Alethea;  I was raised in the Hawaiian Islands and have raised my own family here as well.  I am a retiree of the post office and enjoy outrigger canoeing with my Kai o pua canoe club and hula dancing.

reviews.comments: Cute cosy Appartment close to everything - we loved it with its lovely pineapple and palmtree decorations, all very clean and new condition - perfect for honeymooners

Alethea and her daughter Lena were excellent hosts for my trip. They were super flexible with my TBD timings and were quite prompt in most responses. The unit was even better than expected, and Lena took the time to not only point everything out, but to have stocked the fridge with some yogurt and beer, in addition to the Kona coffee available to us.

The location of the unit is superb (walking to many great restaurants and a short drive to everywhere). I would highly recommend staying with Alethea.

Alethea's place was great!

Despite our late arrival we were warmly welcomed by her and her grandson and shown how everything works. 

The condo is clean, light, nicely furnished and really well located for breakfast spots, farmers market restaurants and beaches. 

Alethea made everything super easy and we would have no hesitation in returning.

Someone met us at the condo with the keys exactly when agreed upon time. Gave us tour around condo getting us acclimated. Condo was very nice, even better than pictures. Neighborhood was nice walking distance to numerous restaurants and bars. Pool was small but nice. It was just about a 5 minute walk to the beach. It is the perfect location for amenities and activities. Thank you Alethea and Family for a great stay.

Great place to stay in Kailua-Kona. In walking distance to everything nearby and a nice view on the ocean. The apartment is well equipped. Alethea greeted us and provided helpful information about the area. Would definitely stay here again.

This trip to Hawaii was our first one.  Alethea's condo was the perfect home away from home.  It was clean, comfortable, very centrally located with a great view.  We made several trips to the farmer's market in the church's parking and got to enjoy and discover local fruits.  Most things in "downtown" Kona was within walking distance.  The included parking was a great perk, too.  We never had to look for a spot when we did take the car.
Alethea couldn't meet with us, but made sure we were welcomed in person.  This was really appreciated.

Alethea is a great host.  I would definitely stay there again.
Great place to stay in the middle of Kona. Walkable. Very clean. Alethea was a great host.

We had a great stay here in Kona. The unit was very nice, spacious for two people. Location was great and within walking distance of many stores, restaurants and activities. Thand for a wonderful stay!

We had an incredible experience at Alethea's hale in Kailua-Kona! The view is breathtaking and the condo was spotless. The furnishings were very tasteful and clean, we loved the palm tree, pineapple theme. We would recommend this space to anybody wanting easy, close, access to downtown in a clean, safe, beautiful hale! Mahalo Alethea!
Really great place. Lanai has two chairs perfect for viewing the sunset.  Walking distance from a lot of restaurants and the beach.

My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay! The building was quiet, and unassuming from the outside. The apartment was lovely - clean and modern, with a nice porch facing the ocean! It was quiet to sleep, and had everything we needed to cook and enjoy coffee in the morning. It was a quick walk to Ali'i Dr. and to the trolley, and both Alethea and her son were very helpful!

This place was absolutely amazing. Unfortunately, my wife and I weren't able to meet with Alethea, but her daughter was there to greet us. She made us feel completely comfortable and welcomed. Alethea has literally anything you could possibly need during your stay and gave us access to it all. The patio has a wonderful view and is literally around the corner from Ali'i Drive (popular venue), farmer's market, and the ocean. I couldn't have picked a better place to stay and for a better price. I would definitely stay here again and would highly recommend this condo. 

Oh, and not to forget, she even gave us coupons to a really great local restaurant. Loved it!
A very nice condo in a wonderful location! Everything was very clean and well stocked. Plus, the view was fantastic!

Perfect! We were island hopping and spending many nights in a hotel.  I wanted a home with a kitchen, and Alethea's home was perfect.  The condo was comfortable and clean, the view was relaxing, the communication with Alethea and family was easy, the building was in a great location, and there was a washer and dryer, which was a plus!

Alethea is a great host.  Her place is in a very convenient location-- close to the Kona airport, walking distance to the shoreline, restaurants, and a short drive to multiple tour operators.  We loved the location and enjoyed checking out the farmers market that’s right there in the church parking lot.  The place was very clean with a nice breeze, and was fully stocked with beach and bath towels and all the kitchen amenities. You can see the ocean off the porch and you have a view of the mountain out the front door.  Alethea said to call if we needed anything at all.  I was not expecting to need to call her, but when checking out I accidentally locked my iPod inside.  She was over in a matter of minutes.  We would stay here again. Great cozy place.

A real good property to rent. We were more interested in finding a new beach everyday than sitting around a resort pool and this was perfect for us. 
The view is great and the elevator to get you to the sixth floor was a nice extra as well as the fridge ice maker. 
Communications with Alethea was seemless. 
We' stay here again.

We were very pleased with Alethea's condo. It was really clean and the full kitchen was nice. Lots of cool breezes from both sides plus ceiling fans kept things nice and cool. Also the added security of having to use a key to enter the elavator was nice too. We would definitely stay here again next time we go to Kona.

We love this condo very much! It has a perfect view, close to the beach and all the good places in Kona. Alethea makes it a sweet home for travellers. Next time we will choose the condo for a longer vacation.

We had a great stay at the condo right in Kailua Kona area, I highly recommend this condo. Great for one person or a couple. Some a great things. 1) IT'S CLEAN! yay! and they include the cleaning in your payment, no extra cleaning fee. 2) SAFE, even the building elevator has a key. 3) Tenants are quiet and mostly retired people. 

It's near the main street, so a little street noise, but that dies down by 9 or 10pm. Great view of the beach. Walk 2 blocks to the beach and main tourist area. Building also has onsite manager and coin laundry. Really nice stay! Thank you Alethea.

We had a great stay in Althea's condo. We found the condo to be clean, spacious, and nicely located. There is a Farmer's Market close by. We made daily treks for their sweet papayas. The condo is also within walking distance to shopping, restaurants, and the beach. It also was nice having a numbered parking space for our car.  

Althea was friendly and flexible. We checked in at 6pm and she waited for us outside the condo to help orient us to the surrounding area as well as the condo.  Thanks, Althea!

I had a very comfortable stay in Alethea's place; it was really well-equipped for all my needs.  Strong wifi, comfy bed, a great shower, a good kitchen, beach towels,  a balcony to enjoy my morning coffee, and my own parking spot.  It's just a short walk to the village/waterfront shops and restaurants, too.

A wonderful, clean, fully furnished and accessorized condo! There's a great view from the balcony, and it's easily walkable to restaurants and the beach. A dedicated parking space is a nice bonus. Highly recommended.

The pictures don't do this place juctice. The apartment is bright, and airy, with more than enough room for two people. Located right in the heart of Kailua Kona, it also makes for a great base camp to explore the west side of the island. Alethea was a wonderful host. She worked around our schedule and showed us around the place.

This was a perfect stay. Alethea met us as we arrived and made us feel very welcome. She also checke din with us after we left to make sure everything was good. Really really sweet and attending to details. The place was really great, and had everything we needed. The shower is great!! And the location is prime- close to the airport and walking distance to a bunch of adventures on the main beach strip. Really great stay, highly recommend!

Alethea s'est montrée disponible et accueillante, et s'est adaptée à notre emploi du temps qui nous a fait arriver plus tôt que prévu.
L'appartement est charmant et bien équipé et la vue sur l'océan est magnifique. Il est idéalement situé au coeur de Kona et de ses restaurants et boutiques. Nous avons pu faire plein de choses à pied, sans parler du marché juste en bas de l'immeuble.

It's was great. I was mostly excited about food. Island Ono Loa Grill has a great hot dog, 808 Grindz Cafe which the breakfast sandwich was so good, Scandinavian Shave Ice on Ali'i drive was good, Bongo Ben's was underwhelming, we drove out to Hapuna and had delicious snacks from Island Naturals and poke from KTA and Kona Brewing was the best meal and beer we had there!?! We also enjoyed beverages on the lanai and watched the sun go down. There was a cooler, beach bag, mat and beach towels which were great for our beach trip. Loved the stay. Simple clean up instruction.

Best location! Everything that you need is close to the condo. Very clean and safe. Full kitchen. Easy communication. Definitely will stay here again when i return to Kona! And have a special bonus: amazing view!

Overall experience was awesome, Alethea was a fantastic warm host the location was perfect, and really clean and had a comfy bed which was great after alot of travel just a short walk to the shops and ever important bars & restaurants for a thirsty hurgy Kiwi

My husband and I spent two weeks in Hawaii for our honeymoon. We are also experienced users of Airbnb services, and this was one of the best experience we've had. The condo is the cutest thing and perfect if you want to cook and save some food money. It is exactly where you want to be: central enough that you can walk to everything (except a real grocery store), but not on the main street so the noise doesn't bother you at night. Everything was  working perfectly. Alethea was  also a great, nice, relax and easy-going hostess. She even came back after we checked-in to bring us a laundry basket because we told her we might want to do some! She  also provides detergent. We  spent 2 nights at the condo, but if  I ever go back to Kona, I would love to stay there for a week, it's so cozy!!

Really lovely condo, with lots of attention to detail in the decor and amenities. There is literally everything a guest could want or need, short the swimsuit! Beautifully decorated, extremely clean with very comfy bed. Kitchen was very nice, with everything you need for cooking. The location is perfect, within walking distance of of Alii Drive, with an amazing ocean view. Assigned parking included. Alethea is a great host, key drop off was easy and she had good tips on surrounding restaurants and activities. Do yourself a favor and stay here. We were very sorry to leave!

We had a wonderful time in Kona! We were on our honeymoon.  Our host was only there to greet us when we arrived but she was very generous in giving us suggestions and offering for us to use any of the food or supplies in the apartment. The apartment is very very clean and easy to get to many things from. We would absolutely stay there again.
Super clean condo close enough to excitement but calm enough for a great sleep

Aletheas condo has a very good location. We can go by feet to the beach, the shopping areas and the restaurants. We enyoed sensational sunset at the condo. Thanks for the good informations about the location and for the nice receiving. We had a very good time in Kona and Aletheas condo.

Alethea is an amazing host - incredibly nice and welcoming, and she gave us tips for local events happening during our stay. The apartment is beautiful, with a small lanai (balcony) overlooking the ocean and "downtown," and it's just a block from the farmer's market. It's well-maintained and very comfortable, with ceiling fans in addition to the AC. The building is quiet and mostly retirees, so best to choose another location if you're interested in having a loud party. Kind and helpful folks at every turn. Highly recommended!

VERY VERY accommodating and exceptionally helpful.  The place is spotless clean, the owner went above and beyond to assist me when I was arriving for a surprise visit to see family.  

I could write a long drawn out review, but the bottom line is this place was EXCELLENT!

Super clean!  Her condo is spacious and she does such a great job cleaning it and making it comfortable. There are lots of clean towels and toiletries. I did accidentally lock myself out on her balcony (don't slam the balcony door or it will lock automatically!!) but she got to the condo in like 10 minutes and freed me. Overall, very highly recommended.

Alethea's apartment is fantastic. The lanai overlooks the coast, making for beautiful and relaxing sunsets; the kitchen is well stocked and equipped; the bed is so cosy with fan and AC; and only a short walk from the beach and restaurants.  Overall, the whole place is like home. This was our favourite place to stay in our whole trip. Alethea is a kind and thoughtful host, instantly contacting us with assistance when inclement weather was heading our way.

The condo is in a great walkable location in Kona. It is a roomy condo with a great ocean view. We were very comfortable there. Alethea was a great host meeting us later than originally scheduled due to our flight delay. She even had a snack waiting for us since many of the restaurants stopped serving food by the time we got into town. Overall a great condo and host.

Alethea has been a great host, she took great care of us. 
She left handwritten recommendation for restaurants and tours, and asked us if we needed anything special..coffee, food for our arrival.
She is gracious and thoughtful.
The condo location, size and view were perfect.

Mahalo

Appartamento molto spazioso. Comoda la possibilità di usufruire (a pagamento 3$) di lavatrice e asciugatrice nella lavanderia del condominio. In dotazione abbiamo trovato anche lo smacchiante che si è rivelato molto utile. Il posto auto è riservato all'appartamento e  quindi sempre libero. Molto veloce nelle risposte via email. Posizione comoda per raggiungere a piedi i ristoranti della zona.

Awesome condo. Great location, convenient to downtown Kona, clean and great sunsets. 
Yes we will be looking up Alethea again when we go back!!!.
Thank you for being a great host Alethea.
Aloha, Mike

Our stay in Kailua Kona couldn't have been better.  Alethea was a fantastic host--she was super friendly and accommodating, and she obviously wanted to make sure we had everything we needed for a great stay.  

The condo was great--it was comfortable, outfitted with everything we possibly could have needed, and just had a welcoming vibe to it.  The view from the balcony was incredible (many cups of coffee and happy hour beverages were enjoyed there!)  The location couldn't have been more convenient.  We were able to walk to dining and shopping, but we were also easily able to jump on the highway when we desired.

All in all a great stay.  Only wish we could have stayed longer!!
Althea graciously let us check in early because our flight arrived several hours before normal check in time.  Her place was wonderful, walking distance to Humpy’s and other great local spots.

Would stay here again! Great location in Kona, felt very welcome and at home in this condo! It was clean and I appreciated the little details like making sure there was coffee and coffee filters! (Surprisingly I stayed at five air bnb's and while this was the least expensive AirBnB, it was the -only- place that had all the things we would need! The others all had small issues. This was the -only- Hawaii AirBnB that didn't have any hiccups.) 

I decided to stay here based on the positive reviews and highly recommend it myself! Thanks for making our stay great. :)

Zero complaints. Walking distance to downtown Kona and pineapple/palm-tree decorations that will boost your vacation mood. Alethea was very welcoming and helpful (thanks!). If only we could have stayed 2 weeks instead of 2 nights...
Nice, private, and spacious place with a good view! Farmer's market nearby, and walkable to the water front. Close to shops and you'll have your own dedicated parking too.

We had a short, but lovely stay in Kona! The location was perfect and the unit had everything we could possibly need. It was very clean and comfortable. Alethea was great, and graciously greeted us upon arrival.
Good location, the place is very homie and comfortable,the host is friendly and helpful
Nice place

Alethea was very responsive and made us feel very welcome on arrival. The apartment is relatively central and everything in central Kona is a walk away ... market, places to eat, shops. I really enjoyed staying and would recommend.

This place is THE best value in Kailua-Kona - full kitchen, full bath, super cold AC, no bugs, ocean view from the lanai, and walk score of 10 out of 10. I would recommend this place to a couple or even a group up to 4 (also a full size futon), and hope to stay here again. Thanks, Alethea!

We loved staying at Alethea's condo.  She is a wonderful host!  She was always quick to respond from the start of our communications.  Her condo is in a great location in Kailua-Kona, within easy walking distance of all the downtown restaurants and attractions.  The condo is very clean and tidy and by far, the best equipped Airbnb property we have ever stayed at.  Alethea has thought of every little amenity you could possibly desire.  The building is a well run property with a reserved parking space.  We would recommend this listing to anyone and will come back again!
Great place in a centrally located apartment building in Kona!
It was a very clean and spacious room. It is in a convenient place and you can spend comfortably. I want to stay again when going to Kailua-Kona.

What a gem! This place was so close to Ali'i drive that you could see it and the ocean, yet not have to deal with the traffic of staying on ali'i drive! You can walk to the hustle and bustle but with a guaranteed parking spot, you can get in and out quickly for your adventure! The apartment is clean, perfect sized, and well equipped. The hostess was friendly, accommodating, and has forgotten nothing. I would absolutely stay here again when in the area. My only negative is that I'm a pillow person, so could have done with newer/more pillow options! A minor thing! This was way better than I even hoped for!

This is an excellent location and the view of the ocean is beautiful from the 6th floor balcony. Every amenity is available, great home away from home. Alii Drive is one block away - shops, restaurants, market and spectacular scenery along the coastline.  We would definitely stay here again!

Close to so much--ocean,restaurants, farmers market and shopping.  There is a lot of things to do within walking distance. Free parking on premises. We loved being able to hear the ocean off in the distance. Well appointed with all the comforts of home away from home. Wish we had stayed longer.
Aretha's unit is centrally located, cozy with a comfortable bed.  Just what we were looking for !
Great location, on-site parking and fully stocked apartment. Felt like home away from home

Althea was a good host and was flexible on our arrival time. She was attentive and communicates well. The apartment is on on the 6th floor so you get a good view of the ocean with the church steeple in the foreground. Beautiful sunsets. Really close to farmers market and the hub of the little town so a perfect place if you want to walk around a lot. No beaches in immediate area however so know that you do need a car.
We loved staying here! Alethea's place had everything we needed. The location is great, very clean and comfortable.
Aretha's condo in Kona was just what we were looking for - close to the ocean, shops, restaurants and more! It had everything we needed as well as free parking on location.  Great stay!

If you are looking for a central place to stay, then look no further.  We stayed here for 3 nights while in Kona and it was an exceptional experience.  I enjoyed greeting each day with a cup of coffee sitting on the balcony looking out at the ocean.  The condo was spotless and contained everything we needed including a cooler, bamboo mat for the beach and much more.  The kitchen had all the essentials.  You can tell that the owner cares about providing a nice home away from home and was quick to respond to any questions or help requested.  There is a designated parking spot, a secure elevator and coin operated (very nice) laundry on premise.  We would stay here again in a heartbeat.

This was our first Airbnb experience, and it could not have been better.  Athena's condo was spacious, tastefully furnished -- and  spotlessly clean! She also had clearly spent time and effort in making guests were comfortable, from thick towels, shampoo and lotions, to a picnic cooler and first aid kit. She also had an extensive collection of menus in a binder to help guests who left her well-furnished kitchen, to eat out. The location was convenient yet quiet, and the lovely ocean view was even better than shown in the pictures. And while we didn't need to call on her, she was just minutes away if we need anything.  Thank you, Athena, for such a great introduction to Airbnb.

The perfect location in an apartment building that legally accommodates about 50% STVR's so you are in competent hands. Fabulous dozing off to the sound of the waves but bring ear-plugs for middle of the night garbage collection and leaf blowers or close the windows.
The apartment is a perfect short term size with everything you could need to enjoy time off - on the 5th floor so great views to boot. Very comfy bed with lots of cushions, great water pressure in the shower and fans to move the air around. Definitely well recommended.
Alethea's condo is right in the heart of Kona. It was the perfect spot to round off our trip. It was in fact, our favourite place to stay during our trip to the big island. 5 stars all day long.

Good location, great sunset views and walking distance to beaches, restaurants and shopping. Be prepared for late night/early am town noises like garbage trucks, church activity and restaurant live music entertainment. We loved it
Easy to get to and convenient location in Kona.  Awesome views and has everything one would need for a short or long stay in town.
Great location and great host!

Although location is good, communication and instructions with the host were very poor to the point of ruining our stay. First of all, fridge wasn't cleaned up properly and we were surprised to see open used egg shells in the fridge (makes you wonder what else wasn't cleaned?) She was having issues with the hot water, and simply texted us to turn a switch on (without explaining where it was) and wait 10 minutes. We finally found it and waited and it didn't work, NO HOT WATER. We immediately contacted her inquiring about the switch and letting her know it wasn't working, and had no response until after we checked out with just saying "sorry, yes that was the right switch", we had to shower with COLD water for three days, we didn't pay what we paid for cold water showers, that was a total scam and she was very uncooperative (from very quick responses during check in process to complete radio salience once we raised the hot water issue) and rejected any request for refund despite acknowledging that she didnt provide us with hot water. Honestly, save yourselves the risk of staying with this host.
Приятная хозяйка, хорошее и чистое место, отлично оборудованная кухня. Во время нашего визита были проблемы с горячей водой.

The home was clean and convenient to shops and restaurants just as described. Alethea was very accommodating and check in and check out went very smoothly. The dedicated parking spot was super helpful. Some rentals have water sports items included like body boards so that would be nice there were goggles for snorkeling but there is a place that rents the whole get up (goggles, tubes and fins) inexpensively down the road. The only slight negative is that I found the bed a little uncomfortable and cramped for two people. The stay over all was wonderful though.

The host was accommodating in my time of arrival. This is a nice condo with an amazing ocean view and very centrally located.   The bed was also comfortable and it was peaceful hearing the waves at night.

Alethea's apartment is immaculate and well stocked. You could easily cook meals there, but we walked the 2 blocks to shopping and restaurant district. Incredible view from the balcony. Also, our flight was delayed 8 hours causing us to get into Kona very late. Alethea communicated with us the whole time and had a lockbox waiting for us. I would absolutely recommend Alethea's!

Alethea's condo was terrific for our trip. My wife and I stayed 8 nights here! It is within walking distance to the shore line and all the shops and restaurants. 

Everything we needed for the trip was available extra towels, beach towels, beach chairs, a snorkel set. Also having a set parking spot is really convenient everyday when coming back. 

It provides a great view as well, wondering sunrises and sunsets. Would recommended to anyone.

Alethea's place was super close to everything we wanted to see and do! Just off the main drag, so it's quiet, but very walkable. You can see the farmers market from the lanai! The neighbors are super friendly too. Highly recommend!
This is a wonderful place to stay in Kona.  Highly  recommended.
Alethea's place was central in Kona, clean and the perfect size for two people… It was a great visit!
Great place to stay on the big island!
Aletha's place was awesome. Close to restaurants and the beach. Clean and we were personally greated by Aletha who gave us a tour of the apartment . Def recommend this place!

We really enjoyed our stay -- the condo actually had a well-stocked kitchen so we only had to buy fresh food. Location was great for downtown Kona as well as touring the island. Alethea also helped me arrange a make-up appointment for the wedding I was attending. The price was right after finding out what others were paying for hotels!

Alethea was an absolutely wonderful  host, and the condo was spectacular. It was clean, had a great balcony, it was close to the local shops and main strip, and every amenity you could need - from beach towels and snorkels to sunscreen and laundry - was included. We hope to stay at her fantastic place again in the future. Mahalo!!
Clean, comfortable, AC worked great.

We had a great time here. Very close to downtown - we walked most of the time. Alethea gave us detailed instructions on how to get in and left some yummy snacks for us. The space is open and comfortable. Great place!

Location is great! So is the view. 

Keep in mind if you're here on a Saturday night, church bells ring at 6:45am on Sunday. 

Bedding and towels were clean. 

Alethea was a great host. We'd revisit again if she'll have us. :)

This place is in an awesome location close to the heart of downtown Kona. Everything is within walking distance, which comes in handy since parking is tight in the downtown. When you see the pic of the church in the photos, you can use that as the landmark for where this place is located. Our host, Althea, was very accommodating on our late check-in and made it easy for us. The building has ample laundry facilities, which was also key for us so we could pack light for an extended trip. Security is great as well, as the elevators are keyed.

Great stay at Alethea's place for 2 nights. Easy access off main road (we easily found on the dark), great parking, good instructions for access to apartment and great location. Very well equipped and much appreciated little extras, such as water, sun cream (if needed) , maps and advice on what to do/see and some wine. 
We were there for early church on a Sunday...bells were ringing but only for 30 seconds, not a problem at all.
Our main reason for visiting Kona was to experience the manta night dive...well worth it, what a wonderful trip we had.

Alethea's condo is a great place to stay.  Very comfortable and has a great view (church, coastline, farmer's market, sunsets) from the lanai.  Lots of amenities - even a pair of binoculars hanging on the lanai for your use.  Conveniently located to downtown Kona area so you can leave your car parked at the condo and walk around the town and along the beaches.  It was very quiet while I was there - only heard the church bells on Sunday morning.  Within easy driving distances north and south to historical and cultural places as well as beautiful beaches.  It was easy to find and check in.  Alethea kept in touch with text messages.  Loved the location and my stay.   Would definitely stay again.

Everything at Alethea's place was as pictured.  The location is extremely convenient to the main dining and shopping area in Kona, so we walked to most places.  The cute space is conveniently stocked with essentials and clean and neat and communication with Alethea made the trip easy to navigate!  I would recommend her place for a stay in Kona.
Great place ! Very cute island decor, matches well with the environment. Comfortable beds and pillows. Short walk to stores and shops.
Althea is really really really a nice person and the appartment is as good as it looks in the pictures. The condo Is placed in a good position, near the sea and many shops for everything you need.

En ville et à distance de marche des restos, boutiques, boardwalk avec un balcon agréable et  une belle vue sur l'océan. l'appartement est idéale pour un couple et la déco est kitsh mais charmante.  Bien insonorisé.  La piscine est petite est sans grand charme mais nous l'avions toujours juste pour nous.  Je recommande.
We loved all the small details (sunscreen, laundry soap etc) that went into this vacation rental. We would definitely stay again. Perfect downtown Kona location, walk to almost anything.

This condo was absolutely perfect for us in every way. The pictures absolutely do not do the place justice. It was perfectly clean, nicely decorated, had every amenity we could ever need for a few days stay, and the bed was super comfortable. Walking to town was easy and quick, and it was a huge plus that the farmers market was just a few steps away. I would highly recommend staying here!
The apartment was in a great location, and was a great value.  We enjoyed our stay and had no complaints.
Alethea's place was centrally located in Kona. The condo was great and with a great view! Highly recommended!
Great condo! Located at 5minutes walk from a lot of restaurants and bars
great location and value

If we ever return to Kona, we would want to stay at Alethea’s delightful condo.  Watching the sun set into the ocean from her 6th floor porch was amazing in itself.  Her palm tree motif contributed to our feeling of being in Hawaii.  Virtually everything one would do in Kona is walkable (a major plus for us) from her location.  Two of our major travel  concerns is “quality” of the bed and shower ... both exceeded our expectations!  We departed  Alethea’s condo rested and clean!
Simple, clean, practical economical and great location/ walkability to the water Alii Dr amenities etc. Plus...... with a great view and balmy breezed on the lanai.

Alethea's Place made our trip to Hawaii that much more enjoyable. It was the perfect size for my husband and myself and you can't get a better location to the shops and restaurants. The kitchen island was super convenient for us with setting up our underwater photography gear. Having an assigned parking space was so nice... you didn't have to ever worry about parking. Would definitely stay here again on another trip!
We had a really great time! All of the shops and restaurants were within a short walking distance and the condo was roomy and very clean! We would definitely stay again!
Great location and view.  A cruise ship was in town one day and wonderful view of this and the ocean.

Spending the week at Alethea's place worked out perfectly. If you are a Scuba Diver, her condo is within walking distance of Jack's Diving Locker. If you are Catholic, the view from her balcony is St. Michaels Church which has a Saturday evening Mass & several Sunday morning Mass options. The church, lots of great shopping, restaurants and the beach are all within a short walk from the condo.

If traveling solo Alethea's place is in a safe neighborhood & the building elevator requires a key to go up to her condo. Parking is easy with an assigned parking space.

The condo was clean, organized & cutely decorated with a Tropical Palm Tree motif. Ocean view from the balcony & master bedroom was beautiful! I highly recommend Alethea's place if you are  staying in Kona.
Comfortable place in a great location. Great view of the sunset!
Nice accommodations perfectly situated in town with many amenities close by!

This condo has a great view of bay/sunsets and just a block from Allie Drive where the action is. We went to Fishstoppers for lunch 3 days in a row. Furnishings are tired. The sink-clogged but Alathea came over withrepairman and got it fixed the same day. Condo bldg has nice laundry, friendly neighbors.
Best place in Kona! Great location and Alethea was very responsive. Thank you for helping to make our first time on the Big Island memorable. We will be back!
Alethea’s place is clean and conveniently located. Walking distance to all the restaurants and shops. Parking, check in and check out are all easy!

Alethea was an amazingly kind, warm and understanding host! She lives nearby and was super responsive via. text messages and made sure we had everything we needed during our stay. Her place is cozy and well-equipped. It also has a beautiful ocean view and is within walking distance to all the restaurants, shops and farmers market in Kona!

Alethea's place was exactly as described - clean, quiet, and in an amazing spot! We were able to just walk down Ali'i Drive each morning to grab breakfast before it got crowded and do the same at night to watch the sunset. The condo had everything we needed and was quite comfortable. We would highly recommend this place and would definitely stay again!
Very clean and centrally located! Easy check in/check out process and the communication was great. Parking was included which was a plus! I would highly recommend Alethea's place.
Great location, view and easy parking.  Has everything you need.  Enjoyed sitting out on the lanai and listening to the waves at night.
The reviews accurately portrait this airbnb. Amazing location and great value overall. Alethea was very responsive and nice!

This very stylishly-appointed condo is right behind St. Mark's Church in Kailua-Kona.  Alethea is a great host, located nearby & very willing to be of assistance.  Heavy traffic appears to be standard in the Kona area, but a surprising amount of road noise can be heard from 6 stories up, which was the only drawback in my experience.  However, for those of us who only return to our AirBnB after a day spent outdoors, it was not much of an issue.

Alethea's place was perfect for our first trip to Kona. The location was ideal- close to so many great restaurants, a farmers market, walking distance from a small beach and historical sites, and more. We even walked to Kona Brewing. The bed was so comfy and we had everything we needed. The complex was quiet and felt safe. We would definitely stay there again!

Alethea’s apartment is located in the heart of Kona. Very easy to walk to shops, restaurants and the waterfront. Alethea shared very clear instructions on how to get into the apartment, which was very clean and contained everything we needed for our 2 day stay.

Very central location in walking distance to many cute shops, galleries and restaurants. We loved sipping coffee out on the lanai and watching the ships out on the ocean. Our host Alethea was very responsive. This apartment was great for a couple. The sleeping area is separated from the rest of the apartment by a sliding screen, so if your partner is a light sleeper you’d have to be quiet when you get up. It wasn’t a problem for us. This place was a good value and the location was a great home base for our Hawaiian adventures!

If you want to be in town, with a view, yet be in a quiet space, this is the place for you. The kitchen had everything and more than we needed. The bed was very comfortable and included a body pillow (bonus for me). The condo was stocked with beach gear, and there were binocular on the lanai for whale watching which was a wonderful touch. A dedicated parking spot means no parking nightmares in a crowded Kona. This airbnb did not disappoint.

We loved staying at Alethea's place and didn't want to leave! It is in a perfect location to walk to Kona's farmers market and tourist type shops, as well as a few nice restaurants. Close driving distance to amazing snorkel spots. Very spacious and airy with a cross breeze through the open windows. We loved having breakfast on the lanai and watching the dolphins in the bay! Didn't need too much communication during our stay, however she was lovely enough to leave some brochures open to pages of activities we mentioned before we arrived. Super comfy bed, too! We would definitely stay here again! Mahalo!

Location, location, location. You can't get better than this location. You are walking distance to some of Kona's best restaurants. We enjoyed walking down to Evolution Bakery and Basik Acai every morning. Parking is a breeze since there is an assigned spot. Large kitchen for cooking and eating. Loved the view from the deck with comfy chairs to watch the sunset and sunrise. We got good sleep on the bed. The layout of the place was perfect. Very responsive host. We'd stay here again!

We had a quick two night stay but the unit offered everything we needed! Check-in instructions were very clear easy to understand! Unit is located in the heart of Kona and is walking distance to many shops, including the farmers market. Two restaurants we have been back to many times and would recommend are: Huggos and On the Rocks - great atmosphere, kid friendly, great service and great food. Unit was very clean and cared for, Alethea obviously cares about her guests and their experience at her place. The lanai has a great view and it was very nice have our morning coffee or evening drink overlooking the ocean. Would definitely recommend this place.

This airbnb was fantastic during our stay in Kona. It is very close to Ali'i drive (where there are a lot of restaurants, a market, and a few shops), and was fantastic comfort wise. The free parking spot was also extremely helpful as Ali'i drive can get quite busy with the cars!. Alethea provided very clear instructions for checking in, and provided a binder which provided great tips on eats! Her airbnb also comes with a kitchen, so you may cook if you prefer that over heading to the restaurants. The Lanai was also a great touch as we were able to take in the view, and at times see the dolphins with the binoculars she provided :). Would definitely stay here again!

Alethea responded quickly and was very friendly and helpful. The condo’s location is unbeatable: walking distance to beaches and local restaurants. The condo was clean and cute and perfect for couples. My boyfriend and I had a great time here.
Great location. You can walk everywhere. You are on the 6th floor so you can see the ocean.

Alethea’s place is just as described... great location, adorable, very comfortable, and roomy! We were very comfortable there for the last leg of our honeymoon... it is within walking distance of Kona, and we could watch the sunset from our lanai... it was absolutely perfect, and just what we were looking for... i would highly recommmend it! We also used Alethea’s recommendations in a book she had put together of local restaurant recommendations... we already want to go back!
Alethea’s place is beautiful and really well located. It’s close to the beach and close to the town center. She communicates really well. Definitely worth the money. Beautiful home and deck.
The home was very clean and comfortable. Great views. We really enjoyed our time there.
Perfect location and lovely space! Enjoyed the ocean view from the balcony. Short walk to all the restaurants. We will definitely stay here again next time we are back on Big Island.

The location is great, close to everything! The view is fantastic! Alethea even left a bag of kona coffee  for us. We are sipping her coffee and enjoying the view every morning. Her condo is supper clean with well-equipped  kitchen. highly recommended!

This home is in a fantastic spot to get to all the great spots in Kailua. We were able to walk down to all the shops and restruants in town, though we did have to get in the car to get to some of the best beaches and snorkel spots. 

The home was clean and well maintained and having access to a kitchen was a huge bonus for us. The view was also great overlooking a church and the ocean. 

Very highly recommend!
Such a great place and great location!  We were able to walk downtown and hit the shops. Alethea was awesome to work with!

Nice place. Close to the action and the water, yet a block or so off it so you can have quiet when you want/need it. View of the ocean from the balcony so you can sit and enjoy the sunset, etc. She provides all the essentials and a few extra which were a nice touch. We appreciated the assigned parking spot for our rental. Alethea provides brochures with area info and menus for nearby restaurants to help you decide what to do and where to go to enjoy your stay. Would recommend!

This rental is very comfortable and has plenty of space. The wall mounted AC is able to cool the whole unit. The bed is very comfortable and there is plenty of dresser space. The full size fridge and freezer including icemaker was a very big plus for us. The building has a very nice laundry room, if you should need it. There are clean washers and dryers, tables for folding, books and magazines to read in chairs while you wait. Althea provided plenty of toiletries, paper towels, bottled water and dishwasher tablets. TY.

Nice location and great view.
The place has all the amenities and easy check-in.

This place is the perfect Airbnb experience. The thoughtful host makes available pretty much everything you might need. The condo is located right in the heart of Kailua-Kona, so it's an easy walk to the "King Kam" hotel and the restaurants and shops around there, as well as the large commercial hub to the south along the water. We were in the area to Scuba dive; it's a drive of less than 15 minutes to the harbor. You have a guaranteed parking spot. There was a big parade in town during our stay, and to get to the main street you just walk out of your condo, take the elevator, walk a bit, turn left, walk a short city block past the farmer's market, and then you're on the main street. If you happen to be some idiot who loses the room key in the harbor - don't ask - the owner has a plan for that and we were back in the unit in no time. The kitchen is very functional, and other reviews sum up the rest, good Wi-Fi, AC, icemaker, etc. In summary, this place is as good as it gets.

Awesome location with reserved parking. The apartment has a full kitchen (and ice maker in the freezer), fast wifi, and is a great spot for exploring Kailua-Kona town. Even though it was on the 6th floor, the breeze made it so we didn't even need the AC. View of the ocean was great, too! Thanks!

Quaint, simple, but has everything you need.  The biggest plusses are the location (walking distance to everything!) and the fact that Alethea is very quick in responding to any messages.  Also, there's a great view.

Alethea's place was wonderful to stay in!  The location is fantastic--everything in Kona is walkable--and the view is great as well!  Everything was squeaky clean (zero bugs as well, which is notoriously hard to do on a tropical island!), and there was a lot of space for our 11-month old to play, as well as a great kitchen for us to make breakfast and lunch.  Alethea was also very responsive, answering all our questions quickly and providing helpful recommendations at every turn.  We loved our stay, and hope to stay again on our next trip to the Big Island!
Can't beat the location. Very short walk to Alii Dr.  Has is own parking stall.
Comfortable, clean, great location, safe. This was the perfect place to stay. I can’t imagine a better place at a better rate. Thank you Alethea!

We stayed at Alethea's place for 4 nights. The apartment is in a great location and has amazing ocean views. Would definitely recommend it. Having parking on premises was also very convenient. Alethea also provided useful local tips and was quick to respond.

Alethea's place was comfortable, cosy, clean and had all the amenities we could need during our enjoyable stay in Kailua-Kona. The apartment felt like a home away from home. The parking was a definite bonus especially in this busy area of town, short walk to the waterfront shops and restaraunts.

Great location in the center of town.  Walking distance to EVERYTHING.  Althea has a binder of restaurants with their menus (and map locations).  Perfect place for me to have the tradewinds blow and finish my writing.  I would stay here again!  Nice touch when she texted me a warning about the tropical storm that was supposed to hit, but didn't until after I left...
Absolutely incredible place in the middle of everything with super awesome amenities and helpful host. The view is incredible and you can walk everywhere.
Within walking distance of the ocean and many restaurants.  Beautiful decor with anything you might need.
The condo is located directly in the center (2min by walk) and has an amazing view from the balcony. The communication and check-in was very easy. We really enjoyed our stay.
Wonderful!
Perfect place! I will definitely stay there again if I go back to kona.
We loved our stay here and the home had everything we could ever need! Thank you so so much!
Great location for shops and felt safe while at condo
Great location and super responsive host! Very convenient to downtown area.
Fantastic location with cozy balcony that has great views. Felt very welcome & had a wonderful time!
Great location- walkable to downtown.

Amazing view!  Well-appointed space.  Surprisingly quiet for the great location.  Alethea provided cold beverages for our arrival.  Convenient parking and easy instructions for entry and arrival.  We would choose to stay here again in an instant.  The pool was clean and private as well.

I can highly highly recommend Alethea's place!  It was just picture perfect!  Parking and Check-In were super easy, the location can't be beat, and waking up to beautiful natural light and a perfect ocean view every morning was just magical.  There's so much great food, just walking distance away.  The best part was that she had snorkeling gear, a cooler, and beach towels, which was perfect for our beach day at Hapuna Beach :).  Alethea was also very quick to respond, the few times I had a question.  Thanks Alethea! <3
Great location. Just a 5 min walk to the heart of town. Quiet apartment with a balcony and a great view. Nice kitchen with all the features of home. Comfy bed. Would stay there again for sure!!!

Very nice unit for a couple; close to center town of Kona and to restaurants.  Nice view.  Quiet. With all you need to cook or prepare breakfast; more than I've seen in other places we stayed at.  Don't be turned off by the appearance of the building (a concrete condo building), the unit itself is very nice, comfortable and quiet.  Would definitely return if we came back to Kona.

Totally as advertised! Amazing location walking distance to everything. Cold drinks waiting in the fridge when we arrived! There is a big book of local restaurant menus for you to decide where to order from. Other people in the building are very friendly. We would totally stay here again! Lovely place!

As advertised and super location with awesome views at sunset. This place is a great value and is super cute. Alethea is very responsive to questions and a thoughtful host. I travel to Kona for work and would stay here again in the future.
Amazing location! Walking distance to all the restaurants on Aali'i drive. The building is a little old but the condo has been decorated with thoughtful touches making it a very pleasant stay.
Great location, very responsive host, and fantastic value for Hawaii!
Easy check-in and check-out.   Cozy unit with excellent location and great views of the ocean and sunset. Would definitely stay again.
Great, convenient location! Gorgeous view of the ocean on the lanai! The condo is a comfy space equipped with everything you need! We enjoyed our stay!

This condo is in a great location, it's only a very short walk to Alii  dr, which is the main street on the waterfront. Lots of choice of restaurants, shops and cafes are only 5-10 min walk.

Our flight departed late at night on our last day and Alethea was very accommodating in letting us stay well past the required checkout time. We appreciated this very much as it gave us a chance to enjoy our last day to the fullest!
Great location and views, wonderful host
Great location near the Farmers Market and the pier and Old Town. Pool is wonderful. Great view from the lanai.
Absolute gem a block up from the waterfront and all the restaurants and bars and shopping. Super clean, great view, lots of local tips and guide books.

Very clean and comfortable condo (for two of us anyway), nice view of the water and sunset, great location only a block from the waterfront restaurants. Lots of thought went into making sure her guests have everything they need. Very responsive to questions before and during the stay.

Alethea's place was much better than we expected. The location is great, and the view from the lanai is lovely ocean, palm trees and sky, over the church, and farmers market. It was clean, comfortable, and has everything you need including beach chairs, towels, even an umbrella to borrow. We were very happy to enjoy Kona without having to drive there!

Just behind the farmers' market and next to the gas station. The condo  is big and super cosy. The only downside is the hot water from shower is kinda small. There's a great shave ice "One Aloha" just nearby. We had wonderful vegan food at Herbivore.

name: 4 bedroom home W/diamond head view w/parking
summary: This is a breezy comfortable 4 bedroom house with nice views of diamond head also 2  free parking spots, as well as an updated kitchen, New indoor wood dinning/eating table. Satellite television, all movie channels available. Also eating on the outdoor lanai table chairs, Outdoor blue launge set/table.
space: This is a nicely 4 bedroom house in the hills of Maunalani Heights, Honolulu. Enjoy nice views of the iconic Diamond Head.   2 couches in the living room, so space for everyone to hangout.  There3 Ceiling fans* in the living room alone, so stays cool/comfortable even during the hottest of days.
description: This is a breezy comfortable 4 bedroom house with nice views of diamond head also 2  free parking spots, as well as an updated kitchen, New indoor wood dinning/eating table. Satellite television, all movie channels available. Also eating on the outdoor lanai table chairs, Outdoor blue launge set/table. This is a nicely 4 bedroom house in the hills of Maunalani Heights, Honolulu. Enjoy nice views of the iconic Diamond Head.   2 couches in the living room, so space for everyone to hangout.  There3 Ceiling fans* in the living room alone, so stays cool/comfortable even during the hottest of days. You will have full and exclusive use of this fully furnished 4 bedroom home with its own large roofed lanai as well as washer/dryer located in garage.  (Everything you see in photos is your own space and not shared) So that you can settle right in, we will check you in and then you will have the place to yourself.. However; we will always be available to assist you with anything you need. The loca
neighborhood_overview: The location provides easy access to Kaimuki Town's restaurants and shops at the bottom of the hill, the highway, Kahala Mall 'Whole Foods' grocery store, movie theater and the beaches of  Kahala beach is 10 min drive, and Black Point.  Waikiki is 15 min drive and downtown/China town is 20min drive.
notes: (All the photos in this listing would be your space and are not shared) For libilty reasons and because its very close to next door house, The backyard is off limits and  has been locked off.
transit: The hill has bus service as well as Uber but a rental car will be much more convenient for exploring from this location.
access: You will have full and exclusive use of this fully furnished 4 bedroom home with its own large roofed lanai as well as washer/dryer located in garage.  (Everything you see in photos is your own space and not shared)
interaction: So that you can settle right in, we will check you in and then you will have the place to yourself.. However; we will always be available to assist you with anything you need.
house_rules: This is a NON SMOKING house/property.  PETS are not permitted in rental units under any conditions.  Please remove your shoes before entering house, no shoes inside the house. (this is island style) their is shoe rack directly outside house. 1. The backyard is off limits and is not included in the listing, (it has been locked off) this is for libilty reason and because it is too close too next door neighbors house. 2. ABSOLUTELY NO SMOKING ON THE PROPERTY. NO DRUG USE.  3 No Pets.  4. We Do Not Want Partiers. If you want to Party all night and come back in the house making noise all hours of the night or planning to bring the Party to the House: This is NOT the place for you.  5. Please Clean Up After Yourself: If trash cans are full inside please take outside and place beside rock wall, their are extra plastic bags in the drawers as well.   6, Please Call if there is a Problem and will fix it although please do not disturb after 11PM Unless it is an Emergency Situation.

host.host_about:
Aloha, Listening 2 family homes here on Oahu (Honolulu), if you have any questions before making your booking please feel free to ask.

Mahalo

reviews.comments:
The accommodation was terrific on the whole. In particular it was very spacious, clean and relaxing. It had all the modern conveniences accept for air con which was not missed as there were fans in every room and a nice breeze always flowing though the house.

Teru was very helpful as was her son who greeted us when we arrived and gave us a tour of the place. 

The location of the house is close to Waikiki but away from the hustle and in a quiet location with beautiful views of Diamond Head. 

I would be keen to stay here again.

We were very happy with our stay at Kaiser and Teru's place. The home was comfortable, spacious, and well kept. Kaiser was very responsive both before and during our stay to any questions, needs, and requests we had. The house is on a hill, with nice views of Diamond Head and the ocean beyond. Internet, flat screen TV with satellite-cable, spacious kitchen and living room area, and a great outdoor deck with gas grill and furniture for dining, lounging, and overall relaxation while enjoying the light breeze and scenic views. The Kaimuki neighborhood at the base of the hill has a nice array of dining options, and anything else you'd need is a quick drive away. Would definitely book here again.

Kaiser was a very nice and great host! The house has an amazing view on Diamond Head, which makes waking up so much nicer. It was clean and has all nessesary utilities. Thank you for letting me and my families stay in your home.

Kaiser greeted us when we arrived and gave us a tour.  We were a group of 6 adults and the house suited us very well with all the amenities that we needed.  Kaiser quickly responded to any questions that we had.  We really enjoyed having drinks and meals on the patio with a fantastic view.  This is a very quiet neighborhood and I slept better than I've had in years.  Thanks for a great time!

Kaiser and Teru kept in touch with us in the months before our trip and this was reassuring.  They were helpful with our arrival time and made us feel welcome.  The home is clean, bright and spacious with amazing views.  We enjoyed the deck and did some cooking in the well stocked kitchen.  Each room had a ceiling fan so the temperature was comfortable.  The location was perfect, close to shopping and touring by car.  Thank you for a lovely vacation home.

高台にある素敵なお家でした｡
部屋も3部屋と多く､ﾏｽﾀｰﾍﾞｯﾄﾞﾙｰﾑにはﾄｲﾚ､洗面台もありました｡何より広めのﾊﾞﾙｺﾆｰが最大の魅力です｡BBQｸﾞﾘﾙもあり､自炊もしやすく最高の三日間でした｡
難点としては､ﾜｲｷｷからは､20分ほど離れているので､ﾚﾝﾀｶｰがないとかなり不便かなと｡
よりﾛｰｶﾙらしいｽﾃｲができるのが魅力です｡

Cozy, clean, well ventilated and well equipped home. Beautiful view to Diamond Head.
We were in 7 people and the only thing we missed was another bathroom with a shower.

We had a nice stay at Kaiser and Teru's house. The house was big enough for the 5 of us and the beds were comfortable. We particularly enjoyed having breakfast on the lanai where the view of the Diamond Head is beautiful. The house is conveniently located in a quiet area and it is easy to visit all of Oahu if you have a car.

The things we loved: The house is in a quiet residential neighborhood, with a nice two-car carport, a shaded porch/deck that has great views of Diamond Head and the ocean, and a kitchen with new countertops, modern appliances, and ample space for meal preparation. The host was responsive to our calls and quick to show up, if we needed something.  The location is close to Kahala mall and has good access to areas near Diamond Head, plus quick access to the freeway. The living room is large with nice couches, and we enjoyed the airy, bright space it had. There is a new large-screen TV and good wifi access.
Things we would like to see improved:
1) The images portrayed on the website show more lamps and furniture than were present in the rooms.  Now there are only ceiling lights associated with the fans, and this limits lighting in the rooms. We could not read in our bedrooms.
2) There is no indoor table for meals, and there appeared to be one on the website photos.  We did eat some meals on the outdoor lanai (deck), but we had hoped for a dining area indoors, as pictured on the website.
3) There are two bedrooms with sliding doors that lack screens. Therefore. those bedrooms cannot have the sliders left open for airflow without risking having bugs fly into the house. Without cross-ventilation, the rooms can be hot and stuffy, even with the ceiling fans.
4) The house is old, and we noticed ants and cockroaches in the front room, kitchen and master bath.

Away from the hustle and bustle of the tourist areas but a close drive to them, i do believe that this was possibly the best air bnb that I could have booked for my parents, grandparents, brother and sister-in-law! My family was in town for 5 nights for my wedding and this, being their first time in Hawaii, I wanted to make them as comfortable as possible. The house had the perfect amount of space for my 6 guests with (possibly the best part of the house) a wrap around balcony overlooking Diamond Head and the ocean. The location of the house is in the hills, which makes it very peaceful and my family spent every night grilling and sitting on the balcony together listening to the birds and nature all around. I'm pretty sure that at least one person slept outside on this great balcony each night! The house was impeccably clean and had well kept furniture and appliances. To keep costs low, my family cooked as much as possible at the house and they found everything they needed in the kitchen. The house does not have AC but it was not needed, even during a particularly hot and humid week. The wind blew through the house nicely and there were also plenty of ceiling fans to circulate air. 

Kaiser, our host, was very gracious and made himself available to contact during our stay but since my family was not in need of anything, we did not have to contact him. He greeted us the day we arrived, showed us around and said goodbye on the departure day. 

This house is great for families who want some R&R and/or to keep costs low by cooking at home.  I will certainly be recommending this air bnb to anyone who has a larger group coming to town and do hope that my family can stay here again. It truly was paradise! Mahalo to Kaiser for sharing his home and making it a comfortable and memorable experience for my beloved family!

We really enjoyed staying here. The lanai was beautiful (views of both the ocean and Diamond Head) and the time I spent out there was one of the high points of my trip. At first I didn't like the rather steep roads up to the house, but we all realized that being so high meant that it was cool at night--we visited relatives at a beachside rental house and it was too hot with no breeze. Although it was 90 degrees during the day, it was cool at night with lovely breezes. There are ceiling fans in all the rooms and that keeps everything cool. Everything was very clean, not a bug in sight (although I expect to see bugs in Hawaii, no matter how clean the house is). There were six of us so we were worried about having one shower (there are two bathrooms but one shower), but it turned out not to be an issue at all. Kaiser met us when we checked in and showed us around. The location is great because you are 10 minutes from Kahala Mall and Whole Foods, 15 minutes away from Ala Moana and Waikiki, and 15 minutes from the airport.

Kaiser was really wonderful and went above and beyond to accommodate us. 
The apartment is in a quite neighborhood on the mountain, definitely a drive away from tourist attractions, which is a big plus for us. There were plenty of room for four of us. Although the house looks dated from outside, the kitchen is completely new and every single appliance and furniture works (fridge, oven, grill, garbage disposal, fans, shower, etc), which is quite rare for air b&b. There was no AC but a lot of fans, which was quite enough. 
The rarest of them all: THERE WAS NO BUGS in this house, even flies were rare! I am terrified of bugs and I was so surprised and happy to find out that somehow the apartment is completely immune to any bugs. We stayed in 3 houses in Hawaii, bugs were a big problem in the other 2. Thank you Kaiser!
We had a great time at this house and we really appreciate Kaiser's warm welcome! We are definitely coming to stay here again:)

Kaiser`s place is great! he welcomed us in the beginning and gave us an overview. everything on the pictures and the previous reviews are true. he was very accommodating and when we needed a few household items mid week he responded right away and provided them within 15 mins otherwise we have all the privacy and independence to the beautiful home. it was a bit dusty at the start however understandable as he is renovating during empty periods. place has no air con however has good breeze and air flow. love the view! would most definitely stay here again!
とにかく眺めがよくてよかったです｡ﾜｲｷｷからは車で15分ほどと少し遠いいですがよりﾛｰｶﾙな生活ができます｡ｷｯﾁﾝも使いやすく料理もできる環境が整っていました｡

The place is great, especially with a view of the diamond head. You can see the sunrise and sunset from the house. The grocery stores are within 10 minute drive. Kaiser is very helpful, and I will definitely recommend his apartment.
This place was great! It's off the beaten path and very quiet and peaceful. Kaiser was quick to make any adjustments that were needed and the house was cozy and felt very private. Great experience
Nice and clean place! We enjoy the stay!!! Thank you Kaiser& Teru.
Great place to stay. Host was great and responded quickly to our questions. Definitely would stay again.
