Our family stayed at Kaiser's for two weeks. The house is very spacious, cool, and comfortable. The neighborhood is scenic and residential, perfect for sitting out in the evening or long walks. The location could not be more convenient--minutes to Kapahulu (and all the good food :-)), close to Pali for trips to Kailua, and, of course, right above Kaimuki. We would definitely stay there again.
Very nice view of the Diamondhead. 6-7min drive to access H1 highway. And 15min to Waikiki beach.  The balcony is great and the host Kaiser is very helpful.

Kaiser & Teru's place was great!  It was clean and had all the amenities we needed (even some extra beach items).  The location gave us easy access to the highway, shopping and restaurants.  Kaiser & Teru  were gracious hosts and we would stay in their place again!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
非常好 極度好 非常推薦入住 房東人非常好 還會帶給你驚喜喔 回答問題的速度也是非常快的

This place is amazing! The view from the lanai is incredible, the unit was clean, quiet and very private. If you are looking to stay in a local neighbourhood, away from the more touristy areas, but within a few minutes drive of the city, then this is the place for you.

The place is in a quiet neighborhood which we enjoyed than the busy downtown. We especially enjoy the scenery of the Diamond Head. Kaiser was very helpful and nice, personally showed us all the features of the apartment. We enjoyed our times there.

This is a perfect house for a comfortable and close to nature stay.
State of the art amenities, kitchen etc
Incredible view so nice and spacious deck overlooking the valley and Diamond Head 
I will definitely come back to this beauty!

The location of Kaiser & Teru's place was closeby to most places we wanted to go. The bedrooms and shower was spacious.  Our host, Kaiser, was very friendly and was very responsive to messages. He was kind enough to walk us through the apartment/house and gave us Hawaiian chocolate.

We came to Hawaii to celebrate our sons wedding, our stay at Kaiser & Teru's place made our experience wonderful and the memories lasting the place was clean comfortable scenic 
We woke up to the sweet sounds of birds and cool breeze.
Thanks for being there.
Awesome home, beautiful scenery on the lanai, quite neighbourhood. everything is good!
Great place away from Waikiki tourist trap (yet only a short drive away), comprehensively equipped, quiet neighbourhood, great view from large terrace, definitely recommend.
Thank you very much! I enjoyed it!

If You want to have the best balcony view in Honolulu, it is here! You will also find four big bedrooms and plenty of room everywhere. Driving time to Waikiki is around 15 minutes. We really enjoyed our time here and communication with Kaiser & Teru was easy.

Wow!

What a wonderful house in the most perfect location.

Balcony views are endless, house is close to everything you need (10-15mins to beach, shops, restaurants. Uber averaged around $12 per journey one way) and also high enough up the mountain for pure tranquility.

Highly recommend!

Chris

Kaiser and Teru were very gracious hosts. Our flight was slightly delayed and we arrived very late at night. Kaiser was more than willing to meet with us at a late time to check us in and go over the basics of the house. The house itself is great. Plenty of room for larger groups. There are two bathrooms inside the main portion of the house, only one of them has a shower. There is a third bathroom in the adjacent apartment style room which also has a shower. The lanai was amazing and was a great place to have our morning coffee or watch a sunset. Overall a great experience. We would definitely stay again.
A rental car is a must since this is up on the hill but this is also what gives the deck such an incredible view! We enjoyed ourselves very much.
非常愉快的一次旅行｡房东是一个非常热情的人,房子内的设施非常齐全,房东还非常有心的提供了很多海边的设备,包括毯子､草席和浮潜设备｡

Carol's place is beautiful. Every piece of design is well thought of and creates a relaxed beautiful atmosphere. Very nice apartment in an amazing location. Only minutes walk from a lively street with delicious food and many places that stay open till late!

El lugar es bastante comodo, el metro esta cerca, muchos bares, restaurantes, tiendas etc, a una calle del lugar. La zona es segura y el apartamento tienen una excelente decoracion. Todos son muy amables en la casa! :)

This alleged “full bedroom”; Private room with the red couch shown on the listing’s pictures (which the couch is not in the room, at least it wasn’t when I arrived) is a complete no go for me. 5 stars DOWN. This was a booking that I made less than 48 hours from my scheduled arrival. I have been using this AIRBNB service now for 3 years, so I would like to think I’m pretty familiar with how things work. The raised eyebrows began when Carlos sent me a text message outside of AirBnB directly from a cell phone number to my cell phone number the day of check in requesting that I send him a picture of my US ID or Passport, as it is needed for self-check in. Again, since I have reserved with several hosts in the past who only did self-check in and never was asked this, I immediately asked him, “Do you not have a copy of my ID from the AIRBNB App?” I then told him to send all requests to me directly on AirBNB so I can have proper documentation of communication with the host. His response regarding why he needs a picture of my ID/or Passport is:    “ We require to have a valid US ID or Passport on file for all of our guest. This is our policy here in NYC as well as other properties I have in Asia & South America. NYC law requires that we have a valid ID on file for anyone getting keys to the property. Further this requirement is noted on our listing description. I understand you submitted ID to your AIRBNB profile; however that is for AIRBNB, not for us. AIRBNB is the system processing the reservation; not the owner of the property; me as the owner of the property also need valid ID on file.”   After his spill I proceeded to take a picture of my State ID, and forwarded it to him. He immediately responded stating that he would give the me self-check in instructions “SHORTLY”….which was around 2p est.  Around 8p EST still no self-check in instructions, at this point, I’m feeling uneasy about this guy as he claims to be such a professional with this Airbnb business bragging about all the properties he has worldwide, yet he doesn’t follow through on sending me check in instructions after he demanded I send him a picture of my personal information (ID). When I inquired with him about the check in information at 8pm that night, this man had the nerve to respond to me and say, “ your flight hasn’t even arrived yet” and he proceeded to send me a screen shot of my flight’s current status. At this point I’m irritated because now you’re just holding the information hostage, I don’t care if I said I wasn’t going to be arriving til 10pm, I paid for a check in of 3p, check out of 11a, therefore I should have had check in instructions within 24 hours of my paid check in time of 3pm OR at least immediately after I sent my photo ID. After I told mentioned to him how his process sounded fishy, he then responded bragging about how he has all of these properties and to read his great reviews on AIRBNB. Now to the good part when I arrived to the unit….I messaged Carlos via AIRBNB letting him know I gained access to the unit.  Now the cleanliness…first of all the hallway area, up to the stairway, to the front door of the unit is completely disgusting full of dog/cat hair. The pictures over exaggerate the size of the alleged “master” bedroom, the bed takes up 97% of the floor space in the “master” room. The TV mounted on the wall did not work at all, and I sent Carlos 2 messages asking him what was up with the TV, and how can I get it to work (within 30 minutes of when he acknowledged my access to his property). Surprisingly Carlos being a #1 rated host throughout the world did not respond….last form of communication through the duration of my stay was his acknowledgement that I gained access to his unit. He didn’t provide check out instructions. Oh and the bathroom, completely disgusting more so the shower/tub. I paid an inflated New Year’s season rate, so I really got played on this one. Lesson learned.
 
 
Angela Holley
(F.K.A. Angela Boler)
Assistant Vice President, Mediations Consultant (In Person Rep)
Foreclosure Mediations-Home Preservation
Wells Fargo Home Mortgage  l  Field Rep  l  Dallas/Fort Worth, TX

reviews.comments:
Hallo Ali , 

Danke für deine Gastfreundschaft .
Ich kann sagen es war eine schöne Zeit bei dir und es gibt kein Grund zur Klage . Deine Wohnung ist sehr empfehlenswert und Istanbul ist immer eine Reise Wert .
Ich werde bestimmt deine Gastfreundschaft nochmal in Anspruch nehmen . Danke 

Viele liebe Grüße 
Familie Rath

Ali bey bizi cok iyi karsiladi. Ali beyin Samimiyeti veyardim severliligi hemen belli oluyordu. Her konuda bize yardimci oldu.
Eve gelince evde cok rahat ettik. Hersey resimdeki gibiydi. Hele aksam balkon keyfi manzarali kacinilmazdi.
Istanbula geldigimde burayi tekrar tercih ederim.
Her sey süperdii. Tesekkürler Ali Bey
It was a good experience and Ali was really helpful!
Ev konum olarak dolmusla ulasımın cok kolay oldugu bir yerde.. Aynı zamanda ev sahipleri cok sıcak kanlı ve yardımseverler.. Kesinlikle tavsiye ederim..

Ev İstanbul'da yaşanabilecek en güzel semtlerden birinde ve  kendine ait yaşanmışlık hissi var. Ali Bey çok hızlı şekilde dönüş yapıyor, her şey eski olmasına karşın tertemiz, istediğiniz vakit lokanta, pastane, markete çabucak ulaşıyorsunuz, istemezseniz sakin sokağın tadını balkondan çıkarıyorsunuz...
Great location with beautiful view! Thank you Ali!

Nice flat, very central and near to shops and busses.
Ali is a very friendly and helpful person.
I recommend this place its amazing
We had a very pleasant stay. The flat is comfortable, the location is quiet, between Kadıkoy & Usküdar. Ali & his family have been very flexible for our last minute arrival. Thank you again!
The location is very central, there are many places you can shop for your needs. The house is very clean and nice. There is everything you may need for your stay. We really enjoyed staying here :)

We spend time there a week and İt was so nice, Balcony was really fine to have breakfast and dinner ( I mean If weather ıs okay ). Bathroom was clean and there was not problem with hot water and this kind of things . Also bed was pretty nice to sleep. It can worth if for this price ! . Kitchen was enough to make dinner and prepare to breakfast and I can recommend it.
Wonderful place, with a beautiful view of the sunset every night, overlooking the Bosphorus. Balcony access from both living room and bedroom. Would do it all over again. Thanks Ali!

Ali is really reactive by message. His flat is corresponding to the pictures and description. It is located 5 min to Harem where you can take boat for Eminonu and 15 min to Uskudar where you have more choice of destination. The flat was clean. The neighborhood is quiet and you have supermarket, several cafe, snack (kofte) and one restaurant (the owner is very kind).
Warm, cozy, lots of spaces and great view. Ali is so kind and helpful :)

Mr. Ali is very kind and responsive person and it was a great location at Üsküdar.A little bit far from the west side of İstanbul. We should take Dolmush or bus to go to iskele. But it does worth because of the calm location.

Our stay at Ali's place was perfect. The house was very easy to reach, and the neighborhood was calm and had every kind of store you might need for everyday needs. The view from the balcony was amazing, and the overall condition of the place was superb. The house was spacious, and Ali was seriously helpful. Would definitely recommend staying there!

I was in Istanbul 3 times, and my last time I stayed in Ali's house. It was the best option ever I had in Istanbul. Very calm area, amazing balcony for breakfast, flat is a bit old (as a grandmother's one) but well orginized, big and really comfortable for 3 people. Flat is NOT in the center or any touristical place, so you you will spend time (around 30 minutes with walking) and money (3 turkish lira for each person for 1 ride) to get to another side. Last ferry is around 22 o'clock, so you will be always time limited to go by it back home. But there is also (more far!) metro, what is also reachable. Overall - good expirience and definietly recommended.

I didn't get to meet Ali -- his relatives who live upstairs gave me the key for check in -- but he was very prompt in replying to all messages, and the place was great. A great value with a full kitchen (though I didn't really use it much), two bedrooms, and a nice back balcony with a partial view of the Bosporous. The neighborhood has cafes, grocery stores, and ATMs all conveniently located within a few blocks. It's a short walk to Uskudar or the ferries to the European side, and a quick dolmush (shared van) ride down to Kadikoy, which I was able to figure out with no problem despite speaking almost no Turkish.

This apartment is one of the loveliest apartments I've ever been to ever in my life. The location, the view, the coziness, also Ali is a great host, he helped us a lot during our trip and gave us all the needed tips. Highly recommended, specially for couples.
Her seyiyle mukemmel. Cok memnun kaldik.

Ali’s house is in a peacefull and friendly neighborhood. The flat was a it dark but had an good balcony overlooking rooftops and the Bosphorus behinde. Excellent spot for the money and only few minuts walk from ferry to citycenter.
Прекрасная уютная квартира! В реальности лучше, чем на фотографиях. Расположение очень удачное. Хозяева очень гостеприимные и отзывчивые. Спасибо, Али!
Zeer goede ligging, goeie internet, rustig gelegen, goeie uitzicht op terras, zeker voor herhaling vatbaar

Thanks to Ali, we got acquainted with the Asian regions of Istanbul. Wonderful infrastructure. Easy access to all other locations. The apartment is very cozy. We are grateful to Ali for his hospitality and kindness.
Ali's place is great. I would recommend it to anyone who wants a quiet place to live while they explore Istanbul. It was easy to get around and has everything you need near by.
This place was very spacy, well located in front of the ferry station. Also great patio !! Only problem was the noise at night and only one little sheet in the bed for two !
Gute Erreichbarkeit , und hervorragende Infrastruktur . Top

Hey all!!
 locations is good, easy to go many touristic places. Place is better than it looks at the pictures and very clean. And Mr ali is the best:
Kind, respective, quick response... 
 I really thank him a lot for being good for us.
After all, i will miss the place. wish to be again!!

Die Unterkunft war genauso wie beschrieben. Besonders schön, war der sehr große Balkon, von der man über den Rand der anderen Dächer hinweg den Bosporus sehen konnte. Die Wohnung war sauber und in einer typischen Istanbuler viertel. Die Harem-Fährstation ist in der Nähe und man kommt von dort schnell rüber auf die Europäsche Seite.
Very good host. I will come back.

Пребывание в гостях у Али было замечательным! Мы приехали ночным автобусом раньше времени заселения, нас встретили и приютили родители Али, за что отдельное огромное спасибо! После бессонной ночи это было как нельзя кстати) Семья очень гостеприимная, по любому вопросу можно обратиться - помогут, подскажут, расскажут. Жильё отличное, с балкона вид на Босфор и европейскую часть города) Однозначно рекомендуем останавливаться здесь!

Everything was as described and even better. We didn't met him personally but Ali quickly solved all the issues. His parents who lived on the next floor met us in the night and helped to do our stay comfort. Silent district with quick transportation anywhere. Pier Harem not far from the apt. I would recommend it to everyone!

Отличное место для размещения в Стамбуле. Квартира очень большая, спальных мест достаточно. Балкон выходит на Босфорский пролив (вторая или третья линия). Будят вас чайки) работает вай фай, есть мыло, порошок, шампунь, полотенца. На кухне все для приготовления пищи. Единственное, что доставляло неудобство, это холод в квартире, были в октябре, в жоме ещё нет отопления. Но это не особенность квартиры, а особенность жизни в Стамбуле. Али и Соня очень гостеприимные. Али отвечал на все вопросы, объяснил точный маршрут как добраться до места.
Ali is a great host! Great location, nice and comfortable apartments. Also Ali give us many useful advices and show places where we can eat and change our money. I am really recommend him!
Very nice and cosy flat. Ali, thank u so much for ur help in all the questions. This place is perfect for the vacation. Location is also very comfortable. Highly recommend for perfect holidays)

Расположение рядом с паромной переправой, паром едет прямо в центр. Однако до него довольно крутая и высокая лестница. До ближайшего метро около 2км. Рядом 2 дешевых магазина где все есть. Квартира просторная. В коридоре, кухне и ванной мраморные полы-лучше иметь с собой теплые носочки. Большая уютная терраса с которой виден Босфор, София и голубая мечеть. Огромная основная кровать. Есть стиральная машина на 8кг, но нет прищепок. Много разной посуды. Плита газовая.
Ali is very responsive and nice. I recommend!
The house was in pretty good location and it was very clean. We enjoyed to stay there and it is a house that we can suggest for other people
Ali is a good host, although the house is better looking than the pictures, the neighborhood is lovely, the location is close to Kadikoy and Üsküdar. It was a very comfortable place!

Нам очень понравилось. Спокойная уютная квартира, с реальным видом на Босфор, Св. Софию, Топкапи. Понравился район, тихий, удобный. Низкие цены по сравнению с европейской частью. Шаговая доступность магазинов, рынка, ресторанов и кафе.на набережной (променад по набережной - отдельная песня). Удобная транспортная доступность: до парома в Центр (Сиркеси) 5 минут пешком. Отдельно хочется отметить. гостеприимность и отзывчивость хозяев. Спасибо большое, Али!
The flat is nice and comfortable, Ali is a great host, he responses very quickly.
Nice cozy flat in a lovely neighborhood, there is a amazing foodmarket on wednesday 50m next to it. Recommended.

Great location. Quiet neighbourhood. Ten minute walk to ferry ($0.75) that took you to the side of Istanbul that has taxim and Sofia and many other sights. Ferry’s are frequent. Coming back home is about 170 steps up. 
1 minute walk to basic groceries-eggs, milk, cheese and bread. 5 minutes to migros grocery with more options including beer and wine. 
Apartment itself was warm and comfortable with a kitchen well stocked with dishes and utensils. There is a balcony with access from both rooms. 
Hot water was always available. 
We were very comfortable.

name: Copacabana Beautiful Studio Beside Ipanema
summary: Charming studio 30m2 with everything you need! Here you will fell at your home! Located at Posto 6 between Copacabana and Ipanema - 3 blocks from Copacabana beach and 10 minutes walking to Ipanema and Arpoador beaches.  Air conditioner, cable tv and internet wi-fi. Perfect for couples!
space: Familiar and silent building, only 4 apartments per floor. The building has doorman, intercom security system and 2 elevators. Apartament description & facilities:  Bedroom/living room - double bed, table with 2 chairs, internet wi-fi, 32 lcd cable tv  and air conditioning. Bathroom - 1 bathroom with shower, hair drayer Kitchen - fridge, stove, microwave oven and other kitchen utensils.  Infront of subway station General Osorio and near bus stops to visit the best places in Rio. Supermarket, restaurants, banks, pharmacy and other conveniences near the building. More than a postcard, Rio is a state of mind, always cheerful and high spirits. Who knows, never forget! NEW YEAR´S EVE AND CARNIVAL MINIMUM STAY 6 NIGHTS  OTHERS HOLIDAYS MINIMUM STAY 4 NIGHTS
description: Charming studio 30m2 with everything you need! Here you will fell at your home! Located at Posto 6 between Copacabana and Ipanema - 3 blocks from Copacabana beach and 10 minutes walking to Ipanema and Arpoador beaches.  Air conditioner, cable tv and internet wi-fi. Perfect for couples! Familiar and silent building, only 4 apartments per floor. The building has doorman, intercom security system and 2 elevators. Apartament description & facilities:  Bedroom/living room - double bed, table with 2 chairs, internet wi-fi, 32 lcd cable tv  and air conditioning. Bathroom - 1 bathroom with shower, hair drayer Kitchen - fridge, stove, microwave oven and other kitchen utensils.  Infront of subway station General Osorio and near bus stops to visit the best places in Rio. Supermarket, restaurants, banks, pharmacy and other conveniences near the building. More than a postcard, Rio is a state of mind, always cheerful and high spirits. Who knows, never forget! NEW YEAR´S EVE AND CARNIVAL MINIMUM STAY
interaction: I will be available during all your stay
house_rules: - No parties please: noise restriction between 10:00 PM to 9:00 AM.  - No guests other than the ones are confirmed at check-in. Please don't bring other people in unless you tell us in advance.  - Make sure you turn off the A/C everytime you leave.  - Do not take towels to the beach.  - A person to clean the place and change towels/bed spreads will come after week one. If you need her to come more often, let us know.  Please take good care!

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Hi, I'm Monica!! Nice person that enjoy travelling around the world and meeting people! You're Welcome!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Monica's studio apartment in Copacabana was exactly as advertised: clean, modern, well appointed and  in a safe, extremely convenient location for guests to enjoy Rio. Monica was a great host: friendly, attentive, responsive and very helpful. She provided a list of recommended restaurants and a bottle of champagne for New Years, and was always answered her cell phone when questions came up. I would have a lot of confidence staying at one of Monica's properties again.
This is the second time that I have rented Monica's Copacabana apartment. The apartment was excellent, and she was a great host!

Ótima estadia. A Mônica foi cuidadosa com a organização e a disposição do seu apartamento, sendo flexível quanto aos horários de "check-in" e "check-out". Sendo assim, indico-a a todos aqueles que desejam ter uma boa e bem localizada estadia na Zona Sul do Rio. ;)
Apartamento ideal para um casal, e muito bem localizado. Monica foi muito prestável na estadia!

This apartment is in the most amazing location ... right next to the Ipanema/General Osario (SA Ferriera entrance) Metro and there is a Riobike stand also right at the door. AND it is only a couple of blocks walk from the beach.  We felt very safe and comfortable in this area. No view to speak of, but you do feel that you are immersed in Rio life, particularly when you hang out the window and watch a Carnaval bloco going past .. fun!!!

Monica was wonderful and very flexible and accommodating with our requests.  We had a few problems on arrival and Monica attempted to remedy them straight away even though we were smack in the middle of Carnaval and Copacabana was pretty much at gridlock.  She even posted some electrical adaptors to me that I had left behind - very helpful.

The apartment is only small, but large enough for a couple to move around comfortably.  Tidy little kitchen area and clean clean clean apartment. It is not what you would call a luxurious apartment however very much value for money.  Monica did not over- escalate the prices for the Carnaval period like many of the Airbnb owners did ... we stayed for 10 days and loved it.

El apartamento está muy bien ubicado. Esta cerca a supermercados, tiendas de barrio, medios de transporte y a las playas: Copacabana e Ipanema. El barrio es tranquilo!. El apartamento es perfecto para una persona sola o pareja. Mónica es una excelente anfitriona!
Super recomendado!

Monica was extremely responsive, kind, and helpful. The apartment is in a great location and is very clean. It suited our needs perfectly and proved to be a great value. Although we had an issue with the shower during our stay, Monica was quick to address the problem as soon as we notified her of it. 

One thing to keep in mind regarding the location is that the General Osorio subway station, for which there is an entrance in front of the building, is currently closed for construction. So if being close to the subway is important to you, then it would make sense to ensure that the station has been reopened.

Overall, I highly recommend Monica and this apartment.

Mein Sohn und ich hatten einen angenehmen Aufenthalt in Monicas Apartment. Es ist ausreichend für 2 Personen und komfortabel und modern eingerichtet. Monica ist als echte Carioca eine nette Gastgeberin und sehr um das Wohlbehagen ihrer Gäste bemüht. Sie versucht, eventuell auftretende Mängel umgehend zu beseitigen und ist flexibel hinsichtlich der An- und Abreise. Wir würden bei einem nächsten Rio-Aufenthalt wieder ihr Appt. buchen und können es nur empfehlen.

Aconselhamos a todos que procuram alojamento no Rio o apartamento da Mónica. Trata-se de um apartamento muito bom, muito simpático, muito bem equipado, extremante limpo e numa zona óptima, perto da praia, do metro, de autocarros e na zona nobre do Rio. Esta localização para nós foi fantástica, pois não queriamos ficar alojados numa zona demasiadamente barulhenta e agitada. Conseguimos de facto, combinar a tranquilidade necessária e a proximidade da praia de Copacabana, Arpoador e Ipanema, pois este apartamento fica à mesma distância de todas elas (5 minutos a pé).
Para além disso adoramos a Mónica, é uma pessoa óptima, muito prestável e uma excelente anfitriã, que nos ajudou e nos deu dicas de grande ajuda.
Sem dúvida foi uma excelente estadia e quando voltarmos ao Rio de Janeiro será novamente a nossa escolha.
5 ESTRELAS.

The apartment was perfect for my wife and me.  Monica went above all my expectations for my first rental on airbnb.com.  She even went as far as having a list of tourist attractions, bus routes, places to eat, and where to rent bicycles in the area.  She was also flexible on the check-in and out times which is important for travelers.  The apartment was spotless and EXTREMELY clean.  I highly recommend staying here over any other option in Rio during your stay (flexible check-in/out, clean, and prime location). Monica made the apartment feel like our home.  You are just a short walk from Copacabana post 5 and can easily walk to post 9 if you wish.  We walked everywhere and didn’t need to take the metro (Still closed).  We found a great salgado stop for a quick breakfast or lunch before hitting the beach or sugar loaf right down the street from the apartment.  You simply walk out the front door towards Avenue Atlantica and one block prior on the left hand side before crossing the street you will find awesome salgados for only R$3.00.  If you turn right here, a couple blocks down on the left you will find an awesome takeout restaurant as well and one meal feeds two Americans at R$15.00!  Note that Monica speaks excellent English for those of you that don’t speak Portuguese. THANKS MONICA!

In a tree weks time I stayd in Rio in this apatment. From april to june.  Monica is the moust caretakeing person and she gave 100% good service.
The appartment is located in a perekt way for a vistor in Rio.It is close to Everything and silent at night. Taxi was passeing by in the corner and it was easy to leave and come home.
The kitchen area was bigger then I expeted and the shower was just perfekt.. Totaly it was very nice dekorated and the bed was good.
Television and WiFi was totaly good. 
For me on my first visit to Rio this apartement was the best in al ways. I can warmly recomend  it. 
Thanks to you Monica.
Sylvia from Lapland in Sweden

Nossa estadia no apartamento da Mônica foi ótima, a localização é muito boa e a estrutura do quarto possui todo o necessário para que o visitante se preocupe apenas em curtir o Rio de Janeiro. 
A Mônica foi extremamente atenciosa, sempre à disposição além de ser muito simpática. 
Quem procura um apartamento silencioso e confortável e com uma excelente localização pode alugar este sem medo de errar. Excelente relação custo benefício.

Great studio apartment very conveniently located between Ipanema and Copacabana. Modern and clean. Monica was also a great host that really wanted to make our trip as memorable as possible. Highly recommended!

We couldn´t have asked for a better host, location, or overall experience. Monica was super friendly and sweet, and very helpful and responsive when we asked for suggestions about Rio. The apartment was the perfect size for 2 people, very comfy bed, very clean and functional kitchen and bathroom. We felt 100% safe the entire time we stayed in Monica´s lovely apartment. Definitely recommend!

Monica was great! my flight was a bit late and my phone could not get a signal...she waited right in front of the building until I showed up,and this was like 7 in the morning.!,she was informative and helpful..first time with Airbnb and it was a great relief to know that good people are working with them...the apartment was fantastic, super clean modern and exactly like the picture. the building is in a middle class neighborhood with tons of charm I felt safe day and night . You are close to all the great neighborhoods without paying the high prices..Copacabana.. what else can I say its just legendary...What a wonderful stay. Rio is just beautiful and this apartment lets you live and feel the pulse of the city...great value  for your money highly recommended. you will not be sorry. I stayed for 8 days in june.my parents are coming to rio soon and I will recommend this apartment to (Website hidden by Airbnb) feel free to book it! its a great deal! tchau!  P.S   Bed linens were Fresh, crisp and clean!

Mônica é uma pessoa maravilhosa, fomos muito bem recebidos em seu Studio, manteve o horário de estadia bem flexível, proporcionou um guia turístico, com os melhores pontos da cidade, orientou sobre meio de trasporte, área de alimentação, além de ficar atenta a possíveis necessidades obtidas. O Studio é excelente, encontra-se totalmente equipado, com limpeza impecável, além de estar muito bem localizado.

Han sido unos días estupendos, tanto porque la ciudad es estupenda, pero sobre todo porque hemos estado muy a gusto en el apartamento. Monica es una persona muy linda y disponible, nos recibió con mucho cariño y nos entregó el apartamento muy bien equipado de todo y muy limpio! La ubicación es muy cómoda. Calidad-precio perfecto! Lo recomiendo! saludos

Estive com minha esposa por 5 dias hospedados no charmoso studio Copacabana posto 6 e ficamos surpresos com o apartamento da Mônica , o qual é ótimo , recentemente reformado , limpíssimo , com todas as comodidades necessárias . A localização é excelente,  próximo as praias de Copacabana e Ipanema e a tudo que esses bairros oferecem de melhor  . 
Fomos recebidos pela Mônica , que além de ser uma simpatia , nos forneceu vários roteiros de passeios , restaurantes ,barzinhos, inclusive com informações de como chegar no local mais fácil e barato .
Já combinamos para o ano que vem , voltarmos ao Rio de Janeiro , pois foi um passeio inesquecível e se der certo nesse mesmo studio .

Monica nos espero hasta que llegamos al Departamento, ya que el avión llegó demorado. La atención fue excelente. tiene mucha información para el turista que hace que se sienta muy confortable.
recomiendo altamente este departamento. además de estar excelentemente ubicado, esta impecable.

O apartamento é incrível! Super limpo e bem cuidado. 
A Mônica pensa cuidadosamente em todos os detalhes, deixando no apt coisas como papel toalha, saca rolhas e coisas de cozinha que fizeram com que me sentisse em casa. Além disso, tem um guia super completo com todas as informações necessárias para conhecer a cidade. Esse cuidado faz toda a diferença.
Quando voltar, certamente será onde vou me hospedar.

Me and my boyfriend stood for 8 nights at this studio, we loved the place, perfectly ubicated, walking distance of Ipanema and Copacabana, in a secure and nice street without noice. We totaly recomend the place. 

Monica is a great host, she gives you all the information you need to have a great time at Rio.

The apartment is perfectly located, and will be even more so when the metro station reopens, as it stands just in front of it!
You are in the part of Copacabana closest to Ipanema. You can walk to both beaches in 3-5 minutes and you can walk around comfortably, as you are in the two safest neighborhoods of Rio.
The apartment is modern, clean, very well equipped, much better equipped than the average of the rental apartments I experienced in Brazil. Even shampoo and cangas (pareos) to take to the beach!
Monica is very nice and always ready to help whenever you need something. She has put together an AMAZING booklet on all you need to know in the apartment and in Rio. Extremely well done.

Uma ótima experiência! Tudo era como descrito. O apartamento fica perto de tudo (praias de Copacabana e Ipanema, restaurantes, padaria, supermercados, ônibus) e no mesmo tempo ele está situado numa rua bem tranquila. A Mônica nos recebeu muito bem, cuidava de tudo, houve até um livrinho com dicas para restaurantes, supermecados e muitas outras informacoes úteis! Muito obrigado para contribuir para as nossas ótimas e agradaveis férias no Brasil!

Increible el departamento, la ubicación y la amabilidad de Mónica. Ninguna crrítica y totalmente agradecida por la estadía!!!

Amazing department, location and friendliness of Monica. No criticism and totally grateful for the stay!
O apartamento é ótimo e a localização incrível. Mônica foi muito atenciosa e receptiva. Altamente (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei mais vezes.

Excelente acomodação ! Eu e minha namorada nos hospedamos durante algumas noites para ir ao evento Rock in Rio, o lugar é muito bem localizado e muito arrumadinho, perto das praias e de tudo que era necessário.

Monica é uma pessoa extremamente atenciosa e nos surpreendeu com a dedicação de nos repassar informações referentes ao evento e a pontos de interesse próximos ao local.

Monica is the BEST. And her apartment is WONDERFUL. My girlfriend and I stayed at her beautiful apartment for 2 weeks, during which she was nothing but kind, honest, helpful, and straightforward. She is super clean and organized, and I was so impressed with her attention to detail. 

The apartment itself is amazing as well: Totally clean and has everything you need. Perfect for couples. The location is fabulous, and Monica has left a good deal of helpful information for you if you're a tourist looking for advice.

In sum: Our stay in Rio could not have been better, in large part because of Monica and her cozy apartment. 

As someone who has lived in Rio for the past 8 months (and have lived in 4 apartments), I can tell you that you won't do better than this apartment and its wonderful host! :)
Great location, easy access to Ipanema and Copacabana beaches and the Lagoa. The apartment is small but comfortable, clean, safe and has everything you need. I will be happy to stay there again.

Monica, muito obrigado por um ótimo fim de semana no seu apartamento. Me sentí como em minha própria (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei. Um abrazo para voce!
For all other airbnb-users: I can definitely recommend staying at Monica`s apartment. Everything functioned perfectly. The apartment is well-situated, well-equiped, cozy and safe (which is a big advantage in Rio). Next time I will be in Rio, I will definitely contact Monica again and hope her place will be available.

This was my first time to use Airbnb and I can only say that this was very good. The point that I want to highlight and was the most important to me was that Monica was very very compliant with everything she said. This is also true for the conditions of the appartment. The appartment was very clean and exactly as specified in the pictures and description and also the hand over was so easy (Monica said she will be there at that time and she was). Really really good. In addition, I have to say that the appartment was in very good condition and in an excellent location. Also Monica is the best help as a tourist guide and provided all information we need to organize our trip. 

Strongly recommend!!!

Ficar no apartamento da Mônica foi maravilhoso! Tudo estava absolutamente limpo e organizado, fazendo parecer que éramos os primeiros a nos hospedar lá, o apartamento foi perfeito para acomodar confortavelmente eu e meu namorado. A localização é outro destaque positivo, nas proximidades do apartamento encontram-se farmácias, mercados, lanchonetes e restaurantes, além disso, as praias de Copacabana e Ipanema estão uma em cada extremidade da avenida próxima ao apartamento, chega-se facilmente à elas. Para andar de ônibus também é bem tranquilo pois há pontos de todas as linhas localizados em ruas e avenidas muito próximas ao apartamento, e para táxis, ao lado do prédio, é sempre possível encontrar alguns parados, quase como um ponto. Por fim, destaco que ter uma anfitriã que nos aguardava quando chegamos, que passou informações e dicas muito úteis para nossa estadia, que se colocou a disposição, e que foi nos encontrar para que nos despedíssemos, fez toda a diferença, Mônica realmente faz com que nos sintamos em casa! Foi a primeira experiências pelo airbnb e com certeza, primeira de muitas. Não há nada do que possamos reclamar. A hostess e o imóvel são mais do que indicados por nós! Valeu muito a pena!

Warm greetings to Monica.
We stay at her flat in novemb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) All was the best. Monica is very good proprietress welcoming, responsive. Apartment at the highest level, very very clean, very comfortable, it has everything you need, just a 5-minute walk from Copacabana beach and 10 minutes from Ipanema. You also can walk to lake, it`s near too. Monica has a lot of brochures which collected all necessary information about Rio. Speed of wi fi perfect. If it chooses a flat sure only get the best impressions from living in Rio.

I had a great time staying at Monica's apartment, the location is great puts you both in Ipanema and Copacabana,

Monica is really welcoming and helpful, she prepared a notebook with all the vital information you need to know about Rio in each neighborhood which helped me explore the city!

I will definitely stay here again!

Thanks Monica!

We were so happy to be with Monica and the neighborhood where her apartment is. She greeted us when we arrived which was later than we expected, showed us into the apartment and made us feel completely at ease. The apartment is very nice - clean and functional with a modern kitchen and amenities. We loved the neighborhood. There is a Metro stop literally right out the door and we were just three blocks from Copacabana  which is everything you have seen and heard ---wonderful to walk and enjoy whiling away your days, swimming, sunning and people watching. It is also an easy walk to Ipanema with eclectic neighborhoods and famous beach.  Every morning we would walk to a coffee shop where we got to know the sweet little girl who served us and have a delicious espresso or cappuccino with a ham and egg breakfast and fresh orange juice. A great shopping street for clothes, shoes, bags plus plus at good prices. Taxis were always available and all the drivers know Monica's street and the apartment location. She was there to meet us when it was time to leave and we have nothing but good memories of our stay in Rio. Thank you Monica. A Happy New Year and good things always.

Julie and Michael

In one word: AMAZING!!!!!

About...

MONICA: she was so helpful and clear since our first contact by mail/sms. She was waiting for us outside the maindoor of the building. She gave us a bottle of wine as christmas gift. She refounded us cause TV was not working normally (even if not necessary but sth appreciated and very nice of her).

STUDIO: the studio is absolutely well located, just between Copacabana and Ipanema, with Metro St at the house exit, with bus stop at 200mt, with nearby shops/bars/restaurants. There are maps and many important info in brochures. We found the flat very clean, bed/bathroom/kitchen are perfect as you can see from the pictures.

RIO: it's big, multicultural, interesting city. Not as dangerous as people say. Full of police but with organization / info points to improve. I'll go back for sure and obviously staying at Monica's Studio.

Monica was an excellent host and her place was perfect - it was bright, clean, the bed was comfy and it had everything you needed. Oh and did I mention the neighborhood! This location was right in the heart of everything but still very quiet and safe. Monica also had a lot of great recommendations and was very accommodating with our departures and arrival times. 

I would very much recommend Monica and her place.

the apartment is clean and in good location , within walking distance to both nice beaches, i did some jogging there and it was really nice.
The host Monica is great and she has compiled a list of what to do ,to see , to eat in the area and she even recommend me some great chinese restaurants in Rio.
overall , i have enjoyed my stay and i am sure i will be back again.
sc

Monica was a great host providing us with loads of cool information on what to enjoy in the area that was off the tourist track. The apartment was perfect for the two of us and the air conditioning was a nice break from the hot days. It's in an amazing location only 10 minute walk to both copacabana and ipanema beaches. It's super clean and comfortable and Monica made us feel very at home, even leaving us some lovely local prosecco as a honeymoon treat for us. The book with recommendations and maps was really appreciated too. Have already recommended this place to other travellers as the perfect place to enjoy the amazing city of Rio de Janeiro.

O lugar é ótimo, melhor que nas fotos, adoramos a estada no Rio.
Perto de tudo, limpo, cama confortável. Mônica é muito simpática e com certeza usaremos o flat de novo, recomendo!

El departamento es hermoso, tal cual se muestra en las fotos. La ubicacion es muy buena y Monica se porto excelente con nosotros. Nos indico donde ir como ir, nos recomendo lugares para visitar y siempre dispuesta a ayudarnos. Gracias Mónica!! Recomendable 100%!!
Excelente apartamento e localização! Na porta do metro e de uma estação de bicicletas. 100% recomendado. Voltarei seguramente.

Monica was extremely helpful and had so much information about the area ready for me when I got to rio . Perfect little clean apartment which was in a great neighborhood close to everything , Copacabana and Ipanema beach were both only a 10 min walk and the metro line was right outside the apartment ! I am very happy with the whole experience and would definitely stay there again !

EXCELENTE! El dpto es mas lindo y luminoso que en la fotos. Genial para parejas. Limpio, seguro, con aire y todo funciona. Esta en la puerta del subte. A 3 cuadras de la parte mas linda de Copacabana y un par de los bares de Ipanema. Todo se puede hacer facil y caminando. Todos los comercios necesarios en la zona. Monica 10 ptos, pues te deja una carpeta con info turistica y util, ademas de guias de Rio.  Ademas nos pudimos retirar tarde del dpto sin ningun problema. Seguro volveremos

Mónica es una excelente anfitriona, muy amable y dispuesta a orientarnos con todo lo que necesitamos. Nos esperó un buen rato debido a que nuestro vuelo se retrasó por lo que estamos muy agradecidos de ella. El departamento es fantástico, tiene todo lo que uno necesita, funciona todo a la perfección y está bellamente decorado. La ubicación es perfecta, a la salida del metro y muy cerca de las playas de Copacabana e Ipanema.
Sin duda, recomendable al 100%, si vuelvo a Río creo que no dudaría en alojarme aquí.
Una maravilla de apartamento.

Super hiper recomendo! A Mônica é super simpática, muito bacana! O apt é ótimo, uma graça, super charmoso. Fica a 500mt da praia, tem uma estação de metrô e de bike literalmente na frente da portaria do prédio. A Mônica ainda organizou todo o apt com guias, manuais e dicas. Recomendo demais, vá sem medo! 

Mônica is a great hostess! Her apartment is amazing, really cozy and charming. 500 mts walk from the beach with a metro (sub) and a bike station literaly by the building's entrance. Mônica has organized the apt with guides, manuals and tips for both brazilians and foreigner. I highly recommend it!

Monica Realmente es una excelente persona, tuvimos una atencion de primera desde el primer momento que llegamos a Rio hasta el ultimo dia q nos fuimos, nos envio a buscar al aeropuerto y hasta nos coordino un taxi el día que nos ibamos, nos dio toda la info para movernos en rio, estuvo constantemente preguntando como estabamos y se preocupo todo el tiempo por la estadia. El departamento HERMOSO, no me alcanzan las palabras para describir lo bien que nos trato. Muy recomendable, si van a Rio de Janeiro por favor vean a Monica Costa.. Mil millones de puntos de calificacion para Monica, saludos

Mónica fue una excelente anfitriona. El departamento es muy lindo y muy cómodo. Además estaba impecable. Cuenta con muchos detalles para la comodidad de los usuarios como: secador de pelo, muy buenos juegos de toallas, vajilla de cocina super completa y detalles más personales como productos de tocador. Destacado: Mónica incluye en su departamento información de interés y guías turísticas para conocer los mejores puntos de Rio.
El servicio de Internet y TV por cable funciona perfecto. El barrio es muy lindo y el departamento está muy bien ubicado, muy cerca de la playa.
La verdad, es altamente recomendable!!!

Gostaria de agradecer à Monica por oferecer um apartamento tal qual o anúncio: organizado, limpo, bem localizado e equipado com tudo o que é necessário para uma estada tranquila e confortável. Foram superadas todas as nossas expectativas.
Recomendo!

El departamento esta muy bien ubicado, a tres cuadras de la playa de Copacaba, muy lindo el barrio y el departamento super limpio y tranquilo. Monica es una excelente anfitriona, nos recibio muy bien, ayudandonos a orientarnos y sobre las cosas que podiamos hacer y visitar en nuestra estadia.

Es la segunda vez que utilizo airbnb para viajar y gracias a mi estadia donde Mónica puedo decir que es un excelente servicio. Mónica te recibe desde el primer día dándote todas las indicaciones importantes de Rio en una carpeta y mapas. Ademas te hace sentir como en casa en la comodidad de un hotel ( a nosotros nos coloco, mani, shampoo, jabon y toallas en el estudio). Por otro lado el estudio es perfecto para unas vacaciones en rio, es pequeño pero tiene todo lo que necesitas y queda justo en frente de al estación de metro general Osorio y paradas de buses con lo cual te puedes desplazar en todo rio, además de ser una zona muy segura. Por ultimo queda cerca de las mejores playas ( a pasos del posto 6 de Copacabana y de ipanema). lo recomiendo 100%

Monica has a wonderful studio-appartment and is an absolutely great host. The appartment is in a very safe neighbourhood, right across a subway station. This is not only very easy in getting around, but also makes sure that there are always plenty of people on the streets, even at night. Walking to the beaches of Ipanema or Copacobana takes only 5 minutes. The appartment is squeeky clean and Monica has made a information booklet wich helps getting around in the city. The appartment comes complete with towels, kanga's for the beach, wifi, shampooo/soaps and a little chocolate for welcome. We stayed here for 5 nights and can highly recommend this wonderful place to anyone wanting to check-out Rio!

Monica is the best! She took the time to explain where to go in Rio and was always available and responsive. She is an amazingly kind person. You can't go wrong staying in this apartment. It's perfectly located, safe and clean. And you have Monica as your host. My experience here was what we all hope for when booking with Airbnb. Greatness.

Monica's apartment is fantastic! Very well located in a nice area of Copacabana, steps from the metro station an d a few blocks from the beach.

Monica is an amazing host and we couldn't be more grateful! I would absolutely recommend to stay at Monica's apartment if you ever visit RJ and I would stay there again for sure!!!

The apartment was very nice, pretty big for a couple and very clean.
There is an equipped kitchen to cook.
Monica is a very goo host, very kind and helpful. You can join her anytime by mail or phone and makes everything to help you.
We recommend highly this apartment.

The Studio was very clean in a good building with security. The location was great, just 2 blocks from Copacabana Beach and in front of metro station. Monica (our host) was very helpful. She informed us how to reach her place, at her home she gave us information about good restaurants and beautiful places with the map, which helped us a lot. Monica is a great host. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

We stayed in the flat during the worldcup. All I can say, is that we had a great stay in a perfect location. 
All communication upfront happend very easily. Monica is very responsive too.
Due to delays with our flight, we arrived only at 2am. Monica waited for us, so we could get in.
The appartment is modern and very clean. We had all we needed. Monica provided towels too. You have airco and wifi which works well.
Finally, the location is great: less than 5 minutes walking from both Copacabana and Ipanema beaches. And you have a metro station and city bikes just in front.
So a great recommendation if you go Rio!

Monica was terrific - really sweet and incredibly helpful.  And the studio is lovely, and in a perfect location - a nice residential neighborhood within easy walking distance of both Copacabana and Ipanema beach, and right across from the metro station.  Highly recommended.

Monica was a great host with a beautiful apartment, very clean and had all we needed. Monica also gave us great advise about the area. Really easy to get to from bus terminal. Really close to subway and many more amenities. Would recommend to anyone visiting rio!

Monica's apartment was wonderful, and she is a generous and considerate host. The apartment itself is five steps from the metro, and five minutes walk from the beach. The bed is extremely comfortable and the kitchen is well equipped with everything we needed. 

Our flight wasn't until 9pm, so Monica arranged for us to take our bags to her sister's place so we could spend our last day in Rio without having to worry about them. She also booked a taxi to the airport for us, which was much cheaper than using a meter-taxi. 

Thanks for a wonderful stay Monica.

Highly recommend!! The absolute best deal in town! The space is well kept and fully equipped. Location is easy. Don't know if this was mentioned in previous reviews but across the street is a little cafe/restaurant that serves all meals all times of day! Monica has mastered hosting. She has a mini concierge desk in the room with all the insider tips. Monica was also extremely easy to get a hold off and has really good english.

My host Monica Costa was great! She was very attentive and prepared for my needs. She had already in place a folder with key information such as nearby restaurants, wi-fi password, maps, important phone numbers, etc. several pages of very useful information.

Moreover, we had plenty of towels, a very clean apt, some goodies waiting for us, etc. And Monica was available via whazup at virtually any time. She responded to inquiries very fast.

I highly recommend Monica Costa as your future host, as she cares about her guests.

A Monica nos recebeu no primeiro dia e nos deixou a vontade. Passou todas as informações com relação a transporte, alimentação e pontos turisticos. O apartamento é limpo, organizado e possui toda a infra necessária.

We spent 4 nights at Monica's flat in Rio and had a fantastic trip. The flat was absolutely perfect. The property was quiet at night and just a two minute bike ride from the beach. We loved the fact that a public bike stop was right outside the gate to the flat. We used them every day! Monica couldn't have been kinder and our stay in Rio at her flat was absolutely perfect! Thanks Monica!

O final de semana foi fantástico! A Mônica nos recebeu muito bem dando informações turísticas e dicas de restaurantes, supermercados, enfim, fomos super bem orientados! O flat é super confortável, limpo, organizado e bem decorado. A cozinha é bem montada e conta com itens essenciais para o preparo de refeições. A cama é super confortável e contamos com roupas de cama extras além de toalhas e cangas! Amei as cangas! Recomendo a estadia no flat! Irei voltar em breve!

Apesar de curta, 2 dias, a nossa estadia foi ótima! O apartamento é como descrito, bem localizado, aconchegante, limpo e com detalhes que demonstram o cuidado da Mônica para receber bem.  Ela é super atenciosa - nos deu várias informações importantes e esclareceu nossas dúvidas pacientemente, sempre disposta a ajudar em tudo. Obrigada, Mônica!

Monica welcomed us with her beautiful smile and lots of (really helpful) tips about touristic and practical info. She is a communicative and helpful host, always available over (Hidden by Airbnb) or email. The apt was super clean and really one of the best choice of our trip: directly above the metro station, at walking distance to both Ipanema and Copacabana beaches and well equipped.
The neighborhood is safe also during the night and there are a lot of bars and restaurants nearby, easily reachable by walking.
It is a perfect starting point for discovering a cidade meravillosa.
Thank you Monica!

Minha experiência foi maravilhosa!
Tudo ocorreu perfeitamente bem.
O apartamento é uma graça. Tudo bem limpinho, organizado e prático.
A localização é perfeita.  Ao lado da saída do metrô e perto da praia de Copacabana e Ipanema, com ótimos restaurantes, mercados e lojas.
Mas a melhor experiência foi a anfitriã Mônica.
Sempre muito prestativa e atenciosa. Ajudou-nos muito no nosso check-out. Atenção e carinho que faz a diferença.
Recomendo muito e com certeza voltaremos, Mônica.
Foi tudo perfeito.
Muitíssimo obrigado.
Até a próxima.
Namastê.

A Mônica é uma excelente anfitriã, nos proporcionou informações extras que precisávamos e nos deixou muito à vontade. O studio é exatamente como está descrito, decorado com bom gosto e equipado com tudo o que é necessário. Além disso, a localização é excelente. Só tenho elogios, nenhum reparo a fazer.

Monica est une personne charmante et agréable. Elle met tout de suite à l'aise. Son appartement est très bien situé (métro au pied de l'immeuble, arrêts de bus à très proche proximité). Les photos de l'appartement sont conformes. Appartement très propre avec une décoration soignée.
Les plages de Copacabana et d'Ipanéma sont accessibles à pied en moins de 10 minutes. Commerces et restaurant tout près.

Excellent location and excellent hostess. Monica made us feel at home immediately. The apartment is very pleasing and contains everything necessary to be comfortable while we stayed there. Some notables: there was a water filter installed and we had very reliable internet. We will surely look to stay at the same place in the future. Thanks also for the great tip on where to find the cheap feijoada.

The best place in Rio! You will feel like an authentic "carioca"(native). You can go walking to the beach and also to many restaurants nearby. There is a metro entrance just in front of the flat. As for the city, I spent 4 days, did so much things, but still not enough. I left the city already with a list of "to do's" for the next opportunity. And, finally, the host: Monica was always very helpful. She gathered a lot of experience hosting for almost 2 years in the AIRBNB. As a result she has plenty of guides that can match just what you want to experience in your trip. She also made a guide with (Hidden by Airbnb) maps prints, pointing hers favorites options. What more to say? Excellent!

This was an excellent airbnb choice. Organising everything with Monica is super easy and she is extremely friendly and helpful. The apartment is perfect for Rio. The location simply can't be beaten - walking distance to both Ipanema and Copacabana beaches and steps from the metro with loads of restaurants and bars in close proximity. But the apartment is also in a very quiet street. The apartment itself is great - spotlessly clean with good wifi and a comfortable bed. Will definitely stay here again on future Rio trips.
Muy buena anfitriona. El adepto. Tal como se ve en las fotos. Todo muy agradable.

A localização do apartamento não poderia ser melhor. Do lado do metrô, perto da praia, perto de supermercados e demais lojas, fizemos quase tudo à pé.
A anfitriã muito querida e muito educada, nos recepcionou na chegada e deixou diversas dicas sobre lugares. 
O apartamento é muito bem equipado e a Mônica tem um acervo de mapas, guias, dicas que é impossível se perder no Rio.
Obrigado pela receptividade, Mônica.
Pretendemos voltar em breve!

A Mônica é uma excelente anfitriã! Mesmo nós não conhecendo nada no Rio, ela nos fez sentir em casa! 
Minha primeira experiência com air BNB. E foi alem das minhas expectativas devido a hospitalidade e serventia da Mônica!
Muitíssimo obrigada, Mônica!
Sem duvidas, recomendo a todos!

Monica was very welcoming and provided us with lots of information about Rio, what to see , where to eat ect. The flat is very nice with a perfect space for a couple.the location is just ideal next to the tube station and 10 min walk to Ipanema or Copacabana beach. Very safe. We would recommend it to our friends. Thank u Monica for being such a nice host.

wirklich schöne Unterkunft mit Bad und Küche, sehr nette sehr hilfsbereite Vermieterin. Sehr sauber. Gute Lage fußläufig zu ipanema und copacabana. Gute Verkehrsverbindungen mit U-Bahnhof direkt vor der Tür und diversen Bussen auf halben Weg zum Strand. Davon einer Art Sackgasse gelegen trotzdem sehr ruhig. Nach unserer Erfahrung sichere Gegend. Herzlichen Dank für die Nette Aufnahme.

Mónica fue muy buena con nosotros. Nos esperó en el apartamento a pesar de que el bus se retrasó. 
Es una linda persona y el departamento es súper céntrico a 3 cuadras de Ipanema y 3 cuadras de Copa, justo en el centro. 
La zona es bonita y tranquila
El departamento está perfectamente equipado y muy bien ubicado. Tuvimos un inconveniente al llegar pero Mónica supo compensarnos.

Hote très sympathique. Plein de bons conseils sur rio dans l appartement.. studio propre et surtout très bien placé: metro au pied de l immeuble et entre copacabana et ipanema! Commerces à proximité. . Pied à terre parfait pour visiter rio!
Apartamento otimo, tudo conforme descrito. Excelente localização, confortavel, seguro e com otimo custo/beneficio. Recomendo.

Super séjour dans le studio de Monica !! Je recommande vivement cet appartement et cette hôtesse. En effet, l'appartement est idéalement situé pour les touristes: entre copacabana et ipaneima, et surtout, au pied du métro ce qui est bien pratique ici. Studio très propre, il paraît neuf, très agréable pour un couple. Concernant Monica, très bon accueil également! Détails précis pour arriver sans difficulté au studio, accueil chaleureux et surtout Monica prend le temps de nous donner des conseils (touristiques, transport, resto, laverie...). Elle est également très disponible par la suite si besoin (réservation de taxi...). Un grand merci Monica de nous avoir permis de passer un si beau séjour à Rio !! À bientôt à paris peut être ?!

Amazing location in one of the nicest neighborhoods in Rio. Super close to the beach, halfway between Ipanema and Copacabana. The apartment is renovated and it's ideal for for one or two ppl, I can't wait to return for a longer stay! I strongly recommend it and would book it again. Monica is a super host, very helpful with suggestions and extremely friendly.

As a well seasoned traveller Monica's apartment was exactly as described on the site. Monica greeted us even though it was later then expected and took time explaining the locality and any questions we had, me and my partner loved the decor and it was spotless. All being well I could not recommend area and Apartment highly enough .

O apartamento é exatamente aquilo que está descrito. Possui toda estrutura para uma excelente hospedagem: cama confortável, ar condicionado, banheiro adequado, internet, TV a cabo, cozinha completa (com utensílios), toalhas e cangas (para as mulheres). Há vários guias no balcão, que auxiliam os passeios. Na semana do Natal de 2014 havia muito policiamento em toda a região, o que nos transmitiu muita segurança. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, está a poucas quadras das praias de Ipanema e Copacabana (fica muito próximo aos postos 5 e 6, região muito bem recomendada), do Forte de Copacabana (recomendamos o café da manhã, a partir das 10h, exceto na segunda) e da Pedra do Arpoador (assista o pôr do sol, por volta das 19h). Bem servido por transporte público, é possível conhecer os principais pontos do Rio pegando ônibus por ali: Cristo, Pão de Açúcar, Jardim Botânico, Maracanã, centro e muitos outros . Há também um metro na porta, mas não o utilizamos. Há várias opções de restaurantes na região, para todos os gostos e bolsos. Apesar disso, a rua é super tranquila e garante noites tranquilas de sono. Além de tudo isso, a Mônica foi super simpática e atenciosa, nos recebeu muito bem. Enfim, eu e minha esposa tivemos uma maravilhosa semana no Rio de Janeiro, hospedados neste excelente local.

Monica was extremely helpful from day 1! The apartment was very clean and entirely renovated, just like the pictures show. Monica provided us with all the things we needed for a great stay. The location is great, just a few minutes walk to either Copacabana or Ipanema beaches.
I would definitely come back! Thank you Monica for everything!

A Monica foi uma excelente anfitriã, nos ajudou em tudo que precisamos a partir do momento que chegamos até a hora de irmos embora. Sempre prestativa e preocupada de como estava sendo nossa estadia. O Studio é uma bem localizado, limpo e organizado  com todos os equipamentos funcionando corretamente.  Local seguro e tranquilo de frente ao metrô, e pertinho das praias de Copacabana e Ipanema. Como o calor estava muito no periodo em que passamos no Rio, era um alegria chegar no Studio e desfrutar de um bom ar condicionado e assistir boa tv de assinatura, além do wifi que era ótimo. Passamos noites bem confortáveis e silenciosas. Recomendo a todos! Pretendo voltar outras vezes!
Obrigado Monica por toda sua atenção!

El departamento es perfecto. Tal como se ve en las fotos, tiene todo lo que se necesita como para sentirte en casa. Es ideal para dos personas. Está bien equipado y cuenta con un potente aire acondicionado y un ventilador de techo (ideales para los calores extremos de Río). Tiene un purificador de agua, lo que evita comprar agua mineral todo el tiempo. Está ubicado estratégicamente entre Copacabana e Ipanema, lo cual permite seleccionar la playa a la que ir cada día (ambas están a pocas cuadras). La zona es muy segura, muy linda y bien conectada con el metro de la ciudad: hay una entrada en la puerta principal. Hay numerosos supermercados y comercios. Mónica es una excelente anfitriona. Te da muy buena información sobre la ciudad (esa que sólo los locales tienen), soluciona cualquier potencial problema, y mantiene comunicación en tiempo real para cualquier cosa que necesites. La entrada y la salida han sido muy bien coordinadas. Y por si fuera poco, ella nos contrató un taxi al aeropuerto por una suma muy conveniente. En suma, no dudaría en volver a rentar este departamento. La ecuación calidad, precio y servicio, sumada a Río da un resultado perfecto. La mejor experiencia que uno se pueda imaginar!

Eu e meu namorado fomos muito bem recepcionados no apto da Monica. Ela foi uma fofa, nos explicou como funcionava a estadia e nos deu dicas de lugares para visitar no final de semana. 
O apto é excelente, completo, limpo e com uma decoração de muito bom gosto. Um ponto super positivo é o fato do prédio estar localizado na frente da estação de metrô General Osório, o que facilitou muito a nossa vida, já que estávamos com pouca grana para andar de táxi e tivemos que nos deslocar para o Centro, Botafogo e Maracanã.
A vizinhança é tranquila e há policiamento nas ruas do entorno.
Amamos!! Foi o melhor lugar que ficamos até agora no RJ e com certeza retornaremos. Super indico!!

Estuvimos hospedados 3 noches  en el departamento de monica  con mi novia y nos atendio exelente , desde el primer momento que quise alquilar su departamento , me facilito todas mis dudas y me atendio muy bien desde que llege a rio.. Ademas nos brindo mucha informacion util de como movernos por Rio y la ubicacion del departamento es realmente MUY BUENA!

El departamento es realmente muy lindo y cómodo. Está muy bien ubicado para poder recorrer cualquier punto de Rio: a cuadras de las playas de Copacabana e Ipanema, frente al subte y a una cuadra de donde pasan todos los omnibus.
Además Mónica estuvo siempre presente para lo que quisiéramos, nos permitió dejar el equipaje mas temprano y nos hizo una muy buena introducción para recorrer Rio (con muchos datos que nos dejó para facilitarnos la estadía).
Si vuelvo a Rio no dudo en ir de vuelta a este hermoso departamento.

A Mônica é uma excelente anfitriã. Me recebeu no apartamento, e teve toda a paciência para mostrar uma pasta que ela deixa no apartamento com diversas dicas e informações turísticas sobre o Rio de Janeiro, mesmo eu já conhecendo bem o Rio... rs

O apartamento é exatamente o que está sendo exibido nas fotos, sem tirar nem por... Excelente localização, a bike do Itaú na porta do prédio é fenomenal, bem como a estação do metrô. 

Enfim, recomendo e com certeza numa próxima estadia tentarei ficar no apto da Mônica.

Abraços,
Thiago Moraes

Monica was a lovely and very helpful host. The apartment is in the perfect location.. In between Ipanema and Copacabana beach. Right outside the apartment is the train station and also bikes which can be rented if you get a Brazilian sim. We loved the bikes! We rode them everywhere which helped us avoid taxi costs. The bike ride around the Lagoa is beautiful. Everything is within walking distance.. Definitely recommend this apartment.. We will be staying here again when we return.

Mónica fue una excelente anfitriona, nos recibió muy amablemente, con el depto en las mejores condiciones y hasta regalitos en la heladera. El depto es hermoso y muy funcional.
La zona es perfecta ya que estás a pocas cuadras de copacabana e ipanema a la vez.
Excelente anfitriã e excelente localização

Monica ist eine nette und sehr hilfsbereite Gastgeber und jederzeit offen für jegliche Fragen. Wir haben uns in dem Apartment sehr wohl gefühlt und haben unseren Aufenthalt genossen. Durch die optimale Lage kann man Strände wie auch Metro und Busstationen schnell erreichen. Bei einem nächsten Brasilienbesuch würden wir sicher wieder bei Monica buchen. Können wir nur weiter empfehlen.

Monica was fantastic. Very helpful through out and the apartment is in a convenient part of town right by the metro station. It was a great stay and if we return to Rio we would welcome a second stay.

Monica is an excellent hostess. She is very responsive and was kind enough to let us check in early and drop off our bags so we could explore the city. Monica was also helpful with plenty of tips for navigating around Rio. I enjoyed the neighborhood as it makes you feel like a local and is near everything you could need in a city. It is an excellent location. I would love to come back to her place.

Fomos muito bem recebidos por Mônica a qual, simpática e prestativa, nos informou sobre peças em cartaz, opções de lazer, etc. O studio é muito aconchegante numa excelente localização, em rua calma e central, além de muito bem equipado e limpo. Valeu muito a pena, recomendo e pretendemos voltar.

Al llegar encontramos en la heladera bebidas frescas para tomar Había ropa de cama y toallones adicionales en el placard, como así también almohadas y almohadones.El baño tenía los amenities necesarios al igual que una pequeña pileta para lavar y tender alguna ropa.
También Mónica nos dejó lonas para la playa, había reposera (y hasta una sombrilla que no llegamos a usar). La wifi y la tv excelentes. 
A poco más de 100 metros hay colectivos para todos los lugares que quieras ir. Bajando el edificio está la entrada al metro OSORIO. El barrio es lindo. De noche es preferible manejarse en taxi, aunque hemos llegado de noche sin problemas y hay mucha vigilancia policial en los alrededores.

This was my first trip to Rio, and I was so pleased with my experience. Staying at Monica's was a delight! My flight was delayed by several hours, but Monica was super warm and welcoming and flexible. Her studio is very cute and just as described, in a very safe feeling little neighborhood, at the entrance of the metro, next to a bikeshare station, and easily within walking distance of Copacabana and Ipenema beaches. Monica was super available throughout my stay, always available if I had a question, and provided lots of good orientation on arrival. She was also very flexible on letting my check in early and check out late. I highly recommend staying with Monica!

Nuestra estadía en el departamento fue excelente. Monica fue muy atenta, estuvo siempre en contacto.
El departamento tenía todo lo necesario para pasar unos lindos dias en rio de janeiro, supero ampliamente mis expectativas. Es la quinta vez que voy a Rio, y fue el mejor departamento que he alquilado. Muy bien equipado, con todos los detalles.
La ubicación es muy buena, a 3 cuadras de la playa de copacabana y a 5 de ipanema con todo a mano.. salida del metro al frente, para alquilar bicicletas "bike rio" al metros del departamento.
Silencioso por las noches, para un buen descanso.
Sin dudas volveria.
Muchas gracias Monica.

We had a fabulous stay at this apartment. Monica waited for us at the apartment when we arrived on our super early flight. She then gave us all kinds of tips and maps on where to find everything nearby. The apartment is just as it appears in the photos and our favorite aspect is the location. The apartment is a short walk to Ipanema and Copacabana and there is a metro station literally out front. 

We highly recommend this apartment!!

Monica's place is fantastic!  Close to both Copacabana and Ipanema.  Metro at the front door.  A quiet street with everything you need a few minutes away.  The apartment itself had everything i needed. The bathroom very modern.  The bed was comfortable. Monica was there when i arrived and gave me helpful information about the area.  Monica was always available to answer any question i had.  I would stay here again if i come back to Rio.

O apartamento era como nas fotos e a localização perfeita para quem está de turismo ou trabalho no RIO... mesmo eu que já tenho um histórico grande de visitas, me senti favorecido.

Recomendo a Mônica para ser sua próxima anfitriã.

Obrigado por tudo e pelas conversas que tivemos em minha chegada.

Um grande beijo.

The apartment was like in the photos and the perfect location for those on tourism or work in RIO ... even though I already have a long history of visits, I felt favored.

I recommend Monica to be his next host.

Thanks for everything and the conversations we had on my arrival.

A big kiss.

Monica was a great host, I couldn't recommend her and the apartment enough! She gave us lots of information on the area and what to see and do and helped us research hiking in the area. Monica was always available to answer questions. The apartment itself is lovely in a safe area outside a metro stop and by a city bike stop a couple of minutes from Ipanema and Copacabana

Apartamento muito bem localizado em um região tranquila e segura, fica apenas 3 quadras da praia. Confortável para um casal, com tv a cabo, internet e uma boa cozinha. As bikes do Itaú ficam em frente ao prédio, assim como uma estação de metro, o que ajuda MUITO. A Monica nos recebeu e foi muito atenciosa. Recomendo e pretendo voltar outras vezes.

We had a fantastic time in Rio during our stay in Monica's apartment. Apartment was spotless and indeed perfect for couples. 

Location is great. Right in between Copacabana beach and Ipanema beach (max 10 minutes walk to either one) in a safe neighborhood eight in front of the metrostation and bike station (Bike Rio). 

Monica has prepared an extensive map with handy tips how to get to places, how much it costs and how long it takes approximately. During our checkin she gave us a few extra recommendations after asking us about our interests. She was also very flexible with a very early checkin and late checkout. Taking all this into account, we are absolutely delighted to have chosen this apartment for our stay in Rio.

Next time in Rio we will definitely try to stay here again. Totally recommended!

We arrived at Monica's apartment after a 26 hour journey and she made us feel welcome as soon as we walked through the door. The apartment was very clean with everything we needed in a safe building which was in a good location- walking distance to a supermarket and bus stop. 
Monica was extremely helpful and provided us with maps, guide books and a fantastic manual which had every piece of information we could ever need! She encouraged us to get in touch with her if we had any questions but had covered everything in the manual! 
All in all, a very good base to explore Rio De Janeiro!

Hermoso y comodo! Monica divina y muy atenta! Llegamos y nos recibio muy bien, nos explico un monton de cosas y dejo una carpetita con informacion. Estuvo atenta en la semana por si necesitabamos algo. Pasamos una semana espectacular en Rio! El departamento es tal cual muestran las fotos. Muy buena ubicacion, cerca de playas, avenidas, centro comercial y el subte en la puerta! Gracias Moni!!

Monica was a very nice host. She not only made me feel welcome in her apartment but also helped me with the daily commutations and local insight. I would definitely recommend her.  More so would welcome her in Australia one day too.
Apartamento realmente charmoso, aconchegante, em excelente localização. E Mônica foi uma ótima anfitriã.
Ótima recepção da Monica! O apartamento possui uma ótima localização e é exatamente como nas fotos!! Super limpo e equipado!! Muito aconchegante!

A Monica foi muito gentil, desde o primeiro momento, passando as informações de transporte e localização. Nosso voo chegou tarde e ela nos aguardou a 1h da manhã com um sorriso no rosto e disposição para nos mostrar todas as dicas e informações importantes sobre o Rio e facilidades da área próxima. O apartamento estava impecável, limpo e exatamente como mostram as (Website hidden by Airbnb) tv a cabo e internet funcionando super bem. 
A localização é excelente, fizemos muitos passeios a pé, ficando bem próximas de copacabana e ipanema; além disso a estação de metro e de bikes do Itau e bem em frente o prédio. Adorei a estadia, voltaria e indicarei para os amigos e todos os viajantes do airbnb. 
Muito obrigada Monica, esperamos voltar em breve.
Um grande abraço.

The studio is great, clean, well situated (very closed from both Ipanema and Copacabana beaches) and very well equipped. Monica thought of all possible needs you may have (from hairdryer to beach towels to tourism instructions to kitchen equipment etc...) While we encountered a small water issue she immediately took care of everything and found solutions. Overall, Monica is a great host and clearly deserves her super host title! Thank you again for your kindness and flexibility!

Monica is a wonderful host. She gave us a lot of recommendations and she helped us a lot during our stay. The apartment is exactly what you need: the location is great - between Copacabana and Ipanema, by a subway station. The location is quiet and secure, there is very helpful guard downstairs. In short another awesome Airbnb experience. Thank you.

Llegar al apartamento de Monica es muy facil, y las fotos que aparecen del mismo no mienten para nada. La ubicación es perfecta, ideal para poder salir caminando de noche tanto a copacabana como a ipanema. El tener la parada de metro en frente es tambien un placer y muy comodo para trasladarse hasta otros puntos turisticos de Rio. 
Monica es super servicial y atenta, muy bien otorgado su award!! La verdad nuestra estadia en su apartamento fue ideal y lo super recomiendo. El barrio quizas tiene un poco de olor a querolina y pis de gato, pero es solo una cuadra al salir del apartamento, por eso no le doy 5 estrellas, pero definitivamente, cuando vuelva a rio, me quedare en el apartamento de Monica.

O estúdio é  exatamente como as fotos mostram, super limpo e organizado, muito bem localizado, ótimo para quem pretende utilizar transporte público. Fica próximo a tudo porém a rua é super silenciosa a noite o que me proporcionou ótimas noites de sono. Recomendo a todos e com certeza voltarei.

Que experiência maravilhosa! Foi minha primeira vez no Rio e também primeira vez usar Airbnb. Ambas experiências foram legais por causa da Mónica. O apto e justamente como apresentado aqui. É super bem localizado com entrada de metrô em frente do prédio, e com menos de 10 minutos a pé das duas praias (Copacabana e Ipanema). Mónica já escreveu uma guia para quem interessa com dicas bastante uteis. Não tenho reclamações, não. Ela me recebeu pessoalmente o primeiro dia, explicou tudo e me deixou pra aproveitar da cidade. Quando tive perguntas ou duvidas ela sempre me respondeu pronto e com (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza vou ligar para ela quando voltar ao Rio. Obrigado, Mónica! / What a great experience! This was my first time in Rio and first time using Airbnb, so I was nervous, but Monica put all my fears to rest. She was really professional, very responsive and super helpful. She even printed up a guide for tourists in various languages. The apartment is just as described and presented here. It's very well-located, with the metro right outside the front gate of the building. I always felt safe. It's 10 minutes walking distance from either Copacabana and Ipanema, and any groceries you may need to buy. I don't have any complaints. Without a doubt, I'll try book with Monica next time I visit Rio. Thanks for the great experience!

Monica was a warm, welcoming and accommodating hostess. She always responded promptly to our questions/requests.  In the apartment, she had an assortment of guides and maps. On top of that, she even created a binder with local restaurants and activities she recommends!  The apartment was clean and in a quiet and secure neighborhood; we could not have asked for a better location (10 minute walk to Ipanema beach, metro station entrance right outside the apartment).
