She was flexible when our flight was delayed (we arrived late) and gave us a nice, in-person overview of the apartment and neighborhood.  This was our first Air BnB experience and we are very satisfied. We would certainly recommend staying at Monica's again.

Net, schoon, verzorgd en eenvoudig te bereiken appartement op de grens tussen de wijken Copacabana en Ipanema. Van alle (noodzakelijke) gemakken voorzien en het makkelijke contact met verhuurder maakte dat wij ons snel thuis voelden. Wij kunnen eigenlijk geen negatieve woorden bedenken dus met andere woorden een aanrader! Wij hebben er heerlijke dagen gehad en genoten van de gastvrijheid van Rio. Zelfs aanwezigheid van map met tips :-)
Mônica é uma pessoa extremamente atenciosa. Eu e minha namorada estivemos pela primeira vez no Rio e a Mônica sugeriu várias opções turísticas. O local é seguro, muito bem localizado e aconchegante.

A Mónica foi extremamente simpática e atenciosa connosco desde a nossa chegada ao Brasil. Esperou por nós até tarde e preparou mesmo a nossa chegada oferecendo boas dicas para a cidade.

Sempre disponível para nos responder (via telefone, (Hidden by Airbnb) , ...) foi uma boa ajuda para resolver algumas das questões que aparecem normalmente (taxis, transportes, ...).

A casa correspondia totalmente ao apresentado no anúncio. É um bom apartamento, com tudo muito limpo e organizado, uma óptima localização: meio caminho da praia de Copacabana e Ipanema, walking distance da praia de 5 min, com metro e bicicletas à porta (literalmente!), porteiro e com bastantes serviços perto (supermercados Zona Sul, restaurantes, cafés, ...).

Quando um dia voltar ao Rio irei sem dúvida tentar alugar o mesmo apartamento, aconselho!
Monica é uma ótima anfitriã e seu apartamento é simpático, muito bem cuidado e com localização excelente, perto das praias e ao lado da estação de metrô. Recomendo.

La estadía fue excelente, el barrio es tranquilo y seguro. El estudio es tal cual lo describe Mónica y aparece en fotos, es cálido, confortable, y tiene todo lo necesario para una estadía turística. Lamento no haber conocido a Mónica personalmente, aunque su cuñado fue muy amable al esperarnos para entregar la llave, y enseñarnos diferentes lugares donde ir en Río. Seguramente volveremos a Río.

I'm probably lucky because all my hosts on airbnb have been awesome, but Monica really went the extra mile!

The apartment is great and exactly as advertised. 

Pros:
- Well located at walking distance from the beaches in Copa and Ipanema
- Steps from the subway and minutes from the bus stops
- Spacious for 2 people
- Clean 
- Very good natural light
- Elevator
- Doorman
- Internet (1mb)
- AC

Passamos uma semana no Rio mas a sensação é que poderiamos ficar um mês!

Desde que chegamos a Monica nos atendeu muito bem, e ficou sempre disponível.

A localização do apartamento é ótima e para ajudar a Monica é super organizada e tem um guia com recomendações do que há de melhor na região do apartamento e também da cidade.

O apartamento era tudo aquilo que esperávamos e conseguimos fazer tudo o que queriamos sem preocupações.

:)

This was an awesome experience. Monica was an extremely nice host. She was there at the apt when I arrived and told me a bit about the area surrounding the apt, as well as showing me a folder that she compiled with great tips, maps and other useful information for those visiting Rio de Janeiro for the first time. The apt was very clean and in a great location. I always felt safe even when walking back late at night. I will definitely consider this place again when I return to Rio.

Monica was a great host, from the moment we arrived she made us feel welcome. She provided us some information on Rio and where to go from some great food. The place is well situated for the beach and shops and in front of one of the metro stations. Great for people watching whilst having your morning coffee! I would recommend this to anyone that like to be part of the Rio community.

Monica was a friendly and helpful host.  She was very responsive and helped us with our questions throughout the visit.

The apartment is in a great location between Ipanema and Copacabana, and also has great access to the metro for reaching other parts of the city.

The apartment itself is a decent size for 1-2 people, with extra towels and sheets for the stay.  The kitchen is well equipped too.  Overall, this was a great option for us and we would stay again.
Foi uma experiência muito agradável, o flat é muito aconchegante e bem localizado. Bem limpo e arejado. Adorei :)

If you are looking for an affordable, clean, spacious and perfect located appartment in one of the most beautiful cities in the world - congratulations, you've found one!! Monica is a very professional and polite host. She told us everything you need to know for a perfect start so that you won't have any questions and if there are any you can contact her every time. The appartment is very spacious and has got a modern interior. The kitchen gots everything you need and you are able to drink water from the installed filter. To visit the beach you only need to walk 10 minutes while you are passing a supermarket, restaurants and - absolutely great - a metro station just in front of the house (it's not visible on (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps but it's the General Osorio station). From there you get to all interesting places very easy, fast and cheap. The appartment doesn't have a nice view out of the window and sometimes it's a bit loud because of the noises resounding between the houses. But if I would recommend an appartment in the center of a vibrant city than this and if I could also give stars to the host Monica would get 5 of it. So please don't hesitate to book this appartment - you won't regret it!

I enjoy the time that I spend at your loft . It is well located, I felt very secure day and night walking around the the residential area.
Many stores, restaurants, grocery stores, etc.
The loft as described by the owner, clean and with air conditioning very helpfull with hot nights. W
Exactly as advertised. Clean apartment, perfect for my stay. Monica was really accommodating with early check in and late check out too. Great stay!

Monica was so lovely and helpful. When I got in she walked me through all the ins and outs of Rio. I was so grateful.

The studio was VERY clean and well equipped. There were umbrellas for the afternoon rain, beach chair, power adapter, etc.

I loved the location too. It was definitely more locals which I enjoyed. that being said, it was still an easy walk to Ipanema where I enjoyed spending most of my time.

Nice. The best apartment I have ever been in Brazil (I spent 17 days in the country)
The apartment is very clean, confortable, very secured ( there is a doorman), with all you need ( filtered water, towels, wifi, tv, air conditioning), next the metro station (just down the building), easy to take a taxi, next copacabana beach, easy to visit the monuments, restaurants...
Monica is very available, helpful (she books a taxi for us). She gave us a lot of advices. 
Our stay in rio was wonderful!!! 
Thank a lot Monica.

O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, muito bem localizado e super agradável. A Mônica é uma excelente anfitriã e se mostrou bem disponível para nos ajudar com o que fosse necessário! Super recomendo!

A nossa estadia no Studio da Monica foi excelente!
Ela nos recebeu muito bem, foi flexível e fez o possível para resolver o único pequeno problema que tivemos com a internet. 
A localização e limpeza do Studio foram impecáveis!
Obrigada por tudo Monica!!

Nos veremos novamente, com certeza!

Monica es muy amable y nos recibió muy bien. Excelente nuestra estadía allí. El departamento es tal cual el anuncio, todo impecable.
Lo recomendamos!

Amaizing, clean apartment and great location! There is everything you need in the apartment including shampoo etc! Monica is lovely person and willing to help you with all the things! She has made this file you can read when you arrive about good restaurants on the map, cambio places, prices of taxis etc! Like a small local lonely planet for you about Rio and there is also many books and guides you can find good information!
Great apartment in a fantastic location. Monica also gave us some great tips and organised an airport transfer for us. Highly recommended!
El departamento es super comodo,  todo como en el anuncio. Muy bien ubicado.

Foi uma ótima experiência!
A Monica foi muito atenciosa, o apartamento atendeu todas as minhas expectativas.

Recomendo.

Pretendo voltar em breve.

No doubt, Mónica is a superhost! She was waiting for us and took all the time we needed to introduce the studio and the neighborhood to us. She had a folder with very good tips. The studio was exactly as described. The locations is perfect. The metro station entrance on the front door is really helpful.

Very conveniently located - literally 10 steps away from the tube. Host is always available to help you with anything you need, from studio-related matters to hot tips about Rio, all the whats, the wheres and the hows!

Monica was a very warm host who had detailed maps of Rio available at the apartment, which she explained beautifully. I even went to some of the restaurants and vars she recommended and they were all great. She was caring and helpful, and even booked my taxi to the airport when I was leaving. The Apartment is comfortable, clean, well-kept, cute, and literally 5 minutes from both Ipanema and Copacabana beaches. It was perfect for me, as I was travelling alone, but I feel it would be just as comfortable for two. It was a pleasure staying at her flat and I recommend it highly! Eu the amo, Monica!

Great location, between Copacabana and Ipanema beaches and bang in front of tbe subway. Small studio perfect for 1 or 2. I had a lovely stay and would certainly come back. Communication with Monica is smooth.

We had an awesome experience in Monica's apartment! Monica was there waiting to meet us when we arrived. She was very welcoming and kind and shared lots of information with us. 

The studio was very clean, well stocked and had everything we needed. It was perfect and Monica was so helpful! We can not thank her enough!

She even organized a taxi for us and it was waiting at 6am when we walked out the door to leave. Since very few people speak English, it was a huge help to us!

The location was fabulous! There is everything you need within walking distance! We would highly recommend Monica's Studio to anyone who is travelling to Rio! You'll love it as much as we did! Thanks, Monica!!

Localização excelente (walking distance to Copacabana, Arpoador and Ipanema). Prédio antigo, porém muito bem conservado. Apartamento reformado. Acomoda com conforto um casal. Cozinha bem equipada, o que lhe permite preparar seu café da manhã e até almoço ou jantar. Recomendo fortemente esta acomodação!

Great place within walking distance of the beach and an entrance to the station out front. The apartment is clean and well-equipped with all the basics you might need.

Monica was helpful and always available for questions. She also made a very helpful guidebook for the area and has a collection of many others about Rio and Brazil. Great choice for Rio.
Monica was great, the apartment was great, the city was great. Stop looking and just book this room.

La estadía en el apartamento de Monica fue excelente. Ella nos recibió con muchas indicaciones y datos útiles para que nos movamos y disfrutemos de Rio. La zona es muy conveniente dado que se encuentra a pocas cuadras tanto de Copacabana como de Ipanema. Inmejorable cercanía para el transporte público.

Fomos recebidas pela Mônica que é uma anfitriã muito atenciosa , nos deu todas as dicas de como ir e vir e sanou nossas dúvidas  .. 
O apto é muito agradável , adoramos a localização que é perfeita , podíamos nos locomover com facilidade , metrô e  estacao de bike, na porta , e a poucos metros de copacabana e Ipanema.
Sem contar que tem uma lanchonete na esquina, que abre o dia todo e tem ótimas opções e com um preço ótimo.  
Indico e pretendo voltar. 
Obrigada Mônica.
Muito bem localizado! Na frente do metro General Osório. Apartamento limpo cama muito boa. Recepção muito boa, chegamos tarde e ela esperou a gente. Muito Bom!

Apartment is perfect! Monica is very helpful with anything that you need and responds quickly to questions. If i return to Rio i will be staying here. Very safe area and direct access to the metro to get around the city.  Stop looking and just book you wont regret it. Being my first time using Airbnb i was nervous but for no reason enjoyed everything about our stay.

La experiencia fue excelente.  Mónica nos recibió casi a las doce de la noche de buen humor y con un montón de explicaciones de cómo conocer la ciudad. A lo largo de la estadía fuimos haciéndole preguntas que fueron contestadas al instante. El departamento esta re bien ubicado. Es muy cómodo y equipado. Incluso algunas noches cocinamos y cenamos con todos los utensillos de aca. En ningún momento sentimos peligro o inseguridad por la noche. Super recomendable!
Monica's apartment was everything it promised. It was right above the metro exit so it was easy to get anywhere, and so accessible to the beaches. Would happily stay there again!!

Espaço  exatamente  como as fotos. Super limpo e organizado. Localização excelente! Em frente  ao metro general Osório  e apenas 5 min de coapacabana ou ipanema. Monica super atenciosa, deixou dicas ótimas  para aproveitar a cidade
A Mônica foi uma excelente anfitriã, a localização é excelente (melhor impossível) e o apartamento é bem equipado. Agradecemos por tudo, foi uma estadia muito agradável!

Lovely apartment in a great location, walking distance from both Ipanema and Copacabana beaches, and right next to General Osario metro station.  The apartment is ideal for a couple or single person staying in Rio.  Monica is a friendly, welcoming host, and provides useful information on local places of interest, places to eat etc.  Highly recommended.

Host
Monica is probably the best host I've dealt with up to this point with Airbnb. Monica was very flexible with our early arrival and gave us accurate directions on how to get to the apartment's location. Monica introduced us to the apartment and all of its amenities. The best part; Monica took her time to explain all of Rio's amazing activities. She is well organized and showed us plenty of tourist maps, books and suggestion booklet on arrival. 

Location
Location is as A+ as the host. The apartment's location is right in the middle of everything. Copacabana, Ipanema and Leblon are steps away (not to mention Arpoador). The metro station is downstairs which can take you from Lapa all the way to Barra da Tijuca. 

Apartment
This is my 6th trip to Rio. Rio apartments for the most part are small. Monica's apartment is a good size and has everything you need (6 days for me and my gf). It was clean and well organized when we arrived.

Monica is a great host! Has tips for every kind of experience travelers look for in the city. She's even has a little home made book with all the great places one need to visit in Rio. The apartment is very well located, the metro station in just at your door step.
The apartment is cosy and clean. It was great staying there!

A Monica foi incrível! Deu várias dicas de onde ir e o que aproveitar, a recepção foi mais do que esperávamos! O Apartamento é ótimo, super arrumadinho, tudo funcionamento perfeitamente. O Prédio é ótimo, em frente ao metro e pertinho da praia e dos mercados! Localização perfeita! Saímos, querendo ficar!

El departamento muy limpio. Estéticamente es como se ve en las fotos. La ubicación es muy buena, frente a la parada de subte  y con fácil llegada a las playas de copacabana e ipanema. En cuanto a los horarios de llegada y salida pudimos coordinar muy bien con Monica. 100% recomendable.
The apartment is great. Exactly as pictured and Monica was just perfect. Fortunately early check in / late check out was possible and it was not a problem at all for her to accommodate.

Espaço ideal para uma pessoa ou casal. Limpo, confortável e em frente ao metrô, fácil acesso para Copacabana e Ipanema. Monica é uma anfitriã de verdade, que recebe a gente com impressos, mapas e dicas do que fazer na cidade. Amei a estadia e com certeza volto outras vezes!
Todo excelente, gracias monica por tu atención!

Monica is AMAZING! The most organised and thorough host I have ever had, what a lovely person. She really made everything so easy. Maps, guides to restaurants and local areas, suggestions all in a file! Beach umbrella, cleaning products, kitchen essentials all great.
The area is great and very convenient to get to Copacabana and Ipanema areas. Right next to a train station. It was so brilliant!
My only problem was there is no hot water in the kitchen or bathroom sinks so washing dishes and shaving were difficult and the shower did not get hot enough. However i think this is a Rio thing and not exclusive to this fantastic place, Thanks Monica.

El departamento esta impecable. Wifi y servicios perfectos. En la puerta esta el subterráneo por si quieren ir algún día al centro. A tres cuaadras de Ipenema y de Copacabana. Bellos restos y supermercados todo cerca. Volevermos

The best option in Río de Janeiro! The studio is perfect, in excellent area just in from a subway station. One can chose to go Copacabana or Ipanema beach. The flat has everything what one needs and Monica is the best host. It's our second time in the flat and we are sure that come back soon.

A Monica foi uma excelente anfitriã, nos recebeu super bem, nos deu dicas e orientações muito úteis, uma ótima pessoa. O espaço é confortável pra duas, até três pessoas. Possui todos os utensílios necessários para uma boa estadia. O maior ponto positivo é, sem dúvidas, a localização. Em frente ao terminal de metrô e poucos quarteirões das praias de Copacabana e Ipanema. Agradeço a Monica por ter feito parte dessa estadia maravilhosa que eu e meu namorado tivemos no Rio. A cidade é realmente maravilhosa. Pretendemos retornar muitas outras vezes.

We had a great stay in Monica's flat. We found the location to be excellent: it takes about 10 minutes to walk to either Copacabana or Ipanema beach; General Osorio is a major station from which many areas of the city can be accessed, including Lapa and a 10 minute Metro ride to Largo do Machado where you can get an official van up to Corcovado; a R$15 Uber ride to the cable car at Sugarloaf; and it only cost us R$45 to get an Uber to the international airport. The flat itself is great, with everything you need, and Monica is an extremely kind and helpful host.
Espaço bem equipado, bem localizado e com preço justo.
A very nicely located apartment, close to two beaches. The apartment itself is as described. Very clean and well-equipped. Communication with Monica was easy as was the check-in.

Monica is a very friendly host and the appartment is clean, well equipped and nicely decorated.
The Metro station is right in front of the door, if you want to use it. In general the appartment is located in a relatively quiet street. What maybe has to be mentioned is that a favela community entrance is not far away.
Muy buena ubicación, cómodo, limpio y agradable...un excelente lugar si quieres pasar por Rio. Mónica es una persona preocupada que se encarga de que tu estadía sea una grata experiencia.

Monica est une personne très gentille et serviable. Elle nous a rendu service en acceptant de venir déposer nos bagages 3 jours avant notre date d'arrivée dans l'appartement. Ce qui nous a beaucoup aidé ! Pour ce qui est de la localisation de l'appartement, très très bien situé, entre Ipanema et Copacabana. Nous pouvions à pied se rendre à l'un ou l'autre sans problème. Un métro juste au pied de l'immeuble, très pratique ! La vie nocturne aussi est très appréciable et pas un sentiment d'insécurité car comme précisé dans d'autres commentaires, l'immeuble est surveillé par un concierge et portail de sécurité. Pour ce qui est de l'appartement, à notre arrivée il était très propre, spatieux pour deux personnes, la SDB très bien aussi. Rien à dire de plus. Niveau qualité prix , cet appartement est à saisir pour votre passage à Rio. 
Thanks again Monica
A estadia foi maravilhosa, o apartamento é bem localizado, limpo, organizado e bem equipado.
Place was very nice!

Sejour agréable à Rio, notamment grâce à ce logement bien situé : au pied du métro, dans un coin calme et immeuble sécurisé. A 10 min à pied de Copacabana, et un petit quart d'heure pour rejoindre Ipanema.

J'y retournerais sans hésitation.

Lovely studio. Really charming  and incredbly .Close to everything, right in between Ipanema and Copacabana. Everything you need is right at your fingertips. Monica is such a lovely host. She takes out the time to offer you little comforts that make a world of difference.
Very detail oriented!! :)

Monica's place is roomy and well-decorated. The kitchen is well equipped. The place is right next to a metro stop, which is very convenient. It is close to the beach and some markets as well. Monica is a great host who is available to answer questions and help with tourist information. Definitely recommend this airbnb!

Ótima relação custo X benefício. Próximo ao metrô, praia de copacabana, Ipanema, supermercados, bancos... apartamento aconchegante, espaçoso  e limpo. 
O contato com a Mônica foi fácil, além de ser uma pessoa muito simpática e  (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaria e recomendo ;)

The apartent is perfect! close to everything, great internet, kitchen with all elements. the street is one block from a favela, but at any time is very safe, the police is always there. there a little bar open until midnight across the street. Always it is a street with a lot of people until late, so we feel safe. All the busses stop are close and the metro just outside the building. thank you very much Monica

Hospedagem muito boa para solteiro ou casal.
Confortável e boa estrutura.

Mais uma vez retorno ao apartamento de Mônica e saio muito satisfeito.
Amigos, vindo ao Rio fiquem aqui, ideal pelo lugar e pela hospitalidade.

Monica, nos recepcionou com muita simpatia e oferecendo dicas importantes sobre o  bairro, arredores e cidade.  O apartamento estava repleto de surpresinhas: cerveja gelada,  sabonete, material limpeza, ... É  delicioso:  ensolarado, decorado com simplicidade mas muito bom gosto, limpo, confortável, silencioso e com metrô na porta de casa!  Qdo retornarmos ao Rio, queremos nos hospedar aí novamente.
excelente, confortável, limpo! janelas anti-ruídos, até. adorei
Muy buen departamento. Todo muy limpio y muy buen ubicado. Mónica fue muy atentamente con nosotros y siempre estuvo a disposición. Volvería varias veces más

Monica is a perfect host. She will give you a lot of tips to enjoy Rio. The flat is well furbished, clean and perfectly located between Ipanema and Copacabana !!
It's also a quiet and safe area. Perfect place !!

El lugar tiene una excelente ubicación, cerca del metro, de buses y al frente de una estación de bicicletas , Mónica es una excelente anfitriona, siempre estuvo dispuesta para nuestras dudas y además nos dio una guía rápida de todo lo que debíamos saber en nuestra estancia . Recomendado 100% para hospedarse en una visita a Rio.

A Mônica foi gentil e atenciosa, o apartamento é prático e tudo correu muito bem. Ela nos deixou um bilhete simpático e também mapas e guias para que aproveitássemos o melhor do Rio. Obrigada, Mônica! Foi tudo ótimo!

El departamento es muy cómodo,  limpió y accesible para todo lo que uno quiere conocer.  La zona es segura. Y el departamento es mucho mas bonito de lo que se ve en fotos. Super recomendable!  Mónica esta todo el tiempo en contacto con cada consulta que uno tenga. Volvería sin ninguna duda alguna.
Recomendo alugar esse apartamento. Bem localizado e ótima recepção da anfitriã Monica.

A Mônica é uma excelente anfitriã, nos recebeu super bem e nos passou ótimas dicas de lugares para visitar, utilização de transporte público, táxis, uber, no apto ela deixou diversos guias da cidade e um guia ótimo montado por ela mesma, com informações muito úteis !!! O estúdio é mto bom e abastecido com o necessário para uma estada confortável. Localizado em frente a uma das saídas da estação de metrô  General Osório e tem por perto restaurantes, mercados, farmácia, etc..  além de estar pertinho das praias de Ipanema e Copacabana. Muito obrigada por td Mônica !!!

O studio da Mônica é exatamente como na foto.
Na frente do  metrô, há poucos minutos da praia de Copacabana e há poucos minutos da praia do Arpoador (bem no meio do caminho).
A rua bem calma e bem tranquila para quem estava viajando sozinha.
O espaço é super bem arejado e iluminado, bem limpo e tudo bem zelado.
A Mônica me esperou até tarde para pegar as chaves, e foi muito solícita a tudo.
Me senti em casa e espero voltar em breve! Adorei o local! =)
É uma ótima opção para quem deseja estar no Rio junto às melhores praias, com ótimas facilidades para se locomover na cidade, a pé ou de metrô.
A Monica no trouxe dicas otimas! excelente recepcao!
The apartment is clean, functional and well located... Monica my host was so helpful and available anytime I have questions. I recommend!

Fantastic location! 5min walk to Copacabana Beach and 10 min walk to Ipanema Beach. Flat is located in quiet street. The flat itself is super clean and modern! I will definitely be back! Thank you very much :)
Foi maravilhosa a hospitalidade, a Mônica e super simpática, o localigação e muito boa... Super indico.
Fantastico pisito muy cerca de la playa.  Seguro ( portero todo el dia y noche ) y muy limpio. Ademas nos aconsejo muy bien la propietaria acerca de que poder hacer por Rio. Realmente un placer.
Es un lugar muy comodo porque estas cerca de todo. Es seguro. Muy recomendable
Everything was perfect!

L'appartement est très bien situé, dans un quartier calme et proche des plages d'ipanema et copacabana.  Monica est très réactive, elle nous a très bien accueilli avec des conseils et des recommandations très pratiques.  Je recommande ce logement a 100%

Great and very cozy apt! It has the best location someone can chose in Rio (down one street and you are on Ipanema beach and if you follow the other street you are in the middle of Copacabana). Apt is really strategically located in-between, you got a juice bar just next to it, metro is literally in front of the doors, supermarket is in the same street. Apt is cute n comfortable. It has an efficient AC, so you will be able to sleep even when the hottest weather kicks in. Perfect place for a one or two persons. I will definitely stay here next yr ;) Monica is very responsive, so you wont have problems getting in touch with her!

Não tivemos o prazer de conhecer a Monica pessoalmente, devido a uma falha minha e de minha esposa quanto ao horário de checkin, independente disso, Monica foi super atenciosa conosco, extrema facilidade e agilidade tanto no checkin como no checkout, demonstrou grande preparo em lidar com pessoas em viagem. Apartamento exatamente como descrito no anúncio, bem localizado, limpo e (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza indicamos esta hospedagem. Para concluir só nos resta agradecermos a Monica pela gentileza e profissionalismo.
Wonderful apartment close from everything, just 100% recommended!
Excellent location that isnt very crowded. Monica was great!

A Mônica é uma excelente anfitriã, desde o início se mostrou bastante interessada em nos ajudar em relação aos principais pontos turísticos da cidade, fornecendo todas as informações necessárias para um proveitoso passeio turístico e também se colocando sempre a disposição em nos ajudar no que fosse necessário.

Em relação ao apartamento, o espaço é muito agradável, limpo e bastante confortável, equipado com todos os itens para uma boa estadia.

Enfim, os dias que passamos aqui foram perfeitos superando nossas expectativas.

We loved the place. The studio was very clean and nice neighborhood. The subway is right at the door of the apartament building and very close to Copacabana & Ipanema. It’s perfect for a couple. Lots of stores, restaurants and supermarkets. Mónica is very nice and if there is something to inform her, she answers you promptly. I highly recommend this little cozy studio. It’s perfect.
Appartement très agréable, quartier bien situé, proche des plages , des commerces et calme.

Monica was great! Super helpful, very quick responses and an overall great host! Her listing was perfect for a solo traveler like myself. Walking distance to the beach, public transportation, supermarket and even had a small restaurant across the street. Couldn’t ask for more! Would stay again!!!!
Excelente opcion en rio. Departamento comodo y en muy buen estado. Ubicacion cerca a todo y la atencion de monica es inmejorable. Lo recomiendo sin duda.
Monica’s place is amazing. Great location, great apt, and great host. I will definitely try to stay at Monica’a again. I recommend it.
Mónica is a great host and the place is really nice, has a perfect location!
great location, very clean place and Monica is amazing

Un super apartamento, bien distribuido, amplio, con todo lo necesario para pasar unas buenas y largas vacaciones. Ubicación estratégica para llegar a Copa Cabana e Ipanema, y si usas metro, lo tienes al costado.
Perfect in every way! Close to beach & anything you need.  Excellent communication and tips.
Todo muy bueno

Recomiendo mucho hospedarse en lo de Mónica, el departamento está excelentemente ubicado en medio de las distintas playas y tiene todo cerca, la zona es muy linda y se puede ir caminando a todos lados. Reservamos el apartamento de un día para el otro y ella fue muy amable con nosotros, manteniendose en contacto. Ideal para una o dos personas, el edificio tiene encargado en la puerta, y todo en la casa funciona bien :). Súper recomendado!

Monica's place is in a perfect location between Ipanema and Copacabana beaches and there is a metro station right outside to access the central part of the city. She gave us some great tips on getting to the main sights and was helpful and responsive to messages throughout our stay. I highly recommend Monica's apartment!

Monica’s place is perfectly situated and really nice. My girlfriend and I loved staying there. It’s right on the cusp between Copacabana and Ipanema, two great areas to explore, with beautiful beaches a short walk from the apartment. The metro stop is right outside, and Monica gave great tips! Highly recommended.

Otima localização, proximo da praia de Copacabana e Ipanema.
Metrô e bicicletas na frente do prédio.
Supermercado a poucos metros também.

Essa foi a segunda vez que me hospedo no local, ótimo para ir em casal ou sozinho.

Monica é uma anfitriã nota 1000. estava sozinha por um período, ofereceu-se para ir a praia comigo. ótimo. apartamento super bem localizado, limpo, tal como as fotos. em frente ao metrô...funcional. amei. tanto que ficarei mais dias agora antes de voltar a minha cidade. super recomendo
Muito legal o espaço, pratico, limpo e perto de tudo na zona sul. Atendeu de forma muito boa as minhas expectativas. Monica é uma ótima anfitriã. Recomendo!

name: Large Garden Duplex on Park block
summary: Large duplex on prime Park block in West 80ies. Bedrooms sleep 4 adults and 1 or 2 toddlers plus a couch for 2 adults. Lower level with office and TV room. Easy subway/bus access and Citi bikes. Ask us for chromebook or baby supplies.
space: Large duplex on prime block on UWS in 80ies between CPW and Columbus. 2 bedrooms sleep 4 adults and 2 toddlers. There is a sleeping couch for 2 more adults. Ask us for chromebook or baby supplies. We have it.  Upper West Side garden level apartment in brownstone building on 80ies between Central Park West and Columbus Ave. Walk in less than 5 minutes to Central Park. Great to discover the Upper West Side (3 blocks from Natural History Museum), Central park (close to the jogging track at the Jacky Onassis Reservoir), as well as the Upper East Side (short walk through Park to Guggenheim etc). Many top restaurants in waking distance. Easy to get downtown: 2 blocks away from subway stop (B, C) and the red line is also close.  The apartment was fully renovated 3 years ago and tastefully furnished (20th century modern). 2 quiet bedrooms can sleep 4 adults and 2 children (two real double bed (queen), 2 toddler beds). There is a sleeping couch for 2 more adults. The apartment features 1.5 bath
description: Large duplex on prime Park block in West 80ies. Bedrooms sleep 4 adults and 1 or 2 toddlers plus a couch for 2 adults. Lower level with office and TV room. Easy subway/bus access and Citi bikes. Ask us for chromebook or baby supplies. Large duplex on prime block on UWS in 80ies between CPW and Columbus. 2 bedrooms sleep 4 adults and 2 toddlers. There is a sleeping couch for 2 more adults. Ask us for chromebook or baby supplies. We have it.  Upper West Side garden level apartment in brownstone building on 80ies between Central Park West and Columbus Ave. Walk in less than 5 minutes to Central Park. Great to discover the Upper West Side (3 blocks from Natural History Museum), Central park (close to the jogging track at the Jacky Onassis Reservoir), as well as the Upper East Side (short walk through Park to Guggenheim etc). Many top restaurants in waking distance. Easy to get downtown: 2 blocks away from subway stop (B, C) and the red line is also close.  The apartment was fully renovated
transit: Very close to subways (b,c, 1) and buses Citibikes in same block, where you can rent bikes for the day.
house_rules: The apartment is in very good condition and very nicely furnished and we would expect our guests to be considerate.  No smoking (other than in garden) No pets. No parties.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a European who stranded in NYC in 1999 and am loving it. Come and visit !

reviews.comments:
We stayed there for one week with our 1 1/2 old daughter. Lovely little place with a garden - perfect for her to run around and play. It was such a nice and quiet street - you could even hear birds chirping in the morning. Amazing location - one block from the park, and one block from the nicest part of the upper westside.
We would definitely stay there again.

We loved staying here, it's perfect or a family and a beautiful, convenient location. Everything you could possibly need at your doorstep.

Dirk was a great host letting us in and showing us around when we arrived, he even helped us with our bags. Debra-Jo who assists with the property when Dirk isn't around was fantastic and helpful too. She even asked some delicious cookies for us. I look forward to staying here again.

What a place to stay for a family in NYC! This apartment was amazing for the 5 of us, it is more like a 4 bedroom apartment rather than 2.5, as there is so much space over the 2 floors. The best things about it include the amazing interior design and furnishings, the size of the space and the proximity to Central Park that is no more than 100 yards away (the subway is about 200 yards away). The apartment also has a garden and a BBQ grill which is remarkable considering the location.

 My only slight worry was the stairs that were quite steep for my 2 year old but that didn't matter as we put a sofa in front of them so he couldn't access them. 

Our hosts, Dirk and his family and Debra Jo were amazing. They left us some cookies which my wife and kids loved and made us feel really welcome. They even lent us a wide variety of toys and scooters to play with and my daughter ended up playing with our host's kids. We had the best time in New York, and so much thanks is due to the amazing hospitality and apartment that our hosts let us stay in. Thank you guys.

Our family of four just enjoyed a fantastic (near month) stay at Dirk's lovely apartment. The apartment has been renovated with top quality materials and appliances.  The location is unbeatable - a few blocks from Natural History Museum and subway, half a block from Central Park, and only a block away from our favorite breakfast restaurant, and a zillion other great restaurants. Dirk was absolutely lovely and efficient to deal with - as was Debra Jo who as our contact for anything we needed. The space, while only being "2 bedroom" could clearly cater for more.  We only used the top floor, and rarely went to the basement level, but it was great to stretch out into and not feel cluttered.  Thanks for Dirk and Debra Jo for our lovely stay.
Perfect UWS base for a group of five.  Stylish apartment with outside space is ideal for young children.

Absolutely gorgeous apartment located in a very cozy part of the busiest city in the world. The apartment is very spacious (especially considering the fact that you're in New York), and the kitchen and living rooms are amazing. If you like to cook, this is the place for you- the kitchen space is extremely generous, there is also an kitchen island with some benches. Dirk provided all the pots/pans/kitchenware, and the gorgeous dining table seats 6. Lastly, the patio in the back (see picture) was an amazing place to just unwind and relax. If you sit there for long enough, you will forget you are living in one of the most populous cities in the world. Oh, and if you decide that the patio isn't a good enough way to escape from the city, central park is only a 5 minute walk away. I would highly recommend this apartment for anyone looking for a great time in NY!

We had a wonderful time in NYC much thanks to Dirk and his wife. The apartment was wonderful. Very clean and stylish. They were very helpful and answered many questions and always with a very fast respond time. We stayed 5 adults and 1 child of 4 without any problems. They apartment had everything that you need and there is a grocery store close by on the corner of the street. 

I can very much recommend this rental.

I shared this great apartment with my business partner and his wife & kid. It was just perfect. It is much larger than any other place I've stayed in NY, and the extra rooms downstairs were perfect for the little one to stay. It really worked as a 3 bedroom for us.

The hosts we re accommodating, quick to respond, and very thoughtful. I'd stay there again in a heartbeat.

Superbe logement, très bien placé et parfaitement équipé.
Je le recommande vivement.
Merci Dirk.

My family stayed here for the NYC Marathon weekend and it was the perfect place. It had everything we needed and great location close to the park (very convenient for the finish line of the marathon!). I would highly reccommend staying here! We also received some delicious muffins! Thank you Dirk for your hospitality.

A gorgeous, large apartment an easy walk to everything you need. Beautifully furnished and very well equipped. Easily accommodated two adults and a very busy three-year-old. We'll definitely be back. Thanks for everything Dirk!

Très bel appartement, spacieux, très bien décoré et bien placé à côté de central park. 2 stations de métro desservant Manahattan et Brooklyn sont à deux pas.
Dirk est très réactif et arrangeant (nous sommes arrivés à 2h du matin!).
Nous étions 5, il y a un grand lit très confortable, l autre lit double est un canapé lit peu confortable et les autres lits sont des petits lits une place.

Nous le recommandons.

The apartment was fantastic for 3 adults and 2 toddlers.  It was easy to get all of our gear into the apartment, had a very large foyer outside of the apartment proper for shoes, strollers, etc.  Inside, the apartment was very nice with good furniture, high end bathrooms (Duravit/ Grohe) useful kitchen with nice applicances.  It was also spotless (even under the bed that we moved to put up 2 pack and plays).  The downstairs area was great so our nanny had her own space -- felt almost like 2 separate apartments.  

The manager of the apartment was great!  She saved us a parking space in front of the building and was extremely responsive to e-mails, texts and phone calls.  Met us at the apartment and walked through everything.  Also was great to have a washer and dryer to do a couple loads of laundry.

Finally, location was fantastic.  I lived on the Upper West Side for 5 years and everthing was nearby.  Zabars, Gristedes, Macoron Parlour, Levain Bakery, Fairway, Sarabeth's, b Cafe, Corvo (cool for drinks), etc.

Best stay ever in New York! We have been to the city many times to visit our children, and Dirk's lovely apartment was the highlight of our latest visit. Easy to get to via car or subway; quiet, relaxing atmosphere; clean and comfortable and beautifully decorated. We used the patio and grill for lunch one day, and enjoyed sipping wine under the stars at night.  Debra Jo answered any questions we had immediately, and left a delicious carrot cake as a Mother's Day treat. We highly recommend Dirk's apartment!

Dirk is really friendly, easy & fast for communication.

The house is great--I didn't expect such a spacious house in upper west side, just one block away from Central Park!

Check-in was easy, neighborhood is nice, house is comfortable!

Would highly recommend for a family trip!

We had an amazing time at this beautiful apartment in the upper west side of NYC. The photos don't do the place justice - it is spacious, and beautifully decorated. The beds are super comfy, and the kitchen is very well equipped. Dirk and Debra-Jo made us feel very comfortable and were very quick to provide us with everything we needed. The area is fantastic for restaurants, and the metro is one block away and Central Park is at the end of the street! We hope to come back one day.

Well located close to Central Park. Nice, clean and a lot of space. Kitchen well equiped. 
Subway nearby. We arrived late but thanks to the responsive communication, everything went smoothly. 
Dirk and DebraJo seemed to be relaxed People. Great place to stay.

This was our first experience with Airbnb and it couldn't have been better. Everything ran very smoothly. Dirk's apartment was beautifully decorated, had plenty of space and was in the perfect location for our family vacation. They even baked us a cake! Such a thoughtful gesture. I'd highly recommend this apartment and set of hosts!

Perfect location! Beautiful, clean and very comfortable apartment! And very responsive and friendly host and property manager! (The property mgr even fm dropped off homemade scones for us one morning :-) We spent a week at this wonderful apartment and I can safely say we'll be returning in the future for sure! Perfect for 2 couples as there are 2 queen bedrooms or for a family with small children. Our host even provided toys, games & strollers for the little ones.  Also the apartment is spacious so you never feel like you're on top of each other. The kitchen was stocked with everything you need to cook but if you feel like eating out there's literally dozens of fabulous places within walking distance.  I highly recommend this apartment to anyone looking to have a comfortable, relaxing lodging experience in NYC!

Dirk was perfect.
The apartement was also wonderfull.
We will come again.
Thanks

Wonderful, wonderful, wonderful. Dirk's apartment was exactly what we wanted. We were traveling with 5 adults, 4 year old and a 1 year old. Everything we needed was supplied. Very spacious, very comfortable and very homely. Dirk stayed in constant communication with us, before arriving and while in New York. Thank you so much for sharing your home with us.

We had a great experience at Dirk's place. Great location, great apartment, great host. 
No hesitations recommending this place.

Accommodations were exactly as described in the listing. The apartment is bright, spacious and had everything we could have wanted with an 18-month old in tow. Dirk was great, providing concise info about key pick up, check out time, etc. Location was unbelievable. Right next to Central Park, the Natural History Museum and the blue / orange subway lines. Really a family friendly NYC neighborhood and walking distance to Shake Shack. What could be better?

My group had a wonderful stay at this beautiful apartment. The outdoor garden was an oasis of sorts and the decor was mid century modern-straight out of Mad Men! The pictures simply do not do the wonderful space justice. The host was easy to communicate with and accommodating in regards to check in/check out times. We were greeted by homemade brownies and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The location was also fantastic as it was right near Central Park and the American Museum of Natural History. Cannot recommend this apartment enough and hope to return in the future.

Dirk has been a fantastic host and the appartment was very beautiful, clean and cozy. We really loved to stay in Dirk's appartment and especially enjoyed the littlte garden. Dirk was very responsive and answered all our questions immediately. He gave us very good restaurant tips in the neighbourhood. It was amazing that we were surprised with fresh baked brownies during our stay. We will definitely come back!

We had a fantastic 9 night stay in the apartment.  It was very clean, quiet (very unique for NYC!), spacious and comfortable for us (4 adults and 1 child). Dirk and his family were so welcoming and helpful throughout the stay: there was a delicious welcome cake, assisting my parents with their bags and arrival, a well equipped apartment (kitchen has everything you need, and Dirk kindly provided a box of toys which kept our daughter happy for hours and a stroller for us to all get out and about despite the jet lag) and farm fresh eggs from the farmers' market.  We valued their local knowledge and assistance, especially when our daughter broke her arm...the advice helped us get everything sorted very quickly.  And the garden is a little oasis.
All in all, I can highly recommend Dirk as a host and his apartment.  We had an excellent experience and would definitely return.

Experience Dirk house was simply fabulous, I have no words to thank them for everything they did for us. Debra and him exceeded their responsibilities as hosts.
1- Being a group of 6 adults and a 7 years old child traveling through our wedding, it was very important for us to find a comfortable place and also nice one for our pre-wedding photo shoot. During the booking process Dirk was very friendly and answered each of my questions more attentively.
2- The place: an apartment on the ground floor (with small but lovely garden with deck) with two main rooms (one with a window overlooking the garden) and a third room in the basement, hardwood floors, kitchen modern, fully equipped, air conditioning, WiFi, TV in the basement (which we never used), minimalist modern finishes ... In short: beautiful
3- Location: one block from Central Park! Two blocks from the Blue (C) line and about 3 blocks from the red line on Broadway.
A Deli on the corner for fast food purchases. A quiet and safe area. UWS is a family area ...
4- Communication: Debra was at all times aware of our needs via whatssap; We had a big problem with my brother's family that used for the first time Airbnb in another apartment In the  area, and had to leave abruptly because The person rented them was not the real owner. Debra and Dirk helped with this urgency, which I will be grateful forever! My advice: always read the reviews and ask if the writer own the property.
100% recommend this accommodation. Dirk we will back!
Apt had everything we needed. Well stocked and very comfortable. Loved the vibe and location was superb. Very close to museum,park and restaurants.

Really great location half a block from park and 2 blocks from subway. Apt was clean and spacious and quiet. Great AC also for the hot summer days. Dirk was incredibly responsive and helpful throughout trip. Would stay again anytime

We stayed with three adults and 2 young children (ages 3 & 1) and Dirk was a tremendous host. He made available for us a travel crib, a toddler bed, toys, scooters and a stroller and was provided prompt and helpful communication whenever needed. He even brought by a bicycle pump so we could pump up the stroller tires. The space was exceptionally clean and, for NYC, remarkably spacious. The apartment is well-appointed with sheets, towels, soap, detergent for the washing machine, and kitchen equipment, and very much as pictured. I wish only we'd lived there when we were Manhattan residents! Oh, and the cookies the housekeeper brought for us were divine, and such a kind touch.

Had a great time in NY, and this appartement. Was perfect for our family, with 3 kids. Close to Central Park, subway, and nice restaurants and places to buy required breakfast or other good food.
When we arrived, it smelled a bit, the host came to act quickly. Later I noticed same smell in whole area, I guess result from torential rains earlier that morning, so not really something that could be influenced. All in all, we had a great stay.
It is a wonderful house for our family with two kids. This house is very nice, comfortable and convenient. My family had a greet time here.

Dirk was very accommodating and welcoming when booking and arranging the vacation. The apartment was as pictured with high quality finishing and fixtures throughout.  Some little extra touches such as the tea and toiletries were thoughtful and well received as well as the box of games and toys as he knew that we were bringing our young daughter.

The apartment is lovely and spacious and is very well organised for guests. Dirk is very responsive to queries. The apartment is on a beautiful tree-lined street. The garden in the back is fantastic. I would love to come back again.

We were six friends discovering New York for the first time and dirk's appartment was the perfect place to do that. Best location, spacious and confortable bedrooms furnished with taste. Dirk was helpful and responsive. Special thanks to Debrajo who took care of us and solve all our little issues during our stay. Highly recommanded !

A terrific stay.   It's a beautiful apartment in a great location. Host is very accommodating and responsive.  Apt is well equipped. We'd definitely stay here again. The only minor downside was the 7am sounds of kids upstairs... A little early for West Coasters... But to be expected in a NYC brownstone.

Fantastic apartment where we spent three nights for a wedding. Dirk provided us with a crib in the master bedroom for our infant and the guest room was ready with two beds for our older boys (5 and 7). Another couple stayed with us on the sofa-bed in the basement. It was all perfect and we loved eating our meals outside on the back terrace. There also are strollers and scooters available for the kids, which was just incredible. The neighborhood is super safe with all the amenities anyone would want/need. Basically, perfect!

The apartment was perfect!  It was just as listed and the location could not have been better!  My family enjoyed the lemon cake the host dropped off -just to welcome them to NYC! Dirk was very prompt and responsive to our inquiries.

Perfect!  A very nice home away from home.  The apartment is very comfortable and the kitchen is well outfitted for meal prep (limits dining out).  Easy walking to subway, museums, Central Park, markets, restaurants, etc.  Nice neighborhood to walk around and always felt safe.  We would definitely try to stay here again if we have future visits to NY.

Highly recommend this garden duplex! It's exactly as shown, which is wonderful, and the location and neighborhood are even better! Dirk and Debra Jo were a joy to deal with, and the home baked goodies were a great welcome. Seriously can't say enough kind things about the host and our experience. This place is amazing - we will be back!

The description is accurate and the apartment was very clean.  The garden is lovely.     I do not think the apartment would be suitable for an active toddler as the stairs are very steep and one of the couches leans against a low glass wall that is over the stairs.
  Dirk was great to send someone over when we were having a problem with a circuit tripping.   
The location was fantastic for us and is a very short walk to Central Park.

Great stay ! The appartment is very well located, very comfortable  , quiet and exactly as described.
We appreciated Debra Jo's cakes when we arrived. 
Dirk was very reactive
We warmly recommand this place.
Dirk was very responsive and a great host - the apartment was clean and exactly as pictured.

Dirk's place was fantastic (yes, all those other reviews are accurate).  The space was perfect for our family of 4 (two kids ages 2 & 6) plus my in-laws.  The kids had toys to play with and the 6 year old really enjoyed riding the bike and scooters in the park.  The kitchen was equipped with everything we needed to cook a fully Thanksgiving meal.  The location, less than 1 block from Central Park, is perfect for active kids. This was also the perfect place for the Macy's Parade.  We will definitely be staying again.

Dirk is an amazing host and did all he could to make our stay easy and comfortable! His apartment is very nice, spacious, great kitchen and nice neighborhood!  Half a block from the park so great for a morning wall to the Reservoir. First time using Airbnb and if I need to use it again in NY will certainly look for his place or any other location he manages in the future

Very nice garden duplex as stated just a half block from Central Park and a big range of restaurants. The apartment is very stylishly furnished and more spacious than we had expected - with plenty of room for a family of five and no kids sharing beds.  Overall, a holiday treat. Note that the lower floor is a basement, but it is only for sleeping in so not a big deal.

The condo was excellent. It was clean, convenient and comfortable. The location is ideal, especially for a family. The proximity to Central Park is amazing and there are numerous shops and tasty restaurants nearby. We hope to stay there again the next time we visit. There were no issues and communication with the owner was seamless.
Todo muy bien, la casa tal cual se ve en las fotos. Dick muy atento y dispuesto a colaborar en todo. Gracias!
This apartment is truly special.  You feel like you have your very own NYC apartment, the location is superb and the apartment is spacious and well appointed.

The apartment is incredibly nice, super clean, well decorated, comfortable and in an incredible neighborhood, I love the UWS. Dirk and his support team  were impeccable, the apartment was waiting with fresh flowers. Did not meet them but were in contact for any need or concern and even left by the door fresh baked cookies for my sons one early morning for breakfast.  The apartment is as described, everything is working and well stocked. Its big for Manhattan standards and the garden in the back is a nice bonus. All the linen is very nice. Dirk is easy going and flexible to adjust in and outs according to flight schedules. He responds intently to any question. Would love to be back sometime.

Dirk was an excellent host who was very accommodating and friendly. Everything went as seamlessly as possible. The property is just as pictured and is an extremely ideal location. I would absolutely stay at this property again.

We had a great stay at this location.  Property was clean and exactly as described.  Location is excellent and we would definitely return again.  Perfect for a NYC visit with kids -- gives you a bit more room than a hotel.

Beautiful spot on the upper east side! Conveniently located to the Met, Natural History Museum and Central Park. Safe quite neighborhood - excellent option for families. The host Dirk allowed us an early check in as well as a late check out with out any penalty, much appreciated!

Great apartment in a nice part of town.  We are a family of 6 (2 adults / 4 kids under 10) and there was plenty of room.  The garden is a bonus.  Dirk was incredibly helpful and responsive, both before and during our stay.  Really close to Central Park and the 86th St subway for quick access to midtown, downtown and the main tourist sites.  Highly recommended.

Dirk and his assistant Debora Jo were outstanding and incredibly responsive hosts and their apartment was truly perfect for our vacation. We came with 2 small children and the layout and location were perfect for us. The house is pre-stocked with childrens books, toys, a stroller and a pack and play, and downstairs and back garden offer a lot of extra space to spread out. The finishes and fixtures are great, the interior design is beautiful, and everything is very intelligently laid out.

This apartment is on a beautiful and quiet street, 1/2 block from Central Park and just steps to a dozen great restaurants and cafes on Columbus and Amsterdam. Childrens' Musuem. Natural History Museum. All so close by. You can truly walk to everything. 

Best of all, Debora Jo surprised us with a hand baked carot cake. Classy all around.
Great place to stay, perfect for a family and easy location. Very enjoyable!

The house is awesome. It's ideally located close to many shops and proximity to Central Park is a plus with children. Dirk has been very friendly and accommodating with us. We highly recommend this house.
Dirk was a great host and the duplex is in a fantastic location.  We had a really good time.

This home was perfect for our family of five.  The UWS is family friendly and Central Park is a very short walk away.  There is plenty of room, and the home was well appointed.  We would gladly stay here again on our next trip to the city.
Great stay! We had a wonderful experience!

This is our second stay in Dirk's lovely apartment. It has been updated since our last stay years ago and everything was perfect. We had our large family with two small children and everyone was happy. We cooked dinner one night and had plenty of room to eat and play. Highly recommended!

Dirk's place is an oasis from busy NYC. Upper west side is calm, it's 1 block fr Central Park, easy subway access and the apt is really well equipped. Dirk was easy to work with, has a smooth check-in and check out process. A perfect situation for our family retreat!

No need to check any further!  This place is better then you can imagine. Pictures do not do the apartment justice. Perfect location on the Upperwest Side. Steps to Central Park and about a block to Subway. Awesome restaurants within walking distance. 
Apartment was extremely comfortable and modern. Shower was great along with all the personal touches of comfort around the house. Outdoor area is truly tranquil and peaceful. Dirk is an amazing host and will answer all your questions and concerns within minutes. 
We stayed almost 3 weeks and were very sad to leave. You actually feel like a New Yorker!

This spacious garden apartment is truly that!  It's a modern, very efficiently designed home with many convenient touches including central air conditioning and full size laundry and dryer machines. Our family of three adults and two teenagers were extremely comfortable.  And Dirk is a tremendous host. He and his team were extremely responsive. Truly appreciated his hospitality.

Dirk's place is a wonderful gem in the middle of the upper west side. It is nice, clean and spacious. The kitchen is well equipped and the bathrooms were perfectly clean. We will be happy to return someday. Thanks Dirk!

It was our first time using Airbnb and I have to admit I was not sure what to expect, but could not asked for better accommodations and host.

The location is perfect, you have everything closed by including Central Park a subway station and all the shops on Columbus Av.

The apartment itself is stylish, clean and comfortable.

Thank you Kirk!

Nous venons de passer un très agréable séjour durant 8 jours, afin de démarrer l'année 2018 à New-York !
L'appartement de Dirk est vraiment formidable : spacieux, moderne, pratique (y compris par temps de neige avec un couloir servant de vestibule aussi où faire sécher les affaires mouillées.)
La répartition sur 2 niveaux est optimum avec des ados à qui nous avions dédié l'espace du bas. Tous le confort existe dans cet appartement avec un electro-ménager à la pointe.
Enfin, l’emplacement géographique est vraiment TOP¨, à proximité de Central Parcs, de toutes les commodités pour les courses, des quartiers touristiques et animés, du métro et des bus.
Je recommande cet appartement et remercie sincèrement Dirk de son écoute, et de ses conseils.
Cdt.

Apartment in a typical brownstone house in the UWS, great location and a lot of space (even though we could not enjoy the private backyard because of the cold weather, my kids had a lot of space to play inside and in the basement). We weren't there for tourism in New York City, so we actually "lived" in the house for 10 days, cooking meals (the kitchen is great!), washing clothes, working and playing and we found everything that we needed for a comfortable stay. We haven't met Dirk in person, but he was very easy to communicate with and for sure has good taste in furnishing. The only "negative" point, if I must mention anything that could be improved, is the lack of storage room in the second bedroom. Otherwise, everything was great!
great spot. dirk was responsive and available to answer questions. i lived in the neighborhood and  felt right at home in the brownstone. will definitely return for another visit.

Dirk’s place was great for a family!  Having an outdoor garden area was a huge plus, since we have an 8 year old and a 2 year old.  We are from Florida and it snowed, and they had a safe and clean place to make a snowman!  It was a comfortable, cozy place to stay, with lots of restaurants and a great park nearby.  Dirk was very responsive, and check in was  easy.
My complaint is about the third bedroom, which is in a finished basement.  There was no heat down there, and the fold out couch was very uncomfortable.  But the two bedrooms and the rest of the living area located on the main floor were perfect.
Overall I would definitely recommend Dirk’s place to you.

Location Location Location - Central Park is right there, subway around the corner one way, Joe's coffee around the corner the other way, Gristedes, too. Wine bar across from the apartment, quiet quiet street, totally clean apartment, well equipped as far as furniture, kitchen, bathrooms, etc. but not overstuffed, so there is plenty of room for your things as well. Dirk  is extremely quick to offer a tip, communication very fast, he's a terrific host. I am from NYC originally but this is not 'my' neighborhood so it was a real treat to get to know the Upper West Side. My kids, husband and friends & family all loved the apartment, too. If you're traveling for a while as we were, the washer & dryer are a huge assist. You cannot go wrong with this place, it checks all the boxes. Enjoy!

Dirk's apartment is a real treasure. I lived in Manhattan for many years so I can appreciate the quality of the space. Nowhere can you find a duplex on the Upper West Side with this much room, and all the included amenities, for this price. It handled my family of 5 easily . The garden space out back is a real plus. The place has everything you could possibly need. It's on a quiet block just steps from Central Park and the Museum of Natural History with easy access to the subway. Great restaurants abound in the area. The physical layout was quite nice and even though it was a garden-level apartment it was completely quiet at night; no street noise to speak of, and no noise from upstairs. The design is mid-century modern, with European flair, a pretty neat combination. The bottom part of the duplex was a perfect area for my 13 year-old to commandeer  as it is set off from the main area by a cool metal staircase. There is a 1/2 bath on the lower level and a nicely sized full bath on the first floor. Appliances were all relatively new and in good working order. 

I appreciatethe fact that the apartment is on a residential block of lovely brownstones; there is a real neighborhood feel to the UWS and its easy to slip into the day-to-day routines of the block. We live nearby on Long Island and spent three days here while some work was being done at our house. We will definitely be back on future occasions when we need a dose of Manhattan.

Dirk was very responsive to any inquiry I had about the space. I would rent from him again.
Ottima posizione appartamento spazioso pulito e contemporaneo ideale per famiglie.

Dirk was a very gracious and flexible host.  The space is lovely, with a well equipped kitchen .  The close proximity to Central Park was great for morning walks and playground time. It is also just a minute walk from multiple restaurants, a grocery store and a deli.   I would recommend it to families/guests up to a party of five.

Dirks place was perfect for our family of 4 ( Kids are 20 and 18). They loved having their own space to sleep- one upstairs and one down on pullout couch. The apt. is very clean and just as pictured. They outdoor space was perfect for us to have a few family members for lunch after my daughters college graduation! Dirk is great with communication and very easy to work with. We loved the neighborhood and ate out at one of the local restaurants almost every night- plenty to choose from. Also easy to buy groceries in the neighborhood. Would definitely would stay again-- perfect for families!

We had an amazing stay at Dirk’s apartment. Everything was very neat and clean. It’s 3 blocks away from the subway station and there are lots of stores and restaurants walking distance. Dirk was always quick to respond and very accommodating with check in and check out times. Central Park half a block away with kids was incredible. I hope we can come back soon!

Dirk’s apartment was ideal for our family with two children aged 8 and 5. Beautifully appointed and comfy beds. The location was perfect for access to subway, Central Park and great food options. Communication was always very clear and responsive. We will really miss the lovely wine bar across the road.

Dirk's home was the perfect landing spot for our family's two week vacation in NYC. The location is incredible with quick entry into Central Park, lots of great restaurants, and only a few blocks to the subway and the Natural History Museum. Exceptionally clean with thoughtful attention to outfitting the home with anything our family could need. There was lots of space for us to spread out and relax, with the outdoor garden as a wonderful bonus. A private entrance with space to store umbrellas and scooters was fantastic. Dirk was quick to respond to questions and wonderfully thoughtful and kind (we came home to a delicious plate of cookies after a long day's adventure). We were very sad to leave and can't wait to return soon.

A very pleasant apartment in a great location, near the park, restaurants and public transportation. Place is clean and well equipped. Dirk is very welcoming, was recipient to our request on early check in, and went out of his way to assist with problems that came up. We highly recommend the place..

Dirk was an outstanding host, very accommodating and quick with communication.  His garden-level condo is an ideal location, close to everything you need but on a very nice and quiet side street.  The apartment itself was immaculate and worked great for a family with several kids.

Dirks house is very comfortable on a beautiful road walking distance fron the wonderful central park 
He was kind to accept our big family with the best of energy 
We would happily visit again 
Highly recommedable

This was our first experience with AirBnB and it was fantastic. We were looking for a place to stay in NYC with a "neighborhood feel" and Dirk's place fit the bill perfectly. The Upper West side is a great place and the proximity to the subway made everything perfectly accessible. My kids (ages 14, 11, 8) all loved were able to spread out and not be on top of each other like most trips staying in a hotel. The garden space was a perfect cherry on top of the location.

Dirks place suited our every need. Location to Central Park is less than a block, great for that morning stroll or run to start the day. It was so nice to leave the hustle and bustle behind  after spending a day on the well worn tourist path and enjoy a local night out for dinner. No shortage of great options around the corner. Overall was awesome, would stay here again if I get the opportunity.

Great apartment on two levels. The bedrooms at opposite ends for more privacy. Second bathroom (1/2) on lower level. Well equipped for families with young kids. Kitchen has everything you need to cook. Kids only missed having a TV on the main level while we cooked (TV is downstairs). Not a bad thing after all! 
Location is perfect: great coffee, restaurants, groceries (Gristedes, Trader Joe's, Zabars), Central Park, subway, museums, farmer's market (Tucker Square/Lincoln Center).

Our family had an amazing stay at Dirk's apartment. We had to travel for a last minute family funeral and Dirk really took care of us. He expedited the cleaning of the space from former guests and made our arrival/checkout seamless. The space is simply incredible and a real gem in the city. It has really nice touches and is quite spacious for the city. No one likes traveling for funerals, but the space could accommodate our larger group and meant we could all be together. It was exactly what we needed. Dirk was extremely responsive and a great host overall. Would definitely stay here again!
Fantastic!

Lovely garden apartment with European touches. Nice and basic but perfect for kids! Great open kitchen and big table to sit and have meals. Next to wonderful things to do with kids - museums, Central Park , tons of shops and kid friendly restaurants. Linens were super soft, plenty of towels, stocked kitchen with kids plates and cups, strollers and toys. I can’t say enough great things about our stay. We are New Yorkers but our apartment is currently rented with tenants. This was a perfect next best! We will be back!

name: The Delightful Bamboo Suite 308 Close to Beach
summary: The Bamboo Hotel is one of only three Waikiki hotels designated as a New York Times Pick. Called 'A hidden gem' on a New York Times Review and 'Honolulu's hippest, affordable place to stay in Waikiki' by Travel & Leisure Magazine.
space: Our studio has a new air-conditioner, kitchen area with two small refrigerators, two-burner stove top, microwave, coffee-maker, color cable TV, hair dryer, iron/ironing board, and free Internet access.
description: The Bamboo Hotel is one of only three Waikiki hotels designated as a New York Times Pick. Called 'A hidden gem' on a New York Times Review and 'Honolulu's hippest, affordable place to stay in Waikiki' by Travel & Leisure Magazine. Our studio has a new air-conditioner, kitchen area with two small refrigerators, two-burner stove top, microwave, coffee-maker, color cable TV, hair dryer, iron/ironing board, and free Internet access. Our Guest Host will meet you at the property for your check-in and give you keys Aloha - Here is the important contact information; We have a Guest Host who will meet you at the property for your check-in. Our process is to meet guests for their arrival at the property. It's important to call my Guest Host at ** (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ** when you arrive at the Honolulu Airport. That way he will know when to meet you at the property. This number only accepts calls, no text messages.  We also have a live answering service who will take a message if our G
neighborhood_overview: There are wonderful restaurants nearby, including the well-known Cheesecake Factory; Hy's Steak House for a very special dinner; Tiki's Grill & Bar for great food, inexpensive drinks and Duke's Canoe House, oceanfront, food, drinks, with both places great spots for sunsets, people watching and nightly entertainment; and Cheeseburger in Paradise, always crowded, located at each end of Waikiki.
notes: Often referred to as an Oasis in the Heart of Waikiki, the Aqua Bamboo & Spa is a lovely property that even includes its own Spa with a beautiful swimming pool and large sun deck in a garden setting called The Outer Sanctuary. There is a pavilion and even a barbecue grill--it's a wonderful spot to take a swim, or just simply relax after a day of activity. There is a new Cafe in the pool area that is open from 6:30 am to 4:00 pm. You can have breakfast or lunch onsite at the pool. Owners Hawaii State Tax ID # TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: - Uber and Lyft are available in Honolulu and Waikiki - 'Biki' bikeshare is available throughout Waikiki & Honolulu - Try out 'Segway' tours of Waikiki, using their stand-up scooters  - Convenient public transportation options include 'TheBus' and the 'Waikiki Trolley' - Taxis are another great way to travel when in a group and the cost can be shared. You can find taxi stands at hotels, most major shopping malls and at the airport. Note that using taxi stands and calling for pick-ups by phone or via hotel concierge is the norm in Hawaii rather than hailing a cab.
access: Our Guest Host will meet you at the property for your check-in and give you keys
interaction: Aloha - Here is the important contact information; We have a Guest Host who will meet you at the property for your check-in. Our process is to meet guests for their arrival at the property. It's important to call my Guest Host at ** (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ** when you arrive at the Honolulu Airport. That way he will know when to meet you at the property. This number only accepts calls, no text messages.  We also have a live answering service who will take a message if our Guest Host is unable to pickup immediately, please leave a message and our Guest Host will get back to you usually within 15 minutes Sincerely, Mark G.H., Property Manager, Hawaii Americana Realty

host.host_about: Real Estate Broker

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great location - close to everything in Waikiki. Beach, hotels and ABC stores right around the corner. 
It is really nice to be welcomed personally by Rob - he shows you everything and you can contact him if you need anything.
The condo is in a hotel which is great, because they have a 24h reception. 
I would definitely recommend this condo!

My family and I enjoyed the stay in WAikiki SO much! Everything was clean, there was fresh fruit waiting for us, beach towels, the apartment was in the very heart of Waikiki and the host was the best - he was so smiling, helpfull and kind! I wish to come back! :-)
The flat was really clean, almost everything has been renovated recently. A delicious pineapple and a box of Macadamia chocolate was waiting for us! Rob really made us feel at home.

Our flight got in very late and Rob (in lieu of Mark) was a totally star meeting us, exactly as he said he would, at the appt.  
The location is totally superb and couldn't be better.  We had no idea what a good place to stay would be in Honolulu but trust me this is it!  
The appt was great, perfect for our needs and generally in good shape, however, the bath/shower could do with a little work.  
The pool is just as fabulous as the picture shows and the little hot tub is brilliant.
I would highly recommend staying here :)
Host was great, location was awesome. The apt and building itself is a little old school for my taste but if you want to be right in the middle of everything this is a good choice.

Mark was very personable. Met us downstairs in the lobby and walked us upstairs. The room was very nice. I loved the pool area, very relaxing. There's also a pizza place downstairs:) There's no view from the room but having a kitchenette was a better priority for me.

I had booked this accommodation for my husbands trip to Hawaii for a conference.  Communication was very easy with Mark and the check-in process went well.  This is the Review that my Husband gave for the place - "Basic room with small kitchen.  Clean.  Beds are nice.  Great Location.  Can't beat it for the price".  So I would say it was a great success.

This was THE best place for me to stay. Super clean and the front desk people were so friendly. I had a lovely pineapple and box of chocolates waiting for me.  Would definitely stay here again. Very close to the beach. Mark and his business partner were easy to work with, friendly and professional.  Mahalo! Twila
The location is perfect. The room and facilities at Bamboo is fine. A bit old, but well kept. We did not see Mark, but the guy helping him was helpfull and doing a great job.

This room is located in best location.
It is near to waikiki beach and many shoping center.
His present was very good.(pineapple and chocolate)
Thank you.

It is located great area at Waikiki.
We had a excellent vacation. Mark  replied to my orders immediately.
Thanks to Mark.
この部屋はﾜｲｷｷﾋﾞｰﾁの近くの素晴らしい場所に位置しており､非常に有意義は休暇を取ることができました｡
ﾏｰｸは私たちの連絡にすぐに答えてくれました｡非常に感謝しております｡
Great service, great place, great price
Host is very friendly. Great location!

This is a fantastic property, i was met by Rob as arranged by Mark when i arrived at the property. Its exactly as described in the pictures, two large comfortable double beds and a small kitchen that was perfect for a week long stay. I found the property quiet and very close to all amenities, it is less that a 5minute walk to the beach, but the pool area downstairs is also very nice. 
Overall the room is excellent value for Waikiki and i would definitely stay here again.

Gute Lage, wenige Meter zum Beach, Restaurants etc.
Marc war selber nicht da, Bob hat seinen Job gut gemacht.
The location was great! Rob was very helpful when we checked in.

Rob who met us at the hotel was  welcoming and helpful.   The room is small but quite adequate  and comfortable.   It is in the center of Waikiki and a few blocks from the beach   We loved the pool and hot tub   and would stay here again just for that.   The on site cafe is really just an evening pizza parlor but we were glad it was there.   Parking is a problem though --there is none---unless you are willing  to pay $25/day  or risk a ticket on the street  if you can even find a space.  This is the perfect place if you dont want to have a car

Our stay was very enjoyable. It was close to the beach and many other services.  The pool in the building was ideally located and offered both sun and shade.  The room itself was large and well equipped kitchen supplies and even some water toys.

It was a good place to "not be there" we barely spent time in the room because there wasn't much space. We barely used the space to cook because there wasn't enough room. The balcony was great even with a view into the adjacent building/rooms. We enjoyed the poolside gathering on Thursday and the staff were very friendly and helpful. The bath tube is old and rusting and we needed more towels. The first set of towels we were given had a weird, damp smell, we had to wash them. Also the sponge was used and I have no idea how long ago. 

Other than that cheap, central place for sleep.

The host & his representative were pleasant to deal with & very helpful - everything went smoothly.
This listing was exactly what I wanted - an amazing location at a fantastic price!
