5mins walk to the beach at The Duke monument, which is right next to where the free hula show is every Tues, Thurs & Sat around sunset (check seasonal times online).
Convenience store & all sorts of restaurants really close plus the on-site pizza cafe makes delicious (large!) pizzas.
At this price, I could afford to pay for parking at the hotel next door every night (up to $25 for 24hrs as of July 2016) - note that you can't use that hotel's elevator & may need to walk up 4 levels of the car park driveways.  
The suite was 'cozy' for our adult family sharing 2 beds - 21yo twins in one bed and Mum & 19yo daughter in the other, but we were only there to sleep anyway (plus the price was too good to ignore).
Nice TV & cable and aircon unit worked well.  I used the microwave but not the stove-top, although I'm sure that would be used by other family mixes.
Good strength free Wi-Fi in-room.  Ice machine down by the nice pool.
The hotel is older, but I loved the 'old-school Hawaii' lobby.
The suite's balcony looks onto neighboring apartments' balconies, but you just close the sheer curtain during the day plus the backing curtain at night when you have your room lights on.
I would definitely recommend this for travelers who prefer to spend their money on activities, rather than their accommodation.

We were welcomed, shown to our room and everything was fine. It is in a great location, right in the middle of Waikiki and most of all it is clean. The kids enjoyed the pool after swimming at the beach and we enjoyed watching them with a glass of wine from the shop a few doors down.

It was our first experience using AirBnB so we were a bit nervous as to how it would unfold. Mark gave simple and prompt answers which assisted and we met Rob at the motel with no problem. The room was exactly as advertised and is in one of the most perfect spots to walk everywhere within a matter of minutes. The room is  exactly what you pay for and exactly what it looks like. You are not paying for a view you get a comfy bed, an air conditioner and a convenient location. All in all very thankful our first experience was pleasant and hassle free. Thank you Mark and Rob.
The location is perfect and Mark and his team were very helpful.

The host arrived promptly when we got there and was straight forward and easy. The experience was stress free. Thankfull for the air conditioning and the very comfortable beds.
A great, no frills place to stay in so close to the beautiful Waikiki beach.
Great place. Convenient to the beach and walking distance to everything you need.

Excellent location.  3 min walk to the middle of Waikiki beach, nice pool onsite. That's the gold. 

On the downside, this listing is for a small hotel room crammed with 2 double beds. It's within the hotel but privately owned so you don't really have access to the hotel reception staff etc, your accommodation manager/contact is offsite.

Check-in process is a little clumsy, you phone when you arrive and someone turns up and shows you around, provides access cards etc.

On balance, was reasonable value, but not much space or comfort. Clean, well located, ideal if you are out all day like we were.

Bamboo suite 308 was our third stay with air bnb in Hawaii. 

It's situated in the Aqua Bamboo hotel which is a great location in Waikiki. Close to everything. The lobby area, and pool is fantastic. So is the pizza place. Desk staff are super helpful. 

Suite is better suited to single people or couples/two single friends only using it for a couple of nights. 

There were some issues. Owner did not reply to any correspondence at all, including information requested for check in procedure. Apartment not well stocked and some minor things are not as advertised. Bathroom is outdated and needs maintenance.

Our family of four spent two nights at Mark's place and had a great time.  The location was perfect for us and the girls loved the pool and the beach.  Communication with Mark and Rob was very easy and we would stay again.
Thanks
Older style rooms which are nevertheless comfortable, reasonably priced and close to the center of Waikiki.
Our stay here was great. We weren't in the room much but it was a great home base. Had everything we needed and the location was perfect walking distance to everything!

Our suite was great, the location was perfect.
Thanks a lot!
Excellent host.. great location... Great communication...
The host canceled this reservation 180 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Overall it was great.  Small room but worth it as it's very close to everything (walking distance).
Rob arrived as soon as he could after I'd called and was very friendly and explained a few things about the place.  I would've preferred to have more toilet paper in the bathroom.  If possible more towels and bed linen would've been great and a vacuum cleaner would've been a bonus.
Overall a great stay!  People at the front desk were very friendly and informative and we had a great time.
Thank you Mark and Rob.
This is a great place to stay, central location to walk all around Waikiki. The staff is great and there is a fabulous pizza place right by the pool called The Lovin Oven.
Great place and location.
Loved the pool area and the closeness of the beach
Very central and host was very accommodating, unit quite small but with all you need for a nice stay.

Perfect location &great value for money. The Bamboo hotel has great friendly staff and an ok pool. The apartment was very nice and had everything we could wish for including beach towels. The balcony is not very pleasant since it is really close to another building, and there is quite a lot of noise from Kuhio ave. Overall a great stay, Mark and his colleagues made it super-easy for us to check in and out during late and early hours. We would stay here again.

A great room, right in the centre of Waikiki and easy walking distance to shops, restaurants, main streets and the beach. It is a smaller room, and we found that it was the perfect size for three. The bathroom doesn't have great ventilation, so can become a bit of a sauna; the balcony faces another building but opening the door lets in a lovely breeze. Highly recommended!

Mark was an attentive and polite host, and responded to any calls or texts regarding check in/out and a minor issue we had with the air conditioner immediately.

Room was clean and well fitted out with everything we needed and the location was right in the heart of Waikiki.

Would definately return again and recommend to others looking for no fuss accomodation in a great location
Great place for a 2a, 2c family. Small room but the location and hotel are great! Loved the pool area, and the hotel staff are so friendly and helpful.
A great spot, would stay here again for sure! Thanks Mark :-)

Mark was very accommodating and worked with our schedule being that my wife was over due on her pregnancy. He didn't have to but he did. Would definitely recommend this location. Close proximity to Waikiki and great pool area.

We had a great stay! Mark welcomed us for check-in, great communication. Everything as described, great location walking distance to everything we needed! Close to the beach, shops & zoo. Highly recommend to stay here!
Great location, good value for the area
Good location

Good location, nice pool area and the pizza place is a little expensive but delicious! Free tea/coffee and water in the lobby all day is excellent. The shower was blocked however we managed to fix this with the plunger supplied and Mark was quick to offer assistance.
위치도 너무 좋고 친절했습니다~
Excellent location and great front desk staff.

The Bamboo Suites are amazing. Cute room in a great location! The beach was about two blocks away, a very quick walk from the room! There are a ton of great restaurants near by as well. I definitely would book another stay!

I had accidentally booked a reservation. As soon as I noticed, I had sent a message to Mark explaining that I had mistakenly made a request (seconds later). He didn't hesitate to approve my reservation. HOWEVER he did ignore my message towards my explanation in canceling. I had to call airbnb to get a response. He gave me the minimum refund. HORRIBLE host. STOLE my money and took advantage.

Great place, 2 blocks from the beach. Exactly as described; third floor apartment with 2 queen beds with kitchenette and balcony (without a view). Mark was there to receive us as when we arrived and answered all the questions we had. The next morning it turned out that the shower water was not draining properly. A quick call and a couple hours later it got fixed! Perfect! Only negative thing I can say is regarding the hotel itself. We asked whether we could store our luggage for a couple hours before heading to the airport and they said no because we were not registered guests. Same thing with borrowing a broom, beach chairs or making use of the free shuttle to Ala Moana. A little bit frustrating, but nothing the host can do about this, I guess. When I contacted Mark about the beach chairs and the broom, he was happy to bring them over the next day. Very responsive host.
Great location, good value but remember your earplugs! Incredibly noisy - street noise not hotel noise. Host and cleanliness outstanding!
Very close to the beach, shopping and dining.  You can park next door, pay for several days and come and go as you please.  It’s not cheap but convenient.

Great location close to the beach and restaurants. Being able to use hotel amenities is a plus. Kitchette is a bonus. If you have a rental and are looking for parking there is a public garage next door, however pricey at $30 a day. Down the street at Waikiki Banyan there is public parking at $20 a day and they offer a weekly rate of $80, only a 10 minute walk. Had a problem with tv and guest host replied promptly when contacted and quickly resolved the problem. Rental was well stocked with dishes, cutlery, towels etc and a bonus it even had chairs for the beach. Would recommend this place and would stay there again.

Clean and well equipped apartment. The facilities looked great unfortunately too busy to use them.
Great location and on the main bus route. 
 Mark was a most welcoming host.
Shopping and restaurants 5minutes away.
Friendly staff at reception.

Très bien rapport qualité prix. Emplacement impeccable sur waikiki. Services parfait. Juste pas de possibilité de laisser les bagages à la consigne de l'hôtel a votre départ donc si vous ne partez pas tout de suite mieux de réserver une nuit supplémentaire. Apparemment hyper équipé. Très contente

Fantastic place - great communication and welcome from Mark. 
Pool and spa facilities were awesome to just hang out for the day and easy block away from Waikiki Beach, restaurants and shopping.

Mark'S place  is good location so easy to go to the beach Malls Restaurants,  of course most place they don't have parking. but  bus public  is so close to mark places Aqua Bamboo  is  popular  for shadles  to pick you up. 
thank Mark.

Our room was perfect for our family. You can't beat the location. Everything you want to do in Waikiki is in walking distance. Mark was quick to respond to our requests and he also upgraded our room to a larger one.  Mark is a great host!
Great central location with good amenities and a nice pool. The free coffee in the foyer was a nice touch to start off your day.

해변가 및 마켓이 근접한 최고의 위치에 아담하고 예쁜 수영장과 알찬 편의 시설을 갖춘 최고의 장소입니다.

딱 하나 세면대 수도가 길어서 물이 좀 많이 튀지만 크게 신경 쓸일은 아닙니다. 좋은 곳에 잘 머물다 갑니다~

There were 3 of us in the room for 9 nights on our first trip to Hawaii. The location was excellent - a short walk to the 'main' beach and close to a grocery store, car rental and both public and tour bus stops. We made use of the beach chairs and towels provided and having a small kitchenette was handy. It does need to be made clear that this is a private suite in a hotel building, and the hotel staff won't do much for you. We had an issue with our in room safe where is stopped responding to our code and despite admitting they had an override device, it took 4 days and many texts, conversations and visits with Mark to convince them to come in and help...and they charged us $50 to do it! The only other issue we had was some noisy neighbors who seemed to enjoy smoking weed at all hours of the day and night. Overall a nice room in a convenient location.
This place was very stylish. It was very accessible and easy to get to places such as the beach, restaurants, other hotels. It was a great place to stay.

Great location- easy 2 block walk to the beach and close to shops/grocery/restaurants/bus. Some street noise at night but earplugs did the job. The room was simple and clean and had all the basics- perfect for what we wanted for our stay.

Great location, great value for money! We enjoyed our stay at Aqua Bamboo it was perfect base for us exploring Oahu. The kitchenette was perfect for us to prepare breakfast & lunch for our days journey & the lovely outdoor pool area was a great space for us to return & relax in after a busy day before a  quick and easy walk to Dukes, The Royal Hawaiian, Cheese Cake Factory and many other great restaurants for dinner. Staff at front desk very welcoming and helpful, little road noise from outside but thats busy Waikiki for you, hard to escape it. Thanks Mark we enjoyed our time at your apartment. We will return.

Location is great and the pool and hot tub is very nice (although we didn’t use it). Everything you need available is within walking distance. Need a quick bite? There’s a Mexican restaurant, good taco spot, cheap (and long but worth it) Japanese udon spot), poke spot, and plenty of ABC stores within a short walk. Two blocks from Waikiki Beach. If you are a light sleeper, then you may be bothered bu the street traffic on Kūhiō, but if a normal sleeper no problem. Comfy A/C and easy check-in.
Mark’s place is clean and in an amazing location.
ありがとうございました｡
Location was great and Mark was prompt to answer any questions that I had.
We loved our stay at Bamboo. Amazing location, a block from the beach and a relaxed atmosphere round the pool. The room was fine, air con noisy though.
Marks place was convenient to the beach buses and getting places was easy, the reception at the hotel were very pleasant and helpful, the pool area was great,

Perfect for couples, maybe less with young child, the location is perfect, 2-3 minutes from the beach, 2-3 minutes from all the restaurants, store and buses. The AC was quite noisy but appart this it's perfect if you want to enjoy Waikiki.  We enjoyed our stay. Mahalo

Apartment is in a great location, super close walk to everything. Access to pool and spa included is a bonus. Check in process was smooth with host meeting us in hotel lobby then showing us through apartment. There are two beds however both are quite small if wanting to sleep with partner, and we aren’t big humans. Air con was noisy buzzing when being used. Lots of towels to access both beach and shower! Boogie boards and beach chairs available for use also. Great little kitchen that we didn’t make use of due to being so close to so many restaurants. We had trouble with the toilet on the first night/day but was fixed by later that afternoon. WiFi is super reliable and fast. Great stay.
Airbnb as expected! Close to everything you need - shopping, food, groceries, public transit. We couldn’t ask for more!

다른 숙소에 비해 저렴한 만큼 딱 그 정도의 환경과 서비스. 
청소까지는 아니더라도 수건 등은 숙박 일수 만큼 제공되면 좋을텐데 잘 안됨. 
로밍을 하지 않아 통화가 어려우면 의사소통도 쉽지 않음. 
다만 이른 체크인에 별도의 요금을 요구하지 않고 안내도 친절한 편이었음.
Great place!

Mark answered all of my questions very quickly before AND during our stay! He was also very accommodating before AND during our stay as well! He didn’t just work to get the business, he clearly wanted to keep repeat business and did an excellent job at it! Thanks Mark!

name: Huge 1 BR Apt close to A,B,C,D &1 trains
summary: I have a spacious 1 BR Apartment, with a full Living Room, Kitchen and Bathroom.  On the Upper West Side of Harlem, near A,B,C,D & 1 trains.  This has been my home for a number of years, I would love to share it with responsible guests.
space: There is a full-sized refrigerator, stove/oven, pots/pans and utensils for all of your cooking needs.  There is closet and drawer space for clothes
description: I have a spacious 1 BR Apartment, with a full Living Room, Kitchen and Bathroom.  On the Upper West Side of Harlem, near A,B,C,D & 1 trains.  This has been my home for a number of years, I would love to share it with responsible guests. There is a full-sized refrigerator, stove/oven, pots/pans and utensils for all of your cooking needs.  There is closet and drawer space for clothes You will have the Whole apartment to yourself.  There is a Queen-sized bed in the bedroom for 2 people and a Futon in the living room for a 3rd person (if needed) Like much of New York, my neighborhood is quite diverse and safe.  You will find a number of inexpensive and well-established shops and grocery stores, as well as a number of "newer"-styled restaurants and eateries. As stated before, I am near the A,B,C,D & 1 trains - A HUGE PLUS for getting to Midtown quickly!
neighborhood_overview: Like much of New York, my neighborhood is quite diverse and safe.  You will find a number of inexpensive and well-established shops and grocery stores, as well as a number of "newer"-styled restaurants and eateries.
transit: As stated before, I am near the A,B,C,D & 1 trains - A HUGE PLUS for getting to Midtown quickly!
access: You will have the Whole apartment to yourself.  There is a Queen-sized bed in the bedroom for 2 people and a Futon in the living room for a 3rd person (if needed)
house_rules: Simply leave the apartment as it was when you arrived:  Clean dishes, floor, lights and electronics off and so forth...

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Stephen was a very solicitous and  accomodating host.  He was proactive about communication and made sure I felt at home before heading out.  A great, cozy, clean space one block away from local eateries and laundry.  I would definitely recommend staying!

The apartment was beautiful. The size of the apartment is size as well. The location is awesome if you plan on cooking or relaxing inside. Neighborhood was nice and quiet, the host was awesome and cool and very helpful.

Loved my experience. Stephen was always reachable. I checked in with him and he gave me a tour and answered any questions I had. He recommended places to eat.  His place was neat, clean and close to transportation. I would definitely recommend it to others and would stay here again myself .
The space was exactly as described. Clean, accessible, and very inviting. Stephen was very helpful and accommodating. I would definitely recommend it, and even consider staying again myself.

Stephen's apartment was very clean, comfortable, and cozy, not to mentioned stocked with plenty of great books! It's within walking distance to the subway. My boyfriend and I stayed for one night and would definitely stay again.

For around 70 dollars... it's just okay. I feel like I could have got more for my money, but it was because the building is old and smells very strong of cat urine and dead mice. The apartment itself WAS clean and true to description, but the smell was so strong, it just makes you feel dirty. 

Also, there is a bit of a security issue. The front doors to the building don't lock and anyone can just walk in off the street. Then again, this is NYC, it's more common than not for old buildings have these issues because they are neglected by the owners. I lived in Harlem for 5 years and definitely experienced that before.
Stephens place was perfect for our stay. I only have 1 question. Can I stay here again next time I am in NYC? The apt. had everything we needed at a good price. THANKS

Stephen was a great host! He checked in with us regularly and made sure we had everything we needed. His place is a close walk to the subway. We also never felt unsafe wandering around the neighborhood. The apartment is on the fourth floor, so if you have difficulties with stairs it's something to keep in mind. Overall our stay was fantastic! Thanks Stephen!
Stephens apartment is very well located for sightseeing in Manhattan, close to the subway, the neighborhood is safe and stephen is a good host.

name: KICK BACK & RELAX BEACH BUNGALOW!
summary: Perfectly quaint, & recently refinished home in the heart of Kailua! 10 minute stroll to all the best restaurants and shops. 1/2 mile walk to one of the most beautiful beaches in the world!  Active Military/police/firefighter/teacher discount 10%
space: Live like a local in our magical beach pad.  We want you to feel right at home... We've put loads of TLC into transforming our 1950's beach bungalow and it is so ready for your R&R getaway.  Additional perks: - Lay back in our teak lounge chairs in the beautiful yard.  - Sun bathe on our private backyard deck - Grill available for use - Incredible brand new outdoor shower - Beach gear available for use (chairs, beach cruisers, coolers, surfboards) - Tips on the best local joints and less touristy adventure spots! #thebraddockbungalow is THE perfect oasis for anyone trying to escape the hustle and bustle and to just kick back and relax!
description: Perfectly quaint, & recently refinished home in the heart of Kailua! 10 minute stroll to all the best restaurants and shops. 1/2 mile walk to one of the most beautiful beaches in the world!  Active Military/police/firefighter/teacher discount 10% Live like a local in our magical beach pad.  We want you to feel right at home... We've put loads of TLC into transforming our 1950's beach bungalow and it is so ready for your R&R getaway.  Additional perks: - Lay back in our teak lounge chairs in the beautiful yard.  - Sun bathe on our private backyard deck - Grill available for use - Incredible brand new outdoor shower - Beach gear available for use (chairs, beach cruisers, coolers, surfboards) - Tips on the best local joints and less touristy adventure spots! #thebraddockbungalow is THE perfect oasis for anyone trying to escape the hustle and bustle and to just kick back and relax! You're welcome to utilize our home as if it were yours. Please be respectful and tidy up after yourselves :).
neighborhood_overview: Walking distance to everything! Away from the craziness of Waikiki/Honolulu and nestled in the heart of the cutest beach town in the world!!!! Our neighborhood is filled with amazing beach bungalows like ours! Neighbors are super friendly and most have been here for MANY years. We kindly ask if you are lost upon arriving to our home to not knock on the neighbors doors and to just give us a call instead to come outside or assist you over the phone. Popular VERY NEARBY Beaches: Kalama beach 0.3mi Kailua town .75mi  Castles 1mi Kailua Beach 1mi Lanikai 2mi
notes: We do have a friendly dog named Bindi. She loves all people and (most) other dogs. If you have an allergy or just don't want her around all the time, please let us know ahead of time.
transit: Right up the corner is the bus to all over the island! 57A takes you right into downtown Honolulu with connections to anywhere on the island. Uber and Lyft available. Bike cruisers always a good way to get around. If you do use the bikes, please lock them up to ensure they do not get stolen.
access: You're welcome to utilize our home as if it were yours. Please be respectful and tidy up after yourselves :). Juicer, blender, stovetop, oven, grill, and more available for use.
interaction: We can be as interactive or private as you wish. We usually work long hours and not around very much, we will be very upfront with you of when we will be around or not to give you privacy.
house_rules: Pets allowed for additional $30 per pet/night. Must be trained and get along with other dogs. Host subject to rejecting pet to stay at any point during visit.

host.host_about:
Aloha!!! 
We are originally from NY & NJ, but joined the HI life in August 2015 and don't have any plans on leaving. Tina is a trauma nurse, and Jim is a consultant at a SunRun, a solar energy company. We have one excited lab mix, Bindi. We love meeting new people, traveling around the world, going on spontaneous adventures, hiking local trails, and anything and everything related to the ocean.

reviews.comments: I love the family feel of staying with people who are from the area. The couple was wonderful and was able to make, suggestions and tips great. Thanks for everything Jan
Great hosts! Their hospitality and kindness really made the stay so much fun and relaxing (their lovely dogs are amazing too. Will definitely stay at their place again when I come back to Oahu.

Jim and Tina's place was a great fit for us in Hawaii. They were very welcoming and really made sure we were comfortable during out entire stay. They treated us like their long time friends and peers. Their house was very close to the beach and downtown. They let us use their bikes which was a  big plus. They had great recommendations for the area which kept us busy the whole time. Their dog's were very chill. Great place for any traveller. I would recommend this place to other travellers; just make note if you require an early checkin time, to contact them early, as they both might be working late.

The hosts were amazing! We felt extremely welcome into their home. The neighborhood was exactly what we were looking for. The beach was perfect for swimming and we found fun stuff to do around town at night. They also recommended us great hikes and places to eat.

Tina and Jim were amazing hosts - they are new Hawaiian residents but they already know a lot about Hawaii and their enthusiasm for Hawaii made us excited to be there ! They made us feel at home right away and are very easy to get along with. They are very friendly and have a chill atmosphere at their lovely beach cottage. We enjoyed getting to know them and they respected our space and quiet time when we needed it. They've done an awesome job renovating their place into a comfortable and clean home. Their dogs are sweethearts - Tina and Jim are excellent dog owners. 

During our 5-day stay, we did a lot of beaching, eating out at the delicious places in town, read or watched TV, and  slept a lot. It was very relaxing. If you want a place where you're away from Honolulu but still have access to it easily, this is the place for you!

Tina and Jimmy's place was in a great location to kick back at the beach and explore the island from. Tina and Jimmy were happy to let us laze around watching TV. They have made a big effort to make their place comfortable for guests. The bikes are an excellent way of getting around Kailua, either into town to get supplies or when heading to the beach.

After a mix up on our arrival Tina came home and let us in . That are a young couple who were very generous in sharing their kitchen, coffee, etc. and since they she and husband Jim are busy working they left us to enjoy their newly remodeled home along with two dogs. The house is about a mile from town, two miles from beach, and bikes are available. Traffic in Kailua is gnarly, so bikes are best. The bedroom is tiny, the bed is a comfortable double bed, and it gets hot in afternoon. Thanks for your hospitality Tina and Jim!
We didn't have email to check the location and the A was left off the number address but we got there. Parking in driveway good and bikes provided. Small and cozy but nicely decorated and breezy.

I had a great stay at Jim and Tina's. They were extremely friendly and accommodating. The room was nice, and I even had the entire place to myself for a few days since Jim and Tina were gone on a hiking trip.

The location was excellent. 10 minute walk from the beach and downtown Kailua.

The only negative was that my bed wasn't ready when I got there around midnight my first night. No big deal. They apologized profusely and I could tell that it was an honest mistake.

Tina and Jim were wonderful and so accommodating. Their home was adorable inside and out. We were able to use their bikes and the beach was only a
short walk away. Kailua was a very cute town and the home was walking distance from shops, restaurants, etc. Thank you for everything!

Kailua is a beautiful town, and Tina and Jimmy's house is just as beautiful! Great decor and friendly dogs, and a short walk to the beach and shops. They went the extra mile for me too by picking me up from the bus stop and even giving me a lift to the airport! Thanks so much guys, it was brief but wonderful.

Tina and Jim made us feel right at home! Their cottage is so cute and clean. Incredibly comfortable and just as pleasant as in the pictures. When home, Tina and Jim were wonderful to chat with. They both work, so it seemed like we had the house all to ourselves, which was also nice :), especially with two loud energetic young kids! They have a yard, which was great to play in and nice neighbors too! They are also centrally located to restaurants and the beach. I'd definitely stay with them again!

Tina and Jimmy were lovely hosts. They made us feel very welcome. We were a bit lax in our arrival communication because it was our last night in Hawaii, so we were out making the most of it and didn't see their messages until later in the afternoon, but they went out of their way to make sure we could get in the house and to make sure we felt at home and comfortable. We were able to visit with them a bit later in the evening, and they were super friendly and fun. We only wish we could have stayed longer! Kailua is beautiful, and Tina and Jimmy's home is very nicely located in town. They left all sorts of great recommendations for visitors, and made us feel very at home. We would absolutely come back to stay with them again the next time we return to Oahu.

My wife and I had a great stay. Tina and her husband were excellent hosts. They gave good local restaurant recommendations and let us use their bikes to ride around town. Their dogs were awesome as well. We will definitely keep them in mind for future stays!

Tina and Jim have a lovely, light filled beach style house in a quiet neighbourhood close to the beach and a short drive from town. They are a friendly couple (with two cute dogs) who were there to answer any questions - as well as give us some great restaurant recommendations - whilst allowing us space as well. Would definitely recommend for a stay in Kailua.

We really enjoyed staying at Tina and Jim's place. They were very welcoming, it was very comfortable, and it's in a great location. Having access to a couple of bikes really helped, but everything we needed was withing walking distance anyway. Both Tina and Jim were happy to give advice on where to eat and drink. We really enjoyed our time in Kailua, thanks in large part to such great hosts.

Tina & Jim's cottage is immaculately clean, airy and perfectly situated in Kailua. It's just a short walk to beautiful Kamala Bay beach and an easy walk to town center (and they have bikes available if you prefer). I highly recommend the Sunday morning Farmers' Market, if you are in town. Parking was easily available at their home. It's a quiet neighborhood - I slept well. They provide beach chairs, beach towels, plenty of room in the fridge for your food/beverages, and a sweet dog, Bindi, to keep you company if you wish. They're kind, thoughtful hosts, and yet allow you your privacy. They've made great updates to their home - the outdoor shower is wonderful, their yard is lovely and they're working on staining/finishing off a nice deck area as well. The room is perfect for a single traveler like myself. There was a basket filled with information on Kailua and surrounding areas, as well as amenities (toothpaste, shower gel, shampoo, etc.) I didn't do any cooking (my choice), but they have a nicely furnished kitchen. I appreciated the "green" choice of coffee pods for their Keurig! I loved having breakfast on their cozy, shady porch looking out over their yard edged with flowers. Directions to their place were excellent. All in all, I would go back in a heartbeat. Thank you, Tina & Jim - you made my return to Hawaii quite wonderful!
Thanks Tina, Jim and Bindi for a lovely stay in your house! If we ever make the long trip over from Europe again we will look you up!
This is the greatest, friendliest, most relaxed Airbnb ever. Thank you Tina and Jim :)
Tina and her husband were great. They were very welcoming and hospitable, even when a few friends got out of hand. Their home is very nice and warming. I would stay again if they'd let me.
Tina and Jim were excellent hosts! We had some travel difficulties and they were super helpful and flexible with check in and check out. Great hosts! Absolutely recommend!
We had a great time at Tina's home and in Kailua more generally. I highly recommend staying with her.

We had a wonderful time at Tina's and Jim's place. They gave us plenty of advice and recommendations on what to do around Kailua, provided us with all we needed to enjoy our stay. The bikes, washer/dryer were really useful, and the house is really nice (table outside is perfect for dinner!). It is perfectly convenient for travelers.
We can only recommend it to future guests: great hosts, great house (and friendly dog). We wish we'd spent more time there!

Great location! You can walk to the beautiful beaches and to the town. If you are coming to Oahu you really should come to Kalua and this is a great place to stay.  Friendly hosts, great location, lovely beach cottage.
All in all a comfortable place to stay. More details about which unit we were staying in would have been helpful, but all was fine when the host came out and greeted us.

Tina and her husband were welcoming and friendly. The house and room were clean and very well decorated. The location wasn't too far from the restaurants and shops. We were able to walk everywhere no problem, but some may choose to drive, especially if you're going to the beach. It was a quick trip, but Tina was very helpful with any questions we had, and gave great recommendations for hikes and places to eat.

Great spot!

Tina and Jim are both very kind and capable of giving you privacy as well as answering any questions you may have. They are very open with their home which makes you feel very comfortable and like you are home away from home. The beach is in walking distance and was the best beach we saw while in Hawaii. Tina and Jim are very open with their supplies such as bikes, and gear. Their openness invites you to be comfortable and we were very thankful for it. Would definitely stay at their home again. Kailua can not be beat.
Good host.  Great, friendly dog.  Breezy room.

Great location. About 20 minute walk to the beach and on a dead end street. Nice and quiet. The room has a window air conditioner which was great. The bed is an airbed and a bit short, but very comfy.
Lovely place, but the bed was a bit small for two adults to sleep.
This house is fabulous! The hosts were kind and flexible when I needed to adjust my arrival date. Close to the most beautiful beach!
Great room right near the heart of Kailua and Jimmy was always friendly and answered any questions we had.
The location is awesome, which is walkable to the beautiful beach and close to many great restaurants. Jim also hosted us warmly.

Incredibly well-kept room in a gorgeous home in walking distance of downtown Kailua. Their dog, Bindi, is a real sweetheart (once bribed with a few treats). Jim was very helpful on my arrival and provided full run of his home. If you’re looking for a comfy place convenient to Kailua and Kaneohe, you won’t find a much better deal than Tina and Jim’s home.
I had a great time in Kailua. This was a great place to stay.

ﾎｽﾄさん夫婦はとても仲が良く親切でした!愛犬のﾋﾞﾝﾃﾞｨも超ﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰで可愛いかった｡
お家は可愛いくて､ｶｲﾙｱに住んでる様に生活出来ました!
英語が苦手な私達夫婦でも､iPhoneの翻訳ｱﾌﾟﾘなどでｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝを取る事が出来ました!
私達は英語をもっと勉強してまたﾃｨﾅとｼﾞﾐｰのお家に帰ってきたいと思いました｡
本当にお世話になりました!
Great location, close to the beach and restaurants. Kailua is a really nice quiet town. Jim and Tina are really good about giving you privacy. Overall really good room to stay in.

We had a great stay at Tina's place with sweet Bindi. The home is really comfortable and welcoming. It's a very residential neighborhood with easy access to pretty much anything you would need during your stay, beautiful beaches & hikes. Would definitely recommend.
Loved this place! Tina was super helpful and the house had such a cool vibe, we were super comfortable for our short stay in Kailua.

We really enjoyed our stay at Tina’s place. Kailua is a great town, and the beach is good fun. Tina was away during our stay, but she arranged for everything, making our stay very easy. The house is stylish and there was lots of beach gear available for our use. Big bonus: Bindi is the sweetest little pup. Would definitely recommend

Tina and Jim’s place is beautiful, in a great location for biking to beaches and a few shops plus very close to a bus stop to other places on the island. They are lovely people, generous, and relaxed. Thanks so much!

Thanks to Tina and Jim for our stay. It was exactly as you would expect from description. Tina and Jim were helpful with suggestions and our questions as needed but also gave us lots of space and privacy. We were made to feel very comfortable using the kitchen, bikes, couches etc. Bhindi, the dog is so freaking cute and friendly! Great stay!
We had a great stay.
Tina was prompt in responding to our room request on such short notice. We were welcome with candlelit room when we arrived. Our room was nice clean and well decorated. A+!

Jimmy met us in person and was very warm and friendly, their home is beautiful at an ideal location . 

The late check in was hassle free and he even moved his car so that we could park ours.

Real value for money

Beautiful home - like something out of a West Elm catalog or Instagram #thebeachlife! Pictures don't do it justice. Everything was super clean plus a wooden outdoor shower. Great to use their bike to head to the beach and not have to worry about parking and keys.  Highly recommend the beaches and town of Kailua - it's a gem!
Nice place in a great location.   Kick back and relax, island style.  Feel the breeze, enjoy the view, and take advantage of the proximity of everything you need.
Tina and Jim are very kind and their dog Bindy is so cute! Also this house located perfect place for us because beach, restaurant and shopping’s are in walking distance(15min or less).

name: Habitación privada
summary: Es un apartamento con 4 habitaciones y estoy alquilando 1 para una persona ordenada y limpia. El apartamento se encuentra en Hostafrancs, está muy bien ubicado, esta a 5 minutos de Plaza España. Tiene patio, sala de comer, sala de estar, cocina...
space: Alquilo habitación con cama matrimonial armario  con ventana al patio tv
description: Es un apartamento con 4 habitaciones y estoy alquilando 1 para una persona ordenada y limpia. El apartamento se encuentra en Hostafrancs, está muy bien ubicado, esta a 5 minutos de Plaza España. Tiene patio, sala de comer, sala de estar, cocina... Alquilo habitación con cama matrimonial armario  con ventana al patio tv Puede utilizar la cocina, el comedor, la sala que es grande, la lavadora etc Puedes contactar conmigo en cualquier momento, ya sea vía (Hidden by Airbnb) o telefonicamente estamos disponibles para ayudarte en todo lo que necesites. El barrio es muy tranquilo, tienes la avenida principal a 2 calles. Puedes llegar en taxi, en bus o en metro. Con cualquier tipo de transporte encontrarás fácil el apartamento.

reviews.comments: La habitación está bien y la casa en general también, buena conexión con metro l1. Experiencia agradable con buenos compañeros

Gabriel, was in contact with me all the way since before i arrived, provided me with all information needed, i had a very nice welcome by Him, he showed me everything inside the apartment and gave me some advice for places to go, (Markets, bars, touristic visits, etc.. ). The neighborhood is safe, and alive, but also quite at night which is really convenient, he was there to provide any kind of help at any point of my stay over a 1 year period. i would advice anyone not to hesitate to stay here.

Todo bien! La habitacion grande y con vista para la calle, cerca plaza espanya! Muy bien
Gracias por todo

¡Increíble lugar!  Tiene todo, es un depa muy moderno y cómodo. Está muy cerca de plaza España y cerca de una avenida donde puedes encontrar de todo. 
La zona es muy tranquila y familiar. 
Me recibió Aurora, súper amable, atenta, y siempre estuvo al pendiente de lo que yo necesitara. 
Definitivamente si vienen a Barcelona no duden en hospedarse aquí.
